High _ priest- emllu _ agghis tetlu _ ipa u ni naagh aat _ apegh llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ . _ whanga mkun _ lata t _ tuyugh ait _ Jews- elgu tem nnun _ Damascus - melngughnun _ , _ lata tke ma kangatnga _ ivagh i yaghtugh u ni lunga _ ugpeqagh neng _ . _ naalke gkumki _ asigh qelluki _ tagite naqngu yagh anka _ Jerusalem-emun _ aghyuugh na luki _ .
" _ taagken _ Jerusalem-emeng _ Damascus -mun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe unga llu _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ qilag meng _ nighug ghllag _ kuukgute qagh uq _ whanga mnun _ .
ullegh aghte lunga _ nuna mun _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ Saul _ , _ Saul _ , _ sangama _ amyuutke aqe zinga _ ? _ '
aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ kina u ziin _ , _ atanegh _ ? _ ' _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ Jesus -ngu unga _ Nazareth -eghm ii _ amyuqetagh te kegken _ . _ '
tamaakut _ igleghalgute ma _ esghagh kaqe aat _ nighug _ iwernga _ aleghqugh tem a _ me a _ nagaqugh mangite aat _ .
enkaam _ aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ sa langa _ ? _ ' _ Atanghem _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ nekeve luten _ aglagh a _ Damascus -mun _ . _ tawani _ kitum _ ungipaate lleqe aaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqekagh aneng _ elpenun _ . _ '
ayaa ma lghiinga _ nighug ghllag m _ angtalanganeng _ enkaam _ igleghalgute ma _ taslugh aatnga _ Damascus -mun _ .
" _ kaate yamta _ yug m _ A nan i as -ngu uniiq egk angita _ esghagh yaghtugh aanga _ . _ elngaatall _ qaatke te nga lghii _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ , _ Damascus -eghmiit _ Jews-et _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ akuzite kaqe kangat _ .
taku lunga _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ anglegute mni _ Saul _ , _ esgh as ag un neqig ten _ ! _ ' _ enkaam _ tawaninginaq _ esghaate yagute lunga _ esghagh aqa _ .
pi unga _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sivunegh mta _ manigugh qite te a _ , _ nakmike aaten _ elpenun _ liigike sqellug qu _ piyuke lleg ni _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ Qepghagh teni _ , _ nagate sqellug qu _ aleghqugh kangaten _ .
enkaam _ ungipaghtekete lleqe aaten _ tea- ma anun _ esghaate llegh gpeneng llu _ nagate llegh gpeneng llu _ .
sa meng _ utaqa i aqe ziin _ ? _ sa aqe ziin _ paaptaaye sten _ , _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ ughvugh ste ki _ tuqlugh i llegh gpegun _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ Jerusalem-emun _ tagi nqigte lunga _ , _ temple- mi _ yughagh ma lunga _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun
esghagh aqa _ atanegh _ . _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe ragkiigh i _ Jerusalem-emeng _ qayughllak _ maani _ tugukligh naanghite aat _ ungipagh n _ whanga mneng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ '
kiimsigh aqa _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ liisimakngwaagh aat _ synagogue- nnun _ pi aqe lunga _ tugulagh kaqe anka _ ugpegh lghiit _ elpeneng _ , _ anag ul egh testaq ank allu _ anusimingllagh ste aqe anka llu _ .
ungipagh ten _ stephen _ tuqute aqe yatgu _ legan _ itagnaq egkaq aqa _ , _ taakut _ tuqut isteng ita _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh it _ aflengake kaqe anka _ . _ '
Atanghem _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe i _ , _ kayagte naqngu amken _ agavek _ uyavagh nun _ Gentile-enun _ . _ ' _ "
tamaakut _ yug lghute t _ nagatekagh at _ Paul _ kenlanga _ Gentile-enun _ pi naqe ni llegh anun _ . _ taagken _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t _ , _ " _ tuqute ggu _ ! _ unguva u yaghqaa nghite uq _ ! _ "
Sak r itu teghllag em _ angtalanganeng _ akilghuu te kete luku _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh teng _ nengug te luki _ aghula tke ait _ , _ suna meng llu _ qule mun _ milughmigkagh t _ .
Pilluw aghtet _ umiileg ita _ esghapag luki _ pilluwagh te minun _ itghute sqekagh a _ Paul _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ . _ kayagte tke a llu _ kagsagmig sqellug qu _ apegh sqellug qu _ sangan _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ akilghuu tke ta a _ .
iwernga _ asigh qes atni _ Paul-em _ aaptekagh a _ umiileg u aq _ , _ " _ Rome-em _ liilightuusagh itni _ itagnagh yaghqau a _ kagsagmig kufsigu _ Rome-eghm ii _ , _ talwa _ nanqigte gpenaan _ sa meng _ anaggute ma ta a _ ? _ "
Paul-em _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ umiil waaghem _ umiileg eng _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sa naqe ziin _ ? _ una _ yuug _ Rome-eghm ii nguuq _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg m _ taku luku _ Paul _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ ipa _ Rome-eghm ii ngu z iin _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
Pilluw aghtet _ umiileg ita _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whanga _ llivike te ghllag lunga _ Rome-eghm ii ngugh te kaagunga _ . _ " _ Paul-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whanga _ Rome-eghm ii ngulunga _ allgegh kau unga _ . _ "
taakut _ aapqugh aagh tek aghq aqsaq angi _ tawaninginaq _ iq ill agh aatkat _ ellnga neng _ . _ Pilluw aghtet _ umiileg ita _ liigike yamigu _ Paul _ Rome-eghm iing utanga _ alingekagh _ qayughllak _ asighqe stekaqe kanga _ .
Pilluw aghtet _ umiileg ita _ liigike sug qu a _ Jews-enun _ sa meng _ apallugh ke ta a _ Paul _ . _ enkaam _ unaami ani _ qiipraghute igh stekagh a _ . _ taagken _ chief _ priest-etlu _ agghis tetlu _ qerngughte te ste luki _ aglagh tke a _ Paul _ ellngit nun _ .
Paul-em _ qiive luki _ agghis tet _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew - lgu temni _ , _ aghnegh mun _ whavek _ kenlanga _ seghleghyug ta ite unga _ kiyaghte lleg mni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ "
aga _ High _ P riest-em _ A nan i as-em _ nekevgha lghii nun _ Paul-em _ tung angani _ qelegh tke a _ Paul _ qasaghte sqellug qu _ qaangh akun _ .
taagken _ Paul-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe aaten _ , _ uyuq _ piniiyugnegh _ ! _ liilightuusagh tgun _ nanqig saghq aqagh pe nga _ iwernga _ elpek _ naafqe aten _ liilightuusagh t _ qasaghte ste llegh gpegun _ . _ "
Paul-em _ saaghw anilnguut _ nekevgha lghiit _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ seghletun _ aleghqugh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ high _ priest- nga _ . _ "
Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew - lgu temni _ , _ liisimake yagh kumkun _ high _ priest- nge ta a _ tawaten _ pi nayagh nghite aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake yagh aqa _ akuzite i _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ igleghte te i lghiit _ yug gpesineng _ seghletun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe nghite asi _ . _ ' _ "
Paul-em _ liigike luki _ ila i _ Sa dd uc ees -ng utangi _ , _ ila i _ pharisees- nge ta i _ iglagtu luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew - lgu temni _ , _ pharisee- ngugh u nga _ , _ sivun gh en k allu _ pharisees- ngugh t _ . _ whaa _ nanqigte na qagh zinga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kenka _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghsaghqagh u ta i _ . _ "
Paul _ tawaten _ pi yan _ Pharisees-etlu _ Sa dd uc ees -etlu _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ aga _ malgh ugh qeng ngin aam aghmeng _ pikagh t _ .
( _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ qayughllak _ Pharisees-et _ ugpeqe u kangit _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ , _ yaqulegtu ni luku _ , _ taghneghaghtu ni luku llu _ , _ naqam _ Sa dd uc ees -et _ ugpeqe igate kangit _ tamaakut _ ) _ .
qenwat _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ iglag tugh tekat _ . _ ila ita _ Pharisees-et _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ mesag ii aghagh tke aat _ Paul _ whaten _ , _ " _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ naal kef ik neghmeng _ aghtugh aghput _ , _ ipa _ entaqun _ taghneghagh m _ nalighmeng _ yaquleg m _ aleghqugh ma a _ . _ "
wanlegi _ aaghtiiraagh te ghllag yata _ repall _ Paul _ wayagh te luku _ lliigh yatgu _ , _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ yakugh yagute luku _ aqnighte na yu katgu _ pilluwagh te minun _ aqfa ste luku _ aw ite u te sqekagh a _ agghis ten eng _ . _ enkaam _ aglagh te sqekagh a _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
tawani _ unugmi _ Atanghem _ aliigh vike luku _ Paul _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ilutu luten _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ Jerusalem-emi _ ungipagh ke llegh gpetun _ , _ Rome- em illu _ ungipaq elleq aghpenga _ . _ "
unaami ani _ 4 0 - neng _ uglagh lghiit _ Jews-et _ agghite luteng _ tuqute naqekagh at _ Paul _ . _ Ell meggneng _ akeqe tke aat _ negh naanghite ni luteng llu _ , _ megh naanghite ni luteng llu _ kenlanga _ tuqute llegh meggnun _ .
enkaam _ chief _ priest- en unllu _ siivanllegh nun llu _ aglagh luteng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ akeqe i ukut _ negh naanghite ni luta _ kenlanga _ tuqute lleg mnnun _ Paul _ .
elpek si llu _ agghis tetlu _ aapte ggu _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ tagin neqig tesqelluku _ Paul _ aapqugh aagh waagh naq niluku _ . _ enkaam _ tume mi _ taakwani _ whangkuta _ tuqu lleq aghput _ . _ "
iwernga _ Paul-em _ uyghu an _ nagaqugh luki _ agghi llegh it _ ungipaate yaghtuqagh a _ Paul _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
ungipaate yatni _ Paul-em _ tuqlugh luku _ umiileg u aq _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ U um _ nukalpig aam _ ungipaa su w aqaa _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ sa meng _ , _ aglagh te aghte gu _ . _ "
Umiil waaghem _ tugu luku _ , _ aglagh te luku _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anusimingllaghagh m _ Paul-em _ tagite sqe a _ elpenun _ una _ nukalpigagh _ , _ sam enguq _ ungipaa su w aaten _ . _ "
umiileg m _ tas luq luku _ iqitute luku _ ellngin aagh samek _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ ungipaate yug zinga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Jews-et _ agghi te ma ut _ aapte na luteng _ Paul _ aglagh te aghte sqellug qu _ agghi vig mun _ unaami _ , _ aapqugh wagh atagh aghnaq niluku _ .
ugpeqe gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ 4 0 - neng _ uglagh ut _ yug t _ iigh luteng _ tume mi _ utaqa i naqe ni lghiit _ tuqute na luku _ . _ akeqe i ma ut _ negh naanghite ni luteng llu _ , _ megh naanghite ni luteng llu _ kenlanga _ tuqute llegh meggnun _ Paul _ . _ apeghiigh luteng _ utaqa i aqe ut _ naten _ pi lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ "
umiileg m _ inegh tengngwaaq aa _ nukalpigagh _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ ungipaate yaghtugh ma ni lunga _ . _ " _ taagken _ aane stekagh a _ .
taagken _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ tagsiqligh lukek _ umiileg u aaghek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ 2 00 _ pilluwaghtet _ , _ 7 0 _ ku unit istet _ , _ 2 00 _ pan as tet _ iglegh saqleg g iin aagh ll in nguq _ Caesarea- mun _ , _ ighivgaqun _ 9 - ek laag mi _ .
Paul -llu _ kuuni meng _ yataaghqe te nakesi _ iglegh usigh qameng _ , _ wataghllak _ pinitun _ kaat ute na ke si _ Governor -mun _ F eli x -mun _ . _ "
taagken _ g overnor -mun _ lata tkekagh a _ Paul _ :
ukut _ lata t _ C l a ud i us _ Ly si as -meng _ pi u ut _ angegh lleg mnun _ Governor -mun _ F eli x -mun _ , _ quyake amken _ .
Jews-et _ tugu kaqe aat _ Paul _ , _ tuqute naqe aqe yaghpete aat llu _ iwernga _ liigike luku _ Rome-eghm iing utanga _ pilluwagh te ku llghiini _ aqf aagh put _ aqnighte na yu katgu _ .
liigike yug luku _ Jews-enun _ sa meng _ apallugh ke ta a _ agghis teng itnun _ aglagh te aqa _ .
iwernga _ liigike yaqegka _ sa meng _ apallugh ite uq _ tuqute yaghqaa luni _ , _ talwa _ anusimingllagh yaghqaa luni _ . _ taawanginaq _ Jews-et _ qaatku unegh in niluku _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ pi aqe aat _ .
ungipaate yatnga _ Jews-en nguq _ tuqute naqe aqe aat _ Paul _ , _ tawaninginaq _ elpenun _ aglagh te ste aqa _ . _ taakut llu _ av utk isteng i _ kayagte anka _ elpenun _ apegh yaghtigh sqellug qu _ apallugh at _ .
enkaam _ unugmi _ tawani _ pilluwaghtet _ kayagte llegh megestun _ aghulaqe tke aat _ Paul _ kenlanga _ antipatris- mun _ .
unaami ani _ ila i _ uteghnigh iqe aat _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ , _ taakut _ ku unit istet _ nagnegh tke aat _ Paul _ Caesarea- mun _ .
kaate luteng _ Paul _ aglagh tke aat _ g overnor -mun _ , _ lata t llu _ tuunekagh it _ .
Governor -em _ lata t _ atightugh luki _ aaptekagh a _ Paul _ , _ " _ nalighnegh aneng _ Rome-em _ pi u ziin _ ? _ " _ Paul-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ C il ic ia- meng _ " _ .
Governor -em _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ Av utk iste ten _ kaate kata _ nanqigte lleqe amken _ . _ " _ taagken _ kelengak ist enun _ kayagte tke a _ kelengake sqellug qu _ P ra et o ri um -e mi _ mangteghagh mi _ Herod-em _ ulima stekagh ani _ .
tallimat _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ High _ priest- a _ A nan i as _ , _ ila i llu _ siivanllegh t _ , _ akuzi stekaghqagh at llu _ tertullus _ , _ kaate tke aat _ Caesarea- mun _ . _ nanqigtivig mi _ Governor -mun _ F eli x -mun _ apeghkagh it _ Paul-em _ seghletun _ pillgh i _ .
tuqlugh yatni _ tertullus _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ angegh lleg mni _ governor _ F eli x -mi _ , _ elpek _ apallugh ke luten _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut _ nuna mnni _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ . _ tamaakut llu _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ allangughte qughkagh ten _ pinigh ut _ .
sa llegh gpenun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ iyamsiqa yug ghllagu ukut _ .
kimaawi ste nayuke amken _ takestaaghhaa luku _ akuzi naqe unga _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ nagate naqe kefkut _ .
una _ yuug _ Paul _ seghleliigh q iste nguuq _ . _ seghleliighqagh ke ai _ qamagte luki _ Jews-et _ naan sagh ngaata _ . _ M agh yaghq ugh tekaat _ Jesus-em _ Nazareth -eghm iim _ maligsaaghtengita _ .
talwa _ sakusiiqe naqe kaqsagh aa _ temple- a _ , _ iwernga _ tuguk aqaghput _ .
Nanqig gnaq egkaq sagh aghput _ lii ll igh tuus amta _ pillgh atun _ , _ taawanginaq _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ Ly si as-em _ tagi luni _ pilluwagh te minun _ wayagh stekaqe a _ whangkunneng _ . _ taagken _ qelegh ai _ av utk isteng i _ elpenun _ tagis qelluki _ .
governor _ F eli x -mi _ , _ aapqugh aaqu v gu _ liigike lleqe aten _ anaggute ni lleg put _ ipa u ta i _ . _ "
Jews-et _ ilate qaghtekagh t _ tertullus- mun _ , _ akuzillegh i _ qamagte luki _ ipa u nikagh it _ .
taagken _ g overnor -em _ Paul _ akuzi sqekagh a _ . _ enkaam _ Paul _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ governor _ F eli x -mi _ , _ quya unga _ mesighagh naqe lghiinga _ elpenun _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake amken _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ nanqigte i ste u uten _ whangkunnun _ Jews-enun _ .
elpek ni _ liigike yugnagh uq _ ipa u ta a _ aku g aa rugllak _ Jerusalem - etel qa _ maniguute na lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Anag gun n is tem a _ liisimake aatnga _ aaghtiiraagh mangite aqa _ kina _ alngunak _ , _ qap r aghq ii mang itu ngallu _ yug neng _ temple- mi _ , _ synagogue- n nillu _ , _ talwa _ nani _ alngunak _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
Enkaangam _ tawaten _ pi ma ni ghngaaghmegtengnga _ ipapigh qen naanghi taat _ .
iwernga _ apegh naqe aqa _ una _ elpesi nun _ , _ manigugh aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh at _ sivunegh mta _ maligte luku _ T um anga _ Jesus-em _ . _ ukut _ yug t _ pi kangat _ temngingu ni luku _ . _ iwernga _ whanga llu _ ellngistun _ ugpeqe anka _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ igaqegkagh it _ .
Anag gun n is tem tunllu _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh tesaghq aqii _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ tuqukagh t _ pinigh yagh nga a ta _ , _ seghleghu yagh nga a ta _ .
Enkaangam _ quunpeng _ kiyaghte naqutke aqe unga _ seghleghyug te kaghqagh ite te lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ .
" _ qafsinegyag _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ qantaghaqu nghhagh _ uteghnigh unga _ Jerusalem-emun _ man il in naluki _ akluma lghiit _ Jews- el gut enka _ , _ aghqer raagh nal ungallu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
pelungighsagh nghmeng _ apeghiigh lunga _ temple- mi _ aghqer raagh um alunga _ , _ ila ita _ Jews-et _ Asi a-meng _ pi t _ esghagh aatnga _ . _ uvite ka _ paaghqite uq llu _ seghleliigh i tuq llu _ .
taakut _ Jews-et _ sangameng _ tagi nghite aat _ ? _ sa meng _ anaggute ma kuma _ ellng ingu yagh tut _ apegh i stekaghqagh nka _ seghletun _ pilleg mneng _ iwernga _ aviite ut _ .
yeqay _ ukut _ whaan lenguut _ nagate kaqe aatnga _ mesighagh aqngama _ Jews-et _ agghi vig itni _ , _ apegh litgu _ anaggute llegh meng _ naal kef ikum aku meg tengnga _ .
entaqun _ ellngit ni _ seghleghu uq _ whaten _ pi aqe yamki _ , _ ' _ Nanqig tagh pesinga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kenka _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ . _ ' _ "
iwernga _ F eli x -em _ , _ liisimakngwaagh luku _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh a _ , _ w in taku si t kaa _ nanqigte gpenaan _ Paul _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Pilluw aghtet _ umiileg at _ Ly si as _ kaate kan _ agghi tke lleqe aqa _ Paul _ . _ "
taagken _ umiil waaghmun _ kayagte tke a _ Paul _ kelengake sqellug qu _ , _ naqam _ anusimingllagh snanigh qagh a _ . _ ighsake ste na nigh ke ai llu _ ilakumtaagh ita _ sa meng _ tagite nghatgu _ aklukegk aaneng _ .
qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ F eli x -em _ Jews -a _ nuliigh ni _ , _ D r usi ll a _ , _ kelqellug qu _ tagikagh _ . _ tagsiqligh luku _ Paul _ , _ nagatekagh ak _ ungipagh lghii _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
Paul-em _ akuzi tke sag ke i _ ukut _ : _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ governor _ F eli x -em _ alinge luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Aan elgh aat en Ê¼ngam _ , _ alla _ aqfa ste lleqe amken _ pi lleghqagh nge gkuma _ . _ "
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ felix _ neghyu u yagh lghii _ Paul -mun _ man il illeq niluni _ pegtekunigu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tagsiqligh aqe kanga _ mulu te gpenaan _ aleghquute na lutek _ .
taagken _ maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ atugh lukek _ , _ P or c i us _ festus _ g overnor -ngugh tekaq _ . _ iwernga _ F eli x -em _ efqugh sug luki _ Jews-et _ Paul _ unitekagh a _ paninang _ qiipragh usigh ng aluku _ .
festus _ kaa sa mi _ Caesarea- mun _ igleghte te i na luni _ , _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ aghulaqekagh _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
tawani _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ igleghutisteng itallu _ Jews-et _ ungipitekagh at _ , _ Paul _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag kau ni luku _ Jews-en eng _ .
sagiqe tke aat _ festus- mun _ , _ Paul _ tagite sqellug qu _ Jerusalem-emun _ qayughllak _ aksaqe luku _ tuqute yu ke aat _ tumangani _ .
iwernga _ F es tus -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Paul _ kelengak aqaghput _ Caesarea- mi _ . _ qantaghaqun _ uteghnigh yaghqaa unga _ ,
igleghut is teg pesi _ maligte nakangatnga _ . _ elngaatall _ tawani _ sa meng _ anaggute ma kan _ apegh nakangat _ . _ "
festus _ Jerusalem -em e tagh aqaq _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ nalighmeng _ qula _ aghneq _ , _ taagken _ Caesarea- t kaq _ . _ unaami ani _ nanqigtivig m _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ aqume luni _ aqfa stekagh a _ Paul _ .
tagite yatgu _ , _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ Jews-et _ kangllu qaghte luku _ anaggute aatagh ghllag mani ke aat _ iwernga _ ipapigh qep agning itk iit _ anaggute llegh i _ .
Paul _ mesag igh aqe aq _ , _ " _ qaatke igate nghite anka _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh it _ , _ seghletun _ pi igate unga _ temple- mi _ , _ seghletun _ pi mangite aqa _ Rome-em _ Umiilegpig aa _ . _ "
F es tus -em _ efqugh sug luki _ Jews-et _ aaptekagh a _ Paul _ , _ " _ Jerusalem-emi _ whanga mnun _ nanqigte sug ziin _ ? _ "
Paul-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ nakaa _ ! _ whaa _ Umiilegpig aam _ nanqigtivig ani _ nekevgha unga _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whani _ nanqigte yaghqaa unga _ . _ Liisimak ngwaagh an _ Jews-enun _ anaggute llghite unga _ .
anaggute ma kuma _ Rome-em _ liilightuusagh an _ pillgh ani _ repall _ tuqute yaghqaa lunga _ , _ anag naqe naanghite aqa _ tuqu llegh _ . _ iwernga _ Jews-et _ anaggute ni llegh at _ temngingu kan _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ Jews-enun _ sastegkanganga _ , _ taana _ yuug _ qaatke te naanghite uq _ Rome-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ Rome-em _ Umiilegpig aanun _ nanqigte sug unga _ . _ "
F es tus -enkut _ agghi lgutke te lghiit _ agghite nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ Paul-em _ piyuke llegh aneng _ , _ Paul _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nanqigte sug u lghiiten _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ , _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ aglagh lleqe uten _ . _ "
Taam _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ umiileg _ agrippa _ kaate tke aq _ Caesarea- mun _ kelqellug qu _ nayag ni _ B ern ic e _ , _ quyake na luku _ governor _ festus _ .
Tamaan sim al ukek _ F es tus -em _ ungipamsug tke a _ agrippa _ Paul -meng _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Governor -ngugh s alghiinga _ F eli x -em _ yuug _ anusimingllaghvig mete ste aqe a _ maani _ .
Jerusalem -em ell unga _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ igleghutisteng itallu _ Jews-et _ ungipaate aatnga _ Paul-em _ anaggute llegh aneng _ . _ taagken _ aapte aatnga _ whanga mnun _ tuqute ste sqellug qu _ ,
iwernga _ kiimsigh kaqe anka _ , _ ' _ whangkuta _ Rome-eghm iini _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nanqigte gpenaki _ tuqute igate aput _ . _ liilightuusagh put _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ seghletun _ pini ke aat _ , _ sivuke luni _ apegh tesaghq aaguq _ ipa _ pi ma ta a _ anag gun n istet _ nag a testek luki _ . _ taagken _ liigik elleq aghput _ sa lleghqagh ut _ . _ '
enkaam _ Paul-em _ anag gun n isteng i _ tagi laghate te yata _ aga _ unaami ani _ aqume kau unga _ nanqigtivig kun _ , _ tagite stekaqe aqa llu _ Paul _ .
Anag gun isteng i _ nekeve uute luteng _ seghletun _ pillgh i _ apegh yaq megteki _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleg mtun _ seghleghtutka nghite ut _ .
Taaw angin aghhaq _ aaghtiiraagh ma kangat _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ , _ taana llu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ Jesus-meng _ tuquma ni luku _ , _ iwernga _ Paul-em _ sagiqe te kaqe a _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ .
liisimakepagunghite te mneng _ tamaakut _ , _ Paul _ aapte aqa _ nanqigte sug ta a _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ nanqigte sug unga _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ . _ kelengake ste nga _ kenlanga _ aglagh ste llegh gpenun _ ellnga nun _ . _ ' _ enkaam _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanagh tes neqig taqa _ kenlanga _ aglagh ste lleghqagh mnun _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ . _ "
Ag r ipp a-m _ pi ke aa _ festus _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ nagate yug aqa _ Paul _ . _ " _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ unaami _ nagate lleqe an _ . _ "
unaami ani _ Ag r ipp a-nkuk _ B ern ic e- enkuk _ iteghkagh k _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ elngaatall _ aar ragh waagh lutek _ umiileg m _ aatkagh aneng _ , _ malig testek luki _ umiileg it llu _ pilluwaghtet _ , _ igleghutisteng illu _ Caesarea- m _ . _ taagken _ F es tus -em _ itghute sqekagh a _ Paul _ .
F es tus -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ elpek si llu _ qamagte lusi _ whaan leng ugh ni _ , _ una _ yuug _ esghagh kesi _ , _ Paul -nguuq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ Jews-et _ maan lenguut _ , _ Jerusalem -em el nguutlu _ qik egh quk egkaqaat _ whanga mkun _ repall _ akilghuu tke kaqe aat _ tuqute yaghqaa ni luku _ .
iwernga _ nanqigte yaqegka _ sa meng _ apallugh ite uq _ tuqute yaghqaa luni _ . _ ellmi neng _ nanqigte sug kau ta aneng _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ aglagh ste na luku _ pi aqe aqa _ .
iwernga _ lata tgun _ sa meng _ ipapigh qengng alghiimeng _ apegh yaghqagh ite unga _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ uum eng _ yug meng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ enkaam _ tagite aqa _ sivu gpesinun _ , _ kiyang _ elpenun _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ ! _ neghyuke aqa _ aapqugh aa qum teggu _ sa meng _ lata sighqagh meng _ naal kef ik nayuk amkun _ .
whanga mni _ temngingu uq _ aglagh stekumkun _ anusimingllagh aq _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ sa meng _ anaggute llegh meng _ apallugh ngunaan _ . _ "
Ag r ipp a-m _ pi ke aa _ Paul _ , _ " _ taawa _ mesighagh yaghqaaghte uten _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ akuzi _ . _ " _ Paul-em _ iigge ni _ nengug te luki _ , _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ elngaatall _ aneghneghte unga _ sivu gpeni _ mesighagh naqe lghiinga _ Jews-et _ anaggu tel qen nik angitneng _ ,
qayughllak _ nalluk enghit ngwaagh aten _ Jews-et _ nangaghnegh it llu _ apallugh ke te kaqe kangit llu _ . _ enkaam _ nanglleg si pig llunga _ aapte amken _ nag atagh tesqell unga _ .
" _ Nun am nil nguutlu _ Jerusalem -em el nguutlu _ qamagte luteng _ Jews-et _ liisimake aat _ kiyaghtaa l qa _ anglinghhagh u te mneng _ ima _ .
apegh yug yagh kumegteggu _ liisimakekagh eng _ apegh nayagh aatnga _ iiwleng _ qaatke te nga lghiinga _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ .
whaa _ Jews-et _ tagi ste aatnga _ whavek _ nanqig tesqell unga _ qayughllak _ neghyuke u kegka _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv aght illegh qaa _ tuqukagh neng _ akequsagh kekagh a _ sivunegh mnnun _ .
taana ta _ akequsagh _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke lghiit _ ramke mta _ neghyuke kangat _ allgegh h naluku _ , _ elngaatall _ maniguute u luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ . _ umiileg mi _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ ataasigh _ neghyuke i llegh _ apallugh ke luku _ Jews-et _ nanqigte sug aatnga _ .
sangafsi _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tsi _ kiyaghnegh _ unguv aght ip agning in niluku _ tuqukagh neng _ ?
" _ sivugh nghaani _ agani _ ugpeqe pigtekaqe aqa _ kipullgin aallegh llak a _ elqughute nga ni luku _ ategh aneng _ Jesus-em _ Nazareth -eghm iim _ .
tawaten _ pi kau unga _ Jerusalem-emi _ . _ Chief _ priest- eneng _ pi lleghqagh nge kau unga _ anusimingllagh ste na luki _ ugpeqagh lghute t _ . _ tuqu qugh naqe yatki _ itagnagh ke pigtekaqe anka _ tuqu tesqelluki _ .
uglagh ghngaan _ aghyuugh stekaqe anka _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ synagogue- nni _ , _ whaten llu _ pi ste naqutke kaqe anka _ , _ ' _ ugpeqe nanigh ma aqa _ Jesus _ . _ ' _ ugumi yagute pigtekaqe anka _ repall _ malighqagh kaqe anka _ talwa _ Gentile-et _ nuna itnun _ amyugh te kete na luki _ .
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Damascus -e tunga _ pi lleghqagh ligh lunga _ , _ qelegh lleg ligh lunga _ chief _ priest- eneng _ .
umiileg mi _ , _ iglegh taa luta _ aghneq _ qukaghite aqe uq llu _ esghagh aqa _ nighug _ nighug atagh alghii _ siqi nghmeng _ , _ kuukgute lghii _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ . _ elngaatall _ nighugh pigte luni _ kuukgute kau uq _ uvite mnun _ , _ igleghalgute mnun llu _ .
qamagte luta _ ullegh aa tukut _ nuna mun _ . _ taagken _ me _ nagaqugh aqa _ whaten _ pi lghii _ H eb r ew- gh m iistun _ , _ ' _ Saul _ , _ Saul _ ! _ sangama _ amyugh te kete zinga _ ? _ aqnigh qugh u uten _ elpeneng _ amyuutke i llegh gpegun _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ o x -em _ aqnigh qugh llegh atun _ kete igh qugh llegh mikun _ yug mi _ maghyaghqugh sagh i _ . _ '
aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ kina u ziin _ atanegh _ ? _ ' _ Atanghem _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ Jesus -ngu unga _ , _ amyuutke ken _ .
nekeve i _ . _ aliigh vike amken _ qayughllak _ nakmike amken _ qepghaghte ngul ut enllu _ liisimake i ste u luten llu _ . _ apegh naketen _ tamaakut _ esghagh uqagh ten _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ tamaakut llu _ kelgute yaghqagh nka _ ki nguv aqun _ aliigh vike gkumken _ .
yuguligh u iqe naagh amken llu _ elpek _ katam _ yug gpeneng _ , _ Gentile- en engllu _ . _ ellngit nun _ kayagte naqngu amken
esghagh tes tesqelluki _ , _ tunute luki _ mamleg meng _ qiiv esqelluki _ nighugh mun _ , _ tunute luki _ tughneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh aneng _ qiiv esqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh anun _ . _ taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute lleqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ ila lleqe ai llu _ tamaavek _ aaftekagh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ whanga mneng _ . _ '
" _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ qaatke kaqe aqa _ taana _ esghaghwaagh llegh ka _ qilag meng _ .
sivuke lunga _ ungipagh ke i unga _ Damascus -mi _ taagken _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ tea- ma ani llu _ Judea- mi _ . _ ungipagh ke i unga _ Jews-en unllu _ Gentile- en unllu _ avutegh qelluki _ seghleghqen nanigh luki _ qiiv esqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ pinitun llu _ pi sqe anka _ ipapigh q utk esqelluku _ avutegh qelluteng _ seghleghqen nan iim at angi _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh ke i llegh ka _ apallugh ke luku _ temple- mi _ Jews-et _ tugu lunga _ tuqute naqutke kaqe aatnga _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aqe aanga _ wh av emun _ kenlanga _ , _ enkaam _ sivu gpesigun _ nekeve lunga _ apegh aqa _ Christ-a _ pingwaagh ghllag nun llu _ ukav an t alghii nunllu _ . _ apegh kaqe a _ taan anguuq _ ataasigh _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ Moses - emllu _ uuknaliqe tkekagh at _ .
pi kau ut _ Christ-a _ ikfiqe pestaagh lleqe ni luku _ enkaam _ sivulii luni _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ apegh yaghqaa ni luku llu _ nighug a _ yuguligh llegh m _ yug nun llu _ Gentile- en unllu _ . _ "
Paul _ mesighagh ma luku _ F es tus -em _ akilghuu ghllag qagh a _ , _ " _ Paul _ , _ nallungughte uten _ ! _ liite llegh ghllag gpek _ nallungughte ste aaten _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Paul-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ governor _ festus- mi _ , _ nallungughte llghite unga _ , _ liisima lunga _ ipa meng _ akuzi u unga _ .
umiileg m _ Ag r ipp a-m _ liisimakngwaagh aa _ tamaa na _ enkaam _ tetug gpenaan _ aleghqugh aqa _ . _ liisimake aqa _ nagaqugh kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ aksaqe luku _ pi kau nghite ut _ .
umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ ugpeq aq sik ii _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh it _ ? _ liisimake amken _ ugpeqe aqe aten _ ! _ "
umiileg m _ Ag r ipp a-m _ aaptekagh a _ Paul _ , _ " _ Sumegh pen ii- i _ whaa _ tan- squghhagh n _ aleghqugh lunga _ ugpegh ste naqe zinga _ Christ-ameng _ ? _ "
Paul-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ tan- squghhagh u ghngaan _ , _ nalighmeng _ taake luku _ aleghqugh yagh ghngaamken _ yugh aat keng ngw aam ken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ugpegh esqell uten _ . _ ellnginagh gpek _ yugh aat keng ngunghi tamken _ , _ yugh aat keng ngw aam si _ qamagte lusi _ nagate lghii ni _ whanga mneng _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ whanga mtun _ lliigh esqellusi _ iwerngaqun _ qiipraghute ngunasi _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg _ agrippa _ , _ governor _ festus _ , _ B ern ic e _ , _ tamaakut llu _ ila i _ nekeve te tke aat _ .
aane luteng _ ellmeggneng _ aleghqugh tke aat _ , _ " _ U umun _ yug mun _ sa meng _ apallugh ite ukut _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllagh sighqagh meng _ . _ "
Ag r ipp a-m _ pi ke aa _ festus _ , _ " _ Aan es nayagh aghput _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ nanqig tesqell uni _ pi kau nghite yagh kan _ . _ "
F es tus -em _ I tal y- tes qesug y inkut _ angyaghpag kun _ , _ aglagh te stekagh i _ Paul -llu _ ila i llu _ anusimingllaghagh t _ umiil waaghmun _ Jul i us -mun _ . _ Jul i us -enkut _ pilluwagh te kullghiit _ ategh ke lghiit _ , _ " _ Umiilegpig aam _ Pilluw agh tengi _ . _ "
taawa _ angyaghpag _ Ad ram y t ti um -e meng _ pi _ , _ aghulaq saqleg g iin aagh tekaq _ ne nun _ Asi a-m _ esneng anil ngughnun _ . _ tawavek _ uugg llu ta _ aghulaqe ukut _ . _ A ris t ar ch us-em _ maligte ainkut _ Th es sal onic a-gh mii m _ . _ ( _ thessalonica _ Macedonia- melnguq _ ) _ .
unaami ani _ kaate ukut _ S id on -mun _ . _ Jul i us-em _ pinitungwaaq _ pi ke aa _ Paul _ , _ laalighte ste aqe luku _ ilakumtaagh anun _ S id on -mi _ , _ sa meng _ aklukegk aaneng _ tuune aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
S id on -meng _ aghulaqe ukut _ anuqe _ aygugh mun _ enkaam _ igleghte ukut _ uq iin ellgh akun _ qiighqagh m _ C yp r us-em _ .
iglegha ukut _ esne akun _ C il ic ia- mllu _ P am ph yl ia- mllu _ , _ taagken _ nagnegh ukut _ myra- mun _ Ly c ia- melngugh mun _ .
Tamaan teftuq _ angyaghpag _ A le x and ri a-meng _ pi _ , _ enkaam _ Umiil waaghem _ Jul i us-em _ liigike luku _ I tal y- n naq utanga _ uugte ste ainkut _ .
Nun m aas qugh haq _ igleghte ukut _ qafsinegyag ghllag _ aghneq _ , _ iwernga _ piyaqli i ghngaamta _ kaate ukut _ C n id us -mun _ . _ anuqligh te m _ iglegh apag ning ii te si nkut _ taagavek _ , _ igleghte ukut _ uq iin ellgh akun _ qiighqagh m _ C r ete -em _ , _ naghughte luku _ Sal m on e _ .
esne ngiighhagh akun _ igleghte ukut _ piyaqli i ghngaamta _ , _ kaate ukut _ kangighagh mun _ ategh ke lghii mun _ , _ U q it aghv ik _ kangegh igh aq _ , _ taana _ qantaghan lenguq _ L as ea- meng _ .
Tamaan teghllag tukut _ qenwat _ yakugh nagh a _ taake luku _ iglegh amun _ , _ siingenllu _ aghneq _ naghughte lghii _ priest-et _ aghqer raagh vig at _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ Jews-et _ . _ enkaam _ Paul-em _ kelenga sagh u aghagh u i _ angyaghpag m _ umiil waagh i _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ sume mni _ whaa _ elngaatall _ yakugh nagh igh naqe ukut _ iglegha lleg mnni _ . _ ifla aqe lteggu llu _ angyaghpag ut _ usituumagh an _ , _ entaqun _ talwa _ tuqu laghate te lleqe ukut _ . _ "
iwernga _ Umiil waaghem _ Jul i us-em _ nagate kaqe kek _ angyaghpag m llu _ umiileg a _ , _ angyaghpag leg llu _ yuug _ avelghagh luku _ Paul _ .
allute luteng llu _ angyaghpag m _ yug i _ igleghte yu ke aat _ qayughllak _ taana _ kangegh igh aq _ yakugh nagh lghii _ angyaghpag mun _ uksughte vig u luni _ . _ kaate naqe na luteng _ Ph o en i x -mun _ pikagh t _ uksughte yaghqaa luteng _ tamaani _ . _ Ph o en i x -em _ kangighagh a _ qiighqagh mete ngughk _ C r ete -mi _ , _ n or th w est- munllu _ s o ut h w est- munllu _ ayuqe lghii _ .
I keg ke meng _ anuqataghaaghte yan _ angyaghpag m _ yug i _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ taana ta _ anuqe _ utaqakagh ut _ . _ " _ enkaam _ uyghigh te a _ sayug luku _ tel an ang aakut _ C r ete -em _ esne ngiighhagh akun _ .
iwernga _ anuqligh ghllag uq _ nakaghya meng _ enkaam _ qiighqagh meng _ atghaghtegh ghllag aa _ .
angyaghpag _ awatmun _ teng sagu _ qute mun _ taglagh naqutkesagh luta _ iilqayug ukut _ enkaam _ up uu peng _ teng tes tukut _ .
qiighqagh squghhagh m _ Ca ud a-m _ uughqa anun _ lliigh sigh nkut _ up- qite ghraag ukut _ . _ tawani _ qam uq saq efut _ angyat ghhagh ut _ piyaqleg iigh tke ghngaamteggu _ qaakagh ut _ .
taagken _ angyaghpag _ ayugighsagh aat _ asighte luku _ tap ghaghmeng _ . _ alinge luteng _ qenaaghte lugh qugh te na yukagh meng _ S yr t is -mi _ tel an angat _ ifkagh qugh luki _ teng tes tukut _ .
unaami ani _ paninang _ esla _ almesiqe ghllag yagu _ , _ angyaghpag m _ usi an _ ila i _ megh mun _ ategh qugh ait _ .
awakaghaani _ esla _ almesiqe yagu _ angyaghpag m _ sanqute i _ ategh qugh ait _ .
qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ siqin ngunani _ , _ ighaleqetaagh ngunani _ pi uq _ esla m _ seghlegh ghllag m _ angtalanganeng _ . _ enkaam _ talwa _ iilqayug ukut _ , _ isigima qun _ tuqu laghate te naqe lghiikut _ .
yug t _ neghe gpenateng _ muluugh ghllag yata _ Paul-em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ nagate kaqsagh kufsinga _ kete nayagh nghite ngugh u kut _ C r ete -meng _ enkaam _ aghsaan _ seghleliigh nayagh nghite usi _ , _ saghya igh te nayagh nghite usi _ .
iwernga _ iilqayug gpenasi _ , _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ tuqu naanghite uq _ iwerngaqun _ angyaghpag igh u lleqe ukut _ .
unuk _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg an _ taku kaqe aanga _ . _ taana ta _ kiyaghnegh _ manigugh aqe kegka _ , _ ellnga n _ pi ke aanga _ .
yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ Paul _ , _ alinge gpenang _ , _ kaate lleqe uten _ Rome- emun _ , _ nekeve lleqe uten _ sivungagh kun _ Umiilegpig aam _ . _ yughagh tke kaqe te gpeneng _ angyaghpag me telgu te ten _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugulill eq ii _ . _ '
enkaam _ quya tek _ , _ ugpeqe i unga _ kiyaghnegh kun _ tawate t ngwaagh esqelluku _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ .
iwerngaqun _ angyaghpag igh u lleqe ukut _ qiighqagh mi _ . _ "
qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ unuk _ kellii mi _ Ad ri at ic -mi _ teng t iinkut _ . _ taakwani _ unug em _ qukaa ni _ yulaagh t _ pi aqe ut _ qute mun _ tughwaaghsugnite ni luta _ .
tapghagh _ uqigkutagh igh luku _ megh mun _ ategh saq megteggu _ yuginagh _ yaagnegh _ uusqaghtutka uq _ . _ Taz ing apigh qaagh yam ta _ tapghagh _ ategh ll aatagh yaq megteggu _ aki mig aq _ yaagnegh _ uusqaghtutkaligh ma lghii _ .
yulaagh t _ alingekagh t _ angyaghpag _ qalmesite na yu kan _ enkaam _ estam aneng _ uyghigh aat _ kingu akun _ . _ taagken _ yughagh ut _ aghte ragkiigh sqellug qu _ .
angyaghpag m _ yulaagh i _ anag naqekagh t _ sivuyag a _ angyaghpag m _ uyghiite ligh naqe sighwaagh te kete luku _ , _ angyat ghhagh _ megh mun _ ateghtekagh at _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ umiileg u aq llu _ pilluwagh tetlu _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ aghulaqe gkata _ kayute pagite te lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ elpek si _ tuqu laghate te lleqe usi _ . _ "
enkaam _ pilluwaghtet _ angyat ghhagh _ kepe tke aat _ .
aghtaghagh naqe aqe a llu _ Paul-em _ qamagte luki _ negh esqugh waaq ii _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ aghneq _ negh elq unghi tusi _ qayughllak _ elngaatall _ kelengaruugh lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh esqugh waagh naq amsi _ iknaqugh tesqellusi _ . _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ tuqu naanghite uq _ talwa _ aqnighte naanghite uq _ . _ "
nepiigh yami _ neqekrangllagh meng _ tugu tete luni _ igamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ manu itni _ ikute luni _ neghekagh _ .
yug t _ ilutugh saghy is teng _ ellngit llu _ qamagte luteng _ negh te tke aat _ .
Qer ng aghllag emta _ angyaghpag melngugh ni _ 2 7 6 -ngu ukut _ .
qamagte luteng _ neghe uute nghmeng _ apeghiigh yameng _ angyaghpag _ uqengelli na luku _ wheat -a _ megh mun _ ategh qugh aat _ .
aghte yagu _ qute meng _ esghaate ut _ , _ taawanginaq _ liisuqe nghite aat _ n a tung utanga _ . _ iwernga _ kangighagh lgu uq _ esnagh leg meng _ enkaam _ taaggun _ tamlag naqe yug ut _ .
kepugh te luki _ uyghiite t _ unitekagh it _ megh mete luki _ , _ petugutagh ik llu _ aquutagh k _ naghigh qugh qu ait _ . _ taagken _ sayug luki _ telaananga t _ sivuyag melnguut _ teng tes tut _ tespikavek _ esnagh mun _ .
iwernga _ angyaghpag m _ sivuyag a _ aghqe itagh i sagh n _ kingu a _ qagi ghllag t _ kagimte aat _ .
Pilluw aghtet _ pi yagh ait _ anusimingllaghagh t _ tuqu qugh na luki _ luuraq _ qute mun _ pugime luteng _ navek _ anag na yu kata _ .
iwernga _ umiil waaghem _ tuqute sug ma nge i tke a _ Paul _ enkaam _ iinghutekagh i _ . _ yeghlegi _ qelqe ai _ pug im aq ayug gaat _ qute mun _ tag liis qelluki _ .
tamaakut _ pugime lleg ite ngugh t _ angyaghpag m _ ik ellgh aakun _ tugu luki _ taglagh naqe sqekagh i _ qute mun _ . _ tawaten _ qamagte luta _ yaywaaseng _ uug llegh aa tukut _ qute mun _ .
yaywaaseng _ qute mun _ uugte yamta _ liigikagh ut _ qiighqagh _ malta- nge ta a _ .
Tamaa kum iit _ elngaatall _ upugha te ainkut _ kumagh qite magh emta _ qayughllak _ aqlaghaghtekanga _ eslallugughte magh mi _ .
Paul _ saqumig luni _ quugkagh meng _ qiigh i ma luku _ , _ tuqunagh lghii _ nemeghyagh _ maatnegh m _ aane ste luku _ quug neng _ , _ iiggagh kun _ amqeghtekagh a _ .
Tamaa kum iit _ esghagh luku _ nemeghyagh _ Paul-em _ iiggagh neng _ qughagh nga lghii _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ yuug _ yugte aghte u uq _ . _ qaywa _ unÊ¼g ani _ megh mi _ tuqu nghite ghngaaghmi _ esghaghhu _ tuqu yaghqaa ma lghii _ . _ "
Paul-em _ iigge ni _ ufsug us aq miniki _ nemeghyagh _ ifkagh uq _ kengh egnun _ iwernga _ talwa _ nemeghyagh m _ aqnighte ma ite kanga _ .
yug t _ pi kaqsagh kangat _ Paul _ puuve ghllag naqe ni luku _ nalighmeng _ tuqu naqe ni luku _ . _ iwernga _ sa gpenani _ muluugh ghllag yan _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh at _ , _ " _ una _ nalug iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh t _ . _ "
Taam _ qiighqagh m _ umiileg a _ P u b li us _ , _ nuna lgu uq _ ughugsigh vig mta _ tung angani _ . _ P u b li us-em _ elngaatall _ upugha te ainkut _ , _ ellnga nite ukut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ .
ata a _ puqlegha u uq _ aqsalliqe magh mi _ . _ Paul-em _ esghagh yaghtugh luku _ yughagh te kete luku _ , _ saaf saqminigu _ naallghute uq _ .
Paul _ tawaten _ pi yan _ qamagte luteng _ ila i _ qinu yuget _ tagi laghate tke aat _ enkaam _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tun qugh taag iinkut _ tunute yameng _ . _ tamaani _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ atugh luki _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte yamta _ tunqughtagh u laatagh ainkut _ tumangani _ atughqagh mnneng _ . _ angyaghpag _ A le x and ri a-meng _ pi _ uksughte ma lghii _ tamaani _ qiighqagh mi _ . _ ategh ke a _ " _ malghi k _ kiyaghnegh k _ " _ sivuyag an ite f tuk lu _ ulimaagh u lutek _ taake uk _ . _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte yan _ taaggun _ uugte ukut _ .
S y ra cus e- mun _ kaa llu ta _ tamaan tukut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ .
taagken _ qapiighwtagh ukut _ R h eg i um -emun _ kaate lleg mnnun _ kenlanga _ . _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ tamaani _ , _ unaami ani _ anuqataghaaghte te ainkut _ i kev aghmeng _ enkaam _ awakaghaani _ P ute ol i -mun _ kaate ukut _ .
Tamaan teftut _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ ell megg n ites q iinkut _ maaghraghvinleg _ aghneq _ . _ taagken _ Rome- emun _ nagnegh ukut _ .
ugpeqagh t _ Rome- em el nguut _ nagaqugh luta _ , _ payegh ma kanginkut _ tungang itnun _ akilpegaghvig t _ Ap pi us - melnguut _ , _ ila ita _ payegh ma kanginkut _ tungang itnun _ pi nga yu t _ aqelqagh lghutagh t _ . _ Paul-em _ esghagh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ ilutughtekagh _ enkaam _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Rome- emun _ kaate yamta _ Paul _ ellngin aghme tes taat _ nani _ piyuk el ghani _ iwerngaqun _ ataasigh m _ pilluwagh tem _ kelengake a _ .
pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ Paul-em _ tagsiqligh ai _ Jews-et _ igleghutisteng it _ . _ tagi yata _ pi a _ , _ " _ Jew - lgu temni _ , _ sa nghite ghngaamki _ yug put _ , _ nalighmeng _ kipullgin aanghi tegh ngaam ki _ nangaghnegh it _ sivunegh mta _ , _ paninang _ igleghut is tem ta _ Jerusalem -em el nguut _ tugu lunga _ tuune aatnga _ Rome-eghm iinun _ .
Aap qugh aagh lunga _ sa meng _ apallugh ite yama _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ iteme te na lunga _ pi yagh aatnga _ .
iwernga _ Jews-et _ ighleke aatnga _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pi aqa _ nanqigte i sta _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ nanqigte sug ni lunga _ . _ Umiilegpig aghmun _ seghlequugh yagh tuun ghi tanka _ yug lgute nka _ .
enkaam _ tagsiqligh amsi _ apegh na luki _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ . _ liite sug aqa llu _ elpesi nun _ taana _ ataasigh _ Israel-eghmiit _ neghyukekagh at _ apallugh ke luku _ qiipragh usigh ng aanga _ . _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Judea- ghmiit _ lata tke igate aaten _ whangkunnun _ . _ talwa _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ ugpeqaalgutem ta _ taag egken _ tagi luteng _ ungipagh ke igate aaten _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ akuzi tke igate aaten _ .
whangkuta _ lii sug aghput _ elpenun _ sa meng _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ta i _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Jesus-meng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh ut _ nani _ alngunak _ seghlequugh aqiit _ . _ "
taagken _ nakmikegkagh at _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ qerngughte te vig u luku _ . _ taana _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ uglagh pigte luteng _ tagi laghate tke aat _ Paul-em _ kiyaghfig anun _ . _ unaagh ghhagh aneng _ unug llegh anun _ kenlanga _ apeghtugh qu ai _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ liigikes tengngwaagh naq utkegk iillu _ Jesus-meng _ atuqe luki _ liilightuusagh i _ Moses-em _ , _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ igaqegkagh it _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqekagh at _ iwernga _ ila ita _ ugpeqe ma ite kangat _ .
enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ . _ nekeve uute aqe ut llu _ aanleghaate na luteng _ Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ipa _ pi ma lghiik _ sivunegh gpesigun _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ Isai ah -kun _ .
whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ taku luki _ ukut _ yug t _ whaten _ pi ki _ , _ Nag asagh ngaagh pesi _ , _ esghapag ngaagh pesi _ liigike naanghite usi _ .
taakut _ yug t _ tawatete ut _ qayughllak _ umyugagh it _ pi negh llu ug tekaagut _ enkaam _ sigute teng llu _ iye teng llu _ saape kaqe ait _ . _ tawatete nghite yagh kumeng _ esghaate nayagh ut _ , _ nagaqugh te nayagh ut _ , _ liigike nayagh ut _ , _ qiive nayagh ut llu _ whanga mnun _ naallgh u tesqell uteng _ . _ ' _ "
Paul-em _ taaqe niite te kun _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ liigike sug aqa _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayag tengngwaaq aqii _ ungip aght eni _ ungip iisqelluki _ yuguligh llegh meng _ Gentile-enun _ . _ ellngit _ nagate pestaagh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
tawaten _ Paul _ pi yan _ Jews-et _ aaghtiiraagh te ghllag magh meng _ aanleghagh tke aat _ .
maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ Paul-em _ kiyaghfig kekagh a _ mangteghagh _ llivike aqe luku _ . _ upugha te aqe kangi _ qamagte luki _ itegh teni _ ,
tetug gpenani llu _ ungipagh ke aq _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ apeghtugh tkekagh a llu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ . _ tawaten _ pillgha _ kitum _ alngunak _ aghula i aghte ma ite kanga _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ ; _ qepghaghte kaa nga _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aanga _ apostle- ngulunga _ , _ nakmike kaqe aanga llu _ ungipaq esqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh ni _ .
ayumigh _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe ai _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ uuknaliq is tem ikun _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ait _ agleghnagh lghii tgun _ akuzite tgun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ .
taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighneghagh neng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau uq _ umiileg m _ David-em _ kingun ghitgun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liigike ste ainkut _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh u uq _ ighnegh a _ . _ taghneghagh m _ ipapigh qegk aqaa _ unguvagh ste luku _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
ellnga kun _ nanglleg ke lleg nge ma unga _ apostle- ngulunga _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi kaqe aanga _ tuq liis qelluki _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ yug i _ ugpeqe sqellug qu llu _ , _ qaatke sqellug qu llu _ Christ-a _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-am _ ategh a _ quulv alleng ellequq _ .
elpek si llu _ Rome- em el ngugh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ pik esqellusi _ .
qamagte lusi _ elpek si _ Rome- em el ngugh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe ke ii te ni _ , _ tuqlugh qite te ni llu _ yuk nalusi _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ Atangh emllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ kayusii ll isi _ , _ nekeggmell eli si ll illu _ .
sivuke luku _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ , _ qayughllak _ ungipagh a _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ mingite u uq _ yug lghute nun _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ .
pi naqe llegh ka _ qamagte luku _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ungipagh ke na luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ighneghagh neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekaqe a _ quunpeng _ yugh aat keng nguk em si _ .
yughagh aqe unga llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ qenwat llu _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghqaa lunga _ .
esghagh yug pigte aqe amsi _ quyas tell el in nalusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ iknaq suug tesqellusi _ .
whaten _ pi u amsi _ : _ qerngagh emta _ kayemughtu tete na luta _ , _ elpek si _ ugpeqe i lleg mkun _ , _ whanga _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisimake sug amsi _ awen _ laalighfike yug aqe amsi _ iwernga _ saam _ quunpeng _ pi nghite ste aqe aanga _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ kayusiite yug anka _ Rome-eghm iit _ ugpegh esqelluki _ Christ-akun _ , _ ila itnun _ Gentile-enun _ pilleg mtun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungipaq esqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ enkaam _ ungipagh ke yaghqaqe anka _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ , _ Greek -en unllu _ Greek - ngun ghil ngugh nunllu _ , _ peghqinegh nun llu _ nall uuq anunllu _ .
enkaam _ whaa _ ungipagh ke i yug ghllagu unga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ elpesi nun llu _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ Rome- e mi _ .
kayngu ke igate anka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghi l qii _ yuguligh llegh mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ . _ sivuke luteng _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ Jews-enun _ taagken _ Gentile-enun _ .
taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ liigike ste ainkut _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe ta i _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh inagh itgun _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ . _ katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ N allgh ugh qegk aq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ neghyuke luku _ ellnga _ . _ "
qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ liigike ste ai _ sakr itu t ngun iluki _ , _ aghyuugh lleqe ni luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ , _ seghletun llu _ pill ghitnun _ . _ seghletun _ pi llghite a _ liigike nanigh ste ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapi llgh aneng _ .
sa u a _ yug t _ liisimakekagh at _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ wh ategh llu waagh uuq _ ellngit nun _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ wh ategh llu waagh ugh taa _ ellngit nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima ta aneng _ nuna _ , _ yug t _ liigikngwaagh aqaat _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ aghuliigh igate ngughk _ , _ ipallu _ kiyaghnegh u ta a _ . _ qaywa _ yug t _ esghaghpagningite ghngaaghmegtekek _ taake uk _ , _ paninang _ liisimake agket _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh akun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ apallugh ite ut _ whaten _ pi lleghqagh meng _ , _ nallukagh ut _ kiyaghnegh lgu ta a _ .
liisimake ghngaaghmegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ quulv iig at aat _ kiyaghnegh u luku _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike igate aat llu _ . _ yeghlegi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ kiyaghnegh meng _ sea-te u nanigh kau ut _ , _ umyugagh it llu _ liigike nanigh kau ut _ .
Pegh qin gh un ii qut _ iwernga _ nall uugh taqut _ .
enkaam _ manigugh gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ yeghlegi _ manigugh aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh teng _ yugsugnite ngugh t _ , _ qawaagsugnite ngugh t _ , _ teghig ke saghsugnite ngugh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ nemeghyaghsugnite ngugh t _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ atuq esqelluki _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh t _ piyug ke ghllag ke ait _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe ait _ yugusigh teng _ anagnga luki _ , _ seghleghqe aqe luteng _ sex-kun _ ila meggnun _ ,
qayughllak _ ipapilleq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ naavghute ma ut _ iqleng amun _ . _ Enkaangam _ manigugh aqe ait llu _ , _ qepghagh te aqe ait llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh i _ , _ avelghagh luku _ ulimaghista _ ellnga _ katam _ . _ ellnga u uq _ usuqe yaghqagh _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ atuq esqelluki _ seghleghqe llegh t _ piyug ke ghllag ke ait _ . _ aghnagh t _ sex -e yug nanigh iit _ yug t _ , _ yeghlegi _ sex -e yag utut _ aghnaa lgute meggneng _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ yug t llu _ sex -e yug nanigh iit _ aghnagh t _ , _ yeghlegi _ sex -e yag uteghllag tut _ yug lgute meggneng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ta itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh ai _ yugusigh itgun _ apallugh ke luki _ anaggute llegh ghllag it _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ sumegh meggni _ sea-te u nghite na iqe aat _ liisimak ip ii lleq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ sea-te u nghite ngugh nun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itnun _ , _ atughqagh ke nghite yagh ka itnun llu _ .
All aaghh in aghmeng _ seghlegh meng _ pi manginagh aqe ut _ , _ seghleghqe aqe ut _ , _ pakignegh u ut _ , _ ugumi ketagh ut llu _ . _ aqinaketagh ut _ , _ yugtagh yuneghtu ut _ , _ pilluw aghy uneghtu ut _ , _ puughte i yuneghtu ut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ait llu _ ila teng _ seghlegh pigu luki _ . _ yiillgi aqe ut _ ,
seghletun _ akuzite kaqe ait _ ila teng _ . _ ugumi ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ yuk egh qen ghu ut _ , _ qukaayug negh uut lu _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ wata _ seghletun _ pi na luteng _ ; _ qaatke te igate ut _ angayuqagh meggnun _ ,
nallu ut _ , _ akequsagh teng _ atuqe igate ait _ , _ nanglleg yug igate ut _ , _ nafugh ta ii te aqe ut llu _ ila meggnun _ .
liisimake ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ pi lghiit _ tawatel nguut _ yug t _ allgegh saghqaq aan Ê¼nguq _ tuqu llegh _ . _ Nag negh utng in agh penaki _ tamaakut _ atuqekagh teng _ , _ talwa _ itagnagh kaqe ait _ tawaten _ pi lghiit _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nanqigte i kuvek _ yug neng _ anag niil qav ig itu ten _ . _ nanqigte nghpeki _ , _ elpeneng _ nanqigte aqe uten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luten _ qayughllak _ elpek llu _ ellngistun _ pi aqe lghiiten _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nanqigte i aqe uq _ yug neng _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi lghii neng _ , _ liisimakagh ut llu _ nanqigte i llegh i _ elqughute nga ut _ .
iwernga _ nanqigte aqe aten _ anaggute lghiit _ , _ naqamllu _ elpek _ katam _ pi aqe aten _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ anaggute llegh t _ . _ enkaam _ sumegh pen ii _ anag yaghqaa ni luku _ pi z ig uu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh a _ ?
Liigik enghi si guu _ nangllegtaghtu langa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ aghyuugh aghte igate kangaten _ tawaninginaq _ qayughllak _ nuqe tu taq egk angaten _ . _ Sumegh pen ii- i _ taakut _ sea-te u nghite aat _ ? _ Liisimak enghi si guu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke aqe kangaten _ qayughllak _ avuteghqe sqe sug kangaten _ ?
iwernga _ elpek _ aleghqugh neghllug u uten _ , _ pineghllug u uten _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ avuteghqe sug igate uten _ . _ En kaa ng aam _ elpek _ katam _ ulima u an _ aghyuugh lleg nge lleghqagh n _ seghlegh atagh aaluku _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliigh lleqe ak _ sakraa lleg ni llu _ , _ elqughutngagh lghii llu _ nanqigte i lleg ni _ .
nanqigte lleqe ai _ tamaghhagh ita _ yug t _ apeghiigh utell ghistun _ .
ila i _ yug t _ pinitun _ pi manginagh aqe ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh meng _ allgegh suk angit _ usuqe llegh _ , _ quulv alleq _ , _ yugusigh llu _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvall el illeq ii _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ yug t _ ellngin aayug negh uut _ . _ ugpeqe yug igate aat _ ipapilleq _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi na luteng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakr itu teghllag luki _ , _ aghyuugh ghllag lleqe ai _ .
Qamagtengngwaagh luni _ nuna mete ngughk _ yuug _ , _ Jews -a _ nalighmeng _ gentile- a _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi ke aq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ seghleliigh mengllu _ ikfiqe llegh meng llu _ .
iwernga _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ yuug _ , _ Jews -a _ nalighmeng _ gentile- a _ , _ pinitun _ pi ke aq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe lleqe a _ , _ quulvagh lleqaa _ , _ nekeggmell el illeq aallu _ .
Tan iill ngun aki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ .
Gentile-et _ allgegh tell ghit iit _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ Moses -mun _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lghiit _ nalluke luki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ tuqu kata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ai _ liilightuusagh tgun _ . _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh lgu ut _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe gkata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ liilightuusagh tgun _ .
tamaakut _ nagate ghesnagh lghiit _ liilightuusagh minun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh igate ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke te lghiit _ liilightuusagh minun _ nall gh ughq aqii _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
Gentile-et _ allgegh tell ghit iit _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ iwernga _ qaute kete nghmegteki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ qaatke te llghite a _ liilightuusagh leg stun _ ayuqe ste ait _ ilu megteggun _ , _ allgegh tekaq enghi tegh ngaagh megteki _ .
qaatke te llghite a _ yug nun _ liigike ste ait _ ilu megteggun _ liisimake ait _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llghite a llu _ liisimake ste ait _ liilightuusagh t _ ilungite nightu langi _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llghite a _ ilangakun _ anaggute na iqe ait _ nalighmeng _ ilangakun _ itagnagh na iqe ait _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ yug t _ aksaqekagh it _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ apegh aqe aqa _ taana _ ungipaq nem ki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
M aat en Ê¼ngam _ lata yug anka _ Jews-et _ . _ Jew -ngu kuvek _ , _ neghyu katen _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug gpenun _ . _ qukaayug uten llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pik nil uten _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ liisima kan _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa sqe sug llegh a _ elpenun _ , _ naten llu _ nakmike yaghqaa ta a _ sa u a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ .
enkaam _ sumegh gpeni _ magh yaghq ugh teng un iiqu ten _ ayaakagh nun _ , _ nighug u na iqe uten llu _ mamleg melngughnun _ .
sumegh gpeni _ nallghusagh teng un iiqu ten _ nall uuq anun _ , _ apeghtughis teng un iiqu tengllu _ taghnughhagh nun _ . _ liilightuusagh lgute gpeneng _ , _ sumegh gpeni _ liisimake ni luku _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ pi iigh kan _ , _ qamagte luku llu _ ipapilleq _ .
apeghtugh aqe aten _ ila ten _ , _ sangan _ elpeneng _ apeghtugh igate ziin _ ? _ ungipagh kau iqe uten _ , _ " _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ " _ el p aa- ak _ , _ tegleg qiigate ziin _ ?
pi aqe uten _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ " _ el p aak _ , _ gelgaghniigh qiigate ziin _ ? _ ugumi ke pigte aten _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ , _ el p aak _ , _ tugute niigh qiigate ziin _ temple- nge i te neng _ ?
qukaayug taqu te n _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ni _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug gpenun _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke nghite nghpeki _ liilightuusagh t _ quulv iig at an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ apallugh ke lusi _ elpek si _ Jews-en i _ , _ Gentile-et _ sa ngugh ughte aqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh a _ . _ "
Qaat keng ngu kuf ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ circumcise- ellgh en _ pinigh uq _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke nghite kufki _ liilightuusagh t _ circumcise- ell ghil ngughestun _ ayuqe uten _ . _ enkaam _ quya ste lleg nge naanghite uten _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ .
gentile- a _ circumcise- ell ghilnguq _ qaatke te lghii _ qelegh sagh itnun _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe a _ nikimqun _ circumcise- e kaa luku _ .
elpek si _ Jews-en i _ liilightuusagh lgu usi _ igaqe nga lghii neng _ , _ circumcise- e kaagu sillu _ , _ taawanginaq _ qaatke igate asi _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ iwernga _ Gentile-et _ circumcise- ell ghilnguut _ , _ qaatke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ enkaam _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
C ircumcise- eng in aghluku _ yug m _ yugusigh a _ Jew - pig ugh tes naanghitaa _ . _ C ircumcise- ell ep iik _ pi igate uq _ yugusigh m _ qaye inagh akun _ .
itupill _ , _ yuug _ Jew - pii gu uq _ Jew -ngu kumi _ ilu mikun _ . _ Igh saq gh wa _ circumcise- e kaaguq _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ nakaan _ igaqegkagh tgun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh meng _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe uq _ , _ nakaan _ yug neng _ .
sa u a _ aneghnegh qus iig wa _ yuug _ allgegh kuni _ Jew -ngu luni _ ? _ sa u a _ aneghnegh qus iig wa _ circumcise- ellegh mun _ ?
uglagh u pigte ut _ aneghnegh ghqu sigh t _ ! _ Sivul igh pigaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ Jews-enun _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ .
ila i _ ataasiighmete nghite kata _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiigh m ennegh i tesleq at guu _ ?
yeghlegi llu _ ! _ tamaghhagh mi _ yuug _ iqlengiqe ste u ghngaan _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ipa u uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ akuzi negh gpeni _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ liisimake lleqe aaten _ elqughute nga ni luten _ . _ yug t _ nanqigtegkangaten _ , _ ipapigh qelleq aten _ anaggute nga ni luki _ . _ "
anaggute negh mta _ , _ anaggute lleg mta _ yug t _ liigikes tengngwaagh aqiit _ kiyaghnegh _ elqughute nga ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ pi lleqe sta _ kiyaghnegh _ anaggute ni luku _ aghyuugh kanginkut _ anaggute lleg mnnun _ ? _ ( _ akuzi u unga _ yug stun _ . _ )
tawatete nghite uq _ ! _ kiyaghnegh _ elqughutngagh nghite kan _ , _ naten mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aki _ nuna m _ yug i _ ?
iwernga _ yuug _ pi nayagh lghii _ , _ " _ iqlengiqe llegh ma _ yug t _ usuqe i ste aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ iqlengiqe llegh ma _ aliigh a qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipa u llegh a _ . _ enkaam _ sang anÊ¼ngam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte anga _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lunga _ seghleghqe stetu te _ ? _ "
yuug _ pi nayagh lghii llu _ , _ " _ seghletun _ pi lta _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ seghletun _ pilleg mnneng _ . _ " _ ila i _ yug t _ temng imeng _ pi aqe ut _ whangkuta _ apeghtugh i aqe ni luta _ tawaten _ . _ nanqigte lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ , _ aghyuugh lleghqagh megestun _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ Jews-en ii _ , _ pinigh aghagh sta _ Gentile- eneng _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ apegh u aqe aqe anka _ Jews -etlu _ , _ Gentile- etlu _ tawateghpigaq _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aaghqute aqe luki _ ayuqe ai _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ taawa _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughutngagh nghite uq _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ .
kina _ alngunak _ liigike igate uq _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ivagh igate a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
qamagte luni _ yuug _ tunute kau uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ; _ qamagte luteng _ anaggute kau ut _ ; _ kina _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pi igate uq _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ .
ighsalqagh it _ qel pal ngughestun _ llivegh stun _ ayuqe ut _ ; _ ulu teng _ atuqe u ait _ puugh ti mun _ , _ qezigh megteggun _ p o is on- elgu ut _ nemeghyagh stun _ ;
q aanghi t _ imigh nga ut _ c ur s e- ellegh nengllu _ , _ ugum i ke ti qellegh mengllu _ .
yugtagh i rakegte ut _ ;
navek _ alngunak _ pinegh meggni _ naafqii ste u aqe ut _ , _ seghleliigh q isteng waaq utlu _ .
nalluke aat _ nekeggmell uni _ kiyaghte lleghqagh _ ,
talwa _ alike igate aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ "
liisimake aput _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh leg t _ qaatkesaghqagh ke ait _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ enkaam _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ nepiigh qelleq iit _ yug t _ whaten _ pi lleghqagh itneng _ , _ " _ nalluke aput _ sa u ta i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ . _ " _ liilightuusagh t llu _ liigike ste lleqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nanqigte lleqe ni luki _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ .
nanqigtekumiki _ yug t _ nallghusagh naanghite ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ itupill _ liilightuusagh t _ liite ste ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe ste u ni luki _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ liigike ste ai _ nallghusagh lleqe ni luki _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ taana _ liilightuusagh tgun llu _ , _ uuknaliqiste t gunllu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ taana _ ipa u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpegh lghii nun _ Christ-akun _ qayughllak _ allake te nghite ut
qamagte luteng _ seghleghqe kau te meggneng _ . _ enkaam _ nuughhute kau ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngugh qun _ tunusagh mikun _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ item ut isteng itgun _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ aghqe te u luku _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aaw akun _ seghevute aqe ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ ugpeqe i nga lghiit _ ellnga kun _ . _ tawaten _ liigike stekaqe a _ elqughute nga ni luni _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ agani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nuqe tutk aqii _ yug t _ enkaam _ nepiigh te kaqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh it _ .
iwernga _ uumi _ pi llegh mi _ ipapigh qaa _ elqughute nga ni luni _ nallghusagh llegh mikun _ alngunak _ yuug _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ apallugh ke luki _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ Jesus-kun _ .
enkaam _ sangaawa _ qukaayug te kete yaghqagh ut _ ? _ qukaayug te kaghqagh ite ukut _ ! _ Qukaayug g naanghi tes taa _ qayughllak _ qaute kete naqutke ke put _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kangi _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ Jesus-kun _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
enkaam _ liigikagh ut _ yuug _ nallghusagh kau uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh kun _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ Jews- ngin aghhaat _ Kiyaghneq at guu _ ? _ Gentile- etlu _ Kiyaghneq enghit at guu _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ Gentile- etlu _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ ,
ataasigh ghhagh u ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ enkaam _ nallghusagh lleqe ai _ Jews-et _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ , _ Gentile- etlu _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ .
liilightuusagh at _ sea-te u nanighqe stekagh i _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ ugpeqe i lleg mta _ qaatke sug ste aqe ai _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh tke ait _ .
Sameng Ê¼ngam _ pi lleqe sta _ Abraham -e meng _ , _ sivunegh mnneng _ whangkuta _ Jews-en i _ ? _ sa meng _ liite kau a _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe u kagu _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ s allghakun _ , _ sa meng _ qukaayug sighqagh lgu nayagh uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qukaayug tkepagningite ai _ salleg ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughutngagh lghii u luku _ . _ "
yuug _ qepghagh llegh mineng _ akileghtuusagh nge kayugu uq _ . _ akileghtuusagh a _ tunusagh u nghite uq _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ allgegh tekaqaa _ qepghagh te luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh naanghite a _ yuug _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qepghagh te i llegh akun _ ellmi nun _ . _ itupill _ yug m _ neghyuke yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ nallghusagh i kayug _ seghleghq est eneng _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ .
umiileg m _ David-em _ igaqe kaqe a _ taana _ ataasigh _ . _ pi kau uq _ yug t _ quyas te pik aan iluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe yaki _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ avelghagh luki _ qepghagh te i llegh it _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
" _ quya stekau ut _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ segheve tke ai _ , _ anaggute llegh it _ saapekagh i _ !
quya stekau uq _ yuug _ seghleghqe llegh i _ Atanghem _ sumeghmike nanigh kangi _ . _ "
taana _ quya ste llegh _ David-em _ akuzi tkekagh a _ , _ circumcise- ek aghhiin aghnun _ pi u a _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ C ircumcise- ell ghil ngugh nunllu _ pi u uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ . _ "
qavngaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh qagh kagu _ ? _ sivungagh ni _ circumcise- ellgh aan _ nalighmeng _ kingu aneng _ ? _ sivungagh ni _ circumcise- ellgh an _ , _ nakaan _ kingu aneng _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ abraham _ circumcise- e kaaguq _ . _ C ircumcise- ellgha _ nalluniilkutagh u uq _ ipapigh qus iil uni _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe kanga _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh akun _ . _ salin _ circumcise- ellghi lluku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ abraham _ ata u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ circumcise- ellghi tegh ngaata _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh ma ai _ elqughute nga luki _ .
Abraham -llu _ ata ke aat _ circumcise- ek at _ . _ taana _ ipa u uq _ taaw angin aghhaq _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kumeng _ Abraham -etun _ , _ salin _ circumcise- ellghi lluku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe ai _ Abraham -enkut _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ iingun aghh aan _ nuna _ ellngit nun _ pagi lleqe ni luku _ . _ akequsagh ke llghite a _ taana _ Abraham -emun _ qayughllak _ qaatke kangi _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ itupill _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe a _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kanga _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ tuune yaghqaa yagh kan _ qaatke te lghii nun _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ taawa _ ugpeqe i llegh _ sea-te u nghite uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ akequsagh a _ sea-te u nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh _ sakrite aqe uq _ yug t _ qaatke te nghite nghata _ liilightuusagh nun _ tuunekagh anun _ Moses -mun _ . _ iwernga _ liilightuusagh ite yagh kan _ taawa _ yug t _ qaatke te nghite sagh ite nayagh ut _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ yug t _ allgegh aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ aki ite ngugh u luku _ tunusagh _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ Abraham-em _ king unghi ta _ allgegh tep estaagh lleqaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ taana _ akequsagh _ Jews- ngin aghhagh nun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ liilightuusagh leg nun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i lghii nun llu _ ayuqe uq _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe i llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ abraham _ qamagte luta _ atakagh ut _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ ata ughte ste amken _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ nuna t _ yug itnun _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ akeqe kaqe a _ abraham _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuqukagh neng _ unguv aght ikayuk _ , _ qelegh i llegh mikun llu _ ulima te kayug _ sa meng _ sa ite ngugh meng _ .
Abraham-em _ avaquti lleghqagh a _ sighima niite kau uq _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ sighimake manginagh kaqe a llu _ . _ enkaam _ ata ughtekau uq _ uglagh u pigte lghii nun _ nuna t _ yug itnun _ . _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ kingunegh ten _ kestepagningite yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Abraham-em _ nulighh a _ , _ sarah _ , _ qumingepagningite kau lghii _ . _ ellnga _ abraham _ 1 00 _ ayumiqulleghtu tekagh ligh yaghtugh luni _ , _ tuqu mun _ tugh aagh ulghii _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ sumegh ke ghngaaghmiki _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ukavagh ma ite ngughk _ .
ugpeqe i nanigh mangite uq _ talwa _ aygughike mangite a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh igh aghaghkagh _ , _ usuqekagh a llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Abraham-em _ ipapigh qut keng ngwaaq aqaa _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pi yaghqaqe ni luku _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ tug uq liq aqaa _ elqughute nga luku _ , _ " _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ .
taakut _ akuzite t _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ tug uq liq aqaa _ elqughute nga luku _ , _ " _ igaqe kau ut _ nakaan _ Abraham - ngin aghmun _ ,
iwernga _ igaqe kau ut _ whangkun nunllu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe ainkut _ elqughute nga luta _ qayughllak _ ugpeq eg kefut _ ellnga _ . _ ellnga u uq _ Jesus-meng _ atanegh mnneng _ unguvagh ste ikagh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ tuqum atk esqelluki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ unguvagh tekaq aallu _ nallghusagh na luta _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nallghusagh kau te mnneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ , _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghte ste ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh ani _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllagu ukut _ qayughllak _ liisimakngwaagh aghput _ kiyaghnegh m _ nengigh ste lleqe ainkut _ nighugh qellegh mineng _ .
Taam _ saaghw akun _ quya aqe ukut _ seghleliigh lleg mnni _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh ut _ seghleliigh llegh m _ nuqete neghtu lleg ngestagh ke ainkut _ .
nuqete neghtu lleg mteggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ itagnagh kaqe ainkut _ . _ itagnagh ke igh llegh an _ sighima lleg ngestagh ke ainkut _ .
Taam _ sighima llegh m _ iil qam iq naanghit iinkut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ kuuve kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ qamavek _ ilu mnnun _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh mikun _ whangkunnun _ .
yugulighpag nigh nge i llu ta _ Christ-am _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ seghleghqes tet _ , _ tawani _ pillegh qagh llu waagh mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ani _ .
entaqun _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh inagh t _ tuquma tke i yug nayagh ut _ elqughutngagh lghii mun _ yug mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ entaqun _ kina _ tuquma tke i yug nayagh uq _ pinigh lghii mun _ yug mun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ whangkunnun _ , _ paninang _ seghleghqe ste u luta _ Christ-am _ tuquma tke kaqe ainkut _ !
Nall un eq niigh aghput _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh ma ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ Christ-am _ aaw akun _ . _ Nall un eq niigh ataghagh aghput _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ukut _ Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ .
whangkuta _ kiyaghnegh m _ anguyag ke yagh ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ ilaliigh kaqe ainkut _ tuqu llegh akun _ ighnegh mi _ . _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilakumtaagh ke ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ nallun eq niigh ataghagh aghput _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ukut _ Christ-am _ unguvallegh akun _ !
Taam _ saaghw akun _ , _ quya ghllagu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ whangkunnun _ ilaliigh te ste i lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Y uk suwh aaq _ , _ adam _ , _ seghleghqe aqngan _ , _ seghleghqe llegh an _ tuqu llegh _ itegh stekaqe a _ nuna mun _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ qayughllak _ qamagte luni _ seghleghqe kau uq _ .
seghleghqe lleg lgu kau uq _ nuna mi _ salin _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune llghite luki _ liilightuusagh t _ Moses -mun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte llghite ai _ yug t _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ qayughllak _ Liiligh tus iilnguq _ .
paninang _ yug t _ kiyaghtekau ut _ ima _ Ad am -e meng _ Moses -mun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ , _ maligte te luteng _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh it _ Ad am -em _ seghleghqe llegh atun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh t _ . _ adam _ Christ- atun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ tagi yaghqagh tun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ Ad am -em _ seghleghqe llegh atun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ ipa u uq _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ yug t _ tuqu kau ut _ apallugh ke luku _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ seghleghqe llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ . _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ allgegh tek aqaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ aq egh qeng ngalghii _ aki ite ngughk _ tunusagh a _ , _ piniqe llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
allake te ghllag uk _ , _ Ad am -em _ seghleghqe llegh a llu _ , _ tunusagh a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ kingu aneng _ adam _ seghleghqe aqngan _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ . _ iwernga _ kingu itneng _ yug lghute ghllag t _ seghleghqe aqngata _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngugh qun _ tunusagh mikun _ nallghusagh stekaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
ataasigh _ yuug _ seghleghqe kau uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ tuqu llegh m _ igleghte te ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ iwernga _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ , _ aange aghagh uq _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ . _ enkaam _ allgegh te lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ kemnagh pigte lghii meng _ piniqe llegh aneng _ , _ tunusagh aneng llu _ elqughutngagh llegh aneng _ , _ qamagte luteng _ igleghte te i lleqe ut _ kiyaghte llegh mi _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
apallugh ke luku _ Ad am -em _ ataasigh _ seghleghqe llegh a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-am _ ataasigh _ elqughutngagh lghii _ pillgha _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ , _ tuune ai llu _ unguvallegh meng _ .
qaatke te nghite llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ , _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ seghleghqe ste ngughte kau ut _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ , _ qaatke te llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ , _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ nallghusagh yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ .
liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ Moses -mun _ yug t _ liite yaaghagh ste ait _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ iwernga _ yug t _ seghleghqe aghagh yata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ nula inaghkagh _ .
seghleghqe llegh m _ igleghte te kaqe ai _ yug t _ tuqu llegh kun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ igleghte te u ai _ yug t _ nallghusagh llegh mikun _ ellngit _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ allgegh aat _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ atanegh mteggun _ .
Sameng Ê¼ngam _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ Seghlegh qu mangin aal taa -a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ nula sqellug qu _ ?
nakaa _ ! _ qayughllak _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu kau kumta _ naten _ seghleghqe manginagh naqe sta _ ?
liisimakagh i _ , _ qamagte luta _ paaptaay aaq ng amta _ ilate kau ukut _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ . _ Il at kaag ut kutlu _ tuqu llegh anun _ paaptaay aaq ng amta _ .
paaptaaye lleg mteggun _ tuqu qagh u ukut llu _ qung uk aag u kutlu _ Christ- ami _ . _ Aghtugh yaghqaanghi llegh llag mikun _ ata m _ unguvagh tekaqaa _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe ukut _ kiyaghtaall eligh ragh agh luta _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ilate ma kanginkut _ Christ-amun _ tuqu llegh akun _ , _ taagken _ ilate ste pestaagh lleqe ainkut llu _ ellnga nun _ unguvagh ste luta _ ellnga tun _ .
liisimakagh ut _ whangku tel ug uy alghiit _ qaquuragh te kau ut _ Christ-akun _ ig leq ataq nan iisqell uta _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh anun _ , _ qepghaghtelaagh un anigh nal ut allu _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
yuug _ tuqu nghmini _ iteme aqe uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh m _ .
tuquma kumta _ Christ- ami _ , _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyagh telgu sigh yaghq aqagh putlu _ ellnga _ .
liisimakagh ut _ Christ-a _ unguvagh stekau uq _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ allameng llu _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite uq _ qayughllak _ tuqu llegh _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite lghii ii te kau uq _ ellnga nun _ .
ataasigh ghhagh meng _ tuqu kau uq _ kayaal qen naluku _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ iwernga _ unguva te mineng _ , _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ sumeghtaghagh tek _ tuqu kau lusi _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh anun _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tek llu _ unguva u lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ ig leq ataq es tegpenaki _ yugusigh si _ tuqu kayug t _ . _ seghleghqe llegh m _ ig leq at aqegk aki _ yugusigh si _ , _ qaatke sug lleqe asi _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ .
alngunak _ nalighnegh i _ yugusigh gpesi _ tuune gpenaki _ seghleghqe sigh u luki _ , _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ tuune lleqe asi _ seghlegh mun _ . _ itupill _ tuune tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh tek aqiisi _ . _ enkaam _ tuune teki _ iingunagh ita _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ellnga nun _ atuq esqelluki _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ .
seghleghqe llegh m _ ig leq ataq naanghit iisi _ qayughllak _ ig leq at aqng w iisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ ; _ ig leq ataq ngun ghit iisi _ liilightuusagh t _ .
enkaam _ sa naqe sta ngam _ ? _ itagnaghtaa- a _ seghleghqe lleghqagh ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ ig leq at aqng uk anginkut _ nakaan _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ itagnagh nghite uq _ !
liisima kaqe usi _ tuune gkufsi _ kitumun _ qaatkesaghqagh u luku _ , _ taawa _ ellnga n _ qepghagh tel aaq aagh lleqiisi _ . _ qaatke gkufsigu _ seghleghqe llegh _ , _ tuqu ste lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke gkufsigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nallghusagh lleqe aisi _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
Qepghagh te laagh uyagh tusi _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ maaten _ qam ak erugllak _ qaatke kesi _ apeghtugh te yagh ragh aat _ apeghtuusagh kekagh t _ elpesi nun _ .
iteme te kau usi _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ enkaam _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh te kaagusi _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ .
tamaakut _ liigike neghllug ta itneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ uspute aqe u anka _ qepghaghtelaagh etlu _ pilii tes teng itlu _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ tuune kayugu yagh asi _ yugusigh si _ qepghaghtelaagh uluki _ nukeggnagh lghii nun llu _ nula manginagh lghii nun llu _ seghletun _ pi llegh nun _ . _ maaten _ tuune teki _ yugusigh si _ qepghaghtelaagh uluki _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ kiyagh tesqellusi _ pelungite lusi _ .
Qepghagh te laagh waaq ng afsi _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ ig leq ataq ell ghit iisi _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghletun _ pi kau usi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ kay nguk aaght asi _ tamaakut _ seghletun _ pi kasi _ . _ sangaawa _ allgegh tek aghsi _ tamaakut _ pi luki _ ? _ All gegh tek aqaghsi _ tuqu llghii n aghhaq _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ iteme te lusi _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh te kaagusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pelung iigh te sim iisi _ , _ allgegh tesi ma aisi llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
akileghtuusagh a _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqu llegh u uq _ ; _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngughk _ tunusagh a _ kenle ite ngugh u uq _ unguvallegh _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ atanegh mteggun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ lata amsi _ liisimake i lghii ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ enkaam _ liigike asi _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh aqe ait _ yug t _ kiyaghteng nguluki _ .
ugu i iqe aq _ aghnagh _ usputagh u uq _ . _ liilightuusagh m _ qelegh llegh ani _ aghnagh _ ugim in isaghq aaguq _ tagtale atun _ ugi mi _ kiyaghte llegh an _ . _ iwernga _ tuqu kan _ ugi ni _ , _ taawa _ iteme lleqe uq _ liilightuusagh aneng _ nengughte llegh m _ .
iwernga _ , _ ugi ni _ unguva luku _ alla mi _ yug mi _ kiyaghtekuni _ gelgaghni ii aghte u luni _ atigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ ugi a _ tuquma kan _ , _ iteme lleqe uq _ taagken _ liilightuusagh meng _ . _ gelgaghniigh u nghite uq _ ugiigh nqigtekuni _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpek si llu _ iteme ma usi _ liilightuusagh neng _ qayughllak _ tuqu kau usi _ Christ- ami _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-am _ pi ke aisi _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh tekaa _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ whangkunnun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
sivugh nghaani _ qaatke aqe aput _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh mta _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe i ste sug aqe ainkut _ tamaakuneng _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe gkumteki _ tuqu ste lleqe ainkut _ .
