Liisimak en ghis tegguu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ nanqigte yaghqagh i _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ? _ nanqigte yaghqaqe u kufsiki _ , _ naten _ piyaqnaghtutka lleqe aat _ elpesi nun _ nanqigte lleghqagh i _ piyaq niil nguut _ ?
Liisimak en ghis tekii _ nanqig saghqaq e keput _ yaquleg t _ ? _ enkaam _ taklaghte qugh llegh t _ aaghte i ragh u aghte te llegh neng _ whani _ unguvallegh mi _ piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa yagh ut _ .
aaghtiiraagh te negh gpesini _ sangafsi ngam _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ pi aqe tsi _ nanqig tesqellusi _ ?
kayngu nagh ghhagh meng _ elpek si _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ akule gpesini _ liisima lghii meng _ taklaghte te i stekaghqagh lgu ut _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ .
yeghlegi _ ugpeqagh m _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ aglagh te aqe a _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ nanqigt ist enun _ , _ agghit k esqelluki _ aaghtiiraagh te lleg tek _ .
tawatete llegh gpesigun _ ugpeqaanghil ngughestun _ kiyagh taagh u usi _ . _ Ugpeq aalgu tesi _ aglagh te gpenaki _ nanqigtivig mun _ . _ nepiigh ta qite ki _ anagte ghngaisi _ , _ puughte ghngaisi _ .
itupill _ elpek si _ katam _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ anagte aqe asi llu _ puughte aqe asi llu _ .
ipapestaaq _ liisimak saghq aqsagh aghsi _ seghletun _ pis tet _ nekaghqagh ite ngugh t _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ puughte ste gpenasi _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ nekaghqagh ite ut _ : _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe kayug t _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ g elg aghniigh tet _ , _ aghnaasigh t _ , _ yug t _ yug lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug t _ , _ aghnagh t _ aghnaa lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug t _ .
tamaakut llu _ teglenga lghiit _ , _ pakignegh t _ , _ megh es tet _ , _ seghlequugh tet _ yug neng _ , _ way aghniigh tet _ , _ nekaghqagh ite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ila si _ tawatete yagh lghiit _ salin _ ugpeqe i llghite luteng _ Christ-ameng _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ ughvughqe kaqe aisi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ , _ aaftekaqe aisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghlegh qumang ilngugh es tunllu _ lli aghtekau usi _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ atanegh kun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
ila si _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ila yan _ sa llegh gpesi _ kayuute yiite naanghite ai _ ugpegh lleg si _ . _ aa _ , _ entaqun _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiinga _ seghlegh mun _ ayghigh pagllag na yukagh ma _ pi naanghite unga _ .
kina llu _ pi nayagh lghii _ , _ " _ neqe _ ulimaagh u uq _ aqsaqugh mun _ , _ aqsaqugh _ neqe mun _ . _ " _ aa _ , _ iwernga _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesaghqagh ke ak _ qamagte lukek _ aqsaqugh llu _ neq allu _ . _ yugusigh _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe sighqagh u nghite yagh uq _ qayughllak _ yugusigh _ atanegh mun _ pi u uq _ , _ atanegh _ yugusigh mnnun _ pi u uq _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ makete yaghqaqe ai _ yugusigh put _ tuqu llegh meng _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mikun _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ makete llegh mitun _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Liisimak en ghis tegguu _ yugusigh si _ nalighnegh ke kangi _ Christ-am _ yugusigh an _ ? _ yugusigh ka _ Christ-am _ pi ligh tke a _ atuq naagh siku un _ aghnagh mun _ akike i kayug meng _ yugusigh mineng _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ pi naanghite aqa _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ yug m _ atuqe gkunigu _ aghnagh _ akike i lghii _ yugusigh mineng _ ataasiightekayug k _ yugusigh ak _ . _ qayughllak _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ maalghug _ yugusigh k _ ataasighte yaghqaa uk _ . _ "
iwernga _ atanegh mun _ lliigh kuvek _ , _ ataasigh u utek _ taghneghagh kun _ .
Liisimak en ghis tegguu _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- ke kangi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghfig i _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ Taghnegh agh mineng _ , _ enkaam _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi liite kaqe aisi _ . _ elpesi neng _ pike nghite usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe gpenasi _ . _ S e x -kun _ seghleghqe gkufsi _ , _ nukeggnaghqe lghii stun _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ pilleq aghsi _ . _ ila i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ tawatete nghite ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tukfigh kaqe aisi _ akitu pigte luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ quulvagh teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ yugusigh gpesigun _ .
Aap tek aqagh pesinga _ nengughte te llegh meng _ lata gpesigun _ . _ U ku s ta _ kiimsigh te nka _ . _ pinigh uq _ yuug _ nuliigh ngunani _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ tamaghhagh mi _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ aghnagh _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugi lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ qayughllak _ nanghii qull eng nayuk afsi _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
yug m _ efqugh saghq aqaa _ nuliigh ni _ . _ Taw a teg gh pigaq _ aghnagh m _ ef qu saghq aqaa _ ugi ni _ atuqe te llegh megteni _ .
aghnagh m _ ellnginagh mi _ yugusigh ni _ pike nghite a _ , _ ugi an llu _ pi ke aa _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ yug m _ ellnginagh mi _ yugusigh ni _ pike nghite a _ , _ nulighh an llu _ pi ke aa _ .
nengughte ma kufsi _ ighsake te gpenasi _ . _ wetku qun _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ atuqe te yaghqaa fqaafsi _ qafsina t _ unug et _ yughagh aghagh na lusi _ . _ taagken _ atuq un neqig lleghh aasi _ nanghii qull eng nayuk afsi _ tughneghagh- meng _ qayughllak _ nuqete yaghqaa nanigh kau lghiisi _ .
qelegh u nghite amsi _ nuligh tiis qellusi _ nalighmeng _ ugiigh esqellusi _ . _ iwernga _ piyug kufsi _ pi lghaasi _ .
whanga mtun tuq _ nulightugh fqaafsi _ , _ aghnagh ni llu _ ugiigh fqaafsi _ . _ iwernga _ allake te ukut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nuliigh lgu stekayugu ai _ ila i _ yug t _ , _ ugi lgu stekayugu ai _ ila i _ aghnagh t _ . _ iwernga _ itagnagh stekayugu ai _ ila i _ yug t _ nula i u na ki _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugi u na ki _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ allake te lghii _ tunusagh _ tuunegk ay u waa _ yug nun llu _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
una ta _ pi kegka _ nulightugh ma ite ngugh nun _ , _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh nun llu _ , _ ugingighagh nun llu _ : _ pinigh nayagh usi _ nulightugh nghite yagh kufsi _ whanga mtun _ , _ aghnagh ni llu _ ugiigh nghite yagh kufsi _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ nulightugh luni _ nuq ete pagning ilnguq _ aghnagh yug llegh mineng _ . _ aghnagh llu _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ ugiigh luni _ nuq ete pag neng ilnguq _ yug yug llegh mineng _ . _ pinigh aghagh nayagh usi _ nengughte lusi _ nanghiiqu lleg nge lleghqagh gpesineng _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ sex-kun _ .
ukut _ akuzite t _ whanga mneng _ pi u nghite ut _ , _ qelegh sagh u ut _ atanegh meng _ nengughtekagh nun _ . _ aghnagh _ iqite yaghqaa nghite uq _ ugi mineng _ .
iwernga _ iqite kuni _ , _ alla neng _ ugiigh yaghqaa nghite uq _ nalighmeng _ ugi minun _ lliigh nqigte li _ . _ yug m llu _ iqitesaghqagh ke nghite a _ nuliigh ni _ .
una _ qelegh sagh _ whanga mneng _ pi u uq _ ila itnun _ . _ ( _ Atanghem _ sa meng _ pi aghte mangite a _ . _ ) _ yuug _ ugpeqe aq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ nuliigh lgu kuni _ ellminite yu lghii meng _ , _ iqite ste nghite ligu _ .
aghnagh llu _ ugpeqe aq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ ugi lgu kuni _ ellminite yu lghii meng _ , _ iqite nghite li _ .
inqun _ yuug _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ aaf tengngwaaq aaguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ nulighh a _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ . _ aghnagh llu _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ aaf tengngwaaq aaguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ ugi a _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ taghnughhagh it _ pelungite ut llu _ aaf tengngwaaq aag utlu _ .
iwernga _ naligh _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ iqite yu kuni _ , _ iqite li _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqe aq _ yuug _ nalighmeng _ aghnagh _ iteme li _ tawatel ngughmeng _ nengughte llegh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmell usi _ kiyaghte sqe sug aqe aisi _ .
ugpeqagh mi _ aghnagh mi _ , _ ugi gpenite kuvek _ kayusii taq saagh an _ yuguligh llegh mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqagh mi _ yug mi _ , _ nuliigh gpenite kuvek _ kayusii taq saagh an _ yuguligh llegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataasi kagh tagh pesi _ ugpeq is taq ng isi _ Christ-ameng _ , _ nengughtekau tsi _ nalighmeng _ nengughte ma nge i tsi _ ? _ C ircumcise- e kaat sii _ nalighmeng _ pi ma nge i tsi _ ? _ Qepghagh te laagh uyagh et sii _ nalighmeng _ qepghaghtelaagh unghi te t sii _ ? _ almesiqe lusi _ tawaten _ nagnegh tek _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ tawatete stekaqe aisi _ . _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ taagken _ apeghtugh aqe anka _ .
yuug _ circumcise- ek aq _ ugpegh aqngami _ , _ allangughte te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ . _ C ircumcise- em angil ngu qlu _ ugpeqe aq _ , _ circumcise- en aqef qaa mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
C ircumcise- elleq lu _ circumcise- enghi te lleq lu _ pit ngunghi tuk _ . _ P it ngu yaghqaq ta _ taana _ qaute kete luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
Ataa sik aghtagh pesi _ ugpeqe i aqngafsi _ , _ natete llegh gpesistun _ almesiqe teggu _ .
Qepghagh te laagh uyagh sii n _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh aqe yaten _ ? _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ . _ iwernga _ qepghaghtelaagh un anigh naq ngu kuvek _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ legan _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ .
Qepghagh tel aaq _ nakmikegkagh a _ Atanghem _ , _ ellnga n _ iteme nga lghii ke a _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil nguq _ yuug _ nakmikegkagh a _ Christ-am _ , _ ellnga n _ qepghagh tel aaq aa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tukfighpag kaqe aisi _ , _ enkaam _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh tegpenasi _ yug nun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ aghula igh te yaghqaa usi _ ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ almesiqe lusi _ tawaten _ tuqlugh llegh atun _ .
Aap taq aghpesinga _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ta i _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh t llu _ nulightugh ma ite ngugh t llu _ . _ Atanghem _ ungipaate mangite aanga _ liilightuusagh meng _ tamaakunun _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ apostle- ngugh te kaagunga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ neghyuke nakefsinga _ .
Seghl el iigh llag ugh tuq _ nuna _ maaten _ . _ sume mni _ whanga _ itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ yuug _ almesiqe luni _ .
nulightugh ma ziin _ ? _ iqite ste gpenaan _ nulighh n _ . _ nulightugh ma ite kuvek _ , _ nulightugh naqe gpenang _ .
iwernga _ nulightugh kuvek _ seghleghqeng ngunghi tuten _ . _ ugiigh ma ite ngughk _ ugiigh kuni _ , _ seghleghqeng ngunghituq _ . _ iwernga _ nulightugh kufsi _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugiigh kumeng _ piyaqleg iigh aghagh yaghqaa usi _ whani _ kiyaghtaallegh mi _ . _ piyaqleg iigh sug nghite pigte amsi _ tawaten _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una ta _ pi kegka _ : _ atanegh ut _ tagi yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ nengughtekagh t _ qepghagh te litgu _ atanegh _ nengugh simangil ngughestun _ .
qivghu lghiit llu _ qepghagh te litgu _ qivgh unghil ngughestun _ . _ quya nga lghiit llu _ qepghagh te litgu _ quy an ghil ngughestun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ tukfightugh ghllag kayug t _ qepghagh te litgu _ av angil ngughestun _ .
Kiyagh teng ngu lusi _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ megnu ke aghagh gpenaan _ nuna m _ san q utanga _ . _ qayughllak _ nuna _ almesiqe luni _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ .
Kiyaghtaa llegh meng tuq _ whaken _ sumeghtaghaatk egk iil nguusi _ . _ nulightugh ma ite ngughk _ qepghallegh qagh taagh atuq _ Atanghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ efqugh sug aqegkanga _ .
nuliigh leg _ qepghagh aghagh qagh yu qu uq _ kiyaghtaa llghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ efqugh sug aqegkanga _ nuliigh ni _ . _ enkaam _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ malgh ugh qengng aa quq _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ aghnagh t llu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ aghnagh t _ ugi igh tke aat _ , _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh t llu _ qepghallegh qagh taagh atut _ Atanghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ yugusigh teng llu _ taghneghagh teng llu _ tuune yug aqe ait _ iingunagh ita _ atanegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ ugi leg _ qepghagh aghagh kayugu uq _ kiyaghtaa llghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ efqugh sug aqegkanga _ ugi ni _ . _ ellnga n llu _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ malgh ugh qengng aaq _ .
tawaten _ pi amsi _ kayusiite na lusi _ . _ nengughte snanigh nghite amsi _ . _ iwernga _ nakmike sug aqa _ pinigh lleghpigagh _ elpesi nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ atanegh _ uglafqe sigh ngunasi _ .
nuliighqagh leg m _ atuqe yug yagute kunigu _ nuliighqagh ni _ , _ nengughte lik _ . _ enkaam _ nengughtekumek _ seghleghqeng ngun aanghi tuk _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ liisimak ngwaa qum igu _ naten _ pi lleghqagh ni _ , _ nuqe tut ngu kum igu llu _ atuqe yu llegh mineng _ nuliighqagh ni _ , _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nuligh tiis qugh aanghil kumigu _ , _ nulightugh yug nghite kuni _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ .
nuliighqagh leg _ nengughte luni _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ , _ iwernga _ nuliighqagh leg _ nengughte nghite kuni _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ pi u uq _ .
aghnagh _ alla neng _ ugiigh yaghqaa nghite uq _ ugi ni _ kiyaghte luku _ . _ iwernga _ ugi ni _ tuqu kan _ , _ piyuke llegh mineng _ ugiigh yagh ghngaaghmi _ itagnagh uq _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugpeqagh ghhagh inagh meng _ .
iwernga _ quy ang aagh ataghagh yaghqaaguq _ ugiigh nqigte nghite kuni _ . _ Taaku s ta _ sumeghtaghagh llegh nka _ . _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ whanga mnite uk _ .
kiimsigh yug anka _ aapqugh aall esi _ negh ke neng _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ ipa u uq _ whaten _ pi llegh i _ , _ " _ liisima lleg lgu ukut _ qamagte luta _ . _ " _ Tawatel nguq _ liisima llegh _ aangaayugte ste i kayugu uq _ , _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh m _ iknaqugh tengng waa _ ugpegh llegh ut _ .
yuug _ pill gu yug neq _ , _ esghaghhu ta _ taana _ paninang _ liite yaghqaghtuqagh _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniq is teni _ whaten _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ , _ " _ whanga _ pi ke anka _ . _ "
enkaam _ neghe lleqe sta _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ? _ liisimake aput _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh u nghite ut _ . _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ alla _ kiyaghnegh ite uq _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ kiyaghneghtu ni luku _ , _ ataneghtu ni luku _ qilag llu _ nuna llu _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ellnga _ Atangh uuq _ . _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ellnga neng _ pi u uq _ , _ kiyaghteng nguukut _ ellnga nun _ . _ liisimakagh ut llu _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- anguuq _ . _ ellnga kun _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ulima kau uq _ , _ unguva u ukut llu _ ellnga kun _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ nalluke ait _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu nghite u langi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe aqe ait _ neqe t _ aghqe te kaqe ni luki _ kiyaghnegh pig nun _ . _ enkaam _ nenegh meggni _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ , _ " _ seghleghqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ neqe _ pit ngunghituq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe aghagh naanghite aisi _ neghe llegh gpesigun _ neqe meng _ . _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ neghenghite kumta _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ifl an aanghi taghput _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ talwa _ neghe ghngaamta _ allgegh te na nghite ukut _ ellnga neng _ .
ugpeqagh ghllag ni _ elpek si _ , _ piyuke llegh gpesistun _ pi yaghqaa lghiisi _ , _ liigike nga te gpesineng _ taana _ ipapighqell eq _ apeghtuusagh ke kaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kelenga lusi _ kayaal nguut _ ugpegh llegh it _ ayuq niigh q egpenaki _ ellngit a _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itni _ anaggute nga lghii meng _ .
naligh ita _ esghagh kuniten _ negh ma luten _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ temple- nge i te ni _ , _ ellnga llu _ negh yug yaaghte uq _ sumeghtaghagh llegh mini _ anaggute nga yagh ghngaan _ .
enkaam _ liisima llegh gpek _ seghleghqe stesagh u aghagh a _ kayaal nguq _ ugpegh llegh a _ ifla ste luku _ , _ ugpeqagh u lgute kan _ Christ-am _ tuqu tkekagh a _ .
Enkaangam _ ayuq niigh qeg kufsiki _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itni _ anaggute nga lghii meng _ , _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ ellngit nun llu _ Christ- am unllu _ .
enkaam _ neghe lleg mkun _ aghqut qegk ameng _ seghleghqe ste na yukagh mkun _ ugpeqagh u lgutke a _ , _ allameng llu _ negh naanghite unga _ sa meng _ tamaaken _ .
iteme nga unga _ , _ piyuke lleg mtun _ pi yaghqaa unga _ . _ Apostle- nguunga _ esghagh tke aq _ Jesus-meng _ atanegh mnneng _ . _ qepghagh te lleg mkun _ ellnga _ ugpeqagh u usi _ elpek si _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ apostle- epig unghi n nigh ngaat nga _ elpek si _ liisimak aghpesinga _ apostle- ep iig uunga _ atanegh kun _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghtaallegh pesi _ Christ-amun _ kelgute kanga _ .
Taaku s ta _ apegh aqe kenka _ seghl eq is tem nun _ .
Barnab as - lu _ whangkutung _ tungsigh naanghi s tuun g _ neghyaghqagh meng llu _ meghyaghqagh meng llu _ elpesi neng _ apeghtuqagh mtegneng _ ?
navek _ pinegh mtung _ kel qep agning ites teg nek ii _ ugpeqagh t _ nuliigh pung _ ilang istun _ apostle-et _ , _ Atanghem _ anglegut angis tunllu _ , _ Peter -e tunllu _ ?
Barnab as - lu _ whangku tuun g _ ellngin aghh aam tung _ qepghaa sim angin agh yaghqaq es teg neg uu _ neqekaghqagh ung _ ?
Pilluw agh tem _ tukfigh yaghqaqe nghite ai _ saghya ni _ pilluw aght en ill uni _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ grapes- meng _ piitesiigh agh tem _ neghe kayugu ai _ ila i _ piite stekagh ni _ . _ Penniigh niigh tem llu _ penniigh mi _ mamagh an _ ila a _ pikayug u a _ .
taakut _ usputagh t _ yug m _ apeghtuusagh ke ai _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ Liiligh tus aan illu _ apeghtuusagh t _ tawatete ut _ .
igaqe kau uq _ liilightuusagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh akun _ Moses -mun _ : _ " _ S ug rug iit aligh pen an _ o x -a _ wheat -et _ tutmagh ste nghpesiki _ qantagh it _ sig iq esqelluki _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghmike nghite agu _ o x -a _ ?
sangami _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi a _ ? _ O x - ngin aghh aaq _ sumegh ke agu _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ whangkuta llu _ suumqagh ke ainkut _ . _ ipapestaaq _ whangkun nunllu _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ qayughllak _ piitesighaghvig meng _ yataaghq ist en unllu _ saghn as ten unllu _ neghyuke kayugu aput _ nengighqe aput _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ piite yaghqagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ whangkutung _ piitesighagh vike kaqe amsi _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh si _ quya stekau ut _ . _ tungsighpag lleqe stuung _ tungsigh vike gkumsi _ akluk egkam teg neng _ ?
apeghtughiste m _ ila i _ elpesi neng _ allgegh te u kata _ aklukegk ameggneng _ , _ whangkutung _ wataqaaghaq _ piyaghq agh pig aa yaghtu kung _ . _ yeghlegi _ qepghagh yug kau ukung _ man ing ereg aghnal u tung _ akluk egkam teg neng _ allgegh te na lutung _ . _ ilangani _ mani pagite aqe ukung _ . _ talwa _ tamaani _ aapte yug igate amsi _ akilegh tiis qell u tung _ . _ una ta _ apallugh ka _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi sug nghite ukung _ , _ " _ Paul _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na luni _ . _ "
liisima kasi _ Temp le -em _ qepghagh tengi _ neghe kayug t _ neqe meng _ temple- mun _ tuunekagh meng _ . _ aghqefig m llu _ qepghagh tengi _ nengigh kayugu ut _ aghqe te kaghqagh meng _ .
tawatete uq _ Atanghem _ qelegh sagh a _ : _ Ungipagh tetlu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ aklukegk ateng _ allgeghsaghqagh ke ait _ tamaakuneng _ ugpeqe ikagh neng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
elpesi neng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh te igate unga _ pi kaghqagh ke yagh ke mneng _ . _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenanga _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh ni lunga _ maaten _ . _ quya aqe unga _ akileghtigh sqe igate ngugh u nga _ elpesi nun _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ ungipagh ke i naqngu unga _ akileghtuusagh ite ghngaaghma _ talwa _ panegh yagh ghngaaghma _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi naanghite aanga _ , _ " _ Paul _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na luni _ . _ "
iwernga _ aangaayug usigh qii tunga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelqe aqe aanga _ ungipaq is qell unga _ . _ Seghleghwaagh un ayagh tunga _ qaatke nghite yagh kumkun _ kiyaghnegh _ .
nakmike kaqsagh kumkun _ una _ qepghaqagh _ whanga mneng _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh lgu ni lunga _ pi nayagh unga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ta aneng _ pi yaghqaqe aqa _ akileghtuusagh ite ghngaaghma _ . _ alla _ naten _ pi lleghqagh ite unga _ .
sangaawa _ akileghtuusagh ka _ ? _ akileghtuusagh ke aqa _ una _ , _ quya pigte aqe unga _ akileghtuusagh ngunanga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qaywa _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe yagh ghngaaghpesinga _ .
Qepghagh te laagh unghi sagh ngaaghma _ , _ whanga mneng _ katam _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh te kaagunga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ , _ yug mun _ uglagh lghii mun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ .
Jews-en in nemni _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ ellngistun _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ . _ kiyaghte negh mni _ Gentile- eni _ liilightuusagh tgun _ kiyagh taagh ni _ , _ ellngistun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ liisimake ghngaamkun _ qaatke te lleg mkun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa nghite ghngaaghma _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ .
Gentile- en in nemni _ nalluke i lghii ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ ellngistun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ nalluke lghii stun _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ . _ Qaat keng ngun ghin niluki _ pi u nghite anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ iwernga _ qaat keng ngw aanka _ Christ-am _ liilightuusagh i _ .
Kay aal ngugh ni _ kiyaghte negh mni _ ellngistun _ lliigh aqe unga _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ . _ Enkaangam _ kinku stun _ alngunak _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ natete yagh nga a ta _ , _ naten _ alngunak _ yugulilleng esqelluki _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ nagaq iis q eq egh lluki _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qayughllak _ quya ste lleg nge aqe lghiinga llu _ ugpeq engh atgu _ Christ-a _ .
qamagte luteng _ ke tan qus tet _ sivulii yu kayugu ut _ , _ iwernga _ ataasigh ghhagh _ kayaalqe i i kayugu uq _ . _ Kiyaghtaa llegh pesini _ Christ-amun _ , _ ke tan qus testun _ kayaalqe i i naqe aqe tek _ .
K e tan qus tet _ ulape aqe ut _ yugusigh teng _ iknaq ughh naluki _ qayughllak _ qaghpa nge yug aqe lghiit _ avayagh meng _ ququngagh leg meng _ . _ tamaakut _ paligh yaghqaa ut _ . _ iwernga _ qaghpa _ ugpeqagh t _ allgeghsaghqagh at _ quun pek aghq aaguq _ .
K e tan qus testun _ taklaghruketun _ ketanqu aqe unga _ kaate na lunga _ kenle mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ tenglug testun _ , _ tenglug agaatagh aqe unga _ kayaalqe i i na lunga _ .
ungipagh kau iqe unga _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ Christ-amun _ . _ whanga llu _ kiyaghteng nguunga _ ellnga nun _ enkaam _ yugusigh mnun _ qaatke ste aqe unga _ , _ luuraq _ pi nghite kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite na yu kanganga _ ellmi neng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke sqe sug anka _ Jews-et _ , _ maligsaagh ikagh t _ Moses -meng _ . _ Egypt- meng _ aghulaqe aqngameng _ qamagte luteng _ maligtekaqe aat _ qilag u aq _ , _ maghyaghqugh i lghii _ tume kaghqagh itgun _ . _ kaa sa ta _ kavilngugh mun _ kellii mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ p ellegh tek aqegkanga _ megh _ aghv iisqelluki _ yaywaaseng _ .
qamagte luteng _ paaptaayekagh u lghiit _ qilawaagh kun llu _ kavilngugh kun llu _ kellii kun _ maligte yaaghte u luteng _ Moses -mun _ .
qamagte luteng _ neghe kau ut _ manna- meng _ ,
meghe kau ut _ ataasigh meng _ taagken _ megh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ tuunekagh aneng _ . _ meghe kaqe aat _ megh _ maaqekagh _ uyghag meng _ . _ Taam _ uyghag m _ maligsaagh kaqe kangi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ . _ uyghag _ taana _ Christ- anguuq _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kaqe ghngaisteng _ , _ paninang _ allute luteng _ efqugh simangil kangat _ ellnga _ . _ enkaam _ tumangani _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqu ste aqe luki _ yugusighkwaagh it _ mingite kau lghiit _ kilgaa ni _ .
tamaa na _ qamagte luni _ pillgh at _ whangkunnun _ usputagh u uq _ , _ kelengas aagh iinkut _ ellngistun _ piyuke fqaan _ seghlegh _ pi sqellug qu _ .
manig ughte ngughte gpenasi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ilang istun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ negh aqe ut _ , _ megh aqe ut _ taagken _ aghula aqe ut _ . _ " _ tawaten _ maniguute kau ut _ gold-meng _ ulimaagh mun _ kaa wagh aghmun _ .
seghleghqe fqaamta _ sex-kun _ ilang istun _ . _ All gegh negha _ seghleghqe llghite a _ 2 3 ,000 _ yuug _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ .
Nan ghii qun aqef qaam teggu _ Atanghem _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ pi lteggu _ , _ ilang istun _ . _ nemeghyagh t _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ ila i _ sivunegh put _ qayughllak _ nanghiiqu kaqe kangat _ atanegh _ .
Akuz ilg agh penasi _ ilang istun _ . _ yaquleg m _ tuqu ste i kayug m _ tuqu qugh kaqe ai _ ila i _ sivunegh put _ qayughllak _ akuz ilg aatk aqegkangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ sivunegh mta _ atuqekagh it _ , _ usputaghqagh u kau ut _ whangkunnun _ . _ igaqe kau ut _ kelenga sagh u te u luteng _ whangkunnun _ kiyaghte lghii nun _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ , _ ellngistun _ pi fqaamta _ pisqell uta _ .
enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ sumegh mini _ pikumi _ ugpegh lleg ni _ aghula igh te ni luku _ , _ kelenga li _ luuraq _ seghleghqesagh u aghte uq _ .
qamagte luteng _ nanghiiqu lleg si _ allak aa yag unghitut _ yug nun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ ata siigh mete uq _ , _ nanghiiqu llegh mun _ qaasghutesaghqagh ke nghite ai _ iknaqe lleg si _ , _ iknaq ell elit aq naagh iisi _ nuqete sighqagh meng _ . _ enkaam _ iqite aqe lleqe usi _ taagken _ nanghiiqu llegh meng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ maniguute gpenasi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
aleghqugh amsi _ sumeghnegh lgu lusi _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nakesi _ sa meng _ pil qa _ .
Iyamsi qay ag un nem teggu _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ wine- a _ Atanghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ , _ nengigh aqe ukut _ Christ-am _ aaw aneng _ . _ iigge mnneng _ aavgugh luku _ neqekrangllagh _ n en em teggu _ , _ nengigh aqe ukut _ Christ-am _ yugusigh aneng _ .
neqekrangllagh _ aavgugh kau ghngaaghmi _ ataasigh u uq _ . _ uglagh ghllag yagh ghngaamta _ , _ ataasigh meng _ taagken _ negh aqe ukut _ . _ enkaam _ kelgute aqe a _ naligh neq ugh nil uta _ ataasigh mun _ yugusigh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ki qun _ Israel-eghmiit _ ; _ nenegh meggni _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ , _ ilate aqe ut _ maniguute lghii nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqefig gni _ .
Sumegh pesi nii _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu aat _ ? _ neqe t llu _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ manigugh sigh pigu aqe aat _ ?
nakaa _ ! _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ aghqer raagh aqut _ tughneghagh nun _ , _ nak an _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ilate nga ste sug nghite amsi _ tughneghagh nun _ .
Christ-amun _ pi liite stekau kufsi _ tughneghagh t _ maligte naanghite asi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Atanghem _ qayuusigh aneng _ meghe gkufsi _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ qayuusigh itneng _ megh naanghite usi _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ Atanghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ neghe kayugu kufsi _ neqekrangllagh meng _ Atanghem _ tipele gkeni _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ tipele itni _ negh naanghite usi _ neqe meng _ .
whangkuta _ Christ-am _ pi liite ke ii te ni _ tughneghagh t _ maligte naqe gkumteki _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ qung yagh tesleq aghput _ . _ neqamike luku _ ellnga _ iknaqe ghllag uq _ whangkunneng _ .
ila si _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ila i _ salleg si _ pinigh nghite ut _ . _ aa-a _ , _ entaqun _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ , _ " _ iwernga _ ila yan _ sa llegh gpesi _ kayuute yiite naanghite ai _ ugpegh lleg si _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellngin aayug tef qaa mi _ pi uq lli _ , _ yeghlegi _ ila ni llu _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe luki _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ kemeg qragh k _ tukfighkagh i _ estugagh meng _ negh aqe teggu _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ aghqe tke kau ta a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
qayughllak _ igaqe kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ nuna _ , _ sa u aat llu _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ tawan lenguut _ Atanghem _ pi ke ai _ . _ "
ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh m _ negh yaghtigh sqe kangisi _ piyug kufsi _ pi lghaasi _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ketfaghtuqagh at _ negh aqe teggu _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ aghqe tke kau ta a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ pi kangisi _ , _ " _ taana _ aghqe tke kau uq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ " _ neghe gpenaan _ , _ ungipaat is teg pesi _ ugpegh llegh a _ kayaal is nayuk afsi gu _ , _ qayughllak _ ellnga ni _ anaggute nga lghii u uq _ . _ entaqun _ sumeghtaghagh na yalghiisi _ , _ " _ sangama tuq _ piyuke lleg mtun _ pi yaghqaa nghite zinga _ ? _ sangama tuq _ kitum _ inegh qugh aghaq anga _ alla tun _ sumeghtaghagh kayug m _ whanga mneng _ ?
iyamsiqa yug vike gkumkun _ kiyaghnegh _ neghyaghqagh mneng _ , _ sang anÊ¼ngam _ kitum _ seghlequugh lleq anga _ neghe gkuma _ iyamsiqa yug tkekagh mneng _ ? _ "
enkaam _ qamagte luku _ sa llegh i _ quulv aa siq aq iteggu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ talwa _ neghe lleg si llu _ meghe lleg si llu _ .
sa gpenasi _ seghleghqe ste i yaghqagh meng _ Jews-enun _ , _ Gentile-enun _ , _ ugpeqagh nun llu _ .
E f qughh naqutk aqanka _ yug lgute nka _ salleg mkun _ alngunak _ . _ whanga inagh mnun _ pinigh lleghqagh _ pi igate aqa _ , _ iwernga _ pinighqe lleghqagh itnun llu _ yug lgute ma _ pi aqe unga _ , _ uglagh lghii _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug qu _ .
enkaam _ whanga mtun _ pi aqe tek _ , _ katam _ whanga _ maligte lleg mtun _ Christ-a _ .
usuqe amsi _ neqamike kefsinga _ , _ atuqe kesi llu _ apeghtuusagh nka _ .
iwernga _ liigike sug amsi _ Christ-a _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ yugu uq llu _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ nuliigh mineng _ .
nasqughiitagh igh luni _ yuug _ yughagh kuni _ nalighmeng _ ungipagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ yughaghvig mi _ , _ quulvagh yaghqaq enghitaa _ naas quut il gh i _ .
enkaam _ aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh gpenani _ yughagh kuni _ nalighmeng _ ungipagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ quulvagh yaghqaq enghitaa _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ . _ tawaten _ pikumi _ qig ugh waaq astun _ meqe ste luni _ ayuqe lleqe uq _ .
aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh yug nghite kuni _ , _ kepugh li _ nuyiigh te luni _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh ni _ kayngu nagh lghii u uq _ qigugh llegh llu _ nuyiigh te luni llu _ kepugh llegh _ , _ enkaam _ nasqughiitagh igh nga li _ .
yuug _ nasqughiitagh igh yaghqaa nghite uq _ maniguute kuni _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh atun _ ulimaagh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh a _ esghigh sqellug qu _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ ulimaagh uq _ yug m _ aange llegh a _ esghigh sqellug qu _ .
liisimake kesi _ yuug _ aghnagh meng _ ulimaagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ yug meng _ ulimaagh u lghii _ .
yuug _ ulimaagh u nghite uq llu _ aghnagh mun _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ ulimaagh u uq _ yug mun _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ yaquleg t _ liigike litgu _ yuug _ aghnagh mun _ naasqugh u te i u ta a _ .
iwernga _ neqamike teggu _ Atanghem _ uspeqe llegh a _ , _ yug nkuk _ aghnaa nkuk _ aklu kete te nga uk _ .
aghnaqe yug ggaaq _ yug meng _ ulimaagh u ghngaan _ , _ taagken _ kenlanga _ yuug _ qamagte luni _ allgegh kau uq _ aghnagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh t llu _ yug t llu _ qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu qun _ : _ ipa _ anaggute nga a _ aghnagh m _ nasqughiitagh ngunani _ yughagh llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ?
yug t _ quunpeng _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ nuy iigh tek agh nguq _ yuug _ ukav aghtaq uq _ ellmi neng _ ,
iwernga _ aghnagh m _ nuyagh ghllag ni _ quulv aa siq aa _ . _ nasqughiitaghqagh u luni _ ellnga nun _ pi kau uq _ .
paninang _ kina _ aaghtiiraagh yug u kuni _ nasqughiitagh meng _ , _ ungipaan neqig tagh ll akun _ taana ta _ apostle- eni _ apeghtuusaq aqeg kefut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ atuqe aqe aat _ apeghtuusagh _ naan sagh ngaaghmeng _ .
whaken _ apeghtugh yug amsi _ qerngughte te aqe llegh gpesineng _ maniguute llegh mun _ . _ usuqepagningite amsi _ qerngughte te aqe llegh gpesinun _ qayughllak _ aqnigh qu utagh aghaq usi _ pinighqe te gpenasi _ .
ungipaate aqe aatnga _ qerngughte te negh gpesini nguq _ ila si _ aaf qem eraagh utaqut _ , _ ataasigh stun _ pi gpenateng _ . _ ugpeqe kestagh luku _ lliigh aqa _ .
entaqun _ aafqugh te llegh gpesigun _ liigike yaghqaqe asi _ naligh si _ ipa _ qaatke te nga ta i _ atanegh mun _ .
enkaam _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ Atanghem _ neghesta igh llegh anun _ , _ negh yagh tuun ghi taq aghsi _ .
neghe uute negh gpesini _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ negh ragkiigh aqe usi _ neqe gpesineng _ , _ ila si _ utaqa gpenaki _ . _ enkaam _ ila si _ iyatagh aqe ut _ , _ ila si _ suume aqe ut _ .
Negh igat sii - i _ , _ megh igat sii - i _ ne gpesini _ ? _ nalighmeng _ ugumi ke stekagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ? _ kayngusaghagh te ste naqutke aqe stekagh i _ ava ite ngugh t _ ? _ sa meng _ pi lamsi _ ? _ Usuq l amsi i _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ usuqe naanghite amsi _ !
sa u a _ liite kaqe a _ atanegh meng _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ ighivg aghmi _ tawani _ uvegh ghpagte te lleghqagh mini _ tugukagh a _ neqekrangllagh _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike yamigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ elpesi nun _ pi u uq _ . _ negh aqe teggu _ neqamike sigh u luku _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ wine- egh ragh aghmeng _ imaleg _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ qayuusigh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nutaghagh u uq _ akequsagh a _ aaw mkun _ . _ awen _ megh aqe teggu _ neqamike sigh u luku _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ quunpeng _ nenegh gpesini _ taagken _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ menegh gpesini llu _ taagken _ qayuusigh meng _ , _ kel gutng waaq aghsi _ Atanghem _ tuqu llegh a _ kenlanga _ alla _ tagi lleghqagh anun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ temngi _ neghe gkuni _ Atanghem _ neqekrangllagh aneng _ , _ meghe gkuni llu _ Atanghem _ qayuusigh aneng _ , _ quulv aghnaanghi taa _ Atanghem _ yugusigh a llu _ aawallu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ sivuke luni _ yug m _ avuteghqe te kete liki _ seghleghqe lleg ni _ alla _ pi yaghqaa fqiita _ pi na luki _ . _ enkaam _ neghe lghaaq _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ meghe lghaaq llu _ qayuusigh meng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ neghe lghii _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ meghe lghii llu _ qayuusigh meng _ , _ Atanghem _ yugusigh a _ liigike naqe gpenaan _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ nanqig telleng yaghq aa quq _ atanegh meng _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ uglagh usi _ kayaal ngugh nillu _ qinuyug nga lghii ni llu _ enkaam _ qafsina t _ tuqu laghate te kau ut _ .
iwernga _ ipapighqell uta _ nanqigtekumta _ whangkunneng _ katam _ enkaam _ avuteghqe tke gkumteki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ Atanghem _ nanqigte naanghite ainkut _ tawaten _ pi kumta _ .
iwernga _ Atanghem _ apeghtugh yug nghminikut _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ , _ nanqigte aqe ainkut _ . _ aghyuugh yaghqaa fqaamta _ pi na luta _ nanqigte i kuni _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh neng _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ negh na lusi _ Atanghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ neghe kestagh gpenasi _ , _ utaqatu te aqe lusi _ .
iyatagh lghiit _ tamaakut _ ne meggni _ negh lit _ enkaangam _ Atanghem _ nanqigte nghite liki _ . _ aglagh kuma _ elpesi nun _ ila i _ aaptekasi _ kiimsigh naagh anka _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liite sug amsi _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh aneng _ .
Neqamik aghsi _ salin _ ugpegh llghite lusi _ maniguute ste aatagh kaqe kangisi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ akuzi igate ngugh nun _ . _ aaghqute aqe stekau lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ liigike sug amsi _ kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ seghleghu uq _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuz isteng ngun ghit aa _ tawaten _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ Atangh uuq _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuz isteng ng waa _ tawaten _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ alla ghhagh inagh u ut _ , _ iwernga _ tunusagh t _ qamagte luki _ taam _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh ke ai _ .
uglagh pigte uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qepghagh te i lleghqagh _ ila mun _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ ataasigh _ atanegh _ qepghagh te lleg nge aqe uq _ .
uglagh u pigte uq _ allake te lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaqagh a _ , _ iwernga _ taam _ ataasigh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ste aqe ai _ whangkunnun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liite stekayugu a _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eni _ ugpeqagh tgun _ tun usal itk amikun _ . _ tunusagh t _ kitumun _ alngunak _ pinighqe sighqagh u ut _ .
Taam _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ yug m _ ila i _ akuzi ste aqe ai _ peghqinellegh mikun _ , _ ila i _ liisima llegh mikun _ .
Taam _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ ugpeqill elit aghaq aqii _ ila i _ yug t _ , _ ila i _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elit aqii _ naallghute i yaghqaa luki _ aqnighnegh neng _ .
taghneghagh m _ tuune kaqe ai _ ila i _ yug t _ allaaghlluwhaght i sighqameng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ ungipagh ke i lleghqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ liigike i lleghqagh _ agleghnagh lghii m _ T agh egh am _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh t _ igleghte te u ta a _ kina _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuzi ste aqe ai _ ila i _ yug t _ aw llaag ghhagh u i nakete te _ ulu kun _ . _ enkaam _ ila itnun _ mumegh igh qugh ste aqe ai _ akuzillegh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ tunusagh t _ ataasi k aght aghhaghmeng _ taagken _ ataasigh gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi u ut _ . _ tuune yukagh ni _ tamaakut _ naligh itneng _ tunute yaghqagh mi _ tuune aqe ai _ .
katam _ yugusigh _ ataasigh _ nalighneghtu ghllag _ , _ qamagte luteng _ nalighnegh t _ yugusigh m _ pike kangi _ . _ qaywa _ uglagh ghngaaghmeng _ ataasigh u uq _ yugusigh _ , _ Christ- allu _ tawatete uq _ .
qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ naligh n equ ghii _ Christ-am _ yugusigh an _ . _ ila put _ Jews- nguut _ , _ ila i _ Gentile-et _ , _ ila i _ qepghaghtelaagh et _ , _ ila i _ qepghaghtelaagh unghitut _ . _ iwernga _ qamagte luta _ paaptaayekagh u ukut _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ Christ-amun _ yugusi lii tesqelluta _ . _ qamagte luta _ tugukligh kaqe agput _ ataasigh k _ taghneghagh k _ .
yugusigh _ ataasigh u nghite uq _ nalighnegh _ , _ nalighneghtu pigte uq _ .
itegagh t _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmeng _ , _ " _ Iigg eng unghil nguunga _ , _ yugusigh m _ pike nghite aanga _ . _ " _ taaqe naanghite u aghte ut _ yugusigh mete nghmeng _ .
sigute _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ " _ iye u nghite unga _ , _ yugusigh m _ pike nghite aanga _ . _ " _ taaqe naanghite u aghte uq _ yugusigh mete nghmeng _ .
yugusigh _ iye raaghinagh u yagh kuni _ , _ naten Ê¼ngam _ nagaqugh nayagh a _ ? _ nalighmeng _ sigute raaghinagh u yagh kuni _ , _ naten Ê¼ngam _ naagh te nayagh a _ sapag nigh meng _ ?
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima mangite ai _ yugusigh put _ tawatete luki _ . _ nakmikegkagh mineng _ nalighnegh lightuqagh ke ai _ .
yugusigh _ ataasigh u yagh kuni _ nalighnegh _ yugusigh u nayagh nghite uq _ .
ipapestaaq _ yugusigh _ nalighneghtu pigte uq _ .
tea- ma ken _ apallugh ke luku _ iye m _ pinagh nghite ai _ iigge t _ , _ " _ Ak luk enghi tamsi _ . _ " _ Tawateghpigaq _ naasqugh m _ pinagh nghite i _ itegagh t _ , _ " _ Ak luk enghi tamsi _ . _ "
ipapestaaq _ yugusigh mta _ nat angi _ kayaate tesugnite ngugh t _ megnu nagh pigte ut _ .
yugusigh mta _ nat angi _ sume mnni _ megnun apag ilnguut _ , _ elngaatall _ aflenga kaqe aput _ . _ yugusigh mta _ nat angi _ esghagh sug igate ke put _ pilugug nga aqe aput _ ,
ila i _ tamaakut _ esghagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ ayuqe lghiit _ pilugug igate aput _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe yamigu _ yugusigh _ , _ megnu nagh aghagh stekaqe ai _ megnu naghpag i tesugnite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ yugusigh _ qepghagh kayugu uq _ qerngagh mi _ . _ nalighnegh m _ qamagte luteng _ aflenga kaqe ait _ ila teng _ tawatengwaaq _ .
ataasigh _ aqnigh nghaani _ qamagte luteng _ aqnigh kayugu ut _ . _ ataasigh _ usuq elleng enghani _ qamagte luteng _ quya kayugu ut _ .
qamagte lusi _ ugpeqagh ni _ Christ-am _ yugusigh ke aisi _ , _ naligh neq ugh iisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ugpeqagh nun _ nakmike kaqe ai _ sivuke luki _ Apostle- et _ aange lleghpigagh u luki _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh i _ uuknaliqistet _ ( _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ ) _ pingayut igh a _ apeghtughiste t _ , _ taagken _ allaaghlluwhaght istet _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghill el itkat _ naallgh ut imun _ , _ kayusigh i yaghqagh t _ ila meggneng _ , _ pinigh lghiit _ igleghutistet _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ akuzi kayug t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yukagh ni _ tamaakut _ naligh itneng _ tunute yaghqagh mi _ tuune aqe ai _ .
qamagte lusi _ Apostle- ng ut sii _ , _ uuknaliqe ste u tsi _ , _ apeghtughiste u tsi _ ? _ qamagte lusi _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elit kaat sii _ allaaghlluwhaght i sighqameng _ ,
naallghute i kayugu tsi _ ? _ qamagte lusi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ akuzi kayugu tsi llu _ mumegh igh qugh kayugu tsi llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ akuzillegh neng _ ? _ nakaa _ !
iwernga _ piyuke teki _ aange aghagh lghiit _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ . _ whaa _ maaten _ apegh naqe aqa _ pinigh aghagh lghii _ taaku neng _ .
akuzi kayugu yagh ghngaaghma _ yug t llu _ yaquleg t llu _ akuzill ghistun _ , _ temngi _ tengngaagtagh lleqe unga _ nalighmeng _ lengaaghtagh lleqe unga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
uuknaliqe kayugu ghngaaghma _ , _ liigike kayugu ghngaamki _ aliite nghite ngugh t _ qamagte luki _ , _ liisima llegh _ qamagtekaqsagh ghngaamkun _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ghngaaghma _ naayghagh nun _ nuugte i sighqagh meng _ , _ pit ngun aanghi tunga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
tuune yagh ghngaamki _ qamagte luki _ sa nka _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ paneghtesagh ghngaaghma _ ungipagh ke i llegh ka _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ allgegh te naanghite unga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
piniqe llegh _ nuqete neghtu uq llu _ , _ nangllegtagh uq llu _ ; _ piniqe llegh _ aqin angituq _ , _ nalighmeng _ yam r r angituq _ , _ nalighmeng _ aangaayug neghituq _ .
piniqe llegh _ seghleghyug te ite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ ellngin aayug neghituq _ . _ piniqe llegh _ sagiqe igate uq _ piyuke llegh mitun _ pi na luni _ , _ qik egh qung igatuq _ , _ nalighmeng _ neqamike i igate uq _ anaggute llegh meng _ .
piniqe llegh m _ quya sigh ke igate a _ seghlegh _ , _ yeghlegi _ quya sigh ka qaa _ ipapilleq _ .
piniqe llegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ sang wa _ sa yagh ghngaan _ . _ iiwleng _ ugpeqe i nga uq _ , _ iiwleng _ neghyuke i nga uq _ , _ iiwleng _ nuqete neghtu uq _ .
piniqe llegh _ kenle ite ngughk _ . _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ kenlet ghu usaghq aagut _ ; _ alla stun _ akuzillegh t _ taaqe yaghqaa ut _ ; _ liisima llegh _ kenlet ghu usaghq aaguq _ .
qayughllak _ tunusagh gput _ liisima llegh llu _ uuknaliqe llegh llu _ iighwite nghite ngugh k _ .
iwernga _ iighwilngugh _ kaate kan _ , _ qamagte luteng _ iighwite nghite ngugh t _ aviigh ugh saghqaagut _ .
taghnughhagh u lunga _ akuzi kayugu yagh unga _ , _ sumeghtaghagh kayugu yagh unga _ , _ liigike kayugu yagh unga _ taghnughhagh estun _ , _ iwernga _ yugughte yalghiinga _ taghnughhagh estun _ pi nanigh unga _ .
liigike llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ iighwite nghite uq _ , _ katam _ tawatete uq _ esghagh lghii stun _ taghneghaghqugh te lug kun _ . _ Q aku q aaq un _ liigikngwaagh yaghq aghput _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ esghagh lleq aghput _ gginasaghqugh luku _ . _ maaten _ liisima llegh ka _ iighwite nghite uq _ . _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ liisima llegh ka _ iighwigh yaghqaa uq _ katam _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimak ngwaaq anganga _ iighw igh ma _ .
Enkaangam _ ukut _ pi nga yu t _ kenlet ghu un naanghi tut _ : _ ugpegh llegh _ , _ sighima llegh _ , _ piniqe llegh _ ; _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh u uq _ angegh lleghpigagh _ .
piniqe lleg nge yug aghagh yaghqaa usi _ pakig gu lluku _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ iwernga _ piyuke teki llu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ , _ wata _ piyuk saghqaq aghsi _ ungipagh ke i llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
yuug _ akuzi nghmini _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ aleghqugh aqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ yug t _ aleghqagh igh igate ai _ qayughllak _ liigike naagh i te aat _ . _ akuzi aqe uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ yug m _ nallukekagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ tunusagh leg _ ungipagh ke i llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ akuzi kayugu uq _ yug nun _ . _ akuzi ta i _ kayusigh i kayugu ut _ , _ kayeme i kayugu ut _ , _ ilutughsagh i kayugu ut _ yug nun _ .
yuug _ akuzi kayug _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ kayusiite kayugu uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ ungipagh ke i kayug _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ kayusigh i kayugu uq _ ugpeqagh neng _ .
qamagte lusi _ piyug kaqsagh amsi _ akuz is qellusi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ iwernga _ wataqaaghaq tuq _ tunusagh lgu lghiisi _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ . _ tamaakut _ ungipagh ke i kayug t _ aange aghagh ut _ akuzi kayug neng _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ . _ akuzi kayug t _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ mumigh qugh telgu yaghqaagut _ kayusii tesqelluki _ ugpeqagh t _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi lunga _ aleghqugh yagh kumsi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ liigike yaghqaqe nghite ke gpesigun _ naten Ê¼ngam _ kayusiin nayagh es tem si _ ? _ iwernga _ apeghtugh yagh kumsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgutekagh aneng _ whanga mnun _ , _ nalighmeng _ ungipaate yagh kumsi _ sa meng _ liitekagh mneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ uuknaliqe tkesagh kumkun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa lleghqagh a _ , _ nalighmeng _ apeghtugh yagh kumsi _ ipapigh qellegh meng _ elngaatall _ kayusiite nayagh amsi _ .
flute- a llu _ harp- a llu _ seghletun _ qalghigh tek ay ek _ kitum _ alngunak _ liigik naang it aa _ sa u a _ ilagaate _ atugh aqe ta a _ .
Pilluw agh tem _ b ug le- a _ qalghigh tek agu _ seghletun _ ila ita _ pilluwaghtet _ nalluke lleqe aat _ pilluw allegh qagh teng _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ akuzi kufsi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ liigike naanghite aisi _ sa meng _ pi i qu tsi _ . _ Akuz in ghil ngughestun _ pi yaghqaa usi _ .
uglagh pigte uq _ allaghhiinaq _ akuzillegh _ , _ atuq isteng ita _ liigike aqe ait _ .
iwernga _ liigike nghite kumkun _ yuug _ akuzi lghii _ alla kun _ akuzillegh kun _ n aku mii nguuq _ whanga mni _ , _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ n aku mii ngu nga _ ellnga ni _ .
Enkaangam _ elpek si _ , _ tunusagh nge yu pigtekufsi _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh aneng _ , _ tungsigh tek _ kayute kaghqagh meng _ ugpeqagh nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yuug _ akuzi kayug _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ yughagh li _ mumegh igh qugh yaghqaa luku _ sa meng _ pilleg ni _ .
yughagh yagh kuma _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ taghneghagh gka _ yughagh lleqe uk _ , _ iwernga _ umyugagh gma _ liigike naanghite ak _ .
sa naqe zinga ngam _ ? _ yughagh lleqe unga _ taghneghagh mkun _ , _ yughagh lleqe unga llu _ umyugagh mkun _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ilagagh lleqe unga _ taghneghagh mkun _ , _ ilagagh lleqe unga llu _ umyugagh mkun _ .
qayughllak _ taghneghagh gpegun _ usuqe gkuvgu _ kiyaghnegh _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ naten Ê¼ngam _ liigike igate ngugh m _ usuqe i lgusigh lleqe aten _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iyamsiqa yug llegh gpeneng _ ? _ nalluke a _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ .
yughagh llegh n _ pi niigh pigte yagh ghngaan _ ila a _ yug m _ kayusillegh nge naanghite uq _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ akuzi aqe lghiinga _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ uglagh aghagh luku _ elpesi neng _ .
iwernga _ yughaghvig mete negh mni _ apeghtugh i yug aqe unga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ akuzite t _ atuqe luki _ liigike yaghqagh si _ , _ akuzi naanghite unga _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ uglagh pigte luku _ liigike yaghqaqe nghite ke gpesineng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ taghnughh aghhagh estun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tek _ anglikagh stun _ , _ iwernga _ seghleghqe sug llegh i _ taghnughh aghhagh estun _ ayuqe uq _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ : _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ ' _ kayagte lleqe anka _ yug t _ alla neng _ nuna neng _ aleghqugh yagh tiis qellusi _ ellngit a _ katam _ ul ung istun _ . _ aleghqugh lleqe amsi _ q aanghi tgun _ iwernga _ paninang _ nag an naanghi tagh pesinga _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ tunusagh a _ akuzillegh m _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ ipapigh qus iiguq _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ , _ nakaan _ ugpeqe i kayug nun _ . _ ungipagh ke i llegh _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ nakaan _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ .
Enkaangam _ yughaghvig gpesini _ ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ akuzite yagh kumeng _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ ila i _ yug m _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ itegh kumeng _ nallungughte ni lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ nalighmeng _ liigike igate ngughk _ yughaghvig gpesinun _ itegh luni _ nagate kunisi _ ungipagh lghiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ nagate luni _ nanqig tengngwaagh llequq _ seghleghqe ste u ni luni _ .
qamanlliqekagh i _ aksaqe nga lghiit _ qayvighqe lleqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ qungughte luni _ manigugh lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ whaten _ pi lleqe uq _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ whaante uq _ elpesi ni _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una ta _ apeghtuusagh ke naqutke aqe kegka _ . _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ maniguute na lusi _ ila si _ ilagagh aqe naagh ut _ , _ kina _ apeghtugh i aqe lleqe uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh i _ ungipagh lleqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh ke sqekagh aneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh i _ akuzi lleqe uq _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ naligh gpesi _ mumegh igh qugh lleqe ai _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpegh llegh itnun _ iknaqugh us iil it _ qamagte luteng _ .
yughaghvig mi _ kina _ akuzi naqngu kuni _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ pi lghaat _ , _ utaqa luki _ ila teng _ taaqe lleghqagh it _ . _ kitum llu _ mumegh igh qugh nakangi _ sa meng _ pill ghit _ .
iwernga _ mumigh qugh teng is kan _ akuzi lghii mun _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ akuzi te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ . _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ akuzi yu kuni _ kavyuguute gpenani _ akuzi lghaaq _ ellmi nun llu _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ .
uuknaliqe istek _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ ungipange lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ akuzi lit _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nagate lit _ , _ liigike litgu _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ .
iwernga _ kina _ ungipange gkan _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ akuzi lghii _ nepiigh li _ , _ ungipange lghii _ akuzi sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ qamagte luteng _ ungipagh ke i yaghqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ akuzi aqe lleqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ nagate lghii _ , _ liite li _ , _ taag av eng in aall eng l illu _ .
neqamike luki _ ungipagh ke i kayug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elit kaagut _ akuzi sighqagh meng _ , _ taaqe sighqagh meng llu _ . _ iiwleng _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elgu ut _ akuzi sighqagh meng _ nalighmeng _ taaqe sighqagh meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ alngunak _ pi sug igate ainkut _ . _ qerngughte te lleg put _ nekegmete sug aqe ai _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ qerngughte te nghata _ ,
aghnagh t _ akuzi ste u yaghqaa nghite ut _ yughaghvig ni _ . _ akuzi yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ igleghutiste ngu yaghqaanghi tutlu _ qerngughte te nga lghii ni _ , _ qayughllak _ liilightugh sag ni llu _ igaqe nga uq _ tawaten _ .
Aap qugh aghy uku meng _ , _ ugi teng _ ne meggni _ aapte litki _ . _ yughaghvig ni _ aghnagh t _ akuzi lleghqagh at _ anaggute nga uq _ .
elpek si _ Cor in th -eghmiit _ ugpeqagh t _ aangaayug neghu usi _ . _ Sumegh pesi nii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ elpesi neng _ pi u aat _ ? _ Ellng in aghhagh pesinun _ apeghtugh te kau aat _ ?
kina _ alngunak _ sumegh mini _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luni _ pikumi _ , _ nalighmeng _ ugpegh ghllag ma ni luni _ , _ liigike liki _ lata tkekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ Atanegh em _ qelegh sagh ke ai _ .
tugukligh nghite kagu _ una _ apeghtuusagh _ , _ tugukligh gpenaan _ ellnga _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ ungipaghte u yug aqe tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ iwernga _ taaqe ste gpenaki _ akuzi lghiit _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ .
yughaghvig ni _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pinitungwaaq _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ pi aqe teggu _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ negh ka ughte yug amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh kekagh mneng _ elpesi nun _ . _ tugukligh kaqe asi _ enkaam _ ugpegh lleg si _ taaggun _ nekegnga ut _ ayugite luteng _ .
yuguligh lleg nge kau usi _ ugpeqe aqe yafsiki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe manginagh teki _ apeghkagh nka _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe nanigh kufsiki _ , _ ugpegh lleg si _ sasii naanghite ut _ .
apeghtugh kaqe amsi _ apeghtuusagh kekagh meng _ whanga mnun _ . _ taakut _ ugpeqe yaghqaqe asi _ : _ Christ-am _ tuqu tke kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ katam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pinaq nill ghistun _ .
taagken _ llivegh kaqe aat _ , _ enkaam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ pinaq nill ghistun _ .
Peter-em _ esghagh kaqe a _ , _ taagken _ kingu aneng _ qamagte luteng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-et _ esghagh kaqe aat _ .
kingu itneng _ 5 00 - neng _ uglagh lghii m _ maligsaaghtengita _ qerng aghllag meng _ esghagh kaqe aat _ . _ kiyang _ taakut _ unguva ut _ , _ ila i _ tuqu kau ghngaaghmeng _ .
taagken _ James -em _ esghagh kaqe a _ , _ enkaam _ ki nguv aqun _ qamagte luteng _ apostle-et _ esghagh kaqe aat _ .
kinguligh u lunga _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ , _ ugpegh yaghq agh pagning itk aagh ngaaghma _ kitum i _ alngunak _ .
Uk aligh pig aagunga _ apostle- eni _ , _ talwa _ atigh yaghqaa nghite yagh unga _ apostle- meng _ , _ qayughllak _ amyuqet aatq egkaq anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ apostle- nguunga _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ whanga mnun _ avangite nghite uq _ . _ qepghagh aghagh unga _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ apostle-et _ , _ iwernga _ whanga mneng _ pi u nghite aqa _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ pi aqe unga _ .
qepghagh aghagh llegh ut _ ila mnneng _ megnu nagh ite uq _ . _ megnu nagh lghii ta _ taana _ qamagte luta _ ungipagh ke kaqe aput _ elpesi nun _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe kaqe asi _ .
ugpeqe u kesi _ ungipagh _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ : _ Christ-am _ unguvagh te llgha _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Sang am eng am _ ila si _ pi aqe aat _ , _ " _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh naanghite ut _ ? _ "
kina _ alngunak _ unguvagh te simangil kan _ , _ Christ-a _ paninang _ tuqu nga nayagh uq _ .
paninang _ tuqu nga kan _ ungipaghqe i uute ukut _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe yaghqagh ite usi _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguvagh te simangil k ata _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh te simangit aa _ Christ-a _ . _ Enkaangam _ whangkuta _ apostle- eni _ qamagte luta _ iqlengiqe ste u ukut _ qayughllak _ pi kau ukut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ Christ-a _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
tuqukagh t _ unguvagh te simangil k ata _ , _ Christ- allu _ unguvagh te sim angituq _ .
Christ-a _ paninang _ tuqu nga kan _ ugpegh lleg si _ sasii nghite ut _ enkaam _ aghyugh lleg nge lleqe usi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesinun _ .
Ugpeq istet _ Christ-akun _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ qamagte luteng _ ifla nayagh ut _ .
neghyuke i llegh ut _ Christ-akun _ wh aning in aghhaq _ kiyaghtaall emnni _ atugh u kan _ , _ nanglleg nagh lleghpigagh u yaghqaa ukut _ yug ni _ kitu meng _ alngunak _ .
ipa u uq _ Christ-a _ unguvagh kau uq _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ liisimakngwaagh aghput _ whangkuta llu _ unguvagh tesaghq aagukut _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ .
tuqu llegh _ allgegh kau uq _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ , _ Ad am -kun _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ unguvagh ste llegh _ tuqu llegh meng _ allgegh kau uq _ ilangakun _ yug kun _ , _ Christ-akun _ .
Ad am -kun _ qamagte luni _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ qamagte luteng _ Christ- amel nguut _ unguvagh tesaghq aagut _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ pi lleghqagh teng _ kaate nghata _ unguvagh aqe naagh ut _ : _ Christ-a _ sivuligh pig aaluni _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ taagken _ tagi nqigtekan _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi i _ unguvagh yaghqaa ut _ .
Christ-a _ umiileg u yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kayaalqe llegh minun _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh et _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ igleghutistet _ , _ yug t llu _ igleghutistet _ ilate luki _ . _ Christ-a _ umiileg u yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqe llegh anun _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ Christ-am _ anguyag i _ . _ kingulighpigagh _ anguyag _ tuqu llegh u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqesagh qugh a _ . _ Christ-am _ tuune gkagu _ ataneghpag u llegh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata mun _ taagken _ kenle a _ kaate lleqe uq _ . _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ lli aghtesaghqagh ke a _ . _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ qaatke stesaghqagh ke a _ Christ-a _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qaatke te yaghqaaghte stekunigu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ Christ-amun _ , _ qaatke te yaghqaaghte yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi kan _ , _ taagken _ ighnegh _ ellmi neng _ katam _ asi ligh u aghte yaghqaa uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ elngaatall _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ igleghte te lleqe a _ .
ila i _ yug t _ paaptaaye ste aqe ut _ tuqukagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ . _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghsaghqagh u nghite kata _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ sang am eng am _ ila i _ paaptaaye ste aqe aat _ tuqukagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ ?
liisimake aput _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh kau ut _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Enkaangam _ ungipagh ke i u ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tuqute naqe yagh ghngainkut _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
ipa u uq _ tuqu saqleg g iinaq _ ayuqe aatnga _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ katam _ liisimake llegh gpesistun _ quyake llegh ka _ ugpegh llegh i _ angli lghii _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ atanegh mteggun _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ipapigh q utk esaghq aqaghsi _ tuqu saqleg g iinaq _ ayuqe kangatnga _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
yug t _ Ephesus - melnguut _ pilluw aqanka _ teghig ke sagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ allgegh te na lunga _ whani _ kiyaghte lleg mni _ pilluw aqum ki _ , _ sa meng _ allgegh te naanghite unga _ . _ tuqu lleg mta _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh yaghqaa nghite kumta _ , _ " _ negh lta _ , _ megh lta _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ "
kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ilakumtaagh nge ma kufsi _ seghletun _ pikayug meng _ , _ atuq sag ulleq aghsi _ sa u a _ pi aqe kangat _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe lusi _ pi nigh itun _ , _ seghleghqen nanigh tek _ , _ ila si _ aku leg pesi nilnguut _ apeghtugh ma ite ngugh u ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ qayughllak _ elpek si _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayngu yug yaghqaa usi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi kan _ : _ " _ naten _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh ste aqe aat _ tuqu llegh meng _ ? _ N atel ngughmeng _ yugusigh lgu yaghqau aat _ ? _ "
uyuq _ nall uuq aq _ ! _ piitute _ nuna kun _ peghu kuvgu _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ sivungagh ni _ piite lleghqagh mi _ .
piitute meng _ alla u luni _ angli aqe uq _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh negh gpeni _ , _ pii tu tes qu veg aghhaq _ peghu aqe an _ nuna kun _ , _ wheat - k aghqaq _ nalighmeng _ sa u yaghqagh _ .
Pii tu tes qu veg aghhaq _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh mineng _ yugusi lit aqaa _ . _ allake te lghiit _ piitute t _ allake te lghii meng _ yugusighqagh lgu ut _ .
Tawatel kut ngwaagh unghitut _ yugusigh t _ . _ yug t _ , _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ iqallug t _ allake te ut _ yugusigh at _ .
qilag _ yugusightu uq _ , _ nuna _ yugusightu uq _ . _ yugusigh t _ qilag melnguut _ ellmegestun _ pinighnagh ut _ . _ yugusigh t llu _ nunamel nguut _ ellmegestun _ pinighnagh ut _ .
siqinegh _ , _ tanqigh _ , _ ighaleqetaagh t llu _ allake te ut _ pinighnagh llegh it _ . _ talwa _ ighaleqetaagh t _ allak aqagh tagh meng _ allake te ut _ pinighnagh llegh it _ .
tawatete yaghqaa ut _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh stekata _ tuqu llegh meng _ : _ nuna mi _ yugusigh put _ tuqu aqe ut _ , _ aghu aqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh igh ragh aput _ tuqu naanghite u aghte ut _ .
llivegh kumeng _ nunamel nguut _ yugusigh put _ seghlegh ughte yaghqagh t _ kayaali yaghqagh t _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh _ unguvagh stekuni _ pinighnagh yaghqagh llu _ iknaqe yaghqagh llu _ .
llivegh nghmini _ yugusigh _ yug m _ pi ke aa _ . _ iwernga _ yugusigh _ unguvagh stekuni _ taghneghagh mnnun _ yugusigh u yaghqaa uq _ . _ yugusigh lgu kata _ yug t _ yugusighqagh lgu ut llu _ taghneghagh put _ .
enkaam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ Y uk suwh aaq _ adam _ unguva lghii ughtekau uq _ . _ " _ iwernga _ kinguligh _ adam _ unguvall elit ikayug uuq _ taghneghagh _ , _ Christ- anguuq _ .
sivuke luta _ yug m _ yugusigh aneng _ yugusigh nge aqe ukut _ , _ taagken _ taakw aningani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugusi lit aqii _ taghneghagh put _ .
Y uk suwh aaq _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ , _ pagula aneng _ nuna m _ ulimaagh u uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ yuug _ Christ-a _ , _ qilag meng _ pi u uq _ .
yug t _ kiyaghtekumeng _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ yugusigh lgu ut _ Ad am -em _ yugusigh itun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ qilag mi _ kiyaghte yaghqagh t _ Christ- atun _ yugusigh lgu yaghqaa ut _ .
Ad am -etun _ yugusigh lgu lleg mtestun _ , _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ Christ- atun _ yugusigh lgu yaghqaa ukut _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liite sug amsi _ yugusigh put _ ukut _ kemekrag meng _ , _ aaw meng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ itegh naanghite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ . _ unguva naanghite ut _ quunperugllag _ .
Ungip aatagh ll amsi _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ : _ qamagte luta _ tuqu naanghite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ qamagte luta _ allangughte yaghqaa ukut _ ,
sukate pigte luta _ qunqalleg llegh stun _ kingulighpigagh _ qalghigh taq _ nagaqugh kumteggu _ . _ tawani _ qalghightagh llegh mi _ ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ unguvagh uute yaghqaa ut _ nutaghagh meng _ yugusigh ligh luteng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ taagken _ whangkuta llu _ paninang _ unguva lghii ni _ nutaghagh meng _ yugusi ng aghagh taa llequkut _ .
yugusigh put _ pagula meng _ ulimaagh t _ allangughte yaghqagh pestaagh u ut _ naafqesaghqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ . _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu kayug t _ simigh yaghqaa ut _ yugusigh meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
enkaam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqegkagh _ apeghiigh lleqe uq _ : _ " _ tuqu llegh _ naafqe uq _ ; _ kayaalqe i i llegh _ iighwigh uq _ ! _ "
" _ tuqu _ , _ kayaalqe i i llegh n _ naagu _ ? _ tuqu _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh en _ aqnighqe uute ziin _ whangkunnun _ naagu _ ? _ "
tuqu llegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eni _ allgegh a qaa _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ aqnighte na luta _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe llegh m _ liilightuusagh t _ aghtughyaghqaanghi l qii _ .
Enkaangam _ iyamsiqayugvik aqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ kayaalqe i i stekaqe ainkut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
Enkaangam _ , _ piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ kayaalqe i i lleghqagh ut _ ip ap estagh utanganeng _ , _ ugpegh lleg si _ aghula i te ste luki _ , _ nuug g aght af qaafsi _ , _ quunpeng _ qepghagh teggu _ Atanghem _ qepghaqagh a _ . _ liisimakagh i _ atanegh kun _ qepghagh llegh i _ avangite nghite uq _ .
ukut _ esgha _ elpesi nun _ qelegh sagh nka _ mani meng _ tuune yaghqagh gpesineng _ ugpeqagh nun _ Judea- melngughnun _ . _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ Gal at ia- ghmiit _ ugpeqe ait _ , _ elpek si llu _ ellngistun _ pi tek _ .
Sivul igh pig aghmi _ santillegh m _ aghnegh ani _ qamagte lusi _ aafte i aqe tek _ mani meng _ allgegh negh pesineng _ . _ tuune yaghqagh gpesi _ angtal anga _ allgegh negh pesi _ angtalanganeng _ iike luku _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ . _ enkaam _ elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ qerngughte i fqaafsi _ mani meng _ pi lghaasi _ .
kaate kuma _ kayagte lleqe anka _ tamaakut _ nakmike gkasi _ lata tgun _ aglagh te sqellug qu _ tunusagh i _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ whanga llu _ pi lleghqagh ka _ pinigh yaghqaa kan _ , _ maligte nakangatnga _ .
elpesi nun _ laalighte naqe gkuma _ sivuke lunga _ Macedonia- kun _ aag lleqe unga _ .
entaqun _ elpesinite aghagh qagh lleqe unga _ walluumllu _ uksulqusigh _ . _ taagken _ navek _ pi naqe gkuma _ yataaghqe lgusigh qagh nakefsinga _ .
Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ maaten _ pi kuma _ elpesinite aghagh yug aqe unga _ , _ aag vike ghesnagh yug nghite amsi _ .
iwernga _ ephesus- mete lleqe unga _ kenlanga _ Pen te c ost -em _ aghnegh anun _ ,
qayughllak _ megnu nagh lghii _ , _ aange lghii _ qepghagh lleghqagh ka _ atanegh mun _ pi aqe uq _ . _ M aan llequnga _ qaywa _ uglagh pigte lghii m _ anguyag ke yagh ghngaatnga _ .
Timoth y _ elpesi nun _ pi kan _ , _ elngaatall _ upugha tete nakesi _ , _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uq _ atanegh mun _ whanga mtun _ .
qamagte lusi _ asit ngin aagh penaan _ , _ enkaam _ quya nga an _ kayagte nakesi _ whanga mnun _ . _ utaqa aqe aqa _ maligte te luku _ ugpeqaalgut nun _ .
Ungip aatagh ll amsi _ ugpeqaalgutem nneng _ Ap oll os -meng _ . _ elngaatall _ qelegh kaqsagh aqa _ laaligh fik esqellusi _ maligte luki _ ila i _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ piyug nghite uq _ . _ laalighfike naagh aisi _ pi lleghqagh nge gkuni _ .
kelenga tek _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesini _ aghula itek _ , _ ilutu tek _ , _ iknaqe tek _ .
piniqe llegh kun _ pi aqe teggu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisima kasi _ Steph an as -enkut _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ , _ ugpeqe aqe yuwhaagh u lghiit _ A ch a ia- mi _ . _ atanegh mun _ tuune kau ut _ ellmeggneng _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ ila i _ kayusiite na luki _ .
qelegh amsi _ qaatku mangin iisqelluki _ liilightugh llegh it _ tawatel nguut _ yug t _ , _ ila i llu _ qepgh algut angit _ .
quya unga _ Steph an as -enkut _ , _ F or tun atu s -enkut _ , _ A ch a ic us -enkut _ kaate lghiit _ qayughllak _ kayusiite u aatnga _ aviillegh gpesini _ .
Quy as tengng w aatnga _ quya ste llegh megestun _ elpek si _ . _ kayusiite i llegh itnun _ iyamsiqa yug vike llegh gpesineng _ liisimak es tengngwaagh nakesi _ .
ugpeqagh t _ Asi a- melnguut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ A qu il a-nkuk _ P ris c ill a-nkuk _ sumegh ke ghllag aisi nguq _ atanegh kun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ el k egkenka _ mangteghagh itni _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ whangam nilnguut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ quyake te aqe tek _ naagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ .
whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ una _ igaqe aqa _ : _ sumegh ke amsi _ . _ Paul _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe nghite kunigu _ atanegh _ , _ naafqe lleg lgu uq _ . _ " _ Mar an ath a _ , _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ atanegh ut _ , _ tea- ai _ !
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ elpesi nite li _ .
piniqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ , _ apostle- nganeng _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ , _ Timoth y- mengllu _ pi u ut _ ugpeqaalgutem nneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ Cor in th -em _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ iingun aghh aani _ A ch a ia- m _ .
yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tuune lisi _ quya ste llegh meng llu _ nekeggmellegh meng llu _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ nangllegt apig llegh ii _ a ta _ , _ kiyaghnegh meng _ tagi aqe uq _ qamagte luni _ kayute kaghqagh _ !
kayusigh aqe ainkut _ qamagte luta _ seghleliigh lleg mnni _ , _ enkaam _ whangkuta llu _ kayusigh yaqleg w aap ut _ tamaakut _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh lghiit _ , _ atuqe luku _ ataasigh _ taana _ kayusillegh _ allgegh tek aghput _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
katam _ ilate nga lleg mtestun _ Christ-am _ uglagh u pigte lghii nun _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ , _ enkaam _ Christ-akun _ ilate nga lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh ghllag anun _ .
ikfiqe gkumta _ , _ kayusillegh gpesinun llu _ yuguligh llegh gpesinun llu _ pillgh uuq _ ; _ kayusillegh nge gkumta _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ kayusillegh nge lleqe usi _ enkaam _ tuune lleg nge lleqe usi _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ suflughte yaghqaa luki _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ ikfiqe llegh t _ suflughtekagh put _ .
enkaam _ sighimake i llegh ut _ elpesi nun _ aghula i tuq _ ; _ liisimakagh ut _ taana _ katam _ ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ ikfiqe lleg mnnun _ , _ elpek si llu _ ilate nga usi _ kayusillegh mun _ allgegh tek amnnun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ nalluke sug nghite amsi _ seghleliigh llegh meng _ nanghiighkagh mnneng _ Asi a-mi _ . _ elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ uqigtu pigtekau uq _ , _ repall _ sighima nanigh kau ukut _ kiyaghte lleghqagh mnneng _ .
ipapestaaq _ tuqu naqe ni luta _ pi yagh ukut _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ aneghte ukut _ whangkunneng _ sighimake fqaamta _ pisqell uta _ , _ taaw angin aghhaq _ kiyaghnegh _ sighimake sqellug qu _ unguvagh ste i kayug _ tuqukagh neng _ .
elngaatall _ seghlegh pestaagh meng _ tuqu m _ tevnegh aneng _ yugul iinkut _ , _ yugulill eq iinkutlu _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ sighima u ukut _ ellnga n _ yugul il aatagh lleq iinkut _ ,
elpek si _ kayusiite ma luta _ yughagh llegh gpesigun _ . _ yughagh tke i llegh ghllag i _ whangkunneng _ kiimsigh lleg nge lleqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste lleqe ainkut _ ; _ uglagh pigte lghiit llu _ iglag tugh lluteng _ iyamsiqa yug vike lleqe aat _ whangkunneng _ .
una _ esgha _ qukaayug sigh ut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mta _ ungipaate ainkut _ kiyaghtaallegh put _ whani _ nuna mi _ ipapigh qengng aaq lu _ piniqe i nga uq llu _ , _ kiyang _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga lghii kun _ kayusillegh akun _ , _ nakaan _ yug m _ peghqinellegh akun _ .
qamagte luteng _ lata put _ elpesi nun _ piyaqnagh u i te ut _ atightugh yaghqaa luteng llu _ liigike yaghqaa luteng llu _ . _ sighima kaqe amsi _ liigikngwaagh esqelluku
sa u a _ maaten _ liigikekagh gpesi _ nalighnegh ghhagh inagh a _ , _ enkaam _ aghnegh ani _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ elpek si _ qukaayug utk elleq agh pesi kut _ katam _ whangkuta _ qukaayug tke lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
qayughllak _ ipapigh q utk egkaq aqa _ qamagte luku _ tamaa na _ , _ sivuke lunga _ elpesi nun _ laalighte na lunga _ pi kaayagh unga _ , _ quyas telleng nayuk afsi _ malgh ugh qeng ngaan _ .
laalighfike yu kaqe amsi _ aglagh te kete luku _ Macedonia- mun _ , _ uteghnigh te kete luku llu _ tamaaken _ , _ kayute nge na lunga _ elpesi neng _ iglegha lleghqagh mnun _ Judea- mun _ .
Sumegh pesi nii _ tawaten _ qakiqniqe lleg mni _ ataasiigh negh i sing aa _ ? _ Sumegh pesi nii _ qakiqniqe llegh ka _ nuna m _ yug atun _ ayuqe a _ , _ tawaninginaq _ pi yaghqagh _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ " _ " _ nakaa _ ? _ "
ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ , _ akequsagh ka _ elpesi nun _ " _ Aang Ê¼gh unghi tuqlu _ " _ " _ Nak aagh unghi tuqlu _ " _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ elpesi nun _ Sil as - lu _ Timoth y- llu _ whanga llu _ , _ " _ Aang Ê¼gh unghi tuqlu _ " _ " _ Nak aagh unghi tuqlu _ " _ ; _ iwernga _ ellnga ni _ quunpeng _ " _ Aang Ê¼gh uuq _ " _ .
ellnga u uq _ " _ angegh llegh _ " _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh itnun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whangkuta _ " _ amen- u aghagh qu kut _ " _ ellnga kun _ usuq nem teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ayepsugighsagh ainkut _ , _ maligte te luta _ elpesi nun _ Christ-akun _ ; _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ aafte ainkut _ ;
nalluniigh ainkut _ ellmi nun _ pi u luta _ , _ tuune ak llu _ taghneghagh gni _ ilu mnnun _ nallangigh sagh u lukek _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ akequsagh kekagh minun _ whang u kun nun _ .
tuqlugh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i ste u luku _ qayughllak _ liisimake kanga _ qaamna _ ilu ka _ ! _ Cor in th - esug unghi tunga _ seghleliigh qes nayuk amsi _ .
Iglegh unnaq ut keng ngunghi taghput _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ ; _ qepghagh lgusigh yug amsi _ quy amas qellusi _ , _ qayughllak _ aghula i te usi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ .
taawa _ umyugagh gka _ ataasiighte ma agka _ alla _ elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ quya nghitesaghqagh u fqaafsi _ pi na lusi _ .
qayughllak _ quya nghite stekumsi _ kitum ngam _ whanga _ qaq ayug tesleq anga _ ? _ alla _ kitum _ pi naanghite anga _ iwerngaqun _ elpek si _ quya nghite stekagh ma _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ elpesi nun _ piyug nghite ngugh u nga _ quy anghi tes nayuk afsi nga _ , _ elpek si _ quy anghi tes nayuk afsi nga _ , _ elpek si _ quyas t is temni _ . _ Ip apigh qut keng ngwaaq a _ una _ , _ whanga _ quya nga negh mni _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ qamagte lusi _ quya nga aqe usi _ .
lata kau unga _ elpesi nun _ elngaatall _ aange luku _ qivghu lleg ligh lunga _ qamagun _ ilu mkun _ , _ qiya magh ma _ alla _ quya nghite ste fqaafsi _ pi na lusi _ taawanginaq _ liigike sqellug qu _ piniqe llegh ghllag ka _ elpesi nun _ .
taana _ yuug _ seghleghqe lghii _ tawani _ , _ seghleghqe nghite uq _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi _ elpesi nun _ seghleghqeng nguuq _ iwernga _ nakaan _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ . _ U niigh migh s unghi taqa _ sa meng _ pilleg mkun _ .
Taw ateng inaq _ aghyuugh i llegh i _ itagnagh uq _ .
maaten _ seghev ull uku ng Ê¼ngam _ kayeme teggu _ wata _ iil qen nayukan _ repall _ iilqayug ghllag na yu kan _ .
manigugh utu te aqa _ elpesi nun _ liigike ste sqellug qu _ ipapestaaq _ piniqe ni luku _ elpesi nun _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ lata kaqe amsi _ : _ liisimake na luku _ qaatkut ngwaaq ut si _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kina _ seghev unnegh pi sigu _ sa meng _ elpesi nun _ pillgh aneng _ whanga llu _ seghevute aqe aqa _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ seghevute yaghqagh _ seghevute yug aqe aqa _ elpek si _ apaghllug lusi _ Christ-a _ tawan tepig lleghh iistun _ ,
tughneghagh m _ aaghqute aqe na yu kanginkut _ qayughllak _ liisimak eg kefut _ sa u ta a _ yataaghqekagh a _ .
kaate yalghiinga _ T ro as -mun _ ungipagh ke na luku _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh a _ Christ-am _ , _ Atanghem _ pilleghq ang es tengngwaagh umak anganga _ .
iwernga _ pengeg ghllag kau unga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke a _ titus _ av iilnguq _ tamaani _ . _ enkaam _ unite luki _ aghulaqe unga _ Macedonia- mun _ .
iwernga _ iyamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ iiwleng _ igleghte te u ainkut _ kay all qii ngallegh qun _ Christ-akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ whangkutgun _ ming ites tengng waa _ liisima lleg ni _ nani _ alngunak _ katam _ neqnigh lghii m _ tepe ngllagh sigh m _ tepagh nge an _ mingite llegh atun _ .
qayughllak _ whangkuta _ tepkegtagh stun _ neqnighsaasigh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ Christ-am _ aghqe tkekagh atun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tepe ut _ me ite u uq _ yugul ik anunllu _ iflakagh nun llu _ .
Tamaa kunun _ iflakagh nun _ tepe ke ainkut _ tuqu llegh m _ tuqute i kayug m _ ; _ iwernga _ yugul ik anun _ tepe ke a _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug m _ . _ kina ngam _ qepghagh yaghqau a _ tawatel ngughmeng _ qepghaqagh meng _ ?
uglagh pigte lghii stun _ kinku stun _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ salin _ qepghagh yaghqaanghil ngughestun _ tamaaken _ qepghaqagh meng _ . _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ pi aqe ait _ ilang istun _ qepghaqagh stun _ ayuqe ni luki _ allgegh te sighqagh t _ kiyagh taagh usigh qam un _ . _ iwernga _ whangkuta _ ataasiighmete luta _ ipapighqell uta _ qepghagh aqe ukut _ ; _ apegh aqe aput _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ kayagte llegh atun _ ungipaghte u luta llu _ qepghaghte ngul ut allu _ Christ-amun _ .
whangkuta _ usuq es aayug gnaq laatagh estaa _ whangkunneng _ katam _ ? _ nalighmeng _ ilang istun _ akluk ingu s taa _ lata meng _ aapgh esqell uta _ elpesi nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ elpesi neng _ ?
elpek si _ , _ elpek si _ katam _ whangkuta _ lata ke amsi _ , _ igaqe nga usi _ ilu mteggun _ tea- ma anun _ liisimak esqell usillu _ atigh tiis qellusi _ .
Wh ateghlluwaaq _ lata u usi _ Christ-ameng _ pi t _ whangkunnun _ tuyugh qu ai _ . _ lata tke kau nghite usi _ ink- akun _ nalighmeng _ lliivneqegtagh tgun _ uyghag tgun _ . _ lata tke kau usi _ yug t _ ilu itgun _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ neghyu lleg lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ Christ-akun _ .
Whang kun neng _ pik nin aanghi taghput _ qepghagh yaqleg uniluku _ taana _ qepghaqagh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyaqleg ughte ste aqe ainkut _ qepghaqagh mun _ .
ellnga n _ qepghagh yaqleg ugh test iinkut _ nutaghagh mun _ akequsagh mun _ . _ taana _ nutaghagh _ akequsagh _ igaqe nga lghii u nghite uq _ liilightuusagh _ , _ iwernga _ taghneghagh gneng _ ayuqe uq _ . _ igaqe nga lghii m _ liilightuusagh m _ tagite a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ iwernga _ taghneghagh m _ tuune a _ unguvallegh _ .
liilightuusagh t _ igaqe kau ut _ uyghag tgun _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighughqell gha _ aliigh kau uq _ liilightuusagh t _ tuune aqngata _ . _ Moses-em _ gginagh a _ kuukgute kau uq _ taagken _ nighugh qellegh meng _ , _ qaywa _ gheve ghngaan _ Israel-eghmiit _ esghaghpag nigh nge i tke aat _ gginagh a _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ tuqu ste i yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ yug t _ qaatke nghite kangit _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ nighugh q est ighllag umak ata _ ,
naten mi _ angka an _ qepghagh llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ nighugh q est iigh ataghagh lleqa _ !
liilightuusagh _ nanqigte i yaghqaa kan _ yug meng _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ nighugh qengng ayaghtuq _ ; _ anaggute llghite ni luteng _ yug t _ pi lghiit _ naten mi _ angka an _ nighugh qengng allegh tu lleq at _ !
tawaten _ pi u ukut _ qayughllak _ nighug atagh alghii ngugh tuq _ nighughqell eq _ maaten _ , _ taana _ nighugh qengng ay alghii _ sivugh nghaani _ aviighute ma uq _ .
N igh ugh qell elgu yaq an _ tawaten _ mulu ghraagkagh meng _ , _ naten mi _ angka an _ nighughqell eg ulleq a _ mulu ghllag yaghqagh meng _ quunperugllag _ !
taana _ sighimake te mnneng _ tetug igate u aghte ukut _ .
Moses -etun _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ , _ gginagh ni _ saaputagh iqe a _ enkaam _ Israel-eghmiit _ esghagh mangite aat _ nighug ghllag _ aviighute lghii _ .
umyugagh it _ liigikepagningite te kau ut _ , _ wh av emun _ kenlanga _ umyugagh it _ saape nga ut _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ saaputagh meng _ , _ atightugh nghmegteki _ neghigh aat _ akequsagh t _ . _ taana _ saape te aq _ iqite yaghqaa uq _ Christ- angin aghh aghqun _ .
talwa _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ atightugh nghmegteki _ liilightuusagh t _ Moses -mun _ tuunekagh t _ , _ umyugagh it _ saaputagh meng _ saape nga aqe ut _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ qiive nghmini _ atanegh mun _ saaputagh a _ iqite aqe uq _ .
maaten _ atanegh _ taghneghagh u lghii _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ Atanghem _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi lgu kuni _ , _ iteme nga lleg lgu uq _ .
Qamagtengngwaagh luta _ saape ta u na ki _ gginagh put _ esghagh lleq aghput _ nighughqell gha _ Atanghem _ . _ taana _ ataasigh _ nighughqell eq _ tagi lghii _ atanegh meng _ taghneghagh u uq _ , _ allangughte ainkut _ ellng asug nigh tesqelluta _ aange aghagh luku _ nighugh qellegh meng _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ qepghaqagh lightu ainkut _ whaken _ qepghagh yaghqagh meng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iilqayugigate ukut _ .
ighsayagute kaqe aput _ aksaqekagh t llu _ kayngu nagh lghiit llu _ . _ puughte igate aput _ yug t _ , _ allangughte igate aput llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ . _ Wh ategh llu waaq lu _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapi llghi _ , _ enkaangam _ yug t _ liite lleqe ainkut _ n atel ngu ut fut _ esghagh ma nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ungipagh kekagh put _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ saape nga kata _ , _ saape nga ut _ ifla yaghqagh ghhagh inagh nun _ .
