Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ sii vag qite ki _ atanegh mun _ qepghagh lghiit _ akule gpesini _ . _ ellnga n _ nakmike kaqe ai _ igleghte te i ste u luki llu _ apeghtughiste u luki llu _ elpesi nun _ .
Siiv ak eghllag aq i tek illu _ piniqe aqe teki llu _ apallugh ke luki _ qepghagh llegh it _ . _ Nek egg me tull usi _ pi tek _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ kelenga sagh ughte ki _ ighsanitagh lghiit _ , _ ilutughsagh teki _ aling tagh lghii t _ , _ kayusigh teki _ kayaal nguut _ , _ n egk egh lluw aan _ pi aqe teki _ qamagte luki _ .
wataghllak _ akite yaqunaki _ seghletun _ pis tesi _ iwernga _ pinitun _ pi aqe teki _ ila si _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ .
quya manginagh lusi _ ,
yughagh manginagh lusi _ ,
iyamsiqa yug lusi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ nekeg negh mi _ . _ Taaku nguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh i _ elpesi nun _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ pi liite ke ii te nun _ .
qaamte gpenakek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ,
sasii nghite ni gpenaki _ uuknaliqe i llegh t _ .
iwernga _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nanghiiqu aqe teggu _ enkaam _ tugukligh aqe luki _ sa u aat _ pinigh lghiit _ ,
iqite nga tek _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghlegh meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmell elit istem _ iighw igh tengngwaagh lusi _ pelungigh ll isi _ . _ avute ite ste liki _ taghneghagh si _ , _ unguva sigh si _ , _ yugusigh si _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tagi kan _ .
Tag siq ligh teg pesi _ pi lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ataasiighmete uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ yughagh te kaqe luta _ .
quya kaqe teki _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ naagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ .
qelegh amsi _ Atanghem _ pillegh qal i tellgh akun _ ukut _ lata t _ atigh tiis qelluki _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ ugpeqaalgu teg pesinun _ .
piniqe llegh a _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ elpesi nite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ , _ silas- meng _ Timoth y- mengllu _ pi u ut _ . _ ugpeqagh nun _ Th es sal onic a- melngughnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ pi itnun _ , _ Atangh emllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
nangllegtagh llegh llu _ nekeggmellegh llu _ elpesi nun _ pi u uk _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ atanegh meng llu _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ iiwleng _ iyamsiqa yagute yaghqaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ elqughute nga uq _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh ut _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeq inegh tugh tagh alghii sillu _ , _ piniq utagh aghl usillu _ lliigh usi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qan atk aqamsi _ ila itnun _ ugpeqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yughaghvig it nil ngughnun _ . _ A apgh aqaghput _ nuqe tut inegh tu llegh sillu _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ qaywa _ amyuutk elleng egh ngaagh pesi _ , _ ikf iqell eng egh ngaagh pesi llu _ .
tamaakut _ ipapigh q aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh a _ elqughutngagh lghii u uq _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh aisi _ itagnagh ni lusi _ kiyagh tesqellusi _ ataneghpag u llegh mini _ qayughllak _ ikfiq ut keng nguk esi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe a _ sa u a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ : _ ikfiqesaghqagh ke ai _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe ste i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ ikfiqe lghii ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali ste naagh aisi _ ikfiqe llegh meng _ whangkuta llu _ maligte te luta _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ aliightekumiki _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ iknaqe ghllag lghiit llu _ yaquleg i _ . _ qilag meng _ ukig lleqe ut _ kenegh mete luteng _ kumaghugh nga lghii mi _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ qaatke te igate ngugh t llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ Jesus-meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
aghyuugh naqngu ai llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ naafqe llegh meng _ , _ iqite ste naqngu ut llu _ atanegh meng _ , _ nighug aneng llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh an _ .
tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ atanegh _ Jesus _ tagi kan _ . _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ ugpeqe ikagh t _ ellnga neng _ usuqe lleqe aat _ , _ saghiigha yagute lleqe aat llu _ . _ elpek si _ akulng it nill equsi _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ ungipagh _ apeghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ whaten _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh lisi _ kiyaghteng ngun ilusi _ ellmi _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh mitun _ . _ Aghtugh yaghqaanghi llegh mi kunllu _ naamigte ligu _ qamagte luku _ piyuke llegh i _ pinigh llegh mun _ , _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ .
enkaam _ ategh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ quulv alleng ellequq _ elpesigun _ , _ elpek si llu _ ellnga kun _ quulv alleng ellequ si _ nafughtagh llegh akun llu _ nangllegtagh llegh akun llu _ kiyaghnegh mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ ungipaate yug amsi _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ qerngughte te lleghqagh mnneng llu _ ellnga nun _ .
umyugagh si _ qaprag agh tes un ghit ngwaagh aput _ nalighmeng _ kakave sug nghite aput _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ aghnegh a _ Atanghem _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ entaqun _ kitum _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ ungipagh kegka qaa _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ lata tke ma ni luku _ whangkunnun _ pika qaa _ .
iwernga _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ! _ taana _ aghnegh a _ Atanghem _ kaate naanghite uq _ kenlanga _ yug t _ malighqutaq sug nan il ghitnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh anun _ , _ kaate llegh anun llu _ seghlegh pestaagh m _ yug m _ . _ ( _ ellnga _ naafqesaghqagh u uq _ hell- mi _ . _ )
Taam _ yug m _ kipullgin aagh lleqii _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ nalighmeng _ manigugh yaghqagh t _ , _ tamaakuneng _ ellmi neng _ qu lighpig aagh saghqaaguq _ . _ Enkaangam _ itegh luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ Temple- ng anun _ aqume luni _ kiyaghnegh u ni lleqe uq _ .
Neqamik en ghis tegguu _ salin _ elpesi nite lunga _ ungipaate kaqe kemsi _ tamaaken _ ?
liisimakagh i _ kitum _ maaten _ nuqnegh kaqe a _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ . _ wetku _ aghnegh ni _ kaate kan _ tagi lleqe uq _ .
aawallu _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ seghleghqe llegh m _ qepghagh u aghte ma uq _ nuna mi _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ kitum _ kimaawi sta qaa _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ kimaawi ste i ste nga _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite ste llegh anun _ .
taagken _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ aliigh tes llequq _ , _ iwernga _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ tagi kuni _ tuqu lleqe a _ aneghnegh aneng _ qanegh mi _ , _ naafqe lleqe a llu _ nighug ghllag akun _ tagi llegh mi _ .
Siv ut gh ulluku _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ tagi lleghqagh a _ , _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ tagi lleqe uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eligh luni _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ taana _ yuug _ allaaghlluwhaght i sighwaagh llequq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ saghiigha nagh lghii neng _ .
atuqe lleqe ai llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ seghlegh t _ puughhe na luki _ tuqu yaghqagh t _ . _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe yu nghite kangat _ ip alleq _ yugul i sigh qaq saq es eng _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ puugh neq guu tesleq ii _ ugpeq esqelluki _ sa u aat _ ipa u nghite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ ugpeqe i nghite ngugh t _ ipapi lleghmeng _ nanqigte yaghqaa ut _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ qayughllak _ pinigh y uug usi qegk angat _ segh llegh qell eq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ iiwleng _ iyamsiqa yagute yaghqaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ elpek si _ piniqe ke ii te ni _ Atanghem _ . _ Iyamsi qayugvik aqagh putlu _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ yugul is qellusi _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ . _ Yugul i kaagusi _ pelungighsagh llegh akun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ , _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun llu _ ipapilleq _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghtaallegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh kaqe aisi _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ ungipagh kekagh megteggun _ ; _ tagi sqe aqe aisi _ pi liite sqellug qu _ nengighqagh i _ pinighnagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqaalgutem nni _ , _ aghula i te kestagh tek _ , _ ugpeqe kestagh teggu _ ipapilleq _ apeghtugh tekagh ut _ elpesi nun _ ungipagh ke i lleg mteggun llu _ lata lleg mteggun llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ piniq is tem ta _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ ilutu llegh meng _ , _ pinigh lghii meng llu _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ellnga n _ katam _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ ata mta _ , _ el k egkenka
ilutughsagh lisi llu _ , _ iknaqugh sagh li sillu _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ pinigh lghii kun _ qepghagh llegh gpesigun llu _ akuzillegh gpesigun llu _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ taaqe niite te kun _ sa meng _ pi iigh aatagh qagh lamsi _ . _ yughagh tke tekut _ Atanghem _ ungipagh a _ mingite ragkiigh sqellug qu _ , _ yug nun llu _ quulv iisqelluku _ , _ katam _ elpek si _ pi llegh gpesistun _ .
yughagh tke tekut llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ yugul is qell uta _ seghlegh neng _ yug neng _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu nghite uq _ .
iwernga _ atanegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ ; _ ik nak qugh sagh lleq iisillu _ p aq niigh sagh lleq iisillu _ tughneghagh meng _ .
Atanghem _ nallun eq niigh um aa _ whangkunnun _ qaatke te u usi _ qelegh lleg mnnun _ , _ qaatku mangin agh lleq agh sillu _ .
Atanghem _ liigik esl isi _ wataqaaghaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ , _ Christ- amllu _ nuqe tut inegh tu llgh aneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qelegh amsi _ iq it ng as qellusi _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ ugpeqaalgu tegpesineng _ ighsanitagh lghii neng llu _ malighqutagh ke igate ngugh neng llu _ apeghtugh tekagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ .
elpek si _ katam _ liisimakagh i _ ayuq e sighagh yaghq aqsagh aghpe kut _ ; _ elpesi nite luta _ ighsanitagh iqe mangite ukut _ .
tugukligh igate aput _ neqe t _ kinku neng _ alngunak _ tukf ill ngun aki _ . _ iwernga _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ , _ ughleghiigh kau ukut _ uqig tuqut ngu y unghi tu tem nneng _ naligh ghhagh inagh gpesinun _ .
elpesi nun _ aap saqleg uyagh tukut _ kayusii tesqelluta _ , _ yeghlegi _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ aflengake na luta _ whangkunneng _ usputagh u na luta _ elpesi nun _ ayuq esi ghiis qell uta _ .
talwa _ elpesi nite luta _ whaten _ qelqe aqe kemsi _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ qepghagh yug nghite ngughk _ neghe ste gpenaan _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi kau ukut _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh aqe ukut _ ila si nguq _ ighsanitagh ut _ , _ qepghagh yug igate ut _ , _ yeghlegi _ yanutqu aqe ai nguq _ yug t _ .
ategh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qelegh aput llu _ kayeme aput llu _ tawatel nguut _ yug t _ ighsanitagh iqe fqiita _ allgh egh utes qelluki _ kiyagh usigh q iitneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ qinuyagute gpenasi _ pinitun _ pi nghmeng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te yu nghite kan _ sa meng _ pilleg mnnun _ u kutgun _ lata mteggun _ , _ suum qen nakesi _ kinku u ta i _ . _ enkaam _ iqite nga lghaasi _ ellnga neng _ kayngu yug sqellug qu _ anaggute llegh aneng _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghute gpenaan _ anguyag u luku _ , _ itupill _ kelenga sagh ughte ggu _ ugpeqagh u lgute kete luku _ .
Atanghem _ ellmi neng _ katam _ nekeggmell elit ikayug em _ , _ nekeggmell eli si ll i _ iiwleng _ sa mi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ atanegh _ tamaghh aagh pesi nilli _ .
whanga _ , _ Paul _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ igaqe aqa _ piniqe i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ igagh aqe unga _ qamagte luki _ lata mkun _ elpesi nun _ liisimak esqelluki _ whanga mneng _ pi u ta i _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ apostle- nganeng _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ . _ Apostle- ngugh te kaagunga _ qelegh llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ Yugulighis tem ta _ , _ Christ _ Jesus- emllu _ sighimakekagh mta _ .
Timoth y -mun _ ; _ ighnegh pig ke amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mtegnegun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ , _ Christ _ Jesus- emllu _ atanegh mta _ quyas li ten _ , _ nangllek li ten _ , _ nekeggmell elg us lit enllu _ .
aghulaqe naqe ma lunga _ Macedonia- mun _ ephesus- mete sqe kaqe amken _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ tamaan lenguut _ apeghtugh i u ut _ ipa u nghite ngugh meng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ . _ qelegh ki _ taa qes qelluki
sang illgh aatk egpen aki nguq _ akuzim ghh utk elluki _ ungipaghaate ngllaghkagh t _ , _ sivunegh lghute ghllag t llu _ ategh it _ . _ tamaakut _ aaghtiiraagh sigh ghhagh inagh u ut _ , _ kayute u nghite ut _ qepghaqagh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ellnga n _ qepghaqagh a _ apeghiigh aqe uq _ ugpeqill ghii n aghh aghqun _ .
Qel el uug utk aqa _ ugpeqagh t _ piniqu te piig esqelluki _ , _ umyugagh kegte luki _ , _ ipa pig meng _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu luki _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ pegtekaqe ait _ tamaakut _ enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh aqe ut _ temng imeng _ .
apeghtughiste u yug aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ iwernga _ liigike igate ait _ akuzi tkekagh teng _ qaywa _ apeghtuusagh ke ghngaaghmegteki _ ipate yu gnite luki _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ pinigh ut _ elqughte luki _ atuqe lghii ni _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ ulimaagh u nghite ut _ pinigh lghii nun _ yug nun _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ liilightuusagh neng _ naafqii kayug nun _ , _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh yug igate ngugh nun _ , _ seghleghq est en unllu _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ waa k igal ngughnun _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ legasiighwagh tke i lghii nun llu _ agleghnagh lghii nun _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ tuqute i kayug nun _ ata meggneng _ nalighmeng _ naa meggneng _ , _ yug tagh ten unllu _ .
ulimaagh u ut _ sex-kun _ seghleghq est enun _ , _ yug nun _ yug lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug nun _ , _ yug nun _ akike i kayug nun _ yug meng _ qepghaghtelaagh uluki _ , _ iqlengiq est enun _ , _ iqlengagh lghii nun _ liisimak ist enun _ , _ kipullgin aalghii nunllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ ipapigh qengng alghiinun _ .
taakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ pi niigh pigte lghii neng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ pi u ut _ . _ apegh u aat _ usuqnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ aapgh esqelluki _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ Christ _ Jesus _ atanegh ut _ , _ iknaqugh saq aqaanga _ qepghaqagh mnun _ . _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ esghagh kaqe aanga _ ataasiighmete lunga _ nakmike lunga _ qepghaa tesqell uni _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke kaqe aqa _ Christ-a _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ pi kaqe aqa _ . _ amyuqetagh te kaqe yamki _ maligsaagh tengi _ tawatete uq _ amyuqet aat keng ngu f taqa _ ellnga _ . _ Taw all iim a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke kaqe kanganga _ qayughllak _ salin _ ugpeqe igate kegka _ Christ-a _ , _ liigike ma ite kegka _ sa aqe tke a _ .
iwernga _ atanegh mta _ nanglleg ke ghllag kaqe aanga _ ! _ Ugpeq ill el itk aqaanga _ , _ piniqell el itk aq aang allu _ Christ _ Jesus- mel ngughmeng _ .
sa meng _ pi lleghqagh ka _ ipa u uq _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ ugpeqe yaghqaa uq _ , _ " _ Christ _ Jesus _ tagi kau uq _ nuna mun _ yugul in aluki _ seghleghqes tet _ . _ " _ whanga _ seghl elleghpig aagunga _ seghleghq est eneng _ .
naqamllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kaqe aanga _ . _ enkaam _ usputagh u unga _ naten _ tag kaan _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ utaqa i lleghqagh aneng _ seghleghq est eneng _ ugpeq esqell uni _ . _ taana _ uspute aq _ tamaakunun _ ayuqe uq _ ugpeqe i yaghqagh nun _ ellnga neng _ unguvall eng esqelluki _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
umiileg mun _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ , _ tuqu pagning ilngugh mun _ , _ aliite nghite ngugh mun _ , _ ellngin aa _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ ; _ ellnga _ quulv alleng l illu _ usuqe lleg nge li llu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
Timoth y -mi _ ighnegh mni _ , _ qavngaq _ ila ita _ uuknaliqistet _ akuzi tke kaqe aaten _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ qelegh amken _ akuzi ta it _ guutute ke ki _ pilluw amun _ . _ tawaten _ pinitun _ pilluwagh llequten _ Christ-amun _ .
ugpeqe i kestagh a _ Christ-akun _ atuqe luku _ liisimake gkan _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ atuqe igate ait _ liisimakekagh teng _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ enkaam _ naafqe aqe ait _ ugpeqe i lleg teng _ katam _ angyaghpag igh te lghii stun _ .
H y men a e us-enkuk _ A le x an der -enkuk _ tamaakut _ akule itnite uk _ . _ tuune kaqe agka _ tughneghagh- mun _ liite sqellug kek _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke fqaan _ kiyaghnegh _ pi sqellug qu _ .
sivuke luku _ kayeme amken _ yughaatk esqelluki _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ , _ tung sii tesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aklukegk iitneng _ , _ iyamsiqa yagute naketen llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
yughagh tke ki _ umiileg t _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ igleghte te i lghiit _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa luta _ nekeggmell uta _ maniguute ma luta _ , _ quulv aam al ukullu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Tawatel nguq _ yughagh llegh _ pinigh uq _ , _ efqugh nagh uq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ Yugulighis tem nni _ ,
qayughllak _ qamagte luku _ yuug _ yuguligh lleg nge sug aa _ , _ liite sug aa llu _ ipapilleq _ .
taawa _ ataasigh inagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ataasigh inagh u uq llu _ ilaliigh te i sta _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ . _ Taananguuq _ yuug _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
ellmi neng _ tuune kau uq _ aghqe te u luni _ iteme te na luki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ Taananguuq _ pillegh qagh lluwaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute i llegh a _ yuguligh lleg nge sug ni luki _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i ste u lunga _ , _ apostle- ngulunga _ . _ kayagte aanga _ apegh tiis qelluki _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe i llegh meng llu _ ipapi llegh mengllu _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ !
tea- ma ghhagh ani _ yughaghvig ni _ yugu i na ut _ yughigh sqe sug anka _ . _ Tamaa ku ngul it _ kiyagh lleghh it _ qaatke te luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ . _ yughagh lit _ nengug te luki _ iigge teng _ sakr aall ngun ateng llu _ aaght iir aall ngun ateng llu _ .
piyuke anka llu _ aghnagh t _ pinighnagh llegh it _ kelgu tesqelluki _ pinitun _ pilugug llegh itgun _ . _ aatkagh it _ malleg nga fqiita _ nalighmeng _ kayngu nagh yaghqaa fqiita _ . _ itupill _ pinighnagh lleg teng _ kelgute litki _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh megteggun _ , _ nakaan _ nuy aqeg sagh waa llegh qun _ nalighmeng _ gold - mengllu _ pe ar l - mengllu _ ull ng aqluteng _ nalighmeng _ akituqagh meng _ aatkagh meng _ aate luteng _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh _ elqughute nga uq _ aghnagh nun _ maniguute kayugu ni lghii nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
yug t _ apeghtugh i nghata _ yughaghvig ni _ aghnagh t _ nagate yaghqaa ut _ nepiigh ng aghmeng _ , _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ .
aghnagh t _ apeghtugh i ste sug igate anka _ nalighmeng _ igleghte te i ste u sug igate anka _ yug nun _ . _ nepiigh nga yaghqaa ut _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima yuggaagh kaqe a _ adam _ , _ taagken _ E v e _ .
Ad am - ngunghituq _ puughte lleg ngekagh _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh u uq _ puughte lleg ngekagh _ enkaam _ seghleghqes tengugh tekaa quq _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh t _ ighnegh iightugh kumeng _ taghnughhagh neng _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ nagnegh ma kumeng _ neghyuke luku _ Jesus _ , _ piniqe i manginagh kumeng _ ila meggneng _ , _ kiyaghte manginagh kumeng llu _ agleghnagh luku _ kiyaghtaa lleghmeng _ qusevegte lleg ligh luteng _ .
whaten _ pi llegh _ ipa u uq _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ igleghte te i ste u yu kuni _ ugpeqagh nun _ taana _ qepghaqagh _ piyukekagh a _ pi niigh pigte uq _ .
igleghte te i sta _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ , _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ , _ sumeghtagh aqeg saghqaaguq _ , _ yu piin ghu yaghqaaguq _ , _ upugh an ghu yaghqaaguq _ , _ apeghtughi yaqleg u uqlu _ .
suume ste u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ suugllug u yaghqaa nghite uq _ iwernga _ nang llegh tagh yaghqaaguq _ , _ qanegh nge naqe igate yaghqaa uq _ , _ mani yuneghtu yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
Igleghut istem _ igleghut ngwaagh yaghq aqii _ mangteghagh mii ni _ , _ avaqutagh ni llu _ apeghtugh yaghqaqe ai _ vegh us naa tef qaa mi _ qaatk esqell uni _ .
igleghte te i sta _ igleghte te i llgite kuni _ ellmi _ katam _ nengllugute mineng _ , _ naten Ê¼ngam _ aflengake lleqe aki _ ugpeq isteng i _ kiyaghnegh m _ ?
igleghte te i sta _ ugpegh nghhagh u nghite yaghqaa uq _ , _ luuraq _ qukaayug te pag nayukan _ enkaam _ nanqigte lleg nge lleqe uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ tughneghagh tun _ .
igleghte te i sta _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ akuzi tke sqellug qu _ itagnagh luku _ . _ enkaam _ seghlequugh pagning illeq aat _ , _ tughneghagh m llu _ kayaalqepagningite lleqe a _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ D e ac on -etlu _ pinigh luki _ akuzite kete yaghqaa ut _ , _ ipapigh qengng ayaghq aagut _ , _ wine- meng _ meghepag yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ pakignegh u yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ mani meng _ .
pegte yaghqaqe nghite ait _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighqekagh i _ , _ umyugagh it llu _ seghleghyug i saghqagh u ut _ .
Igleghut istet _ nakmiigh vagilgameng _ d e ac on- k aghqameng _ qepghaq al illuki _ liigike nakangit _ pinigh ta i _ yug t _ . _ taagken _ d e ac on- ngugh tes nak angit _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ aghnagh t llu _ pinigh luki _ akuzite kete yaghqaa ut _ , _ yiillgi yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ iwernga _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa ut _ , _ ataasiighmete yaghqaa ut llu _ sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ .
D e ac on -et _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa ut _ , _ igleghut ngwaagh yaghq aqiit _ avaqutagh teng llu _ mangteghagh mii teng llu _ .
tamaakut _ d e ac on -et _ qepghaq egtat _ quulv alleng yaghqaagut _ , _ nallun eq suk naanghit aatlu _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
sunanguq _ qantaghaqun _ elpenun _ pi langa _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ elpenun _ lata tke anka _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
enkaam _ kimaawi ma kuma _ lata ma _ liisimake ste lleqe aaten _ naten _ ugpeqagh t _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nengllugut ang anilnguut _ . _ Ellng inguut _ ugpeq isteng i _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ aghveghaqetagh u ut _ , _ tunemagh u ut llu _ ipapi llegh mun _ .
Nall un eq n aghh angun aki _ ugpeqe aput _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvightekagh i _ seghlegh ghllag u ut llu _ ipa pestaagh u ut llu _ : _ Christ-a _ allgegh kau uq _ yugusigh pigu luni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ liisimake ste ai _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi ke ai _ elqughute nga ta i _ , _ yaquleg t llu _ esghagh kaqe aat _ . _ ungipagh ke kau uq _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ , _ ugpeqe kaqe aat _ nunatagh ghhagh ni _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ , _ taagken _ qilag mun _ mayu utk ag uq _ .
agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ pi uk _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ ila ita _ yug t _ pegte lleqe aat _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ Christ-akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke lleqe kangit _ iqlengagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ , _ apeghtuusagh it llu _ .
Tawatel nguut _ apeghtuusagh t _ iqlengagh lghii neng _ pi u ut _ . _ iqlengiqe lleg teng _ apegh aqe ait _ ip apig sug nigh qelluki _ . _ nagate nanigh kaqe ait _ umyugagh teng _ liisimake i lghiit _ elqughutngagh llegh meng llu _ anaggute nga llegh meng llu _ .
Tawatel nguut _ yug t _ nengughte te snanigh i aqe ut _ , _ ila i llu _ neqe m _ neghe snanigh aqe ait _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe ai _ qamagte luki _ neqe t _ negh yaghqaa luki _ iyamsiqa yagute aqe luki _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ liisimake i lghiit _ ipapi lleghmeng _ liisimake ait _ tamaakut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh i _ qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghii u ut _ . _ enkaam _ ighsake yaghqaa nghite ut _ tugukligh ma kumeng _ iyamsiqa yagute luki _ .
akuzi ta akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ yugh akunllu _ aaftekau ut _ agleghnagh luki _ .
tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ liigikes tengng waa qu f ki _ ugpeqaalgu tegpen un _ , _ pinigh lghii u lleqe uten _ qepghaghte nga _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh n _ iknaqugh lleqaa _ liisima inagh kufki _ ipapi llghet _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqe aqe kangit _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ apeghtuusagh t _ qaatkekagh ten _ .
nagate gpenaki _ sasii nghite ngugh t _ ungipaghaate t _ teng v imun _ ayuqe lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapi llgh anun _ . _ yeghlegi _ peghqigsagh tke gu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe lghii _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ .
yugusigh m _ ulape llegh a _ pinigh uq _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe lghii _ pinigh aghagh uq _ . _ kayusiite yaghqaqe ainkut _ whani _ unguvallegh mnni _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh ani llu _ unguvallegh m _ .
taana _ pi llegh _ ipa u uq _ , _ enkaam _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ ugpeqe yaghqaa uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qepghagh ghllagu ukut llu _ sagiq liigh teng ngu u kutlu _ yug nun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ ipapilleq _ . _ tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ neghyukagh ut _ unguva lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ Yugulighis teng at _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakut _ ugpegh lghiit _ ellnga kun _ .
qelegh ki _ apeghtugh ki _ tamaaken _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ palaqe ste gpenaan _ anglinghhagh u ma llegh n _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh nun _ usput aaw i _ akuzillegh gpegun _ , _ sa llegh gpegun _ , _ piniqe llegh gpegun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ , _ pelungite luten _ kiyaghte llegh gpegun _ .
kaate lleg mnun _ kenlanga _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te nghata _ atigh uute aqe ki _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ , _ ungipagh qite aqe ki _ , _ apeghtugh aqe ki _ .
atuqe aqe gu _ taghnegh ag nekun _ tunusagh _ ilu gpenite ngughk _ . _ taana _ tunusagh _ tuune kau uq _ elpenun _ uuknaliqe llegh kun _ Elder -et _ iig t igh aqng aten _ .
pi naqe llegh n _ qamagte luku _ pi aqe ki _ qelegh tke anka _ . _ tawaten _ yug t _ liite lleqe aat _ pill gu ugh lleghhii ten _ .
P ir aam si ngwaagh luten _ kiyaghtaallegh pen illu _ apeghtugh i llegh gpeni llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ elpeneng _ yugulill equ ten _ , _ tamaakut llu _ nag ates te ten _ .
aghyuugh gpenaan _ siivanllegh _ yuug _ , _ iwernga _ kav yung unaan _ nallghusagh aqe gu _ ata ke lghii stun _ . _ uyuqligh t _ yug t _ anglegute ke lghii stun _ pi aqe ki _ .
siivanllegh t _ aghnagh t _ naa ke lghii stun _ pi aqe ki _ , _ enkaam _ uyuqligh t _ aghnagh t _ nayag stun _ pi aqe ki _ , _ qiliigh yuke fqiita _ .
kayusiite ki _ ugingighagh t _ aflengake i ste nga i tke aat _ .
iwernga _ ugi igh aq _ avaqutaghtu kuni _ nalighmeng _ eltughaghtu kuni _ , _ kelgute lit _ nengllugute meggnun _ kiyaghte yug ni luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe llegh atun _ . _ aflengake llegh megteggun _ angayuqagh teng _ aki naqe lleqe ait _ enkaam _ efqugh lleqaat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugi igh aq _ ilakwaagh igh tke aq _ sighima u uq _ kiyaghnegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yughagh manginagh u uq _ kayusii tesqell uni _ .
iwernga _ ugi igh aq _ teghig niq ngin aqumi _ ellmi neng _ efqugh h naluni _ , _ unguva ghngaaghmi _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ .
qelegh ki _ ugpeqagh t _ tamaakut _ pisqelluki _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequ unghi ll itk i _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aflengake nghite kumiki _ ilakwaagh ni _ , _ wata _ ellmi _ katam _ nengllugute ni _ , _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ pegtekaqe a _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ . _ enkaam _ seghlegh atagh aa llequq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ .
ugi igh aq _ 6 0 _ uksughtutkaligh ma kan _ , _ nengughtekau kan llu _ ataasigh meng _ , _ ategh a _ igaqe yagh ghngaaghmi _ ayuqe uq _ ugingighagh t _ ategh lghutagh itgun _ .
amalleqa _ tea- ma yan _ liisimake aat _ qepghagh llegtu langa _ , _ katam _ avaqutagh ni _ pinitun _ angli ste llegh atun _ , _ upugha neghtu langa _ , _ ugpeqaalgut mi _ itegagh it _ ughvugh aqe luki _ , _ kayusigh i aqe luni _ seghleliigh lghii neng _ , _ quunpeng llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe lghii _ .
iwernga _ nuteghagh t _ ugingighagh t _ ategh it _ igaqe gpenaki _ ategh lghutagh tgun _ . _ yugusigh ita _ piyuke llegh an _ sak niq es negh is teng _ ugiigh yug lleqe ut _ . _ tawaten _ pi ma kumeng _ naafqe lleqe aat _ akeqe i llegh eng _ Christ-amun _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ qayughllak _ naafqe kangat _ akeqe i llegh eng _ .
Taam _ saaghw akun _ ighsani te aghte aqe ai _ , _ itghagh u i te ughtaghkagh i _ , _ yiillgi te ughtaghkagh i _ , _ yanutqu neghtugh taqagh i _ , _ akuzite kaqe ait llu _ sa u aat _ akuzi tkesaghqagh ke nghite ke teng _ .
enkaam _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh ut _ nuteghagh t _ ug in ghigh at _ ugiigh yagh kumeng _ , _ taghnughhagh nge luteng _ , _ aflengak esqell ukillu _ nengllugut angit _ . _ tawaten _ pi kumeng _ anguyag _ seghlequugh vig ii tesleq aat _ whangkunneng _ .
aawallu _ ila i _ nuteghagh t _ ugingighagh t _ ugpeqagh u nanigh luteng _ maligte te ma ut _ tughneghagh- mun _ .
ugpeqe aq _ aghnagh _ ilakwaagh lgu kuni _ ugingighagh neng _ , _ ellnga n _ kayusiite yaghqaqe ai _ . _ enkaam _ ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ kayusiite nghite yagh ghngaaghmegteki _ ayuqe ait _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqagh t _ kayusiite lleqe ait _ ug in ghigh at _ aflengake i ste nga i tke aat _ .
Elder -et _ igleghte te i yuqagh t _ yug aghvig mi _ , _ taaku ngin aghhaag nengllu _ qepghagh lghiit _ apeghtugh i llegh kun _ , _ ungipagh ke i llegh kun llu _ , _ quulv aghaq iteki _ malgh ugh qelluki _ akileghtuusagh it _ .
qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ O x -a _ tutmagh lghii _ g ra in -meng _ malliigh na luki _ , _ negh sqellug qu _ g ra in -meng _ sugrugiitagh igh gpenaan _ . _ " _ amalleqa _ , _ " _ qepghagh a _ akileghtugh yaghqaa uq _ qepghagh llegh anun _ . _ "
nagate gpenaki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ avutke i lghiit _ Elder -meng _ anaggute ma ni luku _ , _ wetku qun _ avutke i lghii _ liisimak is tel g uk an _ maalghug gneng _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu neng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh kan _ , _ aghyuugh naken _ seghleghqen nan iisqelluku _ ugpeqagh t _ manu itni _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvgu _ ila i _ tamaakut _ alinge lleqe ut _ .
tamaakut _ qelegh te anka _ elpenun _ qaatk esqelluki _ , _ pakig gut if qaa vek _ nalighmeng _ taniilqe i fqaavek _ pisqell uten _ . _ tawaten _ qelegh amken _ esghaam an ghitni _ kiyaghnegh nkut _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-enkut _ , _ nakmikegkagh t llu _ yaquleg t _ .
I ig t igh agh tegpenaan _ kina _ igleghte te i stekaghqagh u luku _ yughaghvig mi _ . _ taayughqe gkuvek _ il al k iin nayuk avek _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ . _ kiyaghte kestagh a _ pelungite luten _ .
meghhagh inagh meng _ meghe gpenang _ , _ iwernga _ wine- ngiighhagh meng _ megh qaghaqe luten _ kayute ke lleqe an _ aqsaqugh gpenun _ , _ qinuyug aatagh llegh gpenun llu _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ al iit ngwaagh aqut _ , _ talwa _ salin _ nanqigte llghite luteng _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ aliighte yaghqaa ut _ kinguvaqwaaqun _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh at _ al iit ngwaagh aqut _ , _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ aliite nghite ngugh t _ iigh nga naanghite ut _ .
qamagte luteng _ qepghaghtelaagh et _ siiv ak eghllag l itk i _ tamaakut _ piliit iste teng _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke nghite likek _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ apeghtugh i llegh ut llu _ .
Qepghagh te laagh et _ piliit isteng it _ ugpeqagh u lgute u kata _ sii vag kataghagh litki _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke kangit _ . _ enkaam _ qepgh aatagh aghl itk i _ qayughllak _ kayusigh u ngugh it _ ugpeqaalgu te teng _ piniqekagh teng _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh ke ki llu _ ungipagh ke ki llu _ .
kina _ alngunak _ apeghtugh i kuni _ alla u luku _ tamaakuneng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ , _ itagnaq enghit ii _ apeghtuusagh pig i _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ ellnga n _ apeghtuusagh an _ ungipaate ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ alla tun _ apeghtugh i lghii _ aangaayug neghllag uuq _ , _ liigike igate uq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ aaghtiiraagh yuneghtu uq llu _ qani iqe yuneghtu uq llu _ akuzite neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi llghem _ allgegh taqagh i _ : _ aqina llegh _ , _ aghiva te llegh _ , _ seghlequugh u telleq _ , _ ugpeqe te nanigh llegh _ .
Tawatel nguut _ quunpeng _ aaghtiiraagh te ta iqe ut _ . _ umyugagh it _ sumegh negh llu ug taqut _ enkaam _ liisimake nanigh aqe aat _ ipapilleq _ . _ sumegh meggni _ qepghagh u uute kumegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ aklungi igh i lleqe ni luteng _ pi aqe ut _ .
iwernga _ allgegh te ghllag lleqe ukut _ kiyaghtekumta _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ itagnaq luku _ pi tu tal v ut _ .
allgegh aqngamta _ nuna mun _ kelqe te ite ukut _ , _ tuqu kumta llu _ kelqe te lgu naanghite ukut _ .
enkaam _ itagnagh lleqe ukut _ neqe lgu kumta _ , _ aatkagh lgu kumta _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ aklungi igh i yu lghiit _ nanghiiqu lleg nge aqe ut _ . _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llghite a _ tug waaq ii _ enkaam _ temngitwh aghllag ugh taqut _ . _ taagken _ piyuke llghite a _ sayug aqe ai _ naafqe llegh mun _ .
mani meng _ piniqe i llegh _ akuqagh a _ qamagte luni _ seghlegh m _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ pegte aqe aat _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ qayughllak _ manitughqagh u ghllag yug lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ ellmeggneng _ qivgh ughllag ugh taqut _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke aaten _ , _ enkaam _ iqite nga luten _ tamaakuneng _ . _ sagiqe te ki _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ kiyaghten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe llegh atun _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg ligh luten _ , _ piniqe i lleg ligh luten _ , _ nuqete neghtu luten _ , _ nangllegtagh luten _ .
Pilluw aat igu _ ugpeqe i llegh _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pilluw alleq _ pinigh lghii u uq _ . _ tugu gu llu _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh kaqe aaten _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ taana _ unguvallegh _ apegh aqe yavgu _ ugpeqe i llegh n _ ugpeqagh lghute nun _ .
qelegh naqe amken _ nagate ma nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ unguvall elit ik am _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ unguva lghii nun _ , _ nagate ma nghaani llu _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ , _ kiim si ghil aataq ughi k am _ P on ti us _ pilate- mun _ .
qelegh amken _ piraamsi luten _ qaatk esqelluki _ qamagte luki _ qel g utk anka _ elpenun _ . _ nagnegh te ki _ kenlanga _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ utegh nin qig llegh anun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ kitum _ alngunak _ anag gun il uten _ pi naanghite aaten _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pillegh qagh llu waagh mini _ tagi ste lleqe a _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ . _ usuqnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ellngin aaguq _ igleghte te i ste ghllag _ , _ ellnga u uq _ umiileg at _ umiileg t _ , _ Atangh at _ at an ghet _ .
ellngagh inagh u uq _ tuqu igate ngughk _ . _ Kiyagh teng nguuq _ nighug rakeg llagmi _ repall _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugh aagh pagningit aa _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ esghagh igate a _ , _ talwa _ esghagh naanghite a _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ pik l ikek _ quulv alleq lu _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleq lu _ quunperugllag _ . _ amen _ .
qukaayug snanigh ki _ tamaakut _ aklung ilnguut _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ talwa _ sighima snanigh ki _ aklungi itgun _ nallun eq n alghii tgun _ . _ iwernga _ sighima sqe ki _ kiyaghnegh kun _ . _ ellnga n _ ighlegute gpenaamta _ tuune aqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pinigh y uug usigh qameng _ .
Ak lung ilnguut _ pinitun _ pi sqe ki _ , _ aklungite sqe ki _ pinitun _ qepghagh llegh kun _ , _ igh l ell ngun aki _ tuune i yu kestagh luki _ ila itnun _ yug nun _ .
tawaten _ pi kumeng _ kagpag lleqe aat _ aklungi _ ellmeggnun _ . _ taana _ aklungi _ ayug il nguug uq _ tunemagh _ aag nakaghqagh itnite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ unguvallegh nge lleqe ut _ unguvallegh pig meng _ .
Timoth y _ , _ kelengake luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ neghyuke tke ai _ elpenun _ . _ iqite nga luten _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ temngitwh aneng _ akuzite itneng llu _ , _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh itneng llu _ . _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ sumegh meggni _ liisim all ep iil gun ii qut _ , _ iwernga _ ipa u nghite uq _ .
ila ita _ pegte ma ut _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kangat _ ipa u nghite ngughk _ liisima llegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyas li si _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ apostle- nganeng _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ . _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ apegh sqellug qu _ akequsagh kekagh _ unguvallegh _ Christ _ Jesus- melnguq _ .
Timoth y -mun _ piniqe pigtekagh mnun _ ighnegh mnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ , _ Christ _ Jesus- emllu _ atanegh mta _ quyas li ten _ , _ nangllek li ten _ , _ nekeggmell elg us lit enllu _ .
unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yughagh lleg mkun _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ elpeneng _ . _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ seghlegh y ull ngun anga _ , _ katam _ sivunegh mtun _ .
esghagh yug pigte aqe amken _ allameng _ , _ qayughllak _ neqamike aqa _ pellegh utu te aqngamtung _ qiya kau lghiiten _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllag lleqe unga _ qerngugh un neqig tekum tung _ .
neqamike aqa _ ugpeqill ep iig en _ . _ Taananguuq _ ataasigh _ ugpeqe i llegh _ nengyugh gpek _ L o is -em _ , _ naa gpek llu _ E un ic e-em _ atuqe ka ak _ . _ Liisimak ngwaagh aqa _ elpek llu _ atuqe u an _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh ka ughte yug amken _ , _ atuqe manginagh ghhu _ tunute yan _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ tuune kaqe a _ iig t igh aqng amken _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ taghnegh al i tell ghit iinkut _ alingyug na lghii meng _ . _ itupill _ taghneghagh gkenka _ imigh kaqe ainkut _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleghmeng _ , _ piniqe llegh meng _ , _ nuqete llegh meng llu _ .
kayngu ke gpenaan _ ungipagh ke gu _ atanegh ut _ , _ talwa _ kayngu yagute gpenanga _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ Christ-a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ itupill _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ikfiqe lgusigh nga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yugul ik aqiin kutlu _ nakmike kaqe ainkut llu _ pelung i tesqelluta _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ apallugh ke luki _ ellmi _ katam _ uspeqe lleg ni llu _ piniqe i lleg ni llu _ , _ nakaan _ qepghagh llegh ut _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ piniqe kaqe ainkut _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ siv ut gh ulluku _ piinligh lleghqagh an _ nuna m _ .
iwernga _ whaa _ piniqe lleg ni _ liite sta _ whangkunnun _ tagi llegh akun _ Yugulighis tem ta _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ . _ Christ-am _ naafqe kaqe a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ taagken _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ liite ste ainkut _ tuqu igate ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i ste u lunga _ , _ apostle- ngulunga _ , _ apeghtughiste u lunga llu _ .
taakut _ apallugh ke luki _ ikfiqe u unga _ . _ iwernga _ kayngu yug nghite unga _ qayughllak _ liisimake aqa _ kina u ta a _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ . _ Liisimak ngwaagh aqa _ ellnga n _ kelengak saqleg waa _ sa u a _ neghyuke tke aqa _ ellnga nun _ kenlanga _ kinguligh mun _ aghnegh mun _ .
maligte ki _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ nagaqughkagh ten _ whanga mneng _ . _ usputagh u ut _ atughqagh ke aten _ . _ apeghtuusagh ke ki _ ugpeqe i llegh kun llu _ piniqe llegh kun llu _ allgegh tekaq aten _ Christ _ Jesus-meng _ .
kelengake gu _ ipapilleq _ neghyuke tke aq _ elpenun _ . _ kelengake gu _ kayute kellug kek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghte lghiik _ ilu mnni _ .
liisima kan _ qamagte vzigh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ Asi a- melnguut _ kayusigh yug nanigh ma aatnga _ , _ talwa _ Ph y g el us-enkuk _ Her mo g en es -enkuk _ .
Yugh aat keng ngw aanka _ atanegh mun _ nangllegyag utes qelluki _ O ne si ph or us-em _ nengllug utangi _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh ghngaan _ ilutughsagh aqe aanga _ . _ kayngu yagute mangite a llu _ anusimingllaghagh u ma llegh ka _ .
kaate aqngami _ Rome- emun _ iv an Ê¼ ghiigh utk aqaanga _ kenlanga _ naalke llegh minun _ .
atanegh mun _ yughagh te kaqe aqa _ Onesiphorus _ nanglleg yagute sqellug qu _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ ! _ liisima kan _ kayute ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ ephesus- mi _ .
Enkaangam _ elpek _ ighnegh mni _ , _ iknaqe i _ atuqe llegh gpegun _ piniqe llegh a _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ .
elpek llu _ tawan tutk atlu _ nagate kaqe asi _ apeghtuusagh nka _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtuusagh nka _ neghyuke te ki _ ataasiigh melngughnun _ . _ taagken _ ellngit a _ apeghtuusaq leg ulleq iit _ ila meggnun _ .
ikfiqe lgusigh kut _ pinigh lghii tun _ pilluwagh teng atun _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ .
Pilluw agh tem _ ilate nga lghii m _ pilluw aght enun _ efqugh sug aqaa _ umiileg ni _ , _ enkaam _ akum ghh uu sig atuq _ pilluwagh teng unghil nguut _ kiyaghtaall ghitnun _ .
kayaalqeiiraagh a _ kilgaaqu mun _ malighqutagh ke nghite kuni _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ , _ allgegh te naanghite uq _ qaghpa aneng _ kayaalq iis tem _ .
ughleghiigh ghllagkagh _ piitesighagh a _ nengigh yuwhaagh yaghqaa uq _ unatagh kata _ .
sumeghtu aghagh tke ki _ sa meng _ pillgh enka _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ liigi ksagute ste lleqe aaten _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
neqamike luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ kingunegh ke a _ David-em _ . _ Tamaa kunguut _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ ap en em ki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
ikfiqe u unga _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke gkenka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ talwa _ qiipragh usigh lunga _ ayuqe unga _ liilightuusagh meng _ naafqii stetu te _ . _ iwernga _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ qiipraghute ite ut _ .
enkaam _ ikfiqe sigh ke yug luku _ ayuqe aqa _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ yugulilleng esqelluki _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ yuguligh llegh megteggun _ nighughqell eng ellequ t _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
maakut _ pillgh et _ ipa u ut _ : _ tuqu lgusigh ma kumteggu _ , _ kiyagh telgu sigh lleq aghput _ .
iilqayug nghite kumta _ , _ igleghut ilgu sigh lleq aghput _ . _ nallu negh ke gkumteggu _ , _ ellnga n llu _ nallu negh ke lleqe ainkut _ .
ataasiighmete nghite kumta _ , _ ellnga _ ataasiighmete aqe uq _ qayughllak _ taaqe naanghite uq _ ataasiighmete nghmeng _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ puygu ste gpenaki _ tamaakut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagate ma nghaani _ , _ kelengas aaghq i _ qani qutu tke fqiita _ akuzite t _ pisqelluki _ . _ qani qu te llegh at _ kayute u naanghite uq _ , _ naaf qeng ngin agh lleqaat _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ nagate lghiit _ .
Taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ qepghagh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnaq esqell uten _ . _ Qepghagh teng u _ kayngu ke i igate ngughk _ qepghaqagh mineng _ . _ elqughaghte luku llu _ apeghtuusagh ke gu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh pig aa _ .
iqite nga luten _ temngitwh aneng _ , _ sa meng _ pi sigh u nghite ngugh neng _ aleghquute llegh neng _ . _ Tawatel nguut _ aleghquute llegh t _ uyavagh u aatagh aghte lleqe ait _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
Tawatel nguut _ temngitwh at _ apeghtuusagh t _ aqnighnegh stun _ ayuqe ut _ mingite kayug t _ maame yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ . _ H y men a e us-enkuk _ Phil e tus -enkuk _ apeghtugh i llegh ik _ tawatel nguug ut _ .
pegtekaqe aik _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ qayughllak _ pi aqe uk _ siingenllu _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh te sim anil uki _ . _ enkaam _ ila itnun _ ugpeqe nanigh stekaqe ak _ ipapilleq _ .
iwernga _ ayug ilnguq _ tunemagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekagh a _ qaprag te pagning ituq _ . _ taaggun _ tunemagh kun _ igaqe nga ut _ akuzite t _ : _ " _ Atanghem _ liisimake ai _ ellmi _ pi ni _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ategh aneng _ Atanegh em _ , _ seghletun _ pi nghmeng _ taaqe li _ . _ "
mangteghagh ghllag mi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ salghutaghtu uq _ : _ ila i _ ulimaagh u ut _ gold-meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ , _ qiku meng llu _ . _ ila i _ salghutagh t _ megnu nagh lghii nun _ atugh u ut _ , _ ila i _ sa mun _ al ngu ng ak _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ katam _ pelungighsagh kuni _ seghlegh meng _ , _ salghutaghtu te _ atughqagh ughte lleqe uq _ megnu nagh lghii mun _ . _ aaftekau aghte lleqe uq _ atugh u luni _ mangteghagh m _ yug anun _ . _ taagken _ atughqagh ughte lleqe uq _ alngunak _ pinigh lghii mun _ qepghaqagh mun _ .
iqite nga luten _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ anglinghhagh t _ atuqe yug aqe ka itneng _ . _ quunpeng _ atuqe aqe gu _ elqughutngagh llegh _ . _ ataasiighmete luten _ , _ piniqe i nga luten _ , _ nekeggmell ut enllu _ . _ tamaakut _ atuqe ki _ , _ maligte te luten _ tuqlugh i lghii nun _ atanegh mun _ qamaken _ pelung ilngughmeng _ ilu meggneng _ .
iqite nga luten _ temngitwh aneng _ aleghquute llegh itneng _ yug t _ akuzi tke i lghii neng _ liigike ma ite ke meggneng _ . _ liisima katen _ aaghtiiraagh te ste i kayugu ut _ .
Atanghem _ qepghaghte nga _ aaghtiiraagh teng unghituq _ . _ itupill _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma anun _ . _ pinigh lghii u yaghqaa uq _ apeghtugh i sta _ . _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ .
Atanghem _ qepghaghte nga _ kavyugite yaghqaa uq _ apeghtugh i kuni _ kipullgin aalghii nun _ . _ walluumllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ avuteghqe ste aqe liki _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ ipapilleq _ .
enkaam _ liite yaaghagh yagh kumeng _ anag nayagh aat _ tughneghagh m _ negagh aa _ . _ tughneghagh m _ naapte ma nghminiki _ aaghqutagh ke aqe ai _ .
liisimake sug amken _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ seghleliigh ghllagu yaghqaa uq _ .
yug t _ ellmeggneng _ piniqe lleqe ut _ , _ mani yuneghtu lleqe ut _ , _ yamrratu lleqe ut _ , _ aangaayugte lleqe ut llu _ . _ Seghl equ ugh lleqiit _ ila teng _ , _ qaute kete naanghite ait _ angayuqagh teng _ , _ iyamsiqa yug naanghite ut _ , _ waaknanigh lleqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
piniqe i naanghite ut _ , _ seghevute i naanghite ut _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i lleqe ut _ , _ suugllug u lleqe ut _ , _ amyuqetagh iqe lleqe ut _ , _ ugumi ke lleqe aat llu _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pinigh lghii _ .
uvegh ghpagte te lleqe ait _ ila teng _ , _ nangyagh u i aghte te lleqe ut _ , _ qukaayug teghllag llequt _ , _ teghigniqe llegh _ piniqe aghagh lleqe aat _ pakig gu lluku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
qaye megteggun _ ugpeqagh u yug lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghtaall ghita _ apegh lleqe aat _ av angitu l ngi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh aneng _ . _ iqite nga luten _ tawatel ngughneng _ yug neng _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ ne nun _ itegh aatagh lleqe ut _ aaghqute aqe pigesnagh na luki _ nall ek aghn ilnguut _ aghnagh t _ . _ tamaakut _ aghnagh t _ seghleghqe llghite a _ uqigtu qusigh ghllag lleqe ai _ , _ seghlegh m llu _ piyuke lleg lghute ita _ aaghqute aqe lleqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ aghnagh t _ nagate lleqe ut _ apeghtugh i llegh anun _ kitum _ alngunak _ , _ taawanginaq _ liite naanghite aat _ ipapilleq _ .
tamaakut _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ ellngit nun _ kipullgin aagh lleqaat _ ipapilleq _ , _ katam _ J an n es -enkuk _ Jam b r es -enkuk _ kipullgin aallgh eg ke tun _ moses _ . _ Um yug agh llu ug llequt _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh at llu _ ipa u nghite lleqe uq _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ pillgh at _ mulu naanghite uq _ . _ temngitwha llegh at _ aliite lleqe uq _ tea- ma anun _ , _ katam _ J an n es -enkuk _ Jam b r es -enkuk _ temngitwha llegh ak _ aliite nga llegh atun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ liisimakngwaagh aten _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ , _ kiyaghtaa l qa _ , _ apallugh a llu _ kiyaghte llegh ma _ . _ liisima kan llu _ ugpeqe i llegh ka _ , _ iilqayug nghite llegh ka _ , _ piniqe i llegh ka _ , _ aghul iil kaa mal qa _ .
liisima kan _ amyuqetagh tkesigh llegh ka _ , _ ikfiqe llegh ka llu _ . _ liisima kan _ tawaten _ pi kaqe aatnga _ Antioch -mi _ , _ I c on i um -e mi _ , _ Ly st r a- millu _ . _ uglagh ghngaan _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge kau unga _ , _ taw all iim a _ Atanghem _ yugul ik aqaanga _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge lleqe uq _ kiyaghte yu lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
seghlegh t _ yug t _ , _ puugh t iste tlu _ , _ seghlegh ughteaghaghte lleqe ut _ . _ puughte qugh lleqe ut _ , _ ellngit llu _ puughte lleg nge lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ atuqe manginagh ki _ apeghtuusagh t _ liitekagh ten _ , _ ugpeq ep ii kagh ten _ . _ liisima katen _ ipa u ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ liisima katen _ kinku u ta i _ apeghtughiste kekagh ten _ .
ima _ taghnughhagh u te gpeneng _ liisimake kaqe aten _ agleghnagh lghiit _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ . _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghtugh yaqleg w aaten _ yuguligh lleghqagh meng _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
qamagte luteng _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ aneghziig llegh ke ai _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtugh i sighqagh u ut _ , _ aghyuugh sagh ighqagh u ut _ , _ nallghusagh sighqagh u ut _ anaggute llegh mun _ , _ apeghtugh i sighqagh u ut llu _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh mun _ .
enkaam _ atuqe luki _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaghte nga _ pegh qig sagh waagh ng all equq _ , _ yataaghq eng ng all equ qlu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mun _ .
Christ _ Jesus _ tagi kuni _ igleghte te i na luni _ ataneghpag u llegh mini _ , _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ unguva lghiit llu _ tuqukagh t llu _ . _ enkaam _ nag asim angh egkeni _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ Christ _ Jesus -enkuk _ , _ qelegh amken
ungipagh ke ki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ sagiqe luten _ ungipagh ke ki _ yug nun _ nagas ug ugh ngaata _ nalighmeng _ nagas ug unghi tegh ngaata _ . _ Nek egg mell uten _ apeghtugh i llegh gpegun _ ugpegh ste naqe ki _ , _ ineghte ki _ anaggute llegh itneng _ , _ kayeme ki llu _ .
pi lleghqagh _ tagi u uq _ yug t _ nagate yug nanigh lleqe ut _ ipa pig nun _ apeghtuusagh nun _ . _ ivagh i lleqe ut _ piyukekagh meggneng _ apeghtughiste lghute neng _ nagate pigesnagh na luki _ nagaqugh yukekagh ghhagh inagh teng _ .
nagate yug nanigh lleqe ut _ ipapi llegh mun _ , _ nagate yug yagute lleqe ut _ tem ngin un _ ungipaghagh nun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ iiwleng _ nekeggmell uten _ , _ nagnegh te gu _ sa u a _ pi yaghqagh n _ ikfiqe u ghngaaghpek _ , _ ungipagh ke i kestagh a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ elpek _ qepghagh tek egk angaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ apeghiigh ghhu _ qamagte luku _ qepghaqagh _ elpenun _ pi sqekagh a _ .
whanga _ aghqe te kete yaghqaaghte ma unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ tuqu lleghqagh ka _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ .
Pilluw aam aaqa _ pinigh lghii _ pilluw alleq _ , _ apeghiigh aqa _ kilgaaqu llegh ka _ , _ ataasiighmete manginagh kau unga _ atanegh mun _ .
enkaam _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ utaqa i te u a _ whanga mnun _ qaghpa a _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ . _ Atanghem _ elqughte luku _ nanqigt istem _ akileghtugh lleqe aanga _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ whanga inagh u gpenanga _ iwernga _ akileghtugh lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ qelanegh lghiit _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ .
Pin aq ellgh aagken _ qamagte lukek _ tagi ragkiigh i _ whanga mnun _ .
D em as-em _ piniq sal ii simaa _ nuna m _ kiyaghtaa llgha _ enkaam _ unite ma unga _ , _ aghulaqe ma uq _ Th es sal onic a-mun _ . _ C r es c en s _ Gal at ia- simaaq _ enkaam _ titus _ D al m at ia- mun _ pi ma uq _ .
L uk e- ngin aghhaq _ whanga mnite uq _ . _ mark _ aqfa luku _ kel qen naken _ qayughllak _ kayute ke pigte aqa _ qepghagh lleg mni _ .
T y ch ic us _ ephesus- mun _ kayagte ma aqa _ .
T ro as - mell unga _ unite kaqe agka _ qaasligh gka _ C ar p us -en kuni _ . _ tagi naqe gkuvek _ tagite aghte nakegken _ . _ tagite aghte naketen llu _ iimg at _ igagh nka _ , _ kiyang _ taakut _ amiiragh meng _ ulimaagh t _ .
A le x an der -em _ siilu meng _ sang llagh tem _ elngaatall _ seghletun _ pi kaqe aanga _ . _ Atanghem _ aghyuugh naagh aa _ tawaten _ pillgh aneng _ .
elpek llu _ kelengake luku _ tawaten _ pinagh yu kangaten _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ut _ ugumi ke pigte a _ .
Nanqig t iste mun _ aglagh te yuwhaagh aqe yatnga _ kitum _ alngunak _ mesighagh te yaghtugh llghite aanga _ , _ yeghlegi _ un iq agh aatk aqaatnga _ . _ yughagh te kaqe anka _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aki naqe fqiita _ pisqelluki _ tawaten _ pill ghitneng _ .
iwernga _ atanegh _ whangam nit kaaguq _ . _ iknaqe sigh ke aqe aanga llu _ ungipaq esqelluki _ iingunagh ita _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ qamagte luki _ Gentile-et _ nagaq iisqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugul ik aqaanga _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ .
Atanghem _ yugul iyagh qaq aanga _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghlegh m _ sughug allgh aneng _ , _ enkaam _ paqna nagh ngunaan _ aglagh u lleqe aanga _ qilagmel ngugh mun _ ataneghpag u llegh minun _ . _ ellnga nun _ usuqe i llegh _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
ungipaate aghte naketen _ P ris c ill a-nkuk _ A qu il a-nkuk _ , _ O ne si ph or us -en kutlu _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
erastus _ unegtekau uq _ Cor in th -mi _ ; _ qinuyug ta aneng _ trophimus _ unite kaqe aqa _ miletus- mi _ .
uksugh vagilgan _ tagi naqe ghllag i _ . _ E u b ul us -enkut _ , _ P ud en s -enkut _ , _ L in us -enkut _ , _ C l a ud ia- nkut _ , _ ila ita llu _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ ungipaate sqe aisi _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
atanegh _ taghneghagh gpenite li _ , _ quyas li sillu _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ qepghagh teng aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ apostle- ng anengllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ kayagtekau unga _ kayusii tesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ yug t _ ugp ellegh tugh tagh iisqelluki _ , _ liite sqellug qu llu _ ipapilleq _ . _ Taam _ ipapi llghem _ kayusigh lleqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghte lleghqagh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ .
taagken _ ataasigh meng _ ipapi lleghmeng _ sighima lleg lgu ukut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ Iqleng iq igat ngwaagh em _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ taana _ unguvallegh _ ima _ ayum ir ug llag g aaneng _ .
enkaam _ pillegh qagh llu waagh mini _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite stekaqe a _ taana _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ ungipagh mikun _ . _ whanga mnun _ neghyuke te kaqe a _ ungipagh ni _ enkaam _ ungipagh kaqe aqa _ qelegh te llegh atun _ kiyaghnegh m _ Yugulighis tem ta _ .
ukut _ lata t _ titus- mun _ pi u ut _ , _ ighnegh pig ke amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mtegnegun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ , _ Christ _ Jesus- emllu _ Yugulighis tem ta _ quyas lit enllu _ nekeggmell elg us lit enllu _ .
unite kaqe amken _ C r ete -mi _ , _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ qepghaqagh ut _ apeghiigh llghite ngughk _ . _ nakmiigh ta ii sqe sug amken _ Elder - k aghqameng _ yughaghvig nun _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ t o w n -et _ . _ neqamike luki _ qelegh tke anka _ :
elder-kaghqagh _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ ; _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ avaquti a llu _ ugpeqagh u yaghqaa ut _ ; _ nelliqe negh u yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ qaatke te igate yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ .
igleghte te i ste u te mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaqagh anun _ , _ Elder -a _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ . _ Y uk egh qen ghu yaghqaanghituq _ , _ nalighmeng _ kaate qaghtagh ma u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ suume ste u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ suugllug u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh u yaghqaa nghite uq _ aklungi igh i na luni _ .
itupill _ upugh an ghu yaghqaaguq _ , _ piniqe i stekaghqagh ke a _ pinigh llegh m _ . _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ , _ elqughute nga yaghqaa uq _ , _ taghneghagh gmikun _ pelungite yaghqaa uq _ , _ nuqe tut iyaghq aaguq _ alngunak _ seghlegh meng _ .
ellnga _ ataasigh mete yaghqaa uq _ ipa pig nun _ apeghtuusagh nun _ apeghtugh alleng ellegh mitun _ . _ atuqe luki _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ kayeme lleqe ai _ yug t _ , _ liigike ste lleqe ai llu _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ anaggute nga ni luki _ .
uglagh u pigte ut _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh t _ , _ temngi _ akuzi lghiit _ puughte i lghiit _ ila meggneng _ , _ kiyang _ tamaaku nguut _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe ait _ circumcise- e yaghq aan iluki _ .
taaqe ste ki _ tawaten _ apeghtugh i llegh itneng _ . _ Tem ng imeng _ apeghtugh i llegh megteggun _ alngunaseghaghqagh ke ait _ iingunagh ita _ nengllugute t _ . _ apeghtugh i aqe ut _ apeghtugh te yaghqaqe nghite ke meggneng _ ; _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ aklungi igh i pigesnagh na luteng _ .
ataasigh m _ C r ete -eghm iim _ uuknaliq istem _ pi kaqe ai _ , _ " _ C r ete -eghmiit _ quunpeng _ iqlengagh ut _ , _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ teghig ke sagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii u ut llu _ neghe ghllaget _ . _ "
tawaten _ pillgha _ ipa u uq _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ qevuute luki _ aghyuugh ki _ C r ete -eghmiit _ ugpeqe ait _ ugpeq esqelluki _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
ungipaate ki _ nagate nanigh litki nguq _ Jews-et _ temngi _ ungipaghagh ta it _ . _ qaute kete nanigh litki nguq _ yug t _ qelegh sagh ngllaghkagh it _ . _ Taaku nguut _ ighsake ikagh t _ ipa pig neng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ pelungite uq _ tamaakunun _ pelung il ngughnun _ . _ iwernga _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ pelungite nghite uq _ tamaakunun _ pelungite nghite ngugh nun _ . _ Kiyagh teng nguut _ seghleghqe llegh mi _ , _ ugpeqe igate aat llu _ Christ-a _ . _ umyugagh it llu _ sumeghnegh it llu _ nukeggnaghtekau ut _ , _ enkaam _ liigike yaghqaa nanigh ma ut _ pinigh llegh llu _ seghl elleq lu _ .
liisimake na iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ iwernga _ kiyaghtaall ghita _ ipapigh qaq aat _ nalluke ta a _ : _ ugumi ke ni pigte ut _ , _ qaatke te igate ut _ , _ sasii nghite ut llu _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pi naanghite aat _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ apeghtuusagh ke ki _ ugpeqagh nun _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
apeghtugh ki _ nuyekligh at _ yug t _ nuqennegh tus qelluki _ , _ siiv ak n alghii nguluki _ , _ sumeghtagh ay us qelluki _ , _ ayep sug i tesqelluki _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ piniqe i llegh kun _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh kun _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ apeghtugh ki _ nuyekligh at _ aghnagh t _ kiyagh tesqelluki _ tuun Ê¼ ng aluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ seghletun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe nghite ait _ ila teng _ , _ nalighmeng _ meghe ghllag fqiita _ wine- meng _ . _ apeghtugh i yaghqaa ut _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh meng _ ,
enkaam _ peghqigh lleqe ait _ uyuqligh t _ aghnagh t _ piniq esqelluki _ ugi it llu _ avaquti ut llu _ .
Sumeghtagh aqeg saghqaagut _ , _ pelungite yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghtaallegh meggni _ , _ qepgh aqeg saghqaagut _ ne meggni _ , _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa ut _ , _ qaatke te yaghqaa ut _ ugi meggnun _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequugh naanghi tii _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh i _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ qelegh ki _ nukalpigagh t _ nuqennegh tus qelluki _ .
elpek _ sa llegh gpegun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ usput aaw i _ ellngit nun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh gpegun _ . _ apeghtugh i aqe i _ ipapighqell uten _ , _ piraamsi luten _ .
wataghllak _ apeghtuusagh ke gkan _ elqughute nga li _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequ unghi ll inkut _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ kipullgin aagh tet _ seghletun _ akuzite kete naanghite ainkut _ , _ kipullgin aall ghit allu _ kayngu yug ste lleqe ai _ .
apeghtugh ki _ qepghaghtelaagh et _ qaatk esqelluki _ pilii tes teng it _ , _ efqugh tengngwaagh esqell ukillu _ . _ V egh us nagh yaghqaq enghit iit _ ,
nalighmeng _ tegleg vike yaghqaqe nghite ait _ . _ yeghlegi _ quunpeng _ pinitun _ , _ ataasiighmete luteng _ pi yaghqaqe ait _ . _ enkaam _ sa llegh megteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ piyuke na ngllagh lleqe ait _ apeghtuusagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ Yugulighis tem ta _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug qu _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ .
Taam _ piniqe llegh m _ apeghtugh ainkut _ pegte sqellug qu _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ , _ ighsak esqelluki _ nuna m _ yug an _ piyuke llegh i _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ . _ apeghtugh ainkut llu _ nuqennegh tus qell uta _ , _ elqughute nga luta _ , _ kiyagh tesqelluta _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte lta _ utaqa i ma luta _ quyanagh lghii meng _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ Sighi mal qaghput _ nighugh qeng ngalghii _ aliigh lleghqagh a _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ kiyaghnegh ghllag mta _ Yugulighis tem ta _ .
ellmi neng _ tuune kau uq _ yugul in aluta _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ pelungighsagh yug kanginkut _ ellmi nun _ yugu luta _ , _ sagiqe luta _ aneghneghq is qell uta _ yug nun _ .
apeghtuusagh ke ki _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ atuqe luki _ kayeme ki _ , _ aghula i aghte ki llu _ seghletun _ pi u kata _ . _ yeqay _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ukavagh ste gpenang _ .
negh ka ughte ki _ ugpeqagh t _ malighqutaq esqelluki _ kav em em _ igleghutisteng itnun _ , _ umiil waagh nunllu _ . _ qaatke te nga yaghqaa ut _ , _ apeghiigh nga yaghqaa ut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh nun _ .
ungipaate ki _ kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke fqaan _ , _ aaghtiiraagh fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ itupill _ nekegg me tu lluki _ , _ quseveg ng atu lluki _ pisqelluki _ tea- ma anun _ .
whangkuta llu _ sivugh nghaani _ nallu yagh ukut _ , _ qaatke te igate yagh ukut _ , _ puugh tengng ayagh tu kutlu _ . _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh a _ ayghigh te luku _ , _ itagnagh qu siq luku _ ayuq sagh aghput _ . _ unguvallegh put _ kiyagh usi q sagh aput _ seghlegh pestaagh mun _ , _ aqina llegh mun llu _ . _ yug t _ ugumi ke yagh ainkut _ , _ ugumi ke te yagh ukut llu _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ Yugulighis tem ta _ liisimake stekaqe ainkut _ nangllegtagh llegh mineng _ , _ piniqe llegh mineng llu _ .
Yugul ik aqiinkut _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh lleg ni _ , _ nakaan _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mteggun _ . _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ ughvugh kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ nutaghagh meng llu _ unguvall el itk aqiinkut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kuuve kaqe ak _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kemnagh pigte lukek _ whangkunnun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ , _ Yugulighis tem teggun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ piniqe llegh mikun _ nallghusagh na luta _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ sighima lleg lgu ukut _ whangkuta _ pi liite na luku _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
tamaakut _ pillgh et _ ipa u ut _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ elpenun _ sagiqe te sqe sug anka _ yug nun _ qaatk esqelluki _ . _ taagken _ ugpegh lleg leg t _ kiyaghnegh kun _ aneghneghqagh igh pestaagh lleqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh t _ pinigh lghii u ut llu _ kayute u ut llu _ tea- ma anun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ iqite nga luten _ tamaakuneng _ temngi _ qani qu te lghii neng _ , _ aaghtiiraagh te lghii neng _ sivugh nghmeng _ ategh itneng _ , _ liilightuusagh neng llu _ . _ tamaa na _ sasii nghite uq _ , _ kayute u naanghite uq _ kitumun _ alngunak _ .
kina _ alngunak _ aafqugh te ste i lghii _ kelengas aagh naken _ ataasigh meng _ nalighmeng _ alghigh luku _ . _ nagate nghite kan _ pegge naken _ .
liisima kan _ tawatel nguum _ yug m _ ighsake kaqe a _ ipapilleq _ , _ seghleghqe ste u uq llu _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga n _ katam _ seghleghqe llegh an _ nanqigte yaghqaaghte ste lleqe a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ .
aglagh stekumkun _ Ar tem as _ nalighmeng _ T y ch ic us _ elpenun _ , _ N ic o p ol is -en naq eghllag g aaten _ , _ qayughllak _ uksughte yug aqe unga _ tamaani _ .
kayusigh naqe ghllag nakegken _ lawyer- a _ Z en as _ , _ Ap oll os - lu _ iglegha lleghqagh gkenun _ . _ wataghllak _ yataaghqe te nakegken _ kelqesaghqagh meng _ sa meng _ aklukegk agken eng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutem ta _ peghqigsagh te kete litgu _ aneghnegh ghqu te kaghqagh _ enkaam _ kayusigh yaqleg ughh nak angit _ aklukegk a pil get _ . _ temngi _ kiyaghtaa f qaa meng _ pi lit _ .
qamagte luteng _ whangam nilnguut _ piniqe aisi nguq _ . _ piniqe llegh ut _ apegh qagh naken _ ugpeqaalgutem nnun _ piniq is tem nnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyas li si _ qamagte lusi _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ , _ anusimingllagh aq _ Christ _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ ugpeqaalgutem n nengllu _ Timoth y-meng _ . _ piniqekagh mtegnun _ qepgh algu tem teg nun _ Phil em on -mun _ ,
ugpeqagh nun llu _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ mangteghagh gpeni _ , _ Ap ph ia- munllu _ nayag mnnun _ Christ-akun _ , _ Ar ch ipp us - munllu _ pilluw algu tem teg nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ , _ nekeggmell elg us li sillu _ .
Phil em on -mi _ , _ quunpeng _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ yugh aat ken nem ken _ ,
qayughllak _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ piniqe llegh n _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh n llu _ atanegh kun _ Jesus-kun _ .
yughagh te kaqe amken _ ungipaa tesqelluki _ ila ten _ ugpeqe i lleg mnneng _ Christ-akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ liigike aghagh lleqe aten _ qamagte luki _ quya ste llegh t _ allgegh tek aput _ Christ-akun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ piniqe i llegh gpek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug anun _ quya ste ghllag aanga llu _ kayeme aanga llu _ ! _ piniqe llegh gpek _ quya ste ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
tetug naanghite unga _ qelegh na luten _ Christ-akun _ atuqe sqellug qu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi naanghite unga _ .
piniqe te llegh ung _ apallugh ke luku _ aapte vike amken _ atuqe sqellug qu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ nanevgagh u unga _ , _ anusimingllaghagh u unga llu _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
whanga u uq _ aapute i lghii _ ighnegh mnun _ , _ O ne sim us -mun _ . _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ ata liite kaqe aanga _ Christ-akun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ sasii nghite yagh uq _ elpenun _ , _ iwernga _ whaa _ kayute ughte pigte ma uq _ whangkutegnun _ .
Onesimus _ elpenun _ aglagh ste naqe aqa _ , _ leganqun _ ilu ka _ maligte te naqe uq _ ellnga kun _ .
Whang am n ites ugu yagh aqa _ kayusii tesqell unga _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ , _ katam _ elpek _ kayusiite na yaqevnga _ maan saq uv ek _ . _ liisima kegken qun _ anusimingllaghagh u lghiinga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ whangam n ites naanghi taqa _ wetku qun _ sivuke luten _ aapte aghte luten _ . _ itagnagh qu ma kuvgu _ whangam n i tesqelluku _ taawa _ elpek _ piyuke llegh ke lleqe an _ , _ qayughllak _ qelegh u nghite amken _ tawaten _ pisqell uten _ .
entaqun _ Onesimus _ iqite aghtekau uq _ elpen isaghq aaluni _ quunperugllag _ .
ellnga _ paninang _ qepghaghtelaagh uuq _ . _ iwernga _ qepghaghtelaagh um allegh mineng _ anglu iigh aghagh ma uq _ qayughllak _ piniqe kau aghte ma uq _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ . _ piniqe pigte aqa _ , _ iwernga _ elpek _ piniqe aghagh lleqe an _ qepghaghtelaagh uluku _ , _ ugpeqagh u lgute u luku llu _ atanegh kun _ .
Enkaangam _ tugukligh ma kuvnga _ qepghagh lgute u lunga _ , _ tugukligh naken _ Onesimus _ whanga u ste luku _ .
sa meng _ seghletun _ pi ma kangaten _ nalighmeng _ aseng em ak angaten _ , _ aseng enga _ whanga _ llivike lleqe aqa _ .
whaa _ , _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ igagh unga _ whaten _ : _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ llivike lleqe amken _ . _ iwernga _ puygu gpenaan _ unguvallegh n _ aseng el uku _ ayuqe an _ whanga mnun _ .
aa-a _ , _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ aapte vike amken _ atanegh kun _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ Onesimus _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ quyas leq aghpenga _ Christ-akun _ !
lata amken _ liisimakngwaagh luku _ qaatkesaghqagh ke an _ qelegh tke aqa _ elpenun _ , _ repall _ qaayghute luku _ pi lleqe uten _ .
atwhay _ , _ nekaghqagh ngllagh te aghte nakevnga _ qayughllak _ sighima u unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ yughagh lleg si _ , _ enkaam _ elpesi nun _ pi lleqe unga _ .
E pap h r as -em nguq _ piniqe aisi _ ; _ anusimingllaghagh lgu tke aqa _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
Qepgh algut m allu _ Mar k -enkut _ , _ A ris t ar ch us -enkut _ , _ D em as -enkut _ , _ L uk e- enkut _ ellngit a llu nguq _ piniqe aisi _ .
piniqe llegh a _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ uglagh luku llu _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u luku llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aleghqugh kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ uuknaliqiste tgun _ .
iwernga _ up-uni _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ aleghqugh kaqe ainkut _ ighnegh mikun _ . _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh _ nuna ngllagh kau uq _ , _ nakmike kaqe a llu _ pi liite sqellug qu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
ighnegh m _ kuukgute aqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighughqell gha _ , _ Kiyaghnegh tung waaq lu _ ayuqe uq _ . _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ nagnegh as tengng w ii _ tawatete luki _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh tgun _ akuzite mikun _ . _ ighnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ unguvallegh ni _ ukmangigh na luta _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ apeghiigh yamigu _ tawaten _ pilleg ni _ , _ qilag mi _ aqume kau uq _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghi tellegh pig aam _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ qule ii aghtekaqe a _ ighnegh _ yaquleg neng _ , _ atel itk aqaallu _ ingyagh te nga lghii meng _ ategh itneng _ .
tawaten _ pika qaa _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi mangite ai _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg t _ whaten _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ ; _ aghneghmi _ A tal ii tagh pe nga _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ pi mangite ai _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg t _ whaten _ , _ " _ ata ke lleqe aanga _ enkaam _ ellnga _ ighnegh ke lleqe aqa _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte yaghqaaghte yamigu _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh ni _ nuna mun _ , _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ yeqay _ qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ita _ manigugh litgu _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ yaquleg neng _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ni _ anuqe stun _ lliigh stekaqe ai _ . _ Qepghagh tengi _ kumaghugh lghii stun _ kengh estun _ lliigh stekaqe ai _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ ighnegh mineng _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ kaay _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aqumutagh gken _ kenle ite yaghqaa uk _ quunperugllag _ ! _ igleghte te lleqe an _ ataneghpag u llegh n _ elqughutngagh lleg ligh luku _ .
pinigh kan _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ ugumi ke an _ anaggute nga llegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh gpek _ nakmike ma uten llu _ quulv aam aat enllu _ pakig gu lluku _ ila gpeneng _ . _ Enkaangam _ quya ste i ghllag uq _ an o in t- el uten _ mesiigh meng _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ elpek _ , _ atanegh _ , _ piinligh yuggaagh mi _ nuna ngllagh kau uten _ , _ iigge gpeneng llu _ qilaga ngllagh kau uten _ .
qamagte luteng _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ , _ iwernga _ elpek _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uten _ . _ aghyugh yaghqaa ut _ aatkagh stun _ .
I meg tegh lleq aten _ qaas l ig etun _ , _ simigh lleqe aten llu _ aatkagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ elpek _ quunpeng _ almesiqe lleqe aaten _ , _ aghyugh yaghqaa nghite uten llu _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ pi mang it ngwaa ghii _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg ni _ whaten _ : _ " _ aqume i _ whagun _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ tunemagh liite ste lleg mnun _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ . _ "
Sang aaw anÊ¼ngam _ yaquleg t _ ? _ qamagte luteng _ taghneghagh u ut _ qepghagh te i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ kayagte aqe ai llu _ kayusii tesqelluki _ tamaakut _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqagh t _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ sumeghtaghaat keng ngwaagh el teki _ ipapi llghet _ nagaqughkagh put _ luuraq _ waa k naniq est aghn ayuk am teki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh i _ ipa u ut _ ; _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ yaquleg tgun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te nghite ngughk _ apeghtuusagh nun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ aghyuugh lleghqaghtutala atun _ .
enkaam _ ighsake ma kumteggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yuguligh i llegh ghllag a _ anag pagningit aghput _ aghyuugh i lleghqagh a _ . _ Atanghem _ apegh yuggaagh kaqe a _ taana _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ taagken _ tamaakut _ nagaqugh tke aat _ ellnga neng _ , _ ipapigh q aat _ whangkunnun _ .
kiyaghnegh m llu _ ipapigh qegk aqaa _ whangkunnun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ atuqe llegh mikun _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ allaaghlluwhaght illgh et _ , _ uyegte llegh mikun llu _ tunusagh i _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh mitun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike llghite ai _ yaquleg t _ igleghut is qelluki _ siv um el ngugh mun _ nuna kaghqagh mun _ . _ ( _ Taananguuq _ nuna _ akuzitk eg kefut _ . _ )
nalighnegh itni _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ sangaawa _ yuug _ umyugagh mig kaqe ken _ , _ nalighmeng _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aflengake gkan _ ?
ulima aqe an _ uk avaq aan lluku _ yaquleg neng _ , _ qaghpa ligh qagh kan _ nighugh qellegh mengllu _ quulv allegh mengllu _ ,
igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh kan llu _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ " _ tawani llu _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe a _ yuug _ " _ igleghte te i ste u luku _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ " _ taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ilate nga uq _ igleghte te i llegh anun _ . _ naqamllu _ salin _ es ghii g atagh put _ yuug _ igleghte te i lghii _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
iwernga _ esghagh aghput _ Jesus _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ natengiighhaq _ ukavagh stekaqsagh aa _ yaquleg neng _ . _ maaten _ esghagh aghput _ qaghpa lug ni _ nighugh qellegh mengllu _ quulv allegh mengllu _ qayughllak _ ikfiqe luni _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ Jesus _ tuqu kau uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ ulim agh ikaq _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ellmi nun _ , _ nagnegh as tengng w iillu _ tawatete luki _ . _ itagnagh pigtekau uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh sagh waaq aqaa _ Jesus _ ikfiqe llegh kun _ piinligh te nguluku _ yuguligh llegh itnun _ . _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ tagite yaghqaaghtekaqe ai _ yug lghute t _ nighugh qellegh mun _ .
Jesus-em _ pelungighsagh kaqe ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga llu _ tamaakut llu _ pelungighsaghkagh i _ , _ qamagte luteng _ ata ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus-em _ kayngu ke igate ai _ atigh yaghqaa luki _ anglegute u luki _ .
Jesus-em _ pika qaa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ apegh lleqe aqa _ ategh n _ anglegute mnun _ ; _ usuqe lleqe amken _ qerngughte te gkata _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ neghyuke lleqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ " _ pi kau uq llu _ , _ " _ whaante unga _ , _ taghnughhagh t llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagivaghkagh i _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
taakut _ taghnughhagh t _ yugu ut _ kemekrag leg t llu _ aaw lgu ut llu _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus _ ellngistun _ lliigh kau uq _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuqu na luni _ naaf qen naluku _ tughneghagh _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elek _ tuqu mun _ .
enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ iteme te kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ qepghaghtelaagh estun _ ayuqe lghiit _ unguvallegh teng _ qamagte luki _ qayughllak _ alike u kangat _ tuqu llegh _ .
Wh ategh llug aagh uuq _ yaquleg u nghite ut _ Jesus-em _ kayusigh iqe ai _ , _ iwernga _ Abraham-em _ king ungh i _ kayusigh aqe ai _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ Jesus _ lliigh tes tengngwaagh yaghq aqaa _ whangkutestun _ . _ tawaten _ qepghaa saqleg waa _ kiyaghnegh _ High _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ , _ nangllegtagh luni llu _ ataasiighmete luni llu _ . _ enkaam _ tuun iyaq leg ugh tekaaguq _ aghqe te meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ seghev utes qelluki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ .
Jesus _ ikfiqe kau te mineng llu _ nanghiiqu lleg nge kau te mineng llu _ , _ kayusigh yaqleg w ii _ tamaakut _ nanghiiqu lleg nge lghiit _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ , _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi llu _ ell min i tesqellusi _ qilag mi _ . _ sumeghmike luku _ Jesus _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekagh a _ Apostle- ngu luku llu _ High _ Priest- ngu luku llu _ aapgh aqeg kefut _ ugpeqe ni luku _ .
Jesus _ ataasigh mete kau uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nakmik iste minun _ , _ katam _ moses _ ataasigh metekagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghagh te aqe yamigu _ kiyaghnegh _ mangteghagh ani _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ mangteghagh _ kitu meng _ ulim agh is tel g ulghii _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ Jesus-kun _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ ulima aqe a _ . _ yug t _ usuqe aghagh yaghqaqe aat _ Jesus _ pakig gu lluku _ Moses -meng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ mangteghagh ngllagh a _ pakig gu lluku _ mangteghagh meng _ .
moses _ ataasiighmete kau uq _ qepghagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ani _ , _ ungipaate kaqe ai llu _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh _ sa meng _ apegh yaghqagh lgu ni luku _ taag an iq aaghaq _ .
iwernga _ Christ-a _ ighnegh u luni _ ataasiighmete kau uq _ igleghte te i sta _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ani _ . _ whangkuta _ mangteghagh ke ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ilutu manginagh kumta _ , _ ipapigh qut ku mangin aqum teg gu llu _ sighimakekagh ut _ .
Enkaangam _ katam _ tawaten _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ ,
pineghlliqe gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ kilgaa nite luteng _ qaatke sug mangite aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nanghiighsaghagh kaqe aat llu _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ tamaani _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ sivunegh gpesi _ esghagh kaqe ghngaaghmegteki _ apeghiighkagh nka _ , _ paninang _ nanghiighsaghagh kaqe aatnga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tamaakut _ yug t _ sakrite stekaqe aatnga _ . _ enkaam _ pi kau unga _ , _ ' _ iiwleng _ ataasiighmete igate ut _ whanga mnun _ , _ liigike igate ut llu _ natete luku _ kiyaghte sqe sug lleg mneng _ .
sakrite u lunga _ akeqe i kau unga _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ ' _ whaten _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ Itegh naanghit ngwaagh aat _ meghnaali vigkagh _ yataaghqe kaqe a _ ellngit nun _ . _ ' _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ kelenga lusi _ , _ seghlegh meng _ sumeghtaghagh llegh neng llu _ ugpegh nghite llegh neng llu _ , _ iqitute ste gpenasi _ unguva lghii meng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
iwernga _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kayeme te aqe tek _ pi lleghqagh lgu ma luku _ atigh llegh ke lghii meng _ " _ aghneghmi _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi nghite kufsi _ taawa _ seghleghqe llegh m _ puughte lusi _ pineghllug ngllagh lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ ataasiigh mel kumta _ unguvallegh mta _ kenle anun _ , _ neghyuke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ ugpegh yuwhaagh lleg mtestun _ , _ taawa _ Christ-am _ pi lgutke lleqe ainkut _ ellmi _ pi mineng _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ , _ pineghllug u gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ "
kinkungaawa t _ nagaqugh tke aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ me aneng _ naqam _ qaatke te gpenateng _ ? _ Tamaa kunguut _ yug t _ Moses-em _ maghyaghqugh qu ai _ Egypt- meng _ .
4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kinku t _ kiyaghnegh _ sakrite ste atgu _ ? _ Tamaa kunguut _ seghleghqell uteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ kilgaa ni _ .
kinku nun _ kiyaghnegh _ akeqe i kau a _ itegh naanghit ngwaagh niluki _ meghnaali vigkagh mun _ yataaghqekagh minun _ ? _ akeqe kaqe ai _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
taawa _ liigikagh ut _ iteghpagningite kau ut _ tawavek _ meghnaali vig mun _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ yug nun _ aghula i tuq _ iitgh esqelluki _ meghnaali vig minun _ . _ iwernga _ alinge lta _ luuraq _ naligh i _ nuughhute na yu kan _ itegh gpenani _ meghnaali vig anun _ .
pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig aneng _ ayuqe lghii _ nagaqugh qaghkagh ut _ katam _ tamaaku stun _ yug stun _ Moses-em _ magh yagh quq iistun _ Egypt- meng _ . _ iwernga _ pinigh lghii m _ ungipagh m _ kayusiite llghite ai _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe mangite aat _ nagaqughkagh eng _ .
whangkuta _ ugpegh lghii ni _ itegh lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi tke kaqe ai _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ whaten _ , _ " _ sakrite u lunga _ akeqe i kau unga _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ whaten _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ itegh naanghite u aghte ut _ meghnaali vigkagh mnun _ . _ ' _ " _ tawaten _ akuzi kau uq _ qepghaqagh ni _ apeghiigh kaqe ghngaaghmiki _ ima _ nuna ngllagh llegh mineng _ .
naa n tuq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe luni _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta a _ aghnegh m _ whaten _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ meghnaali kau uq _ tam aaghh aaneng _ qepghaqagh mineng _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ . _ "
akuzite ni llu _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ itegh naanghite u aghte ut _ meghnaali vigkagh mnun _ . _ "
paninang _ ila i _ yug t _ itegh lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh te yuwhaagh ke aat _ pinigh lghii meng _ ungipagh meng _ , _ itegh llghite ut _ meghnaali vig mun _ qayughllak _ qaatke te llghite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ ila a _ aghneq _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ " _ aghneghmi _ . _ " _ Kingu rug llag aneng _ Moses-em _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ taana _ aghneq _ David -kun _ . _ uteghte pagte anka _ David-em _ igaqegkagh i _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ , _ pineghlliqe gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ "
