tuute vigkagh t _ apumeg iitagh t _ nuna mun _ unaghsigh t _ .
enkaam _ iqug i _ taakut _ ayagute u ut _ atigh llegh i _ guulgute m _ napaqagh i _ .
enkaam _ sakniqe te luki _ nekegte luki _ tawaten _ sani an _ pi i _ tawaten _ ama _ guulgute t _ taakut _ ayagute i _ ama _ tuusagh igh luki _ , _ enkaam _ esghapag lghii m _ yug m _ tawaten _ atunem _ ghhuugh negh tu tal angi _ , _ inglugtun _ nef tegh qugh testaq luki _ esghapag luki _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ guulgute t _ ighulugh tgun _ asighte te luki _ , _ allameng _ amel tu tagh aghaq elghiit _ , _ iqug i _ taakut _ sayug tegh aat aqiit _ av legh nayuk ata _ ighulugh t _ .
enkaam _ tegg m aagh qwaagh llag aqii _ ighulugh t _ un iil engest aghh aay alghiit _ .
enkaam _ mayugh aqe luteng _ .
Tan pegh h et _ , _ tafutagh u ut _ ila i _ , _ ranme m _ tung angani _ tanpegh t _ quupekagh t _ sivuke luki _ nek egh qugh luki _ taaku s _ tunuqagh m _ tanpeghh i _ ighulugh tgun _ tamaagun _ qulighnegh i _ qel uugh tegh utaqiit _ . _ taakut _ enkaam _ sani an _ pi i _ asi liit _ pi nghata _ . _ yanga u ut _ reghillegh i _ .
taakut _ alla neng _ tanpegh meng _ ilaagh luki _ pi aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ tagsigh aq _ atuqe aqe aat _ uglagh u pigte luku _ .
Qul iit _ tanpegh t _ nef tegh qun ghata _ mekelghiigh u luta _ tagsighagh mun _ nuv ugh teng un emta _ putu nge i kete te _ teghigniqe aqe ukut _ mayugh amun _ nuvugh yug te aqe lghiikut _ .
Tan pegh h a _ qamagte luku _ tawaten _ saye i _ entaqun _ on e- th ir d - ev z ii _ mangteghagh m _ uteghmun _ .
angyaghpag m _ tel an ang anganeng _ um ugh p aa rug llagmeng _ at as tameng _ tanpigh aqe ait _ .
llaaghanwha _ tanpegh sugh nap angun aan _ lli aqe aat _ tawaten _ .
tagsigh aq _ uglagh u pigte luku _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
tagsighagh t _ tamaakut _ tapghagh at _ amenqun _ tanpegh mun _ atuqe aqe lghiit _ .
ayvegh m _ , _ qasiqagh m _ uyiigh ngllagh llegh m _ taaqe negh a _ keleve aqe luki _ .
alngunak _ ayvegh m _ ikellegh aneng _ uziftagh ke luki _ qelutagh u luku _ tagsighagh u luku _ .
qasiqagh t llu _ ilangakun _ tawaten _ .
alngunak _ esl egk ak iita _ keleve aqe ut _ tag sigh as _ tamaakut _ .
qasiqagh m _ uyiigh ngllaghkagh m _ taaqe negh i _ taakut _ .
unkuvag t _ pi nghmegteki _ taawa _ taaqe negh i _ .
sa u a _ ik ellgh aq _ uz if qugh aqaat _ talwa _ amiiqagh m _ liighqe llegh i _ , _ tekerqagh i _ uz if qugh aqiit _ qelutagh u luki _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagsigh aq _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
Y uku tagh sigh luku _ mangteghaghpag lghii ni _ .
enkaam _ nutagh aper u waaghmeng _ kinegh nghhagh meng _ tunuqagh i _ akil ighnegh em _ tung angi _ , _ ilangakun _ whangkuta qun _ ay w an _ tung angi _ awatkaghtagh t _ ataasigh t _ , _ ilangakun _ malghugnegh t _ ilate aqe ut _ , _ pal aghh aan Ê¼ghata _ amiiqagh igh llegh t _ .
Taaq sug g waaghmun _ mangtegh aghpag es _ tamaakut _ , _ akuzi lghii ni _ qay iig rugh lluteng _ ayuqe ut _ , _ akuzillegh it _ taaq sug g waal ghiini _ .
tallimat _ tanpeghh et _ mangtegh aghpag mun _ , _ esgha _ taaku s ta _ tawaten _ tunuqagh m _ taakut _ sanim- a _ malghugnegh t _ qule ii iqe te luteng _ , _ enkaam _ tallimagnegh t _ .
tawaten _ nek egh qugh luku _ taa qen ghata _ , _ ingliigh magh meng _ , _ nefkuuragh _ , _ qasugh iqe aq _ qeghaate kayug _ .
nefkuuragh t _ pi nigh ghllag t _ . _ enkaam _ mangtegh as _ taa qen gh at aa _ m iig tem meng _ ategh leg t _ .
kenegh meng _ kumagh lluteng _ tamaaken _ qasiqagh meng _ , _ nefkuuragh meng _ eghqwaagh aqe luteng _ .
kayute t _ ila i _ ighleke aqe kangit _ negh esqelluki _ .
K aag tuum aghmeng _ makl in Ê¼ ghaghmeng _ nefkuuragh meng _ .
paaw i _ maligte luki _ nefku kayugu lghiit _ .
paaw i _ qupughragh negh meggni _ , _ uyghag kun _ , _ qalqalima meng _ , _ sa meng _ kaag tugh aqegkangit _ .
kavighrug ketu te _ qupughragh llegh i _ paaw m _ .
Neq nii pig tu ut _ tepe kegte pigte lghiit _ .
qayughllak _ sivuligh _ unakegkagh _ maklag _ , _ ayvegh _ nefku igate ngughk _ wiin _ , _ kepellegh ni _ sa ni _ qayugh utaghpag ni _ kiyaghte aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ mesiigh ut ngwaagh aqelghiit _ . _ T ep es u ung naq ek est at _ nefku aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ qamavek _ iiwleng _ k iingh waa qayug et _ mesiigh utng waa neghmeggni _ .
enkaam _ tepe kegte pigte ut _ .
taawa _ mangtag leg t _ mangtag meng llu _ m iig tem meng _ ategh leg _ .
neqnigh ghllagu ut _ nef ku u ra s _ tamaakut _ sivu ligh aat _ .
aamtaam _ nef ku nagh sim an _ unakegkagh t _ kaatu tagh esn aq _ nefku lghii ni _ , _ maaten _ elpek si _ nefku llegh gpesistun _ taawa _ alla u aqe ut _ .
mesugh i _ ellngagh lugh u aghte ste gpenaki _ qaye i _ k iin Ê¼gh aghh neghmeggni _ ellngagh nanigh aqe lghiit _ enkaam _ qaam n angi _ aghipate aqe luteng _ , _ alla u ut _ enkaam _ .
mesiigh tke aat _ neqnigh tu s _ taawa _ .
neqe m llu _ kagpag llegh a
Pel aa sim _ apegh llegh a
taaqe negh mta _ sa mun _ unang niigh mun _ lliigh aqe ut _ .
naten _ nefkuuragh t _ qeghaate aqe aat _ ?
Sivuk lluki _ nefkuuragh t _ taakut _ .
I ghu ul ut _ nek egh qu qayug ulghiit _ qeghagh tgun _ sivuke luki _ enkaam _ qaayng ikun _ ighulugh m _ nefkuuragh _ , _ qasugh u iqe aq llu _ sa aghte qugh luki _ tanpeghh agh aal iq aghluki _ tanpegh meng _ .
uksugh mun llu _ pin Ê¼ghata _ tanpegh meng _ saape aqe luki _ pikayug u ut _ .
U pen Ê¼gh aam _ pillgh i _ ukut _ aagra m _ saghy aang aneng _ tanpeghh agh aaligh luki _ aatkagh meng _ pikayug t _ qaayng ikun _ enkaam _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh aqe kangit _ .
uksugh mun _ pi kaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ ama _ tawaten _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ uksughtekayug t _ .
eghqwaagh te yaghqagh t llu _ tawaten _ .
uqiigh luki _ nefku aqe lghiit _ .
uqiightugh luki _ enkaangam _ kinegh rakegtagh t _ .
tamaa na _ sa u a _ ila a _ tu lii m aq _ kiilqusigh _ negh magh an _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Mangtegh as qw aalghii ni _ kin ell ghistun _ sivuligh t _ nefku t _ kiig negh ke aat _ qeghaate kayugu ut _ , _ siv uul iit _ kinegh nghhagh t _ .
alla u yagh lghii _ , _ nefku kayug t _ wetku _ kiiw t _ pin an Ê¼ghata _ .
nefku yaghagh ngugh _ tagitugtu uq _ .
ila a _ uksugh mun _ pi kaghqagh _ qeghaate aqe aat _ .
E gh qwaagh usaghq as _ tamaakut _ ama _ u pen Ê¼gh aghh aaneng _ saghna kayug t _ .
aghvenge lghii ni _ awataghpag t _ mangtag meng _ imigh kayug t _ .
enkaam _ payangite nghaani _ quyngigh m _ kevigh a _ atghagh te nghatki _ angyaleg m _ kag paag aqegkangi _ .
taana _ kiig mi _ uukagh _ pi nghaani _ nefku kayug _ , _ nunivag _ saghna aqe kangat _ tuqusigh aqe luki _ .
awen _ ungipagh kaqe anka _ laluramke nun _ nunivag t _ tuqusigh aqe ni luki _ akm aag ut akun _ .
tuqu negh meggni _ mesugh i _ q ug aaghq waa kayug un iluki _ , _ ila i _ katam _ j u ic e- estun _ ayuqe na iqe anka _ .
enkaam _ maaten _ kinguligh nun _ or ang e _ j u ic e- ngun iluki _ liite lghii nun _ j u ic e-meng _ ayuqe na iqe anka _ .
enkaam _ tamaa na _ uksaagh mun _ ll iin Ê¼ghani _ O c t ob er -mun _ nunivag meng llu _ kevigh te luku _ awataghpag mun _ .
aqlaghaghte nghaani _ tamaa na _ eghqwaagh te kaghqagh _ uukagh _ asighte aqe luku _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uukaghtagh teng _ asighte luki _ tagite aqe kangit _ qegh aghnaq enghata _ .
eghqwaagh te kaghqagh t _ uksuqun _ ellngit a llu _ atuqe yaghqaa luki _ itake aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ qafsina _ asighnegh _ , _ qula neng _ ug laagh aqluku _ asighte aqe luku _ sang wa _ .
ila i _ nefkuuragh meng _ pikayug t _ .
aamta _ whangkuta _ uukagh _ , _ tawaqa _ , _ pugneghqagh _ , _ nunivag t _ taakut _ qaayng an it aqut _ qeghagh nun _ qaake luteng _ , _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ enkaam _ asigh tengngwaagh aqiit _ .
uukagh t _ kinegh nghhagh t _ , _ igg w ani _ pi niigh pigte ut _ S ep tem p er em _ uukaghti a _ .
kinegh ghllag ste gpenaki _ qeghaate aqe lghiit _ eghqwaagh te kaghqagh u luki _ .
aamta _ sivuligh t _ A ug us t -em _ pi i _ masleg kanigh aqe ut _ .
uuk _ , _ ila a _ uukagh _ Jul y -mi _ piyaghq aan Ê¼ghani _ kingugtagh u ghllag qagh yu k _ .
ukut _ en kam m _ ggata i _ neq ang iit ngwaagh um aaq egkangi _ kingug m _ .
september _ taana _ king ug n apag ilnguq _ enkaam _ pinigh aqe ut _ .
aatkagh m _ kaki llegh a _ , _ atuqe llegh a _ neghigh luku
W ay eng im _ apegh llegh a
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ liite unga _ kaki meng _ .
Iq rag me tagh ngaata _ kaki naqutke kau unga _ , _ nal ikek _ e igh t _ , _ n ine- year s -ngu lunga _ .
kelug nka _ natete yagh luteng _ nanghii qwaagh aat am _ qenwat _ tawaten _ liite unga _ .
whanga _ liite lleg mni _ sa u a _ maana _ maaten _ atugh ut _ ukav an saghtuq _ .
iitek _ allgegh luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ taawanginaq _ ukav an teftuq _ .
palaghhagh u yagh uq _ aate tke aq _ , _ iitegngam _ kameraagh _ aklunagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
kameg ngllagh aqe kangit _ neghsapig t _ .
qazigyagh meng _ melqugh ligh luku _ yug t _ ipigtu luku _ , _ ipigkestaaghhagh u luku _ kaame kegka _ yug t _ .
Uy g iin Ê¼ ghaghmeng _ kay an qu siq at _ , _ aar ragh waagh us iigut _ .
whanga _ tawaten _ liite lleg mni _ .
ataasigh t _ amiiragh t _ kameg mun _ naama kayug t _ , _ neghsagh t _ aang k egtat _ neghsapig t _ .
qazigyagh t _ aang eghll an Ê¼ ghilnguut _ amsakelghii t _ .
neghsapig t _ suf ll ugh ragg neghllug et _ .
Un Ê¼g avek _ unÊ¼g a pis iil uki _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ , _ neghsapig t _ unÊ¼g a pis iil uki _ piniqe aqe ait _ .
Ayum iq un Ê¼ghani _ suf ll ugh ragg neghllug et _ qazigyagh neng _ .
qazigyagh t _ ayum iq unaq utng inaq _ taa p ng ig sim aaq egkangi _ .
kukupag t _ ung ll enegh tung itneng _ seghleqe aqe ait _ .
aghi negh meggni _ unglleg neghtuqagh t _ .
amiiragh t _ kin en Ê¼ghata _ , _ pellug luki _ iqangigh aqe ait _ sa ta i _ mesiigh negh igh aqiit _ melqw illu _ .
whaten _ uksugh mi _ pikagh t _ melqw i _ taane luki _ mesiigh i _ taane vyiigh aqe ait _ .
aane te luki _ anigu kun _ tuut qugh luki _ enkaam _ ilu akun _ niightugh aqe ait _ .
talwa _ liigh q imun _ pattern- nge isagh ut _ .
A tu lug g agh teggun _ atuqe yagh ka itgun _ nasiqute luki _ aange aghagh luki _ pi aqe ait _ .
aghvegh m _ ivalu i _ qiipagh ke aqe ait _ asi an _ tung angi _ tukughagh i _ .
emta _ ang tugh aat _ ivalu kegtekayugu ut _ .
iitek _ ila i llu _ amsakaghtagh t _ aghv epig et llu _ ivalu kegte ut _ .
enkaam _ pin em teki _ iike luki _ qupughragh luki _ , _ qupughhugh luki _ , _ kinegh ngllagh luki _ kin en Ê¼ghata _ qiipi aqe aput _ .
tallu luki _ pi aqe aput _ .
quyngigh m _ ivalu i _ am estaaghh aat _ kameg m _ uygu anun _ , _ qule mun _ kaleftagh u sigh t _ , _ uygiinghagh t _ qule i _ kameg m _ .
kaleftagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
K al ef tagh luki _ kaki aqe ait _ .
Y aag k estaagh aat _ kaki llegh t _ .
quyngigh m _ ivalu i _ am estaaghh aaluki _ qiipi luki _ tespagavek _ atuqe aqe ut _ .
aghvegh m _ pi i _ qayughllak _ ila i _ , _ iitek _ ila i _ taaqe kayug t _ am estaaghh aaluki _ .
qiipi lghii ni _ whaten _ tap ghagh p aw aaghem _ qiip elgh atun _ qiipe magh ita _ es leg tal k aghq iistun _ tallu luki _ , _ uygaagh ke luki _ uug n angi kun _ , _ nuuve neghqagh i _ taakut _ am ell iigh aghaq luki _ taagavek _ .
tagneghsagh naqe lghii ni _ tagneghli meng _ sa meng _ tag neghs ar eg agh aqiit _ , _ kaleftagh mun _ whaten _ atuqe naqe lghii ni _ , _ uygu sigh u luki _ pi lghii ni _ .
kenuleg t _ siku ut _ kameg mun _ kaki sigh t _ , _ maaten _ th re e- si d ed - k aqegkangit _ kenuleg t _ tamaakut _ ipeg lghiit _ sang y iil nguut _ .
tespagavek _ kameg m _ uygu anun _ kenug ite ngugh t _ angqaperug kegtagh t _ kaki sigh u ut _ .
atungag meng _ aange lghii meng _ , _ amsakaghtagh meng _ i whan imeng _ nateghqagh ke kayugu yaghpete ut _ .
whanga _ liite lleg mni _ unÊ¼g avek _ kameg t _ qasiqagh meng _ nateghqagh igh kayugu ait _ kiyang _ .
aghisigh luki _ yataaghqe aqe ait _ aghi nghata _ egte luki _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ amiiragh _ yukutate luni _ kaki nqegte uq _ .
elngaatall _ taaqe lghii ni _ kin eng llagh waagh aqiit _ .
Naz igh aam _ amiiragh i _ temkagh ke kayugu ait _ , _ uksugh mi _ atugh u ut _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ .
sivuligh ghhagh mta _ aagkut _ kiig mi _ ellngin aaluki _ uus lluki _ sa ta i _ qaasligh u luki _ atuqe kayugu yaghpete ait _ .
maaten _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ atuqe yagute ma kangit _ .
amigh meng _ qamagun _ ilep gh aaghmeng _ ilupeghagh igh luki _ .
Tem kaa s _ taakut _ qaye akun _ amiiragh t _ melqw i _ qaasligh ke luki _ uksugh mi _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
Taaku nguut _ qaamkut _ ilukligh t _ ategh i _ ilep gh aaghet _ .
taakut _ qaasligh at _ temkagh at _ , _ n ungigh tel get _ paagna i _ qukagh i llu _ , _ tukughagh i llu _ taakut _ qamagte luteng _ temkagh at llu _ ilep gh aagh etlu _ .
kameg m _ ilu akun _ allighte t _ amiiragh t _ .
ila i _ pi lget _ qallukagh meng _ allighte ke aqe ut _ .
amigh meng _ ama _ qalleg vag kaqe ut _ , _ nuqutuqagh t _ yugusigh a _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ n ar an Ê¼ ghi lluteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
amalleqa _ tawaten _ ugmestaaghhagh meng _ amigh meng _ iluklighte luki _ ila i _ uksugh mi _ mil qw i _ qam an lluki _ .
qaasligh at _ taakut _ mil qw i _ qaye anite luki _ .
uksugh mi _ whaten _ aghnagh m _ amalleqa _ atugh it _ q as pi qu lluki _ .
ighu i _ segesqugh mun _ kenle kut _ .
maqaghqe ghllag luteng _ ayuqe yagh lghiit _ qiipaghagh _ kayaal nguq _ tamaani _ iwernga _ ama _ ila i _ nuugh nga lghii ni _ inglupigagh ghhagh u kayugu ut _ , _ s aatgh waaghh aaluki _ sa ta i _ qaasligh ke luki _ qallevag t _ , _ alla _ qaye akun _ atkug luteng _ .
amigh ghqu aq _ kiyang _ atkug kaqsagh kangat _ , _ sukilpagh _ , _ alpa _ , _ metghagh _ , _ kang Ê¼gh waag mengllu _ atkug kayugu yaghpete ut _ .
weni _ whanga llu _ liite lleg mni _ sa u a _ kayaali kestagh ta a _ .
ila a _ atuqe pagnanigh magh an _ liite kau unga _ .
yug t _ ng el qagh meng _ , _ alpa meng _ kiyang _ atkug kaqe ut _ .
saye i _ atkug ngllagh aqe ait _ atuqe aqe ait _ atku ng ll amun _ .
P aam nang illu _ atuqe kayugu ut _ naate lghii ni _ , _ naam aligh lleghh iini _ .
amalleqa _ amiiragh i _ aghvig luki _ yataaghqe llegh i _ pi aqe ait _ kel igagh waaghluki _ .
taaqe neghllug pigu ut _ sukilpagh t _ wata _ mekestaaghhagh t _ .
naate neghllug pigu ut _ , _ pegte aqe luki qun _ enraq _ kaki aqe lghiit _ .
Ighivg agh millu _ whaten _ kiyang _ pikayug u ut _ .
aghneghmi _ whaten _ sa meng _ neqenge naqe meng _ qepgh am su reg agh tuqaq _ , _ qepghaqagh _ uglaapig teng ngu yaghtuq _ aghnagh ni _ mangteghapig mete luni _ , _ kiyang _ ighivg aghmi _ aghuliigh qagh negh meggni _ kaki llegh kesagh kangat _ .
ne m _ qepghaqagh a _ .
sapeghhnagh mi _ whaten _ kanegh ghllag kayugu ut _ aagra m _ qaye i _ , _ nategh mi _ .
qama _ qayughllak _ puqla ghllag u aqe lghii _ , _ iiyagh _ es leg tan qelluku _ agep sugh taa qayug et _ egllu stun _ , _ enkaam _ kanegh ghllag qagh yu k _ .
naqamllu _ tawan ll iq iigal kangit _ . _ ifkaghte luki _ , _ alleg luki _ egte aqe luki _ .
nanigh t _ taakut _ ama _ uqughqagh aneng _ yataaghqe llegh i _ , _ uqugh isag lleghqagh i _ uqigh aqe luki _ .
nutaghagh inagh meng _ whaten _ pinegh meggni _ , _ iitegngam _ aqlagha mi _ whaten _ mesiigh i _ nuugh aatagh naqe ghllag t _ t ang taq ereg ameng _ lliigh lghii ni _ .
kapeghte luteng _ kumlate luteng _ whaten _ tamaakut _ ughug tem meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ sukate nagh ut _ .
aqlagha igh te mi _ t ang taq ereg iluteng _ lliigh aqe ut _ enkaam _ sukangiite aqe ai _ mesiigh ngllagh llegh i _ .
uglagh _ mesiigh _ atuqe aqe aat _ nanigh mun _ , _ ila ita _ maalghug u aqe lghiit _ pag um _ inglegh m _ nanigh a _ .
inga _ alla _ maalghug _ inglu ani _ enkaam _ estamat _ nanigh t _ atuqe kayugu ait _ .
tamaakut _ neghsagh m _ uqigh a _ awatkaghtagh meng _ akume vleghagh luteng _ pinigh aqe ut _ .
aamta _ ellngin aaluteng _ kumaghugh naqe ghllag aqe ut _ .
Ak sig ung waagh luteng _ kumaghugh igate ut _ .
taawanginaq _ yakumangilngugh ni _ pama yug ma t _ .
neghsagh meng llu _ atkug ngllagh kayugu te u lghii ni _ .
P aq niil nguut _ qevuute luteng _ yu ku tan ami _ .
kiyang _ taaku nguut _ qawaag m _ amiir i _ kiyang _ atugh t _ .
qikmigh meng _ puvite ke ut _ , _ puvisaagh igh kayugu ut _ .
ataasigh t _ agaten _ amaa llgagh at _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ , _ pamakaghtagh t _ .
weni _ maaten _ quynginge magh an _ liite kau unga _ .
quyngigh u uute luku _ salin _ taag aningani _ tespamaken _ amigh llu _ pi ma aqe yagh kangat _ .
U pen Ê¼gh ami _ amiiragh t _ mil qw ighluki _ kaame kaqe ait _ .
aghinaghte nghaani _ melqw ilngughmeng _ kaame kaqe ut _ .
uksugh mi _ aamta _ melqughtugh ma lghii meng _ kaame ke kayugu ut _ .
quyillegtagh u ut _ uksugh mi _ aatkagh it _ .
uliigh t _ tamaakut _ mughu te mun _ atugh u ut _ .
Un Ê¼g api sim _ kameg m _ ategh ke ai _ , _ uliigh _ .
quyillegtagh t _ maani _ qute mi _ nav e g _ ama _ pi mun _ atugh t _ .
Aku gh vig aa s _ tamaakut _ agh in aghnegh ani _ angyagh mun _ ivghaagh sigh t _ u pen Ê¼gh ami _ taape neghllug t _ .
taawanginaq _ tawaten _ taa p ng igg neghata _ tuk r uug g neghata _ aghvig luki _ mesiigh meng _ sa ta i _ angighhe aqe ait _ qaam n angi _ .
mulu negh meggni _ mesiigh negh ii taqut _ .
enkaam _ taape neghllug ghraagte aqe ai _ .
aghyugh negh meggni _ taa p ng ig tekayug ii _ .
amiiragh _ aklu niite luku _ simigh qiinagh aqe luku _ taa p ng ig tekaq _ pikayug u aat _ .
kiig mi _ enraq _ temkag lug t _ aghvig luki _ , _ sa ta i _ kavighte luki _ pi aqe ait _ kameg ngllagh aqe ait _ .
aamqute u ut _ nateghqagh m llu _ amiiragh m llu _ akul ang anilnguut _ enkaam _ uk atang anilnguut _ qiipagh m _ itegh qagh i uute ai _ elngaatall _ sagniite u ut _ , _ sagniite ke ai _ .
Tap ghagh p aw aagh meng qun _ atugh lghii ni _ , _ kelug mun _ itegh qagh i aatagh u ut _ seve uute na yu kata _ sa na yu kata _ .
test-pag kut _ quul ng anilnguut _ uygu u ut _ .
Un Ê¼g an tut _ uum _ iteg ngestagh m _ taakw nang anilnguut _ mughnegh t _ , _ nateghqagh m _ tung angani _ .
paagna an _ pi i _ nungighte u ut _ , _ singigh a _ , _ putulghi i _ , _ n ungigh tengi _ .
uygu yan _ kaki llegh i _ neftegte llegh i _ kaleftagh u uute luki _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ .
test-pag kut _ nungighte yan _ igg wh aning i _ nungighte yiite te t _ .
qallukagh at _ kameg t _ estullug meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ quyngigh m _ ighu i _ ategh i _ qallukagh at _ es tull ung l aq ay uug it _ .
ipigtu luki _ piyug lghii ni _ ipigkestaaghhagh u luku _ ilaaghtugh aqe luki _ aange lghiit _ ayuqe ait _ .
ipigkingwaagh t _ ipigkestaaghhagh at _ kameg t _ , _ enkaam _ ipigtuqagh t _ pagavesengwaagh t _ .
neghigh luku _ U N A N G N I I L E Q _ maani _ sivuqagh mi
Aku l k im _ apegh llegh a
whaten _ uksaagh mi _ kuml aluni _ anig un Ê¼gh agu _ , _ elngaatall _ yuug _ yataaghqe te ghllag kayugu uq _ , _ siku k _ kaate ste gpenakek _ .
tapghagh _ , _ uun Ê¼gh aq _ , _ qaan Ê¼ ng waaq _ , _ sa u a _ atughqagh _ unang niigh mun _ apeghiigh naqe aqe kangat _ .
uyiigh _ , _ tuugkagh _ , _ ayvegh niigh mun _ atughqagh _ tug aagh es nangll agh tegh aqegkangat _ .
sa u a _ qamiy allu _ tamaa na _ , _ qaghlu kaghqagh _ qikmigh mun _ ulima luku _ , _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ste gpenaan _ pi aqe kangat _ .
taagken _ uks un Ê¼gh an _ , _ uksugh na iqe aat _ siku k _ kaan negh egkeni _ maavek _ .
tawani _ yuug _ tengghuniqe te aqe uq _ piy aa mun _ uksugh yuggaagh nghaani _ qayughllak _ teghig ke sagh m _ unake naqe llegh a _ piyaqnagh iitagh ke lghii _ siku gni _ unÊ¼g ani _ .
unaangu luku _ aghte ste gpenaan _ sivuke pigte luku _ eslaqagh ke lghiit _ aane luteng _ , _ saamna llu _ esne _ qagi a _ agig sagh tu ugh aqegkangat _ navek _ wiin _ pi vagilgameng _ .
Pin in Ê¼ghani _ mughu te mun _ , _ yataagh qelluteng _ aga _ aghulaqe uute aqe lghiit _ sanqutetuumagh meng _ .
kiyang _ paamggun _ kiwavek _ naayghagh m _ sivungagh nun _ esghaate naqe magh meng _ teghig meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
ilangakun _ taakw aning iigh aq _ ayveghagh te aqe lghiit _ tegh ik _ qantaghate nghaani _ .
Uy ii ghi s _ taakut _ elngaatall _ kelengake sqe lleg leg t _ ig l ak aa siq nayuk atki _ ayvegh niigh kumeng _ .
Ay v elg un Ê¼ghani _ tawaten _ sanqute teng _ quunpeng _ yataang _ pi aqe lghiit _ pi llgu na llegh ani _ siku m _ .
liilightuusagh _ taana _ , _ uyiigh teng _ quunpeng _ uughqa n _ tungang an illuki _ iiwleng _ pi sqe lleg leg t _ .
qayughllak _ ayumigh _ nan Ê¼ ghii q aalghiit _ , _ yug t _ ayvegh mun _ nusug na iqe ait _ uyiigh kun _ iglag ke aqe aat _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ ap aall uq luku _ uyiigh t _ anuqe m _ tungang ak u _ pi snanigh lleg leg t _ , _ teng te kuy eng _ ig l ak aa sii yaghqat _ .
taana qun _ kiiw u aq _ sivungagh mi _ ayvegh m _ nusug qu a _ tawaten _ uyiigh an _ ig l ak aghluku _ tazimantekagh _ .
unangniigh llegh _ tamaa na _ liilightuusagh ghllag u uq _ qayughllak _ awen _ peleghqe tke kayug _ .
ila a _ whaa _ puyg uk efut _ .
Tamaa tu m _ liilightuusagh a _ , _ esla m _ , _ siku m _ , _ megh m _ , _ maaqellegh m _ saam lu _ ila yan _ nate tul nganeng _ liite luteng _ wetku _ ell meg neng _ mughute yaaghtekayug t _ nukalpigagh t _ . _ wiin _ sivuke luteng _ pi ke sigh nun _ maligsaagh te luteng _ unang niigh mun _ piinligh kayug t _ liite kayug t _ tawaten _ nan Ê¼ ghiigh luku _ mughute ni uq _ .
kina _ taanÊ¼g ani _ ayveghagh nghmini _ tawani _ ila ni _ pi yaagh lgute ni _ apagh aatagh aqe ai _ uusqagh llegh anun _ siku m _ m ayuq aghl ini _ .
enkaam _ uv il ighnegh melnguut _ tamaakut _ pi yu aat _ esghaate negh migte ni _ tagi laghate te aqe lghiit _ nengigh yagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
K aat quun n neghata _ uglagh te luki _ ayvegh teng _ qaake luki _ , _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ nengigh uute aqe uq _ .
aga _ asighte i luteng _ qaan Ê¼ ngw aat eng _ kelute mun _ taglagh naqe magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ kingu ligh qutagh luteng _ igleghte te aqe ut _ uygu uute qugh te luteng _ .
uka _ qamugh te lghiit _ ne meng _ esghagh nghmegteki _ , _ nanevgagh u aqe ut _ qel egh ragh tet _ , _ siivanllegh t _ kayagte aqe ait _ mekelghiigh t _ paay ghis qelluki _ , _ igaghyagh t llu _ tamaakut _ pi ste aqe kangit _ igaghyagh u ghngaita _ .
kinku t _ tuungqagh teng _ qamuutagh ke ait _ , _ kinku t llu _ alngunak _ .
tawani _ neqe _ piy uwh aan Ê¼ghani _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ quya kayugu uq _ , _ qayughllak _ sivuqagh _ iingunagh mi _ nutaghagh meng _ neqe meng _ naasiigh yaghqaa lghii _ .
tawatete uq _ tamaani _ ataasigh stun _ yug a _ ayuqe te yagh uq _ .
ilangani _ tamaakut _ pi yu aat _ yug t _ , _ tevragh t _ , _ up- qlighte te aqe lghiit _ meghhagh ni _ nalighmeng _ iighwilngugh m _ kangite gkeni _ .
neghsagh llu _ tamaani _ aklunagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
aga _ iighwilngugh t _ quup aghnaq utng inaq _ nuug inagh magh meng _ kiyang _ pi aqe yagh lghiit _ uksugh yuggaagh mi _ tawaten _ .
tagtalmi _ ikevagh ughte luni _ megh ughte nghagu _ amalleqa _ angyagh meng _ pinegh meggni _ ayvegh _ , _ maklag _ , _ neghsagh _ unake aqe kangat _ .
taawanginaq _ uksugh mi _ sall eg yug um aghtaq egkanga _ . _ siku k llu _ pin in Ê¼gh egk egni _ kiyang _ aghneghtu mi _ esavghagh te aqe lghiit _ unÊ¼g avek _ ama _ neqete luteng llu _ taglagh aqe luteng _ .
neqete naqe a _ taana _ iiwleng _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ tawaten _ pillgh ugh t aghh neghani _ .
neqangisag lleghqagh _ pakig gut aqegkangat _ saama llu _ aghnegh tughnegh ani _ tegh ik llu _ awavagh qagh yu k _ .
tawani llu _ esla _ pinigh aghluku _ pi naqe kayug t _ .
tawani llu _ uksugh yuggaagh mi _ qawaagni ii aagh _ pikayug _ .
aygughara meng _ unaangu luku _ aghtagh aq es tan Ê¼ghani _ kang Ê¼gh w aak _ , _ alpa meng _ , _ met ghaghmeng _ ilangakun _ akume luni _ aygugh ghllag qagh yu k _ , _ enkaam _ aygughara meng _ ategh leg _ .
Ighivg aghmi _ enraq _ eslugh ghllag qagh yu k _ uqu mig teng nguuq _ ategh a _ .
aywaa neng _ anuqe _ ug av aneng _ ayuq en Ê¼ghani _ qawaagniigh llgu nagh aqe uq _ .
naten _ ilangakun _ siku k llu _ kaasagh an Ê¼gh egk egni _ nani _ tamaani _ kaneghyengesi mi _ , _ qighunegh _ pi ghllag qagh yu k _ .
qighunegh meng _ ategh leg _ tamaa na _ alp aagh aay alghii _ tenge igate ngughk _ q ug il ip ag llagem _ , _ enkaam _ ilangani _ uksugh llegh m _ sigh l atk eghllak ay u waat _ siku mete luku _ , _ meghagh ite u tke aq _ , _ kiyang _ amani llu _ , _ qawani llu _ .
emta _ iin Ê¼gh usal ek _ , _ uglagh negh mii ni nguq _ nenge a _ ugh umak ayug uniluku _ pi aqe aat _ enkaam _ kelenga sagh u uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ uksugh _ navek _ taakwavek _ Ll uugh vig mun _ ll in Ê¼ghani _ angyaleg _ tam agh aghmi _ aghvegh mun _ sanqute t _ yataaghqe te aqe kangit _ .
angyaghwaagh u yagh lghiit _ aghvegh niigh sagh it _ tamaani _ . _ G aar in Ê¼gh i _ ghhuugh m llu _ simigh aqe luki _ naavuma na yu kata _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aghqelengestagh i _ .
keniliigh te magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ pillgh ugh tef agilg agu _ kete ghesnagh yaghqaa luteng _ .
quunpeng _ taakut _ kenilegh t _ kelengake luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ anig un Ê¼gh aki _ pekete aqe luki _ , _ amalleqa _ v uum an Ê¼gh ak illu _ regh igh taqluki _ iiwleng _ .
aamta _ tu v alg un Ê¼ghani _ tawaten _ ataasigh inagh t _ kenilegh t _ segge aqe ait _ , _ qay ugh l ak _ ilangakun _ tuvagh _ aastu aqe lghii _ .
A as k estaaghh aan Ê¼ghani _ kiyang _ malghugnegh t _ pi aqe ait _ , _ uw atang aghm iitlu _ , _ aking aghm iitlu _ .
taawa _ aghveghni ii aagh _ piinligh aqe uq _ aghvegh llu _ igleghte magh mi _ pi aqe lghii _ .
saama llu _ megh ughh negh tugh taqegkanga _ . _ esla _ unaami _ pinigh sug nin naq en Ê¼ghani _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ iye _ inglupigagh _ atugh naqe ni luku _ .
unaangu pigte luku _ ilangakun _ atghaghtegh te aqe lghiit _ iglag ke luku _ teng Ê¼gh un iq em _ aqf aaligh aat aasim aghmeng _ taa yug niigh em _ .
taakut _ kiyang _ A wer g enkut _ sivulii yuneghtuqagh t _ .
elngaatall _ aga _ kete uute negh meggni _ nap aghh waagh taqegkanga _ telaananga m _ .
pilaataqu negh meggni _ aga _ aghvenge i nagh magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ ilangani _ , _ ama _ tawaten _ ila a _ ayumiqullegh m _ avangite aqe luni _ ayuqe lghii _ angyaghnaghpag i te m llu _ pi ste aqe kanga _ .
kinku t _ taakut _ aghvenge negh meggni _ aga _ napaatagh aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ liisimake luki _ ivenrugh u uute qaghtagh te aqe lghiit _ napaatagh meng _ esghaate negh meggni _ .
P aag ken lu _ ne meng _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ liisima kaqe kangit _ ilangakun _ , _ enkaam _ ne mi llu _ qesugniqe te aqe lghiit _ aghv engu ugh umaghmeng _ .
tuqute luki _ aghvegh teng _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ enraq _ kelute mun _ kaalgugh naqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyagh _ qamagte luni _ kaalguutagh ke lghii _ uygu uq uteghllag luni _ uka _ aliinegh meggni _ .
kaalgughkagh teng _ kaat ute te nghmegteki _ ategh leg t _ teghlug te meng _ , _ teghlug te na iqe kangit _ .
unuk _ pi tke igate aat _ aga _ pilag naqe magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ aqsaqughiitigh qagh luteng _ .
tamaani _ neghigh luku _ mangtag _ nengigh te igate yaghpete aat _ , _ enkaam _ angyagh _ iingunagh mi _ aghvegh mi _ tawani _ pi naqute kayug _ .
tamaakut _ angyagh m _ yug i _ kay ung qan Ê¼gh et _ suyvaghte aqe lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tea- ma a _ pikayug _ , _ naasiigh qagh yu k _ .
suqi a _ , _ llaag i _ , _ sa i llu _ taam _ aghv el ghem _ agghi te aqe ai _ , _ inpite qugh magh mi _ pikayug llu _ navek _ alngunak _ .
taagken _ kiig m _ aghnagh a _ piite nghaani _ , _ aghvegh iitagh ke kanga _ .
tawani _ enraq _ ayvegh niigh mun _ neq niigh mun _ legh iigh aqe lghiit _ .
tawani llu _ tanqigh mi _ teghig em _ avaqutaghagh a _ allg ek qayuk _ , _ qasiqagh leg _ , _ teghiglug leg _ un akugh aqegkangat _ .
neqe _ uglagh luku _ pinagh kaqe kangat _ tegh ik _ aligh u aatagh luku _ , _ esla _ pin in Ê¼ghani _ qav alq ug penateng _ angyaghtugh aqe lghiit _ .
kagpag naqe magh an _ neqe _ pi aqe kangat _ .
tamaani llu _ qikmigh _ atugh ghllagu yagh lghii _ enkaam _ ila a _ kiyang _ neghqutkagh u luku _ saghna ghllag aqe aat _ .
tuugte magh an _ manguna _ , _ kemeg qragh k _ tamaa na _ nefku magh an _ , _ neqangisag lleghqagh _ pak igg utk aqegkangat _ liisimake luku _ .
tawani _ pinaghvig mi llu _ ayughaayag _ qawani _ pi aqe aat _ nani _ taakwani _ tapghugh m _ ketanga ni llu _ .
siku pagite te aqe kanga _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ iwernga _ qavregh meng llu _ ayveghagh te kayug t _ unÊ¼g ani _ .
qavregh _ taana _ aghnasaleg _ amsakaghtagh meng _ akume luni _ qasiqagh leg t _ akuuragh qaghaqe ait _ .
aga _ awavagh magh mi _ taana _ qavregh _ pikayug _ .
Qem iigh unnegh an ii nguq _ pig tekayug uf taat _ .
sikungigh te a _ maligte luku _ tegh ik llu _ maligte te kayug _ .
tawani llu _ pinaghvig mi _ kiyang _ m atu m _ qiighqagh m _ qawaag a _ kaat quute te kayug _ .
alpa eng _ unake aqe aat _ qawaagniigh luku _ .
unaangu pigte luku _ ug ani _ singikrag mi _ suk ilp aq ulghii _ pi aqe kangat _ , _ ighi n Ê¼gh anillu _ whan ikumi _ .
amiiragh a _ tamaa tu m _ qawaag m _ atkugkagh u luku _ peg t iir ak igal kangat _ , _ alpa _ , _ ngelqagh _ , _ sukilpagh _ , _ ila i llu _ .
kiwani _ naayghagh mi _ uzive yaaghte nghaani _ tawani _ an nav ag luku _ pikayug _ .
uugtekayug _ ighivg agh millu _ , _ unaangu luku llu _ .
ategh kek _ ighivg aay aan kunguut _ , _ un aay aankuk _ .
naputuqagh _ naayghagh _ teskiwna _ anag vag vig meng _ , _ ategh i _ napu t _ .
aywaa neng llu _ i kev agh mengllu _ napu leg _ , _ emta _ pinigh llegh i _ sivulii yug te kaqe ait _ anuqe _ pin in Ê¼gh anillu _ .
tamaa na _ anag vag ni uq _ teghig nagh pigte uq _ liite lghii ni _ an av ag meng _ .
enkaam _ an av ag y aq _ uglagh u pigte aqe uq _ .
Ugl aaghin Ê¼ghani _ qagugh ak _ kiyang _ nukalpigagh _ tamaavek _ teng Ê¼gh un iq utaq elghii _ .
uglagh luku _ qagugh ak _ unake nghmegteggu _ kagpag kayug at _ kiyang _ ighaluqi luku _ pi aqe kangat _ .
Igh al uq ameng _ ategh ke ut _ tamaakut _ mesiigh kun _ kanaghtekagh t _ .
tawaten _ ila a _ neqe m _ kag pal gha _ ayuqe lghii _ tamaani _ neghigh luku _ .
nani _ tamaani _ elte nagh vig mi _ qagugh ak _ ighn in Ê¼ghani _ agavek _ pennagh nun _ angyagh meng _ manig yagh te kayug _ megh _ pin in Ê¼ghani _ , _ alpa m _ manig anun _ , _ amalleqa _ agavek _ nunivag mun _ kiyang _ piyug meng _ pi aqe ut _ met gh aam _ saam _ manig anun _ ila i _ .
sukilpagh m llu _ manig anun _ k ig w avek _ naayghagh mun llu _ manig yagh aqe lghiit _ ama _ .
tamaani _ salin _ qawaagniighusigh _ allgegh l aall ghi lluku _ neghigh luku _ tea- ma kut _ atugh aqe kangit _ negaghagh t _ , _ suqagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ metghagh mete te _ atugh t _ .
tamaakut _ sukilpagh mun _ atugh t _ ategh ke ai _ qitavestaagh t _ , _ naghuyagh mun _ enkaam _ atugh t _ maklegsagh meng _ ategh leg t _ , _ enkaam _ ngelqagh mete te _ atugh t _ ategh ke ai _ ayengqeghragh t _ .
ama _ tamaakut _ kuuvragh meng _ ategh leg t _ ulima llegh i _ negaghpag stun _ ayuq ek an it _ teghiglug mun _ naapte luki _ pi sigh t _ .
enkaam _ llangaqa _ unange ni uq _ teghig mun _ aghsaan _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ kiig mi _ iwernga _ ila i _ nunaagh meggnun _ aglagh uute aqe lghiit _ kiyang _ unatagh anun llu _ .
nunivag anun _ , _ uqfigagh anun _ sa mun llu _ unatagh m _ ila anun _ .
sa u a _ atughqagh _ sa mun _ unaghsigh _ angwaaghute kaghqagh _ , _ yaavuquute kaghqagh _ , _ ivagh aqe kangat _ sa mun llu _ ila anun _ atughqagh _ .
quugkagh meng llu _ quug meng _ qerngughte i aqe luteng _ mayughtagh ke luki _ qerngagh ita _ .
kiig mi _ nun aagh melnguut _ yug t _ kiyang _ unange na i aaghet _ neghsagh meng _ , _ qawaag meng llu _ .
sa mun _ tamaavek _ pi vik eg llagh akun _ nun aang lagh aqelghiit _ kiyang _ .
samavek llu _ uughqa nun _ iqall iyagh aqelghiit _ .
kiilqusigh _ iqallug eng _ naapte aqe kangat _ tesamani _ naayvaghllag mi _ .
W e ku llu _ kuml ayagh tun Ê¼ghani _ uteghnigh uute aqe lghiit _ .
teskiwavek _ kangii nun _ angyagh meng _ itghagh luteng _ tes ki wh ken _ saghya eng _ , _ angyagh t llu _ teve te qugh luki _ qaqlungighig nun _ teve aqe lghiit _ naayvaghllag mun _ .
U kum llu _ uughqa n _ meghe a _ pin in Ê¼ghani _ taakwagun _ angyagh meng _ pikayug u ut _ qagi ite nghaani _ .
pugughileghmii t llu _ taakut _ avelghagh igate ngugh t _ kiig ta a _ kiyang _ tam agh aan _ teskiwavek _ pikayug t _ iqallugagh nun _ w ek u _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ ngelqagh u aghagh niigh nghmeng _ .
iqalliniighvig _ ategh leg _ , _ egkugh a _ tespagna _ , _ tapghaaghagh llu _ , _ aghvigh tek llu _ qupnegh niigh vig t _ , _ taanegna _ ket ligh neq _ iqallupig niigh vig _ .
enkaam _ tespamna _ nuna meng _ ategh leg _ kiig w t aghniigh vik _ .
ukani _ tamaa na _ iqallug _ pi igate yaghpete aat _ tamaani _ , _ wetku _ qantaghaqun _ pi yagute kau ut _ liite luku _ .
yeqay _ uukagh eng _ sighla tke ghllag kayugu aat _ nulugh luku _ kii p aghq en Ê¼ghani _ .
tamaa na llu _ kayu _ kiwani _ naayghagh m _ sivungagh ni _ pikayug at _ .
tawani _ uksaagh yagh tun Ê¼ghani _ amalleqa _ yuug _ qimugsigh qagh yu k _ yataaghqe te kayug _ , _ qamiye meng _ , _ qaghlu meng _ qimugsigh sighqagh meng _ sa meng llu _ ila aneng _ unang niigh mun _ atughqagh meng _ .
tamaani _ neghigh luku _ qamiye _ paaragh ite usagh lghii _ , _ taatghusigh ite usagh lghii _ .
qamiye mun _ taatghusigh at _ atugh it _ unaghsigh t _ tamaani _ ingleghagh t _ akule itgun _ asitmun _ ken Ê¼ gut kayuget _ , _ ategh ke ai _ yag aar in at _ .
talwa _ uyghiite ite ngugh t _ tamaani _ .
aghuliigh negh meggni _ taakut _ kagsagute teng _ qikmigh meng _ sivungagh kun _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
kagsagute t _ tamaakut _ qikmigh mun _ aghyuugh sigh u ut _ .

tawatete yagh lghii _ tamaani _ iglegh neq _ .
N A T E N G _ angyapig m _ ulu ii ma llegh i
Aku l k im _ apegh llegh a
ayumigh _ ulim gh usiq _ pinigh lghii _ maaten _ atugh ut _ aviite yagh lghii _ .
sa u a _ tam aaghh aan _ maani _ allgegh tekaq _ atuqe kaqe kangat _ sa ngllagh naqe negh meggni _ unangniighusigh _ tamaghhagh an _ ulim aper ug waagh luku _ pi aqe kangat _ tamaani _ .
angyaghtugh sigh t _ angyagh t _ tamaani _ atugh it _ ategh ke lghiit _ angyapig meng _ .
Tag tal ngi _ kiyang _ yuginagh _ itegagh _ siipngagh lghiit _ .
Iq e tul ngi _ kiyang _ yaagnegh stun _ iqetutka aqe ut _ .
mayughneghqagh _ , _ neghqwaaghtaghqagh _ esne mi _ ivagh luku _ pi aqe kangat _ angyat ngllagh naqe negh meggni _ .
tuquuqagh igh te luku _ nemegh perewaagh _ nemegh yaghqagh _ pi aqe kangat _ suq aghm em _ kelevekagh meng _ nemegh kete luteng _ .
enkaam _ saam nang illu _ angyagh m _ taklaghmete luki _ ulima aqe yagh kangit _ ayumigh _ .
I ngu sighluki _ tawaten _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ yuug _ aqume uute yaghqaa luku _ alla _ angyaleg _ angyalligh kun _ .
tamaakut _ aghnasaleg t _ uvineg kegtagh t _ amiiqagh u iqe ait _ amighqagh u luki _ angyagh mun _ .
sivuke luki _ kiighte luki _ niightugh kayug t _ meq en Ê¼ghata _ .
amigh i naqe negh meggni _ sivuke luki _ kenite aqe ait _ agh ing waagh esqelluki _ .
Maalgh u _ , _ pi nga yu _ tanpegh _ naama kayug _ angyagh mun _ amu i luni _ kiyang _ .
uyguragh anun _ qiipagh t _ kaki sigh t _ ategh ke ai _ tea-si sigh t _ ivalu meng _ ulimaagh it _ pi aghte luteng _ .
angyagh mun _ amu i luki _ aghnasaleg t _ liisima kangit _ mulu neghtuqagh t _ ugi neng _ , _ saama _ uvineg kegte yu i magh meng _ .
ugi t _ tamaa kun Ê¼nguq _ ataasi ghaghmeng _ ayum iq uk ayug uftut _ , _ imange yuguma magh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
angyagh m _ amu i _ tamaani _ talwa _ piin eq iig as aq angit _ .
enkaam _ pi nga yu _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ amu i nguq _ simigh yaghqaaghtekayugu ut _ .
saamkut _ ku yaag it _ aghu kayug t _ , _ saama llu _ uk i yug um agh tekayug et _ .
angyagh negh meggni _ igleghte te yu ait _ .
A ngwaagh meng _ , _ y aav uqu meng _ , _ telaananga meng llu _ .
siighnagh t _ kaki te uute luki _ telaananga ngllagh ma aqe kangit _ tamaani _ ayumigh _ .
sanqute t _ A Y V E GH N I I GH M U N
Qav algh aam _ apegh llegh a
sanqute t _ tamaakut _ unangniighusigh u ut _ teghig mun _ unÊ¼g ani _ kellii ni _ .
Taaku nguut _ awataghpag t _ , _ tapghagh at _ , _ uun Ê¼gh at _ , _ tuugkagh at _ .
qerngagh meng _ atigh llegh i _ â _ sanqute t _ â _ .
angyagh mi _ atugh t _ allakanigh u ut _ siku gni _ atugh neng _ .
U un Ê¼gh at _ unaghsigh u ut _ aghvinleg _ itegagh _ tag t atk elghiit _ angqaperugtekagh t _ iigge meng _ tugu yaghqaa luki _ .
iqug ani _ tugegh meng _ ategh leg t _ naangqugh t _ nuv ug yug tekat _ uug n angi _ peqigte luteng _ nemegh tke aat _ .
taakut _ tuug Ê¼gh et _ siku m _ um ut al ng anun _ esghaate yu i ut _ .
Un Ê¼g ani _ siku gni _ atu pig uu s _ tamaakut _ .
enkaam _ uun Ê¼gh am _ inglu an _ iqug ani _ , _ ategh i _ iqu uy at _ , _ tuugkagh ligh vig t _ .
ama _ tugute t _ peqigte luteng _ nemegh ke aat _ suqagh meng _ kel ev ngwaaq ameng _ .
I qu uy am _ uug n angi _ kepe negh kegtagh t _ qukagh i _ igarutaagh lleg leg t _ giimagh mun _ nekegte vig t _ .
taakut _ giimagh t _ kilg aan lenguut _ tapghagh ghhagh meng _ nuuve luteng _ qukagh megteggun _ ayuqe ut _ .
tapghi a _ uun Ê¼gh akun _ nemegh tke aat _ naten _ entaqun _ th re e _ inches _ tag k alghiit _ , _ iqug i _ nuv ug yug lluteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
inglu i _ iqu uy akun _ aate stekayug t _ , _ inglu i _ tuugkagh kun _ aate stekayug t _ .
A ates legh iini _ giimagh m _ tapghi a _ neng qeng ngwaagh aqut _ .
wetku _ naghullgute lghii ni _ il ef kagh agh tekayug et _ .
taakut _ giimagh m _ tapghi a _ ategh lgu ut _ aaghsi meng _ .
enkaam _ taam _ aaghsi m _ uun Ê¼gh amun _ nemegh llegh m _ siipnegh i _ taak egh pag gaat _ ama _ atugh u ut _ , _ ategh ke ai _ qalu ukut _ .
taakut _ tuugkagh m _ nuvug i _ savigtagh leg t _ , _ inglu i _ igarutaagh ke aat _ giimagh m _ inglu an _ nuvug a _ itegh yaghqaa luku _ tawavek _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ tuug kaam _ kiw akagh aan ilnguq _ tapghagh _ taana _ tuug kaam _ up- yu aatagh a _ , _ ukimallegh akun _ nuuve tke aq _ ategh a _ tukaghsiigh u uq _ .
En Ê¼ ng at all _ taana _ tukaghsiigh mun _ uyiigh _ q illgh unnaq eg kuni _ , _ qapruute u uq _ ategh a _ .
tapghagh m _ uygu te llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ taawanginaq _ maalgh uneng _ nuuve te luteng _ .
tukaghsiigh m _ amalleqa _ uygu te llegh i _ taakut _ estu tete lugh qugh luteng _ kipullegmun _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
sanqute t _ ulima kumeng _ tuugkagh _ aate ste luku _ neng lluku _ uteghmun _ aaghsi kun _ nuuve te luku _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ qaluuku meng _ uyiigh _ awatghute luku _ aaghsi kun _ taana _ nuuve te luku _ ataasigh meng _ nusugteqagh igh luku _ q illgh usaghq aq _ .
aga _ ay veg h _ naghulleg kuni _ uun Ê¼gh aq _ aga _ mayugh yaghqagh _ uyiigh mete ghngaaghmi _ puglegh yaghqagh _ n ar an Ê¼ ghilnguq _ nuqutuqagh _ .
taawa _ taaku nguut _ ayvegh niigh sigh t _ sanqute t _ .
taakut _ giimagh t _ n af llu ug ut _ , _ ayvegh mun _ itegh qaghtekuni _ tuugkagh _ , _ una _ uun Ê¼gh aq _ ullegh kuni _ aga _ iteme yaghqagh _ .
En kaam am _ qaagh i _ , _ taakut _ nuv uk rug melnguut _ qilleghnegh ghhagh t _ estullugnegh u ut _ ategh i _ .
taaggun _ iq uk rug ikun _ ukite luki _ nuuve te luki _ neng lluki _ , _ eggmagh luki _ , _ taakut _ iqukrug i _ q illegh tepig meng _ qilleghte yaghqagh t _ .
estullugnegh u ut _ ategh i _ .
kiiwhkut _ kangii ut _ , _ kangigh tem meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ , _ tuugkagh m _ kiw akagh aan ilnguq _ tapghagh _ taana _ tuugkagh m _ up- yu aatagh a _ , _ tuugkagh at qun _ ukimallegh leg t _ , _ taaggun _ tapghagh ghhagh t _ nuuve te luki _ , _ tukaghsiigh u ut _ ategh i _ .
sanqute i _ A GH V E GH N I I GH E M
Qav algh aam _ apegh llegh a
tamaakut _ whaa _ aghveghqutagh ke aqe kangit _ tuugkagh ghllag t _ , _ aghvegh qut aan Ê¼ ghi sagh tut _ .
ighlleghute u na iqe ait _ , _ ighlleghute meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
elngaatall _ aghvegh qut an Ê¼nguq _ esgh h a _ taakut _ uyghag t _ , _ ighlleghute m _ savigtigh a _ .
tuugkagh at qun _ giimagh lgu lghiit _ whaa _ kingu liigh aam _ tuugkagh i _ sav ik en Ê¼gh aaghmeng _ .
ighlleghute u ut _ tuugkagh ghllag t _ taakut _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ uyghag t _ ugmestaaghhagh t _ aghveghqutagh u ut _ .
ukimallegh llgagh u aqe ut _ ila i _ .
Siv uyag tem _ quunpeng _ na sa mi _ nungighte nga kete te _ petug luki _ , _ unÊ¼g aani _ .
N eleg tengngwaagh penaki _ whavek _ ighlleghute mun _ , _ sig iq nayuk am iki _ kelenga ke m _ angtale aneng _ .
wetku _ whaa _ aghvegh meng _ pi naqe negh meggni _ nelegte luki _ pikayug u ait _ .
enkaam _ taakwegkut _ ighlleghute m _ kiw akagh aan ilnguut _ amalka _ giimagh ghllag u ut _ , _ kuukegh u na iqe ait _ .
Ang tugh pin Ê¼ ghagh llaget _ nuvug yugsaghkagh t _ whavek _ ighlleghute m _ tun ut anganun _ .
K uuk et _ amalka _ tungu i _ .
amenqun _ saveg t _ maakut _ tungig leg t _ .
tamaa na u ut _ .
kuukegh u na iqe ait _ .
elngaatall _ uniilliighaghte yu aqe aat _ tu kagh te s _ taakut _ .
Pegh ng aghmeng _ nuuve te luteng _ taaggun _ , _ pegh ng aghllag meng _ tuteg te luteng _ kakitu tke aat _ saviigagh t _ maklag t _ tap ghagh rak aaq egkangit _ maaten _ .
kingwaagh u ut _ ategh i _ .
taakut _ tu kagh tengu f tun Ê¼nguq _ tawaten _ tuteg tke aat _ uniilliighaghte yaghkagh t _ awataghpag mun _ taaleg mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ ku keg mun _ tawavek _ aate ste luku _ , _ taaggun _ putu luteng _ keniqaate lgu na iqe ai _ , _ amalka _ tekeghmigute stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
U un Ê¼gh aam _ ila i _ tekeghmigute lgu ut _ .
elngaatall _ uglagh te luki _ neng lluki _ tawavek _ keniqaate mun _ aate sqe aghte aqe ait _ , _ uglagh te luki _ neng lluki _ .
elngaatall _ quunpeng _ taakut _ taawa _ tawan taqut _ u pen Ê¼gh al qusiq _ .
ayag mun _ tawavek _ kumlu mun _ nemegh tekagh mun _ aate ste nghmegteki _ uglagh te luki _ , _ taawa _ quunpeng _ n elg aqut _ p es kug sig atut _ , _ quunpeng _ tawan taqut _ .
quunpeng _ kete negh meggni _ , _ saa vg um iigh waagh luteng _ amalka _ , _ taawa _ taakut _ quunpeng _ aate z ngalghiit _ ayag mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
taake uk _ elngaatall _ tukagh tek _ kangigh leg t _ , _ taaleg mun _ tukagh tek _ ilate te lutek _ amenqun _ aw at ii teg nekun _ ilate luteng _ q illgh ut kayuget _ .
Aw at it nguut _ .
Taam _ kingu u i aghagh a _ tapghagh _ taana _ , _ taana _ tapghaghrag _ , _ tapghaghrag meng _ ategh leg _ , _ un kuuv ak _ .
miglegrungigh u yagh ghngaaghmi _ qukiinaani _ .
miglegrungigh at _ elngaatall _ ayvegh _ aghn aagh an Ê¼ ghh aagh ll uk _ , _ taghnughh ang en Ê¼ ghh aghll uk _ miglegrungigh _ .
tamaa na u yagh ghngaan _ qukiinaani _ tap ghagh rangll aagh aqut _ keleve luki _ two _ and _ a _ h al f _ inches _ esl egk ak iita _ .
tapghaghrag meng _ elngaatall _ aat qu s _ tamaakut _ unkuvag t _ , _ miglegrungigh at _ .
taaggun _ ineqerewaagh m _ kenle akun _ umu llegh akun _ uziftagh ke ait _ .
elngaatall _ taakut _ ki waa kagh ii _ tapghagh at _ , _ pi nga yug u lghiit _ ayumigh m _ awataghpag i _ .
kingwaagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ elngaatall _ maklag t _ , _ saviigagh u yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ meqesigh kaayagh ghngaaghmeng _ .
kingwaagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ kingwaagh u ut _ .
unkuvag t _ en Ê¼ ngaatall _ tapghaghrag u ut _ ategh i _ .
taakut _ awatagh paag et _ .
Sivuq ligh pii gaq _ aange lghii _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ amsakelghii _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ q azig yagh aayagh ng aghmi _ qukiinaani _ , _ kingwaagh _ .
taaleg _ , _ Aku ul a _ , _ kingwaagh _ .
taaleg u ut _ siv uq ligh pii gaat _ taakut _ .
U ugh qw aag et _ , _ aghsaan _ aang ep agll an Ê¼ ghilnguut _ .
tegag staghhiinagh t _ awataghpi aqe ait _ kiyang _ .
iitek _ aghnagh t llu _ awataghpi aqe ait _ amle i _ taakut _ qagh r il ghagh luki _ .
qaghrilghagh at _ ilaagh sigh t _ unaghsigh t _ iim lluteng _ esneghrug i _ .
enkaam _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ kaki luki _ esneghrug i _ uzimun _ tawavek _ amalka _ ilaagh mun _ kumyugte aqe ait _ esneghrug i _ qamagun _ qu ligh negh ikun _ .
elngaatall _ nem gh aq ii s _ taaku ngi _ iime negh kun _ taaggun _ .
qaghrilghagh m _ esneghrug a _ uzimun _ iimnga lghii _ .
asighte aqe ait _ taaggun _ neng lluki _ .
Q agh r il gh aag us _ taakut _ .
enkaam _ qepe luki _ inglugtun _ pu tuk gh i _ itegagh an _ qevuute luki _ neng lluki _ tawaten _ .
amenqun _ naflugh ghhagh a _ pu tuk gh an _ .
K iw akagh aakun _ qepute aqe ait _ pu tuk gh i _ inglugtun _ enkaam _ uulte negh meggni qun _ sa squghhagh u aqe lghiit _ .
El tuq sam aghmeng _ ayuqe ut _ .
taakut _ ama _ sanqute meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
ayumigh m _ eghqwaagh llegh a llu _ , _ eghqwaagh sagh a llu
Ap ang al uum _ apegh llegh a
kitum _ igleghte te lleqe agu _ ayumigh m _ yupig ita _ eghqwaagh llegh a _ ?
maalghug u uk _ , _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ allake te lghiit _ sivunegh leg t _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ ramke t _ .
ataasigh t _ taakut _ pugughileghmii t _ .
ila i _ sivun Ê¼ ghita _ ategh i _ aymaramket _ .
paamken _ ungazigh meng _ pi ut _ , _ qerng aghllag meng _ nenglu t _ qerng agh melnguut _ iimken _ sivunegh meggneng _ ima _ ataasigh mi _ ne mi _ .
sanighmelngughmii t _ ategh it _ .
nenglu it _ taw aaten _ sani qligh ke te ghllag luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ nekeg neghi _ .
taakut _ ategh it _ , _ ramke t _ ilakwaagh ke te lghiit _ paamken _ tagikagh t _ , _ maani _ kingun Ê¼ ghit _ whaa _ kiyaghte ut _ , _ talwa _ angyaleg itnun _ atigh te luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
ila i _ taakut _ ramke t _ ategh i _ nangupagaghmii t _ .
nenglullug it _ ama _ qaye ii llegh ni _ ayumightagh t _ qerng agh melnguut _ nenglu t _ .
ayumigh _ tamaakut _ yug t _ liisimake kangat _ naten _ eghqwaagh llegh llu _ , _ sa meng llu _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh meng _ , _ qerngughte i llegh m llu _ iglegh negha _ .
ataasigh meng _ ay uum iqu llegh ni _ eghqwaagh kayug t _ naate yagh aq _ kaate nghaani _ .
laluramke t _ â _ moon _ worship _ â _ - ngun iiq egkangat _ , _ teme igh u u uq _ .
whaten _ Ay maa ram ket _ pikayug u ut _ eghqwaagh naqe negh meggni _ : _ us aa _ taana _ u pen Ê¼gh aa _ tamaghhagh an _ pangeghtekau yu k _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh leg nun _ , _ quyngigh m _ tunugh anun llu _ qilu anun llu _ .
tamaakut _ qerngughte luki _ kag paag aqluki _ kiig negh ke aat _ .
amalleqa _ nunivag meng _ awataghpag kun _ kagpag i kayugu ut _ .
uteghnigh nghmini _ tes p amken _ uukagh meng _ nefku kayug _ eghqwaagh mun _ atughqagh meng _ .
salngag t llu _ tawaqa t _ , _ nalighmeng _ tawaqapig meng _ pamaken _ atghagh te kayug _ .
aghvenge ma negh meggni _ , _ ataasigh t _ awataghpag t _ mangtag meng _ imigh luki _ siqlugagh mun _ kan ag taqluki _ .
tamaa na _ neqe _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh _ kagpag kayugu aat _ kenle aanga _ taw aa vek _ aghnegh anun _ eghqwaagh vigkagh mun _ , _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ nazighaghsigh mi _ , _ kergamqun _ nutaghagh _ tanqigh _ piite nghaani _ .
Taam _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ Pii f qem meng _ ategh leg _ .
tawani _ taana _ angyaleg _ eghqwaagh mun _ igleghte te i ste u aqe uq _ .
nulighh a _ taana _ angyaleg m _ sa meng _ akuute yaghqagh meng _ akuute qugh aqe uq _ .
ayvegh m _ uqugh an _ mesiigh i _ akuute sagh igh kaqe ai _ nun iiv ag mun _ , _ tunu meng _ ila luki _ .
qamagte lutek _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aatkagh meng _ , _ eghqwaagh em _ aate te kaghqagh aneng _ aate yaghqagh k _ .
wetku _ tawaninginaq _ aate yaghqagh t _ .
Tamaa kun Ê¼nguq _ ateghagh m _ aate kaqe ai _ .
ateghagh naqe negh meggni _ aate kayug it _ .
aghneq _ ataasigh _ yataaghqe te kaqe aat _ , _ neqe _ sa u a _ apeghiigh tegh r aa negh megteggu _ .
unaghsigh kun _ sagnegh kun _ neqe _ qamagte luku _ qantagh tegh luku _ nategh m _ qukaa kun _ qerngagh ita _ lli luki _ , _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ qavaghtaghkagh it _ .
tawani _ unugmi _ taam _ angyaleg m _ qafsina t _ ilagaate t _ atugh aqe ai _ tamaa v eng inaq _ pi sigh t _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ tamaakut _ .
nangllegsiisigh t _ .
taagken _ unaangu pigte luku _ aght aagh aq est aq _ maligte luku _ angyagh m _ yug an _ neng llu ugu te teng _ ila ke luki _ atghagh uute aqe ut _ tamaaken _ sagnegh meng _ tugumiigh iigh uute luteng _ , _ kanavek _ angyilghagh nun _ .
taagken _ angyagh _ angyilghagh neng _ ateghte luku _ , _ taakut llu _ neqe t _ qaake luki _ angyagh mun _ , _ kan aa vek _ ken ii legh nun _ angyagh _ atghagh te aqe aat _ .
Taw aani _ kenilegh ni _ aghuliigh luteng _ utaqa i aqe ut _ siqinegh _ piite neghsigh aqe aat _ .
whaa _ siqinegh _ pii tek es tan Ê¼ghani _ naayghagh m _ qaye aneng _ , _ angyaleg m _ tamaa na _ sagnegh _ llilaghtugh ste aqe a _ anigu m _ qaye akun _ , _ taagken _ tamaaken _ sagnegh m _ imaa neng _ tugu tete lugh aqe luni _ eghqwaagh aqe uq _ .
eghqwaagh negh meggni _ tugu tete lugh luteng _ taanÊ¼g avek _ megh mun _ milugh utu te kete luku _ sa meng _ akuzimleghagh magh meng _ man iig uu tu simeng _ , _ igamsiqa yug magh meng _ ag um _ ayumiqullegh m _ tunugh u sagh aneng _ pi aqe ut _ .
tawaten _ eghqwaagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ angyaleg _ , _ tawaqa t llu _ iingunagh ita _ megh mun _ miluute luki _ piiq egkaa ngi _ taakut _ yug t _ negh esqell u uki _ .
tawani _ ken ii legh ni _ neghe uute ghllag kayugu ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ tagi lghii _ elngaatall _ negh sqe aqe aat _ .
taana _ llangaqa _ eghte qugh u aagh _ nangllegsiisigh u uq _ ama _ ig am siq aayug uus iiguq _ .
tanqigh mun _ man iig uu tus iin Ê¼ ghituq _ , _ taawanginaq _ taana _ tanqigh m _ piite yuwhaagh llegh a _ iiskughte aqe aat _ tawan igh llu ugw aaq _ ay uum iqu llegh mi _ pi na luteng _ .
nangllegsiisigh _ uum un _ u pen Ê¼gh aam _ neqnigh u llegh a _ pilaataqu sqellug qu _ .
taakut _ pugughileghmii t _ ramke it _ eghqwaagh kayugu ut _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ Ll uugh vig mi _ , _ amalleqa _ tawaten _ tanqigh _ piin Ê¼gh aaluku _ .
tawaten _ ama _ neqe _ iing ke rugllak _ negh yug naq _ qerngughte luku _ pikayug t _ .
taawanginaq _ taa kun Ê¼nguq _ pugughileghmii t _ , _ ilakwaagh ke te ii na lghiit _ eghte qugh u aagh mi _ negh te kayugu ut _ .
alla t _ pi igate ut _ .
taakut _ ila i _ ramke t _ , _ nangupagaghmii t _ , _ eghqwaa qay uug uftut _ tawani _ teghiglugsigh mi _ tawaten _ tanqigh _ piite nghaani _ .
alngunak _ kina _ negh yaghtuqagh yu k _ tawani _ egh qw aan Ê¼ghata _ .
tamaa na _ angyaleg _ eghqwaagh qagh yu k _ qamag g luni _ ateghagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luni _ pikayug _ .
temngi _ alla _ aate igate te ait _ , _ iwerngaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ wetku _ aate kayug it _ .
E GH Q W AA LL Q E M _ yataaghqe llegh
Pel aa sim _ apegh llegh a
ila a _ nefkuuragh meng _ eghqwaagh u sqe kayug _ .
Ap r il - er ug llagmun _ ilangakun _ kaate stekayugu ait _ .
Ll uugh vig mi _ eghqwaagh kayug t _ .
whangkuta _ nazighaghsigh mi _ , _ ilangani _ F eb ru ar y -mun _ kaat ngwaagh umaan _ , _ ilangani _ J an u ar y- m _ naange nghaani _ .
amenqun _ kalanta ni _ tanqigh t _ ne w _ mo on -et _ alngunak _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
tanqigh pig kun _ ayuqe lghiit _ whangkuta _ .
piite ghesnagh nghata _ , _ sivulii lghii ni _ eghqwaagh yaghagh aqe lghii ni _ .
ataasigh u yagh na iqe aat _ angyagh _ tazimani _ , _ enkaam _ aafte lghiit _ tawaten _ legan _ ataasigh _ uspeqe llegh _ .
taana _ Qu waa r en _ allakanigh _ .
saki mini _ key- aghtekau uq _ , _ enkaam _ saki mitun _ pillgha _ ayuqe uq _ .
At ayagh aankut _ , _ P us aankut _ ata at _ .
whangkuta _ Ang q ateng an w at enkut _ taakut _ sivul iiw aqut _ qayughllak _ ig whani _ entaqun _ Pel aasi ngu may aghtuq _ ataasigh u luteng _ angyagh t _ .
taagken _ ugl aaghi y ameng _ entaqun _ tegh leg nge a _ lli aqe aq _ .
enkaam _ taana _ Qu waa r in llu _ aaftekagh _ .
enkaam _ eghqwaagh llegh it _ tawaten _ , _ whangkuta _ pi yagute yamta _ maaten _ Ang q ateng an w an _ taana _ sivul iiw aqelghii _ .
whangkuta _ , _ P us aankut _ , _ U w etel en _ , _ kingu lighh a _ angyaleg _ , _ qilleghte uute te _ taana _ angy alg ugh tengng an _ eghqwaagh kayugu ste luku _ .
P us aam _ kinguligh u ste luku _ pika qaa _ .
ataasigh t _ negh kestagh u kut _ eghqwaagh sagh ke aqe ut _ .
aghvenge lghii ni _ mangtag meng _ .
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ tamaa na _ ategh qugh luku _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh _ aghneghmi _ , _ Pii f qem meng _ ategh leg _ .
aavgugh qagh yu k _ mangtag meng _ mangtag lgu negh mta _ avegtugh magh an _ , _ uukagh _ aavgugh luku _ , _ pellug magh emta _ nunivag meng _ .
uqughqagh meng llu _ ayveghagh lghii ni _ saghna aqe lghiikut _ .
kapeghte i luteng _ uqingllagh magh meng _ .
tawaqa _ aavgugh magh an _ .
uukagh _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh stun _ , _ pugnegh iigh magh meng _ .
pugnegh t _ mekestaaghhagh u aqe ut _ .
paamken _ atghagh tke aat _ mekestaaghhaa lghiit _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ kagpag luki _ , _ unaami _ nighugte nghaani _ angyagh t _ ateghte luki _ , _ awataghpag t _ , _ tap ghagh rag es _ tawaten _ angyagh naqe lghii stun _ .
sagnegh t _ neqe t _ aqf aaq egg keput _ tawaten _ angyagh naqe lghii stun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh te luki _ .
siqinegh _ piite neghsigh aqe aat _ eghqwaagh gpenateng _ wiin _ .
igaghyagh kayugu luta _ utaqa i te kete luku _ kayag g negh inkut _ qaprag aqe lghiikut _ , _ mayughaate aqe lghiikut _ vuuslegh nun _ .
siqinegh _ piite kestagh nghaani _ , _ esnevagh u qugh luki _ megh m _ esne anun _ , _ eghqwaagh luten _ , _ eghqwaagh luteng _ , _ taaqe negh meggni _ , _ pell u umegh tat _ , _ pugnegh t _ aavg ugh waaghluki _ .
mangtag _ avegtugh aq _ sagneghnite aqe lghii _ .
tunuvagh te luki _ neghe uute ghllag kayug ni _ esnagh a mi _ .
taawa _ kiyang _ al ngun a g _ naken _ negh yagh qagh yu k _ .
yuggagh t _ agigte lghiit llu _ , _ nagun _ , _ apagh aatagh luki _ negh esqelluki _ .
taawa _ mangtag lgu lghii ni _ , _ kiyang _ mangtag meng _ negh aqe ut _ .
Neq niigh qwaagh llak ayuget _ whangkunni _ aghyugh negh meggni _ .
Aw atagh pag melnguut _ neqnigh tu s _ taawa _ .
enkaam _ taaqe negh mta _ taglagh luteng _ , _ angyagh t llu _ qaake luki _ apeghiigh luki _ .
tamaa na _ awite qugh luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uukagh t _ ilate katen _ legan _ tugulagh aqe kangit _ .
A av gugh tegh luku _ tea- magh an _ uukagh _ , _ nunivag llu _ , _ aavgugh magh an _ mangtag _ .
awalightugh aqe lghiit _ , _ mangteghagh _ qamagte luku _ awalightugh aqe kangat _ .
enkaam _ im iis al ik _ , _ sa meng _ amiiragh _ , _ sa u a _ al ngu un ak _ ulimasigh _ .
whangkuta _ pinegh meggni _ walamnaag _ sa u a _ igarutaagh _ .
aghnagh t _ ighneghllug _ , _ sa u a _ amiiragh _ .
Im iis aper uw aal ek _ .
taawa _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ eghqwaagh em _ negh kanga _ tamaa na _ negh y uuk ayug a _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ whangkuta _ qamagte luten _ ila put _ kayusigh aqe luki _ ayuqe lghii ni _ eghqwaagh naq enghata _ .
kayu siightu tete luta _ qerngughte te aqe luta _ ayuqe lghii ni _ .
aamta _ ila i _ negh y iigal ngu us _ talwa _ , _ negh ka ite ngugh t _ nunivag g aghmeng _ legan _ eghqwaagh tke kayug t _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ pugughileghmii neng _ ategh leg t _ u kuta _ qasiqagh meng _ pikayug u ma ut llu _ , _ nunivag _ , _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ , _ ila i _ ququngagh raaghinagh ghhagh meng _ .
Ll uugh v ir ug llagmi _ wetku _ ila i _ eghqwaagh te kayug t _ U w al iit _ , _ Pugughilegh m iis taakut _ , _ akule ke inkut _ , _ Sul uug enkut _ , _ Tem ker uun kut _ taakut llu _ ifkaghte te u uq _ liite yama _ angyaleg _ , _ tamlu m _ ata a _ .
Ll uugh vig mi _ ama _ eghqwaagh kayugu ut _ .
entaqun _ ququng agh mengllu _ , _ tunguuya meng llu _ kineghkagh meng _ eghqwaagh tke ut _ .
ivaghullug _ I L A G AA T
Pel aa sim _ apegh llegh a
Ighivg an Ê¼ghani _ , _ eghqwaagh em _ el ag aatangi _ taakut _ atugh aqe ait _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ angyaleg t _ taakut _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ .
El ng at aal l _ , _ repall _ tu saq nap angun ateng llu _ .
Nangll eg sim _ angtalanganeng _ , _ wata _ eghqwaagh llegh mi _ tawani _ nanglleg naghsagh pigte luteng _ ilagagh negh meggni _ iglag teng _ qugh agh teghllag luk ii _ pi aqe kangit _ .
Nangll eg sim _ angtalanganeng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Uuk naa - aa- aa ngu u- uuq _ .
Saam naa - aa- aa ngu u- uuq _ ,
T agl alghii - ii- ii _ s aa- aam n aa _ .
ketangaa- u an _ aghveghaa- a _ s aa- aam naa -aa
Aghv el egg lag uu- uu- l ii _ .
Ellng all uu- uu- uu _ .
Qag im aa _ ilug an ii- ii- ii _ .
Uk naa - aa- aa ngu u- uuq _ .
Saam naa - aa- aa nguuq _ ,
Ket ang aa- aa- aan _ ayveghaa- a _ s aa- aam na _ .
Aghv el egll aag ul uu- uu- l ii
El ng aa- aa- aall uu- uu ngu - uuq
Qag im aa _ ilug an ii- ii- ii _ .
Uuk naa - aa- aa ngu u- uuq _ .
Saam naa - aa- aa ngu u- uuq

ketangaa- u an _ makl aq aa- aa- aa nguuq _ .

A GH V E GH N I I GH E M _ P I LL GH I
Pel aa sim _ apegh llegh a
taawa _ enkaamngam _ angyaghnagh llegh mun _ tawavek _ .
aghvenge negh meggni _ avii kayug t _ , _ â _ W u-h u-h u-h uum eng _ ! _ â _ ayuqe ut _ avii s _ tamaakut _ .
aquutagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te luki _ , _ angyapig m _ aquutagh i _ .
Kel gut ngu f tun Ê¼nguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nus un Ê¼ghata _ aga _ aghveqe luki _ .
enkaam _ tuqute nghata _ wiin _ angyagh _ awillaghate te luni _ .
uzive luki _ kaspugte lghii ni _ avii kayug t _ w u-h u-h u-h uum eng _ ayuqe ut _ .
enkaam _ taa qen ghata _ tagi laghate te luni _ qepghagh aqe ait _ .
ila i _ kaal gugh naq enghata _ kaal gu ut aghq aa meng _ , _ ikute magh meng _ mangtag meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
awataghpag ightugh luku _ sivul ighnegh i kunllu _ , _ kingu nge i kete te llu _ .
enkaam _ ghhatagh luteng llu _ igleghte negh meggni _ aga _ angyagh m _ yug a _ qamagte luni _ avii kayug _ w u-h u-h u-h uum eng _ .
qukaghite lghii ni llu _ , _ whaa _ tamlag yaghtugh lghii ni llu _ avii aqe lghiit _ .
taawa _ qepghagh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ kaat ute te nghata _ taakut _ angyaleg t _ mangtag meng _ pi luteng _ awataghpag t _ imigh aqe kangit _ .
suqi a _ taakut _ inglu i _ sivuligh t _ iike yuggaagh t _ aghvenge lghii m _ qamagte luki _ pikayug u ai _ .
veghagh i llu _ taakut _ qamagte luki _ pikayug u ai _ .
inglu i _ suqagh n _ taakut _ angyagh mun _ all ghu ul egnun _ , _ pingay uul egnun _ , _ taakwavek _ in pi qu us gh aq aqiit _ .
siipnegh _ tamaa na _ suqagh _ siivanllegh nun _ in pi qu us gh aq aqaat _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ , _ angyaleg t _ elqiigh luteng _ ayuqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyaleg t _ kaate lghii ni _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ qepghagh llegh i _ aghvegh m _ , _ angyaleg m _ aa _ elqiigh uute luta _ sivuyag tetlu _ angyaleg t llu _ .
aquutagh t _ , _ qalugyagh t _ sivuyag tem _ tugu luki _ mangtag g aghmeng _ ikute luteng _ enkaam _ taglagh aqe ut _ .
A quut as taakut _ mangteghagh m _ sivugh u nga kete te _ qavighnga i ta _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
Qal ugy as _ taakut _ amig m _ aywaa kun _ asighte te aqe ait _ napagh ita _ .
enkaam _ nunivag t _ egsug i _ taakut _ ikute luteng _ peghu aqe lghiit _ , _ aghveng mun _ pi kaghqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ tugu luki _ , _ itghute luki _ , _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uglagh tal ng atuq _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ , _ q illegh teng ngu us _ taakut _ , _ taqughtekete te _ , _ qiiyngu t _ amenqun _ quyngigh m _ manu i _ melqughtuqagh t _ .
taagken _ ikute te luteng _ naten _ angka i ta _ petug kayugu ait _ .
aavgugh aqe ait _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uglaghtala atun _ , _ aghtequgh ligh luki _ , _ enkaam _ qaltaaghwagh ghhagh u ut _ .
qaltaaghwagh ghhagh t _ , _ unaghsigh t _ sa u aat _ , _ ila i _ suq aaw ut _ , _ tawavek _ kanaghte uute luki _ , _ megh meng _ ila aghte luki _ , _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ tugumiiqe luki _ atghagh aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ aquutagh t _ alla _ ila i _ , _ angy il gh anilnguut _ , _ taakut _ kel qelluki _ , _ uugte luteng _ , _ sivuyag tetlu _ , _ angyaleg t llu _ .
taakut _ aquutagh t _ angyaleg m _ atuqe luki _ , _ taakut _ angyaleg m _ nulighh i _ angyagh m _ sivuyag an _ kelu kaghagh ani _ , _ m allegh qeng ngwaagh aqiit _ angy as _ tawaten _ .
angyagh t _ wiin _ iggagte aatagh aqe ait _ tawaten _ tallim aneng _ iggagte aatagh luki _ av iin Ê¼ghata _ .
aquutagh teng _ qule mun _ nengug te nghatki _ , _ enkaam _ nulugh igh i te a _ taam _ qaltaaghwagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te aqe ait _ .
avii nghmeng _ taa qen gh aat a _ , _ enraq _ aghvigh lluki _ igg ag aatagh luteng _ .
tawaten _ ama _ inglu anun _ nengug te luki _ av iin Ê¼ghata _ , _ ama _ inglu aneng _ aghvigh lluki _ ama _ qaltaaghwagh teng _ nengug te aqe ait _ qule mun _ .
Av iit _ W u-h u-h u-h uu nguut _ ar at _ avii meng _ ategh leg t _ .
tawaten _ aviillegh _ W u-h u-h u-h u-h u-h uu _ pi aqe ut _ .

iike luki _ naten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ , _ mangtagtuumagh ita _ kiwavek _ nate rugllak _ tag k iita _ mangtag i _ .
N ef teg taq us _ tawaten _ .
taakut _ teghrughaagh t _ taagken _ qaltaaghwagh m _ megh aneng _ kuuve qaghte aghte aqe ait _ sivuke luki _ .
teghrughaagh t _ veghagh m _ iqug ke ai _ , _ iime qaghte luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
V iistun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Tegh rugh aagh us _ taakut _ .
qaltaaghwagh m _ megh aneng _ kuuve qagh qaghaqe ait _ sivuke luki _ enkaam _ taakut _ tuune aqe ait _ .

enkaam _ taa qen Ê¼ghata _ , _ puuskaate t _ aghnagh m _ ighu ita _ akul angii kun _ aghvequte aqe ait _ .

pi iigh aatagh kau unga _ .
puygu laatagh ma aqa _ whangkuta _ sivuke luku _ pillegh p us _ taana _ .
Aghn as _ tagi laghate te aqe lghiit _ ilagagh yagh ut _ .
ivi t _ , _ iv iigh un Ê¼ ghilnguut _ .
ivi u ut _ aghnagh t _ aqume uute luteng _ .
aqumutagh igh luki _ aquutagh m _ taam _ kelu kaghagh akun _ .
Taam _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ atghagh naqe lghii ni _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute i tete luki _ unite aqe ai _ enkaam _ taakut _ kingu itneng _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
nunanigh pigtu ut _ ilagaate t _ ig l ak g alek _ .
nalluke anka _ ilagaate t _ , _ liite mangite anka _ iv is _ tamaakut _ .
Ig g w aning in aat _ iv aagh ull uug et _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh luteng _ tawaten _ tagl an Ê¼ghata _ , _ angyagh t _ usingigh luki _ sayug luki _ kelevagh luki _ .

ivi igh ghllag kayugu luki _ .

Enkaangam _ angaghqugh te lghii _ yuug _ esghapag lghii ni _ nun m aag gaq _ , _ ila i _ qamugh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .

iglakegte pigte lghiit llu _ , _ aghnagh paget _ tamaakut _ ima _ mekelghiighh aa tem m neng _ .

nagate kanga _ tamaaken _ .

ataata ke luku _ whanga _ ayuqe aqa _ .
aghvenge neghtuqagh _ up on Ê¼gh aatanga _ kiyang _ .

Aghnagh paget _ iglag kegtagh ghhalek _ .
enkaam _ taaqe aqe ut _ angaghqugh nghmeng _ , _ apeghiigh nghata _ enkaam _ taagken _ enraq _ angyaleg m _ tugukagh mineng _ suqagh meng _ , _ kiyang _ aghnagh t _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ inpite qugh aqe ait _ suqagh meng _ .
enkaam _ inpite qugh nghmeng _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ , _ en ragh ngam _ angyagh m _ yug i _ nengigh te ste aqe ait _ .
tamaa na _ qamestagh _ , _ aghvegh m _ llaag i _ , _ talligh m _ nuvukrug i _ , _ veghagh m _ nuvukrug i _ , _ qengagh i _ , _ iye i _ , _ iye i _ ukut _ iy igh pig aat _ iike luki _ , _ qal taagh w agnun _ kanaghte luki _ petug kayugu ut _ .
taakut _ qamestagh t _ , _ taakut llu _ llaag t _ uy v as aghq en neghmeng _ apeghiigh aqe kangit _ .
nekegte luki _ tawaten _ taakut _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ taa qen Ê¼ghata _ qamestagh i _ taakut _ siqlugagh mun _ angaghqugh aqe ut _ , _ kan aghqugh aaqut _ sig lug aghm iig aqut _ .
enkaam _ tegh rugh waagh es _ taakut _ aghveghaqetagh kun _ pe tu w aqiit _ .

eghte qugh u aagh _ taana _ tanqigh mun _ pi ngun Ê¼ ghilnguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .

qerngughte i sigh _ taana _ , _ kiyang _ aghvegh _ taana _ angegh llegh u lghii _ unake naqe yaghqagh _ .
taakut _ amalka _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflenga kaqe kangit _ tunusagh u luki _ tukfigh sigh u luki _ .

apeghtughiste m _ tanqigh mun _ pillgh un iluki _ pi aqe kangi _ .
moon _ w or sh ip -meng _ ata iqe ai _ apeghtughiste mta _ whangkuta _ .

Pel aa sim _ apegh llegh a
taakut _ llaag t _ eghqwaagh naqe lghii ni _ keneligh luteng _ .
uksugh mi _ uqfigagh m _ tangigh llegh m _ qaam n angi _ am estaaghh aat _ , _ saghna aqe lghiit _ .

paneghte aqe kangit _ kenegh kun _ .

aamta _ qepghagh u ngugh lug ni _ qav an Ê¼ghani _ aghte negh ni _ , _ maalgh uneng _ ighivg aghni _ tawaten _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .

Tegh rugh aagh es _ taakut _ mangtag i _ uteghmun _ iike luki _ , _ taakut _ ken ghet _ kumagh lluki _ eghqwaagh aqlaatagh kangit _ tamaaken _ ggiillegh meng _ panegh qugh magh meng _ .
enkaam _ awatagh paag etlu _ ikugh aqe ut _ , _ aquutagh t llu _ taakut _ iike magh ita _ .

enkaam _ iye i _ taakut _ qageghte luki _ sa kun _ qalusiqagh kun _ sa kun _ sagnegh u aagh qun llu _ megh i _ taakut _ ila ke luki _ iye an _ megh i _ .
tamaa na _ ggiillegh m _ panellegh a _ akuute aqe aat _ mesiigh meng _ ila aghte luki _ ugl aaghi naluki _ akuute aqe ait _ .

qulighnegh i llu _ taakut _ ming ughh aqiit _ .

Pel aa sim _ apegh llegh a
enkaam _ angyagh uute luteng _ tawaten _ , _ angyagh naq _ kayaali nghaani _ enkaam _ taakut _ qamestagh i _ aqfa luki _ angaghqugh luki _ unaangu pigte luku _ siqinegh _ quulv aghq aaq es tan ghani _ p egg et _ sa u aat _ kayute kellug ke i _ ang aghqu mun _ .
enkaam _ ighleke aqe kangit _ , _ whangkuta qun _ kayute teng _ .
taakut _ ama _ tawaten _ uy v as aghq elget _ .
eghqwaagh qagh luteng _ ama _ tawaten _ , _ taawa _ apegh iin Ê¼ghata _ eghqwaagh nghmeng _ elngaatall _ pil iigh un neq egg s aat kayuk _ qamestagh m _ mangtag aneng _ .
aavgugh luki _ naten _ umu tate ke ii te a _ qamestagh m _ am estaa llghi _ , _ mangteghagh nun _ awaligh uute kaqe ait _ .
wetku _ tawani _ nengighqe aqe ait _ .
mangteghagh _ qamagte luku _ .
