imiisagh u ut _ akileghtuusagh t _ amalka _ .
aghnagh u aghagh aat _ sa meng _ neqe meng _ negh yug n ameng _ pi aqe luki _ , _ enkaam _ ayghigh luteng llu _ aw aaligh tugh naq aqelghiit _ .
taawa _ taa qen Ê¼gh aat a _ tegh ruugh aagh es _ taakut _ petug aqe lghiit _ aagra m _ qula akun _ .
A GH Q E S A GH T U M _ pi a
Pel aa sim _ apegh llegh a
enkaam _ angyagh naq _ kayaal in Ê¼ghani _ , _ enraq _ aghq es aghtu mun _ pikayug ni _ .
ila ke te lghii _ , _ kelgute te luta _ siivanllegh t _ , _ taakut _ aghvengekagh ni _ teghrughaagh t _ .
aghnagh t _ kelgugh luki _ qerngugh uluteng _ taglagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
qasiqagh m _ itegagh a _ , _ mangtag _ , _ aghn as _ tamaakut _ , _ mangtag _ agaghte i i ragh u aagh _ .
ila i _ nefkuuragh meng llu _ , _ tawaqa _ , _ quyngigh m llu _ tulimagh aneng _ pi ma aqe aat _ pam aaken _ atghagh tekagh meng _ .
Q is g eng ankut _ , _ Anagh as uug enkut _ , _ W iy allu _ taana _ pikayug _ iknaqe llegh a _ umiileg _ .
enkaam _ kumagh lluteng _ ungagagh meng _ qiigh aqe luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ â _ A asiv aas aam na _ taa _ , _ â _ sivun Ê¼gh et _ tuqlugh aqe luki _ tagilaghaa tesqelluki _ ken Ê¼ ghem _ asi anun _ neghe ste naqe ni luki _ eghqwaagh aqe kangit _ .
taagken _ apegh iin Ê¼ghata _ neghe uute ghllag aqe ukut _ .
teghrughaagh t _ nengighqe aqe luki _ neghe uute aqe ut _ .
elngaatall _ neqe m _ neqnigh lleghpigagh i _ tegh ruugh aagh es _ taakut _ piinlegh i _ kin Ê¼gh ag aneghmeggni _ , _ kii _ mesiigh _ uqlughte nanigh negh meggni _ , _ g ev y agll uteng _ tesqamani _ s aan igh r uug tekestagh lu uteng _ aa _ urang _ neqnigh ut _ neqe t _ .
elngaatall _ neghe uute ghllag kayug ni _ .
taaqe negh mta _ kenegh mun _ alleg luta _ veg meng _ sa meng _ .
Atgh amun _ kilgaaqu te aqe ukut _ mekelghiigh ni _ .
enkaam _ qamagte luni _ tawaten _ angyaleg a _ , _ angyagh meng _ taaqe llegh at _ p uv aall aluku _ , _ taakw aningani _ aghqesaghtugh aqe luteng _ .
allakagh meng _ pi vig leg t _ alngunak _ kinku t _ .
kiyang _ yug a _ aghq es aghtugh v il ik _ naan taqluteng _ .
ila i _ angyagh meng _ pi aqe luteng _ .
kiyang _ qamagte luni _ .
enkaam _ amalka _ ayumiqullegh _ kaspugte aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ taana _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aqa _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ sangiighhagh a _ , _ p uvall ar aallgh aa _ , _ aghq es aghtu m s uk _ apeghiigh aqe kangat _ J un e-em _ kiyang _ naange nghaani _ taakwani _ .
enkaam _ July _ taana _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ , _ sa mun _ nunivagseghagh mete te _ saghna vig _ , _ ne w _ year -ngu s qelluku _ . _ alla _ nutaghagh _ amalka _ ayumiqu l eq _ igleghte te aqe kangat _ .
taawa _ sa u a _ nul ugh y aq _ , _ an av ag y aq _ atuqe magh an _ .
aghnagh t _ aghulaghqugh te aqe lghiit _ iwerngaqun _ kiilqusigh _ al iin Ê¼gh un Ê¼gh aani _ .
aghhunneghagu _ avelghagh gpenateng _ navek _ pi aqe luteng _ .
Nul ugh y aq _ , _ kayu _ pin Ê¼ghani _ , _ nef kaa q luku _ , _ mesiigh kun _ ateghte aqe luku _ .
uukagh _ tawaten _ ama _ mesiigh mun _ ateghte aqe luku _ ila a _ .
aghula i te gpenani _ yug a _ legh iitu te mneng _ esghapag lleg mni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
navek _ pi ma inagh _ , _ ila a _ tamaa na _ sang ll aq _ navek _ pi igate ngughk _ .
sa meng _ angyagh meng _ ulima _ .
ila a _ mallu nge aqe luni _ , _ uug teng aqluni _ , _ aghvegh meng lu _ mallu nge aqe luteng _ .
alngunak _ ayvegh meng _ mall ung en Ê¼ghata _ pi laghate aqe luni _ .
kelgugh aqe kangit _ aqf a tesqelluki _ aghvegh meng _ mall ung en Ê¼ghata _ , _ aghvesiigh meng _ , _ qung v uugh aghmeng _ wataghllak _ avelghagh igate ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ pilag nghmegteki _ , _ ila ke te lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ pilag aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ ne iitagh ke luki _ .
taakwavek _ qenwat qun _ esgha _ aghvepig llu _ qenwat qun _ ne iitagh ke luku _ lliigh lghii _ maa te mun _ ukavek _ wha _ tawaten _ .
sivuligh
sivungagh m _ Kiyaghtaa llgha _ neghigh luku
mat- yu ke aq _ sivungagh mii
K ing i kaam _ apegh llegh a

Sipel ankut _ maavek _ lliigh magh ita _ tagi ukut _ wetku _ .
anengagh ka _ Gal aag er ng en _ aghnaa igh te yan _ kayagte aanga _ qepghagh te yaghtigh sqellug qu _ .
amen- a _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t llu _ , _ Sipel an kutlu _ qerngughte te kau ut _ taam _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ maavek _ sivungagh mun _ .
quyngigh m _ qap r aghq aqegkangi _ .
taagken _ enkaangam _ tagi ukut llu _ aghnaa igh te yan _ Gal aag er ng en _ .
kayusigh yaghtigh sqe a _ ataqagh m _ .
Enkaangam _ qenwat _ ellngit llu _ tagi ut _ .
tazigna ta _ mangteghagh at _ .
sivuke luta _ kan an s alghiikut _ , _ aaygu m _ maaten _ nayugh kekagh ani _ .
Enkaangam _ , _ elngaatall _ kag pell ghagh teghllag luta _ ayuqe yalghiikut _ .
ingaghte uute negh mta _ sakighte luta _ , _ qavaghvig ite ngughk _ tamaani _ .
igaghvig _ sakmavek _ pi u yaghpete aat _ , _ Pin aay am _ itghagh te ma kanga _ , _ taghnughhagh a _ m atu m _ pillgite na yu kan _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ .
Pi whan inkut _ M r . _ F ar l is -enkut _ , _ Sipel ankut _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ Pang aw y inkut _ ayvigtegh mi _ taamani _ quyngigh _ sigh uneghtu p aal ugllak _ tugu naqutke kangat _ .
Ag Ê¼ ghil ghiit _ nagate vyiigh anka _ , _ ne m _ kelut angani _ taamani _ ayvigtegh mi _ .
Tamaa ke yag gaq _ quyngigh neng _ sigh ungh i _ aange lghiik _ .
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ ungazighmii m _ neli kaqsagh kanga _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ , _ Mayuk aam _ .
enkaam _ amani _ sivukekagh _ Q uv eg si legh mi _ nenglu ngiighhagh m _ aag llegh a _ makete luku _ .
alghigh ta ani _ nun algu si qagh aghput _ .
whangkuta _ lo g _ ho us e-meng _ mangteghagh luta _ .
almesiqe a _ nutem _ tawaten _ mesag ghllag _ .
T utem qii r aaghh aghmeng _ tuum kell uta _ .
kelulighnegh itgun _ uw aligh negh itgun _ mangteghagh ukut _ Mayuk aankut _ , _ maagun _ sivungagh kun _ .
Taan Ê¼g an teftuq _ .
elngaatall _ nategh ke te luni _ f lo or - engll aamalghii _ pi whan imeng _ , _ salngagkwaagh m _ , _ ingl it raagh meng _ , _ taqughkwaagh aneng _ .
elngaatall _ taake uk _ neghe llegh nkuk _ , _ Siiv aghh aankuk _ taghnughhagh ke lukek _ .
enkaam _ nuligh qelluku _ Tal iq naq _ , _ taana llu _ saki ni _ entaqun _ W aay i _ .
Enkaangam _ tawani _ itghagh yuwhaagh aqngamta _ , _ I ir gu m _ itghagh sigh nkut _ maavek _ .
amavek _ maaken _ Mayuk aankut _ taakut _ sivu ngiighhagh mnni _ itghagh kau lghiit _ .
maghagh mete te _ it ghagh waaq agh tukut _ ayvigtegh meng _ amaken _ tawani _ kiig ani _ .
Enkaangam _ taamani _ Gal aag er ng enkuk _ Mayuk aankuk _ uyghiite ngllagh uk _ .
angyi aghte tke aat
malghukuraagh _ tesqawani _ unguvigagh m _ tapghagh ani _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa ke aq _ aquutagh ii aghagh luni _ wallu _ tepe kau a _ .
yug i _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ tume liqe luteng _ , _ naalkekagh it _ qenwat _ , _ maalghug _ .
samagun _ naayghagh t _ uughq itgun _ ivagh luki _ qimugsigh meng _ .
Enkaangam _ kitum _ taam _ am aghagh si ni _ nangllaghqe ghllag yan _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ , _ naayghagh t _ uughq itni _ samani _ .
up- lleghte luku _ , _ talwa _ akuzi nanigh luni _ , _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ i whan im _ Ay m ergem _ .
piiwagh te u yagh kangi _ ivagh it _ kinku t _ taam _ malghukuraagh m _ yug i _ .
esghaqagh kau ma aqa _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ .
unguvigagh m _ entaqun _ tapghagh ani _ tesqawani _ .
napaqagh ghllag a llu _ , _ taana llu _ yugusigh a _ .
kingu a llu _ taawa _ aminghagh vyiigh llgagh u uq _ natengiighhaq _ .
uugte aq
Taaku nguukut _ tawani _ , _ K em ugy illu _ , _ veghtekagh llu _ , _ A taqa _ wallu _ Sing aaw e tegh llaklu _ iwhani llu _ K anegh tegh yaq lu _ , _ uugta nge ukut _ tesqawani _ ayvegh meng _ .
tuqute luku _ kagimtegkangat _ , _ elngaatall _ taana _ Sing aaw e teghllak _ nat anganeng _ tuufqaghtagh lghii _ .
ii _ aghnalqwaagh _ qemall _ , _ tukaate ma a _ neghekagh an _ entaqun _ , _ migh y am _ kaate kaqe a _ elngaatall _ , _ tesqawani _ taaqe luni _ tuufqaghtagh nghmeng _ .
Mayuk aankuk _ Am aw un kuk _ nayag ak _ .
tamaani _ aghnaaghtekau uq _ .
iknaqe qrug raaghinagh _ elngaatall _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
Mayuk aam _ angyi lghii
Tes kan an teftut _ Mayuk aam _ angyi lghii _ , _ tekeghagh an _ uku m _ tungang iighh aani _ .
anguksag kaqsagh aput _ amaken _ tapghapagagh meng _ maavek _ lliigh yama _ , _ teskan ani _ tukughagh i _ kenle nge i kete te _ samagun _ kepugh llegh it _ .
whaten _ ayuqe yaghpete ut _ , _ enkaam _ iighsuute meng _ qughagh qugh vike luteng _ .
arekull _ Mayuk aam _ tamaani _ tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ .
F am il y- ngin aghh aaw aqelghiit _ maani _ taakut _ Mayuk aankut _ .
inglu a _ qaake luku _ angyaghwaagh m _ enkaam _ ayagsigh luku _ , _ inglu a _ enraq _ iighsugh luku _ qaake aqe a _ .
tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ .
mat- yu ke aq _ sivuke pigte luni _ maavek _ lliigh kau uq _ .
enkaam _ tuqu yan _ , _ Sipel ankut _ kiiw gneng _ samaken _ quyngigh eng _ nula ghllag yan _ malghughqellug qu _ , _ ila a _ ayvigtegh mi _ , _ ila a _ maani _ , _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ .
angyaghpag ghllag _ R u b y
Enkaangam _ una _ R u b y _ angyaghpag ghllag _ pi nga yug qu ragh u aagh _ , _ esghagh ma aqa _ taana _ , _ Ste am er -ngu yagh pe tuq _ .
tawani _ esghagh aqe yamkun _ kingu mikun _ whaten _ mal ghu ku r aaghh agh estun _ el qagh t aghhaghmeng _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
R u b y _ maagun _ uyghigh uq _ , _ igaghvig _ tagite a _ , _ igagh vike yuwhaagh _ .
Pin aay am _ itghagh tke a _ tawani _ .
tawaten _ pi luku _ umiileg llu _ tes akm um llu _ apeghtughiste a _ kina u yagh uq _ .
D up er tu is -ngu yagh taa _ wallu _ puyg aaqa _ tes akm um _ apeghtughiste a _ .
ipa _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ igaghyagh vike yuwhaagh ka _ whanga _ C am p b ell -ngu yaghtuq _ .
elngaatall _ taana _ apeghtugh i sta _ qepghaqagh ghllag pestaagh u yagh uq _ .
L o s _ angeles- meng _ tagi kau uq _ , _ C al if or n ia- meng _ .
sa n _ F r an cis co - m _ uughqa ghhagh anite ngughk _ taana _ L o s _ angeles _ .
Taw all iim a _ naten _ angka aqa _ akileghtuusagh a _ aghvig nghaani _ .
wetku _ upenghagh ghhagh inagh mi _ m a il - l elit kayuk _ .
C ut ter - et gun _ wetku _ m a il eng egk ayuk _ taana _ yuug _ .
Enkaangam _ elngaatall _ kuusme mi llu _ , _ Ne w _ Y e ar - millu _ igagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ kiiw gnun _ aglagh luni _ , _ kiiw gneng _ tesam aken _ pugughilegh mun _ .
pugughilegh meng _ wetku _ tagi aqe luni _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ kuusmeyagh aqe lghiik _ kiiw gnun _ tesamavek _ quyngighqwaagh nun _ .
petgegh nghhagh
quyngighqwaagh t _ liisimakekagh nka _ pi whan in kunguut _ , _ Sipel ankut _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ petgegh nghhagh _ taana _ iiwenllu _ liite aqe unga _ tuqu uq _ .
imagh yagh ghllag luku _ nat angakun _ , _ wallu _ ighu an _ kenle akun _ .
taaghta mun _ p asi s kangat _ i od ine- meng _ aghaligh naqe luku _ tuqute ni luku _ .
ata an _ I meg y uu tem _ wallu _ pasike kanga _ .
elngaatall _ Pin aay am _ iknaqughi ni yagh aa _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ samani _ tapghagh mun _ taagavek _ quugsaghtugh negh meggni _ , _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ kakegllugiitagh mineng _ uygaaghte luku _ , _ whaten _ navek _ tamaavek _ qenaagh mun _ mugh aay a _ kanagagh gminun _ , _ ingavek _ qam ugh te minun _ uyamig aghte luku _ aqf al aa meng _ aglagh te kaqe a _ .
quyngigh m _ ataasigh m _ katamngwaagh _ usi a _ , _ taana _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe a _ .
Enkaangam _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ tuqu yan _ , _ uyughagh anun _ tagi ste aat _ quyngigh a _ Un megg aghmun _ .
enkaam _ quyngighqwaagh uq _ taana _ Un megg aq _ .
taakut _ amalka _ piinligh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ .
entaqun _ uygu regh aneng _ maaken _ laaligh neng _ ungipamsug meng _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ g overn men tem nguq _ maana _ quyngigh liqe aqe kanga _ ig atagh llagmeng _ kenle ke luku _ .
P anegh aat kaalghii _ nalluke kegka _ whanga _ , _ sivuqagh _ tesakemna _ .
enkaam _ pugughilegh mun _ neqe meng _ aqfate aqe luteng _ .
kiyalighagh t _ maakut _ , _ kukuleg t _ yug lgutusagh lghiit _ , _ pugughilegh t _ tamaakut _ .
ungipamsug ke luki _ liite aqe anka _ .
alaka ghhagh
Enkaangam _ tes ki wh kuk _ Nun aag ak _ , _ kukuleg mii u uq _ entaqun _ , _ alaka ghhagh u uq _ .
uyiigh meng _ amel tul kek _ usputagh qagh lukek _ , _ qute mun _ taglaate luku _ taana _ uyiigh _ .
aag vig kaghte luni nguq _ nalugute nghmini _ aghvigh qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ .
ighleke aqe kangat _ qetgegh luni _ t angegh tun gh aas kuni _ uteghmun _ megh mun _ ifkagh na yu kan _ uyghag ghllag u lghii _ .
Taam aa _ El qil eg mii _ uy amig aat akek _ maalghug _ uyghag ghllag k _ tak er ii kan ik _ .
aag llegh a _ naten _ whaten _ entaqun _ ten _ fe e t- em y aak _ , _ yaag nev z iq _ iq e tul nga _ .
U yam ig aataq niiq agket _ , _ taake uk _ , _ alaka ghhagh mun _ tawavek _ .
tapghapagagh mi
taagken _ I ir gu m _ itghagh te luta _ amavek _ tapghapagagh mun _ , _ azigutagh leg ghllag u yagh uq _ unegken llu _ paagken llu _ , _ whaten _ unaghsigh meng _ azigutagh leg ghllag t _ teskan an sagh tut _ esnagh ghhagh m _ tun ut angani _ .
sa qaghte laatagh sta _ uqughte ta ghhagh ngunaamta _ itghagh ma lghiikut _ .
nefkuuragh put _ elngaatall _ sika ke lghii stun _ aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ .
esghaghhu _ W angq etel em _ taz ing ken _ quyngigh _ qineghpeghwaagh yagh luku _ esghagh ma kanginkut _ .
esghagh luta _ legan _ tespikegken _ , _ uk aligh meng _ naayghagh meng _ , _ samavek _ mangteghagh mii meggnun _ pi gpenani _ tespikegken _ egmigh vike ma kanginkut _ .
taagken _ ungipaate luku _ , _ neqe ghllag u na ait _ ama _ elqiileg mi _ taamani _ .
Enkaangam _ nat angani _ taam _ whanga _ maligte luku _ taama _ pi ukung _ akmag yagh unga _ neqe meng _ .
unaami _ W iigh allu _ tagi ukung _ esne perewaagh kun _ akmag aatagh lutung _ quyngigh meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ sa meng _ .
taamani _ W aagh naa m _ pennagh ghhagh ita _ qaye itni _ sik igg aq _ aga _ sivu ngiighhagh mtegni _ , _ suna _ pam um _ kayagte te agu _ malighqigh sqellug qu _ .
aatakqun _ temngi _ pi yagh aqa _ , _ akmag aat aleg llag ulghii nga _ .
taagken _ kaate lutung _ tamaani _ esgha _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ pi niigh pigte yagh lghii _ .
taana _ Pang aw y i _ amalka _ tuvghagh ke luku _ , _ ataasiighte pagtekaayagh lghiit _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ V egh tek aankut _ .
Pang aw y i _ tuvghagh ke luku _ .
pedersen
pedersen _ una _ kaate nghaani _ ilangakun _ sakmavek _ piiwagh aqe lghiit _ , _ naa p tagh teng _ akike yaghtugh aqe kangat _ kaviigh _ .
Enkaangam _ itghagh yamta _ taamavek _ tawaten _ aglagh yamta _ taawa _ pedersen _ itghagh kayugu yagh lghii _ maavek _ .
ilangakun _ taamaken _ upag aqe lghiikut _ maavek _ .
ilangakun _ ellnga n _ Pedersen -em _ taam _ uun Ê¼g gun _ itghagh vike aqe kanginkut _ .
umiileg _ taana _ pilleg qrug raaghinagh _ .
aga _ siku m _ tugu luku _ naagu _ maaqute aqe a _ .
entaqun _ alpag te nghatni _ pi wh anil uni _ whaa _ aliigh waaq estagh aqelghii _ sakmaken _ .
pedersen _ taana _ angyaghugh magh mi _ , _ akilpegagh magh mi _ ayuqe uq _ .
aghvepig mun _ angyaghughtu yaghpete uq _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ sivuqagh mete luta _ salin _ .
naghughte aqe uq _ , _ uksaagh en kug ni _ , _ upengh aan kug ni _ .
N ome- e telleq
entaqun _ N ome- a _ nel imun _ saghiigh qes uwh aagh aqng an _ liite kau lghiinga _ .
esghaghhu qun _ maaten _ whaa _ angyagh pang est iigh us kanga _ .
N ome- ell uteng _ piiwagh negh meggni _ , _ esnagh aneng _ sa meng _ saghn am sug um aaqelghiit _ , _ egtekagh itneng _ laluramke t _ .
piyag qu te _ ( _ B e ar _ ) _ N ome- e taqut _ .
Ch e e ch ak o _ C om pan y- lluteng _ tawaten _ akilpegagh luteng _ .
tawaten _ N ome- esaghq aa neghmeggni _ aki kaghqagh meng _ yataaghqe aqe lghiit _ uksugh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ .
naten _ pi aqe aat _ , _ taana _ Ataayagh haq _ entaqun _ kaangqugh ke luku _ .
esghaghhu qun _ suqagh meng _ akike luteng _ N ome- eq aataqelghiit _ .
Taakw aningani _ umyugagh meggneng _ lliigh ut _ .
Ch e e ch ak o _ allgeghllug qu _ sivuqagh m _ tes akm um _ .
sa yukagh yu k _ , _ whaten _ sanighte luku _ sayug aqe kangat _ iigh suu teg nekun _ , _ piyug tes tem meng _ amalka _ .
enkaam _ tespamani _ ungazigh mi _ malghukuraagh _ , _ S aap l ang uftuq _ ategh a _ .
enkaam _ avate mi _ tawani _ H az el _ , _ ama _ malghukuraagh _ , _ ang er kav av legh aaguq _ natengiighhaq _ Un az igh miit _ an yagh pag itneng _ .
tukfigh iqe ait _ N ome- me meng _ .
maaten _ paga _ N ome- a _ angyaghpag ngestagh meng _ avaqraggiighute ma uq _ .
wetku _ entaqun _ nakmiigh aqe yagh kata _ tamaaken _ lipeghsagh luteng _ akmavek _ pi aqe nayagh lghiit _ .
tawaten _ nula kau uq _ sivu nge aq _ .
sivuke pigte luku _ Mayuk aam _ ungazighmii m _ , _ atghagh luni _ Sivuq am etku ll aaluni _ , _ Sivuqaghh mii ngugh tekaq _ .
uyughagh ke te lghiik _ Am ag un kuk _ , _ nayag ke luku _ Sing aaw e teghllak _ taakut _ .
taana _ Am agu _ taawa _ iknaqe qrug pigte yaghtu uq _ .
iwernga _ Sun aagh rug em _ entaqun _ kitugh yagh aa _ , _ pi nanigh magh an _ .
P aang Ê¼gh et
elngaatall _ upenghagh u uute nghaani _ payangite nghaani _ naav ghut kayug yug aghtu uq _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
tespamaken llu _ pangeghte luteng _ , _ maligte luki _ maakumiu t _ , _ sakmani _ .
ukavek _ lliigh yug niite ghllag luta _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ .
tespamavek _ nangenqagh naqe yagh luta _ , _ amsanaghllug _ elngaatall _ .
amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ teghigagh ighlliqe luta _ evlug ghllag t _ kaate luki _ .
entaqun _ B er ing _ S t ra it -mi _ kaate kaqe ke put _ amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ evlug ghrugllag t _ .
taagken _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ i whan inkut _ Al ankut _ nallagh aput _ qavregh meng _ malighqugh luteng _ .
tawaten _ malighqugh llegh ke ut _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ayvasaa stekagh a _ naghulleg nghmegteggu nguq _ ellngit a _ pikayug u aat _ .
Piy a _ ( _ B e ar _ ) _ tespamavek _ eng ine- ek eg sagh yaghtu qayug uyagh tuq _ , _ navek _ nalluke aqa _ .
Piy a _ una _ C o as t _ G u ar d _ Cutter _ aqimle ightugh a _ .
apeghtughiste m _ tawavek _ apegh luki _ Piy an kunun _ .
sa n _ F r an cis co - telleq
Th et is -ngu yaghtuq _ aag llegh a _ .
taameng _ pi yameng _ qem igh taagh yaghtuq _ pal aghhaghmeng _ .
Enkaangam _ V egh tek aankut _ taam _ i whan inkut _ angu sagh u te nkut _ , _ I n uun kut _ aghvigh te kaqsagh ai _ taaggun _ Th et is -em _ .
I whan in ku nguyagh pe tun Ê¼nguq _ ipa _ aghvigh yaghqagh t _ , _ igaghyagh kayug t _ ukut _ , _ I ir gun kut _ entaqun _ kinku t _ Sun aagh rug enkut _ , _ kina u uq _ pi nga yu aat _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyaghte luni _ V egh te kaam _ kanavek _ sa n _ F r an cis co -meng _ b ri d g e- el iim an ik angat _ , _ tamaani nguq _ avangite yagh uq _ taak man lluki _ ellngit _ .
Enkaangam _ eltughagh minun _ kelgute aqe kangi _ igaqegkagh nite luku _ esghagh nghminigu _ taana _ b ri d g e- eghllak _ .
whaken _ sa n _ F r an cis co -meng _ navek _ , _ G old en _ gate- mun _ entaqun _ .
tawavek _ kenle ke luku _ b ri d g e- el iim an iiq aat _ .
F er r y _ b o at - kun Ê¼nguq _ aghvigh qragh u llegh a _ ellngit _ taak man lluteng _ .
Enkaangam _ uteghnigh ut _ angyagh ut gun _ malghukuraagh kun _ , _ kina u yagh uq _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ , _ uksughte luteng _ wetku _ taakut _ .
I nuugh nguq _ taana _ igaq ay uug tev y iiq aalghii _ , _ umiileg anun _ lata ste luku _ aghvegh niigh y at _ .
aygugh uute naqe yata _ tawavek _ tagi luteng _ legan _ pi naqe ni ma kangi _ .
ivagh i ma _ aghnagh _ iknaqe lghii
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
elngaatall _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ iknaqe lghii _ , _ yuguma neghtuqagh _ repall _ W or l d _ W ar _ T w o -mi _ tamaani _ unguva yagh lghii _ .
Aghnalqwaagh llagluni _ , _ nekeve nanigh luni _ , _ pak reg ng aghhaghmi _ talwa _ lli aqe aq _ .
wetku _ taam _ pillug am _ kingu aneng _ tuqukagh _ .
ivagh i ma u uq _ ategh a _ , _ Ag aankuk _ , _ K ar gin kuk _ nayag ak _ .
sivuke luku _ Ay ng er a _ ugi ke yagh kanga _ , _ P aall eng etaq _ panike luku _ .
taake uk _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ qamagte lutek _ enkaam _ qalu m llu nguq _ tugu kaqsagh kanga _ .
ama _ taana llu _ tuqukagh _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ Tutm atel gem _ tugukagh a _ .
taake uk _ ne k _ aghy up aar ighllag lutek _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ , _ wetku _ W or l d _ W ar _ T w o - m _ kingu aneng _ .
flu- lutek _ qerngagh egmek _ , _ kinguligh aq utagh lutek _ , _ ikfiqepag gpenatek _ , _ qinuyug te kete luku _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ .
iknaqe pigte ma lghii _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
ayumigh _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ ayvii llegh it _ alla t _ maaten _ pilleg mnneng _ .
ayvegh meng _ nas q ungh i _ uyav lu tuum aghllag ita _ uteghvagh qu te _ iike aqe kangit _ neqetuumagh ita _ .
Taam nguq _ ivagh i ma m _ angtughpag m _ nas qun ghii _ tugutagh nge i kete te _ tugu luki _ saaygu m _ qaye anun _ miluute ma aqe kangi _ .
sivu liigh aput
Mek enegh sim _ apegh llegh a
Taag an ii _ qiighqagh _ maana _ yugtu pigte ma yagh lghii _ .
qafsina _ villages- nge ma yagh lghii _ , _ sivuqagh _ , _ sa igh kuvek _ , _ kiyalighagh _ , _ kukuleg _ , _ qangeghsagh _ - _ kiwatangaghmii t _ , _ tawaten _ ungipamsug kaqe kanga _ Aq aam _ .
a qaa _ i whan it _ aghnagh ke ghrug aat _ , _ pagaliit _ .
pagaliit _ T uus aankuk _ A kum ut aankuk _ panig ak _ .
T up aanga _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ .
anglegute ke te lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ Iq mal u wa _ , _ P aa z ak _ uyuq lighpig aan iiq aa _ .
kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ repall _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ .
angayuqagh gkenka nguq _ tesakmaken _ kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ kukuleg u te kaqe aat _ ellnga _ .
Leg an Ê¼nguq _ kukuleg mun _ tagyuqa ut _ , _ taakwavek _ ketliqagh t _ sani itneng _ uw aligh negh akun _ igleghte aat _ .
kii _ , _ nenglu m _ qaye a _ paga _ ke tan qwaagh aq r ig taa _ yuug _ naavghute uq _ .
angyaghyage neng _ sivuqagh meng _ aragh ut _ .
taamagun _ tam lii vig g aaw aqelghii kun _ , _ taag gun Ê¼nguq _ tamlag ut _ .

yugtu pigte yaghpete uq _ .

Tawaten Ê¼nguq _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ pi aqe kangat _ .
Tawaten Ê¼nguq _ aghnaghagh penaagh u luteng _ ellngit _ , _ entaqun _ kell mig sig all uteng _ salin _ , _ iwernga _ ungipagh ngugh _ nagaqugh aqe uq _ whaten _ kii p aghq em mi _ uksaagh m _ tung angani _ , _ Kiyaligh aghm iin Ê¼nguq _ tes q aga _ aqiiyag ut _ .
ii _ , _ leg re taq elghii n Ê¼nguq _ aghnaghagh llegagh t _ ellngit _ .
kiyalighagh mii t _ pi nghmegteki _ , _ tes qag um nguq _ yug i _ angvigagh pigte ut _ .
pi nghmegteki _ met ghaghmeng _ atkug te luteng _ , _ aate kau uute luteng _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ ilang akun Ê¼nguq _ , _ K iw atang aghm iin Ê¼nguq _ tes q aga _ aqiiyag t _ .
pi nghmegteki _ , _ nagh uy am enguq _ atkug ghpagte te luteng _ .
esgha _ T ul iinkut _ nalighnegh it _ maaten _ entaqun _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .

taawa _ sivuqagh llu _ , _ sa igh kuvek llu _ nagate llegh mini _ uglagh na iqe yagh aa _ .

naqam _ aliigh nghmini _ taag av erugllak _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ taagani _ sivunegh mnni _ m aal ghu waaq sagh tun Ê¼nguq _ mangteghagh t _ kiyaghute yu ait _ .

Tawaten Ê¼nguq _ sivuqagh _ mangteghasqwaagh mun _ aanleghaate yuwhaagh luni _ , _ sivuqagh _ gaagh u uute nghmini _ , _ qaqsungigh at _ , _ naghuyagh t _ , _ esne m _ tungang akun Ê¼nguq _ naghughte negh meggni _ nutem _ alpag negh meggni _ saye it _ p uyuq em leg agh waagh luteng _ .

nanigh u llegh a _ pugughilegh m
pugughilegh _ , _ rep all nguq _ pennagh t _ taag egkut _ tuum ligh llag luki _ ayuqe yaghpete ai _ .

nellug yug negh meggni _ unite aqe luki _ .

qikmigh ita _ qighunegh mun _ teghiigh tke a _ .

Enkaangam _ N gu ung ay am _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe aat _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ atiiqekagh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ taana _ .

whangkuta _ ilugh waag put _ .
Enkaangam _ tanemlleqa _ Es tug r uuk _ tuqu yan _ taake uk _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ aflengake i ste nga i uute yayek _ , _ entaqun _ qantagh anllegh pig aghmun _ I ming atmun _ aflengake sqellug kek _ qallegsaghagh te yagh lukek _ , _ I ming ate q rug em _ entaqun _ apetuyuugte te ma uk _ .

anglikagh k _ whangkunni _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ taake uk _ ugw iigh tu utellegh meg nun _ kenlanga _ .

aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh at _ sivungagh mii t
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a
pugughilegh mi _ aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ .
aghvegh niigh llegh _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ , _ tesamani _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ angayuqagh igh te magh mi _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ elngaatall _ ellngin aghhaghmi _ .
taawanginaq _ angayuqagh igh te luni _ ellngin aghh aagh te kaalghii _ , _ iitek _ anengagh ghhagh a _ , _ taawanginaq _ qinuy u waagh aqelghii _ .
ungipagh kaqe kangi _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ , _ upengh aam llu _ ilangani _ tu v aghllag luni _ tawaten _ , _ aghvegh t _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ k aagh taagh aqelghiit _ esghapag aqe kangi _ .

puuskaate meng _ lipeghsagh yug unga _ , _ maalghug _ pi agka _ .

anguksag ghllag kaqe aqa _ .
aghillug nkut _ , _ Qu waa r enkut _ , _ M in aankut _ , _ taakut _ siivanllegh t _ sulug nkut _ , _ ifkaghte te nkut _ anguksag ghllagkagh nka _ .
enmis _ qelegh i luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ esghapag luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ nukalpigagh nun _ , _ qayughllak _ whaten _ anguyag leg stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
inglu qligh mnneng _ pamaken _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ payangite kayug _ .
Aqel q aghniigh meng _ atigh luki _ , _ aqelqaghniigh kayugu kangit _ .
tamaakut _ aqfate te mun _ ayuq esug nilnguut _ taawa _ elngaatall _ aqfate te meng _ pi ste aqe ait _ .
A am taa _ tughumgha te ste luki _ whaten _ iknaq ngwaagh mun _ ayuq esug nilnguut _ taawa _ iknaq meng _ enraq _ pi ste naqutke aqe ait _ .
qayughllak _ pangeghtekan _ anguyag lgu yaghqagh t _ taakut _ .
tawatete ut _ payangite nghaani _ , _ taakut _ awatangani _ tughumgha te kayug t _ , _ taawa _ tugutu te aqe ut _ tughumgha te kayugu ut _ , _ nakaan _ anguyag ke te luteng _ taawanginaq _ aqelqaghni ii aagh _ .
anguyag ke te nghite ut _ piniqe te luteng _ elngaatall _ , _ naav ghu tu lluteng _ ayuqe ut _ tespamaken _ ungazigh meng _ , _ nuugh naq an iq _ entaqun _ tanpegh _ .

amu i qaghte na qaqu ut _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ atungagh k _ .

quyillegte neghtuqagh t _ entaqun _ allgegh te aqe lghiit _ .

tawatete ut _ .

M algh ugh qelluni _ sangami _ ayuqe ma a _ .
S i x -kun _ kiyang _ pi aqe unga _ imigh i negh mni _ .

nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ taake uk _ , _ apeghtughiste k _ C am p b ell -enkuk _ .

Quyngigh qw aal eq _ - _ neli yuwhaagh llegh
19 1 4 -mi _ quyngighqwaagh unga _ .
19 1 4 -mi _ mangteghiigh yuwhaagh llegh itni _ legan _ kiig ani _ .
whanga _ uksugh ani _ itghagh unga _ .
Quyng il egt imeng _ aqfa atnga _ quyngigh qwaagh esqell unga _ .
Anaghay aagh mun _ ap pr en ti ce- ngulunga _ .
Anaghay aam _ aqfa unga _ ap pr en ti ce- ngulunga _ .
Ap pr en ti ce- ngugh tunga _ taawa _ .
tea- ngatu _ Un megg aam _ tugu kaqe a _ tawani _ .
entaqun _ apeghtughiste m _ nanglleg yagute lunga _ mekelghiighh aagh ngaaghm aa _ ap pr en ti c eng ugh testek aqegk anganga _ Anaghay aagh mun _ , _ angayuqagh gka _ maavek _ lliigh lghiik _ .
19 1 4 -nguftuq _ taawa _ neli yuwhaagh llegh _ .
I n uum _ lo g _ ho us e _ taana _ Sipel ankuk _ , _ lo g _ ho us e- nguftuq _ 19 1 4 -mi _ ulimaagh u uq _ neli yuwhaagh llegh _ .
estamagnegh ghhagh u ut _ .
Sipel a _ , _ N u ngu k _ , _ Anaghay aaq _ , _ Un megg aq _ , _ taaku nguftut _ .
pi nga yu neng _ inglu lgu yagh lghiit _ quyngighqwaagh t _ .
aveg luteng _ pi kau ut _ .
Enkaangam _ ayvigtegh mi _ Pin aay a _ , _ Pang aw y i _ , _ meteghllug _ , _ R aa quq _ , _ taakut _ ayvigtegh mete ut _ .
entaqun _ ag Ê¼ ghi lluteng _ tawaten _ p ellegh tekat _ .
taawa _ esgha _ 19 1 4 -mi _ quyngighqwaagh kanga _ .
Anaghay aagh mi _ enkaangam _ four _ year s -nguftuq _ ap pr en ti ce- ngu llghem _ kiyaghtaa llgha _ .
estamat _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh luki _ kayagtekayugu ait _ ellngit neng _ lliigh esqelluki _ .
tamaani _ qamagtengngwaagh waagh luni _ quyngigh leg m _ nalluniigh kayug a _ .
quyngigh _ nalluniightugh luni _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
upenghagh mi _ whaten _ tegleg yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ut _ enraq _ avaquti ut _ .
whangkuta _ nalluniigh lleg mtestun _ nalluniigh kumteki _ , _ whaa _ pi kumteki _ , _ kii _ taam _ yug m _ quyngigh a _ naqam _ nughagh a _ una _ saam _ yug m _ nalluniigh luku _ .
tegleg yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ naa ita _ liisimake kangit _ .
naten _ uglaghqak aan _ quyngigh _ , _ nughagh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ , _ kiiw ni _ whaten _ aghv ighh naq nem teggu _ , _ nughagh ngeltagh lghute _ elngaatall _ qerngugh q uteghllag aqelghii _ , _ naa ite a _ ivagh magh ita _ , _ naalke aqe ait _ legan _ aga _ , _ aghulaqe te magh ita _ .
tawatete ut _ , _ tugulagh kayugu ait _ .
nallavragh yaghqaqe nghite ait _ tawatengwaaq _ iqeghte aq _ ayuqe yagh ghngaan _ .
quyngigh m _ nalluniightu llegh a
Enkaangam _ Anaghay aam _ nalluniigh llegh a _ v iis tagh iin aaftuq _ .
takestaaghhaa lutek _ sigute kek _ qamagte lutek _ .
whanga _ enkaangam _ aghenqignegh a _ awalighnegh a _ iike yalghiimi _ L _ .
taakwna _ kepe negh kegte uq _ inglu a _ .
ataasigh mi _ ayumiqullegh mi _ nalluniigh llegh _ tamaa na _ aghvinleg u uq _ .
ataasigh mi _ ayumiqullegh mi _ quyngigh meng _ nalluniigh i llegh a _ .
Ap pr en ti ce- ngugh tem _ nalluniigh llegh a _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
Enkaangam _ sivuligh mi _ aghvinleg _ .
estamat _ saghligagh t _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
Enkaangam _ aag llegh ani _ ayumiqullegh m _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
nalluniigh kayug t _ .
Enkaangam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ qula _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ estamat _ yugte aqe luki _ , _ tawaten _ nalluniightugh aqe luki _ .
Enkaangam _ es tamaani _ tawani _ , _ qula _ allameng _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ uglaghqak aan _ , _ aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ estamat _ yug t _ .
taawa _ upengh anghani _ , _ kiig nghaani _ kayagte aqe ait _ .
ellngit neng _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte ste aqe ait _ , _ taawanginaq _ tiinta meng _ , _ egllu meng _ , _ avlawa _ sa u a _ , _ kagimkagh _ tunqugh aqe aat _ , _ sa meng _ pi yaghqaa gpenaki _ .
gaaghusigh _ qamagte luku _ tunqugh kayugu aat _ .
tawaten _ ayuqe uq _ .
katam _ tawaten _ ayumigh _ panig teng _ tugumiightu nghmegteki _ , _ saki itnun _ aglagh ste naqe nghmegteki _ .
tugumiightu lghii stun _ tawatengwaaq _ tugum iigh tuq allgh uugh aqiit _ ap pr en ti ce- eteng _ .
ellngit neng _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte ste aqe kangit _ .
tawatete uq _ .
tugumiightu lghii stun _ katam _ .
tugumiigh iigh uq _ tamaa na _ , _ panig teng _ saki itnun _ aglagh sug kayugu ait _ mul upag naq enghata _ .
nengaa teng _ taakut _ tugumiightugh luki _ aglagh stekayug it _ .
tawatete laatagh ut _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ pi aqe unga _ , _ ap pr en ti ce- et _ tawaten _ esleq engh atki _ tugumiightugh luki _ aglagh tes legh iistun _ .
aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh yagu _ Sipel am _ pi a _ , _ â _ Anaghay aaq _ , _ qakun _ tulugh u i _ kayagte naqe zigu _ nalleghaghhalek _ aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ pi naqe a _ ! _ â _ upenghagh ke te _ pi naqe a _ .
Upengh anghani _ ivgagh mi _ taawani _ , _ pedersen _ kaate nghaani _ , _ taawani _ ighni ste i kayugu lghiikut _ .
akilpegagh niigh luta _ apeghiigh yamta _ , _ tent- a _ , _ qawaagniighusigh _ , _ suflugagh _ , _ eg llu _ , _ av l aawa _ , _ ii- u na qaghtagh te _ tukfightugh aa _ sa meng _ nuugh yaghqaa gpenanga _ , _ taawa _ umyugagh mneng _ lliigh ste aanga _ .
Enkaangam _ angayuqagh nka _ legan _ ten t- amnun _ tagi ta nka _ , _ Un megg aan kun it aqs alghiit _ .
Ataa sim e taq s alghiit _ , _ upenghagh mi _ taawavek _ ivgagh mun _ ighni ste i yagh te aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ c or r al -mun _ kanaghtekayugu lghii _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ quyngigh _ keste nghmegteggu _ , _ quyngightutala _ liisima kaqe kangat _ , _ yug m _ taam _ quyngigh an _ uglagh t at al anga _ teregh te kayugu lghii _ .
tawaten _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kiyaghtaall emni _ 4 00 -ngugh tekaq _ quyngigh ka _ siip ngaagh luni _ .
legan _ naa itnite luki _ nughagh at _ , _ ighninghhagh u luki _ nalluniigh aqe aput _ .
naa ita _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ , _ repall _ unite igate ait _ tawan lluki _ , _ manu itnite luki _ inag itnite luki _ nalluniightugh aqe aput _ , _ ighninghhagh ghhagh u luki _ .
aamta _ ila ita _ angayuqagh ita _ unite qaghte luki _ esghapag aqe ait _ , _ apegh iin em teki _ wetku _ taku aqe ait _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ sughug aghaqut _ enkaangam _ ila mnnun _ naghpigh ste luki _ nuqnegh ste luki _ nalluniigh luki _ wetku _ , _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ sughug aghaqut _ , _ avaqutagh teng _ tugu snanigh aqe ait _ .
S ughug aghnaq enghata _ naghpigh luki _ nuqnegh aqe ait _ .
four _ year s -mi _ quyngigh ka _ 4 00 -ngugh tuq _ , _ saghligagh nge yuqagh nge a _ qayughllak _ .
upenghagh mi _ ighn ist inun _ pinegh mni _ kiyang _ saghligagh meng _ ighni aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ saghligagh nge yuqagh t _ nula rakegte na pigte ut _ .
esghaghhu qun _ tawaten _ tuyugh i i aghagh ta mi _ quyngigh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu lghiit _ uksaagh nghaani _ .
seven _ h un d re d _ d oll ar s -meng _ quy nigh tuqat _ tamaakut _ mo ne y -ngu utaqelghiit _ D e c em b er -mi _ .
Enkaangam _ taakwavek _ ukavagh magh mi _ quyngigh tu tal estun _ tawaten _ mo ne y -ngu utaqut _ .
quyngightuqagh t _ tamaakut _ $ _ 7 00 . 00 -ngugh sim aaqelghii _ .
esgha _ tawatete laatagh ma lghii _ .
M o ne y -ngu ut kayug uyagh tut _ , _ igug ighkagh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu yagh lghiit _ akmavek _ B o x er -kun _ , _ unaghsigh u luku _ Boxer _ , _ unaghsigh ghhagh u luku _ , _ Wh it l em _ umiileg kesagh kanga _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh ghllag kau lghii _ kayusigh i kau lghii _ .
pedersen _ taawa _ kayusigh i kau uq _ estu w ii lluku _ , _ akilpegagh niigh qagh yu k _ .
wetku _ apeghiigh nghata _ , _ pedersen _ , _ akilpegagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe negh mta _ , _ Jul y -en aq enghani _ Jul y mi _ wetku _ tagi laghate te aqe ukut _ , _ tagi aqe ukut _ maavek _ sivungagh mun _ .
kiyang _ quyng im e tu tem neng _ nalluke kegka _ sa u a _ ila a _ , _ ne mun _ tagil qung igal nguunga _ kiyang _ quyng im et kayug ulghii nga _ qayughllak _ .
taakut _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ quyngigh igh kut _ kelengake u kangat _ .
wetku _ ighni ste i _ taa qen ghani _ , _ ne mun _ tagi luta _ unaami _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh ke luteng _ , _ quyngigh _ aqfa aqe luku _ tagite aqe luku _ tawatestaghhiinaq _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
unaami _ tuungligh ghhagh t _ pi aqe luteng _ .
Enkaangam _ taakut _ unaami _ , _ taakut _ quyngigh ghqu yaghqagh t _ maalghug u luteng _ aghulaqe aqe ut _ .
N ay ugh nanigh aqeg kefut _ temngi _ aqfa aqe luku _ piiq eg kefut _ .
neli llegh _ igaghvig ligh llegh
Enkaangam _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _ igaghvig ligh naqe yan _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t _ taamkut _ tagi laghate te ut _ .
Me et ing -e yagh tut _ .
qerngughte te ut _ meeting- aat _ .
igaghvig _ whaa _ qaake naqe kangat _ , _ nagun _ nekegte lleghqagh meng _ ag Ê¼ ghit kaat _ .
Enkaangam _ me et ing - el uteng _ tawaten _ , _ ayvigtegh _ taam n aa _ nuna kegte yagh ghngaan _ , _ uksugh mi _ sa nigh ite u ta aneng _ , _ umeg negh p aa llu utanganeng _ , _ savig ite u ta aneng _ avelghagh aat _ anuqetuqagh _ .
ayvigtegh _ sa nigh ite ngughk _ piyaa nigh ite ngughk _ .
naqam _ quut f aghmeng _ quunpeng _ umegnegh ughte aqe kanga _ .
ivgagh _ taawna _ nuna kegte aq _ pi yu ghngaaghmegteggu _ atg- ghhaghte neghtuqagh _ .
mangteghagh t _ suupe te inaghte na yu kata _ qenaagh u ta aneng _ .
qayughllak _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ , _ kii _ tiin t avig et _ suupute ghllag ma aqe kangi _ qenaagh u lghii _ .
maana _ mesagtu ghngaan _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ nakmike aat _ uk ag ung iighhaq _ regh igh tekayug utanganeng _ neq niigh vik eg tut anganeng _ .
aghuliigh aat _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ maagun _ pi naqe aat _ .
aywaa meng _ anuqlighpag igate ngughk _ maana _ ikevagh ghhagh inagh meng _ anuqligh qagh yu k _ .
taawa _ ayvigtegh mii t _ itagnagh ut _ , _ tagite ait _ mangteghagh teng _ naaf qelluki _ tagi laghate te ut _ maavek _ .
tagi ut _ taghnughhagh teng _ igaghy iisqelluki _ , _ qerngugh un neqig tut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ enkaam _ .
taawanginaq _ nani _ tanqigh mi _ puygu ma aqa _ igaghvig _ qaak sug wh aallgha _ , _ naqamalla _ kitum _ entaqun _ .
igagh ngllagh llegh mete ngughk _ .
G overn men t -em _ igagh u ni te u lghiit _ , _ imatuq _ avangite aat _ .
igagh a _ pi yuwhaagh aqngami _ entaqun _ Th om p s on nguuq _ entaqun _ .
D up er tu is -ngu yaghtuq _ ulimaghista _ igaghvig meng _ .
sivuqagh mi _ apeghtughiste u yagh lghii _ .
igaghvig _ ulima naqe aqngan _ , _ taam _ ulima yaghtugh aa _ .
igaghvig _ ulima ut _ , _ sivungagh m _ igaghvig a _ .
Tes kan agun _ nutem _ pi ut _ , _ whagun _ igaghvig ghllag u yagh lghii kun _ whaa _ maaten _ .
Taw an s alghii qun _ igaghvig gaq _ sa u a _ mekestaaghhagh _ .
kenlanga _ T ro ut man -enkut _ maavek _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ atuqekagh at _ taana _ .
Enkaangam _ M r . _ W ill i am -enkut _ lliigh magh ita _ igagh vike yuwhaagh m _ kingu ligh aa _ kumagh kau uq _ .
Taz ing agun _ nekegtegkangat _ , _ maaten _ uum _ nekagh ughtekanga _ , _ taaggun _ nekegtekagh at _ .
kumagh kau lghii _ , _ kii _ taawa _ qamag tengngwaaq aqaa _ .
D r um -a _ tamaa na _ iqe iqe ughtagh ukagh at _ sukate luku _ , _ iqite kaqe kangat _ guute na yu kan _ .
iwerngaqun _ tan k - angi _ taakut _ qafsinagnegh u lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ , _ wallu _ aghvin leg negh uyagh ta _ .
taakut _ aghula i te ut _ .
G uuq aqat _ , _ qimagugh tke aat _ ukavek _ .
M r . _ W ill i am _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ tesqam an le ngu uk ak _ W al ter -em _ aane te kaqe ak _ .
naten _ f lo or -em _ asi a _ regh iteftuq _ .
A aghh w meng _ itegh vikekagh i _ .
agepsugh ghllagu lghii _ , _ esghagh vig ite ngughk _ aaghh w meng _ ivagh lukek _ qikmigh llu _ , _ M r . _ W ill i am -llu _ aane tke ak _ .
walter _ liisima laatagh ma a _ , _ saamna _ f lo or -em _ asi a _ agepsugh ghllagu ghngaaghmi _ , _ naten _ uusqaghtu tekagh mi _ saam n anga _ avangite ma a _ , _ regh i simaa _ , _ esghagh a _ aane te kaqe kangi _ .
naten _ ayuqe nayagh lghii _ , _ agepsugh m _ naafqe kanigh luku _ W ill i am _ talwa _ .
qaamte i na luni _ tesqam an tekaa yalghii _ , _ qikmigh ghllag a llu _ tawan tekaq _ .
unaghsigh llu _ , _ igaghyagh llegh ka llu
El ng at aal l _ tawatete uq _ quug ghllag u yaghtu uq _ Sag ungh ang est aankuk _ , _ Sag ungh aankuk _ taake uk _ , _ enkaam _ aklunagh isag lghii _ quugkagh meng _ .
mangteghiightuqagh u lghiit _ legan _ tamaaken _ unaghsigh meng _ qupughhugh luteng _ .
taakut _ Sipel ankut _ lo g _ ho us e- nguluku _ ulima kaqe aat _ .
llaaghinaan _ esgha _ nalluniigh aa ta qaa _ I n uum _ 19 1 4 -mi _ nekeftekau lghii _ .
Taa waa _ sivuqagh mi _ whaten _ liigikngwaagh penanga _ itghagh kau lghiinga _ maavek _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ , _ 1 2 _ year s ng ngulunga _ .
igaghyagh unga _ tesakmani _ iitek _ .
S e c on d _ g ra d e- ngulunga _ taaqe unga _ , _ igaghyaghpag gpenanga _ .
maani _ itupill _ yo ung _ me n _ c l as s- et gun _ igaghyagh aatagh unga _ .
Y o ung _ me n _ c l ass -et _ igaghyagh kayugu yaghpete ut _ ighivg aghmi _ .
igagh te kayugu yagh ut _ yug t _ ighivg aghmi _ .
igaghyagh kayugu yalghiikut _ tamaani _ yug tgun _ , _ ima _ taaqe aat _ sangan _ , _ piyug nanigh aat _ .
Quyngigh niigh em _ piyaqli i llegh a
quyngigh igh ni uq _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe na pigte uq _ .
talwa _ ighni ste i mi _ mangteghagh isag lghiikut _ .
esla mi _ legan _ uyghag t _ may- ughte luki _ , _ azigutagh ghhagh mi _ taawa _ .
talwa _ sa ngunaamta _ , _ s le e pin g _ b ag - ngun aamta _ , _ ulig ngunaamta _ legan _ tawaten _ ingaghte aqe lghiikut _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
I werng aa _ aatkagh put _ maqagh lghiit _ .
qamagun _ nughagh at _ maakut _ ighninghhagh t _ , _ nughagh ghhagh t _ , _ angli ma ite ngugh t _ qamagun _ ilukligh u luki _ , _ enkaangam _ qaye akun _ tuqutagh nge ste aq _ maana _ aate te kaghqagh _ nughagh _ .
aate te kaghqagh ughtekagh _ .
tamaa na _ melqw i _ qaute kete luki _ atkug kaqe aput _ .
Il ep gh aagh luta _ tem kagh luta _ .
amigh meng _ alla ighsigh luta _ , _ kameg luta _ , _ amigh meng _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ .
Taan angin aaguq _ umegnegh ughte nghaani _ seghlegh pigu uq _ .
azigutagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ .
iwernga _ tagtalmi _ sunglug ta ghhagh neng _ , _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ sa u aat _ azigutagh liite aput _ .
mangteghagh ke yaag te aput _ .
legan _ unaghsigh meng _ tawaten _ ulima luki _ , _ c an v as -meng _ qantagh luki _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ azigutagh t _ piniraaghinagh t _ .
An uq ligh naq enghani _ petug tegh aqluki _ up- lleghte na yu kaki _ .
alaghrang _ egllu ngllagh ut _ , _ ulluvikagh t _ f iv e _ g all on -et _ , _ tamaa na inagh u yagh lghii _ ulluvikagh _ f iv e _ g all on -a _ .
tamaaken _ egllu ngllagh yagute ut _ , _ suflu ngllagh luteng _ kag pel engest ayug g aghmeng _ .
suflugkagh t _ sa u aat _ , _ egllu kaghqagh meng _ pedersen _ tagite kayugu lghii _ saag nga lghii meng _ , _ gal v an iz e- et _ sa u aat _ egllu kaghqagh ghllag t _ entaqun _ whaten _ p l y w o od - estun _ angka lghiit _ .
kepugh luki _ ulima kayug it _ .
whangkuta _ enkaam _ suflu ngllagh negh mta _ , _ meghutlug t _ legan _ uygu uute qugh te luki _ suflu ke aqe ke put _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ .
ivgagh m _ qaye ani _ ighni ta iqe lghiikut _ , _ pugughillghagh mete te _ ukig yagute ukut _ , _ pugughillghagh qun _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ ulima luki _ , _ egllu ligh luta _ , _ quugtu pigte lghii _ legan _ , _ qav ang si yu waal ghii _ , _ qavangsi yagh aqe lghii _ .
quyngigh ut _ ukig te luku _ pugughillghagh mete te _ aga _ mayugh aqe lghii _ .
mayugh nghaani _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ , _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ iwerngaqun _ unglegh qaqu luni _ lliigh naq enghani _ , _ um ul ghagh aqaghput _ , _ ukig taqagh ut _ tawavek _ nayugh mnnun _ .
pilaataqu lghii ni _ four _ hours _ unglegh ma te kaqe aat _ .
taawanginaq _ emta _ ila ita _ nayugh i lghiit _ kipullegte vig _ tugh aan ghani _ neghe snanigh aqe kangat _ ungllegtu aatagh aqe kangat _ tak el engest ayug g aaluki _ , _ unglegh ma llegh _ lliigh ma aqe kangat _ , _ on e _ hour _ , _ two _ hours _ .
ungllegtagh ta m _ whaa _ kipullegte i lleghqagh _ kaan naq enghani _ , _ ighleg yagute ma aqe kangat _ liigilliigh luki _ .
kiyang _ quyngigh mete kanga _ whanga _ .
utaqa i aqe lunga _ taakut _ aleghqagh nka _ tagi nghata _ .
esghaghhu qun _ Gen ug enkut _ , _ Malig utk aankut _ , _ ayugighsagh te nkut _ quyngighqwaagh aatagh kaayagh ut _ .
taawa _ mulu nghite ut _ .
sivugh qaghte negh meggni _ taawa _ itghagh igate ut _ .
entaqun _ iilqayug aqe ut _ nanghiigh nghmegteggu _ ikfiqe na a _ .
neghe gpenaamta _ , _ qavagh gpenaamta _ igleghte negh mta _ taan anguuq _ ikfiqe na llegh _ .
Enkaangam _ ivagh i yami _ tawani _ ilangakun _ unaa mun _ kenlanga _ kaate gpenaamta _ ivgagh mete luta _ pi aqe kanginkut _ .
nanghiigh aatagh kangat _ , _ enkaangam _ ima _ piiwagh aqe ut _ quyngigh qwaagh waagh luteng _ .
iilqayug neghllug te mneng _ whanga _ .
Megh nugh nanigh waagh lunga _ , _ ten m aaw ing waagh lunga _ .
Ang tan ghh am testun _ igleghte aqe lghiikut _ , _ enkaam _ megh nugh nanigh waagh luta _ .
enmis _ uteghmun _ aqfaaghtu te aqe luku _ quyngigh ut _ lliigh aghput _ tughwaagh negh mta _ , _ ivagh i yagh negh mta _ .
O n e _ week _ aghulaq utk aqeg kefut _ quyngigh mun _ pinegh mta _ , _ tuqutagh ii lleghqagh _ pinaq enghani _ .
A man saghtuq _ c or r al -a _ , _ tuqutagh igh yuwhaagh llegh ut _ qitneg mi _ .
qitneg mete yagh lghii _ c or r al -a _ , _ taan angin aay alghii _ .
Enkaangam _ c or r al- eng llagh tut _ ivgagh kun _ .
taawa _ taawavek _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ tuqutagh igh yagh yagute ut _ .
Taam av erugllak _ pikayug u yagh ut _ qitneg mun _ sivuqagh meng _ tuqutagh yagh te aqe yagh ut _ .
Her d -em _ tukfigh kayugu yagh aa _ , _ atungagh k _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ teghig l aaq _ , _ qaghlu kau luku _ .
quyngilegti llegh
quunpeng _ quyng il egt imeng _ ayuqe yalghiikut _ , _ qimugsigh gpenaamta _ .
Pegh qigh til uta _ pi aqe lghiikut _ , _ repall qun _ ataasigh meng _ , _ estam aneng _ inglu lgu luta _ pugughilegh meng _ co al -e meng _ piiwagh te i kau ukut _ , _ quyng il egt ip ere waaghmeng _ igaghvig mun _ , _ sivuqagh m _ apeghtughiste anun _ .
sivuqagh _ entaqun _ usingigh vig ite yan _ , _ natete yan _ pugughilegh kun _ co al -a _ qaake ma kangat _ .
G overn men t -em _ co al enga _ igaghvig m _ .
Quyng il egt imeng _ co al -e meng _ piiwagh te i yaghtugh ukut _ sivuqagh mun _ estam aneng _ inglulegyag u luta _ .
Maalgh ut _ usi ke aatagh aput _ ataasigh kun _ quyngigh kun _ , _ 1 5 0 _ p oun d -et _ co al -et _ ataasigh t _ .
whangkuta _ quyngigh put _ u tuq angh ulghiit _ , _ tenmaawikagh t _ qamugh mun _ , _ qamugh qu sigh ghllag t _ .
ukut _ ayvigtegh mii t _ ellngit a _ nuteghagh t _ quyngigh teng _ atugh naqe luki _ , _ naavyigh yuguma lghiit _ qamugh u aatagh igate ngugh t _ , _ tenmaawi kau nghite ngugh t _ .
up- si llu ta _ tesamavek _ tev mun _ pangalegti tete yalghiimeng _ legan _ unite ainkut _ aga _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t _ taakut _ quyngigh at _ nuteghagh u lghiit _ , _ whangkuta _ u tuq angh ulghiit _ .
pugughilegh meng _ up- si llu ta _ aygugh uute yalghiikut _ , _ nuug ukut _ whangkuta _ enraq _ usite yalghiikut _ .
tevelqug ni _ utaqa i ukut _ , _ pugughilegh meng _ saag gu tukut _ .
W angq etel en _ aviite uq _ .
Gal aag er ng em _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ W angq etel en _ entaqun _ uka _ . _ â _ T as lugh ameng _ uka _ allgegh lghii _ .
M aas q en _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ M aas q en _ , _ sa meng _ piyugte gpenaan _ pi naken _ , _ entaqun _ uka _ q ef liq ng waal ghii _ . _ â
aa _ , _ whangkuta _ sivungagh mii ni _ , _ salin _ tagi llghite luki _ ayvigtegh mii t _ , _ tamlu _ , _ whanga _ , _ M aas q en _ , _ Megh y uq _ .
Enkaangam _ ayvigtegh meng _ taamaken _ , _ W angq etel en _ , _ Gal aag er ng en _ , _ A lu wa _ , _ N ung un aq _ , _ Qen l uk _ , _ Ak iy a _ , _ aghvinlegyage t _ .
whangkuta _ estam ag uukut _ , _ qule u ukut _ qerngagh emta _ .
W angq etel em _ quyngigh a _ p aghy um _ qam uy iilnguq _ , _ unite naqe ak _ usi gni _ , _ aag llegh a _ waran _ qaake sqe aat _ .
taana _ enraq _ ighsa kau te aqe aat _ qaake naqe nghite aat _ .
pi atnga _ , _ â _ elpek _ nanghiiqu yagh kuvgu _ , _ usi ke yagh kuvgu _ . _ â _ sivuughagh kestagh ghngaamkun _ quyngigh ka _ naavyigh na yu kan _ pi nga yiite aqa _ .
â _ masingka _ legan _ itagnagh lghii _ ! _ â
M agh yaghq ugh tek luku _ W angq etel en _ igleghte ukut _ sukatutala atun _ .
quyngigh a _ ung legh aat atugh qw aag a _ megh n um _ .
qamiye put _ , _ qamiye pigu ut _ iqetu ghllag luku _ two _ fe et ngwaa qut _ iq et aagh all uki _ qamiye ngllaghkagh t _ .
qayughllak _ kilgaa ni _ petug vike magh ita _ pi aqe ke put _ , _ legan _ aaghwte te luki _ unite aqe ke put _ quyngigh put _ .
ne mun _ atghagh aqe lghiikut _ aaghh w lluki _ .
suqaghnegh i _ savikenghaagh u ut _ .
Enkaangam _ pi yalghiikut _ masingka _ ping ayug ugh ngaata _ sivuqagh mun _ kaat ute anka _ .
kii _ qamugh neghtu pigte ut _ , _ kiilqusigh _ atuqe aqe kangit _ qayughllak _ .
kiig u yagh ghngaan _ unaghsigh mun _ qamughtugh u sigh ke aqe kangit _ .
Enkaangam _ qamugh mun _ iknaqe ut _ naav y igh yaghqaanghi sim aghmeng _ ayuqe ut _ .
Chief _ Her der -meng _ tugutellegh _ , _ nakmiigh llegh
taagken _ chief _ her der -meng _ tugu tete naqe ut _ , _ chief _ her der - k aghqameng _ .
sivuligh _ Sipel anguuq _ chief _ her der -a _ , _ enkaangam _ Pang aw y ing ugh lluni _ , _ Pang aw y ing ugh sim aan _ nutaghagh meng _ chief _ her der - k aghqameng _ tugu tete naqe ut _ .
quyngigh _ c or r al -mun _ kanaghte luku _ , _ key-tagh ut _ , _ pi nga yug u luta _ , _ Pang aw y i _ , _ ggayegllug _ , _ whanga _ .
Nal im taa _ tung qwaagh aghh naq agu _ , _ tung qwaagh agh tellegh qaa _ esghagh naqe aat _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ayum iq ukat _ , _ year l ing -et _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ uksughtekagh t _ , _ ol d _ d o g _ , _ ol d _ d o g -meng _ atigh yaghqagh t _ , _ tawaten _ .
atightugh aatagh yagh ke put _ whangkuta _ quyngigh m _ ayumiqu tu tal angi _ .
keste i luta _ apeghiigh luta _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ â _ kii _ ! _ whanga _ elqughaghte ma kegka _ quyngigh _ kiyang _ ayumiqu tu tal nga _ ! _ â
amenam _ ungazighmii stun _ , _ paam ku stun _ , _ quy ill g istun _ , _ quyng im e tu tem neng _ liigilliigh kaqe kegka _ quyngigh m _ uksughtutala a _ , _ nayugh ke m _ angtale aneng _ .
tawatete kangat _ pamani _ , _ quyilleg t _ liisimakngwaagh luki _ uksugh tu taa l a _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh i _ , _ kiyaghtaa llghi _ liit ngwaagh luki _ ayuqe kangit _ .
Taw ateng waagh waaq _ ayuqe yaghpete uq _ .
aawallu _ quy n imun _ chief _ her der -ngu lunga _ tu w aatnga _ .
quyngigh _ tung qwaagh agh tek egka _ .
tawani _ chief _ her der -ngu l qin aghtunga _ , _ may or -ngu magh ma _ , _ estu w aghmun _ d ir e c t or -ngu magh ma _ .
Es tu w am _ saghya a _ whangkuta _ ag Ê¼ ghit k egkayug uy aqef ut _ , _ An ic a-m _ tugu mangite luku _ .
akitutala _ qerngagh emta _ ulim al aghluku _ , _ sivuqagh mii t llu _ qerngughte te luta _ ulima luku _ pikayug uy aqef ut _ .
sivuqagh mi _ K uz aat a _ may or - kes aq angat _ .
enkaam _ qerngagh emtung _ K uz aat allu _ qepghaqagh u lghiikung _ kiyang _ estu w aghmun _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ kayanqute _ maana _ uk igh qugh aqeg kefut _ , _ aki ite ngugh mun _ sa mun _ neqe mun _ ukig tellegh put _ pikayug uk efut _ , _ enkaam _ estu w aghput _ iflii igate ngughk _ .
aki pagite yagh ghngaaghmi _ ghhuugh _ tamaa na _ , _ tamaavek _ agl aghh nem teggu _ ifla igate ngughk _ .
maana _ ila a _ neqe m _ akimsuggiite u lghii _ , _ enkaam _ tamaavek _ nengigh qen nem teggu _ aki ite ngugh mun _ , _ aki tugh tev legh aghyagh ngaaghmi _ kayanqute _ tamaa na _ atugh ut _ ivagh i niigh sigh _ piyaqli na yu kata _ .
tawatete kayugu yagh lghii _ .
maaten _ An ic a-mun _ lliigh luni _ tawaten _ lli aqe aq _ .
tawatete yagh ukut _ , _ elngaatall _ tawateng waagh waaq _ qepgh al qes agh aghput _ sivuqagh mii t llu _ whangkuta llu _ .
Me et ing - ek ayug uy alghiikut _ kiyang _ council-ni _ , _ sivuqagh m _ council-ngi _ , _ whangkuta llu _ , _ qerngughte te luta _ aghvigh aat ameng _ tawaten _ me et ing - ek ayug ni _ .
ilangani _ maavek _ tagi luteng _ , _ kiyang _ whangkuta _ tesakmavek _ , _ M r . _ D a ugh er t y _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ me et ing -e yaq ayug uyagh tukut _ .
M r . _ D a ugh er t y _ seghleghllug u yagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tamaani _ .
qayughllak _ whaten _ D a ugh er t y- m _ quunpeng _ tesakmavek _ Jul y -e y aam aamta _ pi stekayugu yagh kanginkut _ .
qerngughte te luta _ Jul y- aaq elghiikut _ , _ tawatete yalghiikut _ .
maaten _ pamaken _ inglu aneng _ pi nanigh yalghiimeng _ , _ aqelqaghniigh sigh ughtekanga _ aangqagh igh aq _ .
Chief _ Her der -em _ qepghaqagh a
Chief _ her der -em _ qepghaqagh a _ tamaa na _ elngaatall _ quyngigh _ , _ quyngigh qwaagh tet _ hour-ngit _ , _ igagh te ligh luta _ .
F or t y- f iv e _ c ent s- an - ho ur -nguftuq _ tamaani _ qepghagh llegh _ .
aghsaghmete yaghtu uq _ f or t y- f iv e- c ent s- an - ho ur _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ angka yagh uq _ .
enraq llu _ mo ne y- pig meng _ akileghtugh gpenaamta _ , _ quyngigh meng _ pikayug u kanginkut _ .
iwerngaqun _ her der -ngugh sim aamta _ mo ne y- ng iighh aghmeng _ ila luta _ lliigh ainkut _ .
Taw ateng waagh waaq _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu lgu luta _ quyngighqwaagh kau lghiikut _ .
Chief _ her der -et _ tamaakut _ quyngigh mun _ kayag ti mun _ , _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh yaghqagh t _ qepghagh kayugu ait _ , _ quunpeng _ quyngigh _ tawaten _ lliigh nghaani _ tawavek _ tuqute i lleghqagh _ lliigh nghaani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ , _ yataagh qes tek estaagh aqegkangit _ .
Chief _ her der -em _ qelegh llegh a _ tawatete uq _ , _ quyngigh ghqu yaghqagh t _ taakut _ ulima kayugu ai _ quunpeng _ .
tuqute i aagh mi _ , _ tawaten _ uglaghqak alghii _ sivuqagh meng _ atungagh k _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ mo ne y-meng _ ila i _ , _ quynginge na ta it _ .
saama _ qepghagh negh meggni _ llaaghanwha _ hour-ngit _ taakut _ quyngigh mun _ legan _ qiifte aqe kangit _ .
aki msuggagh ngunaan _ urang _ , _ qamagtengngwaagh waagh luku _ qepghagh lghii _ , _ enkaangam _ quynginge uute kayugu yagh lghii _ , _ tuqu ta u uute aqe lghii _ .
saama _ ila ita _ pirughte i te aqe kangit _ .
whangkuta _ katam _ quyngigh leg ni _ , _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute ste aqe ainkut _ piyuke lleg mtestun _ inwa _ tukfigh luku _ .
Enkaangam _ whangkuta _ tun qugh aqeg kefut _ aki u na an _ tanemlleqa _ quyngigh yaghkagh nun _ tamaavek _ .
whanga qun _ kayusiite i naqe nghmeng _ katam _ whanga _ tukfigh aqe luki _ aki it _ pilagh kanga _ , _ her d -em _ pal aghagh tekayug uk angi _ .
whanga _ up uu peng _ pinitun _ tukfigh aqe kenka _ , _ qayughllak _ negh yugnagh pigte lghii _ quyngigh _ , _ maaten _ paninang _ tawatel nguq _ .
urang _ nulasagh kumegteggu _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe yagh kumeng _ , _ whaa _ quyngigh m _ yug ita _ kelengake yagh kumegteggu _ ighni ta iqe luteng _ , _ tuqute llegh _ kayaate nayagh lghii _ .
kaviigh m _ , _ meteghllug m _ , _ tuqute kayugu kanga _ nughagh _ , _ kelengake nghite ngugh ni _ .
meteghllug qrug t _ tamaakut _ teghh ikun _ nughagh ghhagh t _ qellu it _ nus uk at aam aaq egkangit _ .
kaviigh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ uw ighh ughluki _ tuqute aqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ enkaangam _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ Sipel am _ chief _ her der -ngu luni _ tuqutagh ii negh mta _ , _ nayugh i negh mta _ , _ kaviigh niigh ste aqe kanginkut _ tuqu qite te neng _ .
taakut _ amiiragh i _ Pedersen -mun _ tuune luki _ money-ngi _ taakut _ nayugh ikagh ni _ , _ kaviigh t _ tuqu tke aput _ Pedersen mun _ tuune luki _ , _ akike luki _ , _ money-ngi _ taakut _ whangkuta _ nayugh ikagh ni _ nengigh te sta qaa _ .
money-ngi _ ne iitagh ke aput _ nayugh ikagh ni _ .
Llaagh an whaa _ nugh aam _ tuqu llegh a _ kayaal nguq _ , _ wetku _ umeg negh ugh neghani _ upenghagh mi _ esla _ naafte nghminigu _ ghhuu ste qugh aqe lghii _ , _ g gh uug aqelghiit _ nugh w aghhaat _ ilangani _ .
aamta _ ilangani _ aghsaan _ tuqu llegh a _ ayuqe aqe uq _ .
taawa _ esla _ naafte luni _ aliigh yuwhaagh llegh ani _ pinegh mta _ , _ kii _ , _ tuq waagh taq um aaqelghii _ .
Enkaangam _ ifl ang igal kefut _ , _ nughagh ghhagh t llu _ tamaakut _ ighninghhagh ghhagh t _ akike kayugu kangi _ chief _ her der -em _ .
tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ nayugh ikagh ni _ tawani _ legan _ akingite ut _ , _ avangite ut _ pilagh aqe ke put _ saghna aqe ke put _ , _ aviite yaghqaa yagh lghiit _ qayughllak _ .
Taan ang ulghii _ uks um ii _ , _ uksaagh mi _ whaten _ kuml aluni _ aniguvzeghagh yagh luni _ , _ eslallugughte luni _ puq l aghq w aaluni _ aqlaghate ghpagte nghmini _ saam n anga _ legan _ siku nghminigu _ negh vig iitagh ke lghii _ .
qayugtugh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ estu w iin neghmeggni _ tuqu kayugu ut _ , _ estug teng _ naang taq egkangit _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyang _ naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte naqe neghtuqagh t _ , _ naayghagh t _ ava ite ngugh t _ itagnagh lghiit _ , _ enraq _ ungagagh pagite te kayugu lghiit _ .
ungagagh _ tamaa na _ uksugh mi _ neqek egkanga _ quyngigh m _ .
ungagagh _ enraq _ tamaa na _ lii saq efut _ , _ laavlaaghmii t _ liite stekagh at _ ungagagh m _ piite llegh a _ .
Tallim an Ê¼nguq _ ayumiqullegh t _ , _ quyngigh m _ neghenghite nghminigu _ , _ nagu kayugu uq _ .
ungagagh t _ tamaakut _ talligh ma _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ wetku _ negh yaghqaaghte ma aqe lghiit _ .
piite luteng _ sukangite pigte ma lghiit _ .
upenghagh mi _ itagnagh lghii _ alngunak _ piinghagh _ maana _ quyngigh m _ neghe kayugu kanga _ .
laavlaaghmii t _ tagi uwh aaq aaf tut _ quyngigh _ maligte luku _ .
pinagh u yankut _ , _ Sipel ankut _ , _ Qal un ku ngul ghiit _ sivuligh t _ , _ quyngigh _ qaake yuwhaagh aqngan _ qula _ .
Agh tuq aa yag enkut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ , _ P et g enghh aankut _ kinku t _ sivuke luteng _ .
Enkaangam _ ayumiqu ngani _ alla _ qaake tke aat _ quyngigh meng _ .
Enkaangam _ taakut _ taaqe ut _ , _ Sipel an ku ngugh tut _ taakut _ , _ elngaatall _ quunpeng _ Sipel a _ , _ Pin aay a _ , _ petgegh nghhagh _ ( _ paninang _ kiyaghte yagh lghii _ ) _ .
petgegh nghhagh _ entaqun _ umiileg kesagh kangat _ tamaani _ , _ Megh yu unkut _ anengagh at _ .
laag vlaagh t _ taakut _ entaqun _ maalghug u ma yagh uk _ , _ wallu _ qafsin Ê¼ gu yagh tat _ .
apeghtugh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ .
quyngigh m _ yu kum taagh i _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ .
Qam iy ngin Ê¼nguq _ qayagh u ut _ , _ uug gun _ qamuutagh leg t _ , _ uvegh igate laatagh ut _ .
qaya stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ qamiy ngit _ .
amenam _ entaqun _ nuyaaghite te ghllag nghata _ atugh aqe kangit _ .
aamta _ nuyaagh luteng _ naafqesaghqagh ke ait _ , _ qapragtu ghllag ut _ .
quyngigh mun _ apeghtugh i llegh
apeghtugh naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ , _ naten _ uy a tutk aagh luki _ , _ sa u a _ f iv e- t o - si x _ feet _ uyatu tke ai ta _ petug aqe aput _ .
taakut _ enlegkutagh t _ qamughaghtagh yaghqaa luki _ , _ qamugh ghllag yaghqaa gpenaki _ , _ aaw ghhaghtagh meng _ pi yaghqaa luki _ , _ aqnighte na yu kata _ , _ ii- sqeaghaghte na yu kata _ .
quunpeng _ nal ughq utagh llag aq u _ tugu yuwh aan em teki _ .
qaprag ghllag aqe ut _ , _ sigh un ghit _ kepugh luki _ h old a- ligh luki _ petug aqe ke put _ .
unaami _ wetku _ pin em teki _ aghuliigh ma aqe lghiit _ .
unaami ani _ enraq _ qaghlu aqe aput _ .
qaghlu it _ piy uwh aan em teki _ , _ enraq _ tanemlleqa _ qaghlu yuwhaagh negh meggni _ ef legh yugem _ iwernga _ mulu pagigate ut _ .
liisagh ke put _ tugu yuwh aan em teki _ tawaten _ apeghtugh naq nemteki _ qaghlu magh ita _ lliigh aput _ .
Q aghl uugh um iita _ , _ qaghlu it _ petug tegh waaghluki _ tawavek _ , _ saag teng it _ qugh w aghn ayuk ata _ .
S aag teng it _ naten _ tag kaa qut _ , _ teghiglug t _ tagtal kell uki _ .
tapghagh ghhagh meng _ uygaagh ke aput _ .
teghiglug t _ peghte luki _ whaten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ sa u a _ th re e _ inches _ , _ peghte luki _ tawaten _ saag tek aqaput _ .
qaghlu t _ pi niigh pigte ut _ tamaakut _ teghiglug t _ , _ amiiragh i _ , _ melqw i _ qaye anite luki _ .
unange i _ melqiite aqe lghiit _ , _ uuk n angi _ ag tugh am _ qagh luku siigh teghllag em _ .
Pegh qig san em ki _ , _ whanga qun _ kiyang _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghtaghkagh nka _ , _ apeghtugh naq nem ki _ .
amenam _ pi nqegtagh t _ wallu _ akuuragh aqe zingi _ .
emta _ ila ita _ ilullug t _ , _ sughug aghll aag et _ quunpeng _ .
anusigaa aqe ut _ , _ uka _ legan _ sughug i kayugu ut _ , _ enkaam _ qamiye teng _ nap agh aghtaq egkangit _ uka _ tagi nghata _ .
uyiigh t _ tagtal kell uki _ tawaten _ saag tek aqaput _ .
enkaam _ qamiye put _ uka _ tagi nghata _ sani igh te nghata _ uughqaghte aqe luta _ .
taawa _ uk an lluki _ quunpeng _ sayughqaaghkagh put _ qiifte naqutke aqe aput _ , _ qiive yagute aqe ut _ ukavek _ aghenqignegh mun _ .
Qii f naq nemteki _ angyalligh qugh magh ita _ qamiye put _ taakwavek _ , _ elngaatall _ taawa _ qiive aqe lghiit _ .
Pang alg ugh aqut _ , _ pang alg ugh aqut _ , _ pang alg ugh nan ingh at aa _ amu kestagh aqe aput _ .
whaa _ qiiv aat atugh lluteng _ lliigh nghata _ , _ aghula i aghte aqe luki _ .
qenwat _ ten m aaw is nemteki _ taawa _ uy atu tal ang istun _ lliigh aqe aput _ .
S aag teng an _ tagtal ngi _ , _ tenpe yaghqaa gpenaki _ sa u a _ si x - fe et _ entaqun _ f iv e- fe et _ tawaten _ uyatu tekagh ligh aqe aput _ .
aghuliigh aghtekata _ , _ tenpe gkumteki _ , _ ighu i _ ayem n naa qep ut _ .
kiyang _ pi nga yu _ whanga _ qavaghte luki _ peghqightu aatagh kaqe anka _ , _ pi nga yu _ qavagh _ .
tawatete kau ut _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghte luki _ peghqigh aqe ut _ peghqigsaghkagh nka _ .
akuuragh aatagh kaqe anka _ ilullug ite ngugh t llu _ .
Ing lu sigh aqaput _ tenmaawi nghata _ , _ enkaam _ magh yaghq ugh tengugh taqut _ .
tamaakut _ aamta _ f oll o w -meng _ ata iqe aput _ , _ taakw egk est aghhiinaq _ , _ elngaatall _ f oll o w - t _ tamaakut _ usi iigh aqe aput _ .
ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ quyngilegti sighqagh u nghite ut _ ellnginagh meng _ .
uziveketaagh ghllagu aqe ut _ igleghte gpenateng _ naqam _ petug luteng _ tas lugh an qeg tut _ , _ f oll o w -meng _ atigh luki _ ayuqe aput _ .
Enkaangam _ qamiye mteggun _ petug luki _ usi lug ke i _ whaa _ igleghte te kaqe aput _ , _ whaa _ usi igh ghllag luteng _ , _ naqamllu _ itagnagh aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ iglegh usi q nemteki _ , _ f oll o w meng _ atunem ta _ yugu yagh nga a ta _ , _ aqume luteng _ maligte te aqe lghiit _ , _ taawanginaq _ ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ peg ng aghmeng _ , _ uziveketaagh yaghqagh t _ igleghte gpenateng _ .
sangameng _ tawatete aqe aat _ inglusi i ma ite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ ing lu tel get _ pinigh ut _ quunpeng _ .
emta _ tawatete laatagh ut _ qikmigh stun _ , _ sukall el waaq luteng _ .
sukate ngugh t _ sukaghllag u ut _ .
whaten _ igleghte te negh mta _ , _ pangalegti tete naqe negh mta _ aga _ sukate ngugh meng _ quyngigh lgu negh mta _ aga _ unite qaghte aqe aput _ ila put _ .
Aqf ay ngwaa k egtat _ tamaaku ut _ , _ aqfayngwaag negh meggni _ whaa _ pang alget _ ila i _ .
pangalegti naqe te inagh _ aga _ , _ ilangani _ pangalegti te kayugu lghiikut _ qayughllak _ .
uyaute iqe aq _ taana _ kiyang _ tuqu qugh kau uq _ ii- sqeaghaghte ste aqe luki _ .
naten _ pi aqe aki _ apeghtugh i nghmini _ .
entaqun _ nuqnegh qagh nghminiki _ aghvequte ste aqe kangi _ .
ii- sqeaghaghte negh meggni _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ .
naasqugh t _ ukut _ iisqagh teng _ aqnighte nghmegteki _ , _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ , _ enkaangam _ tuqute aqe aput _ .
emta _ tawaten _ ayuqe laatagh ut _ , _ ila ita _ apeghtugh qu ait _ ilullug ghllag t _ sughug aghy unegh tuqat _ .
whanga _ amenam _ apeghtuqagh nka _ ilulliqepag gpenateng _ , _ llangaqa _ pin qeg tegh r aas t aghhiin aat _ .
emta _ pi aqlaatagh ait _ tamaakut _ ilullug t _ , _ umyugagh it _ natete ma aqe lghiit _ , _ suugllug kanigh ma aqe lghiit _ .
Tawate taq ll aatagh pe tut _ .
manigugh luteng _ quyngigh t _ atughqagh u ut _ , _ sas naq ef qaa meng _ .
S ughug aghy unegh tuq as _ taawa _ anusigaa aqe ut _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ mekelghiigh t _ qamiye meggneng _ aafte igate ut _ .
S ughug ll an ghis teng _ legan _ qamiye teng _ nap agh aghtaq iit _ , _ qayug mig naq negh tuqat _ qayughllak _ .
kii _ , _ taawa _ nula kaayagh uq _ , _ 1 0 ,000 -ng uk aaguq _ kingulighpigagh _ c or r al- ek aq _ .
Nal ikek _ ifkagh llegh nkuk _ , _ N uuq it aankut _ chief _ her der -ngu lukek _ .
nula pagllag kau uq _ .
Enkaangam _ tawani _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ , _ upenghaghyag u _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ kii _ uughqa ni _ samani _ naayghagh ghhagh t _ uvit ang itni _ .
yaywaalingiighhagh u na iqe kangat _ saamna _ i whan im _ aygugh ghhagh anite ngughk _ , _ suvinagh ghraag ggaat _ , _ ayvigtegh m _ kelut ang anilnguut _ .
N ay gh an naq _ , _ suvinagh ghraag ggaat _ , _ naayghagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
Uv it angani _ tawani _ kii _ , _ ung legh um aghll aak _ , _ tuqukagh lghute ghllag _ .
legan _ unglegh ma negh ke te ziin _ tawaten _ panegh aatk aq _ .
Enkaangam _ qiighqagh _ maana _ tawaten _ uglaghqak alghii mun _ quyngigh mun _ atughqagh u nghite uq _ , _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ .
Uks uum _ negh kanga _ piyaqnagh pigte lghii _ .
Qal te meng _ , _ aqsaqugh mig itgun _ pi yagh ke put _ , _ uyghag m _ qal teng aneng _ , _ neqe u nghite ngugh t _ amenam _ .
uyghag m _ qal teng aneng _ aqsaq ughh mik elghiit _ , _ seghleghu lghiit _ neqe u nghite ngugh t _ .
quyngigh m _ atuqe llegh a
I meg y uu tem _ apegh llegh a
quyngigh t _ qamagte luteng _ neghe kayugu ut _ .
sugupag i _ ayakagh aqe luki _ , _ si gut angi _ , _ sigh ungh an _ melqw i _ , _ itegagh i _ ayakagh aqe luki _ negh ugh aqiit _ .
Aq saq ghw i _ pi whan iy ukagh penaki _ ukifkagh yukagh gpenaki _ .
taakut _ qaayng anilnguut _ aqsaqugh m _ taakut _ tunu t _ pugughyi u ut _ .
I ik ngwaagh luki _ aqsaqugh t _ , _ wetku _ iike luki _ tesqam kut _ imigh a _ ilak ell iluki _ , _ aqsaqugh mete luki _ tawani _ qu w ii sigh luteng _ neghe kayugu ut _ .
aqsaqugh m _ nat angani _ alamke t _ , _ ughvugh waaghluki _ neghe kayug t _ , _ vegllugte yug nigh t _ tamaakut _ , _ aqsaqugh t llu _ ughvugh waaghluki _ neghe kayug t _ .
kevighqagh i _ taakut _ naan lenguut _ , _ ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ imigh luki _ kev ingll aq ay uw iit _ .
ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ uulte magh ita _ imigh kayug t _ .
qellu i _ tamaakut _ ama _ uulte magh ita _ , _ tunughtuqagh t _ .
whangkuta _ negh igate aput _ iiskag i llu _ , _ tengug i llu _ .
ila ita _ negh aqe ait _ .
Q il eg y ighllag i _ taakut _ , _ qilu i _ uzimun _ pikayug t _ , _ ikugh waaghluki _ qan lag igh waaghluki _ tunu ghllag t _ angqaperugtu te _ tawaten _ .
amalleqa _ qamagte luku _ yugusigh anite ngughk _ taana _ neghe kayugu uq _ .
amu i _ uksaagh nghagu _ mel qugh tughnegh ata _ allighaghqagh ughte aqe ut _ .
upenghagh mi _ mel qugh llu ug teghllag aqii _ makugte negh meggni _ .
amiiragh i _ ug mel engest aghhaat _ mel qegh qel eng estaaghh aat _ asiighqagh u luki _ saghna kaqe kangit _ .
taakwani _ nani _ Jul y -mi _ aate te kaghqagh ughte aqe uq _ .
katamngwaagh _ melqughtu langi _ lliigh aqe ut _ pi nigh ghllag t _ aange lghii u yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ legan _ mel qegh qell iigh agh aqegkangi _ .
ighni ste i _ april- mi _ piinligh aqe ut _ kiyang _ , _ yug inagh meng _ .
kipullegte i stekete te luteng _ on e _ we ek - ek agh taan _ .
ivgagh mete luta _ nutaan _ maana _ quyngigh _ atghagh luni _ ellmi neng _ tamaani _ ighnegh iightugh aqe uq _ uvite kaghagh mnni llu _ .
taklaghte luta _ esghapag aqe aput _ tawaten _ esghapagkagh mtestun _ legan _ , _ nughagh at _ kinegh naqe te inagh _ aga _ igleghte aqe ut _ .
umegnegh u luku _ tiinta lug teng _ nayugh i aqe ut _ .
tiinta lug teng _ ighni ste i mi _ tawaten _ .
uglagh ghllag yagh lghii _ quyngigh _ .
