iike ta t
Mek enegh sim _ apegh llegh a
esgha _ taakut _ iike ta t _ tesakmaken _ .
Q un aghhaq _ mekelghiigh pigu luku _ ii ku taa mak at _ .
qafsineg ii ta ani _ qavagh m _ unugmi _ tawani _ , _ ii _ , _ ayngelite ghllag mun _ kaat ute ma kagh nge i _ , _ eflugh te luki _ elngaatall _ maaqe ghllag _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangit _ ( _ entaqun _ liisimake kanga _ ) _ .
â _ seghleghhalek _ navek _ lliigh te aqe inkut _ , _ Nun aag agnun _ ak lii taq enghit in ku ut _ .
sangami _ ayngelite ghllag _ uukna _ allgegh a _ . _ â _ Nun aag ak _ negh ighh aaneng _ nangllegtagh na iqe agket _ .
â _ Nun aag ag nekun _ whaa _ entaqun _ eflugh te ainkut _ . _ â

tawaten _ ag Ê¼ ghi ngu ulluteng _ ataasiighte luteng _ ( _ uusqagh pigte lghii _ amenqun _ vuuslegh ghllag u aqe lghii _ ) _ .
ayngelite ghllag k _ .
eflugh te nga llegh ghllag mun _ amu isigh negh meggni _ aan Ê¼ ng allgh waaq elghiik _ .
ayngelite u na iqe ait _ , _ tuvagh m _ whaten _ maaqellegh m _ eflugh te ghllag m _ tak lagh r uk g ighllag luteng _ naqam _ vuuslegh i _ uusqagh ghllag t _ .
Nun aag agni _ taakwani _ vuuslegh ghllag u aqe lghii _ .
entami qun _ ataasiighte pagte luteng _ ataasigh _ ayag ma kangat _ .
uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ sa ngugh ghllag k _ test- pig ka _ mamlegute uk _ . _ â
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ entaqun _ taawa _ Nun aag ak _ ! _ Negh ighh aaneng _ nangllegtagh na iqe agket _ . _ â
tawaten _ uyiighagh teng _ , _ entaqun _ esgha _ uyiighagh leg perewaagh t _ , _ uyiighagh ni _ saagllug qu _ tawaten _ uyiighagh kun _ taaggun _ mayugh uute ut _ .
Kingu lighpig agh nguq _ iiwen _ nuyilegh u te kestagh aqe a _ sayug aghte aat _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ mugh aayagh llaak _ , _ qivallug ghllag _ , _ mugh aayagh llak _ .
naqam _ test- pig ka _ en leg a _ aligh ite ngughk _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ taawa _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ uugte ukut _ . _ â _ Nun aag ak _ negh ighh aaneng _ n angleg t aghn iiq agket _ .
â _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ kaate ukut _ .
whaken _ igleghte naanghite ukut _ , _ tazingavek _ aglagh luta _ Nun aag agnun _ qavangsi naqe ukut _ elngaatall _ egtug yug gpenaamta _ . _ â _ ( _ aatkagh kegte pigte lghiit _ entaqun _ neghigh luku _ . _ )
â _ unaami _ wetku _ aghtekan _ mingle anun _ taglagh lleqe ukut _ . _ â
taawa _ aghte neghsigh ma kangat _ .
llaaghanam _ agh saqminigu _ , _ Nun aag ak _ .
taawa _ mingle anun _ pagavek _ , _ qiv allug llaak _ , _ tuum llug llak _ , _ elngaatall _ igleghtekagh t _ .
aghneq _ naten _ lliigh magh an _ entaqun _ tapghagh ghhagh kun _ taakwagun _ qutenge ma lghiit _ .
siivanllegh ita _ apaate ma kangit _ uk atmun _ .
kukuleg mun _ uw avek _ kaate naqe sqe ai _ .
Iiw en Ê¼nguq _ mamleg a qaa _ kukuleg mun _ kaat quute ut _ , _ kukuleg nguq _ paaghq iin negh h aq an iimalghii _ tamaani _ .
nenge lunga _ kiyaghute lghii _ salin _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ elngaatall _ teghh um as aqum eng _ naghugh esnagh tes nay an ghit iisi _ , _ maani _ qavagh naqe ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ nenglu itnun _ itegh gpenasi _ . _ â

tamaani _ ighulugh meng _ ivagh i luteng _ mangteghasqwaagh ngllagh ut _ .
legan _ nanevgagh m _ apeghtugh ai _ , _ â _ kinku nun _ taa kunun _ nav ghagh yagh aq l usii _ legan _ unguva pigte lghii stun _ pi tek _ .
kinku t _ navghagh vike aqe luki _ sa meng _ tanpegh meng _ ighulugh meng _ tamaaken _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ legan _ tawaten _ navghagh aqe luteng _ .
taawa _ azigutagh _ taaqe luku _ qavagh ut _ .
naagu nguq _ saq rag gaq _ llaaghanwha _ , _ wetku nguq _ unaami _ aghtaghagh naqe llegh mi _ , _ qaga nguq _ aghqiiw _ , _ qii ll aghq u _ .
nanevgagh m _ pi aqe kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ upugha te aisi _ .
apeghiigh kufsi _ nav gh aghh asi _ tamaakut _ yug itnun _ veghute qugh nakesi _ .
maaken _ igleghte lleqe ukut _ . _ â
apeghiigh luteng _ iglegh naq ng ameng _ whaten _ tuum llug llagmi _ imani _ , _ whaten _ uygu uute qugh te luteng _ igleghte ma ite ngugh t _ .
Sak igh me nguq _ kangighagh anun _ pikavek _ taglagh kau ut _ .
En taq un Ê¼nguq _ aling yu waagh utng uk aalghiit _ qamagte luteng _ .
tawaten _ taagken _ taglagh kau ut _ sak igh meng _ , _ pikavek _ kangighagh anun _ kukuleg m _ .
kangighagh u negh nge uq _ wetku _ ukavek _ igiigh yameng _ naallghute ut _ .
Q un aghhaq _ una _ atallug nkut _ ata at _ , _ Qer ngugh te kaam _ ugw ik saq anga _ , _ atallug nkuk _ , _ W aall ankut _ ata ak _ , _ Q un aghhaq _ taana _ .
En kaa ngam nguq _ n angyagh t aghq waagh llakaq _ , _ an usim igh tem _ mekelghiigh pigu luni _ , _ ii ku taa mak aq _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe aat _ .
ila i _ iike ta t
taakut _ ila i _ ungipamsug m _ nunanigh ut _ , _ puygu kanigh luki _ iwernga _ ungipamsug ke naqe anka _ .
uksaagh ghhagh u negh nge uq _ iike tke aat _ , _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh yayek _ .
Nap azig enkut _ , _ M es uur unkut _ , _ Qet iin ankut _ , _ kinku t _ , _ iike tke aat _ .
uksughtekagh t _ iitek _ B er ing _ S ea- mi _ esgha _ .
uksughte ma lghiit _ navek _ taakwavek _ .
Tawaten niiq sagh iin Ê¼nguq _ taakw ag ung iighh agh nguq _ ivgagh te nghminiki _ kiyang _ uteghnigh igate ut _ .
sivuqagh mi _ iike te neghtuqagh t _ .
naqamalla nguq _ awavagh qu te _ ivgagh te nghminiki _ entaqun _ maaqnegh m nguq _ aygugh mun _ ukavek _ ivgagh te aqe kangi _ .
aamta _ taakw ag ung iighh agh nguq _ pi nghminiki _ entaqun _ i kev regh aam _ aghvigh te meng _ pi aqe kangi _ .
Tawate t kan Ê¼nguq _ uksughtekagh t _ .
ellmaaragte nghaani nguq _ maaqnegh m _ sukate pigte luki _ aygugh te aqe yagh kangi _ .
naayghagh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ aliigh aqe yagh lghii _ , _ ima nguq _ aygugh u aghte nghaani _ iivagh aqe lghii _ .
taawa nguq _ aghneghtuumaan _ qiighqagh _ maana _ ila kepagningite te aat _ .
Ay v i kaat ngin aghhagh nguq _ taana _ talughte neghlliqe yagh uq _ .
taawa nguq _ tagtalmi _ aviighute uq _ temngi _ meraaghinagh ghllag mun _ lliigh ut _ .
S iku v ag llag en Ê¼nguq _ nekagh ughte ait _ , _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nalighnegh i _ ne ngllagh luki _ .
ellmaaragte nghaani nguq _ tuvagh u te aqe kangi _ .
M ugh utaq elghii n Ê¼nguq _ tamaani _ .
Piy uwh aaghhiin aghm un Ê¼nguq _ taana _ sakniqe tkesagh aat _ megh _ , _ megh ite ngugh t _ .
ayveghagh luteng _ wallu _ maklagte luteng _ , _ qilu aneng _ entaqun _ ighneghllug ngllagh luteng _ , _ aatkagh meng _ kiigh akun _ whaten _ qen legh waagh luteng _ pi ma lghiit _ .
anigu meng _ , _ peghqinegh pigu ma ut _ esgha _ taag n aput _ , _ esghaghhu _ anigu meng _ imigh luki _ yugusigh megteggun _ mengllagh yagute ut _ .
yugusigh m _ maatnegh an _ ughug taq egkangi _ .
taawa _ megh _ akluk nanigh aat _ .
taana nguq _ estam aat _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute uq _ .
aghipa m _ saam _ entaqun _ enraq llu _ kanagh luni _ , _ asi gni _ uniigh yayek _ iilqayug luni _ tuqute ma lghii _ .
taakut _ pi nga yu t _ uksughtekagh t _ tawani _ .
M es uur unkut _ , _ Nap az inkut _ , _ Qet iin ankut _ .
qete i i na qrug ngugh _ taana _ atugh kayugu ma a _ .
taana _ Nap az inaq _ alignagh lghii _ , _ ilagagh qagh yu k _ .
Tughnegh aan Ê¼nguq _ megh m _ uusqagh llegh anun _ pi igate ma lghiit _ , _ megh mi _ kiyaghsigate ma lghiit _ .
Tughnegh iigh utng waaq aagut _ meghllag mun _ lliigh yameng _ .
Al al ak angin aghhiin aagh te kaag un Ê¼nguq _ .
Al al ak ang uf tughnguq _ tughneghagh i _ mesungesag t _ .
Taaku ngin agh aagh simalghiit _ megh m _ pi i _ .
Tawaten Ê¼nguq _ esla _ naafte luni _ milegtaagh te naqe negh meggni _ ellmeggneng _ ilutughsagh te aqe luteng _ iknaqsuugte te aqe luteng _ kiyaghtekagh t _ .
milegtaagh te naqe negh meggni _ taana _ pingayugh tek _ pi aqe ka ak _ , _ â _ qete i i na _ ! _ seghleghhalek _ , _ seghletun _ kiyaghte naqlaatagh ukut _ , _ averngu lta _ . _ â _ atugh ghpagte ste aqe ka ak _ pingayugh tek _ taana _ .
ii _ , _ nem et alghiistun _ llaaghanwha _ qesugniqe aqe lghiit _ avara te magh meng _ ellmeggneng _ .
llaaghanwha _ milegtaagh lleghqagh eng _ ov er c ome- aaq egkangat _ .
taaqe negh meggni _ taana _ pi nga yu aat _ enraq _ ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
taawa nguq _ mesungesag inagh ghhagh t _ taakut _ tughneghagh i _ tagi aqe lghiit _ .
aamta _ ila a _ tughneghaan _ ivegh igate ma ut _ entaqun _ , _ aviighute uute tke aat _ .
uksugh ghllag _ avii tke aat _ , _ uksaagh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ , _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh llegh gkeneng _ .
entaqun _ may- mi _ ima _ wetku _ nani _ K am s aatk am _ nalighnegh akun _ qutengekagh t _ .
tawaten _ apegh ait _ .
Ak luk nanigh aan Ê¼nguq _ megh _ .
anigullugte luni _ lliigh yalghiimi _ taakut _ nayigh ita _ akeleghraagh a _ meghaagh nge luni _ , _ tamaaken _ meqekagh t _ .
esghaghhu qun _ repall _ ughug yan _ , _ taakut _ nayugh teng _ uyiigh agh meggneng _ asighte ma kangit _ entaqun _ ugl af nayuk aki _ .
T uv aghn an iq angi _ taaku ngin aghh aagh tut _ , _ aqlagha igh u uute kanga _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmeng _ qute _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
qute mun _ paga _ tugh aagh tut _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmeng _ kii _ , _ tekeghagh ghllag _ ika _ .
tawavek _ tekeghagh ghllag mun _ itghute kanigh ai _ uku m _ tung angakun _ .
tekeghagh ghllag _ taana _ tugh waagh yaq megteggu _ kii _ , _ sugenregh igh ghllag luni _ .
H aak _ ! _ seghleghhalek _ tawavek _ kaatute kumegteki _ whaa _ seghleghu naqe ut _ .
iitek _ whaten _ aklu i te kanigh luteng _ , _ qute m _ ketf ag g aakun _ taakwavek _ aan uugh utk an iq angi _ .
taana _ pingayugh tek _ pi laatagh ma ka ak _ , _ alignagh lleghtagh tek _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ , _ ingavek _ atneghagh anun _ lliigh kumta _ sugenregh mun _ , _ ukut _ nayugh mta _ unite lleqe ainkut _ .
alignagh na iqe luten _ naten _ pi naqe i _ . _ â
amsanaghllugllak _ .
tawaten _ ilagagh luni _ Al al ak ani _ taakut _ aleghqugh qu ai _ naten _ kayute ngllaghkagh _ .
qateghllug ghllag mi nguq _ imani _ sikuvag ghllag t _ kelute mun _ qukfighute naagh aat _ elngaatall _ , _ tawavek _ kangighagh anun _ .
qute meng _ aw avaq aan lluteng _ teghh akun _ tuute tke aat _ , _ aghqe itagh i tke aat _ , _ nalugutekagh neng _ aw avaq aan lluteng _ .
iwernga _ if qall agh ngaaghmeng _ uug llegh aatkat _ .
tanemlleqa _ iiw en Ê¼nguq _ ghh atagh tekestagh aqii _ qute mun _ taakwavek _ uugtekagh t _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ tap ghagh llaak _ sa ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ , _ enkaam _ naan tu le y eng _ nalluke kangat _ .
Tawaten Ê¼nguq _ tungtu tgun _ ( _ b i g _ d ip pe r _ ) _ aygugh ut _ .
aghte nghaani _ siqin ghem _ tunganganun _ igleghte aqe luteng _ .
Tap ghagh llag uf tughnguq _ aygugh mun _ esne _ tawaten _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ tu mes ug ning iighhaq _ avangite uq _ .
temngi qun _ aatakqun _ igleghte ut _ .
qafsina _ qavagh _ atugh magh an _ , _ wallu nguq _ tanqigh _ .
H iik _ , _ iim qagh t allegh sug ning iighh aat _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ esghagh ait _ .
tume u lleghqagh i _ nallun eq nagh luteng _ temngi _ iime qaghte luteng _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ iime qagh ta vleghagh _ tamaa na _ nula kestagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ seghleghhalek _ negh ke igh te naqe ut _ qute mun _ lliigh yalghiimeng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ nalluniigh te ut _ tumete yug ni u luteng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ kii _ , _ peghwaagh ghllag t _ kaa saq megteki _ iqall uw aghllak _ peghwaagh ghllag _ .
negh ut _ elngaatall _ .
negh luteng _ , _ angyagh u aatagh luteng _ taawa _ igleghte ut _ .
aygugh lqinagh luteng _ peghwaagh t _ kaate nghmegteki _ taawa _ iq al uw aaw aqelghiit _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ tekeghagh _ qem igh y uk _ inga _ aliigh aat _ , _ iiwen _ qem igh yugmeng _ taagken _ mayugh aqe ut _ , _ amaken _ yug m llu _ atunem _ .
atunem _ aliigh te ut _ .
kii _ , _ piyaqmegteggu _ yuug _ tusaqepagningite aat _ , _ ulu _ alla _ .
seghleghhalek _ tu saq unnegh i tem _ enraq _ seghleghu naqe ut _ , _ liig i kunnegh i tem _ .
qete i i na _ taana _ , _ esgha _ sa u a _ kiyaghtaallegh llagem _ apeghiigh waagh luku _ ayuqe nghminigu _ , _ mekelghiigh u luni _ nukalpigagh pigu luni _ k id nap -e kaa malghii _ .
tespamna _ quteghllag _ negh ighh aaneng _ yu wa _ amyuqetagh na iqe aat _ .
K id nap - egh ikayug uniiq aat _ qiighqagh m _ m atu m _ anglinghhagh aneng _ , _ aghnaghagh aneng _ , _ nukalpigagh aneng _ metngeghute i kayug _ .
taana _ qete i i na _ metngeghute kau ma yagh lghii _ .
tawaten _ enraq llu _ esgha _ tuune aqe luki _ , _ tuune aqe luki _ tawaten _ pi ma aqe ait _ .
A saag g aankut _ maakut _ ungipaq ag egkangit _ tawaten _ pi kau ni luki _ .
taana _ Qet iin aq r uk _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghii _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike kau ma yagh lghii _ .
quyilleg ni _ qepghagh luni _ , _ qepghagh luni _ aghyuqe yami _ metngeqagh qrug u uq _ .
uteghnigh kau ma lghii _ naqam _ .
nukalpigagh k _ maalghug u lutek _ yug m _ qepghagh tek egk akek _ quyilleg m _ .
Q ite f kay uug te q rug um aa _ esghaghhu _ .
seghleghhalek _ aag llegh gkenka _ pil aatagh aak _ , _ â _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ , _ yug lgute mun _ kaat ngwaagh luta _ tu saq unnegh i tem _ seghletun _ pi naqe ukut _ , _ aatak _ qiteve te naqe gu _ ! _ â
Qet iin aq rug em _ qitev us aq minigu _ , _ ii _ iingken _ ak is aq minigu _ nutem _ nagate ll ghistun _ tawatengwaaq _ akuzillegh a _ ayuqe luni _ .
ii _ , _ napaghpagtagh te lutek _ aga _ payegh te uk _ .
ii _ , _ kaat ute te lutek _ qet legh u tug nguq _ , _ elngaatall _ .
piyaqminigu _ taana _ qepgh algut ni _ neghigh luku _ mekelghiigh _ whaa _ nallagh utu te aqe uk _ .
tawaten _ aleghquute lutek _ pi ma kangi _ , _ ama _ negh ghllag _ taa man niluku _ , _ â _ keleg qaghte te yaghtugh naqe amsi _ .
Taam um _ ne m _ upugha te i llegh a _ tawatete uq _ , _ yug m _ kaate lghii m _ uum _ pana teng _ uut qigh lluki _ elpesi nun _ nengug te aatagh lleqe ait _ .
tugu manginagh nakesi _ , _ tugu manginagh nakesi _ .
tuqute naanghite aisi _ , _ upugha te i llegh it _ tawatete ut _ . _ â
taawa _ aga _ aglagh uq _ llaaghanwha _ .
M aate qwaaq un Ê¼nguq _ llaaghanam _ kii _ , _ yuug _ inwa nguq _ palaghhagh _ kaat quute uq _ .
llaaghanam nguq _ kaate lghii m _ uum _ pana teng _ uut qigh lluki _ , _ taawa _ tugu ma inagh ke ait _ .
taake uk _ Nap az ug enkuk _ M es uur un kuk _ ne m _ tamaa tu m _ umiileg an _ aqelqagh ke ma kek _ .
taana _ Qet iin aq r uk _ taam _ aqelqagh ke ma kanga _ qepghagh lgutkekagh an _ .
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ , _ Qet iin ankuk _ taana llu _ .
Pan in anguq _ ne m _ tamaa tu m _ ulu a _ alla u uq _ .
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ kiyaghte ut _ .
Taam _ Nap az ug em _ , _ nuyekligh ke ma atgu _ ungipaate sqe ma kanga _ Qet iin amun _ , _ â _ Ik ii f si n Ê¼nguq _ ne mnni _ samani _ sivuqagh ghhagh mi _ tawaten _ un iil iq eghllag luta _ qutengeqaghte negh mta _ taghyugh igh aqe yagh ukut _ !
a tuq _ sa u a _ pinigh yuuk _ atuq aqsagh aghput _ . _ â
ii _ , _ umiileg m _ piyaqminiki _ , _ umiileg an _ nuna m _ taam _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ legan _ pi aqe llegh gpesistun _ pi tek _ . _ â _ taawa _ taana _ Qet iin aq r uk _ atugh tek laat aam akangat _ .
elngaatall nguq _ qesugniqe stekaqe a _ negh ghllag _ taana _ ellngin agh aghmi _ .
taana _ entaqun _ Nap az inaq _ ilagagh luni _ , _ qaywalleqa nguq _ tughneghaghtu pigte ma a _ qute mun _ uugte yalghiimi _ .

ghhute itgun _ , _ melghutagh itgun _ p uug p aghqu m _ yuug _ qim aag lluku _ .
tawatete kau ut _ .
maalghug gneng _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh k _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
ataasigh inagh u yaghqaa yagh lghii nguq _ naligh t _ , _ wallu _ qete i i na _ nelliqe luni _ sa luni _ taagken _ anaggute luni _ taake ughtagh aqe aat _ .
iike te llegh meggneng _ estamat ii te kun _ wetku _ , _ es tamaani _ ayumiqullegh m _ ungazigh mun _ kaateqaghsi ma lghiit _ .

tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe ait _ .

N uugh naa m _ apegh llegh a
Sivuk egh pig agh lunga _ liisagh lghiinga _ An asug enkut _ pamani _ guygu ita _ kelu kaghagh itni _ mangteghapig mi _ , _ tawani _ liite unga _ .

nekeve te _ , _ whanga _ , _ aqume igate ngughk _ , _ M ik l aghhaq _ .
enkaam _ P aa z ag em _ anglegut angi _ taakut _ Iq mal u wa _ , _ T up aanga _ , _ a qaa _ , _ Ag e z a _ .
whanga _ ategh ka _ Ag e z angun iiq aat _ , _ uyuq ligh pigaq _ .
Iq mal uw am _ taam _ M ik agh aq _ nulugh igh qugh a _ .
taana _ Aghnagh aghp ak _ ugw ing iis an _ , _ entaqun _ qilleghte uute te m _ ata an _ nuligh qes aqanga _ Kingu waagh haam _ .
Pel egh qes ata _ enkaam _ tugu te ste qugh luki _ tawavek _ lli aqe aq _ .
taakut _ ama _ atalgute ke te lghiit _ Ang q ateng an w at enkut _ , _ Q aal unkut _ .
taakut _ Pel aasi n kutlu _ , _ U w etel enkut _ ila ke te ut _ .
ila ke te luta _ whangkuta _ ayuqe ukut _ .
taakut _ qayuutagh m _ ila ke ai _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ Pel aasi _ apakagh ut _ imani _ ategh a _ .
enkaam _ nev ngam _ entaqun _ atiiqe te aqe luteng _ .
saama _ entaqun _ ilaliigh te aqe lghiit _ tawaten _ neghe lgutke te luteng _ lliigh negh meggni _ .
tawaten qun _ liite lleg mni _ nagate aqe anka _ .
naange aat _ taana _ A tek anguuq _ , _ T ang a tun kut _ taakut _ entaqun _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ U w etel enkut _ .
U w etel em _ nulighh a _ W am iiy aq _ .
taana _ W iy a _ , _ aymaramket _ aghnaa t _ .
Enkaangam _ taana _ ugw igh pig ani _ tuqu yan _ taagken _ Iy eng qigh meng _ ugw iiq aq _ .
Enkaangam _ taakut _ P aang ankuk _ uziva nkuk _ , _ aghnagh t qun _ ataasigh t _ anglegute ke te pestaagh t _ , _ tume _ ataasigh _ , _ aanvig _ ataasigh _ , _ allameng _ at ak aqsagh ngaagh ngaata _ .

whangkuta qun _ pam an ll iim ta _ , _ asag ghllag mta _ taam _ , _ Nagh uq ang uftuq _ taana _ pam an ll iim ta _ king ungh at _ , _ elngaatall _ sungagh meng _ atghagh te aqe kanginkut _ tangyeghute meng _ , _ qupag meng _ .
elngaatall nguq _ tamaa na _ pi tke pigte aat _ megnu nagh lghii _ .
entaqun _ sivunegh put _ tes p amken _ pi u ut _ .
esgha qun llu _ ukut _ W al ang ankut _ , _ ila put _ whangkuta _ .
nallukngwaagh yalghiikut _ whangkuta _ , _ ellnga n _ Uuk et am _ ungipamsug te kaqe ainkut _ .
liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ quunpeng _ pangeghte a _ .
tagitug mi _ qevuute luteng _ tawaten _ amsanaghllug ghllag mi _ suqsugh t _ uka _ aliigh aqe lghiit _ .
sakmani _ nagh aa negh tuq a kut _ aatnegh mi _ .
taagken _ emta _ tawaten _ tagitugllug _ , _ Iq mal uw ankuk _ , _ Ay ak in kuk _ , _ aatnegh kun _ iggasighte lutek _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ , _ naghaagh te aqe lghiikut _ aatnegh m _ asi ani _ taakwani _ .
sangamta _ tawaten _ pi llegh ut _ nalluke kegka _ .
qaasqagh mi _ ama _ pinegh mta _ aghillug m _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ .
uuk _ mate- yaag yu ngiighhagh _ ama _ taana _ quunpeng _ qaas qam ennegh tuqaq _ .
L iit ngwaagh luta _ pi yalghiikut _ esghap al uug usiq _ taghnughhagh nun _ , _ nanugh t _ naken _ ikegken llu _ , _ kiiwhken llu _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
tawaten _ emta _ upenghagh mi _ kii _ uka _ suq sugh aliigh llak _ , _ nutem _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ tagi laghate te k _ . _ â _ Tawatel nguut _ ar aq ru w aqelghiit _ kaate yaghtugh negh meggni _ .
â _ aa _ , _ milugh mig te ku ut _ , _ taghnegh iigh te ku ut _ . _ â _ P iq ru w aqelghiit _ ungazighmii t _ .
upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ kaate kayugu ut _ akilpegagh niigh ghllaget _ .
entaqun _ aghsaan _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ tespamani _ aklungi igh lleghtu ghngaaghmeng _ .
ila i qun _ wenigh a _ saaputagh ite aqe ut _ talwa _ qalleg vag qiinagh luteng _ , _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ qal ip aag g aghmeng _ .
yug t _ tamaakut _ saatghwaagh qiinagh luteng _ akilpegagh na i aaghet _ .
qevuute luteng _ aki kegte ghllaget _ .
qallukagh at _ san agh tengngwaaq at _ kavigh tengngwaagh luteng _ .
sungagh _ , _ ugtinghagh _ , _ qikmiiraagh _ kavigh tengngwaaq aq _ , _ sa u a _ legan _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ aki kaghqagh _ .
qayugh leg nun _ , _ sa meng _ maaken _ estu w aam _ pi anun _ aki it _ .
qiipaghagh put _ maakut _ wh atel nguut _ ugpeqagh meng _ atigh luki _ aghnagh ita _ .
ugpeqagh ghhagh leg nun llu _ aki it _ tawaten _ .
quunpeng _ liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ akequsagh leg ni _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ puughte aqe kanginkut _ entaqun _ .
nalleqligh ke na iqe lghiit _ , _ entaqun _ taagani _ ila teng _ .
Sivul iigh amta _ ila ke te lghiit _ nalleqligh u lghiit _ ellngit ni _ .
nalleqligh mta nguq _ piiq egk angin kun Ê¼nguq _ tamaakut _ , _ â _ taghnughhagh si _ keleng akluk ii _ kalngagmig lleqe aput _ . _ â _ puughte luta _ entaqun _ .
kalngagmig na yu kanginkut _ whangkuta _ itegh aataq elghiikut _ .
urang _ aki kegte pigte ut _ .

aqelqaghni ii aagh _ , _ upugha te i llegh
aqelqaghniigh ta leg _ tamaani _ .
liisagh lghiikut _ qellinegh _ esgha _ teskana _ igaghvig ghllag m _ n atu m _ neliite tke a _ .
uyghag ghrugllag t _ taawa _ angqaperug kegtagh leg t _ pi nga yu t _ , _ mekestaaghhagh _ ataasigh _ , _ amalleqa _ taana _ aqelqaghniigh sagh it _ .
aqfaqugh vig leg ghllag u yaghpete uq _ taawa _ .
taana _ Q ell ingh uftuq _ ategh a _ , _ qerngugh vik _ .
aqfaqugh te ghllag t _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ iitek _ liite aqa _ , _ esghapag kaqe anka _ legan _ ategh aqe luteng _ aga _ .

esghapag na pigte uq _ , _ iinghusaleg _ emta _ .

ima wha _ wiin _ esghapag yugh ngaamta _ tunuvagh aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ esghapag aqe ukut _ .
liisagh lghiinga qun _ whanga _ , _ yug t _ taakut _ kinku t _ entaqun _ aagken _ naken _ kilgaaqu aqe aat _ sam aw un _ naayghagh m _ mingle akun _ kaspugte luku _ .
entaqun _ tawatete aqe yagh ut _ .
aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ k allegh teghll aneghmeggni _ pingayugh qelluteng _ .
aki yan _ qaasqagh ani _ , _ uw atangan _ qaasqagh ani _ , _ ne m _ tun ut angani _ .
seghlegh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ .
whaa _ entaqun _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ tawaten _ , _ enraq _ atugh aqe lghiit _ teskan ani _ sulug nkut ni _ .
amenqun _ taakut _ atughte ghllagu na iqe yagh kangit _ .
iitek _ angukagh put _ .

kii _ , _ en ragh ngam _ whangkuta _ asag mta _ taam _ Sing leng am _ , _ igh le kum taagh llag inkut _ atugh nun _ kanavek _ panrengi naqe negh mta _ .

naqam _ taana _ panig a _ pugughileghmii u lghii _ , _ asag ke te lghiik _ atghagh aqe lghiik _ An asug enkuk _ .

atugh ghllag t _ tawaten _ .
sa sqe qaghte aqe linkut _ ipa _ meghtigh sqe ainkut _ , _ kayusiite sqe uq _ , _ taghnughhiqe te sqe uq _ , _ legre na yukagh mta _ .

pi aqe kanginkut _ whangkuta _ Sing leng am _ , _ â _ pagaliit _ atigh igate ut _ , _ aghula igate ut _ . _ â _ whangkuta _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh nghata _ tawaten _ atugh ghllag nghmeng _ , _ tumighqaate naqe negh meggni _ , _ taglagh uute naqe negh meggni _ , _ tumighqaate naqe na iqe ut _ .
P uyg iim aghmeng _ ila i _ waame te aqe lghiit _ , _ entaqun _ amsanagh ghhagh u luku _ taglagh uute na luteng _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ maaten _ esgha _ , _ neve ste uute ghllag luta _ entaqun _ imaken _ ima _ ayuqe lghiikut _ whaa _ .

tawaten _ kingu itneng _ atugh ghllag qagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ esla llu _ naafte nghaani _ .

awiim _ ulape sigh ke kangit _ .

nalluke aqa _ whanga _ apegh luku _ pi aqe aat _ .

angag ke na iqe lghii _ Sun aaghr uk _ taana _ ama _ .
iknaqe llegh ke aqe kanga _ sivuqagh m _ , _ iknaqe uq _ .

tamaakut _ Y agh aankut _ kilgaaqu ste u na iqe yagh ait _ , _ aantagh mii m llu _ ata a _ Q aa lu _ .
qepe qaghtugh usigh luteng _ kilgaaqu kayug t _ tamaakut _ .
qepe qagh uute kek _ taake uk _ aqume igate ngugh mete uk _ Q aal um _ .
qiinghigh mangite agka _ sa u te kek _ .
salem- perewaagh _ entaqun _ tamaghhagh mi _ sa llegh _ .
nanughaghtagh leg t _ tamaakut _ iknaqughi ghllagkagh t _ .
nanughaghtagh luteng _ aatkagh it _ tunugh ke isigh luteng _ qull ig it _ , _ temkagh it _ , _ iknaqe lghiit _ , _ sukate ngugh t _ .
I ir gugh llaklu _ una _ tunuqite lgu luku _ angukagh ka _ whanga _ .
temngi _ yuug _ kiyagh taagh yaghqaanghi saghpe tuq _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ nukalpigagh _ yugughtekagh _ , _ nukalpigagh _ maana _ anglinghhagh _ .
whaa _ whangkutestun _ entaqun _ yugtu tekagh liqe aq _ sa meng _ ikfiq liigh lleghhii _ aga _ kayusigh magh an _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ .

esghapag inagh yaghqaa nghite yaghpete ut _ .

uksugh mi _ whaten _ umegnegh mi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ neng aang itegh ngaata _ anigu m _ pi nghaki _ pe ke tu taqluki _ .
nengaa ita _ qepghaat kay ugw iit _ .
maaten _ allangugh tem _ talwa _ kayusigh i na niite ut _ .

taakwani _ whangkunni _ puvalla meng _ esghaate mangite unga _ angli u lunga _ .
avangite ukut _ sa ite ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ apa ghllag ut _ taana _ aghillug _ uksaagh te nghatni _ , _ isi _ kev iiw aqelghii _ quyngigh m _ kevigh kaqe kanga _ isigima _ .

sa u a _ wallu _ melqugh igh aq _ enraq _ liigike llghite aqa _ .
inglukutagh ke lghiikung _ whangkutung _ .
U ugh qagh m iin kuk _ aqume igate ngugh nkuk _ , _ nekeve te nkuk _ , _ T uus aankuk _ , _ Ag ig sug enkuk _ Qag aq un kuk _ , _ inglukutagh ke luta _ , _ whangkutung _ aghillug llu _ .
inglu ke neghtu aanga _ whanga _ .
P egg nemteki _ aga _ legan _ , _ akuqagh aqe ke put _ kaate nghata _ .
emta _ natete yaghqagh nun _ , _ ellnga qun _ taana _ whangkuta _ apa ut _ , _ whaa _ ayumiqu luku _ , _ sa kan _ uksaagh kan _ ifla lleqe uq _ , _ taana _ legan _ igleghte aq _ , _ qukaghite nghmini _ sall ip g aghtaq luni _ .

qelanegh na ghllag _ kum aght in aqa _ .
taawa _ aan gh ugh lluteng _ taakut _ kumagh nghata _ supughragh nghminiki _ , _ qenwat _ kumagh aqe ut _ .

Aghveng enghata _ Sal qum si lleq
whaa _ upengh anghani _ tawaten _ unÊ¼g a _ aghvenge ni nghatki _ , _ naghaagh te ghngaamta _ elngaatall _ taglagh uute luta _ , _ uka _ kaal g ungh aat a _ piy ut qer rag kiigh aqukut _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t llu _ , _ aghnaghagh t llu _ .
whangkuta _ aghnaghagh ni _ ughvughqe te luta _ taaqe luta _ taq ugh tengngwaagh luta _ , _ samaken _ nanigh m _ asi aneng _ aallnegh meng _ qilag aput _ pi luki _ atghagh uute aqe ukut _ .
sangamta _ nalluke aqa _ nangaghnegh m _ almesiqe laatagh kanga _ .
taawa _ mangtagtu uute aqe ukut _ tesamani _ .
P ilag et _ atalughagh meng _ mil uv ik aqegkanginkut _ .
angyaleg t _ tamaakut _ esghapag na lleghpigagh at _ .
nulighh it _ pika _ angyilghagh ni _ .
kaankut _ ugw imeng _ aquutagh _ pi te lghii ii nigh itgun _ qal taagh w ragg aat _ , _ aghul ak all ghu unegh meggni _ esghapag na pigte ut _ .
nulighh it _ pika _ kenilegh m _ nalighnegh ani _ , _ angyaleg t _ kana _ angyagh mi _ , _ aghvenge lghiit _ taakut _ .
iwerngaqun _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ , _ qal taagh w ragg aghmeng _ nulighh it _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ .
K atu m _ ugw imeng _ sa te lghii ii nagh u kete te _ qalta teng _ aghulate aqe luki _ .
tawatete laatagh lghiit _ entaqun _ .
taakut _ iv igh teng it _ manughagh kun _ aqume uute luteng _ .
uka _ llaag t _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ , _ taakut _ aghvegh leg t _ atigh aqe luki _ apallugh ke aqe luki _ ilagagh aqe lghiit _ .
ilagaate it _ nalluke anka _ liite mangite anka _ , _ naqam _ whanga llu _ aqume aqe lghiinga _ .
Iv igh uteghllag aqut _ aghnagh perewaagh t _ , _ aghni ut llu _ entaqun _ naken _ ugw iiq at _ tagi luteng _ aghvenge lghii nun _ ugw it eng _ sa teng _ aghveng enghata _ .
taakut _ aymaramket pig t _ , _ aymaramket pigu na iqe anka _ yug squgh u ta ghhagh t _ taakut _ .
W iyagh ll aw aaqelghii _ taana _ , _ aghnaghagh t _ panig it llu _ , _ whangkuta llu _ ila ke luta _ , _ iglakegte ghllag _ aghnagh _ ivi igh nghmini _ .
Malig tev y iiq aghaq aghput _ iitek _ , _ tawaten _ angyaleg t _ atigh aqe luki _ .
Iv igh tel ep er ew aal get _ entaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ .
iwerngaqun _ naangellegh itnun _ llaag t _ angaghqugh llegh it _ .
esgha _ siqlugagh lgu yaghpete ukut _ A pe tek inkut _ kelu kaghagh itni _ llaag lghutagh lgu aq _ .
llaag lghutagh _ entaqun _ ilukligh u uq _ , _ ataasigh _ amig ke luku _ .
Taakw an tut _ whangkuta _ siqlugagh put _ , _ taana _ ama _ neqelghutagh u na iqe a _ Ang q ateng an w ate m _ .
ellngit a nguq _ siq luw aqagh aat _ taana _ .
nuyekligh teng _ entaqun _ naasqugh ke luki _ legan _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
maaten _ qavngaq _ pi yaqegka _ K ing ungh am _ kelg us aq minigu _ , _ en m is s _ iiggellug igh ghllag luni _ , _ siqlugagh ut _ taana _ ughyugh ghllag luni _ .
esgha _ kelut angit nilnguut _ siqlugagh t _ taakwegkut _ , _ taaku nguut _ siqlugagh put _ taakw an tut _ .
K ag pam sug llaget _ , _ nani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
paninang qun _ salin _ maana _ , _ ugw iigh um aghma _ tuyugh qaghaqe ainkut _ ukut _ nayugh mta _ R aa quun kut _ .
uziva nkut _ salin _ entaqun _ angyeghetagh _ sa u a _ atuqe u luku _ .
mangtag _ , _ qasugh iqe aq _ sa u a _ tuyugh aqe aat _ .
angyeghetagh t _ tamaakut _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ neqe t _ angyagh mun _ kelqe te aaghet _ , _ ategh i _ angyeghetagh t _ .
taakut _ alla _ akmagtagh ghhagh t _ aghinghwaagh u na iqe ait _ .
sanqute t _ , _ aghvegh mun _ pi sigh t _ , _ aghinghwaagh lghutagh t _ .
aghvenge naqe llegh _ piraamsi tete luku _ ayuqe yagh kangat _ .
eghqwaagh uute aqe luteng _ tanqigh mi _ nani _ .
angyagh mun _ pi sigh _ enkaam _ entaqun _ yataagh qen naq neghmeggni _ eghqwaagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
Kaa vam _ angli naqe llegh a
Kaa vam _ apegh llegh a
siknegh
siknegh mi _ tesamani _ qafsina neng _ akuuragh aqe aqa _ qazigyagh _ , _ whaten _ iiwleng _ pi gpenaan _ , _ ayumiqullegh t _ ataasigh t _ .
U w aligh neghmeng _ taaw egken _ esneghag ni _ .
nalluqagh nge a _ , _ angyengestagh lgu lghiinga _ .
ilu te mun _ maaq ek _ uughqaghtagh t _ allgeq est at _ .
negig llegh k _ wh aang iighh aagh llutek _ kenle kek _ , _ uks aa pag mi _ whaten _ , _ ilu te mun _ tung yuuk _ maaqe ghllagek _ .
unake luki _ upag aghte luki _ tugu naqe i nagh ma luki _ , _ taakwavek _ malleg aghte nghminiki _ tegh luw aghtaq luki _ .
tawatete naagh zinga _ .
naqam _ unange ghllag _ , _ qayughllak _ uygu te ghllag _ .
U unÊ¼g gun _ aag lghii _ sa u luku _ .
Taw ateng in aan aqng ama _ , _ angalqatagh nka _ il em lluki _ kete qaghte lunga _ , _ kaate luki _ taw av eng iighhaq _ ang all q at ameng _ , _ nekreg ite ngugh nge a _ , _ angalqatagh aghte aqe anka _ .
legan _ taakwavek _ , _ enraq _ y akugh naq an iq _ , _ kag s aat aqegk anganga _ laagh anun _ .
Wh aang iighhaq _ negig llegh m _ kenle kek _ .
aghvinleg _ tugu qaghte aqa _ .
ila a _ aga _ tegh luw aghtaq anga _ , _ whan ik waaq aa _ iiwen _ , _ siqinegh _ tevigh yagh uq _ .
G u utng waaq aagunga _ iwerngaqun _ whan ik waa _ .
unaami _ uughqaghte aat _ kaate ghllag ma lghiit _ .
teskiwani _ U me y aal agni _ , _ qenu _ anuqe ngunani _ puglegh meng _ pi lghii _ amsanagh _ .
sa u a _ kagpesqwaagh _ , _ nalluk egh llagh ngaam ki _ suflugagh m _ qepghagh llegh i _ , _ piyuke lleg mtun _ lli aghte naqe aqa _ .
kingu a _ walamnaag aghagh aqa _ nakeghsagh ta a _ .
pinigh yagh lghii _ apeghiighkagh _ .
naakghite te ste ghllag aqa _ , _ uk atgh utagh llak _ .
teskiwavek _ ( _ nutaan _ unange ghraag vyiigh yagute aqe unga _ ) _ kaate yalghiinga _ taawa _ , _ aghnegh up aag umaan _ , _ uksaagh mi _ , _ nuug aqe uq _ kiiwhken _ elngaatall _ .
Wh aang iighh aaghh neghata _ gu un nem ki _ , _ ukatghute ghllag luki _ .
ii _ guusagh lghiinga _ .
unange gpenanga _ seghleghhalek _ ghhuugh ghhagh nka _ sikna yagute anka _ .
nuug ghllag _ unite luku _ quug meng _ qerngughte i yalghiinga _ , _ ghhuugh meng _ sik nayag utem _ .
teghiglug t _ esgha _ repall _ qungeghrug i _ aliigh aqe ut _ qenughhaghagh vleghagh mi _ mallegkagh m _ angtalanganeng _ .
iwerngaqun _ , _ aglagh negh mni _ legan _ guute aqe unga _ .
â _ sangami _ tawatete a _ . _ â
awavagh qagh a qun _ nuug lghii _ pii s utagh aghluku _ guusagh kegka _ leganqun _ .
tugu naagh nghite kegka _ amsan aghq waa kanga _ .
entaqun _ kiiwna a _ w al am naa pagem _ uk atgh ut atugh qwaa s tegh llak aqa _ .
taawa _ mataawi kau unga _ .
sivu nge aq
maana llu _ sivu nge aq _ nuugtu yagh lghii _ .
uksugh mi _ tuvagh _ regh ighh neghmini _ nuug leg pigu uq _ , _ unange na pigte yagh uq _ , _ maaten _ avangite te a _ .
aghsaan _ nuug pagite te a _ .
tawaten _ malleg lutek _ me ngunani _ kiyaghte uq _ .
R aa quq _ taana _ esavghaghtu raaghinagh _ .
Keleng ak aqeg kefut _ .
T uum llug llak _ , _ angyagh llegh ke sigh ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ inwa _ w algu yaag g aghmun _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ iknaq elg aqat _ .
aa _ , _ maghyaghqugh aqe kanginkut _ w algu yaag luni _ .
â _ puughte i lghiit _ tamaakut _ angwaaghute meng _ anagu aqe luki _ ! _ â _ amenam _ legan _ anagu aqe ke put _ .
esnevagh aqe ukut _ legan _ nuug aqe ut _ .
kayagte aqe kanginkut _ amsakellegh inagh aneng _ , _ nuugtu nghaani _ .
qafsina _ unake luku _ , _ tamaani _ ig leq aq waaq elghii _ , _ llaaghanwha _ ilangakun _ maklagte aqe lghii _ qavaghsigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ taakwegkut _ segge llegh ghllag t _ uteghmun _ itagnagh aqe ut _ .
Angy all qusigh llak _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
nuugtu pigte yagh uq _ .
sangami _ maaten _ nuug pagite te agu _ .
leveklug ghllag m _ saam _ teghh a _ s aku s lug tugh qw aam _ saam _ .
maana _ sivu nge aq _ nateghtu langa _ nallukngwaagh kegka _ .
siknegh mete aqe lghiinga _ quunpeng _ unang segh waaghmun _ lliigh ghngaan _ .
uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ .
uksaagh m _ unang segh waagh a _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ .
qineghpeghwaagh aqe lghiinga _ liigilliigh yama _ .
naten _ lliigh nghaani _ , _ uksaaghpag kestagh nghaani _ , _ ayvegh _ ukavek _ esghaq aqu tugh h negh atgu _ .
kaana _ ayveghagh igate uq _ kiw aligh neq an iq _ .
negh niigh vig ghllag _ , _ quunpeng _ ayvegh leg _ , _ qan taagh an tuq _ kana _ .
whaa _ tagtalmi _ esgh aall aagh nanigh tunga _ .
qantaghante uq _ , _ aghula i aatagh u ghllag _ .
Esgh aall aagh nanigh tunga _ .
nalluke kegka _ nateghtu langa _ , _ maan sim angitu nga _ , _ siknegh mete kanga _ .
pugughilegh meng _ ken qig llaagh penanga _ tesamani _ tagi unga _ maavek _ .
taawa _ tagi ukut _ pugughilegh meng _ .
Sivul igh pig aal u tung _ , _ ( _ Anaghay aankut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ maan lenguut _ ) _ , _ W aall allu _ tagite ainkung _ I ming ate m _ .
W aall a _ taana _ kiyalighagh mii u yagh lghii _ .
taakwagun _ , _ qamiye t _ malghugnegh t _ , _ W aall a _ qamugh ke luku _ .
qikmigh ghhagh t _ pinigh waaghet _ , _ naten _ ken qig llaagh penanga _ , _ entaqun _ qavagh aqe lunga _ .
naten _ tawaten _ , _ wallu _ kangigh mii nun _ kaate sta _ .
Anaghay aaq _ quyngilegti _ .
taawa _ quyngigh a _ qateghrakegtagh ghllag _ .
sa u ak _ qamiy ell uug pag ek _ , _ natete ak _ , _ aghqestaagh pigu uk _ .
I whan it wha _ qamisli llegh ke nghite atkek _ L ap l and -eghmiit _ .
aa _ , _ un u waa _ mamleg a _ .
ii _ naayghagh ghrug ghllag _ whaa _ qigug mi _ angq aper ukeg llak _ .
whaa _ tagtalmi _ liisimakngwaagh pe taqa _ .
uugna qun _ Naay ghagh p aw uniiq egkangat _ .
taana _ , _ tawani _ ima _ esghagh llegh ka _ .
unug llegh ke sigh _ tagi ukut _ , _ naten _ uyatu tke a _ , _ ken qig ll aall ghi taqa _ .
naa kek _ taake uk _ qimugsigh k _ aviite uk _ .
Meng y aa ken ghi tag put _ .
kaate luni _ legan _ quyngigh ni _ pegte a _ .
taawa _ alla _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh lgu uq _ .
Wh aang iighhaq _ petug luni _ , _ mangteghagh m _ ingate kaghagh ani _ , _ uku m _ qemi m _ uk akagh aani _ .
taawa _ sivungagh mun _ lliigh uq _ .
I meg y uu tem llu _ angayuqagh i _ , _ Sipel ankut _ , _ N ung ug enkut _ , _ whangkuta _ , _ estamagnegh u uq _ mangteghagh _ .
Mangtegh apig gaat _ , _ whangkuta llu _ , _ I meg y uu tem llu _ angayuqagh i _ , _ N ung ug en kutlu _ tanpegh ghhagh t _ .
taakut _ Sipel ankut _ entaqun _ lo g _ ho us e- ngun iiq egkangit _ .
qaamkut _ mingle i _ unaghsigh t _ , _ sivuqagh m _ mangteghagh atun _ .
iwernga _ maan angil nguut _ , _ unaghsigh t qun _ nuug uute ghllag luteng _ , _ whaten _ ro o f -em s iil get _ .
tanpegh meng _ ro o f - eligh luteng _ .
T uum llug llaak _ aghpumla ghllag _ .
maaten qun _ tuum llug g naniq anga _ , _ aghpumla nga i uute kanga _ .
entaqun _ anuq e tugh tekanga _ .
tamaani qun _ aghpumla u lghii _ quun pegh llak _ .
anigu _ temngi _ tekite ghllag _ , _ mangteghagh t _ nuv uk rug g ii _ , _ anigu ghllag _ .
umegnegh ughte nghminigu _ taagken _ , _ ii _ entaqun _ qaamte aqe a _ , _ tamaa na _ teng teghll anegh minigu _ .
A ay _ , _ ayveghagh lghiit llu _ wh aang iighh aaw aqut _ .
unaagh nge i nagh u kete te _ naken _ qamugh t _ whaa _ .
neghsaghtu magh mi wha _ ayuqe yagh nghite a _ , _ esghaghhu qun _ kan ani _ tekeghagh ani _ kana _ eftughuute aqe ut _ awen _ .
K ell mig tell ghil nguunga _ nalluke kenka _ , _ entaqun _ luugh gni _ .
tawaten _ kum laagh qelluni _ , _ I n uun kuk _ kinku k _ , _ N u ngu waallu _ , _ Uv ing waallu _ , _ quyngigh meng _ tas lugh wagh lutek _ kiiwhken _ tagi aqe uk _ qamiy ng ik _ usi lug teng _ .
Kaa tu saq meg nek i _ , _ neghsagh t _ ig ugh qwaa kat _ paseghagh ghllag t _ .
entaqun _ ighivgaq _ unange luteng _ , _ naten _ aqfaqugh ma ait _ , _ q azig yagh p agh qut _ naken _ pi atgu _ .
quyngigh t _ tas lugh ameng _ tagi aqe ut _ Uv ing waallu _ , _ N u ngu waallu _ , _ I nuugh uuq _ iitek _ aag llegh a _ .
Q azig y apag llag sug n itu tlu _ aange pigte ut _ , _ enraq _ sikugh nag llag luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
kukuleg
kukuleg _ teskiwna _ maaken _ esghaqaaluni _ , _ legan _ napaqagh m _ ul i waagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
qeghagh ghllag _ , _ sa u ut _ .
qeghaghtu pigte uq _ ullegh aa tellghi lluni _ .
angyagh meng _ teskiwavek _ , _ mangteghagh ngllagh naqe t _ , _ mangteghagh vyiigh ghhagh _ sa u a _ .
taakwegken _ esne meng _ unaghsigh meng _ angyagh kun _ usi ii kut _ , _ usi iigh ukut _ .
maligsaagh yug neghtugh kanga _ palaghmete ghngaaghma _ .
Y aav uq ugh tek luki _ I ming at enkut _ , _ entaqun _ Megh yu unkut _ , _ W aagh y inkut _ , _ kinku t _ P et g enghh aankut _ .
Es negh ru wh aakun _ angyapig kun _ y aav uqu meng _ .
teskiwani _ kukuleg m _ kangighagh ani _ , _ whaa _ maaten _ liigike yaqegka _ , _ kangighagh akun _ tamlag qagh luteng _ sa ut _ piyutagh u aghte te ut _ , _ uqligh aat _ wallu _ .
tamaa _ nenglullug t _ nat angi _ ifkagh aqe luteng _ naqam _ nef teg ng aaq luteng _ .
me nge ghllag luteng _ qaam n angi _ .
yug m _ naasqugh lghutagh nge i _ tamaa _ .
ii _ tanpeghh agh aaq _ sa u a _ tamaa _ .
angyagh t _ tamaa _ ulpig aghte aghte aqe luteng _ , _ ayemqugh aqe luteng _ .
amig lgu aqe luteng _ , _ sa ngllaghkagh ghllag pestaagh _ , _ pelungigh ghllag _ , _ saag r ukeg llak _ .
maaten _ kiwa _ qete llegh ughte ma uq _ .
Seghleghwaagh uuq _ .
tawani _ entaqun _ yugu i te ghllag mi _ , _ sa ma uq _ , _ tuqu laghate te ma uq _ .
sa n qun _ tamaa _ nenglu ni _ .
Y uv ghiigh waagh yaqum ta _ entaqun _ s aku s lug llak _ sama _ .
enraq llu _ tamaani _ llangaqa _ un ay aghaq iig ates ug n itut _ .
Taa waa _ unaghsigh meng _ usi iigh luteng _ , _ kepe te aqe luteng _ .
Taakw n anga _ puyg aaq egkegka _ nateghtu langa _ , _ naqam _ n atanga _ neqamike aqe anka _ .
uughqa ni _ samani
tagtale mii _ ii _ naten _ imani _ ayumiqullegh _ atuqe luku _ maani _ , _ llangaqa _ mulupag gpenani _ , _ aglagh ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
Taa kun ii _ , _ angayuqagh gka _ taake uk _ , _ apag kaa _ , _ liite lghiinga _ angayuqagh ke lukek _ taake uk _ .
aglagh ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
tamaani _ kiig ainkut _ , _ upenghaghagh a _ , _ salin _ ken qig ll aall ghil nguunga _ .
tagtale mii _ kiig aqe a llu _ , _ Anaghay aankut _ suna _ taakut _ , _ angyapig kun _ .
Anaghay aankut _ , _ I ming at enkut _ , _ kinangaawa _ W aagh y ing waallu _ esteg ragh u a llu _ , _ taana llu _ naa ghllag ka _ , _ kaate ut _ qamagte luteng _ .
Tamaan te ku ll aal ut aan g _ kete ukut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh m _ qikmigh t _ quut qugh ut ii _ kangii nun _ kiwavek _ .
taakut _ Pugughilegh melnguut _ Ag aan kutlu _ , _ An aw ut aan kutlu _ malghugnegh t _ .
tawaten _ teve luta _ entaqun _ .
maaten _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ tapghaaghagh qun _ , _ iiwen _ siqinegh _ tev igh yaghtu ugh aquq _ tamlag ukut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ kangii neng _ taagken _ uteghte uq _ .
qikmigh t _ itghagh u uute kangi _ .
Tamaan te ku ll aal utaa _ , _ iqallug ut _ awen _ unak aghput _ .
kii _ awen _ siknegh _ nagaq u tugh taqaa _ .
siknegh _ quunpeng _ q aanghi t nun _ lliigh uq _ .
arekull _ siknegh mun _ aglagh u aqe ukut _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ qenwat llu _ igleghte ukut _ .
tawaten _ tekegh algh un qun _ taakwna _ , _ naagu _ siknegh _ .
ii _ at iqu s atugh ll aatagh aat _ .
S ung agh yugg alek _ kanagh a _ peng ug ulluni _ , _ siknegh u naqe lleqe uq _ .
Taa waa _ ketmiighte vigkagh ut _ , _ Es negh aghp aag uf tuk _ ategh kek _ .
qateghllug tek _ inga _ .
esneghagh m _ kel utegh llu waagh ani _ tapghagh mi _ taakwani _ , _ kelute mii ii aghte lutek _ Es negh aghp aag uf tuk _ .
naayvagh mun _ whavek _ kanaken _ esneghag neng _ esneghagh k _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ nuug t wha _ tamaa _ esghaqagh aqe aput _ , _ naayvagh mi _ .
Taz ing kuk _ kaate yaghtugh yaqegput _ uugte ghllag lutek _ qategh ghraagte lutek _ , _ neghs apig p aghq ughllak _ .
temngi _ qenaagh kun _ uugte luteng _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ , _ kii _ .
guute nghite ait _ avelghagh ait _ .
kii _ ii _ , _ taakwagun _ aningugh luta _ , _ allakagh mi _ siknegh _ naayvagh lgu lghii _ .
atghagh ukut _ , _ ii _ aghqe i aghaghtu uq _ imani _ .
nuug _ tamaa na _ , _ qawaag llaak _ , _ sam segh h agh aaghmeng _ .
arekull _ aglekesegagh u aqe ut _ .
Sam segh h aghaq ngwaagh aqanka _ .
kii _ , _ teskanavek _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiikut _ , _ qagi t _ unÊ¼g a _ , _ esneghagh k _ regh igh qell utek _ , _ ayeme aqe ut _ kana _ .
qawaag ghllag u uq _ , _ neghsagh ghllag _ .
ii _ legan _ suqsugh ghhalek _ neghsagh t _ qimag aqe ut _ naken _ .
unange naqe mun _ waa ken ghi tut _ kaate naqe i nagh ut _ .
enraq llu _ nak ev legh aghmeng _ anuqe _ ayuqe uq _ .

tamlag luta _ nenglullug lghute ghllag t _ kii _ taak waa _ .
sungaghyug te aqe lghiit _ esghaghkagh nka _ , _ kaa _ siq luw algh un qun _ taakwna _ kelute mnni _ .
taagken _ tent- ta lug teng _ , _ uqlighsagh naqe ut _ ingavek _ .
angyapig llu _ esnevagh te naqe aat _ .
I negh qugh wagh waagh lunga _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh ma _ , _ legan _ aga _ uyavaghqagh ughte ut _ , _ kingu itneng _ , _ ighsak ingh egkeni _ yaag aghte aqe lunga _ .
ii _ naqam _ riistuniqe magh ma _ aghyuugh na yu kangatnga _ .
Qik migh agh estun _ entaqun _ maligsaagh naqe lghii stun _ .
guute lutek _ , _ up aghq aghtaq lutek _ Tutm atel g enkuk _ , _ Anaghay aankuk _ .
tagsigh aagnenga llu _ esghagh lunga _ .
taawa _ nuug aqe uq _ , _ ilu te mun _ maaq eghll aag uf tuk _ .
legan _ guute lutek _ unake luki _ up aghq aghtaq luki _ .
iwerngaqun _ whan ik waa _ tagi ukut _ .
taane a _ nenglu vyiigh _ sa u a _ , _ Sipel am _ entaqun _ nekeftekaqe laatagh aa _ .
pinighsagh luku _ tawan naq ngu f tukut _ arekull _ .
taana _ nayughkagh ut _ .
nevugh ligh aat _ qaye a _ , _ nevugh lgu uq _ nutem _ .
egllu llgagh u uq llu _ taawa _ naagu _ suflug meng _ iv aghn aghhaq _ .
tamaa _ co pp er -et _ , _ legan _ taakwavek _ suqlughte luki _ , _ waya meng _ sa meng _ , _ wayaghtu uq llu _ co pp er -meng _ tamaa _ .
suflug t _ taaqe ait _ .
arekull _ B al en a-m _ nalighnegh aneng _ mak regh qu llgh uftut _ .
angyaghpag m _ taam _ aghqe itagh i tekagh m _ .
taawa _ tesamani _ tepe luni _ angyaghpagllug m _ ing luv in gha _ .
taawa _ quug u luni _ qalqalimaqu lleghtu uq _ .

Taaku nguftut _ Qer ngugh tek aan ku nguftut _ taam _ ata a _ may- ngam _ .

Wh an ikum aan _ taghtughtu inkut _ atugh naqe ni luki _ .
taagken _ atugh lghii nun _ aglagh ukut _ , _ navek _ pi langa _ maligte te unga _ atugh lghii nun _ .
mangteghagh ghrug ghllag _ , _ paagna a _ niighigh luku _ , _ yuug _ qineghte uute luni _ elngaatall _ asitmun _ .
whanga llu _ may eq ell eg agh lunga _ qineghte unga _ .
taagken _ qineghte yalghiinga _ yug ghllag u uq _ nategh _ elngaatall _ , _ aqumg av igg aq _ taan anginaq _ aghul av igg aqlu _ regh iteftuq _ .
yug ghllag u uq _ amig mun _ iiwleng _ .
legan _ ategh aqe ut _ alla t _ , _ ila i _ ategh vzigh luteng _ alla t _ mellu tete nghata _ ila i _ ategh aqe ut _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luteng _ neghe uute ut _ siivanllegh t _ , _ whangkuta _ neghenghite ukut _ tamaani _ temngi _ iglegha ukut _ , _ esghagh yukekagh ut _ esghagh aghput _ .
Yug llag uf tuuq _ ungazigh _ , _ mangteghagh ghllag _ .
teghigniqe ukut _ k allegh taq l utaa _ , _ naghaagh lqusiigh aqe luta _ .
mulu ukut _ tespamani _ anguugh ainkut _ nak e meng _ anuq ll igh luni _ .
iwernga _ aghyuqe vig ite ngughk _ , _ teng Ê¼gh un aq _ elngaatall _ .
taawa _ pegge nanigh lunga _ , _ maligte te lunga _ tukugh mnun _ qavagh yagute unga _ .
tukugh nka _ taakut _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
quyilleg t _ kaate ut
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luta _ quyillgaagh ghhagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ taa kun ituq _ , _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
akuzi igate ngughk _ whangkutestun _ naqam _ mumegh igh qugh te aqe kangat _ .
ungipamsug nghaani _ taam _ tukugh mta _ mumigte te aqe ainkut _ .
tea- magh an tuq _ ellnga llu _ , _ liite ghraag unga _ akuzillegh aneng _ nagate m _ .
ila i _ neqamike anka _ paninang _ , _ ila i _ puyg aanka _ quyillgaagh t _ akuzillegh it _ .
taana _ atuute llgagh u uq _ , _ atugh yaghtugh uq _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ nani _ .
nagaqugh unga _ , _ aghulaqe naqe negh meggni nguq _ quyillgaagh t _ mangteghagh nun _ qikmightuumagh meng _ takuughagh aqe ut _ .
tungsigh niigh llegh it _ tawatete na ait _ .
tukugh ma _ waa ken ghis atgu _ , _ aghulaqe naqe yayek _ nengiighhagh k _ taake uk _ , _ qaghluughisaghtugh agka _ .
qiteve aqe lghii _ , _ tusaqe igate kegka _ .
taakut _ qaghlu t _ akuqagh luki _ , _ kenigh nghaki _ taakut _ qaghlu yaghqagh t _ taku luki _ qaghlu aqe anka _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ melqupag _ sa u a _ qaghlu sqe a _ , _ kenigh aa _ , _ tawaten _ pi unga _ , _ â _ K ul uf ten _ . _ â _ taawa _ K ul uf ten et _ entaqun _ melqupag u ut _ ellngit ni _ .

nuna an _ Nek eg negha
taawa _ sivuqagh tun _ ayuqe uq _ naayvagh _ .

naayvagh kun _ taakwagun _ aghulaqe uq _ .
tawaten _ sivuqagh tun _ tapghagh lgu uq _ .
naayghagh i _ pag ar ugllak _ .
sivuqagh meng _ aliite aqe lghiit _ mamleg siigh t _ naayghagh t _ ak iv an tut _ .
tungeqligh a _ taana _ ungazigh m _ uughqa nun _ tume u uq _ , _ ategh a _ ukigyaghagh u uq _ .
Ig aghvig an Ê¼nguq _ tawan saghtuq _ ukigyaghagh mi _ .
nuugte ma kangat _ ki nguv aqun _ pi yalghiikut _ mangteghagh m _ qung anganun _ .
taagken _ pi laatagh ainkut _ aygugh meng _ , _ aanyaghagh u uq _ pam ar ug llaak _ , _ ungazigh meng _ taagken _ sungaghyaagte lutek _ ayuqe uk _ naayghagh k _ .
maaken _ naayghagh neng _ paagken _ esghagh lghii ni _ naayghagh t _ aghq el eng estagh aat _ , _ tawatete ut _ aghqestaaghhagh u ut _ aygugh mun _ .
taana _ ungazigh m _ aygugh ghhagh ani _ qiighqagh ghllag _ iwhani u uq _ nunangighagh u uq _ .
Al p aghllag uf tugh nguuq _ nuna igh aq _ , _ ne m _ qula akun _ alpa _ igleghte ghllag _ , _ qawaagniigh igate ngugh t _ , _ alpa meng _ negh igate ngugh t _ .
metghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ qawaagniigh llegh ke ut _ .
taakut _ tukugh nka _ angyengestagh squllgagh u ut _ taawa _ petug luni _ nategh kun _ .
qawaagniighusigh ghhagh it llu _ takestaaghhaa ut _ kepe luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
upugha negh ghllag u ut _ ungazighmii t _ tamaani _ pilleg mni _ sivuligh mi _ .

uglagh u pigte uq _ ungazigh _ , _ entaqun _ m atu mllu _ sivuqagh m llu _ qerngughte te yagh ghngaaghmi _ paninang _ uglagh uq _ .
Upugh anegh llaak _ , _ aag negh mta _ taakut _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ qayugh yagh a _ . _ â _ ighsa negh mta _ pi aqe ainkut _ , _ â _ Pel uus ang iighh aagh ngaan _ . _ â _ taawa _ aane yug nanigh ukut _ upugh aghllagem _ , _ kepe yu m _ .
manguna _ whangkutestun _ negh kangat _ quyngigh _ .
quyngigh t _ awatkaghtagh t _ aqii nghhagh t _ , _ awatangani _ aqii luteng _ tagi tke ait _ .
T uk r uug lluteng _ neq n it _ elngaatall _ awatkaghtagh t _ .
aqii ma aqe lghiit _ upengh ayagh aaluku _ taagavek _ aki anun _ angyagh kun _ .
naken _ tasigh meng _ , _ avate meng _ yug nge aqe luteng _ taagavek _ angu aghtekaghqagh meng _ .
aate yameng _ , _ aki anun _ taagavek _ naan tat _ imani _ quyilleg t _ ak iv an sim aat _ .
quyngighqwaagh t _ Kiyaghtaa llgh at
Quun pe nguq _ quyngigh eng _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ uksulqusigh igh ghllag _ .
uksugh mi _ tunuvagh aqe luteng _ pagavek _ mugu aqe luteng _ , _ quyngigh eng _ negh manginigh sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
atigh llegh i _ tawatete ut _ nuugte naqe negh meggni _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ .
enkaam _ qamiy egh naa qung it _ tamaakut _ tan Ê¼ ngu ur ng engu ftut _ .
iwerngaqun _ usi igh ghllag luki _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ .
nunivag m _ qukaa nun _ pamavek _ uksugh mi _ umeg nep ag illgh anun _ entaqun _ negh vig kegtagh mun _ quyngigh eng _ aghulaqe te aqe luku _ , _ tun uv aghllag l ut aan g _ ungazigh meng _ .
paamna _ ungazigh _ aange pigte lghii _ nuna _ .
tespagani _ uksughte luteng _ upengh aq es tan ghani _ esne mun _ aligate ma aqe lghiit _ kiiw t _ pinagh lleghqagh i _ siv ut gh ulluki _ .
quyngigh meng _ qikmigh ke luteng _ .
taawa _ mugu nqigte ma aqe lghiit _ esne anun _ upengh aq es tan ghani _ .
taawa _ tamaaken _ neqenge ma aqe lghiit _ tukfigh i luteng _ , _ tuugte aq _ , _ manguna _ .
manguna t _ tuugtagh u lghiit _ whangkunni _ , _ akike luki _ tanpegh _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ tap ghagh pak _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike ma aqe kangat _ quynginge natke ma aqe kangat _ .
quyilleg t _ tamaakut _ tukfighagh eng _ tapghagh _ quyngigh meggnun _ saag tekum aan _ .
sanqute ke aqe kangat _ , _ nateghqagh _ kameg meggnun _ .
ungazighmii t _ Kiyaghtaa llgh at
esghagh yagh kufsiki _ ungazighmii t _ aatkagh it _ n uqu tu p aagh rug ll aag uut _ , _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ nasaperagh meng _ nasagh ke lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ atkug w it _ ukut _ collar-ngi _ maaten _ , _ qikmiiraagh t _ entaqun _ iingunagh ita _ co ll ar - k aqiit _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwavek _ qule mun _ iwhani luki _ nasaperagh meggneng _ taagken _ sigutngiitagh leg meng _ qepe nghmegteki _ legan _ puvite leg t _ , _ lliigh aqe ut _ naagu _ su pug gaq _ .
kameg it _ n uqu tu p aagh rug et _ , _ ila i _ esghaghkagh nka _ qall uk aghmeng _ temkag lgu aqe ut _ , _ pinigh t _ maqagh t _ atugh it _ .
sa u aat _ maqagh u na iqe ait _ aatkagh t _ ama _ , _ wallu _ atkug ghllag t _ tamaakut _ .
liite qugh yagh unga _ , _ ungazighmii t _ akuzillegh it _ whangkunneng _ ila i _ san iv aq aan taqut _ , _ nagnegh aghqu nguut _ .
avate meng _ kenle ke luni _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ ila a _ tawaten _ qiteve ma _ .
qiteve a _ nagate aqe a _ tespamani _ , _ aleghquute aqe ut _ katam _ whangkuta _ whaten _ aleghquute negh mta _ .
ungazigh _ taana _ ikevaghllug mun _ ukavek _ tekeghagh igh luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ sivuqagh tun _ tawaten _ taakwagun _ .

aatnegh leg _ , _ uughqa _ , _ imun _ , _ siq luw aghy aag et _ , _ tawaten _ sivuqagh m _ atightullegh atun _ .

tamaani _ esghagh lleg mni _ qimugsigh u uq _ .
ugriilegh mun _ qimugsigh meng _ akilpegagh yagh te aqe ut _ , _ estu w algu ftuq _ Ug r ii llghii naq _ taana _ , _ ungazigh _ estu w ii saghpe tuq _ tamaani _ .
sivuligh mi _ pangeghte aqngama _ .
elngaatall _ iqa _ piniqe aat _ seghleqe igate aat _ tamaani _ .
pelungighsagh yug pagigate yaghpete ut _ tamaani _ .

manguna t _ ugkellikagh t _ putu itgun _ tugu luki _ gg aat meggnun _ miluute luki _ taagken _ ket ar w at aqiit _ angyagh meng _ qute mun _ .
tawaten _ angaghqugh aqe ut _ .
apeghiigh luteng _ tamaakut _ kan uug tegh llakat _ esnagh mi _ tawani _ aniguvzeghagh ghhagh kun _ qikmigh stun _ tawaten _ ighwaaghtuute aqe ut _ aq sag eteng _ aaw igh aqe ait _ ila meggnun _ sangighqugh ste aqe ait _ .

pinigh llegh i llu _ , _ sungaghyug kegtagh u ut _ kayaate llegh i _ .

pinigh llegh i _ tawaqa m _ .

ategh ai _ eghll ipa _ .

ruuseghmii t _ taaw keg kut _ apeghtughiste t _ inglu ani _ .
aghvigh uute ma lghiit _ piyug meng _ .
Iiw en Ê¼nguq _ kiiw gnun _ qukaghite naqe aqe ut _ , _ uka nguq _ qikmigh igh ghllag _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ aange ghllag _ uw igh sagh sug nigh llak _ .
uteghmun _ igaghvig mun _ , _ qiighnite aqe luteng _ sik waagh aghmi _ tamaani _ , _ ila teng _ ngiigte aqe luki _ alingruugh te m _ qimagugh te ma lghiit _ , _ aagh waagh aqluteng _ .
uugte qaghte luteng _ apeghtughiste mun _ tawavek _ , _ apeghtughiste mun _ itegh luteng _ tenglugtugh luku _ pi ma kangat _ kayus iisqell uteng _ .
pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ qikmigh igh ghllag _ inga _ uw igh sagh sug nigh ll aw aagh uuq _ . _ â
ruuseghmii m _ taam _ qineghte luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ qikmigh u nghite uq _ kuuni u uq _ ugighhe yiite uq _ . _ â
El ngaat all nguq _ nengl aqsaq miniki _ , _ nengl aa tun Ê¼nguq _ .
N ut aan Ê¼nguq _ ellngit _ esghaate lghiit _ , _ ellngit _ ungazighmii t _ tamaaken _ kuuni meng _ .
taagken _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ .
An Ê¼g ii sim aluki _ igaghvig m _ manughagh ani _ , _ mel ug utaq un Ê¼nguq _ maghhuurka meng _ , _ melug te ma luki nguq _ , _ uglagh tun Ê¼nguq _ aqume uute luteng _ ila i _ .
Qik migh aghhagh nguq _ melqupagraag ghhagh _ tagi uq _ naken _ tamaaken _ .
ila ni _ pi ma kangi _ U t ataa w ete m _ , _ â _ entaqun _ una _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ ellnga llu _ melug yug uq _ . _ â _ taagken _ kuynge ni _ melug luku _ agep sugh taagh q eghllag luku _ , _ tugu luku _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ , _ qengagh kek _ mellu lukek _ qaan gha _ , _ qaangh akun _ suupe ma kanga _ qengagh kek _ mellu lukek _ nuqnegh luku _ .
Leg an Ê¼nguq _ pegte a _ qengagh gmikun _ agep sugh taagh umaghmi _ melug lghii stun _ .
qikmighagh ghhagh _ tamaani _ iglegh qu r gh alghii _ , _ qen w an Ê¼nguq _ ullegh aghte uq _ .
nenglagh qu ma kangat _ tuq w aalgh i _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
taawa nguq _ nekeve luni _ aga _ navek _ aghulaqe uq _ , _ piniighte luni _ .
Taam _ ungipamsug qu a _ U t ataa w ete m _ .
Taan angin aghh aagh simalghii _ U t ataa w en _ maaten _ ungazighte lleg mni _ kinguligh mi _ .
tawani _ siivanllegh _ tamaa na _ entaqun _ tuqu laghate te ma ni luku _ .
amen _ qellinegh lgu uq _ , _ elngaatall _ siivanllegh _ tamaa na _ aarragh te ste luku _ .
tanqigh t _ naang enghata _ siivanllegh ghhagh inagh t _ meghsi aqe ait _ kelengake luki _ tawaten _ gu ard - te tu ftut _ .
ungazigh _ suulya ghllag ughte ma lghii _ tamaani _ keleng an aghq w aamakanga _ .
taagken _ m ov i e- lluta _ , _ nagnegh uq _ may- nga _ apeghtuqagh ni _ esghapag esqelluki _ .
taana _ Q aghl uu y am _ ighnegh ke a _ magh yaghq ugh tek luku _ elngaatall _ qii f qagh tam su waagh us alghiimeng _ iigge teng _ pateg te aghte aqe luki _ .
J u ic e- meng wha _ tagite ainkut _ tamaaken _ ruuseghmii m _ aghnagh m _ saam _ , _ meghaatagh meng _ .
upugha ghllaget _ upugha ma ghllag t _ , _ ruuseghmii t _ apeghtughiste t _ .
iyatagh ste gpenaamta _ igagh te nghmeng _ taa qen ghani _ .

J un e- mi _ paninang _ tawani _ igagh te aqe ut _ .
tuqlughaasigh _ kavite ngughk _ s ay uw aqaat _ , _ lengaaghuute aqe a _ .
igaghyagh _ uglaapig tef tuuq _ .
igaghvig at _ aange ghllag uq _ .
Qafsin Ê¼g un ii kaat _ si x te en - ngun iiq aat _ apeghtughiste at _ .
Kiyaghtaa llghem _ All angugh negha
L igh th o us e- elgu ftut _ .
L igh th o us e- a _ aliite aqe lghii _ sivuqagh meng llu _ entaqun _ .
maaken llu _ akisqaghte te aqe uq _ , _ uusqagh pigte uq _ .
qateghrakegtagh meng _ piineqe luni _ pik an teftuq _ uziv e ke taagh et _ .
Es tam ag yag uftut _ akisqaghte ta i _ .
yupig meng _ kelengak is telgu ftut _ f am il y- t _ .
atghagh yaghqaa nghite ngugh u kut _ taanÊ¼g avek _ Sivuqaghh m iini _ .
Taaku nguftut _ angyagh teng it _ e igh t- nguftut _ ungazigh m _ taaku st aghhiin aat _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ angyagh ut _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ angyagh _ .
H o ur -a _ kaate negh ghhagh ni _ taam _ umiileg m _ kingu m _ , _ May or -ng an _ , _ umiileg an _ ungazigh m _ qelegh aqe ai _ ho ur -a _ kaate ni luku _ angyagh uu tesqelluki _ .
taawa _ anuqataghagh u ghngaan _ angyaghugh te aqe ut _ .
esla _ seghleghu aqe lghii _ uteghnigh aqe ut _ sa ngunateng _ .
Iv aq aan kunun _ tawavek _ , _ ig l inegh a _ estu waagh simalghii _ .
aklungi igh llegh ke a _ ungazigh m _ .
aklungi igh lleg liite ma kangi _ taakut _ Iv aq aam _ avaquti a _ .
kete te yu ke aq _ taana _ estu waa ftuq _ , _ taana _ naligh _ ighnegh a _ angu u uq _ ama _ saste u uq _ .
taana _ Pik es aq _ angyaleg _ kayaalqe i i ma lghii _ upenghagh mi _ ataasigh mi _ on e _ th o us and _ dollars _ ( _ on e _ th o us and _ ru b l e _ ) _ .
angyaghniigh llegh m _ teghig ke sagh _ unak el gha _ 8 0 _ maklagte yaghqaa yaghpete ut _ , _ 1 00 _ ayvegh _ , _ 6 0 _ neghsagh _ .
Taaku ngin aat _ Pik es aankut _ tungqaghaghte ma kangat _ unangniigh llegh _ .
taawa _ on e _ th o us and _ ru b le- meng _ mo ne y-meng _ w in -em akangat _ .
manughagh at _ qepghagh teghllag uftut _ .
angtughpag ghllag t _ iingunagh ita _ amiiq il aghluki _ uqiigh ma aqe kangit _ .
taghyugh ligh luki _ entaqun _ angyaghpag tgun _ taakmavek _ aghvigh te ma aqe ait _ .
ungazigh _ tawani _ kinguligh mi _ mangunatugh niigh te ma lghii _ .
Esl equ un kugneng _ , _ ke mek rag en kugneng _ .
tukfigh luku _ lliigh ma kangat _ neq s eng _ , _ ellmeng _ siq luw aqsagh ngaagh megteggu _ .
taawa _ igaghvig m _ kelut angani _ apegh kausigh naagh qu ghllagek _ .
aghnagh t _ siq luw ameggnun _ siq luw aghqu luteng _ , _ sagnegh teng _ imigh luki _ tawavek _ apegh kau sigh gnun _ aglagh luteng _ , _ apegh qagh luki _ taglaate luki _ neqe teng _ , _ estu w amun _ llivike yaghtugh aqe ait _ neqe t _ taakut _ taglaatekagh teng _ .
Es tu w aanun _ pi unga _ , _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ estu wagh pig aa _ .
taagken _ tukfigh i luteng _ w ar e _ ho us e- eng anun _ aqfate aqe ut _ , _ w ar e _ ho us e- enga _ esghagh yaghtigh sqe aat _ , _ w ar e _ ho us e- egh naa qugh llaak _ inglu a _ saghya ghllag u uq _ , _ inglu a _ taagna _ nanaagh _ , _ amu a _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ megh llegh ke uq _ , _ agaghte uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
kaviipig _ , _ silver _ f o x _ , _ sangusiq _ amiiragh _ , _ b e av er -a _ amiiragh _ , _ neghsagh m _ amiir a _ taag an tu teftuq _ aki at _ akikekagh at _ .
taawa _ neqek r angl aghv ilgu ftut _ .
tanemlleqa _ tawani _ neqekrangllagh vig itnun _ gaagh vig u uq _ .
Aan tu nguftuq _ yupig _ , _ akuzi kayug _ whangkutestun _ , _ h al f _ b re ed -a _ ruuseghmiig igh a _ , _ upugha negh ghllag _ ama _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ .
Aghhutanga _ tam aaghh an _ neqekrangllagh ghllagu uq _ , _ estu wagh meggnun _ , _ eghll ip ameng _ tamaaken _ .
aghneghmi _ Iv aq aankut _ taakut _ , _ Iv aq aam _ panig a _ neqekrangllaghte u uq _ aghneghmi _ .
Unug mi _ taana _ Aan t u _ , _ Aan tu nguftuq _ yuggagh _ h al f _ breed _ Ruus egh mi _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ .
uugte neghtu yaghpete uq _ mekelghiigh u luni _ Am er ic a-m _ angyaghpag akun _ akmavek _ S eat t le- mun _ .

ategh _ uglagh u pigte uq _ .
taakut _ tukuqekagh nka _ , _ may- ngam _ ata ke a _ sivuligh mi _ pista u yagh uq _ , _ kinguligh mi _ ruuseghmii t _ pillgh at _ , _ pista u nanigh ma lghii _ .
ruuseghmii ni _ qil gh aghn aaftuq _ , _ kayngu unaa ftuq _ pi sta _ ategh u luni _ , _ ategh a _ simigh ma kangat _ Qer ngugh tek aghmeng _ .
qerngughtekau aghte ma lghii _ .
kiiste i vig _ T uk aleg aghvig mi
D an ce- ev ilgu ftuq _ , _ d an ce- ev ig itnun _ pi yalghiinga _ kiiste i vig _ tesqam an ll aatagh pe tuq _ .
nukalpigagh _ taana _ 2 0 _ year s _ igaghyagh luni _ uteghnigh aqe uq _ L en ing ra d -meng _ .
elngaatall _ apeghtugh i aqe uq _ gu it ar -e meng _ , _ v i ol in -e meng _ , _ nengtaatagh meng _ .
elngaatall _ aghnagh aqe te luni _ seghleghllug u ut _ , _ gu it ar em aghmeng _ , _ v i ol in -em aghmeng _ , _ ac c or d i an -em aghmeng _ .
kiiste i vig _ taana _ taku kestagh aa _ mekelghiigh m _ qam aten _ .
D an ce- esqelluku _ ellnga llu _ , _ ataasigh t _ aatqaghte aqe lghiit _ .
sivungigh luku _ ketngig ni _ itegagh ni _ keveg luki _ ket ng igg iin aag ni _ tuute lukek _ p aper egh t it aa _ .
kiiste i vig _ nekefqaghte uq _ .
kiiste i vig _ tus iig aghllag ulghii _ nekefqaghte magh mi _ aga _ nalug qagh te luni _ aragh kau magh mi _ aga _ ellngistun _ iigge ni _ qukagh mikun _ whaten _ inglugtun _ pi whan iiq luki _ leganqun _ napaqagh _ taana _ uziveaghaghte aqe luku _ sighla ghllag _ .
elngaatall _ aragh aat _ , _ aatqaghte vike aqe aat _ legan _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ mekelghiigh t _ kipullgin aalluku _ , _ araghqagh ii aagh _ kiiste i vig _ .
Ar aghq inaq sami _ , _ sa u a _ ungazighmii _ mekelghiigh _ taku kestagh aa _ , _ tawaten _ d an ce- em aghmi _ iigge ni _ qukagh mikun _ inglugtun _ nekegte luki _ , _ taawa _ legan _ ellngistun _ ruuseghmii stun _ ketngig ni _ napaghte luku _ aga _ itegagh mineng _ aga _ papasqitagh vike a _ , _ aga _ nekefqaghte sta _ .
nalug kau te aghte magh mi _ elngaatall _ sighla te ut _ .
naange niite anga _ P angegh llegh ma
taagken _ navek _ pi laatagh ukut _ .
tawaten _ iiwen _ d an ce- ev ig meng _ taglagh aqe ukut _ angyaghyag ni luteng _ , _ pi yalghiikut _ uughqa neng _ angyaghyag aqe ut _ .
upugha te ait _ , _ tawaten _ maakumiu stun _ upleg te ghllag aqe kangit _ quya ke m _ elngaatall _ .
qiteve ma u ut _ , _ akuzipig meng _ aghsaan _ ayuqe ut _ , _ iitek _ akuzi msiigh aqe ut _ .
Taaku nguftut _ teng tekat _ qiwaa neng _ .
avate meng _ pi u ut _ , _ qiwaaghmii t _ taakut _ esghaghkagh nka _ sivuqagh mi _ teng tekat _ .
taana _ Ng ep en k aw aaw et nguftuq _ ataasigh _ liigike aqa _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ akuzi msiigh qagh yu k _ , _ G ut g ugy i _ .
G ut g ugy in kuk _ , _ G ul g ugy in kuk _ taake uk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
Pil uw ug em _ liisimak ngwaa ghii _ taakut _ G ul g ugy inkut _ , _ G ut g ugy inkut _ , _ piinliite nkut _ , _ whanga llu _ esghagh kaqe anka _ taakut _ teng tekat _ .
taana _ akuzipigpag igate ngughk _ Ng ep en k aw aawen _ , _ kiyang _ qiteve ghllagu ut _ .
nagate lghii ni _ qitev et _ tamaakut _ liite nagh ut _ , _ liigike nagh aqe ut _ .
Taam _ tukugh ma _ may- ngam _ apeghtugh aqe kanganga _ .
ruuseghmii stun llu _ qitev mengllu _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ ighivg aghmi _ ungipamsug te aqe aanga _ .
taakut _ Ataayagh haam _ pillgilliqe tke vzigh ai _ suqagh t _ ugriilegh mun _ akikesaghtugh stekagh i _ , _ may or -ng akun _ , _ umiileg akun _ ungazigh m _ .
tugu vzigh aat _ Ataayagh haq _ , _ iwernga _ peglleghqute ma kangat _ .
atghagh naqe ghngaamta _ piniighte ghngaan _ wiin _ nuqnegh ainkut _ .
Ataayagh haq _ apeghiigh na luku _ .
atghagh naqe yamta _ , _ igagh _ , _ tespam um _ ungazigh m _ igagh a _ , _ quyngigh m _ amu i _ atghagh te yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ sa u a llu _ tamaa na _ ila a _ .
atghagh naqe yamta _ , _ sivuke luku _ taana _ wiin _ , _ atg- ghhagh _ pi vagilgan _ , _ taana _ ugriilegh mun _ kingu u uq _ mayor-nga _ ungazigh m _ Ataayagh haam _ suq ameng _ akilpegagh yaghkagh _ veghute ait _ suqi a _ pi naqe nghite ait _ .
taagken _ atghagh ukut _ .

puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
neghigh luku _ aghnagh ghllag _ taana _ Sing aaw e teghllag uftuq _ ategh a _ , _ Pil ugug en kun iteftuq _ sivungagh mi _ .
taakut _ pilugug m _ avaquti a _ aflengake ghllagu ai _ .
quunpeng _ an Ê¼g igh aqelghiit _ .
esnagh mun _ tawaten _ alla _ pi yalghiikut _ kana _ tekeghagh ani _ an Ê¼g igh aqef tut _ .
tagsigh luta _ aglagh uute yamta _ ungipamsug te ainkut _ .
qenaagh kun _ aqume uute luta _ whangkuta _ nagas aqef ut _ nunanigh ghllag _ .
pi yalghiimi _ , _ ellngin Ê¼nguq _ sivuke luteng _ sivungagh mi _ kiyaghte yuwhaagh kau ut _ salin _ taakwna _ paaghqite luku _ .
Negh sagh llag uyagh pe tughnguq _ qazigyagh meng _ neli yuwhaagh aqngameng _ .
R ep all nguq _ afta vig ngllagh luteng _ pi kau ut _ quug meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ .
qayughllak nguq _ unaghsigh ghllag u yaghpete uq _ tamaa na _ .
ellnga nge uq _ taana _ quunpeng _ piyug g aghmeng _ sivugh qaghte aqe lghii _ , _ akmag aatagh luni _ kaate aqe lghii _ .
taakwna nguq _ maaten _ nalugvig ughtekagh _ naayvagh ghrugllag u yagh uq _ kiiw m _ esne aneng _ kenle ke luni _ .
piyug nghmini nguq _ kiiw m _ esne akun _ tagi aqe lghii _ .
tekeghagh a nguq _ taana _ peng ug rakeg saghtuq _ mingle a llu _ igg ag r ukeg saghpe tuq _ .
I i wh l ak ayug u yaghtugh nguq _ kan av erugllak _ repall _ talughte luni _ .
iinghusaleg u uq _ wataghllak _ ii wh l anghani _ taanÊ¼g avek _ ategh yaqunaki _ pi sqe lleg leg _ , _ uleve qaghtekayugu ni luku _ sukate pigte luni _ .
Ayum igh nguq _ taghnughhagh lghute _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ ii wh lag mi _ uleve qaghte te luki _ .
ilangani _ tawaten _ ellngit _ neqangisag ma lghiit _ , _ iyataghnagh iqe ma lghiit _ .
talwa nguq _ tawani _ tepagh isag ghllag _ , _ elqwaagh isag ghllag _ .
elngaatall nguq _ quunpeng _ esnighqwagh aqe lghii _ taana _ Sing aaw e teghllak _ .
sa meng _ naalkute na luni _ elqwaagh ghhagh meng _ .
atgenra _ ava isag ghllag _ .
alla _ unaangu pigte luku _ esnighqwagh luni _ pi yalghiimi nguq _ tekeghagh a _ , _ teskana nguq _ , _ ii wh lag luni _ unÊ¼g av erugllak _ ayuqe uq _ .
Un Ê¼g all u nguq _ elqwaaghtu uq _ qiliigh nagh _ , _ enraq _ iinghusaleg u lghii _ .
saama llu _ enraq _ ellngin aghh aalghii _ taanÊ¼g avek _ atg- ghhaghte yu ghngaaghmi _ .
aqume luni _ taanÊ¼g avek _ ayuqe luni _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ aqum taagh ngaaghmi _ paaghq ilngugh mi _ , _ pama _ kel utanganeng _ kafsagtagh ma lghii _ .
Q iiv yaqminigu _ taawa _ temngi _ nuna meng _ amigh k _ qel p aghmi _ , _ ava isag lghii _ .
Aghn as qughh wagh nguq _ aane aqe uq _ qal ip aa kagh lluni _ , _ nuna meng _ ghh atagh ng aghmi _ .
naten _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh nghminikek nguq _ ellnga nge uq _ legan _ nun ak iighw aghaqelghii _ , _ sa aqe lghii _ kayaali inagh aqe lghii _ .
elngaatall _ qevuute luni _ ell pek ng anaq aqelghii _ san ayuk ang atni _ .
naqam nguq _ , _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ k af sag t aghn an ingh egkeni _ ava iitagh ke luni _ .
Leg an Ê¼nguq _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh aqe ak _ ellnga _ uniigh naqe aqe lghii _ , _ qevuute pigte luni _ iwernga _ esteqe aqe lghii _ , _ teghh um anaq aqelghii _ wata _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnagh ghllag mi _ whani _ , _ aghtugh amken _ seghlegh ghllag u uten _ elngaatall _ iknaqe uten _ .
whanga _ aane vike amken _ kayusigh nagh u luten _ neqangisag lghiisi _ .
enta _ tawani _ utaq iig i _ unÊ¼g avek _ saghna yagh te naqe amken _ . _ â
naagu nguq _ legan _ aga _ atghagh uq _ taanÊ¼g avek _ talugh qaghte luni _ qalmesagh t _ awata itnun _ .
naqamllu _ mulupag gpenani _ uka nguq _ aliigh uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi nguq _ kenigh ghhagh ni _ imigh ghllag luku _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ kenigh ghhagh n _ . _ â _ key- nghmini _ aghn as qughh w aam _ kenigh anun _ katag ma kangi _ .

llaaghanwha nguq _ neghekagh t _ .

ayvegh m _ aglu kek _ tamaaken _ tugu lukek _ napaghte ak _ .

Ayum igh nguq _ ellngit _ tawaten _ nagh aa qay ud et _ .
akuuraate lutek nguq _ aglu k _ gheve aqe lghiik _ llaaghan _ .

talwa _ salin _ quyngighqwaagh t _ neli llghite luki _ .
ellngit a nguq _ sivu nge aq _ neli yuwhaagh kaqe aat _ .

puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
ungipamsug _ ayumigh _ yuggagh _ pugughileghmii _ G ug iing en _ , _ nanevgagh ghhagh ughte magh mi _ .
sukate yagh lghii _ , _ iknaqe yagh lghii _ nukalpigagh u luni _ .
nanevgagh luni _ sa nanigh magh mi _ , _ temngi _ esnagh mun _ ukig qagh luni _ siku gnun _ kan av eng iighhaq _ pi yagh luni _ analghu ghllag t _ awata itni _ nanugh ghllag nkuk _ kasivag tke ak _ .
Nan uun Ê¼nguq _ tamaakut _ kasivag lghii ni _ sughug i kayugu ut _ qimag igate ngugh t _ .
legan _ sughukagh a _ uka _ .
aatak _ mayugh aghtekagh _ analghu nun _ .
sa ite ngughk _ sanqute ite ngughk _ iwerngaqun _ sav igg ani _ tafsimig ke luku _ .
qaygeghte qaghte luni _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ , _ uka _ legan _ nagnegh aqe uq _ nanugh ghllag _ .
aatakqun _ temngi _ sav igg ani _ amaaghaghte luku _ qule mun _ nengug te luku _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ whaken _ pi lleqe amken _ , _ whaken _ pi lleqe amken _ ! _ â
kii _ , _ nanugh ghllag nguq _ tukegh aghte ghllag luni _ leg an Ê¼nguq _ aga _ siigte ghllag magh mi _ kete mun _ pakegte ma lghii _ .
pelleghmun _ anagniigh utu te ma lghiik _ .
