qilag m _ taghnughhagh a
Mek enegh sim _ apegh llegh a
tawaten _ pagaliit _ aghnaqe kangat _ , _ pagaliit _ entaqun _ ungipaghagh itneng _ , _ angayuqagh mineng _ ungipagh aq _ entaqun _ liite qugh kaqe kangi _ .
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ nenge uq _ tamaa na _ tan em leq a _ umiileg leg _ .
umiileg a _ nuna m _ tamaa tu m _ tallim aneng _ panig leg _ .
Uk saagh unnegh iste nguq _ aghnaghagh t _ pagunghagh eng _ pi aqe kangat _ .
elngaatall _ ingh uy iq utaqelghiit _ .
Tawaten Ê¼nguq _ ingh uy aneng _ kaate nghata _ naa ita _ pikegken _ aakagh itneng _ inghu sightu ait _ n iv ugh tegh aqegkangi _ .
alla _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh _ pi luni _ , _ pagunghagh _ saghna yaghqaaghte luni _ inghu yagh llegh mi _ tawaten _ inghu ghngaaghmeng _ uyuq lighpig aam _ nanigh ke aagh _ anglegute mineng _ san iv aghq aagh luni _ taghnughhagh _ nagaqugh waa _ qiya lghii _ .
ighninghhagh _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqe luku _ qiya llegh akun _ taakwavek _ pi luni _ kaa saqminigu _ taghnughhagh _ ighninghhagh _ mekelghiigh aaf tughnguq _ .
elngaatall _ anegh r eng it kem meng _ tugu luku _ nii v us gh aminun _ kanagh a _ .
K uug Ê¼ ghilnguut _ whaa _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ seghleghhalek _ angayuqagh gkenka _ quyake naqe ak _ kuug Ê¼ ghilnguut _ .
taagken _ uteghnigh uute luteng _ tawaten _ emta _ naa ita _ almesigh ghhagh mitun _ aakagh itneng _ whaken _ ingh uk egkiit _ nivugh kangi _ .
Uy uq lighpig aam _ inghu sightu a _ k at ag yaqminigu _ kii _ , _ aga _ sa u a _ ifkagh uq _ .
piyaqminigu _ taghnughhagh _ enraq llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u uq _ .
ii _ , _ quyake naqe na iqe a _ aghnaghagh m _ piyaqminigu _ , _ teng v imun _ , _ kipullegmun _ , _ naa an _ piyaqminigu _ .
â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ seghleghhalek _ waran _ ata n _ , _ ugw ika _ nuna m _ m atu m _ umiileg ke nghite yagh kagu _ .
S aku s iiq naq llu um af t an _ elngaatall _ .
yug ngunang _ aqsanguma ziin _ qavngaq _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ ungipaate ghngaatni _ aygughike a _ , _ yug ngunani _ aqsa nge sta _ legan _ .
Ugw ini _ nani _ qaga _ yug ni _ qerngugh taagh ullghiit _ .
itegh yan _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ yug mi _ whani _ , _ panig gpek _ kayngu sagh aates naq lugh aaten _ s aku s iiq naq lugh w aaten _ .
waran _ nuna m _ qagugh m _ umiileg ke nghite yagh kangaten _ . _ â

â _ saa _ , _ sangama _ ? _ â
â _ esghaqagh ghhu qun _ taana _ taghnughhagh _ . _ â

yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh luni _ , _ â _ naken _ pi a _ ? _ â
â _ entaqun _ esgha _ yug ngunani _ aqsanguma uq _ . _ â
yuug _ iisqiighute luni _ panig ni _ pi a _ , _ â _ Wh aan naanghi tuten _ , _ aane ste naqe amken _ , _ qagavek _ lliigh naqe uten _ .
nunalgute mnun _ qagavek _ talwa _ kinku nun _ itegh snaanghite amken _ , _ liilightugh te naqe amken _ , _ tesqagavek _ temngi _ lliigh naqe uten _ . _ â _ taawa _ aan e simakanga _ .
nunalgute m _ nanglleg yagute ghngaaghmigu _ qayughllak _ pi ligu _ umiileg m _ iinghute kanga _ .
taawa _ tesqagavek _ lliigh uq _ .
uksaaqestagh ma kanga _ , _ kuml aluni _ aqlaghaghte a _ , _ kumlate a _ .
Ighivg aghmi _ tawaten _ tanq igh llug llaak _ , _ taghnughhagh a nguq _ qiya ghllag _ .
sa meng _ tesqagani _ azigutagh ngllagh vyiigh luni _ kiyaghte aagh _ .
wata _ aqlaghaghtekanga _ kuml akanga _ .
Tawaten Ê¼nguq _ uteghpaarkitaagh te aqe a _ .
qenwat _ mengilegyagute luku _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ taghnughhagh mi _ whani _ nanglleg ke gpenanga _ qiyaaqe ai _ , _ piyaqnagh te _ whanga _ lli aghte lunga _ . _ â
tawaten _ uteghpaarkitaagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ h iik _ , _ tanqigh _ mamlegpag u uute uq _ .
tawaten _ uteghpaarkitaagh ghngaaghmi _ me m _ tun utanganeng _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnaghagh mi _ whan ii _ , _ n af ugh nagh qu ten _ ell ngaatall _ , _ aqfa aqe amken _ .
wasaq _ whanga _ angayuqagh gken _ n angleg yag ull ukek _ , _ nanglleg ke lukek _ ava ite ngugh k _ ighnegh ite ngugh k _ , _ elpegun _ tuune kaqsagh agka _ ighneghqagh meng _ .
tea- ai _ maligte nga _ aqfa aqe amken _ . _ â

piyaqminigu _ yuug _ , _ qategh rakeg tepig llegh ii meng _ , _ qateghrakegtagh meng _ aatkagh leg _ .
Q im ug sii f tughnguq _ , _ qikmigh a _ qategh rakeg tep er u waaghet _ qamagte luteng _ .
â _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ taghnughhite gnun _ tawavek _ . _ â
mayugh te a nguq _ , _ mayugh te a _ . _ ( _ uyatu pigte ma a _ pamavek _ qilag mun _ . _ )
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ aghnagh aq _ meqsug uq _ .
salug naqe uq _ meq sug em _ ikfiqe sta _ .
yug m _ akuzite aqe yagh kanga _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ kaate yaghtugh ukung _ , _ kaate kuvek _ meghe lleqe uten _ . _ â _ seghleghhalek _ sakniqe uq _ salug naqe uq _ .
qenwat _ yug m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aa-a _ , _ tawani _ utaqa i ai _ meghqe te qagh naqe amken _ .
W atagh llag ng aam _ puugh tes aq un ang _ .
taawa _ puugh te sim aku vek _ qayughllak qun _ elpek _ pil q egken _ taawa _ ifla lleqe uten _ . _ â _ naagu _ aghulaqe uq _ .
legan _ aghulaqe luni _ mul ugh pag luni _ me m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ ukavek _ qiive aghten _ , _ esghaqagh nga qun _ .
aatkagh pung _ naavghute ltegneki _ . _ â _ ii _ , _ iike na ghhalek _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ qu way uw igat aghhaghmeng _ elngaatall _ .
W ar anÊ¼ngam _ taawa _ qiive aghte ait _ . _ â
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ nuqete yagh luni _ qiive uq _ .
piyaqminigu _ kaay _ , _ tag neq g alek _ qallevag kek _ ngevreghagte lutek _ .
â _ aatkagh pung _ naavghute ltegneki _ , _ ukut _ aatkagh nka _ esghaqagh ki qun _ pi nigh ghllag t _ elngaatall _ . _ â

â _ yaghlegillu _ inegh tengngwaaq aqsagh aanga _ wataghllak _ kitumun _ puugh nayuk anganga _ . _ â

â _ elngaatall _ puughte aaten _ taag um _ yug m _ .
pi naanghite uten _ , _ naten _ pi naanghite uten _ . _ â _ qinu na ghhalek _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ aaghte ste laatagh uq _ .
legan _ qallevag gni _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ qallevag kek _ taake uk _ aate ak _ , _ melngu u luni _ qamiye m _ ingleghagh an _ akul angakun _ ifkagh uq _ .
taawa _ aghnagh _ taana _ ellnga _ , _ aatkagh i _ aate luki _ taghnughhite gnun _ itegh uq _ .
Mul ugh pag llagluni _ pama _ yuug _ uteghnigh uq _ .
aapte a _ , _ â _ naagu _ qaame na a _ , _ sal u waagh tuten _ ? _ â

â _ yaghlegillu _ utaqa i aqe unga _ ! _ â _ aghnagh m _ puughte a _ .
aghnagh aq _ sa luni _ pi li _ sama _ melngu ughte luni _ , _ akuzi na luni _ pi yagh uq _ , _ temngi _ legan _ aneghte ghllag uq _ .
naagu _ aga _ unite luku _ igleghte uq _ .
yug m _ liigike a _ , _ liigike ghngaaghmiki _ igleghte uq _ .
taawa _ s p ac e- mi _ entaqun _ nani _ tespagani _ kiyaghte uq _ taana _ melngu ughte luni _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ tung tun Ê¼nguq _ uka _ tagi aqe ut _ qerng aghneghet _ .
amig igh te naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ , _ aklu i uute naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ ima nguq _ aga _ alpag aqe ut _ kaate ste gpenateng _ , _ suka ite ngughk _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ kiyaghte uq _ .
tawaten _ alla _ uka _ tagi yata _ , _ uk an te rug pag llag luki _ ima _ sivu kaghqagh itnun _ amig igh te naqutke uq _ .
sivuligh t _ qenwat _ aga _ , _ qenwat _ naghughte ut _ .
( _ taana _ pegte aghte luku _ tespamavek _ lliigh naqe unga _ . _ )
taghnughhagh _ q iyagh llaak _ , _ yug m _ liigike ghngaaghmigu _ .
navek _ pi luni _ kaate nghmini _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin mi _ naqam _ aviillegh mni _ ? _ â
â _ S as qell unga _ pi aqe zinga _ kaki aqe lghiinga _ , _ wangi aqe lghiinga _ , _ tekegh ngllagh aqe lghiinga _ . _ â _ taawa _ yug m _ nepiigh te aqe kanga _ .
( _ taagken _ taawa _ tawavek _ uteghte unga _ ) _ .
aghnagh aq _ taana _ tungtu t _ uka _ tagi yata _ , _ siv ut gh ulluki _ elngaatall _ tume kaghqagh itnun _ amig igh te ragkiigh uq _ .
kii _ , _ sivuligh t _ aga _ naghughte uute ut _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh m _ nalighnegh akun _ agtugh qagh aa _ legan _ , _ qallevag kek _ quup agh saq min ikek _ , _ aghnagh _ qallevag mineng _ aane yalghiimi _ , _ aghnagh _ legan _ matagh mi _ tawaten _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ kiyaghte uq _ .
tagtalmi _ yug m _ aatkagh meng _ kelqe te luku _ ivagh yaghtugh aa _ .
taawa _ naalke ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnagh mi _ whan ii _ taa meng wha _ tawaten _ kiyagh taagh aq uten _ , _ pineghllug pigu ma ziin _ elngaatall _ .
naagu _ liiligh tugh waagh yaq em ken _ wataghllak _ puughte ste gpenang _ pisqell uten _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ taglaate naqe amken _ .
kaate kuma _ tespamavek _ tu ung lii yug saq un ang _ wataghllak _ pi lghaaten _ . _ â
mayugh te luku _ kaat ute a _ , _ legan _ itegh uq _ kii _ , _ t aghn ugh aan _ quyake magh an _ taku luku _ qet llegh aataghaa _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ kiyaghte luteng _ , _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ taana _ aghnagh _ .
Puugh t is teni _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ , _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ .
qavagh ste a _ kengh ek _ kumaghllug kek _ .
qavagh ngllagh luku _ tagtalmi _ takuyangllagh aqe luku _ , _ aghnagh _ teghtugh nanigh uq _ qavagh uq _ .
taana _ puughte i ste nga _ aghnagh _ .
taagken _ qavagh yan _ , _ keveg luku _ kengh egnun _ tazingavek _ aglagh te kestagh aa _ .
K engh egnun _ miluute a _ , _ yug m _ taam _ mayugh te ikagh m _ .
taagken _ aga _ av iil ghw astun _ ukikagh _ kengh eg nekun _ taaggun _ .
taana ta _ ungipagh aq _ tawatel nguq _ , _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ S at an -enkuk _ .
taake uk _ esgha _ ungipaghaate k _ .
kiyaghnegh ghllag m _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ whavek _ tuune kaqsagh kanga _ .
nuna m _ yug an _ tugukligh ma ite kanga _ .
Tawatel nguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ satan _ taana _ asitmun _ egtekaqe kanga _ .
ungipaghagh mta _ title- nga ta _ taana _ .
paninang _ akeqe luku _ kenegh mun _ anusimingllagh yaghqaqe kanga _ .
taana ta _ ungipaghagh an _ yug lgute mnun _ ungipagh aatk es uw aqegkegka _ .
Nagh uy angugh tekaq
Mek enegh sim _ apegh llegh a
taane a _ tanemlleqa _ I ming ate m _ ungipamsug kaqe kanga _ .
( _ aagna _ pan igg aqa _ whanga _ Nagh uy a _ . _ pugughilegh llu _ naghuyagh lgu lghii _ . _ )
naghuyagh m _ taam _ at iiq el uug utanga _ , _ N aaw y angu yaghtugh nguq _ yug m _ ategh a _ taana _ .
iike te luteng _ entaqun _ pugughileghmii t _ ighnegh ke te lghiit _ .
taawa _ naghuyagh m _ taam _ , _ kiyaghtaallegh llagem _ entaqun _ kayusillegh _ tuun yaqminigu _ .
entaqun _ naghuyagh mun _ tawaten _ naghuyagh t _ kayute kellug ke i _ qutenge stekagh i _ .
taawanginaq _ liiligh tugh waaghluki _ pi kaqsagh kangi _ , _ wataghllak _ kelute mun _ qamagte luki _ ingaghte uute luki _ qav aa tesqelluki _ kayagtekaqsagh kangi _ .
taana _ ataasigh _ entaqun _ nukalpigagh _ sa u a _ entaqun _ aygugh itagh ma uq _ , _ pineghllug ma uq _ tawaten _ ungipamsug ughte yaghqaa luni _ .
unaami _ aghte yagh kanga _ taakut _ kelute mun _ ingaghte uute nga lghiit _ , _ qute mete luteng _ elpeg kekagh t _ .
taana _ aviite uq _ .
taawa nguq _ Nagh uy angugh simalghii _ .
nani _ pennagh ni _ naan lluku _ apegh aqe yagh aa _ I ming ate m _ uku nun _ legan _ Aglugh aan kunun _ aghqesaghtugh vig at _ .
taana _ Nagh uy a _ ellnga n _ talwa _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ I ming ate m _ , _ yugu yagh lghii _ taana _ Nagh uy a _ .
taawa nguq _ mel qugh llu ug teghllag luni _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
qalghigh llegh a _ iglaglluugte ghllag luni _ .
taagken _ esghagh nanigh aat _ en taq un Ê¼nguq _ aviighute ma uq _ .
taana ta nguq _ esgha _ sivun gh at _ taakut _ Ag aankut _ .
ungipagh aq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ taana _ .
aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ qerngughte i uq _ elngaatall _ .
kii _ , _ aling tagh u i i i i itu yameng _ aling ig a tut anganeng _ atigh ma ut _ entaqun _ .
ima _ taz im ke rug llaak _ ungipagh aq _ taana _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
Upengh angh aninguq _ pungughmii t _ sikungigh te nghaani _ taakw n aa _ , _ enlegmete te _ pagavek _ aghviqagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
upenghagh ii yaghtugh aqe ut _ m a in l and -mun _ tespagavek _ .
upenghagh ii aqe ut _ tespagani _ ne eng _ punguug _ unite lukek _ .
Alingtii tung angin aghhaq _ tamaan taqelghii _ ne mi _ tamaani _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayngun _ whaa _ sa u a _ qinuy u waagh llak _ pi lleqe uq _ tughneghagh igh naqe yagh kumkek _ punguug _ , _ entaqun _ . _ â
esgha _ ayum ir ug llag ugh ngaaghmi _ nenglullug lgu ma uq _ alla _ , _ sivu liigh ait _ aag ku rug llaget _ entaqun _ .
alingtagh u itu ngam _ taam _ sivul iigh ani _ naaf qen naq ii _ .
elngaatall _ tughneghagh igh naqe ma kek _ punguug _ .
kelgugh ma lghii _ , _ kelgugh ma kanga _ P u nguum _ yug a _ neghyu i sqellug qu _ ellmeggnun _ .
nenglullug nun _ kaate luni _ nenglullug t _ qineghte luki _ ategh it _ tuqlughragh luki _ nagas iisqelluki _ P uvall anaq niluni _ .
Taa kunun _ aglagh luni _ taakwna _ atigh luku _ p uvall anaq niluni _ nagas iisqelluki _ .
elngaatall _ neqenge naqe lghii _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ ken Ê¼ ghh w ak _ kumaghllug kek _ , _ sasiqumtaagh at _ ayumigh _ ken Ê¼ ghh w igh luteng _ neqe _ ken Ê¼ ghh w am _ uvit anganun _ llilaghtu ghllag aqe luku _ .
W uu tutk aghq ani _ tiguynge _ sa u a _ , _ tiguynge t _ tamaakut _ aksigutagh u aqe ut _ , _ ayumigh m _ tiguynge i _ .
anighqute ni _ , _ tamaakut _ tiguynge t llu _ iigh luki _ navek _ tug waagh esnagh yaghq aaluki _ .
kelgugh qu a _ elngaatall _ punguug _ .
I ii _ , _ whan iku k est aq _ maligte luku _ tughnegh al uwh aqaa _ qerngughte yalghiimi _ elngaatall _ .
ila i nguq _ mingle meng _ tamaaken _ itegh aqe lghiit _ , _ ila i _ qule aneng _ paagken _ ukig aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ mingle meng _ naken _ taagken _ , _ ila i _ samaken _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte a _ .
â _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ . _ â _ iwerngaqun _ tughnegh al uwh aq _ neqe mun _ whavek _ sekete uute lghii _ .
taakut _ w uu tutk aghq ani _ anighqute t _ tugu luki _ aliigh aghte te kete luki _ qete te a _ tuqu qu ghllag aa _ .
ila a nguq _ alig napig llegh ii _ aga _ nuna m _ asi anun _ itegh aqe uq _ , _ pagavek _ qilaga nun _ , _ mingle mun _ .
ila a nguq _ aamta _ n atel nguut _ , _ temngi _ ten p utagh aaq elghii n Ê¼nguq _ tamaani _ tughneghaan- ghngaaghmeng _ elngaatall _ , _ taawa _ alingruugh em _ angtalanganeng _ .
tawaten _ kelengaruugh uq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
qavagh nanigh uq _ sa uq _ kelenga uq _ , _ ak in ayuk ang atni _ .
elngaatall _ qavagh m _ sak niq es at nii _ ( _ ii _ , _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ qalmesagh ghllag _ ii negh min ii _ qute mun _ lliigh qagh yu k _ ) _ qalmesagh ghllag mun _ teskanavek _ atghagh luni _ qavangsi ma lghii _ , _ iye gni _ suq w aghhaghmeng _ ayagsightugh lukek _ inglugtun _ , _ esghapag pigte lghii stun _ legan _ qavagh _ .
I ye g _ naqam _ tagh p agh rakeg llagek _ , _ taawa _ qavagh uq _ .
ii _ , _ meng egh ag llagem _ teghtugh a _ elngaatall _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ paga nguq _ esnagh mi _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ .
guutute kaghagh ni _ taakut _ kel qelluki _ tawani _ .
Kayag tagh waagh utaq ef taat _ tughneghaan- lgute meggnun _ tamaavek _ .
â _ I man tagh aay _ aa _ uygu te gu _ , _ uygu te gu _ . _ â _ uygute na luku nguq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
â _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ , _ aa _ K an an tagh aam _ pi naagh aa _ . _ â _ K an an le nguum _ tughneghagh m nguq _ mingle anun _ kayagte te a _ .
â _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ aa _ Pik an tagh aam _ pi naagh aa _ . _ â _ P iku m _ quulv an le nguum _ tughneghaan _ .
K an an tagh aghmun _ pi sqe aqe luku _ elngaatall _ , _ kayag tagh waagh utaq ef taat _ .
ii _ , _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ aa _ taawa llu _ whanga _ .
makete qaghte te kete luku _ guute laatagh ma kangi _ .
aniighwte aghte qugh a _ elngaatall _ tuqu qu ghllag luku _ .
taawa nguq _ tughneghagh igh te a _ .
naten _ kiik _ lliigh nghaani _ atghagh uute kayug t _ enleg meng _ tespag ken _ .
atghagh uute luteng _ elngaatall _ uksaaqestagh aa _ punguug ni _ tawani _ .
aqlaghaghte nghaani qun _ mangteghagh t _ sa aqe lghiit _ miigtagh aqe lghiit _ w et ng aaq waaq elghiit _ aqlagha mi _ .
T ak ev uq _ igleghte ma lghii _ , _ alingtagh u itu ngam _ kelengake ma kanga _ , _ saa vg um iigh waagh luni _ ii _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ kangigh a _ iiyagh kun _ kanaghte luku _ , _ taagken _ nuqnegh tegh yaghq aa _ .
wetku _ kaate kan _ naghulleg yaghqagh a _ .
mangteghagh nun _ kaan negh min ii _ qagugh mig te ghllag aqe luni _ siklaate luni _ .
qama _ akite aqe kangat _ tenglugtugh aqe kangat _ , _ kii _ iq lin qeg sagh mi _ payugte kestagh aqe lghii _ siklaate luni _ .
iinghute ma ka nge a _ ellmeggnun _ kaate kan _ akite fqaan _ tenglugtugh fqaan _ pisqelluki _ .
taawa _ ellngit nun _ pi luni _ , _ akite nghite nghatni nguq _ , _ kii _ ii _ , _ qen Ê¼ ngu ll iq eghllag luni _ payugte kestagh aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ siklaate ghllag aqe lghii _ , _ qagugh mig te aqe lghii _ mangteghagh kun _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ taakwavek _ , _ siklaate luni _ akite nghite yatni _ , _ ii _ qen Ê¼ ngu ll iq eghllag luni _ sivugte kestagh yan _ naghulleg aa _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ neng salghiimi _ elngaatall _ T ak ev uq _ anagniigh yalghiimi _ .
uyiigh _ qamaken _ nuqnegh kanga _ elngaatall _ .
nenglu _ pikegken _ segge ma kanga _ segge ma kanga _ , _ naange naqe yan _ uyiigh m _ kangigh a _ kaate yan _ peghhe qagh ma kanga _ .
S aap gut aa _ , _ T ak ev uq _ sa u a _ taana _ .
uksaagh mi _ taakwani _ uksugh luni _ , _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ piy aat aagh luni _ navek _ taanÊ¼g avek _ , _ mangteghagh _ suna _ taana _ .
megh mete ma uq _ entaqun _ .
taawa nguq _ nanevgagh ghllag _ quulqite gni _ aqume luni _ ii _ .
tamaa _ yugtuqagh _ aghnaghtu uq _ .
upugha te aat _ elngaatall _ .
gaagh te naqe aat _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ aa _ sivug ll un ing ugh aa _ , _ â _ aqelqagh ka _ aa _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ gaagh u tegguu _ .
gaagh te ggu _ neghes tegguu _ tuugkagh rraag meng _ , _ giimagh rraag meng _ , _ iqu uy ar rag meng _ . _ â _ ahaa _ , _ gaagh te sqe ma kanga _ .
atightugh luki _ imanagh t _ sa u aat _ giimagh rraag t _ , _ iqu uy ar raag et _ , _ tuugkagh rraag t _ , _ tapghaaghagh at _ .
gaagh te aat _ elngaatall _ .
ugute luteng _ negh ma lghiit _ .
neqnigh ghhalek _ imanagh _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ neghe a _ .
iwerngaqun _ kep sugh agh iigh luni _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ taam nguq _ qiive luni _ qaallgute a _ , _ â _ alingtagh u itu ngam _ aa _ sanqut aani _ ellmi neng _ negh ai _ . _ â
legan _ tawaten _ pi uq _ , _ ii _ ang v angh akun _ ug mes taa llgh akun _ tuugkagh _ , _ giimagh _ , _ iqu uy aq _ legan _ piisqaghte a tuq _ , _ tapghaaghagh _ tamaa na _ uya iigh aq _ .
San qut aan inguq _ negh mafte ai _ .
taawa _ tuquma lghii _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
tefaay _ !
yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ ungipagh aq
siftugh te m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ taana nguq _ yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ .
elngaatall _ neqeng yu p aa rugllak _ urang _ .
Quun pe nguq _ naken _ piy aaneng _ , _ angyagh neng _ kaate nghmini _ negh sagh sighagh llagluni _ kaate aqe lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ elngaatall _ nulighh an _ nefku ghllag aqe kangi _ ila i _ negh kangi _ .
amiiragh i _ nayug luki _ , _ nayug luki _ negh kangi _ kanaghte uute aqe luki _ .
tagtalmi _ taagken _ yuug _ neqete nanigh yalghiimi _ , _ neqe meng _ kaat ute na nigh yagh lghii mi _ , _ ima _ neqe ngllagh ghllag qagh a _ taana _ nefku ghllag _ avangite te a _ negh ke igh te uk _ , _ yuug _ neqenge yu igh te yalghiimi _ .

neqenge nanigh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ U p uu peng _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh meng _ pi yagh kuma _ entaqun _ negh nayagh ukung _ ighivgaqun _ . _ â
pennagh nun _ nunivag yagh yalghiimi _ , _ tawaten _ saghna ma luku _ , _ ugw ing anguq _ uka _ kaleve qaghte ghllag luni _ qaya ghhagh a _ taglagh yalghiimi _ .
kii _ sama nguq _ usingigh yalghiimi _ neqe ghllag _ ugw ingan _ qaake ma kanga _ .
Nak en Ê¼nguq _ pennagh m _ saye aneng _ taakwegken _ aghnagh _ aane luni _ kayusiite luku _ ima nguq _ aga _ itegh aa tuk _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ , _ uyghag m _ asi anun _ , _ amig anun _ tawavek _ itegh aa llutek _ aga nguq _ umeg te uk _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ Ugw ika _ taameng _ neqeng yiigh ull ii _ , _ aghnagh meng _ naalkute ma lghii _ pennagh m _ saye ani _ whaa _ . _ â _ aglagh ma lghii _ nunivagte gpenani _ .
kaate yan _ ugw ini _ p em akanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ neqenge yu igh te ziin _ ? _ â
â _ esgha _ sangama _ neqeng yiigh us kang anga _ . _ â
taagken _ aghnagh _ quunpeng _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ pi ghllag ughte uq _ .
Ugw ini _ aghulaq enghani _ ellnga llu _ aghulaq aq lluni _ .
allamenguq _ pi yalghiimi _ ataasigh meng _ aghneghmi _ , _ aghnagh ngugh _ taawa _ pennagh m _ saye ani _ aqumga aqe uq _ , _ iwhani _ pellugtugh aqe uq _ elngaatall _ aliineghllug ghllag mi _ .
taku ma kanga _ aghnagh m _ taam _ .
â _ sangavek _ agavek _ ne mun _ aglagh igate ziin _ , _ ellngin aghhagh pek _ pellagh yug igate ziin _ ? _ â

â _ nakaa _ , _ ne ke aqa _ una _ neghightagh u unga _ una _ ne ke aqa _ whanga _ . _ â
â _ kumakigh te aghte ltung _ ? _ â
aa _ , _ aa _ ighsak estam i kun Ê¼nguq _ angegh uq _ .
taawa nguq _ gaagh aqe uq _ neghsagh meng _ esla kun _ elngaatall _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ sivuke luten _ kumakigh laken _ . _ â _ aqume luni _ taagken _ ingaghte ste luku _ kumakigh aa _ .
qavagh ngllagh aa _ elngaatall _ kumakigh aa _ , _ ima nguq _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh yan _ aghsug kestagh luku _ nuna kun _ lli kestagh luku _ ugke a _ taana _ qallaqugh ghllag _ tugu luku _ sigutanga kun _ aghnagh m _ kuuve ma kanga _ legan _ tuqute luku _ .
I ilq wa _ qaamna _ , _ sigute kek _ panegh yalghiimek _ tuquma lghii _ .
tuqu yalghiimi nguq _ taakwavek _ iq ragh qelluni _ llangaqa nguq _ ighyaghqesagh lghii mi _ iq ligh mi _ .
aqume ste luku _ , _ aqume vyiigh ste luku _ , _ pelluk u a _ tawavek _ , _ iigge nge ai _ piifte luki _ , _ aqumgagh an _ tawaten _ unite ma kanga _ .
Un ill uku u _ pennagh m _ qaye ani _ taklaghte luni _ kelengake ma kanga _ qaya ghhagh _ taglagh yaghqagh _ , _ ugw ini _ .
kii _ , _ uka nguq _ taglagh yalghiimi _ usi ii ghllag luni _ , _ kaleve qaghte ghllag luni _ .
taagken _ kaate yan _ esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh siigh ni _ taana _ , _ aghnaghagh ni _ sa ni _ , _ elngaatall _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â _ tuqu kau lghii _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
â _ egmiinaq _ sukate luten _ aghnaq el qu sig penang _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â

â _ naqam _ iq ligh pek _ tespikani _ esghapag nga _ .
egmiinaq _ tea- ai _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ neqe ghllag u unga _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â _ avelghaqiinagh aa _ .
â _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ naqam _ iq ligh pek _ esghapag nga _ . _ â _ qenwat _ sakrite uq _ .
uughqaghte luni _ sayug agh saqminigu _ imani nguq _ uniistaaghhagh u uq _ .
Piyaq min igu nguq _ tuqu uluni _ , _ aneghnegh sugh yaqminigu _ .
ii _ akuqagh luku nguq _ elngaatall _ yuug _ qiyaaghwagh yalghiimi _ inag mig ke luku _ nuliigh siigh ni _ , _ aghnaghagh ni _ taana _ .
qiyaaghwagh yalghiimi nguq _ , _ qiyaaghwagh ma luku _ aghnagh m _ nuliigh pig an _ tespam um _ pennagh m _ qaayng anil nguum _ unite ma kanga _ .
nalleghaghhalek nguq _ naagu _ yuug _ .
kii _ kaate yalghiimi nguq _ up- ke aa _ qayugh a _ kaleve qaghte luni _ .
kaate luni nguq _ , _ â _ kii _ nutaan _ repall _ neqete uten _ ? _ â
â _ aa _ , _ nutaan _ repall _ neqete unga _ . _ â _ Esgh alq ug pen aan Ê¼nguq _ iye gni _ iigh manginagh lukek _ , _ gginagh ni _ iigh manginagh luku _ .
kayusigh qu luku _ , _ taglaate qugh lgusigh luku _ itegh aa llutek _ aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ sa yamek _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ . _ â
â _ esghaghhu _ nutaan _ neqenge yalghiinga _ , _ piyaqleg iigh yalghiinga _ entaqun _ iye gka _ puuve uk _ . _ â
gaagh ragkiigh lutek _ negh te kete luku _ .
â _ sa yamek llu _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ ? _ â _ taawa _ naghughte nghminigu _ , _ â _ sa yamek llu _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ ? _ â
qenwat _ yug m _ taam _ ugw ingan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U um lleqa _ pi ma kanga _ ! _ â _ taawa _ iye k _ puuve ghllag ni lukek _ qin un aghqutk es aq minigu _ .
â _ U um lleqa _ pi ma kanga _ â _ , _ tawaten Ê¼nguq _ pi tkellug qu _ uulegh u ma lghii _ tawaten _ pi magh mi _ .

pugughileghmii u llegh ut
Quyngigh tuum aghme nguq _ anguyag nge luteng _ anag ma lghiit _ qavagh nanigh naqe yameng _ aate yameng _ .
tawatete ut _ naqamalla _ whaa _ aapgh waagh aqa _ nagate lleg mtun _ .
sangan _ uglagh yag aghllag ennguq _ W al angam _ aapgh waagh yaqminigu _ tazingani _ aa sa mi _ .
nenglu _ ataasigh _ nenglu ghrug ghllag _ , _ yugunqegte pigte ma aqe aat llu _ .
angayuqagh gket _ tawani _ nengl uk saq em egg ni _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg nguq _ W al angam _ apegh llegh ani _ , _ aanleghaate luni _ angyaghugh te aqe uq _ , _ angyagh _ , _ tesqamaken _ .
â _ tawaten _ sikig stun _ entaqun _ , _ â _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ .
taagavek _ nenglu ngllagh luteng _ , _ taakwavek _ taana _ ataasigh _ angayuq ag teng _ tuumkellug qu _ .

aghvenge luteng _ , _ yugtu pigte lghii _ entaqun _ maaghaghte aqe kangit _ aghvenge ghngaaghmeng _ .
nuugh aqe lghiit _ .

nengqe ghllag luteng _ ukut _ tapghaghrag t _ iighsuute t _ .

ii _ , _ qelegh kangit _ legan _ tesamavek _ .

estu ma luku _ tuqu qu ghllag luku _ nateqlitekagh _ teskan ani _ pi aqe luku _ .

aasagh mii lgu uq _ .

pugughileghmii t

entaqun _ ipa u uq _ .

An ang w aan aaguq _ ap agh pig aqa _ sivuligh pigaq _ .
alla _ sivuligh leg _ .

napaqagh ghhagh _ ap agh pig aqaqa _ Yug niil qw aam _ ata a _ uum _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ , _ Iteghyagh aam _ kuug gha _ .
W aall a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ , _ ukut _ I meg yu ut enkut _ pi ke aat _ .
kiyalighagh mii u ut _ taakut _ ukut _ Ay waagh miit _ nani _ qangeghsagh mii t _ .
M algh ugh qelluteng _ entaqun _ nun aghq aat _ qangeghsagh _ .
Un megg aankut _ , _ S um uu si nkut _ , _ alaka ghhagh nkut _ kiyalighagh m _ yug ke ai _ .
maalghug _ alaka ghhagh k _ sivuligh llu _ kinguligh llu _ pi nigh staghhiinagh k _ qamagte lutek _ .
W aall a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ nayugh ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
tagi ukung _ enmis _ whangkutung _ .
tesamani _ pugughilegh mi _ kiyagh llegh ii _ .
tespikavek _ qemi mun _ kel utem m nil ngugh mun _ mayugh lutung _ , _ segesqugh gmikun _ ayapegh luni _ aliineghllug _ kiw atmun _ nekegte luni _ aghuliigh aqe lghii _ .
entaqun _ qama _ kiyalighagh mun _ um yugw ak _ kaat ngwaagh lutek _ .
akuzillegh it _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ iitek _ whangkutestun _ anagte yaghqaa gpenateng _ tusaqe neghllugte yaghqaa gpenateng _ .

alaska- meng _ , _ m a in l and -meng _ .
Qan tagh anllegh aneng _ taakwegken _ .

enkaam _ Ag aam _ avaqutagh ke ai _ Kav nagh uun kut _ , _ Aglugh aankut _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ Qaygegh t aankut _ , _ U kum ankut _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ M aghq an eq _ .
allameng _ nuyekligh lgu ut _ nalug iqe yagh aat _ .
nagate lleg mni _ peleghqe tke ai _ K ar g im _ , _ S agh umig en ku nguuk _ Sing ig paay ankuk _ .

K ar gi _ , _ Ag aq _ , _ tan- qagh u nga _ , _ ivagh i ma _ taakut _ liisimake anka _ .

qaaqu aq _ aghnagh u uq _ esghagh ghllag kaqe aqa _ taam _ maaten _ G ugw iing em _ ata lgu ta an _ nayag a _ .

taagken _ nengyugh ghhagh ka _ puughhute _ .
ivagh i ma _ kingulighpigagh _ .
avaquti a _ Anaghay aankut _ , _ aki vig nkut _ , _ nategh mii nkut _ .
Yug niil qwaaq _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ ighneghqagh ke a _ sa a _ qangigagh a _ , _ ilughagh n _ avaqutagh ke a _ .
Tutm atel gem _ nayag a _ T en m iiwen _ , _ taan anginaq _ liisimake aqa _ .

U ngu q t i _ ilugh waa _ , _ Q aay aam _ avaqutagh a _ , _ Q aaq w aankut _ kuug gh at _ .

anglegutetu yagh lghii _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
anagutagh ghhagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh ma _ ataata ke a _ puughhute m _ .

aaga _ Anag ut aam _ nulighh a _ .
avaqutagh lgu yagh lghii _ tagneghli meng _ , _ peleghqe tke aat _ puughhute m _ kuug gh an _ .
atghagh u nga _ Ag aankut _ panike aat _ allughqagh m _ taw aaten _ anagutagh mete te _ lli aqe aq _ .
tan- qagh u nga _ Ag aam _ nayag ke a _ .
G gin aq utk an ik _ esghaqagh u lutek _ .
A am t ay aq _ aghyugh kau uq _ naagu _ tamaani _ sa kaghqagh ghhagh _ .

Yug waagh haq _ puughhute m _ ata a _ , _ nulighh a _ Naang iigh aq _ .
avaqutagh ke ai _ Yug waagh haam _ , _ pekete te aq _ , _ agigte te _ , _ puughhute _ , _ Nal ugw i _ .

naqam _ ilugh w al ghut angi _ taakut _ , _ Qaygegh t aankut _ .

enkaam _ whanga _ , _ I kan uq _ , _ Nal ugw i _ .
napaqagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh ke a _ Yug niil qwaaq _ .
Q aan aankut _ tesam an tuq _ ama _ ramke t _ allakagh meng _ .
tanem _ avaqutagh a _ taan angin aghhagh sug nill uku _ nagate te qugh aqe aqa _ elqwaagh ghqu _ , _ T aq aang ankuk _ .
pugughileghmii t _ naqamllu _ whaten _ whangkutestun _ pugughileghmii stun _ qerngagh meng _ atigh llegh at _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ naqam _ .
alla t _ nunatagh t _ kinku t _ ungipagh ke igate ait _ .
iitek nguq _ nunatagh meng _ nula u yagh uq _ taku aqe luku _ whaten _ negh naqe m _ saam _ amenqun _ ivagh i ghllagu yagh lghiit _ , _ neqe _ taana _ .
nula u yaghtugh ngugh _ whaken _ qiighqagh m _ yugw an _ lliigh vike aqe luku _ nula u yaghtugh ngugh _ .
atigh llegh i _ pugughileghmii u nghite ngugh t _ , _ naqamllu _ liigike llghite anka _ n aku mii ngwaaq luteng _ .
pugughileghmii lghute _ taan anguuq _ nagate lleg mni _ N ung ugw en kugneng _ Anaghay aan kugneng _ .
negh naqe m _ aneghneghte naqe m _ siivanllegh i nguq _ piiwagh mafte ut _ kiyang _ tawaten _ kevg aghq aligh luteng _ .
legan _ nenglu meng _ taagken _ whangkunneng _ qem g aghme teghll all em m neng _ aane luteng _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwaghkagh t _ , _ qavngaq _ imani _ .
ataasigh u yagh ukut _ , _ ataasigh mi _ nenglu mi _ , _ pelleghqagh ke te llegh u uq _ .
qafsina t _ entaqun _ kiyalighagh mun _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ ata ii qugh stegkangi _ Anaghay aam _ tanem _ taagken _ nenglu meng _ aanekagh t _ ighsake te te nkut _ , _ silas-tu te te nkuk _ Kiyaligh amel nguuk _ .
kiyalighagh mun _ lli aqe aat _ .
pugughileghmii lghute _ tesakmani _ nula ghllag lghii _ .
taagken _ nenglu meng _ ataasigh meng _ aane luteng _ piiwaghkagh t _ .
maani llu _ sivungagh mi _ nula aqe uq _ .
tawaten _ nagate vyiigh llegh ke aqa _ taagken _ angl is agh teg emneng _ .

neqamike yaghqagh t _ liigi _ neqamik esqelluki _ ungipamsug te aqe kanginkut _ .
W aak igal ngugh ni _ .
taana _ ayumightagh ghllag _ qaaqu aq _ ung ii pam sug taagh llak _ waa k igal kefut _ .
I ming ate m _ sa kagu _ ?
sakegh nghite a _ I ming an _ sak enghi taghput _ iike nagh te mineng _ nulighhtuqagh _ .
aghnagh nge naqe m _ akequsagh ke luku nguq _ yugusigh ni _ , _ iing ke rugllak _ ellngit ni _ tawani _ nengaawagh u lghii _ .

alla ghllag _ quutmii neng _ ungazigh meng _ allgeghkagh _ , _ allgellegh a _ entaqun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
taakut _ A al aankut _ , _ An ang w aan aankut _ A az ugw en kun nguq _ anglegute ke te ut _ , _ apa nka _ .

avaqutagh lgutu te lghiit _ .

nemeghqagh u luki _ suqi a _ .

nanugh m _ ne ke luku _ .
ii _ , _ nenglu ngllagh llegh ke te luku _ leg annguq _ nenglu i _ ifkaghte aqe ai _ nanugh m _ .

aghtugh aa _ pi neghllug _ .

tawaten _ nagaqugh aqa _ .

ungipagh kaqe kanga _ Tutm atel gem _ taam _ angl is agh tem a _ nap iigh lleghh iin nguq _ waame aqe ut _ nan umun _ sanitmiighte aghte lghiit _ tagtalmi _ .

nanugh m _ tuum l il aghllag luku _ ila i _ ikfiq n at _ kiigh ani _ .
nenglu _ qafsin Ê¼ gu yagh ta _ uglaghraag _ qaya _ paamna _ nenglu ligh vig ite ngughk _ tangeghtu ghllag _ .
ketwhelqun _ , _ uygu na ni _ kana _ allameng _ taana _ Kang k iil ghem _ asi ani qun _ , _ taghnughhagh ghhagh it _ estu igate ut _ .

atigh llegh i _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ taakwavek _ mayugh uute aqe ut _ , _ kiigtagh ke ut _ taakwani _ .
pennagh ni nguq _ taagani _ pen nan it ku ll aaluteng _ qagugh ak _ piyuke llegh eng _ entaqun _ ngelqagh u aghagh u aghte llegh mun _ kenlanga _ .
itghagh aqe ut _ tagi luteng _ iqall ugw anun _ .

S ugh ugwet
Taag an ir ug llag an ii _ talwa _ Q aaq w aam _ entaqun _ sivungagh ni _ sughu k _ allgeghkagh _ .
tespamaken _ aywaa neng _ iglegh tan eng _ nakaan _ uughqa neng _ .
taakwegken _ uq ev aneng _ aate yameng _ pi llghite ut _ ukegken _ aywaa neng _ pikagh t _ .
taakwegkut qun _ yugw it _ tuqu qugh kau ni kangit _ kiyalighagh mii t _ .
entaqun _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aki naqe m _ .
U ugh qan nguq _ uukna _ yug wa _ pi llghite uq _ uukna _ , _ Av ates taakw egkut _ , _ tea-si inkut _ .
aygugh a _ uukna _ anguyiqe kau uq _ ungazigh meng _ kenle ke luni _ .
qiighqagh _ entaqun _ un ay migh waaq aqsaq angat _ .
pillugute lghii stun _ maaten _ katam _ entaqun _ .

sa igh kuvek
taana _ sa igh kuvek _ ungipaghagh u luku _ repall _ nagaqugh aqa _ elngaatall nguq _ yug llaak _ .
naken llu _ nagaqugh qagh nghite ngugh u kut _ whaa _ maaten _ taaku s ta _ siquveg mii u yagh lghiit _ .
yugtu lleghpigagh u na iqe aat _ .

Un Ê¼g ar ug llaak _ ketligh at _ ila it _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m nguq _ s ugw ag luni _ ayvegh aneng _ neqete nghmeng _ aghtugh luni _ taglagh luni _ ne nun _ kaate nghmini _ meghsi ngllagh luni _ leg annguq _ tuun egh atni _ tun utmun _ kuuve aqe ai _ .

tuune a _ qinuyagute luku _ .
T un utmun _ kuuve a _ .
ii-i _ , _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ agh iv alegh taag aa _ allghiinegh iqe qrug ni luku _ .
aga _ itegh uq _ enraq llu _ .

ii _ , _ leg annguq _ itegh uq _ , _ qagingughte ghllag aa _ .

ellnga neng _ kayagte a _ ellnga neng _ pi sqellug qu _ .
sagiqe te yatni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnalqwaagh _ kii _ , _ qag igh r uku ut aagh llaget _ .

mayeraaghpag _ A naq si
siknegh mi _ ama _ ang vig apig niiq aa _ yuug _ .
yug ghrugllag u na iqe aat _ , _ taa waa _ kelgute yagh aat _ napaqagh squghhagh _ .
Wh ag unnguq _ kaapute luni _ ayuqe uq _ ( _ tuye akun _ ) _ whagun llu _ ighu m _ kenle akun _ .
nengug luku nguq _ esgha _ naama kusiigh aqlaatagh ma atgu _ .
U ngu q ti nguq _ angvigagh ghllag uq _ , _ Anaghay aam _ apegh aqe a _ .
nuqsaleg aqe a nguq _ taana _ napaqagh a _ nengug luku _ .
Qem igh ll ugwem _ tag taa langa _ .
qazigyaghagh ghhagh m nguq _ iq elq w akun _ pakineg luku _ tuquma lghii _ .
ivghaagh lghii _ amsik aghlluni _ entaqun _ qazigyaghagh meng _ , _ teghig ke sagh ke te _ nuyaaghite yagh lghii _ .
naghulleg aqe luki _ , _ pak in Ê¼g umakanga _ nagun _ iq elq w akun _ itegagh akun _ , _ taawa _ taana _ tuqusiigh iqe a _ , _ pakineg llegh a _ qazigyaghagh m _ .
ategh a _ A naq si _ , _ siknegh mii _ .
At ku yagh haam _ .
esgha qun _ tuqu naqe negh mta _ aghtugh igate ngugh u kut _ .
yug lgu luku _ enmis _ angu kaqe aat _ siknegh _ ukegkut _ kinguligh t _ .
Yul gu f tughnguq _ tamaa na ai _ yugw ii tellegh llagem _ entaqun _ nat angani _ yug lgu yagh uq _ enmis _ ingu tugh h aghme nguq _ paaghqite te yan _ yug pagite te yan _ aghvenge aghte aqe ut _ tagtalmi _ , _ siknegh mi _ .
amenqun _ ama _ neghqwaaghtuqagh _ .

negaghpag ngllagh llegh
Qii pam enguq _ ivalu meng _ negaghpag ke aqe ut _ taagani _ .
elngaatall _ uksulqusigh igh ngugh _ qiipe aqe kangat _ .
Am er iig agh allghi _ tamaakut _ qupneghqutaghqagh t _ , _ eslege llegh i _ kiiwhtaghqutaghqagh t _ , _ iqate lughqutaghqagh t _ , _ negaghpagkagh t _ .
Tawaten nguq _ p uus ngugh ragg aat _ imigh aqe ait _ whaa _ qafsina m _ yaagneghqagh m _ negaghpag m _ , _ nalluniightugh luteng _ emta _ taaggun _ .
qafsina _ imightugh luku _ .
whaten qun _ kaki naqe negh meggni qun _ qiipi aqe lghiit _ , _ tawaten _ .
Q in ung itut _ .
entaqun _ itagnaghi nghata _ , _ aghi ste luki nguq _ en ragh ngam _ paaggun _ neng qelluki _ .
Ig lag tengngwaagh aq aan nguq _ , _ nenglute aq _ .
taawa _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ .
P eq ligh sigh at _ .
tagtale mii _ agh i sigh luk ii _ tawaten _ nekegte aqe luki _ .
entaqun _ piyuke lleg teng _ kaate nghata _ en ragh ngam _ qilag aqe luki _ negaghpag ngllagh aqe luki _ .
suqagh meng _ pugughyaagh ke na iqe ait _ yeqay _ .

angli naqe llegh ka _ pugughilegh mi
Aghnagh aghn iim _ apegh llegh a
akuzi naqe lghii _ aghnaghaghni ii unga _ ungipamsug naqe lghiinga _ pugughilegh mi _ angli lleg mneng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ allgegh ma lghii _ 19 2 8 -mi _ .
angayuqagh kek _ Aglugh aankuk _ nategh mii nkuk _ .
Aglugh aq _ taana _ Ag aankuk _ Iteghyagh aankuk _ ighneghagh k _ , _ nuyek lighpig aam _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ nategh mii m _ angayuqagh kek _ Tutm atel g enkuk _ Pin ir kag enkuk _ .
taawa _ allgegh yalghiinga _ nalluke aqa _ talwa _ aakagh ka _ ugw iigh umalghii _ sivungagh mii neng _ qiwaaghmii neng _ .
aakagh gka _ maalghug _ .
K uug gh egka _ maalghug _ nuyekligh ak _ whanga mneng _ .
nuyeklighpigagh _ aakagh ka _ Naang iigh aq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ K ar gi _ .
naghuyagh nkuk _ , _ Tapgh al ugw enkuk _ yugte aqe lukek _ .
whanga _ Aghnagh aghn iq _ , _ uyughagh gka _ maalghug _ taake uk _ N aagh ul uun kuk _ P it iin kuk _ .
iitek _ angu aqa _ apa ka _ taana _ Ag aq _ .
Wh ateng waaq _ liigikngwaagh penaan _ .
iitek _ naghaagh te negh mta _ nagh agh utk aghqameng _ sa meng _ tagite aqe kanginkut _ , _ ak mal iigh aghmeng _ , _ qateghyiighagh meng _ sa meng _ naghaaghute kaghqagh meng _ .
Wh ateng waaq _ liigike gpenaan _ , _ Ag aaftuq _ taawa _ siivanllegh ut _ .
taake uk _ asag gka _ Ag aam _ panig kek _ Atgh aang ankuk _ U kum ankuk _ .
Qaygegh taan kuk _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ ighnegh kek _ , _ Aglugh aq _ nuyek lighpig aam _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ .
kinku u ta i _ taag egkut _ nalluke anka _ .
taana _ asag ka _ atghagh u nga _ ugw ilgu ftuq _ taawa _ Agh tuq aa yag meng _ .
enmis _ mangtegh iluteng _ maalghug yaag egneng _ .
aag llegh a _ mangteghapig _ tanpegh meng _ amu iqe lghii _ , _ aag llegh a _ guygu _ .
kiig nghaani _ nuugte aqe luteng _ .
taawa _ mangteghapig ghllag llu _ whanga qun _ angu aqa _ tawani _ n ayuq egkayug wat _ .
Kiig unnegh is teng _ legan _ tanpeghh a _ iike luku _ qaame na nga _ ukmangigh waagh luku _ kiigtagh ke ut _ guygu mi _ .
iwernga _ paninang _ ayagyu t llu _ atuqe u luki _ paninang _ taawa _ esghagh anka _ nanigh t _ .
angli naqe llegh ka _ elngaatall _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ , _ qawavek llu _ iqall in iigh y aanun _ pi aqe luta _ , _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ aate te kaghqagh _ .
qawaag m _ amiiragh a _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ qawavek _ enraq _ iqall ugw anun _ pikayug u ut _ .
iqallug igh ghllag luteng _ tesqawani _ elngaatall _ .
alla _ pamavek _ nuna mun _ enraq _ kiiwhtagh anun _ enraq _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
qanii luteng qun _ kangii nun _ alla _ uteghte pagte luteng _ wetku _ tawaten _ uteghnigh naqe aqe ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
liite lleg mni _ elngaatall _ neqetu pigte uq _ .
Upengh aan negh is teng _ kiyang _ llangaqa _ n az igh aankuk _ teghig lugw enkut _ .
teghiglug _ kuuvragh luku _ , _ tasigu luku _ enkaam _ pi aqe kangat _ .
S uf lugw aq _ llangaqa _ atuqepag igate kangat _ .
kuuvragh _ neghusigh ke pigte aat _ elngaatall _ teghiglug meng _ .
whanga _ qepghagh yagute magh ma _ kiyang _ n ayug w aqegkeput _ tapghaghqagh t _ , _ uyiighqagh t _ , _ angalqataasighqagh t _ .

Ag aam _ nayag ke a _ .
El qwaagh qun kut _ taakut _ kaate aqe ut _ uksugh mi llu _ qimugsigh meng _ , _ kiig mi llu _ angyagh meng _ .
tamaa na _ amiiragh _ nazighagh _ aate te kaghqagh u luku _ , _ teme kaghqagh _ inglukagh ghqu tete luku _ kinku nun _ tuune aqe kangi _ .
taana llu _ tengghu nagh pigte aqe lghii _ angyaghpag _ ategh a _ T ra d er _ kaate nghaani _ .
amiiragh _ , _ tapghagh _ , _ sa u a llu _ iv or y _ , _ aate tke aq llu _ , _ kameg llu _ .
T ra d e- aaq egkangat _ uksugh mun _ naamakaghqagh _ sa u a _ qayuq _ kagimkagh _ .
T o as t _ b re ad - eghllag uf tuq un _ tamaani _ liite lleg mni _ .
taakut _ enkaam _ atalgute nka _ Qaygegh taam _ avaquti a llu _ , _ W es qeg et enkut _ , _ ayuqligh nkut _ , _ T akeq s iig enkut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ taana _ nulightugh luni _ K uk iy ang ameng _ .
ayapghute nkut _ , _ Anag ut aankut _ , _ Ag aankut _ , _ asag u ma ainkut _ avaquti a _ .
Taam _ enraq _ kingu aneng _ igaghyagh mun _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwagh qaghaqe luta _ .
whangkuta llu qun _ angyagh n aghh neghani _ aghvegh niigh mun _ piiwagh qaghaqe ukut _ on e _ m on th -ng iighhaq _ .
enkaam _ tawani _ piiw aq all em m ni _ taan ang iighhaq _ igaghy aatk aqaghput _ , _ whanga llu _ N aagh ul uqlu _ .
Taam _ tagtale ngiighhagh a _ on e _ month _ igaghy aatk aqaghput _ .
whanga _ igaghyagh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ sivungagh mun _ .
sivu nge aghte ukut _ nani _ , _ qafsina _ year s- ngugh teghllag um aghma _ .
nategh mii m _ kuug gha _ tes kiw an lenguq _ , _ angag ka _ Anaghay aaq _ .
enkaam _ amalleqa _ qawavek _ tevnegh meggni _ , _ tesqawani _ qem gugh utaq ukut _ .
apangiighhagh ka _ taana _ naa ma _ ata a _ Tutm atelek _ , _ U ma _ .
tea- ma ghhagh gkenka _ naqamalla _ ategh gni _ atuqe kek _ .
sivuligh _ nuliigh pig aa _ Pin ir kag uftuq _ naa ma _ qantaghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ allameng _ aviighute yan _ nulightugh luni _ puughhute meng _ nalluke aqa _ .
wetku _ ivagh i ma meng _ nulightugh magh an _ taana _ liisimake aqa _ .
taana llu _ allughqagh at _ siftugh te _ .
Es nighqw aqlu _ kiyang _ tesqawani _ qem gugh utaq elghii ni _ taghnughhagh u luta _ salin _ mekestaaghhaatu tete luta _ .
tesqawavek _ pite kayugu ut _ , _ taakut llu _ N ung ugw enkut _ , _ A pe tek in kutlu _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ , _ W al ang an kutlu _ taakut _ .
siknegh mun _ pi yamta _ tamaakut _ esghagh tegh anka _ .
Naqam enraq _ nengyugh ka _ taana _ itegh yagh aq _ liisimakngwaagh aqa _ .
kiyang _ Iteghyagh aghmeng _ liite aqa _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ kag par egh alleq _ .
kagpag llegh a _ neqe m _ liite aqa _ Iteghyagh aghmeng _ akuute llegh i _ sa u aat _ liite qugh anka _ .
qaywa _ wh ategh ll ugw aaq _ apeghtugh aqe yanga _ tawani _ liite gpenaki _ , _ ki nguv aqun _ liigikngwaagh anka _ .
piinlillegh aneng _ iwernga _ apeghtugh llegh an _ liite luki _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate aat _ .
talwa _ ngelq aam _ qilu ngiighhagh i _ si pegh qugh waaghluki _ agaghte aqe luki _ .
M et gh aam _ , _ ngelq aam _ itegagh a _ nuv ugh tegh luku _ kinegh ngllagh aqe luku _ .
angiite tke aq _ entaqun _ igataghnagh iqe llegh mun _ .
agnepa llu _ entaqun _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate kangat _ .
atugh yaghqagh perewaagh _ sangiighhagh _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ .
nunivagseghagh ghhagh mun _ talwa _ tamaavek _ kag par egh allghit _ ellnga neng _ lii qugh tegh anka _ .
nunivag _ , _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ akugh anun _ kenlanga _ .
akugh _ uglagh u pigte uq _ taawa _ neghe kayug ut _ elngaatall _ .
alqegkagh t llu _ , _ pugh p uuq etlu _ qallate luki _ kagpag kayugu ait _ , _ qall at ngwaagh luki _ uksugh mi _ neqekaghqagh u luki _ .
ila i llu _ akugh ghhagh m _ tamaakut _ suqlag t _ , _ suqlamengestagh t _ akughllug ke i _ ama _ pi kay ugw it _ neqnigh ghllaget _ , _ peknegh t _ .
sa u a _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh _ elngaatall _ liilightugh te aqe kangat _ .

enkaam _ amalleqa _ tamaa na _ inghu yaghqaghte a _ aqavzig _ , _ pagunghagh _ , _ kaavlag _ .
Taaku nguftut _ inghu luteng _ enraq _ pi kay ugwet _ .
elngaatall _ aqavzig ghllag u uq _ , _ pagunghagh ghllag u uq _ .
nunivag _ taana _ kiyang _ Sing ig p ameng _ aagken _ pennagh neng _ atate zikun _ tag itegh llak ayug wat _ qiipaghagh t _ imigh ghllag luki _ .
laluramke t llu _ esghagh qaghte yug ni tke anka _ laalighte aat _ nalighmeng _ taakut llu _ kiyaghtekau aat _ tesamani _ .
nurse- a llu _ gallegher- meng _ ategh ke lghii _ kaate aghte uq _ .
asag ka _ taana _ up-uma _ emta _ qinuyug ghllagu laatagh uq _ tamaani _ .
liite lleg mni llu _ tawani _ legan _ B i b le- eneng _ atightugh kayug ni _ , _ ilagagh kayug ni _ , _ yughagh te kayug ni _ .
Sun d ay - nkuk _ W ed n es d ay - nkuk _ legan _ taake uk llu _ aflengake lukek _ ayuqe agput _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ atalgute nka _ qem qagh waagh aqegk enka _ tagis qelluki _ ellngit llu _ ilagagh aqe luta _ qerngagh emta _ yughagh aqe luta _ .
B i b le- eghllag et qun _ taawa _ igaqegkaghtuqagh t _ yuvghiigh na ghllaget _ whangkun n l _ tawan teftut _ , _ naken _ imani _ pi kaqe atki _ umu ghllaget _ .
umuqagh meng _ qaspeghagh ke lghiit _ .
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ whanga _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghii _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ qaygeghte aq _ nalighmeng _ Aglugh aq _ kaate nghmini _ usi igh ghllag luni _ mission _ b o x - ngun iiq egkangit _ R e d _ C r os s -en engllu _ .
Whang kun ni _ taghnughhagh ni _ elngaatall _ qiliigh nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghiit _ , _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh at _ , _ quyanagh lleghpigagh at _ .
qaywa _ paper _ s ac k -et _ talwa _ esleq ell ngun ateng _ imaleg u yagh ghngaita _ nuts- meng _ , _ c and y-meng _ , _ p o p _ c or n -meng _ whangkunni _ elngaatall _ quyanagh ghllag t _ .
uksugh mi _ enkaam _ sa yaghqagh ite aqe lghii ni _ , _ entaqun _ sa meng _ i whan illegh qam m neng _ quunpeng _ naghaagh ste aqe kanginkut llu _ sa meng _ .
kiyang _ llangaqa _ e x er cise- estaq egk anginkut _ ilu anite ghngaamta _ , _ uul taat ameng _ sa meng _ peghlaaghwagh meng _ , _ es tugh pag tameng _ .
tawaten _ ilu ani _ qaw aw aanghi n nemta _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ uyghagagh u te aqe lghiikut llu _ .
whanga _ angli lleg mni _ igaghyaghqagh llu _ aklunagh pigte aqe lghii _ .
M ag az in e-em _ ig iit allgh aakun _ ter ugw itegh llag aqelghii kut _ .
taana _ enkaam _ quunpeng _ whanga _ f av o ri te - kelluku _ qimugsigh _ usi leg ghllag _ mission _ b o x -meng _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ tagi lghii _ ter ugw iy uk elleghpig aqegkegka _ .
tawani qun _ sivuligh pig aghmi _ igaghyagh lleg mni _ sivungagh mun _ ar t is t- ngun iiq aatnga _ qayughllak _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ ter ugw igh llagem _ .
sa u aat _ legan _ ter ugw in em ki _ elqughaghte aqe luki _ .
kiig mi _ amalleqa _ neqamike aqa _ teghigniqe llegh ka _ .
iighaate aqe lghiikut _ , _ veg a llu _ r iig ll ugw allu _ taake ghllaget _ tamaavek _ iighaate aqe lghiikut _ .
sa meng llu _ ategh i _ esgha _ puygu kenka _ , _ naghpigh aqe luki _ aglu t _ ila mta _ inglu ke te luta _ ataasigh _ qam ugh tek luku _ aglu gneng _ naghpigh naqute aqe ke put _ .
qenwat _ naghpigh lleg t _ uglaghi ghllag aqe lghiit _ naghpigh iqe ait _ neghqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ qamugh it _ .
qetgagh te aqe luta llu _ , _ sa u aat _ tamaakut _ naghaagh lleg put _ teghig nagh tun _ avighaate aqe ut _ .
A tuq es ugw aqanka _ whanga _ maaten _ eltughagh mnun _ .
tamaakut llu _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ ivagh in iigh tet _ , _ quyngighqwaagh t _ .
quyngigh ghllag u yagh u uq _ liite lleg mni _ tamaani _ , _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag _ enraq _ kaynge m llu _ entaqun _ malighqagh nghminiki _ pangaleg u ghllag aqe lghii _ quyngigh _ saam llu _ vegtaagh m _ pang alg ughq eghllag aqegkanga _ .
aagken _ imagh a _ P eng ut neng _ aliigh luni _ pamagun _ Kang igh aag nekun _ kiwavek _ aga _ teve ghllag aqe lghii _ .
allameng _ sivuqagh meng _ uteghnigh yalghiikut _ uvite mi _ nughagh ghhagh t _ legan _ tuquma aqe lghiit _ .
tamaani _ entaqun _ nula ghllag llegh ani _ quyngigh m _ .
ata ma _ Aglugh aam _ ungipamsug ke nghminiki _ qawani _ quyngigh igh na i aaghet _ Pang aw y inkut _ kinku t _ kiyalighagh mi _ nani _ tesqawani _ .
Quy ngin nguq _ legan _ qaghlu luki _ qam is lu ug llaget _ uqf il qaagh meng _ tes qaw an leng ugh meng _ avayagh aneng _ kepugh ghllag luteng _ usi igh nghmegteki _ quyngigh t _ qam ugh tek luki _ qikmigh stun _ .
taawa _ ellnga llu _ igagh lgu uq _ b uc k _ d e er -meng _ quyngigh lgu kau ni yagh uq _ ellmi llu _ .
enraq _ taam _ kingu aneng _ aviite luta _ salin _ pennaghqute te luni _ sa u a _ maana _ c ar e- en anigh luku _ .
tamaani _ enkaam _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ quyngigh y at _ kaate aqe lghiit _ i whan inkut _ R aa quun kut _ , _ kin ku ngwaaq at _ ila i _ uglagh _ katelghaate aqe lghii _ .
kiig mi _ enkaam _ anglu ighpag magh ma _ piyug meng llu _ U yat iq aankut _ maakut _ kaate aqe ut _ quyngigh meng _ ivagh iy at _ .
enkaam _ entaqun _ Agh tuq aa yag enkut _ , _ Qaygegh t aankut _ igaghy iisqelluki _ entaqun _ taghnughhagh teng _ sivuligh pig aagut _ sivuqagh mun _ nuugh qw aatkat _ liisimake lleg mni _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ siingenllu _ up-uma _ kiiste i vig meng _ ugw iigh tuq _ .
enkaam _ kayute igh te naqe ni luni llu _ Aglugh aq _ pi aqe lghii _ , _ sivuqagh mun _ ellnga llu _ piig wagh tukut _ iw em ga _ taam _ kingu aneng _ , _ Aglugh aq _ aviighute magh an llu _ paninang _ P it iim _ nayugh ke yagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
nulightugh luni _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh uq _ tesamani _ elngaatall _ .
pi ta igh u uq _ whanga _ ugw iigh um aghma _ kingu mneng _ taagken _ pi te i uq _ kingulighpigagh u uq _ sivuqagh mun _ lli aqe aq _ .
tawani llu _ pi te i uq _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ taaku nguut _ N ung ugw enkut _ , _ qagugh mii _ kelgute luni _ mangteghagh ghhagh a _ atugh naqe ni luku _ aghvegh niigh mun _ .
Aghvegh llag waaq elghii _ taakw nang iighhaq _ qantagh aq _ taawa _ taagken _ piinligh kau uq _ maaten _ neli kangat _ itagnatun _ aghvegh niigh mun _ .
ipa _ whangkuta _ kingulighpigagh u ukut _ .
taana _ apa ka _ Ag aq _ kiyaghte luki _ iitek _ entaqun _ siivanllegh pig aqaat _ tesamani _ .
iitek _ Tutm atel g en kutlu _ kaate aghte aqe ut _ .
kiyang _ qawani _ iqalliniighvig mi _ qerngughte te aqe lghiikut _ taakut llu _ El qwaagh qun kut _ qantaghan teng nguut _ kaate neghtuqagh t _ tesamavek _ .
kiyang _ kiig gun _ tevnga kun _ A pe tek in kutlu _ taakut _ waamte uute te nkut _ tev egkayug wet _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ wetku _ esghagh aqe kegka _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ .
pugughilegh
U kum am _ apegh llegh a
iighwite luta _ K ar gi _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ entaqun _ talwa _ taghnughhagh pagite ukut _ Ag aan kuni _ .
piqalag _ taake uk _ nunaagh gket _ , _ ne gket _ mangteghagh leg k _ .
ighulugh leg k _ ika _ akmagutagh leg k _ .
iwernga _ mayugh aatagh lleg mni _ imani _ nuna ughtekagh _ .
Ing an taq elghii n nguq _ pennaghte negh meggni _ , _ sivuke luteng _ kuyag nge ma gni _ .
kuyag nge ma gni _ tawani _ kiyaghte luteng _ atghagh aqe lghiit _ agavek _ piqalag nun _ .
taakwagun _ sugugte luteng _ , _ yugw ita _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ .
aghni ut _ pamagun _ mayugh tu utaq elghii n nguq _ .
Iteghyagh aankut _ , _ W al ku tan kut _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ W al kut am _ kayaalq ek atagh aqegkanga _ itegh yagh aq _ .
tawaten _ emta _ quut quut aqegk angi nguq _ qikmigh t _ , _ Aglugh aam _ .
amenqun _ P iq al am _ paagna a _ uusqagh ghllag _ tespagani _ .
Tawaten nguq _ iiwenllu nguq _ ivgagh naqe aqe ut _ uugte na luteng _ Iteghyagh aankut _ aragh tun nguq _ , _ â _ Aglugh aq _ ullegh uq _ , _ pennaghqute te uq _ ! _ â _ test- pig ke na _ anigu leg _ .
legan _ taagken _ sa u luki _ usi teng _ qetgegh te aat _ .
ellnga n llu nguq _ iitek _ esghagh aa _ uka _ .
qikmigh a _ talwa _ naa ke i _ .
P al aghhagh me nguq _ aliigh qaghaqe uq _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ K ar gi _ ataata a _ , _ Ag aam _ anengagh a _ , _ sa mi nguq _ sugugte lit _ aga _ nalug tke aq _ .
aga _ taakwagun _ whaa _ siingenllu _ itegh qaghte lghii _ anigu mun _ tespikavek _ .
I werng aq unnguq _ sa luku _ pi litgu _ .
aliigh te nghminigu nguq _ pika _ yug u yug lluni _ .
qughagh nghaani nguq _ ima _ talughte te aqe a _ .
ullegh na nigh an _ tawaten _ ukig te ma kangat _ .
aaw yagh ghllag _ , _ naasqugh ghllag a _ uuk nagh llaga _ k iil uug tegh llakaq _ .
navek _ pi kau aat _ tawavek llu _ uugta t _ alaghrang _ piqalag nun _ .
taawa _ taana _ pennaghqute te llegh an _ angegh llegh ke a _ .
qikmigh a _ talwa _ avii tke aat _ naa ke i _ .
taana _ yugusigh ghhagh a _ tugu qaghtekagh at _ .
alignagh yagute aqe kanga _ ilagagh igate ngughk _ naqam _ sa igate ngughk _ , _ K ar gi _ , _ anengagh ni _ Ag aam _ .
Es ghh agh u nguq _ yug u pagning ilnguq _ unguva stekagh a _ Aglugh aq _ qangigagh ni _ .
kinku u lghii ni _ tuqu yaghqagh _ .
Naas q wa _ kagimekagh _ .
taakwani _ kingu ani _ whangkuta _ , _ Naang iigh aqlu _ allgegh magh an _ , _ ifkagh nqigte laataghkagh _ .
ifkagh gpenani _ kaave i ke ghllag ke aq _ .
talligh kek _ sa ghllag ke ak _ .
Napaqaghh aan kunguut _ , _ Aglugh aankut _ , _ whangkuta _ M il gh ul agni _ Naang iigh aq _ , _ nategh mii _ , _ whanga _ .
utaqa i ni _ pennaghtagh neng _ .
Ng elq aagh aghy at _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ Aglugh aankut _ , _ Qaygegh t aankut _ .
kingu itneng _ whangkuta _ , _ Naang iigh aqlu _ amsakelghii _ tamaani _ , _ ang taa l gut ku tev z ig ni _ .
neqe meng _ gaagh luta _ , _ apeghiigh luni _ nategh mii _ utaqa i ukut _ manughagh mi _ qakmani _ .
nutem _ paga _ , _ aliigh yalghiimeng _ aga _ qagughrug mi _ tan-kaghyage m _ qula ani _ , _ imani llu _ sukaghllag t _ .
mate- te ghhagh inagh _ aga _ aliighagh ut _ whaa _ ukig ut _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ imani _ seghleghu ut _ .
iwerngaqun _ gginagh ghhagh _ una _ sallghite uq _ .
kaate luni _ manughagh mun _ tafsi igh yalghiimi _ aaw yagh p aghq u _ ifkagh qu uute uq _ .
ilapga qu te aqe uq _ , _ naasqugh ghllag a _ .
aaw ightugh luku _ , _ qantaghqagh leg nun _ aqfaqugh naqe uk _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ , _ Qaygegh taan kuk _ .
manughagh mi _ qakmani _ .
whangkuta _ sa aqe ukut _ ilu ani _ .
Q iin ghagh salghiimi _ imani _ sungghanagh uq _ â _ aglagh uute naqe ukut _ ! _ â _ ima _ aga _ siv ugw aghtuq _ .
pi naqe i nagh ma luta _ aga llu _ Aku l pegh amun _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
M aligh qaq efut _ Naang iigh aq _ , _ whanga _ , _ nategh mii _ .
ima _ aga _ nuugh tugh aq er taghput _ .
enankin _ nategh mii m _ aga _ k at qagh taa _ , _ ugw ini _ Aglugh aq _ , _ arekull _ sa ghllag _ nalpagh ghllag _ kenlanga ii te ghllag _ .
N uq negh tegh aataq anga _ kaateqaghtagh ung _ .
Naang iigh aqlu _ aghnagh aghh aluku _ .
N uq neq luku _ kenigh akun _ tukegh lleghtagh ghllag ni _ , _ legan _ ava igh lleg ke ainkut _ .
pugughilegh mun _ amavek _ aglagh te ainkut _ .
T um ang illgh anun _ atghagh te luta _ tume nun _ pi aqe luta _ .
ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe luta _ , _ uyghagkagh ightu aghagh a sa _ .
amalka _ qikmigh kun _ tugu laghate luta _ .
aawallu _ Sil qin ang agnun _ kaate aghte ukut _ .
iiwenllu _ samaken _ ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe ukut _ tume nun _ agavek _ ika _ nategh mii _ araghaatagh ghllag _ wasi _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ , _ ing ar ug pak _ , _ paghyugh lghiikut _ whangkuta _ .
enankin _ kaat qagh saq min inkut _ yuwh aak _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ .
aga _ ima _ , _ whangkuta _ peghte uute luta _ .
amalka _ qikmigh _ neng yagh a _ , _ igleghte naqe a _ , _ Aglugh aq _ .
sa mi _ kaate lta _ whangkuta _ , _ neghigh pigte luku _ kaat ute ma kagh nge aat _ .
taawa _ ingaghmete uq _ , _ ingaghte ma kangat _ nek g umalghii _ Agh tuq aa yag em _ inag mig ke a _ .
aqfaqugh ma kanga _ Iteghyagh aam _ Agh tuq aay ak _ .
tamaa na _ qanegh mineng _ aaw a _ paam sug tegh aqeftaa _ talligh m _ uum _ kiitigh llegh a _ , _ atkug wa _ piig aqe luni _ .
nuqete naagh nghite ngugh t _ qaligh ghhaat _ qiipaghagh t _ , _ atkug wet _ amighqwaagh t _ .
Naas q wa _ qukfighte aqe luku _ , _ ag av es aas luku _ aqume ste luku _ legan _ qanegh mineng _ nusug luki _ uyghag t _ lli aqe ai _ , _ kii _ uyghag ghllag u uq _ amighregagh m _ kiigh a _ .
whaa nguq _ naasqugh _ una _ ukifkagh kaayagh kuni _ unguva nagh u yagh nghite uq _ .
qanegh mineng _ ulu mineng _ , _ nus ugw aqii _ uyghag t _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ .
I w emg aqun _ ef lugh waagh aqluki _ uyghag igh tegh waagh aa _ .
Nek eg r aam siigh luni _ taagken _ igleghte yaaghte yalghiimi _ piniighte yalghiimi _ ellngin aghh aa yaghqaag penani _ , _ quunpeng _ al eligh y unegh tugh qw aaluni _ .
sa uq _ kak av legh waagh aqluni _ , _ alingruugh ghllag aqe luni _ , _ nek g aqluni _ .
taawa _ ugpegh llegh gni _ aghula igh te lukek _ .
Whang ku ngin aamta _ alignalghii mun _ pi naqe ghllag _ .
qenwat qun _ A aw y aankuk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ tagi tke agput _ , _ aqfa kek _ kitum _ , _ atgh ak _ maavek _ .
naqamllu _ sa nghite ak _ , _ temngi _ sa naanghite ni luku _ naten _ yuwh aam _ .
Nul iiq ru whaa _ taana _ leganqun _ tengghu nagh _ aghnagh ghhagh _ .
nalla ghhagh _ pi uq _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ , _ elpesi ni llu _ quy ang apig singa _ ? _ â _ agnepa _ tawatete igate yagh unga _ tugun ghii nem ki _ iilqe ghllag aqe unga _ sa yaghqagh nun _ . _ â _ legan _ aghnagh ghhagh _ qalepangi ghllag _ ilag av aghq ughllak _ .
N u ter n _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ tuqu naanghite uq _ alingutke gpenaan _ .
Um yugw agka _ qama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ . _ â
taagken _ yugwem _ kel qut aaq saq min inga _ Aglugh aam _ , _ navek _ pi nghmini _ .
piniighte a _ mulunghituq _ , _ maavek llu _ tagi aqe luni _ .
taawa _ tagtale ke a _ .
angli naqngu lunga
W es qeg ete m _ apegh llegh a
kiig mi _ tesamani _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ .
kii _ , _ ne mete igate ukut _ .
pennagh ni _ kiyaghte luta _ aga _ nasiqe negh meggni _ qawavek _ naayvagh mun _ .
M il gh ul ag nillu _ , _ kuyag nge ma gni _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ .
alpa _ sa u a _ ngelq aaghaq _ pi iqagh ut _ kiilqusigh _ .
iqallug _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute luku _ , _ tagi aghte luta _ esnagh mi _ ten tal uta _ kiyaghte aghte luta _ apeghii negh megg teggu _ kagpag tegh luta _ itghagh aqe luta _ aghvighteg nun _ .
F o ur te en _ year s- ngugh sim aghma _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh ukut _ .
aglagh aqe luta _ , _ piiwagh qagh luta _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aglagh qaghaqe luta _ tagi aqe luta _ .
tagi luta _ qenwat _ ll ii piig tukut _ ayuqligh _ igaghyagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tuungligh ka _ .
P iig w ap iig tukut _ f o ur te en _ year s- ngugh sim aghma _ .
sivuqaghte negh mta _ I ir gun kun it aqukut _ , _ ila nga nigh kun _ uum _ aasa m _ angayuqagh itni _ Aghnagh lluwh aankut _ .
angyaghpag t _ pugughilegh mete luta _ kaate aqe lghiit _ T ra d er _ , _ angyaleg at _ kina _ M r . _ R anka _ , _ ila nga nigh kun _ Castell _ .
C as tell -kun _ at asi meng _ sivuqagh meng _ pugughilegh mun _ aglagh ukut _ .
I ir gun kutgun _ piiwagh luta _ aglagh te ainkut _ taaggun _ .
Taaku ngin aagut _ angyaghpag t _ .
igaghyagh llghite unga _ .
sivuqagh mi _ on e- ye ar _ igaghyagh qagh lunga _ taaqe kau unga _ .
naghaaghute lgu ukut _ sa meng _ ulimaagh meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ nagh agh u teng llaq at _ , _ qamiye u aq _ , _ angyaghwaagh _ , _ sa u a _ .
uqfigagh t qun _ amen _ tangigh llegh ghqu aaghet _ pi c ku p _ s ti c k s- kell uki _ tamaaken _ naghaagh te kaqsagh ukut _ , _ iighhagh u te meng _ , _ qawawaagh meng _ .
Meteghllug waaghet _ sa u aat _ unagh sii w aq lluteng _ .
mangteghagh t _ Agh tuq aa yag enkut _ , _ Aglugh aq _ , _ whangkuta _ .
guygu mun _ whangkuta _ lliigh ukut _ liit ngwaagh um aghma _ neqamike aqa _ .
entaqun _ taakut _ qemtagh ghllag mi _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke te lghiit _ tawani _ whangkuta _ guygu mun _ lliigh ukut _ .
angyat nge llegh _ nalluke aqa _ , _ liisagh lghiinga _ taawa _ angyaghwaagh lgu ukut _ .
entaqun _ Pedersen -meng _ pik niiq aat _ .
nekreg te nkut llu _ tesam an tagh taqluteng _ entaqun _ anglegute mini _ tawani _ Agh tuq aa yag mi _ esghagh aatagh aqe anka _ kaate aghte nghata _ ilangani _ .
Ungip am s ugwet _ tamaakut _ ila i _ enraq _ aling yugwem _ , _ kiyang _ ighivg aghmi _ ungipamsug te lghii neng _ .
Ip angugh tesug nighqw aan ghata _ aling yag un nem ki _ ila i _ , _ naa ke i _ qav aghnaq rag kiigh em _ .
qevuute lunga _ qemall _ ilangani _ qivgh uk aq lluki _ .
sangan lli _ nagat ngwaagh nanigh singa _ .
puygu ma anka _ ungipam s ugwet _ sa u aat _ nagate ghllag luki _ .
qemall _ whaa _ neqangugh lleqe anka _ .
amalka _ esgha _ legan _ liite lleg mni _ e x er cise- es teghllag um aaq inkut _ estughte pagte aq _ sa u a _ , _ qet gaq _ e x er cise- e sim aaq egk anginkut _ esgha _ naghaagh ste nghmegtekut _ , _ pinigh y uug testaq iinkut _ .
aanqaghte luta _ alla _ mangteghagh t _ uzifqaghte luki _ wiin _ neghe ste gpenaamta _ .
Igh s aan ing i tesqelluta _ entaqun _ pinigh y uug tesqelluta _ malighqutagh ke u yalghiikut _ legan _ .
kii _ , _ naghaaghute _ allaagh iinaq _ sa u a _ nagh aal qu siigh utk aqsaq efut _ .
pugughilegh m _ P anegh aate llgha
U kum am _ apegh llegh a
Anag ut aam _ taana _ ungipamsug ke kanga _ panegh aat eghllak _ .
talwa _ ellnga _ nukalpigagh u luku _ , _ ungipamsug ke yaghqagh a nguq _ talwa _ urang _ seghleghu uq _ .
Qamagtengngwaagh luni _ pugughilegh _ yugw iq aa _ , _ ig atam _ saam _ qinu yugwem _ .
mesiighllug kun _ anigu t _ nepte luki _ negh aqe luki _ .
nanigh m _ peqagh i _ , _ uqu ll ugw i _ , _ ellngagh ta i _ qaamkut _ negh aqe luki _ .
avaqutagh teng _ paneghte yu i ma kangit _ .
taagavek _ aane te luki _ kiiw m _ inglu anun _ lli aqe luki _ , _ kayaal im _ ukavek _ lliigh ut _ .
taagani _ kayaali llegh mi _ , _ legan _ amig meng _ aane ste luki _ ifkaghte aqe kangit _ , _ manughagh mun _ tawavek _ .
qenwat _ aane te nanigh ma kangit _ .
taana ta _ P it iim _ iiggekagh a _ asim m nilnguq _ saamna _ yug meng _ imaqe ghllag uq _ .
Aghul iigh tu utegh lag luteng _ .
katamqun _ anagte u ma lghiit _ Iteghyagh aankut _ , _ Ag aankut _ , _ Anag ut aankut _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ uyugh aqut alghiit _ .
pamavek nguq _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ taslugh kete te luteng _ .
sa meng _ neqe meng _ ivagh im sug yagh aqelghiit _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ Iteghyagh aankut _ .
tamaani nguq _ tuqu quqagh _ , _ llivegh _ .
Kang k iil ghem _ pegh y alq aani _ taakwani _ .
entaqun _ iglegh taa yagh luteng _ panegh pigesnaghkagh t _ , _ negh ke igh llegh m _ .
Siq lugw am _ , _ iigge llegh i _ afsengagh m _ sa i _ negh ugh aqluki _ , _ mesiighllug vyiigh ghhagh i _ negh ugh aqluki _ .
megh kun _ pugughilegh _ neqe igh ghllag kaqe na iqe kanga _ Anag ut aam _ .
Legannguq _ tuugtagh t _ aane te luki _ kaate nghata _ maaken _ , _ aavg unegh megg teki _ quk ikun _ aafkagh inagh aqe luki _ .
A qim l ennguq _ tuugtagh m _ aveg llegh m _ katamngwaagh _ .
P anegh aa tellgh ani _ tamaani _ .
neqetu yagh lghii _ pugughilegh _ .
sivuqagh _ igataghnagh _ .
iwernga _ megh kun _ pugughilegh m _ negh ka aneng _ anagkagh t _ entaqun _ .
Tes am an tekaa y alghiikut _ siipnegh ghhagh ni _ angayuqagh gka llu _ , _ angleg ukagh aan k allu _ , _ taaw ar aaghin aq _ nanevgaghtagh ut llu _ .
tazikani _ Anag ut aankut _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ Agh tuq aa yag enkut _ .
taawa _ pugughilegh m _ yug ke aa _ .

Anaghay aam _ itghagh tke ai _ .

taakut _ itghagh tke ai _ aki vig nkut _ , _ tagnegh linkut _ panig ni _ ila i _ .
Qaw ag em _ amighqwaagh i _ , _ atkug ngllaghkagh t
nanevgaghtagh mta _ ungipagh iqe te igate kanginkut _ .
Kuku leg m iin nguq _ pugughilegh mun _ piyug uute ghllag negh meggni _ upenghagh mi _ .
sagnegh _ pakegtekagh _ , _ akmag ke luku _ qayugh te aq _ .
sukilpagh mun _ , _ qawaag m _ amighqwaagh anun _ .
kiyang _ aate kau yaghpete ut _ ngelq aankut _ , _ sukilpagh nkut _ , _ alpa nkut _ , _ naghuyagh nkut _ , _ qaq sung iinkut _ .
esghaghteqagh nka _ angayuqagh ma _ naa ma _ ulima aqe kangi _ .
qaqsungigh at _ atkug u luteng _ entaqun _ alpa stun _ 3 5 - nguut _ .
naghuyagh t _ , _ ngelqagh stun _ 2 5 - nguut _ .
sukilpagh t _ 8 5 -ngu luteng _ atkug wet _ .
akmaliighagh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ 1 00 _ atkug u luteng _ naam ak ayug wet _ .
amighqwaagh t _ esghapag lleg mni _ sivuke luki _ ghhute kun _ ghhute ngllaghkagh kun _ tequgh kun _ , _ naagu _ s o ap - eng iighhaq _ aghvig nghminiki _ naa ma _ , _ talwa _ whanga _ , _ qategh rak g alek _ taaq nemteki _ .
I nin aq nemteki _ , _ tequgh ghhagh t _ te qugh paag tek aghhaat _ mesiigh meng _ kuuve luki _ qategh qwaa s luki _ .
angighhwaagh luki _ amighqwaagh t _ .
itghuugute neghsigh luki _ , _ ini luki _ .
Neng t aghh nemteki _ , _ aay qategh rak etun _ .
whanga _ qantaghaqun _ taaqe kanga _ tamaaken _ amighqwaagh meng _ qepghagh nghmeng _ .
ighleg yagute yatnga _ taaqe unga _ .
aki ngllagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ amighqwaagh meng _ tamaaken _ , _ ngelq aan kugneng _ , _ al pan kugneng _ , _ suk ilp aan ku neng _ .
Q ugw in ii _ sivuke luki _ keligagh aqe ke put _ .
G ev es tengngwaagh luki _ ngelqagh at _ , _ naghuyagh t _ .
qateg i _ ukut _ atugh aqe ut _ qamagte luteng _ .
qateg i _ allakagh meng _ atugh u ut _ , _ salleg i _ allakagh meng _ .
pinighhalek _ atkug wet _ maqagh ghhalek _ .
ghhuu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh t _ .
aghsughtagh ghhagh meng _ kiigh mig luki _ , _ ngelqagh at _ qaasligh ke luki _ .
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ ilep ghagh luteng _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ amigh t _ taakut _ , _ ilep gh aaghet _ kav ir rak g alek _ pinighhalek _ .
Tem kagh luki _ aat kay ugwet _ .
Iteghyagh aam _ ungipamsug te nghminikut _ sangita _ paam ku ghh mii ng ita _ nalighnegh ita _ upenghagh u uute nghatni nguq _ nugh aghmeng _ , _ neqe meng _ , _ amigh meng _ atghagh te ghllag aqe kanga _ , _ tagite aqe kangat _ .
sa eng _ nayag eng _ taana _ P anganga _ tagite aqe kangat _ , _ Pang angaaw en _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ amigh _ , _ neqe _ , _ quyngigh _ , _ tawaqapig _ .
talwa _ esghaghkagh nka _ tawaqapig i _ .
sungaghyug kegtagh ghllag t _ ququngagh ghllag t _ iknaqe ghllaget _ tawaqa t _ .
ila i _ sungaghyaag u aqe luteng _ .

pugughileghmii t
pugughilegh mi _ U kum am _ angayuqagh kek _ Ag aankuk _ Iteghyagh aankuk _ .
avaquti a _ anglegute nka _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ .
qule u yaghpete ukut _ pi nga yu t _ siipnegh ke luki _ , _ kin kugh y aw aat _ .

umeg ke i

angyagh t _ ayvegh m _ kangllukagh i

nanugh m _ Taghnughh iiq eng ellgha
nenglu it _ tamaakut _ ayumightagh ghllag t _ .
aviite luki _ talwa _ Iteghyagh aankut _ tugutu te mangite luki _ .

nenglu i _ estamat _ yugtu ghllaget _ .
aatghute ghllag negh meggni nguq _ taghnughh aper ugw aaq _ unite luku _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag negh meggni _ .
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ naghaagh te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ taghnughhagh it _ .
alla _ tawaten _ naghaagh uteghllag lu te nguq _ amaken _ Uy gun aneng _ nanugh ghllag m _ ivgagh ma aki _ qughsatku m _ .
qughsatku m _ uugte vike ma kangi _ .
nanugh ghllag m _ tuqu qugh ma a _ taghnughhagh _ tamaa na _ .
At asigh hiin aq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ anagkagh _ .
tuqu quqagh ni _ tamaa na _ negh uum aa _ ila i _ siipte aqe luki _ , _ naa squghhagh inagh i _ negh aqe luki _ , _ nak agh iin ii _ negh aqe luki _ .

ayapghute m _ apegh llegh a
whanga _ ayapghute u unga _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ panig a _ , _ K uk iy angam _ panig a _ .

tesamani _ liite unga _ .

Ag aq _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .

taawa _ ingaghte luni _ qinuyug u uq _ , _ ighu a _ uki nga lghii _ sa u aat qun _ maame igate ngugh t _ , _ agha lgu aqe yagh kata _ tamaani _ entaqun _ pinigh aqe nayagh lghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ manu ani _ tawani _ qavagh aqe lunga _ ellnga ni _ .

pi yalghiinga _ tuquma lghii _ .
Ag aq _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke aat _ , _ nulighh a _ itegh yagh aq _ .
liite lleg mni _ ne t _ malghugnegh t _ iwerngaqun _ atghagh u yankut _ taakut _ ping ayuq luki _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghtekayug ni _ uksughte aqe luta _ kiigtagh ke luta _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh aqe luki _ .
sivuqagh m _ nate tul nga _ whanga qun _ nalluke yagh aqa _ .
whanga qun _ 1 7 _ year s- ngugh sim aghma _ maavek _ lliigh kau unga _ .
S atugh qwaa k anginkut _ qinuy u tugh hnaq aatagh llaget _ enkaam _ maavek _ sivuqagh mun _ tawaten _ agha leg nun _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh lghiit _ kayaali naqe ghllag ughte lghiit _ .
sa meng _ agha ite ngugh u lghiit _ tesamani _ , _ maa ke ngin aghhaq _ agh ang egkayug wet _ .
maapi i aghagh u aatagh llegh ut _ liisimake aqa _ .
maapi luta _ aglagh aqe luta _ pi iigh aataghkagh ni _ .
K uz aat am _ aqfa aqe kanginkut _ angyagh tu mun _ , _ yugw is ag llag uluni _ .
enkaam _ maaken _ neqe ngllagh luteng _ aglagh te aqe luta _ .
maani _ mangteghagh ite yagh ukut _ .
tazikna _ kitum _ I vig ugwem _ pik sagh aa _ .
taakut _ liisimake anka _ M aay aankut _ wh ateng waaq _ , _ alike magh ita _ esghagh kaqe anka _ .
upenghagh mi _ neqe niigh aqe ut _ esavghagh luteng _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ ayveghagh qaghaqe ut _ maklagte aghte aqe ut _ tawaten _ yu pag ilnguut _ , _ qerngughte luteng _ , _ angyagh _ ataasigh _ .
J un e- ngugh h neghani _ elngaatall _ tawani _ un akugh aqut _ inwa _ ghhuugh ghhagh mun _ .
kuuvragh kun _ negaghpag kun _ maagun _ o aten _ iis tutk alghii kun _ .
tapghagh at _ , _ qasiqagh m _ amenqun _ tamaaken _ keleve te luteng _ inwa _ ghhuugh sugh n aghhaq _ .
ghhuugh teng _ it akum taagh llag it _ .

A qiy ag aqiinkut _ , _ es tug waam llu _ negh ka aneng _ aglagh te aghte aqe ainkut _ .
maaken llu _ quyngigh lgu luku _ piyug meng _ kaate aqe ut _ sivungagh meng llu _ maaken llu _ .
kaynge lgu luku _ , _ kaynge _ ama _ taana _ mekestaaghhaa luta _ esghagh kaqe a _ .
angli ghllag magh an _ ighleg yagute aqe kanginkut _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ iiskughte aqe kanginkut _ navek _ aghulaqe lleghqagh ut _ .

Aglugh aankut _ taakut _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ kingulighpigagh ughtekagh t _ .
taawa _ aglagh yug nanigh uq _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh u aghte uq _ iilqayug kanigh lghii _ yugw ii tem _ .
nenglutuqagh _ , _ iigge snanigh aqe kanginkut _ neghsagh meng _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh mta _ amenqun _ tepe a _ sa u a _ aliigh na yu kan _ ighlek el uug ut angat _ .
wetku _ qagi inagh ghhagh m _ aliighte nghagu _ naalkute aghte aqe ukut _ tug ut lu wh aghmeng _ , _ tuugkagh ghhagh meng _ .
tawatete ut _ iwerngaqun _ nengyugh mta _ ungipamsug wa _ Iteghyagh aam _ taana _ mangteghagh squghhagh _ , _ kuug gh an _ uuknaliqe aqngami _ nekeftekaqe a _ ch ur ch -e nguluku _ .
tagtalmi _ sa u aat _ angyaghpag t _ kaate luteng _ te ach er- k aghqaq _ tesam ag unnguq _ qaake ma kangat _ .
tesamani _ enkaam _ igaghyagh vleghagh kau ma lghiit _ esgha _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ Aglugh aankut _ taakut _ nekreg te nkut _ tesamavek _ pi luteng _ nagnegh luteng _ , _ W aal ankut _ , _ ayuqe inkut _ tesamani _ igaghyagh te ma lghiit _ , _ U niigh taq aankut _ .
taana llu _ liisimake kegka _ G e is t- ta _ .
taawa _ d y n am ite - tegh llaget _ , _ entaqun _ mining- u aqe ut _ .
tesamani _ uksugh ghqu ghllag ut _ , _ uksughte aatagh ut _ .
taana _ mangteghagh ghhagh _ guygu ngiighhagh _ qaake llegh a _ liisimake aqa _ .
Nan ek -e kun _ angyaghpag squghhagh kun _ angaghqugh kaqe aat _ .
kaviigh meng _ , _ ulimaagh meng _ qerngughte te luteng _ Qaygegh t aankut _ kakikagh meng llu _ ila luki _ tukfigh iqe aat _ .
tesamna _ maaten _ una _ aghqelli ma ut _ , _ uusqagh ghllag yagh uq _ .
anuqe m _ tagtalmi _ tuquuqagh i _ entaqun _ anate te m _ naranghigh luni _ aghqelli kaqe aat _ .
uusqagh ghllag yagh uq _ , _ anuq ek eg teghllag tuq _ tesamna _ .
anuqligh nghmini _ mangteghagh t _ qaprag taq egkangi _ , _ uusqagh te mineng _ .
taana _ mangteghapig _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh llu _ qu ugwet _ quupe aqe luki _ pinighsagh qaghkagh ut _ , _ ulimak aqaghput _ whangkuta _ .
nenglu u yagh uq _ sivuke luni _ .
nenglu mi _ tawani _ liite kau unga _ , _ nenglu m _ ilu ani _ .
enkaam _ unaghsigh meng _ pi iigh aatagh yan _ angaghqugh aqe luki _ , _ quupe aqe luki _ ulim al agh te qaghput _ .
tanpegh meng _ pii k naligh luku _ .
Ag aankut _ nenglu meng _ tawavek _ nuugtekagh t _ enkaam _ tawan lluni _ tuqu kau uq _ .
nulighh a _ taana _ aq sall ugwem _ iwerngaqun _ taawa _ un am taq epig es naq aqaa _ .
ayaa yaghtugh ngestagh aqe uq llu _ , _ whaten _ taghnughhagh estun _ lliigh kestagh aqe uq llu _ esghaghhu qun _ nagh aal g utken naq aqeg kefut _ .
nengyugh ghhagh inagh mta _ ungipamsug te aghte vyiigh qaghaqe ainkut _ .
Ag aam _ ata i _ taakut _ kin kung waat _ uvegh luteng _ tuqukagh t _ l v el ghani _ taakwani _ , _ qungughvig ni _ entaqun _ kangsumqaghte luteng _ tuqukagh t _ .
qerngagh emta _ Aghnagh aghn iq lu _ , _ ayuqligh llu _ angl ik a kut _ ro om -a _ entaqun _ mangteghagh _ una _ kag pell iigh aghluku _ aaf qeng er taa tukut _ .
Nul agh ilghii niq un _ kag pell iigh agh aqegkangi _ mangteghagh t _ f am il y- tugh lleghh iini _ .
tagtalmi _ nani _ tamaani _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ ang uugh em _ neqangisag luta _ lliigh ukut _ .
qayugh m _ aw ar king iighh ii _ uqug ligh aqe luki _ neqekagh ke ke put _ .
Tan pegh h et _ p uu f luki _ tapghaghqagh t _ gaagh luki _ .
Siq lugw am _ p uy an eq ru whaa _ kelig aqe luku _ , _ tawaten _ neqek egk aghput _ .
Ell maa r agll eq _ maligte luku _ aliillegh _ maligte luku _ sakma _ J an u ar y -mi _ tawani _ N ay eg regh aq _ aghvenge aqe uq _ mangtag ghllag t _ kaat ute i aat _ El qwaagh qun kut _ , _ K uz aat ankut _ .
taawa _ neqete ukut _ .
naten _ sangamta _ negh ke igh te qaghte ghllagkagh ni _ sangamta _ , _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ entaqun _ .
Teghig l ugwem _ inglu i _ , _ uksaagh mi _ un akugh llag luku _ tanpegh nun _ kanaghte uute aqe luku _ kayu _ , _ iqallug _ , _ qagugh ak _ kagpag tegh aqegkangat _ uksugh mi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ .
nalighnegh ghhagh a _ egh qal ik agh tegpenaan _ .
qawaag m _ itegagh i _ nuvugh aqe luki _ agaghte uute aqe luki _ uksugh mi _ p uu f luki _ , _ aghi ste luki _ , _ gaagh luki _ negh aqe ke put _ .
kiyang _ nulugh yagh qaghaqe ukut _ tagtalmi _ , _ iq s apag ilngugh ni _ tamaani _ .
nulugh yagh llegh _ tamaghhagh an _ suf lugw al iq aam anginaq _ , _ nanugh meng _ keleng ar uugh em _ .
Negh ev legh aq est ani _ tawaten _ .
riigh nge ka inagh _ angyaghpag _ , _ at asigh hiin aghmeng _ pedersen _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
kingulighpigagh u ni luku _ pugughilegh mun _ usingigh iqe aq _ .
Taaq n iit ngu f tughnguq _ iglegha llegh a _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ riigh nge gkankut _ , _ Nan ek -enkut _ kaate aqe ut _ tesamavek _ sivulii luteng _ pugughilegh kun _ tekite aqe ut _ .
taagken _ ki nguv aqun _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ sivungagh mun _ pi aqe ut _ .
akilpegagh aqe ut _ kagimkagh _ , _ iiqmig _ , _ tawaqa _ entaqun _ avelghagh igate kangat _ , _ sikeriigh t _ .
avlawa qun _ iitek _ piiq eg kefut _ qayuq _ .
qayugh t _ tamaakut _ I iis alghiinga _ qamagun _ f o il - elget _ qaye i _ vegaagh t _ J ap an es e- e meng _ ategh leg t _ , _ tum apag ilnguut _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
F o il - eng i _ tamaakut _ Aghnagh aghn iq lu _ elngaatall _ teghigniqe tke aqlaatagh ke put _ aksaqe luku _ tegleg luki _ ggu ter n teggun _ m a teg taqluki _ .
iqenge negh mta _ qel megh uu tesqelluki _ iingqagh put _ .
Wh ateng waaq _ enraq _ pi gpenaamta _ , _ nagate snanigh aqe kanginkut llu _ ungipamsug te nghata _ .
Qepgh am sug llag ni _ quunpeng _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ .
nunivag niigh aqe luta _ , _ maani _ av iil nguut _ piitesighagh at _ saghna aqe luki _ , _ legan _ esghaqagh u luteng _ mi r ugw an at _ .
Un at aankut _ , _ mellu inkut _ s aghnal aghaq aput _ uksugh mi _ pi kaghqagh u luki _ .
iitegngam _ aqavzig _ elngaatall _ saghn aaq aghput _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a
sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh i
kukuleg mii t
Pen apag em _ apegh llegh a
tawaten _ nagate lleg mtun _ Ugw ete le meng _ ap ang iighh am m neng _ apegh naqe aqa _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kanginkut _ , _ kukuleg mii t _ pelung ighllag ennguq _ elngaatall _ iqangite naqe negh ghllag t _ , _ aatk aqeg llaget _ , _ igaqragh ghllag _ sa at _ tamaghhagh mi _ ayuqe lghii _ .
entaqun _ ataasiigh negh unaq egh llaget _ ipapigh qengng anaq egh llaget _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
S agh llak annguq _ tagtalmi _ .
elngaatall _ amyuq e tagh sighwaagh llagem _ kaate tke ai _ , _ entaqun _ nanghiiqu llegh m _ saam _ kaate te ghllag ke ai _ maa tengu yaq an _ sumeghtaghagh llegh _ .
tawaten _ ukut _ kiyaghte aaghet _ uum _ nuna m _ pi yan _ puughte ghllag kaqe kangi _ sivuke luki _ .
Legannguq _ piyaa luteng _ unÊ¼g ani _ ayvegh t _ unguva i ta _ manguna itneng _ ikute luteng _ , _ legan _ amyuqetagh igh ke ghllag ke aat _ .
pi aqe lghii _ whaten _ Ugw etel en _ , _ â _ imatuq llu _ talwa _ ayvegh ghhagh inagh t _ pi kaqe atki _ , _ awiim nguq _ teghig ke sagh _ qamag luku _ seghletun _ tawaten _ amyuutke kaqe kangat _ . _ â
tuqute gpenaki _ ikute aqe luteng _ legan _ .
entaqun _ tawaten _ teghig nagh nge tke ai _ elngaatall _ .
legan _ tawaten _ unguv al ngughmeng _ whaa _ ikute aqe luteng _ gaagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
tagtalmi _ yuug _ ataasigh _ sa ghllag ke aq _ elngaatall _ .
entaqun _ kevg aa kaalghii _ yuug _ taana _ .
Saam _ kaate kaqe kanga _ , _ nunalgute ni _ elngaatall _ aatk angl aates qegkii _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ , _ pelungighsagh te naqe ni luteng _ pi kaqe kangi _ .
aghnagh _ kaki tke aq _ elngaatall _ .
aarragh tke aq _ igaqragh ghllag meng _ tawaten _ pinigh rakeg tepig lluku _ ulima tete luteng _ .
entaqun _ apeghiigh yaq megteggu _ tamaa na _ qelegh te llegh a _ , _ entaqun _ tamaan anginaq _ pi gpenaan _ mangteghagh ke te luki _ sag n ellgh aq ulluki _ ukmangigh stekagh i _ yugwem _ taam _ .
Yugwem _ taam _ pillgh atun _ legan _ pikagh t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ alignagh ite ngughk _ yuug _ taana _ entaqun _ .
laluramke nun _ ungipamsug ke nghminigu _ p ro ph e c y- kaan iiq egkangat _ yuug _ taana _ .
tawaten _ apeghiigh uute yan _ , _ enraq llu _ tawani _ ighivg aghmi _ pi lleghqagh itni _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ , _ anuq eq ragg angun ani _ , _ qag iq ragg angun ani _ legan _ megh _ unegna _ taghneghaghqugh te stun _ qategh ll ugwem _ angtalanganeng _ lli aqe aq _ .
esnagh mun _ atghagh uute ste ghllag luku _ yuug _ elngaatall _ kum aght ighllag luteng _ b on _ f ir e- egh llakat _ entaqun _ .
K um aght ighllag luteng _ quug _ qerngughte luku _ aarragh te luteng _ tawaten _ entaqun _ neqe meng _ kel qelluteng _ .
Yugwem _ wh al en _ pi ke ai _ , _ â _ temngi _ tawaten _ aneghte nghite u amsi _ , _ nuna _ uukna _ tagi lghii _ qateghrakegtagh _ iqa ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ tuus aghq aq enghil kefut _ nuk eg nagh luta _ . _ â
taana _ apeghiigh te sqellug qu _ pelungighsagh te sqellug qu _ .
esgha _ legan _ B i b le- et _ pill ghistun _ pikagh t _ .
taghneghaghqughkagh t _ megh kun _ uun Ê¼g gun _ , _ mumigte aqe luteng _ yuvghiighkagh t _ .
elngaatall _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ entaqun _ seghletun _ pi llegh eng _ taana _ qivghukekagh at _ sa ke aat _ apeghraghkagh at _ .
seghleghqe llegh eng _ , _ seghlegh yuk ellegh teng _ aag negh squgh ke aat _ elngaatall _ .
taghneghaghqughkagh t _ taanÊ¼g avek _ nuna mun _ .
pi aqe kangi _ Ugw etel em _ , _ â _ En taq unnguq _ seghevute uute tke aat _ . _ â
piniqe llegh _ ighivg aghmi _ tawani _ naalkekagh at _ .
I werng aq unnguq _ tawaten _ taakwna _ nuna _ yugwem _ taam _ atigh aqe kanga _ taakwna _ nuna _ tagi lghii _ qategh rakeg llak _ ava ite ngughk _ tagneqragh ite ngughk _ iqa ite ngughk _ .
taana _ pelungighsagh te sqekagh a _ , _ ukmangigh sqekagh i _ nunalgute ni _ tamaakut _ .
entaqun _ apeghiigh luteng _ esgha _ taam _ kingu aneng _ mulu gpenateng _ , _ qav amegg ne nguq _ tuqu laghate kau ut _ .
Aq nigh pen ate nguq _ qav aghpag utk aan iiq egk angin nguq _ .
nenglu m _ legan _ imigh a _ qavagh negh ke te ziin _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
ungipamsug _ taana _ elngaatall _ allaaghlluwh aghy ag ut aqegkegka _ c om par e- r aaq egkegka _ , _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghiinga _ whaten _ igamsiqa yagute aqe kegka _ .
repall _ pi aqe kenka _ min iste r -et _ , _ â _ Taakw aningani _ whaa _ kenlet ghu us kan _ nuna _ , _ entaqun _ ila i _ legan _ esghagh yaghqagh put _ yuguligh llegh nun _ iteghkagh t _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh a _ esghagh kaqe kegka _ elngaatall _ , _ yupig t _ tawateng waagh waaq _ laluramke stun _ ugpeqe luku _ ayuqe kangat _ h on or - eghllag luku _ ( _ in _ th e i r _ o w n _ w ay _ ) _ ellmeng _ katam _ pi llegh megestun _ .
