anglinghhagh u lunga
Am ig iq aam _ apegh llegh a
elngaatall _ whanga _ qaatke ghllag luki _ angayuqagh nka _ ata nka _ taakut _ angli kau lghiinga _ .
neqe _ sa u a _ angaghqugh ghllag nghatgu _ qepghigh sqe aqe kangatnga _ qinutagh ghllag naagh ni lunga _ .
enkaam _ kayusiite aqe kenka _ neqe meng _ qepghagh nghata _ .
P is q eghllag atnga _ sas q eghllag atnga _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe lghiinga _ ilangakun _ k allegh s aghnal ungallu _ sa lunga llu _ qinuyug lunga _ .
panignagh u na iqe lunga _ nukeggnaghqe ste ghllag aqe aatnga _ .
Ugw iigh yam allu _ tagi negh mni _ agligh sqe aqe kangatnga _ .
agligh sqe nghatnga _ Ap aat an kunun _ atghagh aqe lghiinga _ .
amalleqa _ pi q r ugw aqegk anganga _ , _ panike na iqe kanganga _ apagh ta m _ .
â _ Sing leng am _ qelanqe lleqe aaten _ . _ â
Sing le nga _ taana _ whangkuta _ agani _ pi kum akangat _ .
â _ Sing leng am _ qelanqe lleqe aaten _ aglagh a _ . _ â
aglagh aqe lghiinga _ qiya vleghagh magh ma _ sumeghtaghagh magh ma _ , _ panike na iqe lunga _ ighsayagute ghllag atnga _ .
l gh s ayag un nilunga _ .
test-kagh nkuk _ enraq _ atalgute gka _ ugumikeraagh naqe ghllag k _ , _ Aku liq aankuk _ , _ Aghn aam k amin kuk _ .
apagh ta m _ panig i _ , _ taana llu _ T ep ar gh uq _ .
T ep ar gh uq _ taana _ entaqun _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u luku _ Ay ak in kunun _ angag itnun _ tuune kaqe aat _ .
Eg migh aghllak _ .
aag lleg nge a nguq _ naa ke a _ .
apagh ta m nguq _ nuligh q eftaa _ aag lleg nge a _ .
ayag ke inkut _ nayag ke aat _ .
Taag egken _ tagi laghate kau ut _ .
whanga llu _ atalgute gka _ taake uk _ .
ugumi ke ghllag yagh kanginkut _ T ep ar gh uum _ .
urang _ ugumi ke yagh ainkut _ , _ maaten _ qemall _ .
pi aqe kenka _ panig nka _ , _ maalliqun _ piniq sal iigh llag aanga _ qavngaq _ ugumi ke ghllag lunga _ .
alingyug ketagh ghllag _ , _ paninang _ maaten _ alingyug ketagh ghllag _ .
Aling yugw igal nguunga _ , _ unug taq elghii ngallu _ ellngin aghh aghma _ .
navek _ aghulaqe uute aqe aat _ .
itegh nghata _ pi aqe kenka _ , _ â _ navek _ aghulaqe uute aqe tsi _ ? _ â
pangeghte aat
ungipamsug ghllag t _ elngaatall _ .
payangite ghllag qagh yu k llu _ angukagh ut _ .
elngaatall _ legan _ tam lagh qu lluteng _ whaa _ qay ung ll aq _ , _ aqelqagh put _ taakut _ qayug ngllagh te ma luki _ qen aagh p all aq u _ , _ q iin qan emni _ kana _ qaasqagh mi _ uziv legh et _ .
aqfaqugh te t _ aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ .
legan _ qayugh qiinagh luteng _ neghe gpenateng _ .
elngaatall _ tawaten _ aqfaqugh te luteng _ uzimun _ ataasighhaaghte aqe luteng _ , _ entaqun _ aneghte negh meggni _ aatqaghte vike aqe luki _ .
apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ mataghqe te luteng _ tughumgh an neqeg s aataqut _ .
enraq _ talwa _ esghapag snanigh aqe kangit _ .
Aghn aam kam illu _ amigh k _ umeg sighwaagh luku _ regh il qugh lluku _ esghapag aqe lghiikung _ .
sangamta _ esghapag snanigh aqe inkut _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ liisagh lghiikut _ agleghnagh staghhiinagh _ .
iwerngaqun _ taaqe luteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ elngaatall _ negh ul gh utaqut _ .
enkaam _ tumighqaate nghata _ llangaqa llu _ nun atugh qwaa sug nit aqiinkut _ .
luteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ elngaatall _ negh ul gh utaqut _ .
enkaam _ tumighqaate nghata _ llangaqa llu _ nun atugh qwaa sug nit aqiinkut _ .
K elqugh luteng _ kalngag meng _ ila i _ uyamig luteng _ .
amigh m _ liiqnegh a _ legan _ tan - ek astun _ tawaten _ .
ugtinghagh it _ pi nigh ghllag t _ legan _ whaten _ .
qallukagh _ san aghqugh waagh luni _ .
ayallaghwaagh llu _ , _ angyaghwaagh llu _ allgegh naqe ghllag at _ elngaatall _ , _ iiwen _ kaki sigh m _ siku i _ .
S iku unnguq _ ataasigh t _ allgegh te q aghnegh megteki _ , _ kaki yaghtugh negh meggni _ tamaan al egnun _ kel qelluki _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ siku ut _ .
S iku ghh naq egh llaget _ maaken _ kaki sigh m _ sikugh aneng _ .
Qav ng aght ar ug llaget _ sikugh nka _ Pedersen -meng _ ima _ tukfighagh t _ , _ pinigh t _ taake ghllag nghite ngugh t _ , _ taak egh paget _ katamngwaagh t _ kenug kegte nghite ngugh t _ pinigh t _ .
whaa _ panig ma _ naang sagh tu ghii _ .
aflenga kaqe anka _ neghightagh ghllag t _ .
sagnegh nka _ ima _ aghnaghagh u lunga _ allgegh tek anka _ .
K elg uq un em ki _ kinku nun _ n allegh ayag ut aqegkangit _ .
talwa _ G e is t- am _ aqeftaghaagh i _ sungaghtuqagh t _ .
pi lgu unga llu _ tamaaken _ sakma _ .
taakut _ enkaam _ panig nka _ taw a tek an iigut _ whanga mtun _ pivagru negh ghllag _ aag qagh ghhaat _ .
aamtaam _ eltughagh nka _ pillgite u aghte ut _ .
whanga mtun llu _ taawa _ pisqelluki _ aghyuugh aqe kenka _ , _ maligte naagh nghite kangatnga _ .
kii _ , _ akuzi aqe unga _ ilangakun _ apeghtugh na luki _ ungipamsug un nem ki _ angli naqe lleg mneng _ .
ineghneghlliqe gpenanga _ whanga _ angli kanga _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
Pel aasi _ entaqun _ taana _ pilleg pigte yagh uq _ elngaatall _ ungipamsug nghmini _ .
taameng _ igagh yaq ayug w etlu _ liisagh lghiikut _ yugwet _ s ev en - ek laag mi _ unugmi _ igaghyagh te aqe lghiit _ .
High _ s ch o ol -em _ igagh i _ qamagtekaqe kangi _ talwa _ .
enkaamllu _ puyg iing igal qwaagh llag uyagh tuq _ .
l g aghy aat kayug uyagh tut _ unugmi _ .
apeghtughiste ke yuwhaagh t
taana _ igaghvig _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ tamaavek _ nanevgagh nun _ .
S aav l an kunun _ , _ P us aan kunun _ , _ kinku nun llu _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ .
Kay us iitk aq niiq egk ang qat _ tea- aghte a _ .
aglu m _ inglu igh llegh aneng _ repa ke luteng _ .
T angegh tughllag tun nguq _ elngaatall _ aglu t _ tamaakut _ , _ ayvegh m _ aglu igh a _ .
tamaaken _ repa ke luteng _ ulima kaqe na iqe aat _ .
kayusigh kaqe na iqe aat _ .
iwernga _ liisagh lghiikut _ pinigh ghllag _ igaghvig ghllag _ .
whaten _ igagh yami _ ikiqun _ uglagh ghllag _ whangkuta _ te ach er- k egkaq enghil kefut _ .
nulighh ghqu te ii na lghiit _ .
maaten llu _ te ach er- eghllag ugh lleghhii _ .
N ic ker s on -enkut _ maani _ te ach er -ngugh llak aagut _ .
minister- nge magh mi _ , _ te ach er -ngu m aghmi _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Th om p s on- n enkut _ ama _ te ach er -ngugh llak aagut _ tawaten _ nulighhqaghtu an _ .
iwernga _ sa u a _ ayuqligh _ ama _ te ach er- k egkaq aghput _ ukav an leng ugh ni _ .
Agh naa r tuq _ ayuqligh _ .
Pill waagh atagh at _ taana _ N ic ker s on- ngun ik angat _ te ach er- ker taat _ .
whangkuta _ taana _ ayuqligh _ te ach er- k egkaq aghput _ .
negh yagh uute kayug ni _ whangkunnun _ .
negh yaghtugh luta _ on e- ek laag yagh tun ghani _ tagi aqe luta _ .
talwa _ mangteghagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
Taan Ê¼g ani _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ .
enkaam _ uvite _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aante aput llu _ sam av eghll ugw inaq _ , _ mallagh ite ngugh t llu _ .
sa kun _ avlawate ta kun _ , _ paper _ s ac k - ke kun _ qantagh luki _ anuqligh nghaani _ aantagh nun _ aante i negh mta _ teng testaq egkeput _ , _ teng taq egkangi _ .
entaqun _ sa pagite luta _ mallagh ite ngugh u kut _ talwa _ .
akilpegaghkagh t
N uugh tek anigh meng _ anglikagh ni _ whangkuta _ .
Taan ang ur tuq _ kiyang _ tukfigh yug qumtaagh at _ tawaqa nkut _ , _ iiqmig nkut _ , _ qay uun kut _ , _ avlawa nkut _ .
Taaku ngu r tut _ kiyang _ tukfigh yuke llegh it _ .
avlawa _ kiyang _ , _ avlawa t llu _ tamaakut _ neqekrangllaghpag gpenaki _ , _ kiyang _ avlawa liigh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ mulu ghllag aqe ut _ , _ neqekrangllagh qaghaqe luteng _ .
nutaghagh llu _ taawa _ nanigh m _ neqekrangllagh a _ neqekrangllagh meng _ negh yugnagh ghllag _ .
sa kun _ qay ul ghut ag b h aghqun _ J av a _ T ea- ngun iiq egk angit gun _ ukite luki _ neqekrangllagh aqe lghiinga _ .
Kang gh ug rak gu ugh lluteng _ ila i _ o aten _ mesiigh m _ taa pe kan ighluki _ neqnigh ghllaget _ whangkunni _ .
neqe ut
ii _ , _ neghsagh _ kaat ute ghllag nghmegteggu _ .
Ay maa kel aghtugh aqeg kef ung _ Nap aaq lu _ .
tazingavek _ saag b h w am m nun _ siq lugw amun _ kanaghte aqe luki _ .
kaate negh megteni _ qam ug b llag lutek _ .
qaye akun _ aligh mta _ qalqalima meng _ aveg aqe luki _ .
Siq lugw iig b aqelghii kung _ qalqalima meng _ kemekrag meng _ .
Sag negh waag b llaget _ imigh luki _ kapeghte i lutung _ iq ugw akun _ kapeghtekagh pung _ lli luki _ .
neghe uute negh mta _ taaggun _ kapeghtekagh kun _ iwhani _ neqnigh ghhalek _ , _ ilangakun _ tengug meng _ .
qalqalima kun _ elngaatall _ unaghsigh kun _ si f tagh lluki _ siq lugw iiq akun _ taaggun _ .
legan _ pellumeghtagh put _ pightugh vleghagh ghhagh t _ .
qazigyagh m llu _ , _ ayvegh m llu _ uqigh a _ l ard - estun _ ayuqe ut _ .
whaten _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ aku un nemteki _ neve sqe aghtagh luteng _ ayuqe aqe ut _ .
P ir aam si t ngwaagh luki _ akuute aqe ke put _ , _ neghyaghqagh stun _ tawaten _ angka i ta _ aavgugh aqe luki _ .
mesiightu luki _ pi sqe aqe kangit _ qavagh ghqu negh meggni nguq _ mesiigh i uute kayugu ut _ .
maaten _ tawaten _ pi aghte aqe yagh anka _ eltughagh nka _ ukut _ avaqutagh nka _ , _ seghleqe aqe ait _ .
Aku ut angwaagh llag luta _ uksulqusigh _ .
akuute luki _ kuml asigh aqluki _ .
Iq all ugw aqlu _ pi ghllag nghatgu _ Nap aaq _ tengertagh igh yu neghtu ghllag _ .
tengertagh t _ tenge kayugu na iqe kangit _ , _ taawanginaq _ aygughike aqe kenka _ .
Aku un nemteki _ uglagh ghllag t _ .
sagnegh u aaghet _ takeriig t _ tamaagun _ tengertagh meng _ akuute ghllag lunga _ ateghte luku _ , _ neghe uute naqe yamta _ neqagh luku _ entaqun _ , _ â _ kaay _ , _ akuute aq _ aqfa aghte naqe aqa _ . _ â
It ghus aq minigu _ legan _ tekerqagh u ni te uq _ kanegh _ .
tenge ma na ait _ naqam _ .
tengertagh meng _ ategh ke lghiit _ .
nalighmeng _ mesiigh i _ , _ nalighmeng _ s allghi _ anagte lghii ni _ tawatete ut _ .
ila i _ ghhuughpagtagh pigesnagh luteng _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ .
Negh qwaa ghigh waaghluki _ iqall ugw at _ tamaakut _ , _ qay ev reg aghh ii _ tamaakut _ ikugh luki _ , _ qete luki _ , _ mesiigh meng _ akuute luki _ qayagh itneng _ kuuv i kev legh aghluki _ kuml asigh aqegkeput _ .
tengertagh u ut _ ategh i _ .
aygughike ma aqe yaqenka _ , _ taana _ esghagh luku _ wetku _ ugpeqe yagute anka _ .
mangteghapig t llu _ , _ mangteghasqwaagh t llu
taagken _ mangteghagh put _ upenghagh mi _ , _ amaa iqe aq _ , _ tapghaghqagh _ apegh iin em teggu _ naafqe aqe ke put _ mangteghagh t _ .
mangteghasqwaagh mun _ lliigh aqe luta _ uqugh meng _ itagsi naqe nghmeng _ .
mangteghapig m _ tanpeghh i _ ikugh luki _ aagra i llu _ naaf qelluki _ , _ mangteghagh m _ qukaa kun _ taaggun _ , _ maqaghqute t llu _ , _ veg t llu _ maqagh te t _ llilaghtugh luki _ tanpegh meng _ asiliqutagh igh luki _ iwhani _ , _ kagpag aqe kangit _ tanpeghh mun _ llilaghtugh luki _ sa meng _ tapgh al aag meng _ nemegh luki _ .
kiigtagh ke lghiit _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ .
mangteghasqwaagh mi _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikut _ ayagyu ligh luki _ .
aghte nghaani _ taakut _ ayagyu put _ mak reg lluki _ petug luki _ paaggun _ .
aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ suksugtagh kun _ qayug ngllagh aqe luta _ .
gaagh ngllagh luteng llu _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ eslallug mi _ .
aliinegh mi _ aamta _ qagani _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ .
aanqaghte pagte te luki _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ gaagh ngllagh aqe ut _ .
G aa nguftut _ anuqe mi _ , _ eslallug mi _ taaggun _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ .
uqugh _ piyaqnagh kanigh yagh lghii _ liisagh lghiinga _ qayughllak _ .
Upengh aam _ wh al en _ uqiightu llegh a _ uqug ngllagh llegh a _ eg sigal kefut _ , _ kag p aper ew aaq _ akmagutagh kun _ .
wetku _ uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ esneli nghaani _ , _ kum laagh taq uluni _ lliigh nghaani _ mangteghagh uute aqe ut _ .
taakut _ paaggun _ iwhani sigh u ut _ , _ mangteghagh m _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ tanpeghtagh igh luteng _ .
tanpigh luta _ taakut _ aagra t _ nekegte aqe ke put _ .
amu i ut _ aagra t _ , _ amigh t _ maakut _ allighaghqagh ughtekagh t _ .
amenqun _ allighaghqagh u na iqe ke put _ melqughtuqagh t _ , _ tamaakut _ kaki luki _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ naten _ esl egk ak alghiimeng _ .
vuvegh m _ , _ v uv igh naq nemteki _ .
una _ iiggereghwaagh vig _ iigge igate luni _ veg ghllag u yagh uq _ .
taagken _ veg meng _ saghna ghllag aqe luta _ .
samagun _ tanpeghh agh aaghet _ ilaagh uute luki _ ikellegh ghqu aaghet _ tunemagh ke luki _ amalka _ .
enkaam _ veg meng _ pi luki _ vuvegh igh aqe ke put _ tanpegh meng _ .
ukite aqe luki _ , _ nap aghy egh aan iiqiit _ uum _ amigh m _ amalka _ ayagsigh ta i _ .
tawaten _ ameltu aqe luki _ napaghte qugh vike aqe ait _ .
test-pag kut _ kelu t _ eslege lghii meng _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ qukaa ii kete te _ llivike luki _ .
test-pag kut _ ama _ tawaten _ esl egk ak alghiimeng _ c e il ing -ng eng i _ amalka _ aagra m _ .
sa ni te mun _ llilaghtugh vike luki _ ulig aqe ke put _ .
tawaten _ uusqaghtutka i ta _ unaghsigh t _ , _ kevigh luki _ veg meng _ .
U uy negh mun _ enraq _ , _ n atanga _ taake ghllag lghii _ veg a _ , _ wh ategh llak _ legan _ .
elngaatall _ akmag aatagh aqe lghiit _ , _ amenqun _ uq eng el eng estaaghh aat _ .
tespamavek _ tawavek _ amenqun _ iiggereghwaagh vig u yagh lghii mun _ veg meng _ saghna yagh negh mta _ qiipaghagh t _ imigh aqe ke put _ aligh a _ qilleghte aqe luki _ .
U qeng es quy uwh aat _ kenegte ghllag aqe luki _ , _ keviite kaghqagh meng _ .
taakwegkut _ uzimun _ aagra t _ kevigh luki _ asi i _ kenegte ghllag luki _ .
elngaatall _ atku v leg aq _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ atg- ke uk _ taaqegkagh _ atku v leg aq _ , _ amigh _ .
amigh m _ qaye akun _ qakmagun _ eslatagh akun _ maqaasghagh igh uute kaqe kangit _ .
puqla ghllag t _ .
tespamna llu _ tawaten _ tanpigh luku _ veg meng _ ul ig aqeg kefut _ .
enkaam _ supug ite ngugh t _ .
taawanginaq _ puq l aghh neghani _ tanpegh pigu luku _ qepghagh na ghllag _ .
legan _ qak em na _ naghigh aqe uq _ tanpegh pigu luta _ , _ kanegh _ ifkagh qu ghllag aqe uq _ .
taakut _ veg t _ ifkaghte luki _ , _ apeghiigh nghaani _ ifkagh qu nghmeng _ , _ kameraagh i llu ta _ kameg put _ repall _ aghi aqe kangi _ .
whaten _ anigu i _ ifkaghte luki _ miluute aqe luki _ .

taakut _ anigu t _ aane ste qugh aqe ke put _ ghhute tgun _ inglug taagh utaq luki _ .

angyaghpag t
ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ Ung al aq _ aghvenge ma lghii _ kii p aghq em mi _ J un e- mi _ .

elngaatall _ usingigh lghiit _ .

angyagh mun _ tagite luku _ tawavek _ , _ U uygh aam _ afta a _ nazighagh _ .

ii _ , _ neghe uute yalghiikut _ llaaghanwha _ qaqayuugte ukut _ elngaatall _ , _ qepghagh lghiikut _ uglaapig luku _ .

pi yalghiikut _ tapghugh m _ nall ang an ite f tukut _ .

tagi laghate te ukut _ , _ tagi laghate te ukut _ , _ quyngighqwaagh t _ nani _ taakw an lluki _ naghughte aput _ , _ ighn ist it _ .

kingu aneng _ Pedersen -mun _ pi lunga _ , _ â _ pagaveg- a _ atugh lghii nun _ nagate yagh yagh ka ite zinga _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ l gh en naq lu _ , _ whanga llu _ ? _ â

ugumi nagh ghhalek _ .

pi unga _ , _ â _ T ed d y _ kayusiite yaghtugh ghhu _ . _ â

ungipaate a _ umiileg _ .

Yugh aq
Yugh aq _ taana _ .
Nag an nem ki _ taawa _ , _ â _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ â _ nagate aqe kegka _ legan _ pi nghatgu _ .
Yugh agh yaq min inga _ , _ talwa _ saafte gpenanga _ , _ iigge ni _ qule mun _ nengug te ai _ , _ nengug te luki _ whaa _ qilag m _ pamaken _ qu lighh aan _ qu lighh aaneng _ qilag m _ pi nga yu an _ qafsig ke llegagh te _ amiiragh aneng _ ay apgh aat iis qelluni _ pi uq _ .
qaamna _ sa u a _ aqnighqagh ii lghii _ pinighsagh na luku _ .
tungsigh llegh a _ esgha _ taana _ in ter est- te t k eghllak aqa _ B i b le- e mi _ H e av en s _ o f _ H e av en - qun _ atightu kangat _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke ghllag aqe kegka _ .
taagken _ tungsigh luni _ wetku _ tawani _ taawa _ elngaatall _ ef lugh waagh um aghma _ .
ayapegh aatagh luni _ qaamna _ aqnighnegh _ pinighsagh naqe a _ , _ m aang n naq aa _ .
M aang n naq niiq iit _ entaqun _ s o oth en aq neghmeng _ .

tefaay _ , _ naang taqiit _ qesigh aqe ainkut _ taawa _ .
qesigh luta _ taaqe aqe ut _ .

ateghte i
kina lli _ ama _ angyat teng _ aga _ angyagh lghiit _ ateghte i lghii _ nagate laatagh aqa _ ?
tawaten _ sivuke laatagh aa _ , _ â _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ â _ , _ angyat ghhagh ni _ aagkut _ taghneghagh ngunaki _ ava u na ki _ meghraag pigte luki _ kete sqe ai _ .
sa mun _ teghig ke sagh mun _ esghagh yaghqaa gpenaki _ taghneghagh nge te yaghqaa gpenaki _ aga _ , _ unÊ¼g ani _ ivagh i naigh sqe ai _ .

alla _ pi laatagh uq _ .
sivuyagte yan _ sigute gkenka _ tun ut angakun _ qesigh laatagh aa _ .

Teghig sit
Teghig sit _ tamaakut _ negh ke igh sag ghllag mi _ elngaatall _ pi kay ugwet _ .
Teghig sil get _ ungipaghagh neng _ entaqun _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
teghigsigh negh meggni _ entaqun _ seal- i qugh kayugu laatagh ut _ , _ alignalghii u ut _ .
sivunegh lgu lghiit _ ayvegh ughtekagh meng _ .
ayvegh nge yu ghllag t _ sivuqagh m _ ayvegh nge yu lleghtagh igh i _ sivun gh annguq _ ayvegh ughtekau lghii _ .
Ayvegh teggun _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ tagi aqe luni _ , _ tagi aqe luni _ .
melqunge luni _ qenwat _ tazimantekagh _ .
ima _ kaate laatagh nghmini nguq _ q alghii gh aqelghii _ ayvegh lghute m _ qalghigh te lghii m _ qung ang an ill uni _ kingunegh minun _ .
ategh teng _ atightugh aqe kangi _ .
ipa u ut _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ ayumigh _ ungipam s ugwet _ .
laluramke nun _ W iy am _ tamaa na _ c om par e- en nem kun _ , _ elqughaghte te luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ pal aghhaghmeng _ allangughte vleghaghkagh _ .
ayumigh m _ Kiyaghtaa l gha
Ar ti c l e _ l aw s -et _ taakut _ kiyaghtaall ghit _ ayumigh m _ O l d _ T estam en tet _ pi it _ yupig m _ legan _ kiyaghtaa llgh atun _ ayuqe ut _ .
sangiighhagh _ qamagte luni _ itake ghllag luni _ ayuqe uq _ .

ungipamsug te negh mta _ maaten _ nani _ ungipamsug te negh mta _ .
talwa _ esghapag snanigh ghllag luta _ ayuqe kanginkut qun _ .
esghagh yugnagh ghllaget _ .
Av eg tugh h aghmun _ neghe uute naqe mi _ whaten _ aqelqagh leg ni _ , _ liilightuusagh leg _ , _ avegtugh lleghqagh meng _ , _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ .
kenletu lleghpigagh u ukut _ entaqun _ whangkuta _ liilightuus aq em r ugw aaq _ sa u a _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ .
sa ite ngughk _ enkaam _ ayumigh _ .
neqe m _ ila a _ neghe snanigh luku _ ayuqe kanga _ ila a _ sa u a _ anglinghhagh nun _ tamaavek _ , _ ila a _ aqsaleg nun _ aghnagh nun _ .
liisimake luki _ entaqun _ sa lget _ tamaakut _ yupig t _ peghqinegh pigu lghiit _ .
talwa _ piitesighagh m _ ila a _ alngunak _ whaten _ negh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ .
agleghnagh ni luki _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ agleghnagh u nghite uq _ entaqun _ atigh llegh a _ taana _ .
puvalla t
puvalla t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ yugwem _ kitum _ sa u a _ esghagh luku _ puvalla ughtekayugu uq _ taawa _ puvalla liite kayugu uq _ , _ entaqun _ g if t- teng aqelghiit _ yugwet _ taakut _ sa meng _ nani _ .
P uvall aneghmeggni _ tawaten _ , _ elngaatall _ par t y- l ghii stun _ katam _ ayuqe ut _ , _ amalka _ c or e- elget _ iwernga _ akugh leg t _ .
sa u a _ tawaten _ aan ghu tellegh teng _ liisimake kangat _ .
Pin igh _ atugh aqe aat _ p uvall aneghmeggni _ .
neqenghaghqe ghllag kayugu ut _ .
uzive na iqe kangit llu _ tapghagh at _ whaten _ aghveghaqetagh kun _ petug luki _ .
aghnagh t _ tugu luki _ yugwet _ paamken _ inglu aneng _ tun utng it nill uteng _ .

S aay at
ila ita _ s aay aan iiq egkangit _ puvalla it _ .
S aay at _ tamaakut _ tax id er m is testun _ ulim aa ghistun _ ayuqe ut _ .
naqam nguq _ kana _ sagnegh t _ , _ qayuutagh ghhagh t _ neqe meng _ imigh luki _ qukaa ni _ tawani _ kenghhwagh m _ saaghw ani _ lli luteng _ .
kiiwhken _ kiwa _ , _ nallu kaqe kangit _ maakut _ ila ita _ anglinghhagh t _ , _ yugwet _ aqume luteng _ piighhagh meng _ entaqun _ amel leg ngestagh ghhagh meng _ ivalu meng _ paaggun _ pi z ite tgun _ pi luki _ .
qawaag m nguq _ amighqwaagh i _ , _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ alngunak _ qawaag t _ , _ iwhani _ esghaghkagh teng _ taakut _ qawaag t _ akuqagh kayugu kangit _ .
Am igh qwaagh ennguq _ afta nghmegteki _ seg lluki _ kevigh luki _ .
kinegh nghata _ kevigh luki _ unguva lghii stun _ legan _ whaten _ ulima luki _ .
nagun _ paamggun _ kaki te aqe ait _ qiipagh t _ .
pika nguq _ qawaag t _ nalug luteng _ itegh aan neghmeggni _ esghagh aqe ait _ .
esghapag ghngaaghmegteki nguq _ qawaag t _ , _ yaqugh teng _ whaten _ saag lluki _ , _ neqe mun _ kanavek _ pi luteng _ , _ p uv ug lu te nguq _ , _ aga _ quulv aghagh taqut _ .

P uvall annguq _ tamaakut _ seghlegh ite ut _ quy an aghll aag uut _ , _ qu yaq ayug utegh llak ayug uut _ .
eghte qugh u aagh
eghte qugh u aaghet _ maakut _ angyagh m _ piinligh lleghqagh ani _ el ngaat al i _ nangllegsiisigh t _ , _ tungsigh ragh sigh t _ elngaatall _ taakut _ .
Y e ar _ ro un d _ entaqun _ neqe _ sa u a _ unakegkagh eng _ , _ part- sa _ taana _ sav e ek ayug wat _ .
angyagh _ piinligh yaghtugh nghaani _ ategh qugh luku _ , _ tunugh _ tamaa na _ pugnegh iigh luku _ , _ kaape llegh ke i luteng _ nunivag meng _ , _ sa u a _ akuute aq llu _ pi luku _ .
aghveghaqetagh m _ uvit angakun _ nek egh qugh luki _ tawaten _ , _ alqimagh yukagh gpenaki _ , _ saafte yukagh gpenaki _ naten _ itake ghllag luki _ .
angyaleg m _ nuliigh ghhagh inagh n _ qepghaq ayug w i _ akuute yaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ .
tanpegh meng _ ulig luki _ qavaghtekayugu ut _ .
Un ugwem _ quk anghani _ angyaleg nkuk _ , _ sivuyag t enkuk _ nulighh a llu _ taana _ ivagh ull ugw aqut _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
taaqe negh megteni _ sivuyagtekete te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuune i yaghtugh aqe uk _ .
taawa _ eghqwaagh aqe ut _ , _ egh waagh luteng _ qayuut as qu veg aghhaat _ sa u aat _ , _ sagnegh nge ste aq _ uglagh u pigte uq _ .
eghqwaagh yaghtugh negh meggni _ tuune i yaghtugh naqe na iqe ut _ .
Y e ar l y _ c at ch -e y eng _ taana _ angyagh naq _ pinaq enghani _ tungsigh waa neghmeggni _ entaqun _ taana _ tuun egkayug waat _ .
Iq ug wa _ amalka _ veghute lghii stun _ amalka _ pi kay ugw aat _ .
elngaatall _ tawani _ tung si qay ugwet _ .
taawa _ ul ig i uki _ unaami _ aghte nghaani qun _ samavek _ esnagh mun _ enraq _ angyat teng _ kete luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ eghqwaagh tkekagh teng _ taglagh negh meggni _ , _ taawa _ qaagken _ negh yaghtu m _ negh aqe kangi _ .
taawa _ qagavek _ enraq _ taana _ ming ilat kay ugw at _ ang ef qaghh aan _ tawaten _ qamagte luku _ taagken _ ikute te luki _ awaligh tugh taa kay ugw iit _ Tes qag egkut _ enraq _ temngi _ tugu gpenaki _ aw al in ghis teng _ sangiighhagh meng _ imiite aqe luki _ .
amalka _ nav egh tev legh aghaq luki _ .
kingulighpigagh _ qepghagh llegh _ nagate kaqe kegka _ whangkunni _ eghqwaagh aqngameng _ .
tawani _ unugmi _ ivagh ull unegh meng _ Ugw etel en _ taaqe luni _ aane luni _ tuune i yaghtugh luni _ itegh luni _ , _ taawa nguq _ pugnegh at llu _ , _ kaapelqagh at llu _ tugu vike ma kangat _ Ping ayug g aag unnguq _ tugu vik negh megg teki _ .
Es k im o - t _ ugpeqe ghllag luki _ ayuqe kangit _ , _ tughnegh aan nguq _ pingay uwh aghneng _ ighneghwaagh ke ut _ .
taawa nguq _ iq ugw aneng _ tugu te ma lghii _ tawaten _ tugu te aatagh ma lghii _ .
kii _ alinge yalghiimek _ , _ W am iiy aq _ alingruugh yalghiimi _ .
Tuq iin aqng in angh at anguq _ negh ka itneng _ tesam an lluki _ tawaten _ tugu vik egkayug w ii _ tughneghagh m _ , _ taghneghagh m _ saam _ .
alingruugh ghllagkagh _ , _ ellnga _ tuqu kau uq _ .
entaqun _ aling eghllag em _ tuqute kaqe a _ .
alinge igate yagh kumeng _ entaqun _ pas saaq nay alghiit _ .
ugpegh ke ghllag m _ , _ r es pe c t- eghllag em _ taawa _ ipa _ aa testek ayug waa _ .
taana _ esgha _ puygu nghite kegka _ whaa _ .
pi nga yu neng _ tughneghagh t _ ighneghwaagh ke na iqe kangit _ .
uyvasaghqe a
uyvasaghqe a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u uq _ .
taana _ amenqun _ tap e eni _ qikmigh meng _ pi lghiit _ uy v as aghq eng nguuq _ tamaa na _ , _ tawaten _ anegh lleq _ qamagte luni _ ategh a _ alngunak _ .
amalka _ alignalghii m llu _ kina _ kayagte yagh kunigu _ qinuyug ta ii lghiit _ , _ tusigagh luni _ sangameng _ tawaten _ anegh tut s eng _ alignalghii kun _ liigike naqe luku _ , _ alignalghii m _ kayagte yagh kumiki _ apeghtugh yagh kumiki _ tawaten _ pisqelluki _ uy v as aghq en nay alghiit _ .
taana _ qikmigh _ tape- mi _ U uygh aankut _ i wh aning at _ .
qikmigh t _ tamaakut _ ng iig aqiit _ qinuyug llag nun _ tamaakunun _ ngiigte ste luki _ tuqute aqe ait _ .
naavghusagh ke aqe ait _ .
qikmigh u naanghite ut _ , _ sang ugh lluwh aghteng _ pivake ghllagkagh eng _ taakut _ qinu yugwet _ naal ghu tes q eq agh lluki _ ng iig luki _ egte aqe ait _ .
S uf lugw aq _ sa u a _ .
uyvasaghqe a _ tamaa na _ alla u uq _ .
uglagh uq _ ategh _ .
qani
tamaakut _ ama _ su ic id e- ek at _ qani na iqe kangit _ .
S u ic id e _ taana _ qani u uq _ , _ yugtagh u nghite ngughk _ yugte aq _ allakagh mete uq _ .
Tamaa kun nguq _ qanig ke aat _ seghl elleghpig aqii _ yugwem _ elngaatall _ , _ um yugw ii tellegh pig aan nguq _ qani kayugu ut _ .
qinuyug negh meggni _ , _ k iy anguq _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ qanig perewaagh _ ellmeggneng _ tuqute aqe ut _ .
Naqam enraq _ liisimak iste ligh luteng _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nanevgaghtagh meggnun _ , _ nuyekligh igh ta meggnun _ akuz ing waagh luteng _ , _ e x p l a in - neng waagh luteng _ , _ naallghute yaghqaa nghite lleg teng _ liigike negh meggni _ .
taawa _ amenqun _ ne m _ tun ut angani _ uyghag ghllag _ ir reg ul ar _ si d e- tawan s alghii _ .
neghqute mun _ uyghag ke na iqe kangat _ .
neghqute m nguq _ naken _ tagi tke a _ entaqun _ ulape u luni _ tawaten _ qani vig u luku _ .
Pi yug me nguq _ taglagh aqe ut _ qani naqe lghiit _ tamaakut _ yugw ennguq _ kiyang _ pinighikagh t _ iilqayug yuguma ghllag ut _ .
pi aqe kangi _ Ugw etel em _ , _ â _ Tamaa kun nguq _ pinighi pigesnagh luteng _ qateghyiighagh m _ um yugw aaneng _ um yugw alget _ ellmeggneng _ tuqute aqe ut _ naallghute lleghqagh eng _ iilqayuke nghmegteggu _ . _ â
taawa nguq _ taglagh luteng _ uyghag nguq _ taana _ akite kete luku _ , _ ila i nguq _ legan _ guute negh meggni _ , _ esghaghhu nguq _ uyghag _ taana _ iilqugh vleghagh ghllag u yagh uq _ .
ila i nguq _ legan _ kenuqagh aqe ut _ ellmeggneng _ tuqute aqe ut _ .
entaqun _ esghapag te ligh luteng _ maligte luteng _ .
entaqun llu nguq _ ila i _ pi aqe kangi _ , _ naallgh usaghq agh lluwh aat _ .
naqam nguq _ ila i _ tamaakut _ pinighi kau nghite ngugh t _ um yugw agh tuqat _ neghqwaagh it _ uki iqe luteng _ kem g im _ angtalanganeng _ , _ naave luteng _ .
piniighte aqe ai nguq _ naallghute aqe ut _ igleghte yagute aqe ut _ .
M ereg te meng _ tume t _ sivuqagh mun
tapi i sag m _ apegh llegh a
Negh qun nguq _ taana _ akmaneghpallugh _ , _ aglagh naqe negh meggni _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ sa u ut _ entaqun _ naten _ angka qaghte lit _ , _ tanpeghh ek _ tawaten _ .
esgha _ mangteghasqwaagh _ iingunagh an _ akmag ma kanga _ maaken _ taamavek _ aglagh negh meggni _ sivugnagh mete te _ .
ayag ke itagh te t _ sa it _ , _ naten _ angka an _ s aku sim aat _ imani _ .
esghaghhu _ atiiqe te yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ aghsaan _ tawaten _ .
Enkaangam _ ayuqligh _ sangan _ ilughagh ke steggu _ whangkuta _ sa meng _ apallugh ke luku _ .
nanevgaghtagh ma _ taam _ angayuqagh ma _ sa ke aat _ entaqun _ .
tanemwha qun _ Y aagh u _ Ugw al iitlu _ pike kangat _ , _ taa meng wha _ apallugh ke luku _ pi ma nghite a _ .
esghaghhu _ maaken _ amavek _ akmag kayugu ma lghiit
M ereg te meng _ piinlillegh a
entaqun _ tazingani _ aam nang uyagh tuq _ neghpigagh a _ meregta _ .
tegh vleghagh m _ qula ani _ tazinga _ nenglu t _ ayum igh tan egh qes iigh et _ esghagh aqe kenka _ tamaa _ naghughte aqe kenka _ .
aghvegh m _ elq un ev rag i _ , _ ang tugh haam _ elq un ev r akum aaq egkangi _ esghaghhu _ .
tawaten _ uyghag stun _ qal te tutk aligh luteng _ lli aqe aat _ , _ ayum igh tan egh qes iigh em _ entaqun _ angtale aneng _ .
kinkungaawa t _ imani _ .
esgha _ yul gem _ kenle aneng _ ukavek _ tagi ste naqe kegka _ .
taawa _ tazingavek _ piiwagh luteng _ enraq _ qaye igh llegh nun _ .
qaye igh llegh t _ ama _ nenglullug llgagh u aqe ut _ tamaa _ neng lu r raag g aghmeng _ .
naqam _ taamna _ meregta _ neghll aak _ elngaatall _ uglagh pestaagh meng _ .
uglagh lghii _ nenge a _ elngaatall _ yug wa _ .
mengyagh llegh
esghaghhu _ repall _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii _ .
navek _ ugw avek _ qerngughte vig ghllag mun _ , _ neng lugh nag llak _ sa u a _ qerngughte vig _ .
ayuqligh t _ q ar g ingun in ay aq angat _ taawavek _ uksaagh mi _ puvalla yagh uute kayugu ma lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ p uvall anghani _ yaywaali leg _ tamaa _ elngaatall _ ellngin aghhaghmeng _ kezemaghhagh meng _ .
N ay u ghis tek luku _ , _ kelengas tek luku _ , _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ taana _ .
ne ghllag m _ taghnughhagh lghute ni _ , _ taana _ aflengak istek luku _ , _ tawavek _ tagi qu ghllag luki _ .
elngaatall _ taawavek _ piiwagh uute ghllag luteng _ taana _ nay u ghis tek luku _ .
legan _ tanqighllug ghllag _ aliigh neghllug ghllag _ .
S iiq aatagh tekayug w i _ qayughllak llu _ sa nghata _ tawaten _ .
puvalla _ kitum _ pi a _ taana _ efqugh h neghminigu _ , _ atugh laataqu nghminigu _ , _ kaa _ , _ leganqun _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ pi naqlaatagh yalghiimi _ , _ taghnughhagh t _ teghhwaaghigh tke aat _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ teghhwaaghigh te ut _ paye u naqe yalghiimi _ entaqun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ yuq egh ragh tagh tuq _ sa uq _ elngaatall _ , _ egtug yug uq _ , _ ugmelli iqe uq _ sa uq _ .
qenwat llu _ alla _ yuqeghte yalghiimi _ , _ kii _ , _ kav ighh al aak _ kenegh ghllag _ uka _ unegken _ .
entaqun _ paye aneng _ kan ak en a _ mengyagh t _ esgha _ tawatete ma lghiit _ .
â _ seghleghhalek _ qenwat llu _ meng yagh naq iin kut aa _ , _ heng _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
esghagh yaghtugh nghminigu _ uka _ tagl aq _ alii ghin aq _ naken _ teskanaken _ paye aneng _ .
â _ Seghlegh h al ek aa _ qenwat llu _ mengyagh naqe aisi _ , _ elngaatall _ pineghlliqe tek _ , _ aragh teki _ â
alla _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ legan _ kenegh ghllag _ .
tughneghagh t _ kenegh meng _ atkug na iqe kangit _ tughneghagh _ aamtayaghhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inaghtu te _ iglegh negha _ ayuqe lghii _ .
kii _ , _ alla _ pi yalghiimi _ kana _ malleg ma lghii _ .
â _ Seghlegh h al ek aa _ , _ taawa _ pi naqe aisi _ , _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
pi yalghiimi _ , _ ii- k _ sa u a _ aane uq _ tesqamaken _ uka _ mayugh uq _ .
elngaatall _ itegh qagh qiinagh luni _ , _ amenqun _ agl ugh at _ esghagh ke put _ nenglullug _ iikna _ ulima aqe yamegteggu _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ tamaavek _ uughqaghte luni _ elngaatall _ tawan ii _ , _ â _ heng _ , _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
kii _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ qakma _ saaygu tgun _ elpeg kesagh ke yagh lghii mi _ , _ el pek saq megteggu _ , _ kii _ nenglu _ , _ nuna _ iggagte uq _ teskanavek _ , _ sunglug uq _ amig mun _ .
kii _ , _ su pugh ragh yaqminigu _ , _ sa yalghiimi _ aneghziig yalghiimi _ teskan av ek aa _ igg ag llag umaghmi _ .
elngaatall _ pi megteggun _ taaggun _ , _ tatame aatagh te ut _ , _ kakave niigh te ut _ , _ sa luteng _ pi lit _ leganqun _ estu laghate te ut _ tesqamavek _ naa ke i _ .
Taghnughh aqs a _ palaghhagh u a _ , _ qam akagh ii _ .
Seghlegh alek _ mekelghiigh _ alinge uq _ .
amen- a _ im g agh alghiini _ sa lghii ni _ tughneghagh t _ pinegh meggni _ entaqun _ ken ghi qeng egkayug ulghiit _ .
aga _ kenegh _ mayugh uq _ , _ aga _ qenwat _ qaame aqe luni _ , _ tawaten _ aneghte luni _ .
nasiqute luku _ ukig luni _ agigte yaghtugh yalghiimi _ aga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ maalliqun _ whanga _ piiq aghh naagh yuk aghpenga _ . _ â
ii _ , _ aghuliigh qaghte luni _ uut qagh tuq _ .
tespikavek _ ne minun _ maaten _ mayugh aghte uq _ .
elngaatall _ anegh p agh quy alghiimi _ all an qig g aghmeng _ itegh luni _ , _ ii _ p es kug wagh tev z igh aqluni _ , _ ifkagh vzigh aqe luni _ pal aghhaghmeng _ sa kun _ eltugh luni _ .

tawatete aqe ainkut llu _ , _ naniq eng y at _ sa u aat llu _ pikayug u ut _ , _ naken _ megh meng _ , _ qute meng _ .
Ken eng yaq ayug wet _ sak ayug wet _ , _ enkaam _ megh _ kenegh meng _ itake pigte luku _ ayuqe yagh kangat _ , _ nunaagh ni _ whaten _ .
tagi laghate te ghllag luteng _ taghnughhagh teng _ piyaq megteki _ , _ naate naagh aat _ , _ taakut _ angayuqagh it _ puvalla yaghkagh t _ .
El ngaat all aa _ aghyuugh mig aat _ sa ut _ , _ pegnem _ akuzi ste luku _ .
qenwat _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ El ngaat all aa _ elpek si llu _ aragh tek _ , _ pineghlliqe tek _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe naagh usi _ inegh h nem si _ , _ elpek qun _ naa gpek _ , _ ata gpek _ meng yagh lleq iin kut i _ ! _ â

wetku _ tawateng inaq _ pi yaghqaa na yu kata _ .

pakreg ghpagte ghllag ma lghii _ .

Ugw atmun _ piinlillegh
taakwavek _ tagi ut _ , _ tagi ut _ ii _ , _ kingun ghit _ maaten _ esgha _ entaqun _ Ung al aankut _ , _ nekreg te nkut _ , _ W aam segh aat enkut _ , _ yuungaaghagh nkut _ , _ kinku t _ taakut _ M ereg tem _ yugw i _ Mang en ankut _ .
enraq llu qun _ esghaghhu _ maavek _ lliigh yagh luteng _ entaqun _ maan tekestagh ngaaghmeng _ taamagun _ nenglu ngllagh ma lghiit _ M ereg te kun _ , _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ Mang en ankut _ ulimaagh at _ M ereg tem ii ngul ghiit _ qayughllak _ .
taamaken _ legan _ aglagh luteng _ sakmavek _ sivuqagh mun _ siq lugw agh qum aaqelghii _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
legan _ sagnegh k _ uyamig ke lukek _ whavek _ ne mun _ tagi pigte lghii stun _ taaga _ aglagh aqe lghii _ siq lugw aghq u _ amavek _ M ereg te mun _ .
taakwa _ aghvigh qaghte vig t _ esghaghhu _ Mang en ankut _ tumang it _ .
aghsughalegh m _ kiw at angani _ taawa _ qenngumsag _ sa u a _ nangupagagh meng _ ategh ke uq _ .
Enkaangam _ yugw i _ kinku t _ taakut _ nangupagaghmii u na iqe kangit _ esghaghhu _ taawavek _ piiwagh kestagh u u ma lghiit _ , _ tag ik est aq _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ whaa _ .
Nul am _ mingite kestagh yalghiimi _ M ereg tem _ yug wa _ .
taawa _ taakwagun _ tume tgun _ piiwagh lghii ni _ San iv legh et _ .
San iv legh ni _ taakwavek _ .
aghsughalegh _ taana _ kitugh lghii ni _ taakwegkut _ tume t _ taakwa _ .
esghaghhu _ ne kun _ tuum l iluteng _ ayuqe ma aqe lghiit _ taakwa _ nenglu t _ , _ nenglu ngiighhagh t _ ing ang iighhaq _ uyghag t _ tamaakut _ mingle itni _ qulighnegh itni _ .
Neng l ull uwh aat _ kaate aqe anka _ maalgh ugw aaq luteng _ .
Taz ing an iq aaghaq _ kitum i _ tawani _ ila i _ taawa _ .
sigasit ni _ tawani _ taawa _ ila i _ .
San iv legh et _ legan _ tume ghllag leg t _ , _ ayumigh m _ M ereg tem _ yugw ita _ tumang it _ qelli ghllag luteng _ ugw avek _ .
uyghagagh ni _ tamaani _ uyghag _ nek egh qugh aqluni _ tuum l ing waagh luni _ .
taawavek _ esnevagh negh mni _ whanga _ esghagh llegh ka _ apegh aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ yugtu yagh ni luki _ ugpeqe aqe kegka _ .
taawavek _ pi yalghiinga _ , _ tes k ig w ken _ , _ taakwa _ nenglagh u aghagh ta t _ , _ nenglagh u aghagh ta t _ ayvigtegh mun _ tawavek _ .
ayvigtegh mi _ taawa _ elngaatall _ nenglu t _ sa u aat _ .
nenglutu uq _ ayvigtegh llu _ taana _ .
tespikani _ quulvani _ , _ san iv legh ni _ taakwani _ , _ tazingani _ inglu anun _ aghvigh aghte lghii ni _ paninang _ nenglu t _ taawa _ .
Ng iig tek aankut
ayag ke inkut _ tawani _ , _ Ay ak im _ ungipam s ugw ani _ , _ sika ghhagh m _ ungipagh ani _ , _ aghqesaghtughtuqagh t _ , _ satuqagh t _ eghqwaaghtuqagh t _ entaqun _ .
Ng iig tek aankut _ tawan niiq iit _ .
ngiigtekagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ nenglu ghllag t _ , _ elngaatall _ negh ghllag _ entaqun _ uglaghyagagh ghllag t _ .
Q ilugh aaghet _ legan _ siklaate ghllag luteng _ ngiigte ma kangit _ yugtuumagh an _ .
Enkaangam _ ategh ke lghiit _ ngiigtekagh meng _ .
Ng iig tek aankut _ atigh neghllugte igate kangit _ taakut _ ellngit _ Ugw al iit _ .
M ereg tem _ nalighnegh ke na luki _ entaqun _ I ir gu m _ esgha _ Qav algh aam _ el tu ugh aa _ ataasigh _ taana _ ngiigtekagh _ .
uyuqligh _ aghnaghagh ghllag _ taana _ .
Aw al qam _ panig a _ ngiigtekagh _ .
esgha _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghiit
taagken _ aghvigh luta _ san iv legh et _ ku k rag n aghq waag ii _ , _ entaqun _ qaye akun _ aag ma aqe ut _ , _ lliigh ma aqe ut _ .
taawa _ iwernga _ ivgagh lghii ni _ sani vleghagh ite te luni _ .
taawa _ nengl ull uwh aq _ tawani _ Ay ak in kuni _ , _ sivugnagh mi _ .
nenglu _ aange llegh ke sigh u uq _ .
elngaatall _ taakut _ amaken _ M ereg te meng _ qaygeghte luteng _ amalka _ tume t _ qaye itgun _ .
taagken _ tan em wh aqa _ tesamavek llu _ ukig vig lgu uq _ , _ sivugnagh mi _ tawani _ .
entaqun _ nalighnegh meggnun _ sa meggnun _ ukig qagh kayugu ut _ taana _ nenglullug _ elngaatall _ , _ Qen aagh aankut _ kinku t _ nenglu mun _ tawavek _ pikayug u ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ enraq _ Siv ug nagh meng _ taakwa _ tume t _ ugw avek _ Aku l keg nekun _ qay gegh tekayug wet _ tuum l iluteng _ taam _ nengl ull ugwem _ yugw ita _ tuum l illghi _ .
