mayughwaagh mii t
entaqun _ esgha _ 1 6 00 -mi _ nani _ neli kau ma lghii _ maani _ .
tagi yalghiimeng _ esgha _ mayugh aagh mi _ tespikani _ .
uukna qun _ mangteghagh t _ aagkut _ manu at _ ho using -et _ , _ esnagh u yagh lghii _ entaqun _ .
tapeghagh meng _ ategh ke lghii _ esgha _ .
mayugh aagh qun _ esgha _ taamaken _ tea- ait _ neli ma lghiit _ .
sa lghii meng llu _ esgha _ Ayvegh yag teggun _ neli luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ taamaken _ tag ik est am _ angtalanganeng _ .
sivuqagh _ yug nge kestagh yalghiimi _ .
entaqun _ kana _ qiighqagh mi _ sa mi _ tawani _ neghqute nkut _ .
taghnughhagh mun _ atigh i llegh _ sivuqagh mi
iyaa-kagh nkuk _ , _ K ep elg un kuk _ apegh llegh at
kitum _ atigh aqe aki _ taghnughhagh t
taghnughhagh teng _ atigh naqe nghmegteki _ sivuke luki _ ateghqagh meng _ siivanllegh teng _ aapte luki _ , _ ateghqagh meng _ tuunekagh aneng _ atigh aqe ut _ .
nalighmeng _ kitu meng _ taagken _ atigh naqe ni luki _ siivanllegh teng _ ungipaate aqe ait _ , _ nalluke sigate ait _ .
ila ita _ ategh it _ ataa sii w aqut _ , _ ila i _ naqam _ maalgh ugw aaq luteng _ , _ ping ayug waaq luteng _ .
naten _ ila i _ wata _ uglagh aqe luteng _ .
laluramke stun _ whaten _ ayuqe nghite ngugh u ut _ first _ n am e _ , _ l as t _ name- ke te nghite ngugh u ut _ , _ John _ Paul _ H enr y _ J on es -etun _ tawaten _ .
ategh t _ uglagh ghngaita _ kiyang _ ataasigh t _ ategh t _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
katam _ Kaa vam _ pillgh atun _ ig angllaq am m ni _ kitum _ taam _ ategh an _ legan _ nal ikek _ atughqagh _ .
ila ita _ ramke m _ taghnughhagh teng _ aane ste gpenaki _ ateghqagh meng _ yataaghq ut kay ugw iit _ .
sivunegh neng
Taag egken _ ima _ ellmeng _ sivugh nghmeng _ ategh it _ at iit kay ugw iit _ kingumun _ ukavek _ aviigh tke aat _ .
enkaam _ puygu igate kangit _ sivunegh teng _ kinku u ta i _ .
taagani _ sivuqagh m _ akuzillegh a _ igaqe nga nghite yagh ghngaan _ .
wiin _ kiyaghte luki _ , _ unguva luki _ atiiqe igate kangit _ , _ entaqun _ taag egken _ ima _ qelegh sagh _ .
iwernga _ esgha _ aghnaghagh m _ ighnegh ni _ qantaghaqun _ atigh ma yagh agu _ a ta mi _ ategh aneng _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ ata an _ efqugh ke ma nge i tke a _ , _ piyuke ma nge i tke a _ .
naten _ ategh t _ aglagh aqe aat _ ramke m _ ila anun
kiyang _ yugwem _ , _ ata m _ tung anganeng _ taghnughhagh t _ allgegh nghata _ atigh kayugu kangit _ .
iwernga _ nuliigh teng _ ellngit a _ pi itneng _ at iiq is tekayug w it _ , _ akileghtugh kayugu kangit _ .
tawaten _ esgha _ ategh t _ ramke m _ ila aneng _ tag ikayug wet _ , _ agl aq ayug wet _ .
aghnagh m _ ategh _ igleghut kayug wa _ .
Ugw iigh luni _ tuqu yagh kan _ , _ ugw ingan _ pi ita _ atiiqe yaghqagh a _ .
nalighmeng _ aghnagh m _ ellnga n _ ramke an _ atiiqe yaghqagh a _ .
ila i _ ategh m _ tawatengwaaq _ akuuragh utu tete luteng _ ayuqe aqe ut _ kinku t _ ramke itni _ nalighmeng _ nani _ nuna mi _ .
ategh t _ whani _ igaqe llegh mi _ atuqekagh t _ temngingu ut _ .
ategh u kata _ aku ur am _ pi ste lleqe ai _ .
nuna meng _ , _ nunaagh mun _ atightullegh
kiyang _ ramke m _ ila yan _ taghnughhagh teng _ atightugh aqe ait _ pennagh m _ , _ nuna m _ , _ saam _ tekeghagh m _ ategh aneng _ .
katam _ â _ qule iqe aq _ â _ taana _ nunaleg m _ legan _ atigh te nayagh kanga _ .
nalighmeng _ taghnughhagh t _ tawani _ allgeghvig itneng _ atigh nayagh kangat _ nalighmeng _ aviighute vig aneng _ nuna meng _ .
taagken _ nalighmeng _ llivegh vig aneng _ , _ qungughvig aneng _ .
ategh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ piitesighagh at
aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ ategh _ nagaqugh aqeg kefut _ , _ qawaag m _ ategh a _ , _ teghig ke sagh m _ ategh a _ saam llu _ piitesighagh m _ , _ ategh leg _ tamaaken llu _ uglagh uq _ .
akuzillegh meng _ atigh llegh
kiyaghte luteng _ sa meng _ pituqagh t _ .
yuug _ taana _ sa meng _ pitu kan _ , _ taana _ akuzillegh a _ taghnughhagh m unnguq _ atigh te yagh ghngaaghmi _ .
amalka _ yuug _ , _ M ukaq _ , _ kiyaghte luni _ pituqagh _ , _ â _ K gu ug g _ ! _ â
At iiq saq megteggu _ , _ taghnughhagh _ â _ K gu ug g meng _ â _ ( _ â _ K gu ug g _ â _ ) _ ata iigh aat _ .
sa mun _ elqughaghte tekagh mun _ atigh llegh
aghnagh _ aqsaleg _ sa llegh mun _ elqughute kan _ legan _ taana _ atigh te ma ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ qavangugh llegh _ , _ esghaghwaagh llegh _ .
amalka _ yugwem _ unaghsigh m _ qaayghu a _ mak reg saqminigu _ , _ qaayghu m _ asing an iteftuq _ yungllaghkagh ghhagh _ .
enkaam _ taana _ atigh te ma kanga _ â _ Mak reg tekaq _ â _ .
allangughte na luteng _ atiiqe i llegh
taagani _ agha _ , _ aghaligh vig _ aviite luku _ , _ taghnughhagh nge nghmeng _ aghtugh lghiit _ , _ natete nghata llu _ qinuyugtu nghata _ , _ qiyatu nghata _ , _ alla _ atigh nqigte aqe kangit _ ategh lgu ghngaita _ alla neng _ .
amalka _ taana _ , _ tuumte i _ , _ alla _ atigh ma kangat _ qiyatu ta aneng _ , _ seghlegh meng _ .
megh mi _ aviigh tke aat
kiyang _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ megh mi _ yugwet _ peleghqekagh t _ atiiqe aqe ait _ aghnagh ghhagh u luki _ .
ategh t _ tan- kestagh u aghte yaghkagh t llu _ alla tun llu _ ata iqe aat
kiyang _ ategh t _ yeghrat _ taake ghllag lghiit _ takelli luki _ ate liit kay ugw iit _ .
amalka _ Mak im ing aawen _ , _ taake yagute luku _ makigh meng _ tuqlughagh ta m _ qenwat _ ateligh te a _ taana _ ategh _ , _ mat- ke i _ .
taghnughhagh t llu _ salin _ akuzi yaaghte gpenateng _ atigh llegh it _ ila ita _ ramke m _ nagnegh taq egkangit _ tawaten _ .
katam _ S aap ugh a _ ategh _ .
taghnughhagh m _ atigh llegh a _ â _ P uug wa _ , _ â _ ateligh tke a _ .
naqamllu _ ayghigh te aqe kangit _ .
pi nga yu a
ayumigh m _ ungipaghagh ta i
Ay ng aghl ing aaw et enkuk _ , _ Q ilak agh iil aankuk
puughhute m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ taake uk nguq _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ ilugh aqut alghiik _ .
K ugw el est aghhiin aak _ , _ yaywaalingiighhagh at _ .
ategh ik _ Ay ng aghl ing aaw et enkuk _ , _ Q ilak agh iil aankuk _ .
Ay ng aghl ing aawen _ taana _ nate t alghii _ , _ nallagh u lghii _ , _ igh san itagh algh i _ .
ilughagh ghhagh a _ Q ilak agh iil aq _ nekegg met alghii _ , _ aatkagh kegte aq _ , _ pinitun _ kiyaghte aagh _ kaki ghllag _ quunpeng _ .
taana _ Ay ng aghl ing aawen _ it ghiigh naq eghllak _ , _ an Ê¼g igh naq eghllak _ sa gpenani _ .
alla _ tawaten _ kaki ma luku _ Q ilak agh iil aq _ , _ kuug g Ê¼gh aa _ ugh luv ghw aang ll aamalghii _ .
iiwen _ taaqe yaghtugh luku _ ugh sagh tu utkelluku _ qineghte yaghtugh ma lghii _ , _ taana _ ugh luv gh waaghh ani _ nap aghluku _ mingle kun _ .
aga _ aane magh an _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ naten _ tekegh ni _ pe t gegh ll aataq uluku _ , _ ten- ke i vike luku _ ugh luv gh waagh a _ ayemkagh ma kanga _ .
alingruugh ma lghii _ , _ itegh kuni _ aghyuugh nayuk ang atni _ , _ ughneg mi _ asi anun _ iigh ma kanga _ .
itegh luni _ kuug g Ê¼gh aan _ ivagh ma kanga _ ughluvegh ni _ , _ â _ naagu _ ughluvegh u aqa _ whaan s alghii _ navek _ pi zigu _ ? _ â
amenam _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ ivagh sighwaagh aa _ el ng anllu _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sagiqe te luku _ ivagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
qenwat _ ugh n egg aa _ ik igh aghluku _ piyaqminigu _ whaa _ ayem ngwaagh luni _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nutaan _ qefliqe uq _ elngaatall _ pi igate yagh lghii _ .
N ayag g ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan _ aksaqe zigu _ ayem lluku _ ? _ â
taagken _ ayeme llegh aneng _ yaakestaaghhagh an _ anag ma yagh kanga _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ uniigh miqe luni _ qiyaaghwagh ma lghii _ .
nutaan _ kuug g Ê¼gh aan _ tawaten _ pi kanga _ .
aghnagh aq _ kagpag luni _ nengagh ma lghii _ aane luni _ navek _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ , _ iiwen _ aghtaghagh aqe a _ inga _ sa u aat _ iime negh m _ ilu ani _ esghagh ai _ .
kaate luki _ piyaqminiki _ iim q aghneghem _ ilu ani _ kam ul ugw algh un _ ukaagh igh ke ghllag ke aat _ .
aqume luni _ aqeftaghaagh ghhagh ni _ nusug luku _ am sigh qu ugh tegh umakangi _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ .
taaqe luki _ negh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ saaghw itni _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ m ev lu ug tet _ nagate ai _ , _ piiq unnguq _ whaa _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aghh aqs a _ una _ n angleg t apig ta _ .
elngaatall _ taghtughsagh qu na an _ meghnaali li _ . _ â
nepiigh yata _ aqume yalghiimi _ aviite ut _ , _ kameg t llu _ taakut _ aviite ut _ .
taagken _ igleghte laatagh uq _ esghagh laatagh ai _ sa u aat _ , _ enraq _ naayvagh m _ esne ani _ .
piyaqminiki _ kii _ iqallug lghute _ , _ afta llghite ngughk _ qenwat _ asi liit _ unegh ii aghte luteng _ .
aqume luni _ af tal agh tegh umakangi _ agaghte aqe luki _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ .
taaqe luki _ negh luni _ qavagh laatagh uq _ .
tawaten _ me m _ taghtugh taqegkanga _ , _ pi aqe kangat _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ una _ igamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ nangllegtagh pigte a _ . _ â
nepiigh nghata _ aqume nghmini _ paaghqite te luni _ .
aqume luni _ igleghte laatagh uq _ .
mangteghagh t _ inga _ esghagh ai _ , _ tazingavek _ aglagh uq _ .
kaate luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh ghhagh _ qama _ nategh mi _ qep ghii lug taq eftuq _ elngaatall _ .
aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ upugh tke a _ , _ aapte a _ , _ â _ kaay _ , _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
uniighyug lunga _ ne mneng _ ukavek _ aghulaqe unga _ .
wasi _ kuug g Ê¼ ghagh ma _ sa aghte aqe aanga _ ugh luv gh waagh mineng _ qivghu vike lunga _ anagu kanganga _ , _ tekegh mneng _ petgegh vike luku _ ayem sam kun _ .
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ naqam _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ tunugh _ tuune a _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ pugnegh iigh i _ elngaatall _ .
iigge ten _ alqimagh yaqunaki _ , _ legan _ al qim agh te qu f ki _ pugnegh n _ mekelli lleqe an _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ pugnegh iigh uq _ peghqigh kau lghii _ legan _ kukriqe nghite uq _ .
iigge ni _ alqime yukagh gpenaki _ taaqe a _ .
taagken _ taaqe yagu _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ I ing kunun _ aglagh te gu _ , _ wataghllak _ qiigh negh ke i i sqe kangaten _ qineghte yaqunang _ pi lghaaten _ .
nategh mi _ utaqa i lghaaten _ .
legan _ kanagh luku _ aqu pi leghn aghq egh ngaata _ wata _ qineghte yaqunang _ . _ â
awaligh i uq _ sagnegh pag ek _ pugnegh meng _ ulevaghaghte lukek _ .
itegh yan _ qamaken _ aagra neng _ upughasagh aat _ legan _ itegh sqe magh an _ , _ aghnagh aq _ legan _ ighsa u aghte uq _ .
kii _ , _ leg annguq _ qama _ lengaaghtu te _ sagnegh k _ piyaqmegtekek _ .
taaqe lukek _ qama _ kete t _ ikighte luki _ piyaqminikek _ sagnegh ghllag k _ sungagh meng _ allaagh iin aghmeng _ imigh ghllag lutek _ .
aghnaghagh m _ tugu lukek _ aane uq _ .
taagken _ itghute yakek _ aghnagh m _ tuune laatagh aa _ enraq _ ivalu lghute meng _ .
â _ ang _ , _ piighhe ki _ nuvagte yukagh gpenaki _ qamagte luki _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ temngi _ kiyagh s ugw igalnguq _ legan _ aqume luni _ tallu luki _ piighhe ai _ nuvagte yukagh gpenaki _ taaqe a _ piighhagh ghrug ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ taaqe yagu _ sagnegh k _ sungagh ghllag meng _ imaleg k _ taake uk _ tuune ak _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ taagken _ nuvugh a _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ legan _ teghigniqe uq _ nuvugh uq _ , _ nuvugh aa _ uy aq ughh mi k _ , _ qukaghute kaghqagh _ , _ qenleghwaaghqagh _ , _ tangyeghute _ , _ tukughte te _ iwerngaqun _ sungagh ghllag _ qamagte a _ qiipi aghte te gpenani _ .
taaqe yaki _ aghnagh m _ aates qugh w ii _ ellnga nun _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ allakagh ghhagh gpek _ tesqamani _ ungavig ni _ qavagh ghhaaten _ legan _ egtug yug gpenang _ qavagh ghhaaten _ saam _ pi naanghite aaten _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ itegh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ elpeg ke aghte yalghiimi _ meng egh aa llghiit _ llangaqa nguq _ n api t _ katelghaate lghiit _ ama _ nagate ai _ .
Piiq unnguq _ â _ kii _ , _ sa u a _ nangllegtagh ghllag _ ukavek _ kaate ma uq _ .
legan _ kameg lghute put _ k iingh waagh luteng _ am sigh qugh waagh luteng _ , _ iqallug lghute put _ af tal agh waagh luteng _ . _ â
legan _ elpeg ke aghte luni _ qavagh laatagh uq _ .
qavaa ma luku _ aghnagh m _ teghtugh a _ .
â _ aghnagh aq _ aamyuq _ aqume i ngam _ , _ tea- ai _ ketfagh a _ . _ â
makete qaghte luni _ ungavig mineng _ aane yalghiimi _ aghnagh m _ yataaghq ut ngwaagh luku _ .
legan _ aghnagh aq _ neqiinagh uq _ .
taaqe yan _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ yataaghqe i _ atghagh a ngam _ .
aane gkuvek _ tamaa na _ esghagh kan _ alike gpenaan _ pi naagh an _ , _ legan _ atghagh ghhaaten _ ne gpenun _ qiive yaqunang _ q ugw in ayug ngaagh pek _ uteghmun _ , _ legan _ avelghaqiinagh luki _ iglegh llegh aaten _ .
iwerngaqun _ legan _ kaate yaghtugh kuvek _ anengagh ghhagh n _ tuqlugh w aghn aken _ .
pi naken _ whaten _ , _ â _ taawa _ anguyagkagh meng _ tagite amken _ â _ .
Ugw ik aghq agh pek _ taku naagh aaten _ alinge gpenang _ atghagh a _ . _ â
taagken _ me atun _ aane yalghiimi _ uvite mi _ tamaa _ kayng ev aghq u _ ila i _ qavaa te t _ .
legan _ atghagh uq _ me atun _ alinge aghte gpenani _ .
pama _ legan _ saam _ malighqagh aa _ tun utanganeng _ kavlegtu te _ , _ siinge aqe luku _ .
legan _ aghnagh m _ pillgha _ neqamike luku _ kakave gpenani _ atghagh uq _ .
qemi meng _ agigte luni _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ tuqlughagh aa _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ taawa _ anguyagkagh meng _ elngaatall _ tagite amken _ . _ â
kii _ , _ uka nguq _ yug lghute _ ketanqu te ghllag _ ellnga nun _ , _ pana meng _ , _ pi teg segh ameng _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ .
uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ uka _ kayng egh lag em _ malighqagh aqe a _ .
kaate luteng _ pi teg saq megteggu _ kaynge ghllag _ tuqute aat _ .
ullegh aghte luni _ , _ kii aneng _ yuug _ nukalpigagh _ aane yalghiimi _ nang agh al qeg llak _ , _ yuukegte ghllag _ , _ iknaqe ghllag _ .
uka _ aghnaghagh mun _ tagi uq _ .
taawa _ taan an uftuq _ ugw ik aghq aa _ .
Q ilak agh iil aq _ ugw iiq aghtuq _ .
yuug _ neqengyu ghllag _ , _ aghvenge yu ghllag _ tawani _ kiyaghte ut _ kug w egh mini _ .
aga _ navek _ pi nghata _ mughute nghata _ ilughagh ghhagh n _ Ay ng aghl ing aaw ete m _ itegh vike aqe kanga _ .
siqni ghllag _ ellnga llu _ ugw iigh yug llak _ pi nigh ghllag meng _ .
Aap qugh waagh aqegkanga _ naten _ naqamalla _ ugw iigh um atanga _ .
qenwat _ Q ilak agh iil aam _ ungipamsug te ma kanga _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Im atugh ngam _ ugw iill emtun _ ugw iigh lleq sin _ ighsanitagh lghiiten _ .
talwa _ kaki igate ngugh u te n _ .
waran _ pii llgh aghten _ amsighqe igate keten _ .
Nal qig angil ngu uten _ . _ â
amenam _ aglagh luni _ , _ iitqiinagh luni _ anengagh ghhagh ni _ qinuyug a _ ugh luv gh aang ll iisqelluku _ , _ weni _ qinuyug a _ .
qenwat _ anengagh ghhagh n _ mengilegyagute luku _ amenam _ yataaghqe te uq _ .
â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ wasagh ii te _ taana _ ata ma _ ulimaagh a _ sa llghite ngughk _ salin _ . _ â
pi msiigh luku _ pegte a _ .
aghnaghagh m _ qinuyug a _ enraq _ qineghte yaghtigh sqe a _ .
qenwat _ aga _ aane uq _ .
kingu aneng _ tekegh ni _ petgegh naqutke a _ petgeghsagh nghminigu _ anagte luku _ qenwat _ itegh yaghtugh uq _ .
U p uu peng _ aghtugh yamigu _ tugu luku _ ketngig luku _ ayemte a _ enraq llu _ ayem lluku _ ughneg llegagh mi _ asi anun _ iigh aa _ .
iigh luku _ kaki sighwaagh uq _ .
anengagh ghhagh a _ itegh luni _ ne mikun _ aqume uq _ .
W aa ken ghit aa _ ughluvegh ngllaghkagh ni _ .
qenwat _ Ay ng aghl ing aaw ete m _ pi a _ , _ â _ enta _ ughluvegh n _ ivagh ghhu _ ukani llu _ ughneg ma _ asi ani _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ tagivagh ghhu _ liisima kan _ . _ â
â _ enta _ nekeve luten _ ivagh ghhu _ . _ â
qenwat _ nekeve luni _ ivagh aa _ ughneg llegagh a _ ikighte luku _ tug waa _ ayeme luni _ .
â _ una _ aghnagh aq _ .
Ay em m naluku _ ulim ates qugh waagh singa _ awii _ , _ sa u luku _ . _ â
egte naqe yagh aa _ , _ aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ enta _ qivghuke gu _ , _ anagu nga _ . _ â
â _ sangan _ s apig llegh iistun _ ulim ates qugh waagh lunga _ ayemte an _ , _ enraq llu _ anag us qe sin _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ anagu nga _ . _ â
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ yaakestaaghhagh an _ aagute lugh aa _ temngi _ .
qiya ghllag uq _ aqnigh magh mi _ .
kagpag ragkiigh luni _ aga _ aane uq _ nengagh uq _ .
iitek _ pi yagh aa _ kuug g Ê¼gh aan _ .
aane luni _ taakwagun _ Q ilak agh iil aam _ apegh llegh akun _ igleghte uq _ .
igleghte ghngaaghmi _ kameg lghute _ kaate a _ nuna m _ iim qagh llegh ani _ lli luteng _ aghipa ghllag t _ , _ piig aqe luteng _ , _ naatghigh qugh te aqe luteng _ .
aqume luni _ esghapag g iinaq _ qinuyagute ai _ .
sivughtu msiigh luki _ , _ am sigh qu v yiigh luki _ taaqe gpenaki _ pegte aqe luki _ wata _ naafqe ai _ .
naafqe ghllag luki _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ elpeg ke yalghiimi _ meng egh aa llghiit _ .
â _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ una _ qepgh all aag me tuq _ .
ima _ kameg put _ wata _ naafqe ma ai _ . _ â _ nepiigh yata _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
aqume luni _ igleghte uq _ .
inga _ sa u aat _ esghagh ai _ , _ piyaqminiki _ iqallug lghute _ afta ma ite ngugh t _ ila i _ asi liit _ unegh ii aghte luteng _ repall _ .
kaate luni _ sivuke luni _ unegh ii aghtekagh meng _ negh ughtagh u uq _ .
taaqe luni _ afta vyiigh luki _ qinuyagute luki _ mingughhu te ghllag naqe yamiki _ taaqe ai _ .
Qav aam algh i _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ akuzite ghllag t _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ nalqigangite uq _ elngaatall _ naqam _ naang teghllag um ii _ iqallug put _ . _ â
nepiigh yata _ aghnagh aq _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ .
mangteghagh t _ aliigh luki _ kaate ai _ , _ kaate luni _ mangteghagh mun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh _ qama _ qepghagh aqe uq _ nategh mi _ .
aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi a _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ kina u ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ Ay ng aghl ing aaw et nguunga _ , _ nengagh u unga _ qayughllak _ kug w egh ma _ anag ul eghy anga _ ukavek _ nengagh unga _ .
tekegh mneng _ ughluvegh a _ ayemtegkegka _ . _ â
â _ naqam _ itegh luteng _ una _ tunugh _ kagim lluku _ pugnegh iigh ghhu _ . _ â
amenam _ iitqiinagh luni _ tunugh _ kagimte a _ .
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ iigge ten _ alqimagh yaqunaki _ pugnegh n _ mekelli i aghagh lleqe uq _ . _ â
amenam _ kelenga aghte yagh luni _ iigge ni _ alqimagh qiinagh aqe luki _ legan _ akuute a _ .
Taaq saqminigu _ pugnegh squghhagh _ sagnegh pagem _ qukagh ghhagh ani _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aatak _ iing kunun _ awaligh i _ .
kepsugh te u naanghite uq _ , _ legan _ itegh kuvek _ upugha lleqe aaten _ , _ iitgh esqugh waagh lleqaaten _ aagra nun _ .
wataghllak _ avelghaqiinagh naagh aten _ .
wata _ talwa _ qineghte yaqunang _ .
legan _ pugnegh n _ kanaghte luku _ utaqa i lghaaten _ . _ â
amenam _ aghnaghagh m _ pugnegh llegagh ni _ aglagh te a _ .
itghute a _ legan _ aqu pi leghn aghhaghmeng _ upugh as aq megteggu _ , _ itegh sqe aat _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ .
I iteg iiguq _ pugnegh ni _ kanaghte luku _ igh sam ll eg agh yaghtuq _ , _ enraq _ legan _ upugh as aq megteggu _ , _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ .
qenwat _ q iin ghagh salghiimi _ mamleg ghllag _ paaghq ilnguq _ .
naqam _ siv ugw agh salghiimi _ qama _ legan _ uglagh ghllag t _ sagnegh kek _ kavlegtu te _ .
maateqwaaqun _ whaa _ sagnegh kek _ nuugte ta gket _ .
S ung aghp ak _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ sagnegh an _ qukaa ni _ .
tagi luni _ itegh uq _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ivalu meng _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ piighhagh ngllagh a _ .
nuvagte yukagh gpenaan _ mekegragh yukagh gpenaan _ . _ â
amenam _ Ay ng aghl ing aawen _ aqume luni _ tallu luku _ ivalu ni _ piighhe a _ nuvagragh qaghaqe luku _ .
Taaq saqminigu _ piighhagh squghhagh _ tan- leg ngestagh ghhagh _ .
aghnagh m _ sagnegh k _ tuune ak _ .
â _ ang _ , _ nuvugh a _ sungagh meng _ . _ â
tugu luku _ sung aghp ak _ nuuve te a _ qiipagh mikun _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ellnga nun _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taamani _ ayagyu ni _ qavagh ghhaaten _ .
legan _ alinge gpenang _ , _ egtug yug gpenang _ saam _ pi naanghite aaten _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ ivgagh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ taghtugh aat _ .
ama nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ â _ kii _ sa u a _ ukavek _ kaate ma a _ elngaatall _ nall ek aghn ilnguq _ , _ pik r aghn iilnguq _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii _ , _ nal qig angilnguq _ .
ama nguq _ aghnagh m _ pi aqe ai _ , _ â _ kaa _ kaa _ , _ ama _ qavaa uq _ . _ â
tawaten _ qavaa ma luku _ aghnagh m _ ama _ tuqlugh aa _ , _ â _ Ay ng aghl ing aawen _ qakun _ taghtugh naqe ziin _ ?
aqume luten _ tea- ai _ . _ â
aqume qaghte luni _ ivgagh yalghiimi _ aghnagh m _ yataaghq ut ngwaagh luku _ .
â _ enta _ negh l ut en ngam _ aglagh a _ ne gpenun _ . _ â
taaqe yan _ aghnagh m _ yataaghqellug qu _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ aane luteng _ aglagh a _ ne gpenun _ .
wataghllak _ alinge gpenang _ aane gkuvek _ pi lghaaten _ .
legan _ aglagh ghhaaten _ uteghmun _ qiive yaqunang _ saam _ maligte ghngaaten _ .
siinge ghngaaten _ avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ igleghte lghaaten _ . _ â
aane yalghiimi _ tamaa _ kaynge ghllag u uq _ elngaatall _ .
esghagh luki _ tamaakut _ ila i _ nekevgha lghiit _ q ugw in ayuk ii _ elngaatall _ .
enraq _ aghnagh m _ alinge snanigh kanga _ .
aghtugh uq _ nuqete nghmeng _ .
alinge uq _ , _ uuvganeng _ aragh magh mi _ ketanqusnaq _ qimag uq _ .
legan _ kingu aneng _ uka _ saam _ malighqagh aa _ , _ qe tegh qelluni _ anagniigh uq _ .
araghaatagh magh mi _ leg annguq _ tak lagh mi _ tekite nghmini _ .
A aghh waa rag kiigh umaghmi _ nekefqaghte luni _ anagniigh aqe lghii _ .
qemi meng _ ag igagh teqagh sami _ , _ araghaatagh ghllag ma lghii _ .
K ugw eni _ tuqlugh w aghllag umaan _ elngaatall _ , _ â _ taawa _ anguyagkagh _ . _ â
uka nguq _ legan _ pi teg segh alget _ yugwet _ , _ pana leg t _ ketanqusnaq _ ellnga nun _ uka _ .
uteghmun _ qiive nghmini _ uka _ kaynge ghllag m _ malighqagh aqe kanga _ .
Yugw et _ kaate luku _ pitegte aat _ , _ aga _ tuqu luni _ ullegh yan _ kii aneng _ nanevgagh llegagh ghhagh _ aane uq _ .
uka _ tagi uq _ Ay ng aghl ing aaw et mun _ , _ kaate yan _ tawatete ghngaan _ atghagh te a _ ne minun _ , _ ugw ik aa _ .
Ay ng aghl ing aawen _ ighsani ta ghhagh u te mineng _ tawate t aghh aagh ngaan _ nanevgagh llegagh ghhagh meng _ ugw iigh tuq _ ima _ .
tefaay _ naange uq _ .
aliigh neghsigh sigh _ Y ag esgu
aasa m _ ungipagh aa
sa u a nguq _ taana _ aghnagh _ , _ wallu _ yuwh aawa _ , _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Y eq ay tuq _ aliigh neghsigh kegka _ . _ â
legan _ aklu aghte gpenani _ whaa _ aanqute i yalghiimi _ :
â _ Y ag es guu uu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Y ag es guu uu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Aap aa _ yagesgu _ , _ aap aa _ yagesgu _ ,
Ghh ughh ughh iiy a _ . _ â
Legannguq _ nepiigh uq _ aliigh yaqminigu _ .
Tawaten nguq _ kiyaghte ma luku _ , _ nak ennguq _ akuzi ghllaget _ nagaqugh ai _ .
tamaani _ esghaqu yalghiimi _ avangite uq _ .
pagavek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ , _ angy annguq _ paga _ .
tespagavek nguq _ esghapag ai _ elngaatall _ .
imani nguq _ , _ â _ sivuyagta _ uugyuq _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ â
Llaagh annguq _ legan _ sivuyag tem _ elqiigh ni _ aga _ ateghte luku _ , _ uka _ ukig uq _ , _ ukig uq _ , _ tuute yan _ tazingavek _ taku a _ .
piyaqminigu _ pinighhalek _ .
tugu luku _ legan _ taaggun _ aate ste vig akun _ talligh mig ma kanga _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ .
iiwen _ uyavaghqagh ughte uq _ , _ eslallugughte ghllag ma kanga _ .
M aat ennguq _ aatkagh i _ k iingh waaq aay alghiit _ , _ whaa _ eslallug ugh teghllag yaqminigu _ aghitqe ghllag luni _ .
Legannguq _ taakwna _ suumqagh u te aqe kanga _ aliigh neghsigh sigh _ .
â _ Y ag es guu uu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Y ag es guu uu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Aap aa _ yagesgu _ , _ aap aa _ yagesgu _ ,
Ghh ughh ughh iiy a _ . _ â
Leg an qun nguq _ aliigh laatagh yaqminigu _ , _ aghvaghllug ghllag _ siqi neghllug ghllag _ .
legan _ aatkagh i _ kinegh laatagh ai _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh tun _ akuzite ghllag t _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ angyagh t _ .
pi ma kanga _ angy alligh tem _ , _ â _ qukaghte qugh a _ uugyuq _ , _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ â
legan _ elqiigh ni _ mat- aghte luku _ ifkagh li aataghaa _ .
uka _ ukig laatagh uq _ , _ ukig laatagh uq _ , _ taz ing agun _ tekite laatagh uq _ .
tazingavek _ taku a _ .
piyaqminigu _ maateghniineng _ pinighatagh aq _ , _ up- ke na nga _ qelmegh ghllag _ .
legan _ tugu nghminiki _ aate aqe kangi _ talligh mikun _ .
taawa _ igleghte laatagh uq _ , _ ne mineng _ uyavagh ghllag uq _ .
Legannguq _ pal aghhaghmeng _ kiyaghte uq _ , _ eslallug _ kaate laatagh uq _ , _ maateghniineng _ elngaatall _ yaagtu ghllag _ eslallug _ .
Legannguq _ suumqagh u te aqe kanga _ aliigh neghsigh sigh _ ,
â _ Y ag es g ii uu u _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Y ag es guu uu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Aap aa yagesgu _ , _ aap aa _ yagesgu _ ,
Ghh ughh ughh iy a _ . _ â
Legannguq _ aliigh aghll aatagh yaqminigu _ siq inegh l uuk _ , _ maaten _ sivuligh meng _ aagken _ elngaatall _ siqinegh _ uguqnagh aghagh luni _ .
elngaatall _ k iingh waa ghii _ aatkagh i _ whaa _ legan _ .
Legannguq _ pi laatagh uq _ meraaghinagh _ naken _ .
Siv uyag tem nguq _ taag w um _ angy alligh teni _ pi a _ , _ â _ angyalligh a _ kiiwyuq _ elpek llu _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ â
Angy alligh tem nguq _ pike ta mikun _ taaggun _ ateghte ma kanga _ , _ aga _ ifkagh uq _ .
A ay _ , _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ uka _ ukig yalghiimi _ elqiigh _ .
elngaatall _ utaqa laatagh aa _ uukna _ uki lghii _ .
uka _ ukig uq _ , _ ukig uq _ , _ tekite yan _ tazingavek _ piyaqminigu _ , _ pinighatagh aq _ elqiigh _ elngaatall _ .
satuqagh _ qughalkutaghtuqagh _ elngaatall _ .
Pinigh atagh aq _ taa kugneng _ maaten _ , _ legan _ tugu luku _ talligh mig laatagh aa _ .
talligh mig luki _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ aglagh yagh kuma _ esgha _ ne mnun _ . _ â
legan _ taakut _ qerngagh ita _ tugumiiqe luki _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ .
entaqun _ unuk _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ , _ aag llegh ani _ whan ikum aan _ kaa tuq _ ne minun _ .
eslallugughte na nigh ke aq _ , _ quunpeng _ aligh u iqe aq _ elngaatall _ .
allameng _ eslallugughte gpenani _ ne minun _ kaate tke aq _ .
aneghrengi ghllag _ elqiigh neng _ .
tefaay _ !
iiyagh ghhagh inagh leg
El q iil aam _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh nkuk nguq _ taake uk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ nenglu mi _ kiyaghte aaghek _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane igate ngughk _ sa luni _ aane li _ aatkagh ite ngughk _ .
Quun pe nguq _ aghn elqusiq _ atku whani _ aate luku _ maghuyugte luni _ kiyagh taagh aqelghii _ .
M agh u yug taagh neng _ sivugte nghmini _ iiyagh ni _ taana nguq _ aghulate luku _ taawa _ almesimitun _ nekegte aqe lghii _ tawaten _ .
quunpeng _ tawaten _ kiyaghte aagh _ elngaatall _ .
sangan _ naqam _ iiyagh ni _ qelpeghte aqe agu _ .
alla nguq _ tawaten _ , _ umiil elgu unnguq _ , _ maalghug _ umiilg egket _ aag llegh a _ aklung ilnguq _ , _ aag llegh a _ ak lu umalghii _ .
Angyagh uun naq ennguq _ upenghagh mi _ , _ ellnga llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qakiqniqe ma lghii _ .
qaywa nguq _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ighleke yagh aa _ , _ â _ sa meng _ aate luten _ angyagh naqe ziin _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ , _ â _ aatkagh ten _ tagivagh ki _ aate naqe anka _ . _ â
Legannguq _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ aatkagh ghhagh i _ aate luki _ me akun _ taaggun _ aane ma lghii _ .
tawavek _ iq uk lighpig aghnun _ esnevagh ma lghii _ , _ yaywaalingiighhagh _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ ? _ â
â _ weni nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ nenglu m _ yugkwaagh a _ uyuq _ . _ â
siinge luku nguq _ aga nguq _ kete aqe ut
Tuunglighh itnun _ tawavek _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ ?
enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ . _ â
weniqruk nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg _ .
Legannguq _ aga _ unite aqe aat
umiileg ghllag mun _ tawavek _ kaate ma lghii _ , _ aklung ilngugh mun _ .
kaate luni nguq _ pi a _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ , _ enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ ! _ â
Legannguq _ yugwem _ taawa _ pi a _ , _ â _ I - ii _ sivuyag tek aghq agh lluwh aq _ !
elpek _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luten _ qalleg vag luten _ weni nguq _ sivuyagtekete lleqe amken _ . _ â
legan _ mil uus aq min igu nguq _ kelute mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ .
taakwna _ angyagh _ tawaten _ qamagte a _ .
iwerngaqun _ iquklighpigagh at _ tazinga _ , _ umiileg m _ aag llegh a _ aghnagh aper ug waaghmeng _ panike lghii _ .
Aghnagh aper ug waaghmeng _ yuk luni _ kete aqe lghii _ .
tawavek _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ , _ enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ angyagh naqe lghiiten _ .
taawa _ yuk naqamken _ , _ sivuyag tek naqamken _ . _ â
kete i aqe ut _ qaake luku _ , _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ .
taana _ aklung ilnguq _ aghveng yugh l ak _ .
Iiw ennguq _ ketf aghq aagh aqut _ kaay _ , _ aghvegh m _ p uug yaq min ik inguq _ legan _ tuune luni _ .
legan _ yaywaali ngiighhagh m _ aghv eq saq min igu nguq _ tuqun neqeg sagh luku _ .
aawallu nguq _ taana _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ umiileg _ aghvenge aghte uq _ .
ii _ , _ angyagh m _ qetgegh te ma kangi _ elngaatall _ .
Iiw ennguq _ kaalguutagh t _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ legan _ paag ken nguq _ anuqe _ atghaghsagh lghii mi _ uka _ legan _ eftugh tun _ , _ kii _ anuq ligh llag yaqminigu _ .
â _ aa _ , _ sa u luku mi _ taana _ yuk ll aat aam az igu _ .
leganqun qun _ tuqu laghate naqe ukut _ whaa _ megh mi _ seghlegh mi _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ an algh uv ag teggun _ tugu laghate luni _ angyagh _ .
paagken _ anuq ligh llag yaqminigu _ legan _ elngaatall _ pi kay uwh aq _ sak ay uwh aq _ tamaa na _ nagh p agh si qay uwh aq _ qamaggute uq _ , _ aghtugh aat
Mekelghiighh agh nguq _ taana _ maamtawha _ pi uq _ , _ â _ Il eng tuq _ ima _ . _ â
naligh ita _ nagaqugh qagh laatagh luku _ .
â _ aa _ , _ uum nguq _ pi ligu _ , _ uum nguq _ pi ligu _ ! _ â
Taam nguq _ aklung il nguum _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ pi ligu _ ellng an pi lleqaa _ whaa _ amsanagh ste lleqe a _ pikayug waaghh aat _ maakut _ mataawi te aat _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qep uugh yalghii mi nguq _ .
Qal iv lugw aghh aghq ek _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ atuqe lukek _ .
Qep uugh waagh luni _ tayeghqagh luni nguq _ ayapegh aatagh ghhaak _ aate lukek _ aanqute i ma lghii _ talligh ghhagh ani _ qule mun _ ayuqe luku _ aghulate magh an _ ,
â _ A - nuq - li - ii _ , _ n a- ng e- llu - gu -ng u _ ,
S i- l a- mi - ngi _ , _ u- k i- i- nang e- llu - gu -ng u _ ,
A - i- y a- i- y a- nga _ , _ y a- i- y a- i- y i- y a _ , _ i- y a- iy i- y a- nga _ ,
Sil am it _ uk in aghn ing it _ aghn it _ pay ugh a _ ,
U q - ugh - taq _ , _ uq - ugh - taq _ . _ â
megh _ pateg ma kanga _ inglu aneng _ - - _ â _ uqughte aq _ ! _ â _ - - _ maalghug gneng _ .
M aate qwaaq unnguq _ legan _ kaay _ qilag a _ kaagkagh a _ piikna nguq _ ukite aghte luku _ legan _ ukig tegh ii yaqminigu _ .
A ay _ , _ amsanaghkwaagh lug ni _ naagu nguq _ maaten _ anuq ll igh llak _ .
qateghllug ghllag nguq _ taglagh ma lghiit _ aghvenge luteng _ taakut _ .
Taam _ umiileg m _ taana _ umiileg _ aklung ilnguq _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ qayugham _ esghaghhu _ yaywaali t _ esghapag te leg llaget _ yaywaali m llu _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg m _ yakugh ke a _ . _ â
taana nguq _ qall em suwh aq _ qemall _ umiileg _ .
taawa _ taglagh ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ aghvenge luteng _ .
impite igate kanga _ yugwem _ taam _ aghv engu qam _ , _ avelghagh qumtaagh an _ impite igate kanga _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ impite qugh ma kanga _ .
Apeghiigh lu te nguq _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ ighsa nga kete te _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ ifkaghte luku _ atghagh te luku _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ aatk angllagh yaq meg teg gu nguq _ mekelghiigh _ pinighhalek _ .
taana _ uyuqligh _ panig ni _ aga _ nuligh qes teng ngin aam aan _ .
taawa nguq _ aghveng yu ghigh llagtuq _ taana _ aghveng y ii tep aaghr uk _ yuug _ .
mekelghiigh perewaagh meng _ avaqutagh ligh luni _ .
taawa _ naange uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag nkuk _ anipaghllag nkuk
Iteghyagh aam _ anagutagh mete te _ neghigh luku _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ me teghll ugwet _ , _ anipa t _ qateg perewaagh u yagh lghiit _ .
anipa nkuk _ me teghll ugw enkuk _ piniqe te pigte yagh lghiik _ , _ quunpeng _ qerng aghme taq elghiik _ .
tawaten _ kiyagh tegh ng aagmek _ anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ igaq ragh waagh u tel tung _ , _ pinighnaghsagh te ltung _ . _ â
â _ A -aa _ ! _ â _ meteghllug ghllag m _ ang ghagh simakanga _ .
â _ elpek _ sivuke laken _ . _ â
anipa ghrug _ angegh ma lghii _ .
Ig aasi taq _ ketfagh ma ka ak _ si lug k aaghh agh mengllu _ .
Ig aasi taq _ taana _ nanigh m _ ellngagh ta aneng _ , _ qulmesiite m _ puyugh aneng _ akuutekagh meng _ imaleg _ tagnegh pigte lghii meng _ .
anipaghllag nguq _ aghuliigh waagh luni _ igagh te simalghii _ , _ repall nguq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
meteghllug ghllag m nguq _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ elngaatall _ igaqragh ma kanga _ .
taaqe luku _ taghtugh simakanga _ .
An ip agh r ugwem _ taghneghagh ni _ meghaagh ghhagh mi _ esghagh yaqminigu _ imani nguq _ pinigh uq _ .
Taag ken nguq _ ima _ anipa t _ igagh rak gu ugh tekaa ftut _ .
anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ â _ heng _ , _ el peg ngam _ . _ â
â _ A -aa _ â _ , _ meteghllug _ ang gh umalghii _ .
anipa m _ silug _ ig aasi tam un _ nepte luku _ meteghllug _ agtugh kau ma yagh kanga _ aga nguq _ nalug kau te uq _ qalghigh kau magh mi _ , _ â _ Q ung _ ! _ â
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ aghula i luten _ seghletun _ pi ste lleqe te ni _ â _ amawha nguq _ agtugh qagh nghatni _ tamaani _ nal uum si tuq _ qalghigh magh mi _ , _ â _ Q ung _ , _ q ung _ , _ q ung _ ! _ â
anipaghllag m nguq _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ aghula igh te luten _ qenwat _ naafqe ta n _ igaqragh llegh ka _ ! _ â
taawa nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ qaprag ghllag _ qalghigh kaqe magh mi _ nalughqutagh ghllag _ tamaani _ .
qenwat llu nguq _ an ip agh lag em _ ugumi yagute luku _ ig aasi tam ineng _ meteghllug ghllag _ kuuve ghllag ma kanga _ .
aga nguq _ qalghigh rug umaghmi _ tenge qagh uq _ , _ â _ Q gh waaq _ , _ q gh waaq _ , _ q gh waaq _ ! _ â
Taag ken nguq _ ima _ me teghll ugwet _ tagneghtekau ut _ .
enkaam nguq _ allameng llu _ il akun nan iim af tun nguq _ .
ivisa ngiighhagh
W am iiy aam _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ .
ne mi nguq _ tawani _ , _ quun pe nguq _ angyaghugh te aqe lghiit _ , _ neqe ngllagh te aqe lghiit _ .
taawa nguq _ tamaan teftuq _ ne mi _ tamaani _ yuug _ ataasigh _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ .
taawa nguq _ nulighh a _ , _ panike luku _ ataasigh _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag nghata nguq _ yugw is ag aqelghii _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ .
nuliigh ni llu _ , _ pan igg anillu _ yuk lukek _ angyagh aqe lghii _ .
kete aqe lghiit _ pan igg ani _ taghtugh qaghte nghaani _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh u luteng _ kete luteng _ , _ aga _ angyagh t _ upleg te aqe lghiit _ nunavag meng _ elngaatall _ , _ uka nguq _ tagi laghate te nghata _ , _ taawa _ ellngit _ agl at _ .
ayveghagh llghite a nguq _ siipneghkwaagh ghhagh itneng _ saghna aqe lghiit _ ellngit _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawaten _ neqenge vleghagh aqe lghiit _ .
En kaa ngam nguq _ uteghnigh aqe lghiit _ unugtagh u ghllag nghaani _ .
pegnem nguq _ neq ete reg aghaq elghiit _ .
Ataa sim enguq _ aghneghmi _ , _ nun av ag p aghq ughllag nguq _ nani _ imani _ , _ aruugh yagh luteng _ esghagh luku _ up leg un neqeg s aall aatagh aat _ .
Leg an qun ngu q -aa _ , _ atghaghtegh te ragkiighute yalghiimeng _ , _ ellngin nguq _ kingulighpigagh ghhagh u laatagh ut _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawatete ghngaan _ pan igg ani _ taghtugh qaghte yan _ , _ naqamllu nguq _ taghtugh s ugw igal kanga _ , _ atghaghtegh luteng _ ellngitllug nge uq _ kete ut _ .
Tawaten nguq _ amsanaghllugllak _ , _ qutenge uq _ qantaghan lluku _ wiin _ nallangigh naqe aqe kangi _ teghig et _ , _ angyagh t _ saamkut _ anuq liit qagh tek ang atni _ qute _ qantaghante sqe luku _ .
sa kan _ , _ tag itu gugh us kang atni _ qute _ qantaghante sqellug qu _ .
Taag ken nguq _ tawaten ngu q -aa _ , _ amsanaghllugllak- a _ , _ qute _ paga _ qantaghan lluku _ , _ aag kul ghutet _ upleg te te ghllag t _ uyavagh ghllag ke aat _ nalla itnun _ iglegh te reg aamaluku _ , _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghiit
Taag ken nguq _ yugw em nguq _ taam _ pi a _ , _ â _ Kaa - kaa _ , _ yaavuqugh nghmeng _ uyuq _ aghnagh aq _ taaqe aghten _ , _ kaa - kaa _ nagate aghte tek _ sangaawa _ ? _ â
yaavuquute ni _ qaake luki _ nasiigh luteng _ nagate yalghiimeng _ , _ sa u a nguq _ .
â _ Un eg kugh sii _ , _ neng aak i tengng aa _ , _ qaak i tengng aa _ , _ â _ leg annguq _ nagaqugh aat _ .
sunanguq _ yugwem _ aquutagh ni _ qiifte agu _ kelute mun _ .
aghnagh m _ taam _ nulighh an _ qiive qaghte luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ pi naqlaatagh zigu _ amyughaagh u aqe yaaghte uq _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ kel utm unnguq _ pi luteng _ , _ qute mun _ tenpete luteng _ , _ kayagte ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ sangaawa _ uugte luten _ , _ â _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
nulighh a nguq _ uugte luni _ , _ tawavek _ peng ug negh waagh anun _ qaasqagh m _ , _ yug sugh w amalghii _ .
Yug sugh w aluni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ paaghqite uq _ . _ â
uugte naqe yaghtugh ngugh _ angyagh mun _ , _ nak ennguq _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ whaante unga _ , _ whaante unga _ ! _ â _ qaghi ite ghllag _ .
taakwavek nguq _ yug sugh waagh agh taa tut _ , _ ivagh i ragkiighute ut _ .
â _ whaante unga _ megh z egh aaghh aghmi _ . _ â
â _ aatak _ meghhagh _ tazigna _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ . _ â
aga nguq _ aghnagh _ aglagh luni _ , _ megh aagh m unnguq _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ avangite uq _ , _ i werng aq unnguq _ taawa _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa ite uq _ , _ avangite uq _ iwerngaqun _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taawa _ . _ â
â _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ , _ taana _ naqam _ qaake lteggu _ . _ â
Aghnagh agh nguq _ sa uq _ ag niq suug tuq _ , _ â _ kimaawi ghllag ukut _ . _ â
aghnagh m nguq _ tugu luku nguq _ q ugw ak laagh penaan _ , _ angyagh m _ aqume vig akun _ aqnighte naqe pigte luku _ miluute a _ , _ mes aaq guu lluku _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ puglegh luteng _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
igleghte ma luki nguq _ .
â _ Nul iin g _ , _ nul iin g _ , _ angyagh m _ megh aaghh anun _ kanaghte aghte nga _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
iwernga nguq _ ata an _ nagaqugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ seghleghhalek _ sa meng _ taana _ pi aqa _ weni _ , _ pie- ghesnagh aqe luku _ pi aghte gu _ .
sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
â _ esghaghhu _ angyagh m _ meghaagh anun _ kanagh tesqell uni _ pi lghii _ . _ â
â _ kanaghte gu _ . _ â
tugu luku nguq _ miluute a _ angyagh m _ megh z egh aagh anun _ .
Taag ken aa _ , _ imani nguq _ megh mete luni _ kana _ enraq _ .
â _ Nul iin g _ , _ nul iin g _ , _ yaavuquute ten _ taakut _ qaake ki _ . _ â _ avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ aghnaghagh m _ ugumi yagute pigtekanga _ .
imani nguq _ , _ â _ Nul iin g _ , _ nul iin g _ , _ yaavuquute ten _ taakut _ qaake ki _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh yagh luku _ ata an _ aghyuugh laatagh aa _ .
aga _ yaavuquute gni _ agniqe pigte luni _ qaake ma kek _ unake naqe pigte luku _ taana _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ .
Legannguq _ qaake ai _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek nguq _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek _ , _ tawaten nguq _ pi yalghiimeng _ sukera kestagh aqe ut _ .
Legannguq _ yuug _ nangll agh qelluni _ , _ aghnagh aq llu _ , _ aghnagh llu _ nangll agh qelluteng _ elngaatall _ , _ up um y egh aam aghmeng _ , _ quyagh llag um aghme nguq _ .
Suk er aghllag yalghii me nguq _ , _ leg annguq _ angyat lghute _ kaate qagh i luki _ naghughaghte aqe ait _ .
Teghig mun _ kaate luteng _ , _ ayvegh alegh taagh llag luteng _ taglagh ma luki nguq _ , _ taawa nguq _ angyat lghute _ taagna _ upleg te a _ taagavek _ igleghte aq _ .
Legannguq _ nangllaghqe te luteng _ naghughaghte nghata _ esghapag nghmegteki _ .
saghiigha yug ghllaget _ , _ allaaghlluwh aghyug llaget _ , _ â _ aagkut _ sukate pigte aat _ ! _ â
ima nguq _ yuug _ t ah na _ ighnegh it alghii _ un angy uugh qwaagh llag aa _ , _ aklungi igh i ghllag uq _ , _ ay v eng y uugh qwaagh llag aa _ .
Quun pe nguq _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taana _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ .
tefaay _ !
sikughaagh nkut _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh nkut _ , _ meteghllug ghllag nkut
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
Uks uum _ negh ke igh sag ani _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pirughte yaghtugh ma lghii _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg itnun _ .
akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ akmag ke luku _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg ita _ nenglu anun _ , _ imani _ saaygu an _ amig a _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ nenglagh yug magh mi _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sikughwaagh t _ umiileg at _ qaamna _ u aten _ esl egk akaa _ . _ â
akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ mat- aghte luku _ pegnem _ kangsugh ghngaan _ amig kun _ ilu te mun _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
aatkagh ni _ mataghte aqe luki _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ .
taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ kangsugh ghngaaghmi _ .
itegh luni _ saaygu t _ ilu itni _ ilepghaagheg ni _ aate ma kek _ .
atkug ni llu _ , _ temkaag ni llu _ agaghte ma kangi _ .
taaqe luni _ aagra nun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
sikughaagh t _ umiilg annguq _ pika _ kelut angani _ aqume luni _ , _ qenngulliqe ghllag luni _ .
imani nguq _ am estaaghh aaguq _ .
tamaa nguq _ sikughaagh t _ aghnagh ait _ qepghagh te ghllag t _ , _ qaprag te ghllag t _ naqam _ qalleg qagh gpenateng _ .
Upugh at aghh neghit aan nguq _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ qalleg qagh gpenani _ alinge sighwaagh ma lghii _ .
sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ qiigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ U ghh u- ghh uu _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ upugh sighwaagh ma lghii _ tupag ghpagte magh mi _ .
umiileg _ aga _ aane uq _ sa meng _ pi aghte gpenani _ .
taawa _ kaviigh ghhagh _ tawan tuq _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ aleghqugh qagh gpenaan _ .
maateqwaaqun _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ itegh yalghiimi _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ atkug wa _ atuqe luku _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag luku _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ neng lagh yug llagh ngaaghmi _ pegnem _ nuqete ma lghii _ elngaatall _ .
umiileg _ qiighw laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ U ghh u- ghh uu _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ tupag ghpagte sighwaagh aqe lghii _ .
umiileg _ nutaan _ akuzi uq _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ gg aat f aka _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ neng lagh yug llagh ngaaghmi _ pi ma kanga _ qusevegte pigte luni _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ sangantuq- a _ atku wh aqa _ aate laatagh zigu _ , _ kel uwh ii _ av legh r uug g naluki _ . _ â
umiileg nguq _ temsiyaaghagh uq _ , _ aga _ aane uq _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ enraq _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ temkagh kek _ atuqe lukek _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag lukek _ .
sikughaagh ghhagh _ qiighw ghllag laatagh uq _ , _ â _ U ghh u- ghh uu _ . _ â
pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ igh uv ag egka _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi laatagh aa _ me ni _ alingesugnite naqe pigte luku _ , _ â _ Uuk -aa _ , _ sangan tuq _ qull igg aag ka _ aate laatagh zikek _ kel uwh ii _ s ev uu tesqelluki _ . _ â
umiileg _ aga _ aane laatagh uq _ iqemyaaghagh magh mi _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ iq ligh mi _ , _ pinighhalek _ elngaatall _ .
â _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ aqelqagh _ upugha teggu _ , _ neqlightugh teggu _ ! _ â
umiileg m _ kayagte ai _ .
nutaan _ upugha te aat _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
neqe meng _ allaagh iin aghmeng _ ketfagh te aat _ .
kaviigh ghhagh nkuk _ umiileg nkuk _ negh uk _ .
negh te kete luku _ umiileg m _ aapte a _ , _ â _ Saam _ uk ag un -aa _ aagte ta ten _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ avaqutagh ghhagh nka _ negh esqelluki _ neq ell g aan ayuk avek _ enankin _ , _ aag vike amken _ . _ â
umiileg m _ aragh ai _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ yataaghqe te nakesi _ pirughte i uute yaghqagh meng _ . _ â
taagken _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pi a _ , _ â _ qavagh luten _ unaami _ wetku _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ pirughte i lleqe aaten _ . _ â
unaami _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pi yalghiimi _ akmagtagh ghhagh a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ imigh luni _ .
akmagtagh ni _ aane sta _ .
ellnga llu _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aane uq _ , _ kangsugh nghite uq _ .
kaate luni _ iiwenllu _ akmagtagh ni _ mataghte aqe a _ , _ meteghllug ghllag _ whaa _ tagi uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ pi a _ meteghllug ghllag m _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ naqamalla _ naken _ neqete yu igh ziin _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg itnun _ pirughte yaghtugh lunga _ , _ llaaghanwha _ taawa _ . _ â
meteghllug ghllag _ imani _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ whanga llu _ unaami _ pirughte yaghtuqagh lleqe unga _ . _ â
Kav iighh am _ pi a _ , _ â _ ii-ii _ pig peng ang _ , _ qay ngun whaa _ igiiterug naanghite uten _ .
whaken _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ â
imani nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ tunusagh t _ kemnagh u i te ut _ . _ â
unaami _ meteghllug ghllag _ akmag tagh pag ll ani _ akmag ke luku _ sikugh aagh en kunun _ pi uq _ .
Kaa sal gh li mi _ imani nguq _ amig at _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ naten ll aam _ qaamna _ umiileg _ esl egk akaa _ ? _ â
amig m _ paye a _ naafqellug qu _ , _ nuqutughte luku _ itegh ma lghii _ .
nategh kun _ atkug ni _ , _ temkaag ni llu _ mat- aghte luki _ , _ agaghte luki _ itegh ma lghii _ aagra nun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ pika _ kelut angani _ aqum lun l _ , _ imani _ am estaaghh aaguq _ , _ naqam _ qenngu ghllag a _ , _ nul g ligh llagluni _ .
upugha te aghte nghite aat _ .
qalleg qagh gpenateng _ naqam _ tamaa _ ilang l _ qaprag te ghllag t _ .
sa meng _ pi aghte gpenaan _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ umiileg _ aga _ aane uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ alike naanghite anka _ , _ akmagtagh ka _ whanga mneng _ imigh lleqe aqa _ . _ â
umiileg _ itegh yalghiimi _ Meteghllugwem _ atkug wa _ atuqe luku _ , _ angegh lleg ke ghllag luku _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag luku _ .
Meteghllugwem _ esghagh luku _ , _ nenglagh ghllag ma lghii _ , _ elngaatall _ tuqutngwaagh ma lghii _ .
umiileg m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ gg aat f aka _ ? _ â
Meteghllugwem _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ Aa- h a- h a- h aa _ , _ sangantuq- a _ aku g llak a _ aate laatagh zigu _ .
llangaqa _ atkug ka _ , _ ne mni _ inga _ pell ug ut aaghmeng _ nuuvekagh _ .
Aa- h a- h a- h aa _ . _ â
â _ Ug um inaq ru wh aghmeng _ ! _ â _ pi magh mi _ aane uq _ umiileg _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ , _ Meteghllugwem _ temkagh kek _ atuqe lukek _ .
legan _ Meteghllugwem _ esghagh nghminigu _ tuqutngwaagh aqe lghii _ .
umiileg m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ igh uv ag egka _ ? _ â
Me tegh l ugwem _ pi a _ , _ â _ Aa- h a- h a- h aa _ , _ sangan _ qull ig egka _ aate laatagh zikek _ ?
llangaqa _ qull ig egka _ ne mni _ inga _ nguulghute meng _ nuuvekagh k _ ! _ â
umiileg _ eggmillgha magh mi _ aga _ aane uq _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ gginagh _ seghlegh _ , _ qenngu ghnaggagh a _ .
aleghquute aghte gpenateng _ ingaghte uute ut _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ ingaghte luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ is ek in am _ , _ suqsugh m _ teghtugh aghte yalghiimi _ , _ qung yagh ag neng _ eslate mun _ saaygu neng _ maaqute aqe a _ .
megh kun _ nal ugw igalnguq _ , _ alingruugh uq _ .
sa ni te mun _ patimlla luni _ qute mun _ uugg tuq _ .
kaame ngunani _ , _ atkug ngunani _ , _ ilep gh aaq iin aghluni _ aghipa ghllag _ aglagh uq _ ne minun _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ taawa _ manughagh mi _ aqumga aqe uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ K ii- ii _ , _ qayugham _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg ita _ pirughte i te aaten _ ? _ â
Meteghllugwem _ pi a _ , _ â _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ inglu u nghite uq _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ qayngun qun _ igiiterug mangite laatagh uten _ ! _ â
tefaay _ .
piinlillegh
P e tu w aam _ igagh llegh a
ungipaghaate t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ apeghtughiste m _ l ingu ist -em _ G e or g i y _ A . _ M en ov sh ch ik ov -em _ igaqe yuwhaagh kaqe ai _ apeghtughiste u luni _ pamani _ 19 3 0 - ni _ .
up-uni _ igagh ni _ qula _ aki mig aq _ siipnegh ke luku _ ungipagh ata _ M en ov sh ch ik ov em _ igaqugh qu ai _ whangkuta _ Sivuq amel ngugh n im _ atigh tull em n n u _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ ama _ L aluram ke ti mun _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ .
qamagte luki _ ungipaghaate t _ ukut _ M en ov sh ch ik ov -em _ 19 8 8 -em _ igagh aneng _ , _ M ate ri al y _ i _ is s le d ov an ii a _ p o _ i az y k u _ i _ f ol Ê¼ k l or u _ ch ap lin s k ik h _ es k im os o v _ ( _ M ate ri al s _ and _ A nal y si s _ C on c ern ing _ th e _ L angu ag e _ and _ F ol k l or e _ o f _ th e _ Ch ap lin s ki _ Es k im o s _ ) _ , _ pi u ut _ pu b l is h ek at _ Ruus e mi _ .
una _ qepghaqagh _ allgegh kau uq _ mani nge yama _ g r an t meng _ Un iv er si t y _ o f _ alaska _ F a ir b ank s-em _ P r ov os t- anganeng _ .
allgegh te llegh kun _ sivugh qagh unga _ ruuseghmii t _ atightullegh itneng _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ whangkunnun _ atigh tugh yug nagh tesqelluki _ kaneghyengesi m _ tanqigh ani _ 2 00 1 -mi _ .
piyuwhaaghmun _ 4 5 _ ungipaghaate t _ 4 9 -en eng _ 19 8 8 -em _ igagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ pi yalghiinga _ ila i _ ungipaghaate m _ siingenllu _ apeghkagh t _ , _ ila i llu _ aghsaan _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
pi nghite yaqenka _ , _ yuginagh _ aki mig aq _ siipnegh ke luku _ siipte uq _ mumegh igh qugh yaghqagh nka _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ tawaten _ nanqigte manginagh magh ita _ pi anka _ .
anagngatu pigte lghii _ M en ov sh ch ik ov -em _ igagh llegh ani _ .
ila i _ atightugh neghllug ghllag t _ repall _ Ruuseghm istun _ ayuqe lghii kun _ mumigte luki _ wetku _ liigikngwaagh anka _ sa u ta i _ ipa _ .
P aam kugh miit _ akuzillegh at _ allakanigh _ ( _ katam _ ellngit a _ uk in i whangkutestun _ k aki - _ , _ ama _ ellngit ni _ enngaatall _ whang tu testun _ elngaatall _ ) _ , _ tespam kugh m iistun _ ayuqe ut _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ .
ilangakun _ P aam kugh miit _ akuzillegh at _ igagh llegh a _ anagnga sug ni lleqe uq _ ( _ katam _ w eng tegh aq _ nakaan _ mangteghagh _ ) _ .
enkaam _ ila i _ akuzite m _ whanga _ nalluke kenka _ , _ sivuke luki _ angayuqagh mnun _ N ay gh waagh m iin kugnun _ J un e- en kugnun _ aapte agka _ sa u ta i _ .
enkaam _ ellngit a _ nallukekagh it _ siivanllegh nun _ aapte yaghtugh anka _ sa u ta i _ .
igamsiqa yug vike anka _ kayusigh kau yatnga _ K ep elg unkut _ , _ Anag gut enkut _ , _ iyagh u kankut _ , _ U uz ag enkut _ , _ Av aal ag enkut _ , _ enkaam _ kiyang _ rosa _ .
R os a-m _ apeghkagh i _ sa u ta i _ naten _ atugh llegh i _ quyilleg t _ akuzite it _ .
U A F -mun _ uteghnigh yama _ qaluvig m _ tanqigh ani _ 2 00 2 -mi _ yupig m _ P r uf is er nga _ S tev en _ Jacob s on- llu _ yuv ghii ghagh pung _ qepghagh llegh nka _ yupig stun llu _ laluramke stun llu _ .
amalleqa _ tawani _ upenghagh ani _ re c or d aanka _ C D -mun _ maligte te nga lghii _ igagh tgun _ .
ama _ n im am _ apegh llegh i _ Ig or _ K r up n ig meng _ S m it h s on i an _ I n st itu ti on -meng _ allgegh ta put _ tuune ai _ Sivuqaghh m iini _ nallukekagh put _ pam an lenguut _ nuna t _ .
ama _ map- a _ tuune a _ tespam um _ nuna m _ naan tul ngi _ apegh luteng _ yupig t _ ama _ sighineg mii t _ kiyaghfig kekagh i _ .
U A F _ C oll eg e _ o f _ L i b er a l _ Ar t s-em _ umiileg an _ John _ L e ip z ig -em _ ama _ A N L C - m _ umiileg an _ L aw r en c e _ K ap l an -em _ mat- ni _ piyaq leg gin aagh taak _ te ru w iste meng _ muute i yaghqaa lunga _ Q ak gin kugneng _ Ap u ghit en kugnun _ Ch ef aghn aghmeng _ ungipagh aat enun _ ilate yaghqagh lug ke i _ .
David _ K o este r _ U A F -em _ An th ro p ol o g y _ D ep ar t men t- meng _ qepghagh tegh yag neng _ kayute kesagh aqa _ Un d erg ra d u at e _ R es e ar c h _ O pp or tun it y _ P ro g ram -em _ mani nge vig aneng _ .
taagken _ esgha _ una _ qepghaqagh _ allgeghkagh _ .
ama _ igamsiqa yug vike anka _ N a uka _ P u b l is h ing _ H o us e- enkut _ S t . _ Peter s b ur g _ , _ R us si a- melnguut _ aang ghut kaa ngi _ A N L C - nkut _ ukut _ ungipaghaate t _ pu b l is h -en kal uki _ whatete luki _ .
ukut _ igagh t _ ama _ CD _ neghyuke te luki _ akuzipig lleg mnnun _ yupig t llu _ kiyaghtaa llgh anun _ nagnegh te yaghqaa luku _ iglegha lleg mnnun _ iknaqughi sagh u luku llu _ , _ pam an ll iim ta _ ungipaghaate itneng _ .
Ungipagh aghtet _ : _ ( _ M en ov sh ch ik ov -meng _ V al en tin a _ ( _ Y ata _ ) _ kunukagh m _ mumegh igh qugh qu ai _ , _ enkaam _ Ig or _ K r up n ig em _ nall gh ugh qegkii _ ) _ .
1 _ . _ ayvegh ghhagh _ ( _ 19 1 4 - 19 4 7 _ ) _ .
ungazighmii _ .
ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
Ay aang aghmi _ alleq aq _ , _ enkaam _ yay waal ing ugh teg kaq _ , _ nuna lgu ta an _ angli stekagh a _ kayusigh iqe a _ .
ayvegh ghhagh _ ungipaghagh u lleg ghllag u yagh lghii _ ama _ ilagagh lleg ghllag u yagh lghii _ nuna lgu ta an _ pi aneng _ .
19 4 0 -mi _ ukut _ ungipagh a tet _ allgegh taq ng ameng _ 2 6 _ year -ngugh tuq _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh u te mineng _ nagate yuneghtu ghllag yagh uq _ ungipaghaate meng llu _ , _ ilagaate meng llu _ alignagh lghiit llu _ ungipaghagh itneng _ .
maakut _ umyugagh anun _ pi luteng _ sumeghtagh agh qelluku _ repall _ .
ayvegh ghhagh _ ungipaghagh nghmini _ apate qugh aqe lghii nguq _ .
M en ov sh ch ik ov -em _ igaqugh kaqe ai _ ama _ mumegh igh qugh ai _ 3 0 - t _ ungipagh a tet _ ayvegh ghhagh meng _ ungazigh mi _ 19 4 0 _ / _ 4 1 em _ uksugh ani _ , _ E k ate r in a _ S . _ R u b st ov - am _ 5 0 _ ungipagh ata _ igaqugh u luku _ 19 4 0 -mi _ .
pi nga yu neng _ inglul ek Ayvegh haam _ ungip ag at ngi _ u kun itut _ igagh ni _ 1 8 -en i _ .
2 _ . _ peter _ tagikagh _ ( _ 19 2 6 - 19 4 1 _ )
ungazighmii _ mekelghiigh _ .
mughunniighte m _ ungipagh agh tem _ Gal m ugy im _ ( _ nani _ 1 8 8 0 - 19 5 7 _ ) _ ighnegh a _ .
T ak ig aam _ su ilugh tekaqaa _ igaghyagh m _ sivulighte negh a _ , _ taagken _ mugh uun nigh tengugh suk aq _ .
angayuqagh u kek _ ruuseghmii ii te i igate yagh uk _ .
Tag i kaam _ ata an _ Gal m ugy im _ uglagh _ sa u a _ yuginagh _ sa u a _ siipngaan _ ungipaghagh te a _ liisimake yagh aa _ .
avaqutagh minun _ ila minun _ nuna lgu ta minun _ ungipaghagh aqe lghii _ sa nghite nghmini _ mughunniigh nghite nghmini _ .
Tag i kaam _ nagatekagh i _ neqamike te qugh u i _ a ta mi _ ungipagh at angi _ .
ila itnun llu _ laalighqwaagh aqe lghii _ unug nghagu _ vuvall angh at allu _ ungipaghagh yaghtugh aqe lghii _ , _ awtu magh meng _ aghula magh meng _ .
Tag i kaam _ piniqumtaagh a _ ineghla ghllag a _ ayvegh ghhagh _ , _ yuug _ nagat ngwaa qayuk _ ama _ ungipaghagh lleg ghllag _ .
19 4 0 _ / _ 4 1 _ em _ uksugh ani _ M en ov sh ch ik ov em _ igagh u aghagh ke yagh ai _ sivuligh t _ igagh i _ akuzipig m _ g ram m ar ngi _ igaghvig t _ sivulighte negh itnun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Kay using egkaq _ ungazigh m _ igleghutisteng itneng _ , _ Ch uk o t k am _ aaght isteng i _ May ng an kugneng _ M all un kugneng _ .
tagikagh _ tagi aqe lghii _ el k egnun _ igal gu sigh yaghtugh aqegk ang ek _ .
ataasigh meng _ igagh gni _ kelqellug kek _ ungipagh ate m _ ila i _ igaqe ma kangi _ .
taagken _ ima _ M en ov sh ch ik ov -enkuk _ qepghagh lgutke te ma lghiik _ 3 0 - t _ ungipagh a tet _ taaqe te ma ka ak _ .
nukalpigagh _ quy am agh llak Tag ikaq _ .
tan- ke ta ghhagh mini _ kiyaghtaallegh mini _ liisimakekagh ni _ qamagte luki _ apegh llghite ai _ .

3 _ . _ A s uy a _ O l ga _ mumigtekagh _ ( _ 19 3 0 - 2 00 1 _ ) _ ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
ugi mini _ kiyaghtekagh _ sighineg mi _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg neng _ avaqu tke ikagh k _ .
menovshchikov _ qepgh aluni _ ungazigh mi _ 19 5 4 -mi _ A s uy a _ , _ atightugh qagh yu k _ pinaq n elghii _ , _ kayute ke kaqe a _ akuzipig m _ g ram m ar nganeng _ igaqugh u luni _ .
tea- ma ni llu _ naayvaghvig m _ tanqigh aneng _ kaneghyengesi m _ tanqigh anun _ igaqugh kaqe ai _ tawaten _ pilleg mtun _ tallimat _ ungipagh a tet _ , _ M en ov sh ch ik ov -em _ mumegh igh qugh aghtekagh i _ .
19 7 0 - nillu _ 19 8 0 - nill un ur se ngul un iq ep gh aaq aaftuq _ Sighi ng em _ c lin ic ngani _ , _ ama _ aflengakekagh i _ avaqutagh ni _ .

4 _ . _ Al gh alek _ ( _ 19 2 0 - 19 6 5 _ ) _ .
ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
atightugh qagh yu k _ ama _ igagh kayuglluggagh _ yuug _ .

19 5 5 -mun _ kenlanga _ mughunniighte ukagh _ ama _ iv en ru utk eg sagh teng ukaq _ ungazigh mi _ â _ nutaghagh mi _ kiyaghtaallegh mi _ â _ .

5 _ . _ nanugh ghhagh _ ( _ 19 1 1 - 19 9 0 _ ? _ ) _ .
ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
igagh lleg ite ngughk _ atightugh lleg ite ngughk _ natengiighhaq _ ruuseghmii ii te i kayug _ .
4 _ year -ngu luni _ ayaakagh _ t ra ch o mal uni _ .
nanugh ghhagh m _ uglagh _ ungipaghagh te a _ ama _ il aag aat a _ liisimake yagh aa _ , _ enkaam _ ungipaghagh u lleg ghllag u yagh lghii _ .
ungipaghaate i _ il aag aat meng _ ila tke aat _ .
1 5 _ im g ip agh a tet _ allgegh qughkagh t _ nanugh ghhagh meng _ .

6 _ . _ V al en tin a _ V ir i _ ( _ W ir i _ ) _ ( _ 19 4 2 -mi _ allgeghkagh _ ) _ .
imtugmii _ sighineg meng _ .

Ukamangaan
iimnanguq _ ungazighmii t _ sivuqagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
ila meng _ sivuqagh mii t _ taghnughhaghqagh it _ way aam aqeg ket _ maalgh uk nay akullghiik _ .
aglagh te ma kegket _ ungazigh mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ K aan gh u _ , _ uyuq ligh pigaq _ .
aghnaghagh ghllag m _ ategh a _ Ukamangaan _ .
aghnaghagh ghllag _ ugi igh yaghqagh stun _ angka lugh u ikagh _ .
ungazigh mun _ kaate luteng _ maalghug gneng _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
A qim alghiit _ Uv ing em un 1 _ taghnughhagh k _ tuune yaghtugh ma kegket _ quyngigh leg nun _ .
kaate yameng _ Uv ing emun _ esghagh ma kangit _ quyilleg ghllag t _ .
aapte ma kangi _ quyilleg m _ , _ â _ sangafsi _ tagi stek _ ? _ â
akite ma kangat _ ungazighmii t _ , _ â _ whangkuta _ tagi ukut _ in qun am en _ taghnughhagh k _ tukfigh sqellug kek _ quyngigh meng _ . _ â
quyilleg _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ naqam _ ighnegh leg _ aange lghii meng _ . _ â
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itupilqun _ ighnegh ka _ nulightugh yagh kuni _ yug in ak aghnayagh amsi _ quyngigh meng _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ tuune aqe aat _ Ukamangaan _ aghnaghagh ghllag _ .
K aan gh u _ tuune nghite aat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ .
uteghte ma lghii _ ungazigh mun _ .
Ukamangaan _ ugiigh uq _ quyilleg mun _ Uv ing eghm ii meng _ .
ugi a _ yuukegte pigte lghii _ ama _ sukate pigte lghii _ ama _ iknaqe pigte lghii _ .
Ukamangaan _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii _ ama _ sungaghate pigte lghii _ .
Ukamangaan _ meghtagh aqe lghii _ ama _ ukini aqe lghii _ .

kiiw gnun _ kaate nghmini _ tamaghhagh an _ aghneq _ ugke meng _ milugh qutagh aqe lghii _ inglu anun _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ .

ama _ nunalgutetuqagh t _ .

aghnagh m _ neghsagh _ itghute ma kanga _ .

yuug _ ay av i si tam un _ aaghhe ma lghii _ .

â _ waniwanllu _ , _ ugiigh igate unga _ !

unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ .
taghtugh luteng _ yuug _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghii _ .
kingu aneng _ aghnagh _ pilugug ma lghii _ .

ama _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ megh mi _ tuqu yagh kuma _ , _ pinigh nayagh unga _ . _ â
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .

puqla yagh kete yami _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .

qenwat _ unug yaghtugh aa _ .

itupill _ qute mi _ tuqu s qe simak anganga _ . _ â
taagken _ sumeghtaghagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ , _ ukiivag mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ alla _ sukate pigte luni _ ukiivag m _ qaye anun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ sag legh aghllak _ .
taaggun _ aghnagh _ aqume ma lghii _ .
tawani _ qiy aamalghii _ , _ nuna _ tukeghragh magh an _ .
nutaan _ ugi ni _ q i tel qu v ingh aa _ neqagh te a _ .
Q iy am _ angtalanganeng _ repall _ aragh ma lghii _ .
qiya ma luku _ sag legh aghllak _ sivutmute _ aghelqute qaghte ma lghii _ .
Q iyaq estagh ngaaghmi _ aghuliigh aghte ma lghii _ .
uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ paye k _ esghagh aak _ .
aghnagh _ nekeve luni _ paye gnun _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
qineghte luni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ qaame na nga _ mamleg ghllag uq _ .
tawani _ esghapag ma lghii _ ama _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ qamavek _ ifkagh yagh kuma _ , _ tuqu nayagh unga _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aqume luni _ paye gnun _ ighu gni _ kanaghte uute ma kek _ .
tesqamani _ saafte te naqutkesagh uq _ mingle aneng _ .
aghtugh yami _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ ifkagh langa _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
ifkagh yalghiimi _ kuyapegagh kun _ tuute ma lghii _ .
ifkagh vig a _ taana _ nenglu ghllag u uq _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ kiw at miigh simalghii _ , _ talligh gni _ saag tagh ll uk ek . aqf aataq luni _ .
qenwat _ egkugh anun _ kaate nghmeng _ aghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ una _ neng lu kun iq egkegka _ entaqun _ nunaghllag u uq _ . _ â
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
N igh ug gaq _ aliigh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
N igh ug gaq _ taana _ taku ma kanga _ .

qenwat _ mengteghagh llu _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
kaate ma lghii _ aghnagh _ mengteghagh ghrukutaaghllag mun _ .
taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ nategh mi _ qiighw ma lghii _ .
ungavig ghllag neng _ nukalpigagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Saam _ aghnaqe aten _ ? _ â
â _ ukiivag mii u unga _ ! _ â
â _ qaywa _ tughneghaan- nghite ziin _ ? _ â

yug m _ akite a _ , _ â _ tughneghaan- nghite unga _ yupig g aagunga _ , _ yupig g aagunga _ !

â _ ugi ma _ qitegh kanganga _ uglagh pigte luku _ ip ag fig un _ tuqu na lunga _ pi yagh unga _ .

enta _ itegh i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ itegh ma lghii _ .

negh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ amsikaghte uq _ .

taagken _ neqe meng _ avegtugh uq _ .
apeghiigh luni _ avegtughagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
negh ma lghiik _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ , _ yug m _ aghnagh _ pi a _ , _ â _ enta _ allighagh t _ saag t iki _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ allighagh t _ saag simakangi _ .
taagken _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yamek _ , _ aghnagh _ ugi an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ mughute aghte naqe unga _ qaya kun _ aghvegh leg nun _ .
aghvenge lunga _ tagi lleqe unga _ . _ â
yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh ma lghii _ .

ukigllug qu _ , _ aqume ma lghii _ qaya minun _ .
uunghagh ni _ tugu luku _ , _ mingle _ naghulleg yagh kete ni _ mingle _ quupaghte ma lghii _ .
quupaghte yalghiimi _ megh ghllag _ mingle meng _ itegh ma lghii _ .
yuug _ kete ma lghii _ , _ esla mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .

taagken _ aghnagh _ ugi mi _ kingu aneng _ ukini ma lghii _ kameg neng _ .
iiwenllu _ aghnegh m _ qute kaghagh ke a _ , _ kameg k _ taaqe ma kek _ .

gaagh ma lghii _ .
ugke t _ ugute yaki _ aqum e simakangi _ .
mulunghituq _ uvit anganeng _ mengqughte te ma lghii _ , _ ama _ megh ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ awituwaq _ ugi ka _ taglagh uq _ . _ â
taagken _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .

aghvegh _ ii- u na ghllag an _ nategh mun _ itghute ma kanga _ .

nategh mi _ yug m _ aghvegh ghllag _ kagimte ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .

taaqe luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ amen _ nuna mnun _ aglagh naanghite unga _ .
luuraq llu _ nuna mnun _ kaate kuma _ ugi ma _ tuqu lleqe anga _ . _ â

akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma _ sa lunga _ pi langa _ ?

â _ enta _ kal ngag g aak _ kumlu gpetun _ angka lghiik _ maalghug _ ulima kek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ kal ngag g aak _ maalghug _ ulima ma kek _ .

negh te kete luku _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ elpek _ keveg aqe lleqe an _ .
whanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taana _ keveg aqe lleqe aqa _ .
ama _ ungipaate naqe amken _ , _ ukiivag mi _ saama _ ugi n _ nulightugh ma uq _ aghnaghagh neng _ maalghug gneng _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii neng _ .
enekiitek _ vuvall aaqut _ , _ esghagh lleqe aten _ .
En taq un ngam _ ukig gnaq amken _ .
enan _ mengteghagh _ ki nguv neng _ maligte te naagh uq _ .
iiwen _ ug iv ek _ aapte naagh aaten _ , _ avelghaqiinagh naken _ .
sagiqe gkan _ pi naken _ , _ â _ enan _ unaami _ ungipaate nagh amken _ . _ â
iiwen _ nategh anun _ kaate kuvek _ uteghmun _ esghagh naagh uten _ .
mengteghagh _ esghagh lleqe an _ .
esghagh kuvgu _ piighhe aq _ il em qugh luku _ panike te lghiitek _ aglagh ghhaatek _ mengteghagh mun _ .
aglagh kuftek _ mengteghagh _ qelpeghtekufsigu _ , _ itegh kuftek _ signegh t _ maalghug neghet _ tugu lleqe aten _ .
tugu kufki _ ila kek _ signegh k _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .
ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .

llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh at _ neghe lleqe ait _ .
taawa _ qamagte unga _ .
Uk igg naq amsi _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ paye k _ suupe yagh ke gni _ anglu igh aatagh ma lghiik _ .

nuna mun _ tuute ma lghiik _ .
tuute yamek _ kalngag _ esghagh yaq es eng _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .

kaate lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ .

panig an _ angegh ma kanga _ .

atugh aqe ut _ aghula magh meng _ .

â _ unaami _ ungipaate naagh amken _ . _ â

ugi a _ negh ma lghii _ quyngigh meng _ .

ugi an _ angegh ma kanga _ .

awergha _ allaghhiinaq _ amigh _ ila ke te nghite ngughk _ mel q wa _ .

llaaghanwha _ yuug _ angegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ itegh aa tuk _ .
Itegh aa llutek _ negh uk _ .

tefaay _ !
yaywaalingiighhagh ak
iimnanguq _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ nay aku t alghiik _ .
nayag an _ ategh a _ Taykeng aawen _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ Taykegergen _ .
nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ N uut qam i _ .
nunalgutetuqagh t _ ama _ umiileg leg t _ .

llaaghanwha _ nulighh an _ neqe meng _ aglagh te ma kek _ .

taagken _ savighhe ma kanga _ .

taaqe ma kanga _ .

naalkute yami _ unagh sighwaagh em _ iqug akun _ petug ma kanga _ .

taagken _ Taykegergen _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ .
nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qiiptaasigh meng _ taaqe te unga _ .

taagken _ Taykegergen _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
sigugnegh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .

nayag a _ Taykeng aawen _ aane ma lghii _ .
alungutellegh m _ asi ani _ siklagh ma lghii _ .

ratamiiragh kek _ qategh lghiik _ .
kaate luni _ Taykeng aawen _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ Tay kung _ , _ Tay kung _ , _ whanga _ tugu yug aqe yagh amken _ ! _ â

ratamiiragh kek _ kavilngugh k _ .

llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .

llaaghanwha _ Taykeng aaw em _ esghagh ma kanga _ .

yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nengligh sqe nghite amken _ ipapik _ pi amken _ . _ â

aamtaam _ ighleke kau yanga _ ugiigh naanghite unga _ .

yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ aghulaqe naqe unga _ .

llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .

taaqe luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ Taykegergen _ esnagh meng _ taglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .

elqwaagh t _ qung angit gun _ maklag _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
itegh luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Qii p taq engu m anga _ elqwaagh meng _ .

nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ w al en qakun _ !
neghe lleqe ukung _ ighivg aghhaq _ ataasigh ghhagh _ . _ â
taagken _ Taykeng aaw em _ maklag _ af l aamakanga _ .
Taykeg erg em pimakanga _ , _ â _ umiileg ut _ neqe meng _ aglagh te gu _ , _ elqwaagh meng _ unatagh meng _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ Taykeng aaw em _ sagnegh ni _ neqe meng _ imigh ma kek _ elqwaagh meng _ ama _ unatagh meng _ .
taagken _ aglagh te ma kek _ umiileg m _ nulighh anun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ qamaken _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ kinangaawa _ ? _ â

teghig ke te yameng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aghtugh nanigh ma lghii _ .

Aghhaghhangaaw raq
iimnanguq _ , _ yug t _ tallimat _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ ata leg t _ ama _ naa leg t _ .
maalghug _ mughute lutek _ iil aamalghiik _ .
ila a _ nunivag mun _ aghulaqe luni _ ifl aamalghii _ .
ila a _ qayaghtu luni _ ifl aamalghii _ .
aminaqe ma lghii _ ataasigh _ Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ unugmi _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh gpenaan _ qavaghni yami _ itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ nutaan _ nigh uug tagh aghaq eftaa _ .
ata ni _ tagh sas m akanga _ .
ata a _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaya ghhagh ka _ amiiragh igh qagh ghhu _ ! _ â
ata an _ yaghlegi _ qayugh a _ ayemqe ughtagh ma kanga _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ qaya ni _ qiy akum akanga _ .
Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ uyuq ligh pigaq _ .
ata an _ natmun _ pi sqe igate kanga _ , _ qay ugh ll a g _ â _ qute _ ataasighhaaghte lghii _ ila i _ ifla laghate te lghiit _ .
Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ ellngin aghhaghmi _ lliigh lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ allameng _ unug yagu _ qay angll aam alghii l _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh aa _ .
amiiragh igh nghmeng _ taaqe luku _ a ta mi _ uunghagh i _ awataghpag i _ tegleg luki _ kete ma lghii _ .
kete luni _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ uyav aghq aagh aquq _ tagitug ughte ghllag ma kanga _ .
kete mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ tag itu g i simakanga _ .
tagitug ite yagh kete ni _ pennagh ghllag _ aligh umakanga _ .
pennagh m _ qaye ani _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ ighu gni _ kulngaghllug kek _ , _ megh mun _ itegagh ni _ nepte luki _ , _ aqumga ragh aqe uq _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ tuq l umakanga _ , _ â _ aagyuq _ tagi aghten _ ! _ â
yuggagh m _ akite aghte mangite ma kanga _ .
yug ghrug qu ta ghllag m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ iiwen _ evlug ughte ste lleqe aqa _ ! _ â
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighu gni _ aghulate yagh ke gni _ evlug ughte ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ yuggagh _ alinge luni _ yugrukutaagh ghllag meng _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ .
â _ yeqay _ iigh ar iigh aa llu tung _ ! _ â
yuggagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A - aa- aa _ ! _ â
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ quneghten _ ! _ â
yuggagh _ quneghte ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ nev egh simalghii _ .
N ev egh san _ yuggagh m _ iv am akanga _ .
â _ nagu _ naan taq sin _ ? _ â
yuggagh _ aqsa anun _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ tukagh ma lghii _ .
yuggagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ naqam _ aqsaute yu gnite a qaa _ . _ â
yuggagh _ ukig ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ ukig aqe uq _ , _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ whaante unga _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ quneghten _ . _ â
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ quneghte ma lghii _ .
quneghte yan _ yuggagh _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kameg anun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ tengug put _ negh lteki _ ! _ â
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kanga _ â _ wiintaku _ qaya ghhagh ka _ tug magh sagh tuq aghl akun _ ! _ â
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ qaya ghhagh minun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
ellnga _ tumangani _ negh sagh tek alghii _ .
neghsaghtagh mi _ tengug i _ ighneghagh i _ nusug ma kangi _ .
nusug luki _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ aate lukek _ atkug ni _ aate luku _ tafsi ma lghii _ .
tafsi luni _ neghsagh m _ ighneghagh ghhagh i _ qumig ma kangi _ .
qumig luki _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taglagh yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ nev egh ten _ . _ â
yuggagh _ nev egh simalghii _ .
N ev egh lluni _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ yuggagh m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ .
tengug i _ aliighte ma kangi _ .
yuggagh m _ atkug mi _ ilu anun _ tengug t _ qumig kaqe kangi _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ liigike mangite ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ tengug meng _ negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tengug ten _ llangaqa _ neghsagh m _ tengug i _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whangkuta _ tengug put _ tawatete ut _ neghsaghpagnite aqe ut _ .
enta _ elpek llu _ nev egh ten _ !
â _ llaaghanwha _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ nev egh simalghii _ .
N ev egh san _ yuggagh m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighneghagh i _ aliigh ma lghiit _ .
Igh saq gh wa _ ku k egh qwaaq eftuq _ .
yuggagh m _ igh saq gh wa _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ .
maaten wha _ megh m _ evlug ughte mangite ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh luni _ wata _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
sukate luni _ qiighqagh kun _ tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag luni _ qaya ghhagh ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ uunghagh ghhagh ni _ awataghpag ni _ tugulagh luki _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ esla mi _ nanigh ghhagh _ kumang alghii _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
kiyaghte ma luku _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ aragh magh mi _ tagi ma lghii _ .
nanigh ghhagh kun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ nugh qagh simalghii _ .
Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ Aghhaghhangaawr aay _ , _ Aghhaghhangaawr aay _ qilu ten _ tagivagh ki _ sukate luki _ ! _ â
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ neghsagh m _ qilu i _ tuune ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh _ agitaghte yalghiimi _ talwa _ qam av erugllak _ ggute ghllag _ .
qilu t _ negh luki _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ .
kalefkaghte luni _ allameng _ nugh qagh simalghii _ .
N ugh qagh san _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ kemagnagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ all am eng nuug umalghii _ .
nuug luni _ Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ Aghhaghhangaawr aay _ , _ Aghhaghhangaawr aay _ , _ ighsaqugh n _ tagivagh ghhu _ . _ â

tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Aghhaghhangaawr aay _ ,

tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t llu _ kalefkaghte ma lghiit _ nuna mun _ .

taagken _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ malighqagh ma kangi _ awataghpag t _ nuughqaghte luteng _ kalefkaghte aqe luteng _ .
suna _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ mengteghagh mete te _ it qagh ta _ .

aagra mun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t _ amig m _ esl at angani _ .

aghnalqwaagh _ qeteghte ma lghii _ .
qeteghte yan _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ ighsalqagh gkenkun _ nunugh yagh kete ni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ tuqute ma kanga _ .
