â _ qayughllak _ qugili ghllag lghiinga _ , _ saama _ alignagh m _ . _ â
yug m _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mengteghagh ghllag mun _ .
itghute ma kanga _ .
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ aghnagh mi _ whani _ enta _ qaagna _ kelgugh ghhu _ .
qamagte luni _ taghnughhagh ke te luni _ tagi laghate li _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ kelgugh aa _ qamagte luku _ .
â _ Taa waa _ qamagte aqa _ . _ â
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ aqnigh lghii _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ qaan ghani _ uunghagh _ ama _ aneghte aqe uq _ kenegh meng _ .
mulunghituq _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ tagi laghate te ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ itegh aa tut _ nanevgagh ke te luteng _ aghnalqwaagh ke te luteng _ taghnughhagh ke te luteng _ leganqun _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ .
Aghhaghh an aaw r aam pimakangi _ , _ â _ En tan an iq qaam teggu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ nanigh _ qaamllug qu _ nategh mun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ enta _ kayusigh tengnga _ .
kina _ ilagaate leg _ ilagaate mineng _ ilagagh li _ .
iiwen _ ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ temngi _ aragh li _ .
iiwen _ aanqute kuma _ aan qu llgh asi _ . _ â
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute uq _ .
tamana _ ellmeng _ ilagaate meggneng _ aanqute uq _ .
ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ aragh te ghllag uq _ .
aragh te ma luki _ Aghhaghh aaw r aam _ tughneghagh _ aqnigh lghii _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ uunghagh ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ aanqaghte ma lghii _ eslate mun _ .
aanqaghte luni _ taagken _ qimag ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh t _ nepiigh aghtagh te ma lghiit _ .
nepiigh aghtagh te yata _ tughneghagh m _ nulighh an _ nanigh _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itghute luku _ kumagh simakanga _ .
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ tuquma lghii _ .
An qagh lluteng _ Aghhaghh ang aw raq _ malighqagh ma kangat _ .
pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ ii teg Ê¼ un _ kaate kumken _ neghe lleqe kemken _ .
sangavek _ iqlengiqe ma ziin _ ? _ â
I w em ga _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ unite ma kangi _ .
qaya ghhagh ni _ aliigh ma kanga _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaya ghhagh _ , _ qaya ghhagh _ megh mun _ piiften _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ qaya ghhagh _ megh mun _ piifte ma lghii _ .
Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ qaya minun _ kaa tuq _ .
uugte luni _ kete uq _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ esnagh mun _ kaat quute ma lghii t _ .
tughneghagh t _ megh mun _ ate y iil nguut _ .
ataasigh m _ tughneghagh m _ megh _ megh ma kanga _ .
megh yagh kete ni _ Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ tug negh aam _ qaangh anun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ qay amin ilnguq _ tep lug gaq _ tugu luku _ megh _ anagutagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ uteghte ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ tughneghagh m _ tugu mangite ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nuna mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tamlag luni _ qaya ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ mengteghagh minun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ angayuqagh gni _ esghagh ma kek _ .
qagugh mig te lutek _ aqumga aqe uk _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qenwat _ tuqu ni luten _ pi aqe amken _ . _ â
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nakaa _ , _ entaqun _ anglegute nka _ nallu te te meggneng _ tuqu laghate te ma ut _ .
maaten _ whanga _ uyavagh nun _ aghulaqe ghngaaghma _ kitum _ tuqute naanghite aanga _ .
whanga _ nanevgagh lunga _ tuqu lleqe unga _ . _ â
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
ungipaghagh an _ Qig ighh mii k
iimnanguq _ , _ Qig ighh mii k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ anglegutku llghii k yay waal ing iighh aak _ .
Qig igh taq _ mengteghaghtu pigte lghii _ .
ama _ umiileg leg t _ .
umiileg at _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
awen _ iiwleng _ aghvenge aqe lghiit _ .
Aghveng engh aani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ esnagh mun _ atghagh aghaq elghiik _ .
kaate nghata _ umiileg m _ uqugh mun _ sii ngwaagh atagh aqeg kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ ava u na tek _ tagl aam aqelghiik _ taawanginaq _ mesiigh mun _ angighte te lutek _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ mengteghagh mun _ taglagh nghaani _ esnagh mun _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ atgh aam aqelghiik _ .
kaate negh meggni _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ ikugh qu te ma aqe lghiik _ ama _ kemekrag meng _ .
taglagh lutek _ kaate negh meggni _ n ut aan negh um aaq elghiik _ .
ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aan enghani _ umiileg m _ sii ngwaagh at aam aqegkanga _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ maa nte kumtung _ tuqu lleqe ainkung _ .
upupeng _ qaya ngllagh lutung _ aghulaq elq ung _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nayag an _ aan gh umakanga _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii neng _ .
qayagh _ taaqe yamigu _ tanpegh ghhagh ghhagh meng _ qem gugh til utek _ nayag ke te lghiik _ il aghtu u simakangat _ .
taaqe yamegteki _ qayagh eng _ amigh ma kangat _ .
qaya ghrukutaaghllag _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii _ taa qum ak anag t _ .
Mekelghiighh aam nayag g ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ maani _ ataasigh meng _ qavaa ltung _ .
unaami _ unang uluku _ mengteghagh ut _ naafqellug qu _ k ellgh akun g _ . _ â
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
unug yagu _ negh ma lghiik _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
taagken _ unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ mengteghagh eng _ naaf qum ak an at _ .
Unang upig lluku _ kete ma lghiik _ .
ukiivag m _ tunganganun _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ aghn elqusiq _ .
unug yagu _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ qal pegh lluku _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ ukiivag mun _ .
meghnugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ uyghigh luku _ angy atagh qu umalghiik _ .
taagken _ negh ma lghiik _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uyughagh ni _ atugh te ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya mini _ nalughqutagh ma lghii _ .
Megh nun gh yami _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ angwaagh ltung _ . _ â
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ angwaagh uk _ .
unug yagu _ uyghigh laatagh uk _ .
uyghigh lutek _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ angwaagh aqe lghiik _ aghn elqusiq _ .
aghnegh m _ qukaghyag u _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ enta _ negh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghuliigh lutek _ qayagh ek _ uyghigh luku _ negh uk _ .
taaqe yamek _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ atugh te nga _ , _ aghula naqe unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ atugh te luku _ nayag an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aghula ma lghii _ .
meghnugh yami _ taaqe luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ uy ghi n _ amu gu _ .
angwaagh ltung _ ! _ â
nayag an _ uy ghi n _ amu ma kanga _ , _ enkaam _ angwaagh uk _ .
iiwenllu _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ nuna _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
taagken _ taku ma kangat _ .
sukate luni _ nuna _ angli ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tamlag ma lghiik _ .
arekull _ ukiivag mun _ kaate aqe uk _ .
qute mun _ ug llegh aa simalghiik _ .
qayagh eng _ sayug ma ka ak _ .
sayug luku _ aaw gh simak angak _ .
mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghiik _ .
Sivul igh pig agh teggun _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
Itegh aa sam ek mekelghiighhaq _ qiighw ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ ineqsunagh ghllag lghii _ aagra meng _ nuug ma lghii _ .
aleghqugh yalghiimi _ qagh itu m raag llaguftuq _ , _ â _ Kaa ay _ , _ saam _ taghnughhagh ke istek _ ?
maani _ aviite usi _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Qig ighh mii ngu u kung _ . _ â
â _ aa _ , _ sa kun _ tagi stek _ ? _ â
â _ qaya kun _ tagi kung _ .
Qayugh llak nun amnni _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ , _ enngaatall _ umiileg ut _ seghlegh pigu uq _ , _ naqam _ aghvenge yu pigte uq _ .
Aghveng enghani _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ ama _ uqugh mun _ siing v ag atagh aqiin kung _ .
llaaghanwha _ ava ngunaamtung _ taglagh aqe ukung _ mengteghagh mnnun _ .
kaate negh mtung _ sa meng _ negh ltung _ .
taawanginaq _ igatagh lutung _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikung _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ taglagh nghaani _ itagnatun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh aqe lghiikung _ .
pilagkagh meng _ ikugh qu te aqe lghiikung _ .
enkaam _ taglagh aqe lghiikung _ .
taglagh negh mtung _ wetku _ negh aqe lghiikung _ .
En kaam am _ tea- ma ken _ ukavek _ tagi kung _ tuqute na yu kanginkung _ . _ â
aghnagh ghllag _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ en kaam pimalghii _ , _ â _ waran wha _ avaqutagh ke lleqe amtek _ .
qamavek _ aagra mun _ itegh tek _ .
asangsi _ ugi ka _ tagi kuni _ qevuute luni _ quya lleqe uq _ . _ â
Itegh a simalghiik _ aagra mun _ .
aghnagh m _ ugi mineng _ utaqa i te kete luku _ neqlightugh ma kek _ .
negh ma lukek _ sama _ ugi a _ kavleg u uute ma lghii _ .

â _ whaante unga _ . _ â
yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .

ukavek _ tukughqagh ghhagh leg nun _ ivagh i u kung _ nani _ inqun _ pinitun _ kiyaghte na lutung _ .
qayughllak _ nuna mnni _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ .

yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ ? _ â
â _ Aghveng enghani _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ mesiigh mun _ sii ngwaagh atagh aqiin kung _ .

mulu nghite uk _ nanevg aghh av ak lu _ aghnalqwaagh ghllag llu _ itegh aa simalghiik _ .

enkaam _ nanevgagh ghllag llu _ aghnalqwaagh ghllag llu _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .

talwa _ sang ighh aghmeng _ mekestaaghhaa luku _ tuun aanghi tanka _ .

yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ asangsi _ whanga _ nanglleg ke naanghite anka _ ! _ â
nuliigh ni _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ â _ enta _ whanga _ angayuqagh nka _ aqfa aghte ki _ .

Aqel q at nagas ug tut _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ aane uq _ .
ugi mi _ angayuqagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ ugi mi _ angayuqagh kek _ ungipaate ma kek _ , _ â _ ugi ma _ aqfa sqe aisi _ aglagh qagh tek nguq _ ungipaghagh yaghtugh tek _ . _ â
nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ aghnagh l qwaagh llaklu _ angegh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qaywa _ qaywa _ aglagh naqe ukung _ ! _ â

â _ tagi naqe uk _ . _ â
aghnagh _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh llu _ nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ itegh aa simalghiik _ .
yug k _ pi te ma lghiik _ , _ â _ whanga _ aqfa ste aqe amsi _ inqun _ aqelqagh k _ pellagh yug lghiik _ ungipaghagh te sqellug kek _ .
nuliigh ma _ angayuqagh kek _ tagiyagh uk _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ yaghlegi _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ milegmiqe ak _ .

yuug _ nepiigh yan _ nanevgagh ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ enta _ ungipaghagh langa _ . _ â
â _ iimnanguq _ , _ nunatagh mii t _ mengteghagh t _ malghugnegh ghhagh t _ .
ataasigh mi _ mengteghagh mi _ kiyaghte lghiik _ yuug llu _ aghnagh llu _ nulighh ghqu te ii na lghiik _ .
ilangani _ mengteghagh ni _ kiyaghte lghiik _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ nengyugh ke te lghiik _ eltugh aqe te lghiik _ .
yuug _ un angy upig llegh ii _ .
naqam _ neqete nghmini _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ neqe meng _ awaligh aqe kanga _ .
enngaatall _ aghnal waaghh aqlu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ pinitun _ yug m _ kiyagh te simakek _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ .
eltughagh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqnigh yagh kuma _ ! _ â _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ â _ sangavek _ ? _ â _ â _ qayughllak _ unguva nghmeng _ qinuyagute unga _ .
qemall _ aqnigh lunga _ tuqu yagh kuma _ aghnagh _ iigna _ aqfa nayagh an _ enkaam _ ughvugh qen nayagh anga _ .
ughvughqe i na ma lunga _ iiggagh aneng _ taagken _ ifla nayagh unga _ .
qemall _ aghnagh kun _ tagi nayagh unga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ . _ â _ â _ neghe pigesnagh na luten _ ! _ â _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Qayugh llak kiyagh h neghmeng _ qinuyagute unga _ ! _ â _ nepiigh luni _ aqniima lghii _ .
Aq nii malgh i _ , _ aqniima lghii _ .
maalghug gneng _ qavagh luni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ tuquma lghii _ .
tuqu yan _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ aghnagh _ aqfa yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
aane luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ nunalgute minun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aagra meng _ aghnagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
aapte ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ â _ S aq waagh sin _ ? _ â
â _ nengyugh ghhagh ka _ tuquma uq _ , _ inqun _ ughvughqe aghte sqellug qu _ aqfa amken _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaywa _ aglagh naqe unga _ , _ utaqa nga _ ! _ â
enkaam _ aglagh ma lghiik _ mengteghagh mun _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aghnagh m _ ughvughqe ma kanga _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aghnagh m _ iiggagh aneng _ kuuve ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ wata _ ughvughqe ma kanga _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ qenwat _ iigge stun _ angkaliigh uq _ .
taawa _ aghnagh m _ ughvughqe a _ .
qenwat _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ iiggagh aneng _ ifla uq _ .
ifla yan _ aghnagh m _ signegh k _ kuuve yaghtugh ma kek _ .
kuuve lukek _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ tuune ma kek _ .
aghnagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
kaate luni _ ii tegh luni _ ugi a _ puuru _ aane luni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yug m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ mengteghagh n _ naafqellug qu _ whangkunnun _ aglagh a _ . _ â _ mekelghiigh _ yug m _ pillgh aa tun _ pi ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ yug m _ nulighh a _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ .
aghnagh m _ atigh ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh meng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qav aghh in aghqun _ angli uq _ .
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aaghwte uq _ .
qavagh luteng _ taghtugh yalghiimeng _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ piyug yaaghte ma lghii _ .
allameng _ qavagh luteng _ taghtugh yalghiimeng _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ akuzi yagute ma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ angli uq _ .
ategh a _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
qenwat _ qawaagte yagute uq _ .
yaywaali ngiighhagh nkuk _ taam llu _ yug m _ ighnegh a _ mughute aqe lghiik _ .
mughute negh megteni _ unange aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ ivagh i nigh ughte ngughte uk _ .
puuru _ yuug _ mughute nanigh uq _ .
ama _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiit _ .
tefaay _ !
taawa _ ungipaghagh unga _ . _ â
nanevgagh _ ungipaghagh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ negh lta _ !
neqnigh lghii meng _ neqe meng _ itghuten _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ neqe meng _ neqnigh lghii meng _ all aghh in aghmeng _ itghute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ negh ma lghiit _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yata _ aghnal gh waaghh aqlu _ nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .
Agl aam alghii k mengtegh ameggnun _ .
unug yagu _ aghnagh m _ allighagh t _ saag simakangi _ .
ingaghte uute luteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yam eng aghn am kal ngani _ itghute ma kanga _ .
It ghus amig u pilugug et _ maalghug neghet _ nusug ma kangi _ ila i _ agha m _ pilugug i _ , _ ila i _ yug m _ pilugug i _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ pilugug luni _ aane ma lghiik _ .
enngaatall _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ pinitun _ lliigh uk _ ama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
angli yata _ yug m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aghnaghagh meng _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii meng _ nulightugh te simakanga _ .
aghnagh aq _ yuukegte pigte lghii meng _ ugiigh te simakanga _ .
taawa _ piit im _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ !
ungipaghagh an _ Yaq elleng etaq
iimnanguq _ yaq elleng e taak _ naa ke te lghiik _ .
nuna m _ asing anil nguuk _ yug stun _ ayuqe lghiik _ .
ighnegh a _ alignagh lghii _ .
aghneq _ tamaghhagh an _ ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
ilagagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ aneghte aqe lghii _ , _ â _ I iy h ii- h ii- h i- h ii y _ , _ Tengag erg en tuq _ ( _ 1 _ ) _ nulighh igh yaghtugh kegka _ ! _ â
naa an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ tengagergete _ aange ghllag uq _ nagaqugh lleqe aaten _ .
nepiigh i _ !
ellnga n _ ulima aqe ainkut _ whangkuta _ .
naagu mi _ ikiwan _ qaayng anil nguum _ nateghqagh meggnun _ angighhe te aqe kanginkut _ . _ â
ighnegh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ gaymaangi _ nul iighh igh naqaqa _ . _ â
ayumigh _ apegh aqe aat _ angegh ghllag lghii _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ aghtagh aam _ tungang anilnguq _ ategh a _ tengagergete _ .
ayumigh _ waam segh aghtet _ yugu na iqe aat _ .
whangkuta nge uq _ Tengag ergem _ ulima aqe ainkut _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yaq elleng etaq _ aane luni _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ vegtagh ma lghii _ .
vegtagh luni _ vegaagh t _ r at amiir ag nekun _ qantagh luki _ itghute ma kangi _ .
itghute luki _ piighhe ma kangi _ .
apeghiigh yamiki _ akmag ma kangi _ .
akmag luki _ aghulaqum simakangi _ .
Tengag erg emun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
paye gnun _ kaate ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte yalghiimi _ mengteghagh t _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ .
taagken _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aagra m _ ila aneng _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ kinangaawa _ ? _ â

â _ kina _ elpek _ ? _ â
â _ Yaq elleng etaq _ . _ â

Yaq elleng e taam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nulighh igh yaghtugh amken _ ! _ â
â _ Uk ak u _ nalleghiite uten _ !
enta _ itegh i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yaq elleng etaq _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Tengag erg em nuligh q ek maalghug uf tuk _ , _ ataasigh _ unug em paniga _ , _ ila a _ siqin ghem _ panig a _ .
Yaq elleng etaq _ siqin ghem _ panig an _ saaghw anun _ ineqsunagh llegh akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .

Siqin ghem _ panig a _ sag legh egneng _ tugu tete luni _ nategh mun _ ategh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ siinu mi _ kavlegtagh uq _ .
kavlegtagh luni _ itegh uq _ .
itegh luni _ sagnegh k _ kanagh ak _ .
â _ taawa _ sagnegh k _ . _ â

Yaq elleng e taam _ tugu lukek _ megh ma kek _ .
taagken _ tengagergete _ ilagagh naqe ma lghii _ .
unug yagu _ nanigh _ awite ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tengagergete _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh- ni _ qagi t _ tuqlugh ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh i _ qagi t _ tagi ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ amig kun _ itegh ma lghiit _ .
aagra at _ megh ughte ghllag ma lghii _ .

aane yata _ tengagergete _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ enta _ nighug u te aghte tek _ .

llaaghanwha _ nighug u te ma lghiit _ .
Yaq elleng etaq _ qavagh aqe uq _ .
taagken _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ .
tughneghagh- ni _ nanugh _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ .
tagi yalghiimi _ aglu kek _ mengqughtagh ma lghiik _ .
mengqughtagh lutek _ nanugh _ aane ma lghii _ .
tengagergete _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ allameng _ kumagh qagh tek _ . _ â
kumaghsagh lghii meng _ yaq elleng etaq _ qavagh aqe uq _ , _ nanugh m _ negh mangite ma kanga _ .

taagken _ allameng _ kumaghsagh lghii meng _ tengagergete _ pilugug aqe uq _ .

aane yan _ yaq elleng e taam _ siqin ghem _ panig a _ pilugug sqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ aane ma lghiik _ .

kaat ute te luku _ vegaagh meng _ piighhagh mineng _ uyatu i ma kanga _ .
asitmun _ ukig simakanga _ .
taagken _ ellnga llu _ ukig ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yaq elleng etaq _ nulightugh uq _ .
taagken _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
Unang uluku _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ .

aane luni _ anigu _ aghnangllagh ma kanga _ .

llaaghanwha _ tengagergete _ ukig ma lghii _ .

vuvalla a _ Ay apegh yugem
vuvalla m _ sanqut angi _ sivuligh _ qaligh k _ , _ signegh t _ , _ qaltaghwaagh k _ , _ aghqe sigh ghhagh k _ tughneghagh nun _ , _ saguyagh k _ , _ tagnegh lghii _ nanigh ghhagh _ kumang alghii _ .
vuvalla m _ yug a _ unang uluku _ pi nga yu mi _ kellaag gni _ nekegte aqe aat _ vuvalla _ .
taaqe nghmegteggu _ vuvalla m _ yug a _ aane aqe uq _ esla mun _ .
Kiyagh t allegh mun _ kelgute aqe uq _ mumegh meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ nalighmeng _ aquutagh meng _ .
aragh aqe uq _ , _ â _ W u-h uu- h uu- h uu- uu _ , _ w u-h uu- h uu- h uu- uu _ , _ w u-h uu- uu _ , _ w u-h uu- uu _ ! _ â
taagken _ vuvalla m _ yug a _ ategh aqe uq _ nategh mun _ .
nuliigh ni _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ enta _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ ! _ â
nulighh an _ tuune aqe ak _ .
K aag tu usim ag kenka _ uzive aqe uq _ ilagagh aqe uq _ uzive te kete luku _ .
ilagagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ pi aqe ai _ , _ â _ qaagna _ nanevgagh _ ungipaate qugh teggu _ .
legan _ whaten _ pi nakesi _ , _ â _ W u- w uu- u-h uu- uu _ , _ w u- w u- u-h uu- uu _ , _ neghsagh yagh i uute usi _ , _ pugnegh yagh i uute usi _ , _ iqallug yagh i uute usi _ , _ tengug yagh i uute usi _ , _ aku tagh yagh ii tusi _ .
Ay apegh y uk _ vuvall aaq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ avii yaghtugh aqe ut _ mengteghagh nun _ tamaghh anun _ nanevgagh at _ aghnalqwaagh t _ .
aapte aqe ait _ , _ â _ navek _ ? _ â
pi aqe ut _ , _ â _ Ay apegh yugmun _ ! _ â
nanevgagh at _ aglagh uute aqe ut _ vuvall alghiinun _ negh na luteng _ qetustaaghhagh meng _ .
tawani _ ungipamsug te aqe ut _ ungipaghagh te aqe ut _ kay al qii raagh utaqut _ saama _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ vuvall am aluki _ alla nun _ neqe meng _ sanqut aaghmeng _ tuune i naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
aghtaghagh nghagu _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _ unegte aqe ut _ .
V uvall alghiit _ ateghaate aqe ut _ nategh mun _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ iiwen _ kinku t _ tawavek _ ila tke aat _ .
ilate naqe negh meggni _ mengteghagh meggneng _ tugutagh ke ut _ tawaqa meng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ ivalu meng _ inqun _ vuvall alghiit _ mengteghagh it _ qilleghte vike na luki _ .
Unang uluku _ ungipaghagh te aqe ut _ ungipamsug te aqe ut _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ negh te aqe ut _ siqin ghem _ piite llegh anun _ kenle anun _ .
siqinegh _ piite nghaani _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _ unegte aqe ut _ .
nategh mun _ ateghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ vuvall alghii tlu _ .
ateghaate negh meggni _ quyng iir aat eng _ tugulagh aqe ait _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ ikute uute aqe ut _ .
esla mun _ aane aqe negh meggni _ quyng iir aat eng _ lliv ikugh aqiit _ .
aanleghaate luteng _ milugh qutagh aqe ut _ tughneghagh nun _ kiyaghtaallegh mun _ megh m _ yug anun _ .
T aq neghmeggni _ itegh aataqut _ .
Itegh all uteng _ aghnalqwaagh t _ uyegte aqe ai _ ataasigh m _ aghnalqwaagh m _ .
taaqe nghatki _ vuvall al ek nuliigh minun _ saguyagh gni _ tungsigh aqe ak _ .
nulighh an _ saguyagh k _ tuune aqe ak _ .
vuvalla legte aq _ uzive aqe uq _ .
iiwen _ vuvalla yaghtuqagh t _ iiwen _ avaquti a _ .
ellnga _ vuvalla legte aq _ sag uyag tuumaghmi _ uzive aqe uq _ .
Nanevg aam _ ilagagh te aqe a _ utuqa meng _ ilagagh ta meng _ .
vuvalla legte aq _ avii aqe uq _ , _ â _ W u h uu uu _ , _ w u h uu uu _ , _ w u h uu uu _ ! _ â
ilagaate _ naang enghani _ uzive lghiit _ aghuliigh aqe ut _ .
aghuliigh nghata _ vuvalla legtagh m _ kallagte te aqe ai _ .
aghnagh t _ putuugh te aqe ut _ iiwen _ kitum _ ata a _ naten _ pi aqa _ yug a _ .
taana _ aghulasigh ke aqe aat _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tungtu ghllag _ enkaam _ Kav eng engh aghhaq
iimnanguq _ , _ tungtu ghllag _ esnagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ kayengenghaghhagh _ .
Kay eng engh aghh aam agh iv am akanga _ , _ â _ tungtu _ paagna _ aqsa allugh _ , _ tungtu _ paagna _ sighunegh allugh _ , _ ighu kek _ am est aghhaak _ , _ talligh kek _ am est aghhaak _ . _ â
tungtu ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Kay eng engh aghh aay _ , _ kay eng engh aaghh aay _ ukapighqaagh i _ !
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ . _ â
Kay eng egh aghhaq _ ukapighqaagh ma lghii _ .
tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ eg llegh simakanga _ esnagh mun _ .
kayengenghaghhagh _ aragh ma lghii _ , _ â _ uvinke a _ tukrug a _ , _ papasqugh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ qanegh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ metengtagh nka _ tukrugtagh i _ ! _ â
itagnatun _ tungtu ghllag m _ kayengenghaghhagh _ megh mun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
Kay eng engh aghhaam _ tungtu ghllag _ aghiva laatagh aa _ , _ â _ tungtu _ paagna _ aqsa allugh _ , _ tungtu _ paagna _ sighunegh allugh _ , _ ighu kek _ am est aghhaak _ , _ talligh kek _ am est aghhaak _ . _ â
tungtu ghllag m _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ â _ Kay eng engh aghh aay _ , _ kay eng engh aaghh aay _ ukapighqaagh i _ !
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ . _ â
Kay eng egh aghhaq _ ukapighqaagh ma lghii _ .
tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ eg llegh simakanga _ esnagh mun _ .
kayengenghaghhagh _ aragh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ uvinke a _ tukrug a _ , _ papasqugh ka _ tukrug a _ qanegh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ metengtagh nka _ tukrugtagh i _ ! _ â
tuquma lghii _ tuk ruugh qwaa yaqenni _ .
T uk ruugh q _ waa yan _ tungtu ghllag m _ negh ma kanga _ .
tungtu ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ kayengenghaghhagh _ taana _ neq n ir k apig gaq _ . _ â
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
nuna meng _ uzive ikagh _ paallghu nkuk _ ama _ Qet ngallegh y ankuk
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ kumag _ umiileg _ qam ar ilak ayuk _ .
ilangani _ kiig m _ kumag m _ nunalgute ni _ pi ma kangi _ paallghu nkut _ , _ qet ngallegh y ankut _ apayepayiigh nkut _ ama _ melngu nkut _ .
pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ Qam ar il an aqunga _ !
Qem gugh utek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ kumag m _ mengteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ .
taagken _ qamarila m _ ayaviigh a _ kingutagh leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
kumag m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ qet ngallegh yaq lu _ paallghu llu _ nuna _ uzive teggu _ .
elpek tek _ melngu llu _ apayepayiigh llu _ naayghagh _ uzive teggu _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aga _ kilg aquu simalghiik _ qet ngallegh y ankuk _ paallghu nkuk _ .
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ meghnaali ma lghiik _ .
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
legan _ kaate yamek _ aneghte ma lghiik _ pekagh nigh ke utek _ .
apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ naayghagh _ .
qesiqun _ paallghu nkuk _ qet ngallegh y ankuk _ uygh al qusigh haq _ uzive ma kangat _ .
ama _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ .
llaaghanwha _ kumag m _ paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ avaqutagh mi _ atkug aneng _ qatelghii meng _ , _ enraq _ qet ngallegh y aq _ tuune ma kanga _ ayaviigh meng _ .
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ enraq _ melngu _ aghyuugh ma kanga _ sumeghnegh ke luku _ .
ellnga _ kumag _ aklungi msuggagh igh te ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tungtu _ Aq anga
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ aghnaanegh _ tungtu _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ighni naqe ma lghii _ .
ighni naqe ma luku _ amaa ghllag k _ maalghug _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
amaa ghllag m _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ tuqute lteggu _ ! _ â
legan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ ighni aghte li _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ ighni ma lghii _ .
ighni yan _ aghnagh _ taana _ tungtu _ tuqute luku _ negh ma kangat _ qamagte luku _ .
qamagte yatgu _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ taghnughhagh a _ tuqute luku _ negh lteggu _ ! _ â
aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ wetku _ angli kan _ negh nak efut _ .
salin _ maaten _ kemgite uq _ . _ â
At im af taat _ Aq ang ameng _ .
taagken _ aga _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ amaa k _ taake uk _ .
aga _ talugh qaghte yaag a _ Aq ang ang iighhaq _ nekeve luni _ tan- a _ naayghagh _ mayugh ma kanga _ pegnem _ .
qaygeghte yamigu _ ukig luni _ inglu anun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ aghn elqusiq _ ulape ma lghii _ .
nasiqute luku _ tagi yaghqaaghte negh an _ ne mineng _ aglagh luni _ unglegh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ pal aghhaghmeng _ k iyaq aat angaa _ tag im al ghh k _ amaa k _ taake uk _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
aghneqwaaqun _ aghulaq engh egkeni _ ulape aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ amaa k _ ama _ taana llu _ tungtu _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ amaa m _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ tuqute luku _ negh lteggu _ ! _ â
aag llegh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
I w em ga _ Aq angam _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ egyug usi _ .
wiin _ whanga llu _ nanghiiqu aghte ngnga _ kayaalqii raagh meng _ . _ â
taagken _ Aq ang ay eng _ amaa k _ malighqughtagh ma ka ak _ .
sivuke luni _ Aq anga _ temngi _ nal um simeng _ qimag ma lghii _ .
qaygeghte yami _ ukig luni _ naayghagh m _ inglu anun _ tawaten _ qimag ma lghii _ .
amaa k _ malighqugh nghmeng _ pekagh ghllag lutek _ aghuliigh te ma kangat _ .
ila a _ amu a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Taam eng wha _ Aq anga _ qugili igate uq _ ! _ â
taagken _ ila yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tawa _ ellnga _ alla _ kitum _ qinuyugte naanghite a _ ! _ â
Aq anga _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
uksugh mi _ ilangani _ teghigagh _ tam ag ghagh mi _ qem gu umalghii _ Aq anga _ naanghagh igh na luku _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ pi aqe yagh kangat _ .
Aq angam _ sighunegh mineng _ egte ma aqe kangi _ .
tamana _ teghigagh _ qamagte luku _ tuqu qu ma kanga _ .
ungleghtagh aqe lghii _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ esghagh luku _ temngi _ quyngigh u ni luku _ taku aqe yagh kangat _ .
liigike nghmegteggu _ negugh aqe kangat _ aleghqugh magh meng _ , _ â _ Aq ang ang iighhaq _ qavagh sighagh aqelghii _ . _ â
Aq anga _ miiwen llu _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ iike te ma uk
kiyaghte ma uq _ ungazigh mi _ aghnagh _ ugi leg _ enkaam _ taghnughhagh llgagh ak _ .
ilangani _ ugingighagh u ma lghii _ .
sighineg mii m _ yug m _ nulighh ite ngugh m _ nagaqugh luku _ ungazigh mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ aghnagh _ tugu ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ sighineg mun _ aghvigh te ma kanga _ .
naqam _ taana _ sighineg mii _ yuug _ aklung ilnguq _ .
kaa sa mi _ taake uk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ ata an _ ighleke aqe kek _ pi aqe kek _ , _ â _ qaagkut _ amyuqetagh ghllag ut _ .
amyuutke lleqe aisi _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aag negh megteni _ naayghagh nun _ aghulaqe aqe lghiik _ .
tespagani _ ul ap um algh n k _ inqun _ iknaqughi na lutek _ .
ata ita _ waamte ma kek _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ iknaqughi sqellug kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ iknaqughi ma lghiik _ saama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ uksugh m _ unang uluku _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ .
tagi yamek _ nagnegh lutek _ esavghagh te lghii nun _ maligte te ma lghiik _ .
tamana _ yuug _ naghughte qugh luku _ awaligh pig aal utek _ ketfagh aqe lghiik _ .

ineqsunagh pigte lghii _ pinigh pigte lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ aghnaghagh m _ , _ â _ ugi ke naanghite aqa _ .
seghlegh pestaagh u uq _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ uteghte pagte ma lghii _ .
â _ iitek llu _ kuuve i ste u luten _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh mun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ yugyag ghllaget _ .
qesiqun _ Ay mang aaw em _ ugi ke aqe ai _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh i _ qullug k _ kuuve yaghtugh kek _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ itegh luni _ taake uk _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ ugate mii ii aghte ma lghii _ pegnem _ ullegh aghte vzigh aqe luni _ .
maaten _ alla _ amllugh naqe yalghiimi _ kuuve ma kek _ taagavek _ ug atang anil ngughnun _ sanqute nun _ .
allameng _ ig leq aghluni _ inglu anun _ enraq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
amig mun _ amllugh luni _ aan aq sal ghi mi _ manughagh kun _ qamagte lukek _ kuuve ma kek _ .
Ay mang aawen _ tap ghaghmeng _ es leg alghiimeng _ tugu tete luni _ kagsag pag at aamakanga _ mekelghiigh _ .
mekelghiigh _ aqnigh nghite uq _ qayughllak _ atkug a _ umu pigte lghii _ .
Ighivg aghy agu _ itegh aa tut _ .
negh luteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
ellnga _ mekelghiigh _ nategh mi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu na luni _ an qagh taa simalghii _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ tut qagh taq luku _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aki naqe ma kangi _ nagh ughh naq enghata _ ighu mineng _ itegmig qagh nghminiki _ nagh teghllag aqelghiit _ .
yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu te ma lghii _ Ay mang aaw enllu _ maligte te luni _ yuug _ taana llu _ mekelghiigh _ .
ghhatagh ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ sivuke luni _ piyug g aghmeng _ .
yug m _ tam atu m _ nenglagh qu magh an _ naghughte aqe kanga _ .
mekelghiigh _ uusneghwaagh mun _ talughte yami _ pilugug ni _ mat- aghte luki _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .
tamana _ y uuk naghugh qu umakanga _ .
taana _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghii _ .
tagimun _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh aq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aagyuq _ utaqa nga _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ utaqa naanghite amken _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh m _ avelghagh luku _ kaate ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ kaate luni _ tugu luku _ itghute ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ tugu ma kanga _ .
yuug _ tamana _ aglagh uute ma lghii _ ellmeng _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ mekelghiigh _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ata an _ aghnagh aam pimakanga _ , _ â _ siingenllu _ aghnagh _ afta kayugu uq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mengteghagh meng _ aveg te luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh m _ nuna anun _ .
kaate luteng _ mekelghiigh m _ ata an _ mengteghagh an _ kelut anganun _ mengteghagh u ma lghiit _ .
Mek legh iigh em _ naange a _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ mengteghagh t _ , _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh t _ .
aghnagh _ quyngigh neng _ alinge luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Aghn am ugini _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane luni _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ ugi minun _ apegh ma kanga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sama _ tagi uq _ ! _ â
ugi an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ negh sqe gu _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nuug luni _ negh sqesagh aa _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ aghnagh aq _ esghagh luku _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ itegh luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ mekelghiigh _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taana _ unaangu luku _ aghnegh m _ qukaa nun _ tuquma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ wetku _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ unguvagh ma lghii _ .
makete luni _ aatgh aamalghii _ .
kaate yan _ ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ muluugh ziin _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayughllak _ aghnagh aq _ ineqsunagh pigte uq _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ tazingani _ tuquma yagh unga _ . _ â
ata an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ whanga _ tuqu yagh langa _ ! _ â
ata a _ aane luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Qam ay _ , _ meghsi aghte ngnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ meghute _ imigh luku _ talligh ghhagh inagh mineng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
yug m _ pateg ma kanga _ meghute _ .
aghnaghagh m _ itagnatun _ imigh ma kanga _ .
naqam _ aghnagh aq _ sungaghaghqwaa luni _ nuug luni _ tuune ma kanga _ .
yug m _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh aq _ tuquma lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yan _ unguvagh luni _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ unaami _ yug m _ mek egh iighhaq _ kevgaagh qu ma kanga _ mekelghiigh meng _ an kun ameng _ ( _ 1 _ ) _ mughute lgute u luku _ .
mekelghiigh _ angegh ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ata ni _ mughute lghii _ maligte ma kanga _ .
unaangu ma lghiit _ .
ata an _ aghillug ni _ inglupigagh _ megh mun _ egte ma kanga _ aksaqe luni _ .
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ uuk _ aghillug ka _ megh mun _ at qagh tuq _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ enan _ alla neng _ aghillug igh ghhaaten _ ! _ â
wanlegi _ ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayughllak _ nuliigh ma _ ukini kaqe a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh _ qukagh mikun _ qaamqaghte luni _ ugmestaaghhagh mun _ siku mun _ ategh uq _ aqf agh iiq _ aghillug meng _ .
whaa _ aga _ ategh yan _ tapghagh a _ nengpagte yagh kete ni _ megh mun _ at qagh tesluku _ ata an _ sayug luku _ siku meng _ maligte ma kanga _ .
maligte luku _ kaape ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
tuqute yamigu _ mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
( _ 1 _ ) _ ruuseghmii t _ mumigte llegh ani _ qem g aghme ngu un iit _ ;
U uz ag em _ pillgh ani _ atg- ke te nagh u na ai _ , _ atg- qu uute yu i aaghek nguq _ qal iiraagh estun _ ayuqe lghiik _ .
kaa lli mi _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Ay mang aawen _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ugi n _ tuquma uq _ qayughllak _ ighleke ghngaamni _ aghillug ka _ aqf aam aa _ .
W as iin mi _ whanga _ ugi ke lleqe kevnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nanigh t _ qaam lluki _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
yuug _ masisu _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aghnaghagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
yuug _ qulligeg ii ma lghii _ .
qulligeg iigh luni _ uka _ ellnga nun _ tagi ma lghii _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ ugi n _ elpek _ tuquma uq _ , _ qayughllak _ ig lek egh ngaam ni _ naa minun _ aghillug _ ulima aqe ni luku _ .
aqfa naqe yagh kete ni _ kaleve uq _ .
W as iin mi _ whanga _ ugi ke lleqe kevnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nanigh t _ qaam lluki _ ilag aagh naq um aluku _ yug m _ taam _ akughtugh magh an _ qinunaghqe magh mi _ taku ma kanga _ ellnga _ .
aghnagh aq _ ilag aagh yalghiimi _ yuug _ taana _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qayughllak _ aghnagh aq _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ ilagagh kau luni _ .
aghnagh aq _ taana _ atghagh at aam alghii 2 _ .
atghaghatagh luni _ ugi mi _ tum anga _ tuumte ma kanga _ .
ategh ma lghii _ siku gnun _ .
ategh yalghiimi _ esghagh aa _ ugi ni _ savig ligh luni _ angvanegh mikun _ .
legan _ savig a _ amu luku _ u ilu umakanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ unguv aam algh n _ .
mekelghiigh _ piyug meng _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ atghaghatagh luni _ .
aghnagh aq _ inglegh kun _ aane ma lghii _ .
Aan y al ghi mi _ yuug _ esghagh aa _ .
Aku g tegh at alghii _ elq em sighagh meng _ . _ ( _ ? _ ) _ tawani _ pal aghhaghmeng _ kiyaghtaa lluteng _ mekelghiigh _ nategh mun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
qiighw ma lghii _ .
ata an _ q iil ghw ii _ nagaqugh luku _ qulligeg ni _ aate ma yagh kek _ .
aate ma kanga _ inglupigagh _ temkagh m _ ighu a _ inglu anun _ aate ma kanga _ ilep gh aaghem _ ighu a _ .
repall _ ata a _ aaghh wer eg aghmeng _ aane ma lghii _ , _ llangaqa _ pi nga yu neng _ ighu ke lghii _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aane ste nagh u na i ma kanga _ unegte sqellug qu _ .
ata a _ aane ma lghii _ .

qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
Qayaqsighvik
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ n im aaq _ Qayaqsighvik _ .
whaa _ salin _ taana _ kiyaghte uq _ nuna _ .
tawani _ nunugh a mi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ yuug _ avaqutaghtuqagh _ .
taawanginaq _ avaquti a _ yug m _ qayaghtugh u luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ qamagte luteng _ .
taagken _ uksugh mi _ ila i _ yug em nulighha _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ighni ma lghii _ .
Piyaq es eng _ taana _ taghnughhagh _ mekelghiigh u uq _ .
atigh ma kangat _ Qayaqsigh vig meng _ .
taagken _ angli te aatnga _ maligte luku _ quunpeng _ angalqataasigh meng _ petug luku _ .
kiyaghute ma kanga _ in qun am en _ anglegut angi tun _ tuqunagh yu kan _ .
qenwat _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aapute ma lghii _ Qayaqsighvik _ qayaghtugh na luni _ .
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ saama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayagh ite uten _ avangite uten _ . _ â
taagken _ Qayaqsighvik _ angegh ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ esnagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esnagh mi _ naalke ma kanga _ qaya m _ sivuyag a _ .
Q ak aqsigh vigem _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
kaate luni _ ata ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ Sang aw a _ taana _ ? _ â
ata an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ qaya m _ sivuyag ke a _ . _ â

ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan _ ulima tete naanghite amken _ . _ â
Qayaqsighvigem _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ ulima te nga _ whanga _ qaya meng _ ! _ â
taagken _ ata an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
ata a _ llaaghanwha _ ulima te ma lghii _ .
qayagh _ ata an _ taaqe ma kanga _ .
taaqe luku _ sivuyag akun _ ama _ angyaleg akun _ ukite ma kanga _ qayugh a _ .
unaami _ Qayaqsighvik _ aapute ma lghii _ ata minun _ qayaghtugh na luni _ .
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ sagiqe ma lghii _ .
ata an _ aan gh umakanga _ .
taagken _ ata an _ angalqataasigh _ saag simakanga _ .
saagllug qu _ qaya m _ sivuyag akun _ qepute ma kanga _ iqukrug a _ angalqataasigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ Qayaqsighvik _ kete ma lghii _ .
ata an _ tapghagh _ aaghh e simakanga _ .
qenwat _ naayghagh mun _ talughsi ma lghii _ .
taagken _ ata an _ amu ma kanga _ wetku _ aaghte yan _ .
tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag yalghiimi _ unaagh nge ughtagh ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
taagken _ taglaate ma kangit _ mengteghagh meggnun _ neghsagh t _ .

ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ sagiqe ma lghii _ .
ata an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsigh vik ke simalghii _ .
alla _ ata an _ aaghhe ste laatagh ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ temngi _ taagavek _ ketmiighte ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ talugh qaghte ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ esghagh ma kanga _ puugzagh _ qavagh lghii _ megh m _ qaye ani _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ uyavagh qu te _ puug ma lghii _ .
puug yan _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ uyavagh qu te _ puug ma lghii _ .
puug yan _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh laatagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ puug laatagh uq _ .
taku kestagh ghngaaghmigu _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ uyav an naq niluku _ .
taagken _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taglagh ma luku _ sukilpagh _ savinagh akun _ qaya m _ nalug uq _ .
nalug luni _ qaangh anun _ it qagh te simakek _ sugrug gni _ .
Qayaqsigh vik gg iis tu simakanga _ .
taagken _ taglagh ragkiigh ma lghii _ .
Igh legh utkelluku _ aglu kek _ meghnugh ma lghiik _ .
meghnugh yayek _ naallgh unnaq sagh aak _ sukilpagh _ wata _ itegh aghagh ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ gg iis tull aat aamakanga _ in qun am en _ itegh na yu kan _ .
taglagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aglu kek _ meghnugh ma lghiik _ .
naallghute na lukek _ aglu gni _ naallgh unnaq sagh aak _ sukilpagh _ itegh aghagh ma lghii _ , _ taawanginaq _ pap as q wa _ aliite luni _ unegte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag yan _ ata an _ taana _ sukilpagh _ nusug ma kanga _ .
qavaa ma lghiit _ unug yagu _ .
unaami _ Qayaqsighvik _ aapute ma lghii _ ata minun _ , _ â _ nunivag mun _ pi yaag qagh langa _ ? _ â
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ sagiqe ma lghii _ .
ata an _ llaaghanwha _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ Qayaqsighvik _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ meghnaali yuguma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ pennagh m _ asi akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqumga ma luku _ kaate ma lghii _ yuug _ savikenghaagh meng _ pilugug ke lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ naqam _ naatghigh lleg leg _ .
yug m _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii m _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ itegagh ni _ qanegh _ Qayaqsighvigem _ agitaghpagtagh ai _ .
yug m _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii m _ pi ma kanga _ Qayaqsighvik _ , _ â _ taana _ sa u a _ agitaghte pagte aghte a _ ? _ â
Qayaqsighvigem _ ighu ni _ ellnga nun _ qapragsagh kete ni _ yuug _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ pi gpenanga _ pilugug nka _ ukut _ pi lleqe aten _ ! _ â
Qayaqsighvigem _ taaqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ yug m _ pilugug ni _ tuune ma kangi _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ aate luki _ nekeve yalghiimi _ aga _ penniigh _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .
qesiqun _ taana _ yuug _ savikenghaagh meng _ pilugug ke lghii _ penniigh u aqe uq _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ tawavek _ mayugh ma lghii _ pennagh mun _ .
uugte yalghiimi _ saama _ pennagh m _ asi ani _ esghagh ma kanga _ negaghpag _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ ukig ma lghii _ .
ukig ma luku _ pika _ pennagh m _ qaye ani _ yuug _ esghagh ma kanga _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii _ taawanginaq _ aange pigte lghii _ .
Taam _ yugrukutaagh m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ naten _ ukig ziin _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ ukig lunga _ . _ â
nutaan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ ukig naqe yagh uq _ .
ifkagh ma lghii _ neghqwaagh ni _ ayemqugh luku _ tuqu luni _ .
taagken _ Qayaqsighvik _ ukig ma lghii _ .
naapte ma lghii _ negaghpag kun _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ awite te naqe yagh uq _ .
aghtugh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ aghneghte ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ unug yaghtugh aa _ Qayaqsighvigem _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
saama _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ aleghqugh waaq eftuq _ , _ â _ K ii ii ii _ , _ unaangu ma unga _ neghsagh meng _ ! _ â
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ naa p t ighluku _ taglaate ma kanga _ Qayaqsigh vik neghs aq _ .
ellmi ni _ maani _ yupig _ taawanginaq _ tuqu sighwaagh lghii _ .
taglaate kete luku _ itegagh ni _ Qayaqsighvigem _ uqfig kun _ eltugh tes aq enni _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ sivutmute _ iqu ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ itegagh ni _ awite qaghte yagh kete ni _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ nagh teghllag umalghii _ repall _ gginagh ni _ esnegti ghllag luku _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ igh yagh qelluni _ sivugte ma lghii _ .
taglaate ma kanga _ alla _ Qayaqsighvik _ .
enraq _ ama _ uqfig kun _ nuqnegh yagh lghii _ alla _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ sagiqe ma lghii _ sivutmute _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ peghhe qagh yagh kete ni _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ nagh ll aataamalghii _ repall _ gginagh ni _ es nigh t ighluku _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Itegh y an nulighhan _ quyake ma kanga _ .
Nanevg aghh aq neghs aq _ ilu anun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itghute luku _ ughugsigh ma kanga _ .
Qayugh llak taakut _ sumeghtaghagh u lghiit _ kumlama tete ni luku _ .
ellmi ni _ maani _ taakut _ pilugug ita _ savikenghaagh t _ llangaqa _ kumlama lghii stun _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ nulighh an _ afta yuguma kanga _ .
nutaan _ ulaagh ni _ tugu luku _ afta naqe yagh aa _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ esteqe ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ salin _ kumlama uq _ .
enan _ unaami _ afta naken _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ qavagh pen am _ tagh tuum aamalghii _ in qun am en _ neghsagh _ unguvagh na yu kan _ .
qavaghni yami _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ anagh ma lghii _ kelengake i stekaghqagh meng _ .
anag nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi _ anagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ anagh mni _ whani _ kelengake nakesi _ neghsagh _ taana _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh yan _ Qayaqsighvik _ nutaan _ payugte yagh uq _ qullug gnite ngughk _ anagh _ aragh ghllag ma lghii _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ makete luni _ esghagh luku _ neghsagh _ anagh ni _ ellmi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ anagh ka _ una _ iqlengagh sagh pigu a _ ! _ â
nanevgagh ghhagh _ ingaghte luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh yan _ Qayaqsighvik _ makete qaghte luni _ ghhukaghagh meng _ kuuve yagh kete ni _ anagh m _ iqukrug a _ siipte ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ ing aghagh simalghii _ .
mulu luni _ nutaan _ Qayaqsighvik _ payugte yagh uq _ anagh _ ar aghy al ghi mi _ llangaqa _ sa kun _ ukimallegh kun _ qineghte luni _ alla _ Qayaqsighvigem _ ghhukaghagh meng _ kuuve yagh kete ni _ talugh qaghte ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ makete luni _ tuqu qugh luki _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ temngi _ tespagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ , _ kii ii ii _ mengteghagh lghute ghllag t _ .
ataasigh nun _ mengteghagh nun _ itegh yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ yug lghute ghllag t _ taawanginaq _ ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ .
qesiqun _ taam _ aghnaghagh m _ kuug k aq e it ii _ .
aghnagh m _ taam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tugu laken _ ! _ â
naqam _ tea- ma kut _ yungestagh ghhagh t _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ angegh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
ilangani _ aghneghmi _ qaga _ esla mi _ ar a simalghiit _ , _ â _ nanugh yagh uq _ nan ugh yaghtu uu uq _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ tea- ma _ yuug _ aan legh a simalghii _ qamagte luni _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ nuliigh minun _ aapute yagh uq _ .
nulighh an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsigh vik aanumalghii _ .
aane yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kanga _ esnagh mi _ agig pegh waagh utaq eftuq _ yug lghute ghllag _ .
ellnga llu _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ saama _ esghagh ma kanga _ kana _ nanugh ghllag _ siku m _ esne ani _ .
nutaan _ naasqugh ni _ ipugte nghagu _ ar at aqelghiit _ , _ â _ U uu uu y _ , _ uu uu u y _ , _ uu uu u y _ , _ uu uu u y _ ! _ â
ila it _ aleghqu um algh em n g _ , _ â _ nanugh _ , _ nanugh _ , _ tanem _ , _ tanem _ ! _ â
qesiqun _ taana _ siku _ siku u nghite uq _ , _ naayvagh m _ pug llug a _ ama _ taana _ nanugh _ nanugh u nghite uq _ , _ ugugnaghagh u uq _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ teskanavek _ ketfagh luni _ ugugnaghagh _ tuute yagh kete ni _ si f tagh qumakanga _ .
Tam atu m _ aange nghite a _ tamana _ yuug _ aragh ma kanga _ , _ â _ nengagh u aq _ nanughagh uq _ tut qagh lluku _ ! _ â
taagken _ aglagh te ma kangat _ .
kaat ute te luku _ itghute ma kangat _ .
aghnagh m _ afta ma kanga _ .
afta luku _ gaagh ma kangat _ .
unug yan _ negh te ma lghiit _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ ugugnaghagh m _ tulimagh a _ yug m _ ataa sim kep su utk aqegkanga _ .
aghnagh m _ llilagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ Qayaqsigh vik neghi _ . _ â
Qayaqsighvik _ negh ma lghii _ .
maalghug _ ighu k _ ugugnaghagh m _ ighu kek _ negh ma kek _ .
taagken _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ aqsa a _ ken eg r aam aan _ , _ â _ kaay _ aqsa n _ aafkagh lleqe uq _ . _ â
unug ma kanga _ qavagh luteng _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ Qayaqsighvigem _ nag aqum akangi _ esla mi _ aragh te lghiit _ , _ â _ tungtuvag _ esghagh aghput _ ! _ â
taagken _ aanleghaate luteng _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ naayghagh nun _ .
ama _ Qayaqsigh vik lu _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ yug t _ iighagh uute lghiit _ .
legan _ makete kestagh nghaani _ alinge aqe lghiit _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ Qayaqsighvigem _ taana _ tungtu _ tungtu u nghite uq _ , _ kuun ii sang uftuq _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ tuute qaghte ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
aragh te ma lghii _ yuug _ tamana _ , _ â _ tungtuvag _ tuqute a _ neng aaw aam _ tuute qaghte luku _ !
yuug _ tamana _ atghagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
ama _ Qayaqsigh vik lu _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ Qayaqsighvik _ ighnegh nge kau lghii _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ aane yalghiimi _ tamana _ yuug _ aga _ tenge uute ma lghii _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ aqergiigh u uq _ .
aghulaqe ma lghiit _ nuna mun _ ighnegh ke te lghiit _ .
taagken _ kaate yalghiimeng _ Qayaqsigh vig mun _ paaghqite uq _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ nanevgagh _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ Saam _ yug ke aten _ sa u ziin _ ? _ â
â _ I mang uu uuq _ , _ ayumigh _ anengagh ka _ Qayaqsighvik _ yuq aq aaftuq _ .
whanga _ whaa _ atigh mafte aatnga _ taameng _ ategh meng _ .
saama _ ata put _ naa put _ neghigh pigte luteng _ tuqu kau ut _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
qayuutagh m _ kayusigh iqe a _ aghnagh
I in mang uq _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nula i kek _ avaqutaghtuqagh _ .
uksugh nghagu _ yuug _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ kiig yagu _ qayaghtugh nghmini _ aghtugh ma lghii _ unange nghmeng _ ama _ ila aneng _ aghnegh neng _ palaghhagh u luku _ unange aqe lghii _ .
uksugh yagu _ amalleqa _ unange nghmeng _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
H angani _ negh kangit _ palaghhagh ughte yata _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ pirughte yaghtugh naqe unga _ amavek _ qantaghan leng ugh nun _ quyilleg nun _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ qamiye gneng _ qamugh luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ , _ Negh e sim aan _ alla _ gaagh te magh an _ quyngigh meng _ .
taaqe yami _ aghulaqe naqe ma yagh lghii _ yug m _ quyilleg m _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
sagiqe ma lghii _ ighlekuughte ma kanga _ .
qavaa ma lghiit _ .
tawa _ yuggagh _ aghtugh ma lghii _ qavagh nghmeng _ qay ughllag Ê¼ qun _ avaquti a _ neqe ite ngugh t _ .
ima _ qavaa ma lghii _ pegnem _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yalghiimeng _ umegnegh ghllag _ tawani _ aghneghte ma lghii _ .
amenam _ taam _ yuggagh m _ mengteghagh mii a _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
unug aqe a _ iiwenllu _ sam ak av leg usimalghii _ .
qelagh ma kanga _ aghnagh m _ qalghigh yalghiimi _ tughneghagh u uq _ .
nuug ma lghii _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ amig kun _ tefli mi _ ayuqe uq _ .
aghnagh m _ upugha te ma kanga _ negh sqellug qu _ .
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Iglegh taag unga _ negh na lunga _ taaku neng _ avaqutagh gpeneng _ aghuliigh unga _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Utaq iig i _ , _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
aghnagh _ at qaghlluni _ uughqa nun _ si n umun _ ivagh i luni _ t ig uy ng a 1 _ tugu luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ elpek _ sumeghnegh gpetun _ sa luki mi _ anigu _ qaangh an itegh ngaan _ nusug ragh aqe zigu _ ? _ â
itegh ma lghii _ .
saama _ tughneghagh _ tung sighwaagh aquq _ avaquti a _ negh na luki _ .
tiguynge _ aanqute yalghiimi _ ilagaate meng _ imani _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ .
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghii _ tughneghagh _ .
tamaani _ ilagagh ma lghii _ iw emg aqun _ ilagaate i _ qamagte ma kangi _ .
qamagte yamiki _ tughneghagh _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh luni _ tung sighwaagh umalghii _ .
Aghn am pimakanga _ , _ â _ Utaq iig i _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
At qaghlluni _ aywaa nun _ si n umun _ ivgagh i luni _ tugu luki _ neqe mun _ igu qugh sigh _ quyngigh m _ kel p anga _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
aleghqugh magh an _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ elpek _ sumeghnegh gpetun _ sa luki mi _ ug uq n am _ ilung anilnguut _ nusug ragh aqe ziki _ ? _ â
mulu luni _ taama _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh _ nunaki luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ unaghsigh _ anegh igh uute ma kanga _ .
A nighqw aamalghii _ iiwenllu _ nepiigh aqe uq _ tughneghagh _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh nghmini _ tung sighwaagh aqelghii _ taghnughh am eng negh naluni _ .
nuug luni _ anighqute ni _ tugu luku _ napaghte ma kanga _ .

anighqute _ ilagagh yalghiimi _ imani _ wata _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ .

pi naanghite amken _ ! _ â

whaken _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
â _ enta _ esghaqagh lakun _ ! _ â
tughneghagh m _ kelgute ma kanga _ qayuutagh ni _ saama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ aghtugh sigh ke nghite na yaqen _ sa u a _ neghyuke gkan _ tugu na yaqen _ . _ â
â _ enta _ esghapag laken _ .
piigh ten _ . _ â

â _ tawa _ tawaten _ pi aqe i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ iteme te ma kanga _ .

uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh _ utegh te simakanga _ .

aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .

afta luku _ si n umun _ lli ma kanga _ .

pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ kayusigh qagh nga _ ! _ â

yuggagh _ itegh ma lghii _ .

Yugh qut aam _ ighnegh a _ kiighwyagh ughtekagh
kiyaghte ma a _ nalighmeng _ kiyaghte ma ita _ , _ maalghug _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ yug k _ avaqutagh ite ngugh k _ .
ilangani _ yuug _ kiw at meggnun _ pi ma luku _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh _ ighni naqe lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh meng _ qesiqun _ tuute ma kanga _ yughqutagh _ pi na aqa _ .
taana _ taghnughhagh _ angli ma lghii _ atghagh te yagh kete ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ Saam _ una _ pi kagu _ ? _ â
â _ una mi _ yugh qut aam _ igh niigh a _ . _ â
Kiyaghnegh em pimakanga _ taghnughhagh _ , _ â _ aa _ ingavek _ aglagh a _ kiighwyagh nun _ . _ â
taghnughhagh _ aglagh yalghiimi _ kiighwyagh ughte ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ . _ tefaay _ .
kiighwyagh
iimnanguq _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ salin _ .
mughunniigh aqe lghii _ naqam unang aqelghii _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ mughute luni _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ unug ma kanga _ .
qule mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ kiighwyagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ kiighwyagh neng _ mengteghagh ite nigh m _ aga _ ifkagh uq _ key- nghhagh _ .
legan _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh y algh n mi _ nulighh a _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
negh te luteng _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ yuug _ mughute ma lghii _ .
unange luni _ neghsagh meng _ tagi yalghiimi _ nulighh a _ ighni i ma lghii _ mekelghiigh meng _ .
ugi an _ aghnagh m _ atigh ma kanga _ , _ kiighwyagh meng _ .
qavagh ghhagh inagh kun _ angli ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ aqsa nge laatagh ma lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ aghnaghagh meng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ alla _ aghnagh _ aqsa nge nanigh ma lghii _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
tawani _ nunugh a mi _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ ama _ mekelghiigh llu _ taana _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ata at _ mughute luni _ iike te ma kanga _ .
ima _ tuquma lghii _ .
Naang a tug im in eng nagaquu lluni _ tuqute ma lghii _ ellmi neng _ .
mekelghiigh m _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ata nka _ naa nka _ tuqu laghate te ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe uten _ entaqun _ temngi _ nuna mete ni luki _ .
whaa _ uum _ kenle aneng _ aqnigh gpenani _ tuqukagh _ kaape luni _ kanagh luni _ meghqe te luni _ taana _ kiighwyagh mun _ mayugh aqe uq _ .
aga _ ata put _ naa put _ may- ma ut _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ unug yagu _ aane luni _ tapghagh _ qule mun _ miluute yagh kete ni _ kiighwyagh kun _ ag aamalghii _ .
taaggun _ tapghagh qun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ aghqut aa llghii nun 1 _ ilate ma lghii _ repall _ teghig niq em _ puygu luku _ nayag ni _ .
qesiqun _ uksugh qugh aqe uq _ .
tea- ma kut _ kiighwyagh t _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ umiilg ugh te simakangat _ .

llaaghanwha _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
ama _ yuug _ kaapekagh _ , _ qemitekagh _ , _ suflugagh ke aq _ sangami _ tuqu rakegte aqa _ ?

tefaay _ .
neghsagh m _ vuvalla a
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ saama _ nunalgutetuqagh t _ .
naqam _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ taana _ yuug _ unaaqute nghagu _ unange gpenani _ .
talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ aku r aa sigal nguq _ .
ila i _ unange uute aqe lghiit _ .
ila ngam _ yuug _ taana _ mughute ma lghii _ .
mughute luni _ anglu _ kaate ma kanga _ .
kaate luku _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .

nuug luni _ y uuk pimakanga _ , _ â _ R am kel as a p _ ! _ â _ legan _ taaqe luni _ mughyug aghte ma lghii _ .
Y uuk taana _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa meng _ aagna _ pi a _ ? _ â
taagken _ yug m _ keng agni _ tenglug lukek _ kak egh qugh yami _ itegagh mi _ asi i _ kanuughqe ma kangi _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ nuliigh ni _ waam n naluku _ .
llaaghanwha _ taglagh yami _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unange ma yagh unga _ ima _ sefkagh te ma uq _ . _ â
Llaagh n aw h a _ nulighh an _ ugpeqe ma kanga _ ugi ni _ .
taagken _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ unang upig lluku _ taghtugh luni _ negh luni _ mughute ma lghii _ .
mughute yalghiimi _ anglu _ kaate ma kanga _ .
kaate yamigu _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .

yug m _ pi yagh kete ni _ , _ ighivgaghniimna u uq _ .
neghsagh m _ taam _ pil at aamakanga _ , _ â _ R am kel as a p _ ! _ â
aga _ mughyug aghte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yuug _ nekeve luni _ maligte te ma lghii _ neghsagh mun _ .
megh mun _ ategh yalghiimi _ teghh anun _ pesugh yug qagh nghite uq _ .
masisu _ esghagh ma kanga _ aga _ yuggagh _ talligh leg llu _ ighu leg llu _ takestaaghhagh meng _ naqam _ yugusigh a _ aange pigte lghii _ .
qesiqun _ neghsagh u uq _ .
yug m _ taana _ yuggagh _ malig simak ang aneng l umun _ .
itegh yan _ iteghvig anun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kanga _ yug m _ taam _ neghsagh t _ vuvall alghiit _ .
tesqamaken _ neghsagh t _ nanevgagh ita _ yuug _ taana _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh i _ esghapag yagh a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ esghapag ma kangi _ .
Nanevg aam _ neghsagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ !
ilagagh naqe unga _ . _ â
nulighh an _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ tuune ma kek _ ugi minun _ .
ugi an _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Qul ighh am taa nguq _ p aa aa- aam kut _ , _ qu lighh aam taa nguq _ p aa aa- aam ut _ , _ I yng ighh aput _ mesiighpag llaagllug qu ai _ neqniqe aqe ait _ ! _ â
qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Qag is av is av is av ii _ , _ qag is av is av is av ii _ ! _ â
taagken _ nanevgagh at _ neghsagh t _ aghnaghagh t _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh t _ pu tugh utek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh _ neghsagh _ aanqute ma lghii _ , _ â _ I quy elq utaa _ iy aa aa _ , _ qaghpa lug ke a _ iyaa- a _ , _ man uq ellegh aaq aa _ iyaa- a _ ! _ â
tawa _ vuvalla _ qamagte ma lghii _ .
Nanevg aam _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ una _ yuug _ elqwaagh meng _ tuune gu _ . _ â
nulighh an _ yuug _ elqwaagh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
Nanevg aam _ neghsagh m _ yuug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaa _ ug gnaq eg kuvek _ quunqagh magh gpek _ qesigh u qagh magh gpek _ uugte lghaaten _ .
ima _ naten _ pi naagh ut _ elqwaagh t _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aane luni _ mayugh ma lghii _ .

esghagh ma kangi _ neghsagh lghute t _ .
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate luku _ angaghqugh ma kangit _ qamagte luki _ .
taawa _ taam _ kenle aneng _ yuug _ taana _ un angy u ghigh llag umalghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
meteghllug _ nulighhtuqagh _ ayuqligh t _ aghnagh itneng
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma ut _ tallimat _ mengteghagh t _ .
taakut _ mengteghagh t _ yug i _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ .
naqam _ kel ul ighnegh h itni _ kiyaghte lghiik _ meteghllug nkuk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ .
ilangani _ nuyek lii m paniga _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ .
Meteghllug em pimakanga _ , _ â _ M eq pak pay ay _ , _ meq pak pay ay _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh m _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
meteghllug _ megh naqe yalghiimi _ megh _ nuna mun _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
Aghnagh aam pimakanga _ , _ pateg magh an _ , _ â _ saa _ una _ megh _ imigh utaa _ pi q pig utaa _ . _ â
meteghllug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Piyaq taq pe ngu yo y _ , _ piyaq tel q en _ taana _ m iq iit ig uu _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ M iq in ing il ak _ , _ tas kw igu _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ atghagh ma lghii _ ama _ meteghllug _ ellmeggnun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ kaate luni _ nengyugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfaqugh ghhu _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aane luni _ mengteghagh nun _ sivuligh pig aghnun _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .

naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte aagh _ quurkeli _ meteghllug
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ tannge t _ umiileg at _ quyngightu pigte lghii _ .
quyngigh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ .
naqam _ taana _ umiileg _ ighnegh leg _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ umiileg m _ quyngigh a _ aveg luni _ iil aamalghii _ naqam _ umegnegh ughte ma lghii _ qevuute pigte luni _ .
naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ quurkeli _ ighnegh leg _ maalghug gneng _ , _ nuyekligh _ ighnegh a _ aghnaasigh _ , _ uyughagh a _ itagnagh lghii _ .

â _ waniwanllu _ ! _ â

qukaghte yamigu _ atghagha aghagh ma lghii _ .

afsengagh ghhagh
iimnanguq _ , _ afsengagh ghhagh _ meqsaghtugh ma lghii _ naayvagh m _ qukaa nun _ .
megh ma lghii _ anglaagh ghhagh _ ukite luku _ .
megh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ anglaagh m _ saaghw ani _ .
meghnaali ma lghii _ tawani _ .
meghnaali ma luku _ papeg a _ kuml atu simakanga _ .
ilagagh ma lghii _ in qun am en _ papeg ni _ ghh atagh tesqelluku _ , _ â _ K an akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ ukig em _ talate anga _ !
Kiy ay uv aghl uk tung aa aa _ !
Am iq l uk _ pik r ung aa aa aa _ , _ t ay man al ukaa _ , _ kal al i kaa aa _ , _ t ay man al ukaa _ , _ kal al i kaa aa _ . _ â
taaqe ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ am iq lug gaq _ ketfagh aghte a _ .
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awite te n _ !
uuynite uten _ ! _ â
Am iq lug gaq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ K an akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ ukig em _ talate anga _ !
Kiy ay uv aghl uk tung aa aa _ , _ sikig _ pik r ung aa aa aa _ , _ t ay man al ukaa _ , _ kal al i kaa aa _ . _ â
sunanguq _ taana _ sik igg aq _ ketfagh a _ .
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awite te n _ !
papegtu uten _ ! _ â

allameng _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ , _ â _ K an akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ kan akiii _ , _ ukig em _ talate anga _ !

sunanguq _ taana _ ukazigh ghhagh _ ketfagh a _ .
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awite te n _ !
papeg n _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ ! _ â

mayeraaghpag
aghnaghaghhagh t _ tallimat _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luki _ r at amiir egnun _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ .
unaghsigh ghllag mun _ petug ma kangi _ .
taaqe luki _ pi yagh kete ni _ , _ â _ U naq ek aa _ ! _ â
unaghsigh _ tak laagh aghsimalghii _ .
unite luku _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ aga _ kaynge ghllag _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ kaynge ghllag _ aagyuq _ llagh an _ yugg ay eng aalghii ten _ iteme teqaghti kut _ ! _ â
â _ Negh n iim sug um aluta _ yug gpesi _ unake naqe aqe ainkut _ . _ â
â _ sa qrugte aqe uq _ aagna _ ! _ â
aga nguq _ me tegh llu r uk _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ Me tegh llu r uk _ aagyuq _ llagh an yugg ay eng aalghii ten _ , _ iteme teqaghti kut _ . _ â
â _ iteme teqaghte naanghite amsi _ .
aantagh ni _ negh n iim sun emta _ milugh pag aatagh aqagh pesi kut _ . _ â
aga _ kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aagyuq _ llaaghan _ yugg ay eng aalghii ten _ iteme teqaghti kut _ ! _ â

unaghsigh igh ghllag _ ag ugh aghsimalghii _ .

â _ Iy er uug et _ , _ iy er uug et _ ! _ â

tallimat _ ngelqagh t

itghute ma kangi _ .

taglagh ma lghii _ .

iimnanguq _ yuggagh _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nunaagh mi _ enngaatall _ unange yiite pigte lghii _ .

nuna lgu ta ita _ unange kaqe kangat _ neghsagh _ , _ maklag _ , _ ayvegh _ , _ nanugh _ .

yuug _ Nap aqut aghh mii

esghagh nghite aat _ .

esgha _ maligte yagh kumki _ . _ â

esnagh mun _ kaate luteng _ yuggagh _ esghapag yalghiimi _ nun aq _ all aq _ nuna ke nghitekagh minun _ tamlag uq _ .

aghvegh _ pilag ma kangat _ .
qepghagh lghiit _ akul ang itni _ yuug _ esghapag ma lghii _ .

aagute ghngaaghmegteggu _ esghagh igate kangat _ .

ivagh ma kangi _ uvite mini _ .

tefaay _ !
meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii nkuk
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ qem g aagmek _ meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii ngiighhagh nkuk _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ igagh te iqe ma lghiik _ .
