manaate i _ tugu luki _ managh yagh ma lghii _ .
anglaagh mun _ kaate luni _ manaate i _ ateghte luki _ managh ma lghii _ .
managh ma luku _ manaate i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ amu ma kangi _ manaate i _ .
uka nguq _ qiya lghii _ amu ma kanga _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ â _ E ng aa enga _ , _ aqsa ka _ s egg ig uu _ ! _ â
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ qaygeghte yagh kete ni _ taghnughhagh ghrukutaaghllag _ .
naqam _ aqsa ghllag a _ .
savig ni _ nusug luku _ aqsa a _ segge yagh kete ni _ iqallugagh ghllag _ aqsang an i simalghii _ .
akmagtagh ni _ tugu luku _ iqallugagh meng _ imigh ma kanga _ esl em kagh agh lluku _ .
imigh i nghmeng _ apeghiigh yami _ taghnughhagh _ ateghte luku _ megh mun _ manaate i _ imeg luki _ akmag aatagh luni _ tagl aam algh n _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yami _ meteghllug _ taghsagh luku _ negh ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ aghneghte lutek _ unug luku _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ qavagh yan _ meteghllug m _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ manaate i _ tegleg luki _ aane luni _ managh yagh ma lghii _ .
managh ma luku _ managh ta i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ .
amu ma kangi _ .
amu ma luki _ uka nguq _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ .
meteghllug m _ manaate i _ pegte luki _ qimag ma lghii _ .
ilangani _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ managh yagh naqe yalghiimi _ managh ta i _ ima _ aviite ut _ .
meteghllug _ aapte yagh kete ni _ kalef sim anil uki _ pi ma kangi _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ tapghagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esghaate ma lghii _ mengteghagh neng _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ , _ mayugh luni _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ quyngigh _ uzive aqe uq _ .
nughagh ghhagh _ qesigh yagh kete ni _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ tugu luku _ nughagh ghhagh _ eslate mun _ egte ma kanga _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ ukig luni _ akmag luku _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
unaami _ enraq _ meteghllug _ tapgh am im _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh meng _ esghaate luni _ aglagh luni _ iiyagh anun _ mayugh luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ quyngigh _ uzive lghii _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
aange lghii ii ghllag _ qesigh yagh kete ni _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ aan e simakanga _ .
meteghllug _ ukig luni _ mengteghagh meng _ akmag naqe yagh kete ni _ tapghi uute uq _ .
quyngigh m _ qil eg y ing i _ nusug luki _ akmagite ngllagh naqe yagh uq _ enraq _ amawha _ kepe qagh ut _ .
aghtugh luni _ akmag nghmeng _ qineghte luni _ mengteghagh mun _ tungsigh ma yagh lghii _ aghnagh mun _ akmag itk agh aghhaghmeng _ .
yaghlegi _ aghnagh m _ yaqiiraag ni _ akuqagh lukek _ aane luni _ meteghllug _ anag ul egh taam akanga _ pi magh mi _ , _ â _ U um lleqa _ quyngigh ghhagh nka _ tuqu qugh aqe kangi _ . _ â
meteghllug _ ava ngunani _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ , _ â _ kii _ sa luten _ esnegte iqe ughtagh u ziin _ ? _ â
meteghllug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh mun _ akmagite kaghqagh niigh naqe lunga _ quyngigh ke kaqe a _ tagite na luku _ yaghlegi _ aanqaghte luni _ anag ul egh taag aanga _ . _ â
â _ U um _ nangllek isteng iighh aanka _ seghleghqe aqe ai _ . _ â
Neq s eng _ naange yan _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ piyaa ma lghii _ pennagh m _ tunganganun _ .
taagani _ mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ esghagh ma kanga _ nuliigh leg _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ amel eng estaaghh aak _ .
yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ enankinam _ aqelqagh _ !
nategh mun _ tawavek _ itegh i _ ! _ â
Yug em nuliini _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ gaagh te gu _ aqelqagh _ qall all uku negh naq elghii _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ itegh ma lghiik _ tukuqe te lghiik _ .
ugke t _ ugute yata _ aghnagh m _ itghute luki _ negh ma lghiit _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ pi ma lghii _ tukugh _ , _ â _ aane aghte naqe unga _ qakmavek _ .
sukate lunga _ itegh naagh unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aga _ aane ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Qam ay _ aqelqagh _ ukavek _ nuug qu a _ ! _ â
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ nuug yalghiimi _ atkug a _ aate ma kanga _ tukugh an _ .
llangaqa nguq _ atkug a _ unagh siigh waaghmeng _ nuuvekagh _ .
Q atelghii ng iighh aam pimakanga _ , _ â _ Uuk piig lleq an _ !
sangan _ aate zigu _ ?
sagiqe ste pigte an _ !
esleqeaghaghte an _ ! _ â
taakut _ tukugh i _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ sikughwaagh u aqe ut _ .
llaaghanwha _ sikugh w aam _ yuuke magh mi _ atkug a _ aqelqagh m _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
S ikugh waagh em nuliini _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ aghulaqe naqe gkan _ pirughte i tete naken _ i wer ngam _ kepsugh llegh anun _ . _ â
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ aghulaqe naqe yan _ sikugh w aam _ nulighh an _ pirughte i te ma kanga _ aq el qagh teng neqmeng _ i werng am kep su llgh anun _ .
Q atelghii h g iighhaq _ akmag aatagh luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ mengteghagh mun _ meteghllug m _ ungipaghsugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ K ii- i _ , _ naken _ pim gh qugh taz in _ ? _ â
â _ aagken _ pennagh m _ tung anganeng _ . _ â
unaami _ meteghllug _ piyaa ma lghii _ taagavek _ .
mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ esghagh aa _ nuliigh leg _ amel eng estaaghh aak _ .
qesiqun _ kaate aqe uq _ sikugh w aan kunun _ .
S ikugh w aam _ tukugh an _ upugha te ma kanga _ itegh sqe magh an _ ilu anun _ .
asanut _ atkug ni _ unite luku _ nategh mi _ , _ nuliigh ni _ gaagh es qum aan _ .
ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghiit _ .
taaqe luteng _ sikughwaagh _ aane ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ meteghllug m _ atkug a _ aate luku _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Qam ay _ aqelqagh _ ukav ek n uuk aa _ ! _ â
Meteghll uk nuug umalghii _ .
esghagh luku _ sikughwaagh _ nengl aghq w aamalghii _ , _ â _ H ah ah a _ , _ llangaqa _ el pek kan aq ar uk _ ! _ â
S ikugh w aam _ aqelqagh mi _ atkug a _ mat- aghte luku _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ aqelqagh _ aane ste gu _ !
aglagh li _ !
pirughte i te aghte gpenaan _ pi naken _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ meteghllug _ aan e simakanga _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ ava ngunani _ pirugh t angun ani _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ qatelghii m _ unite ma kanga _ meteghllug _ alla _ kiyaghte lgutesaghqagh u gpenaan _ .
qamagte uq _ .
egeghagh mii
yuug _ egeghagh mii _ nukaghagh leg _ .
nuliigh pig a _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ nukaghagh a _ maalghug neng _ mekelghiigh staghhiinagh neng _ avaqutagh leg _ .
nukaghagh a _ taana _ Ang ete qughh mii _ .
angyaghtugh aqe lghii _ yuug _ nuliigh pig ni _ kelqellug qu _ .
yuug _ angyagh nghmini _ aghvenge aqe lghii _ .
aghvenge nghmini _ nukaghagh ni _ miite i stekaqe kanga _ .
aghvenge nghmini _ ataasigh t _ pilagkagh t _ tuune aqe kangi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ nuk aghagh minun _ .
elkek _ nuliigh pig ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ quyngigh meng _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ angyagh yata _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh ni _ nuyekligh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ angyat put _ taglagh yaghqagh t _ esghapag ki _ .
uka _ aliigh kata _ ungipite nakevnga _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ siighnagh m _ aqef tagh aa _ imigh ma kanga _ megh meng _ .
ila a _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te luku _ saama _ ugi mi _ ila yan _ nuliigh pig an _ iighagh aneng _ quyngigh meng _ tugu tete luni _ avegtugh luni _ ila ma kangi _ mangtag t _ avegtughagh ni _ .
enkaam _ uyuqligh m _ taghnughhagh mi _ ila a _ maka a _ imigh ma kanga _ peqagh meng _ tukrug lghii meng _ sii ma i te u luku _ .
iiwen _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ ighnegh an _ nuyek lii m _ ungipaate ma kanga _ uka _ taglagh ni luki _ angyagh t _ .
itegh sqe ma kanga _ ighnegh ni _ .
itegh yan _ neghe ste luku _ taagken _ atghii sqe ma kanga _ esnagh mun _ .
angyagh t _ tamlag yalghiimeng _ aghvenge ma lghiit _ .
angyaleg ita _ yug ni _ ll il am akanga _ nukaghagh ni _ aqfa sqellug qu _ , _ â _ Aghv engu m akun nguq _ , _ miite i yaghtugh li nguq _ . _ â
K evg aaq _ taglagh luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ ugi anun _ aqfa ste ni luku _ miite i yaghtigh sqellug qu _ .
â _ A aa _ atghagh naqe unga _ . _ â
utaqa ma kangat _ .
naagu _ ?
atghagh nghite uq _ .
itagnatun _ yug m _ aqfate ma kanga _ , _ â _ sukate luni nguq _ atghagh li _ .
ghhuute ai nguq _ . _ â
K evg aaq _ taglagh luni _ ungipaa si kaa nga _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ kevg aaq _ , _ â _ enraq _ taghnughhagh ka _ qiyaaqe uq _ , _ atghagh aqe nayagh unga _ . _ â
K evg aaq _ atghagh luni _ angyaleg _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh pig an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga _ puughte isaghtugh lakun _ miite i yaghtugh naqe lghii _ . _ â
angegh ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
N ukagh aam _ aksaqe luni _ esghapag ma kanga _ taglagh lghii _ .
kaate luni _ nutaan _ qineghte yan _ anag u umakanga _ naasqw akun _ tuqute luku _ .
tuqute yamigu _ angyaatagh ni _ akmag luki _ avaqutagh ni _ tugu luku _ qimag ma lghii _ May egh ag nekun _ .
qaygeghte yami _ uyghag m _ akul anganun _ iigh ma lghii _ .
siingenllu _ unug kanga _ .
aghvengekagh t _ utaqa i yagh luteng _ esnagh mi _ utaqakagh eng _ aviite yan _ yuug _ taglagh yalghiimi _ nuliigh pig ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ tuqu luni _ amig mi _ naqam _ nukaghagh a _ aviite uq _ .
yuug _ atghagh luni _ yug ni _ ll il am akangi _ ivagh iyagh tiis qelluki _ .
Ivagh yaq es eng _ mamleg mi _ esghagh nghite aat _ .
aviite uq _ .
aviite yan _ utegh qaa simalghiit _ .
aghnagh _ angy atagh qelluni _ apeghiigh yami _ ukig ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ meghnaali te kete luku _ tulughagh ma lghii _ .
tulughagh te kete luku _ nagaqugh ma kangi _ suqsughtagh lghiit _ .
enkaam _ kana _ nalla akun _ qen aagh tall a simalghiit _ .
pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ piiksuq _ !
sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â
aghnagh m _ akite ma kangi _ , _ â _ angetequgh mun _ aglagh yug aqe yagh unga _ , _ iw emg an aten _ aglagh langa _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ uugten _ !
Ang ete qughh mii nguukut _ , _ aglagh te naqe amken _ . _ â
aghnagh _ angyagh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
â _ quneghte lghaaten _ ! _ â
taagken _ itagnatun _ suqsughtagh meng _ aghnagh _ nagate ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ pil atagh aat _ , _ â _ A aam _ esghagh ghhaaten _ aga _ uugten _ ! _ â
aghnagh _ uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ angetequgh u nghite ngughk _ all aq _ nuna _ .
maaten _ angyagh ke vig ni _ uteghmun _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ aga _ mesungesag t _ p uug legh aataq eftut _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ nenglu ghrukutaagh _ pika _ esghagh ma kanga _ tunuqligh ke luku _ nenglu squghhagh _ .
nenglu ghllag m _ qaye ani _ nekevgha aqe uq _ yuug _ k apes eg aghluni _ .
K apes eg akek _ ghhuu ghllag lutek _ nasagh ni _ , _ aligh ni _ , _ kenigh ni _ tugh qugh luki _ .
aghnagh mun _ esn amel ngugh mun _ ayuqe luku _ talligh ni _ , _ aligh n _ inglu a _ il em aghaq saqenni _ anuqligh ghllag ma kanga _ eslallug pag tuumaghmi _ .
aghnagh _ taghnughhaghtuumagh an _ teng simakanga _ qagi t _ tun ut angit gun _ tuute ste luku _ .
naqam _ anuqe _ alpag ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ itagnatun _ uugte aqe uq _ .
yug m _ enraq _ inglu a _ aligh mi _ ilemeaghaghte yagh kete ni _ itagnatun _ anuqligh ghllag laatagh aa _ eslallug pag tuumaghmi _ .
aghnagh _ teng taqegkanga _ qagi t _ tung angit gun _ tuute ste luku _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ alpag nghaani _ anuqe ghllag _ uug neghani _ yug m _ nasagh ni _ enkaam _ kenigh ni _ itemqugh yagh kete ni _ aghnagh _ itagnatun _ teng taq luku _ qenwat _ taghnughhagh ke te lghiik _ aghnaa nkuk _ mataghqe uk _ pilugug i uute uk _ .
wetku _ yuug _ ukig luni _ nenglu mineng _ uka _ atghagh ma lghii _ pilugug meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ .
aghnagh mun _ kaate luni _ pi ma kanga _ yug m _ , _ â _ taawa _ pilugug meng _ tagite amtek _ qayughllak _ pilugug si _ nukeggnagh pigte ut _ .
whanga _ elpek _ aqfa ste aqe amken _ nanglleg yagute luten _ .
pilugug tek _ .
apeghiigh kufsi _ taglagh ghhaakut _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ pilugug nghmeng _ taaq sag Ê¼ ta _ taglagh ma lghiit _ nenglu anun _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ tungtuqu yagh aqe lghii _ , _ aghnagh m _ af taq egkangi _ .
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ angli uq _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh a _ .
ellmi neng _ igleghte yaaghte uq _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aag nghmini _ aghn elqusiq _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
tespamani _ aghneghte aqe lghii _ nenglu squghhagh mi _ .
Ighivg aam aan _ tagi nghmini _ igaghtu pigte lghii meng _ pilugug luni _ .
Kiyaghtaa llghem _ tagtala ani _ aghnagh _ ighni ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ .
taana llu _ angli ma lghii _ qenwat _ .
taana llu _ uyuqligh _ ellmi neng _ igleghte yagute ma lghii _ .
anengagh ke te lghiik _ aa negh meg m _ aghneghte aqe lghiik _ nenglu ngiighhagh mi _ .
tagi negh megteni _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ pilugug lutek _ ig aghtu pig llegh ii meng _ .
tagi negh megteni _ legan _ neghe gpenatek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te aqe lghiik _ .
yug m _ pi aqe kanga _ aghnagh _ , _ â _ A san u tel pek _ espamavek _ tunuqligh ghhagh mnnun _ aglagh gpenang _ pi aqe i _ ! _ â
maaten _ ilangani _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Sang an ll aam _ pamavek _ pis naan igh aqanga _ .
enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh lakun _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ nenglu squghhagh mun _ iiyagh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ ilu te mun _ avaqutagh kek _ quulqite m _ qaye akun _ aqume lutek _ ighu teng _ aghulate magh ita _ nagh agh utaq ef tuk _ .
taawa _ aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ gaagh magh mi _ ukini magh mi _ pellugtuumagh mi _ enngaatall _ aveniqe aqe uq _ .
aghnagh m _ iiyagh meng _ esqamavek _ kay agh um ay aqaanga _ .
aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
avaqutagh kek _ ullgh agh san _ q iyagh waa simalghiik _ .
aghnagh _ iiwen _ nekeve aqe uq _ yuug _ uka _ aliigh aqe uq _ qefliqe magh mi _ , _ â _ K iii _ aghnagh _ pineghllug ghllag pigu a _ .
imamta _ ineghte aqe yu i kete te _ ! _ â
nenglu mun _ itegh luni _ saguyagh gni _ tugu lukek _ aglagh luni _ tespamavek _ aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ kall agagh yaqenni _ saguyagh gmineng _ unguvagh simakanga _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnagh _ aglagh nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
enraq _ nenglu m _ te ker kaan it aqelghiik _ maalghug _ kalngag sngwaaghagh ghhagh k _ ila a _ aywaa n _ tung an ani _ ila a _ uughqa n _ .
taake uk llu _ kal ng as ngaagh aghhaak _ yug m _ iinghute aqe kek _ saafte sqe gpenakek _ .
kiyaghte luteng _ maaten _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ , _ â _ Sang an ll aam _ kal ngag g aak _ ukuk _ iinghute aqe akek _ ?
enta _ ila a _ esghaqagh lakun _ ! _ â
ketfagh luku _ aghnagh m _ nusug ragh yagh kete ni _ awergha m _ amiiragh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ nusug ragh aa _ .
S aagh w amikun _ may- ughte ghllag aa _ .
iiwen _ wata _ asi anun _ kaaw aqe uq _ , _ ugu qagh ma lghii _ .
asi a _ kalngag m _ kengh uftuq _ .
iiwen _ talligh ni _ s ay uw aghtaq aa _ yuug _ qefliqe magh mi _ qakma _ kaate aqe uq _ .
â _ ugumi nagh ghhalek _ aghnaq s a _ qaam n api neghllug ll api waa _ ! _ â
iitghute kete luku _ saguyagh gni _ tugu lukek _ kall agagh yaqenni _ uteghte luni _ umyug agh mineng _ awergha _ kanaghte uute ma lghii _ kal ngag g aghmun _ .
taana llu _ aghnagh m _ tallu i _ kall agagh yaqenni _ saguyagh gmineng _ uguqe llghite te yu i ma kanga _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnagh _ nagate luni _ yug meng _ lliigh uq _ .
pineghlliqe nagh u nighte uq _ .
kiyaghte ma lghiit _ pinitun _ .
ilangani _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghyuqe igate ziin _ ? _ â
â _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma qun _ naten _ pi langa _ ! _ â
yug m _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ â _ Wh aveg Ê¼ qun _ tagi aghten _ ! _ â
yug m _ nenglu m _ qukaa nite ngughk _ sag legh aq _ pakig ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ agigte yalghiimi _ sama _ egeghagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ enkaam _ mengteghagh _ nayugh kuvinghagh ani _ masisu _ allighagh t _ taawa _ mengteghagh m _ qaye akun _ m ategh qugh luteng _ .
ighnegh a _ aghnagh m _ nuyekligh _ aane ma lghii _ mengteghagh meng _ .
atkug a _ negig llegh ghllag _ saama _ iqa ghllag _ .
aghnagh _ qiya yagh uq _ .
sama _ pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ eslallugughte a _ .
allighagh t _ itegh qugh tekii _ ! _ â
yug m _ aghnagh _ tuye akun _ pakig ma kanga _ , _ â _ Tawaten ngam _ ! _ â
enkaam _ sag legh aq _ ne anun _ lli ma kanga _ .
yug m _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aane luten _ yughqutagh meng _ ghhiitagh luten _ ighnegh gpenun _ pamavek _ aglaa tes qen nak eten _ uygu qu utes qelluki _ .
uygu te uute nghmeng _ apeghiigh kaki _ tagi tes qen nak eten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ .
uygu te uute luki _ tagite ma kangit _ .
yug m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ M aal ghu m _ quyngigh m _ si gut angi _ paasqute te ki _ .
enkaam _ ataasigh _ all aghhiin am _ awergha m _ melqw aneng _ ikute luten _ imeg naken _ ila a _ tungtu m _ amigh aneng _ .
aligh gpek _ inglu a _ quyngigh m _ unguva lghii m _ melqw aneng _ ikute aqe luku _ imigh naken _ .
enkaam _ ama _ inglu a _ enraq _ mengteghagh meng _ savighhe uute aqe luku _ imigh naken _ . _ â
laagh an wha _ aghnagh _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ .
apeghiigh yan _ aghnagh _ yug m _ sag legh aq _ aw ite u te kete luku _ pi a _ , _ â _ taana _ elpek _ tagite kan _ ighnegh n _ kel qen naken _ .
una _ uyughagh a _ whanga mni _ unegte lleqe uq _ .
ukig lusi _ nateqlite kufsi _ quneghte luten _ aligh gpek _ inglu a _ efsug te naken _ enkaam _ inglu a llu _ .
enkaam _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh kuvek _ taake uk _ maalghug _ sigute k _ paasqute te nga lghiik _ ama _ quneghte luten _ efsug te nakegken _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh n _ nuyekligh _ taglagh kan _ uq ugh ut aghq aghhaq _ esghagh yagh tiis qen naken _ tekeghagh m _ awata anun _ uyughagh ke te lghii gnun _ anengagh a _ sivulii luku _ . _ â
taagken _ yug m _ naa ke te lghiik _ ukig simakek _ .
tuute ma lghiit _ egeghagh m _ kelut angani _ .
tuute yameng _ aghnagh m _ qim egh lluni _ aligh gni _ efsug te lukek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ mengteghagh _ , _ ama _ saaghw itni _ quyngigh _ .
itegh luni _ qun aghmi _ paasqute te nga lghiit _ quyngigh m _ m aal ghu m _ si gut angi _ efsug te luki _ esghagh yalghiimi _ awergha ghllag _ all aghh n naq _ amigh ghllag _ mingllite qugh ma kanga _ .
egeghagh mii _ yuggagh _ aane luni _ unang uluku _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ pika _ esghagh ai _ quyilleg t _ .
amenam _ yuggagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yalghiimi _ iflakagh _ nunalgute mi _ nulighh a _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ ungipaghsugh ma kanga _ ighnegh mineng _ nuyek ligh meng _ enkaam _ ugi mineng _ .
yuggagh m _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
negh luni _ aane aqe yan _ quyngigh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh ni _ lipeghsagh ma kanga _ taglagh qigh sqellug qu _ .
llaaghanwha _ ighnegh a _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
naa an _ neghe ste luku _ alla neng _ pilugug luku _ nutaghagh u ta ghhagh inagh meng _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ llilagh ma kek _ amavek _ tapghagh m _ awata anun _ esnighqwigh sqellug kek _ asanut _ anegh nge aq _ sivulii luku _ .
nagaqugh luni _ ugi a _ aghnagh m _ nutaghagh _ nuliigh ni _ enngaatall _ agligh sqellug qu _ angayuqagh itnun _ aan e simakanga _ .
taagken _ yuug _ taglagh ma lghii _ tespikavek _ utuqa mun _ nuliigh minun _ .
Es nighqw ak _ taglagh yalghiimek _ aghvegh meng _ mallu u ma lghiik _ .
nunalgute teng _ kelgugh luki _ pilag ma kangat _ aghvegh _ .
taagken _ aghnagh m _ quyngigh mineng _ amig ligh aqe luki _ awergha ligh aqe luki _ awalightugh ai _ nunalgute ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ i wer ngam _ aghyugh llegh itnun _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
esnagh mii _ enkaam _ quyilleg
kiyaghte ma uq _ qigi mi _ yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ .
kiig te nghagu _ qayaghtugh nghmini _ unake aqe kanga _ masingka _ uksugh mi _ naama te kaghqagh _ neqe _ .
ayumigh ite nghagu _ uksaagh mi _ nutaan _ siku ligh nghagu _ Y ag rak en utagh mii _ quyilleg _ yuug _ pirughte yaghtugh aqe lghii _ qigi mun _ .
Ag lag naq enghani _ quyilleg ni _ esnagh mii an _ iw emg am _ usitutala atun _ tuune aqe kanga _ neqe meng _ .
naqam _ uksaagh mi _ tuqutiighvig _ kaate nghaani _ qigi mi _ yuug _ quyillegte nghaani _ angyagh ni _ neqe meng _ usi luku _ quyilleg an _ esnagh mii ni _ tuune aqe kanga _ inglu t _ ataasigh t _ amig ligh luki _ qall uk aghmeng _ .
naqam _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ enan _ ayumiqun _ tuqute i tete nagh amken _ . _ â
ayumigh ite nghagu _ tawatestaghhiinaq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ qigi mi _ y uu ku k saagh mi _ quyillegte yan _ emta _ quyilleg an _ tawaten _ uglaghqak aan _ tuune luku _ angyagh h ut ameng _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ S iku ligh ak u _ pirughte yaghtugh lleqe unga _ elpenun _ .
tenge ta ghhagh meng _ yat aghqut aghh nak ev nga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ esnagh mii an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
qigi mun _ aglagh yami _ amsakaghtagh m _ amiiqagh a _ sa iqe luku _ esne a _ amiiqagh m _ tu ugh lluku _ siqlugagh m _ paye anun _ petug tegh u umakanga _ .
taagken _ ayvegh m _ tengug aneng _ imigh ma kanga _ iw emg am _ esleqeaghaghte luku _ .
enkaam _ megh _ kumlate luni _ lliigh yan _ siqlugagh m _ tenge ta m _ paye a _ megh meng _ kuvughtagh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ siqlugagh _ imaghtuumagh an _ kum lagh qumakanga _ .
qigi mi _ yuug _ mengtegh am e simaluku _ qakma _ kaate ma lghii _ quyilleg a _ pirughte yagh uq _ .
yug m _ aane vike ma kanga _ aqelqagh ni _ atkug ngunani _ naqam _ nasaperagh luni _ aghillug luni _ .
quyilleg m _ aqelqagh an _ esnagh mii ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqlagha ghhalek _ matagh gpek _ sa qu ziin _ ? _ â
â _ Sang w aqun _ aate lakun _ !
naken _ atkugkagh meng _ amu i igate ngugh u nga _ .
elpek _ am iil it aqeg kev nga _ qall uk aghmeng _ . _ â
taagken _ itegh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taq sameng _ quyilleg m _ esnagh mii _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagu te uq _ uksaagh _ teng ut igh tesqell uten _ pi yaqemken _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ teskana _ kiyaghte uq _ .
Ulim asim amken _ .
enmis _ aqfa lteggu _ . _ â
Llaagh ang wha _ aane lutek _ siqlugagh anun _ atghagh ma lghiik _ .
siqlugagh mun _ kaate yamek _ esnagh mii m _ pi ma kanga _ quyilleg _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ sa aqe zigu _ nusug ggu _ . _ â
siqlugagh m _ paye a _ ilang qull aq _ katam _ amiiqagh m _ putu i _ aliite luteng _ .
quyilleg m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ kak u _ sa ma m _ ! _ â
quyilleg _ sivughagh u ma lghii _ tenge ta meng _ nusug te nghmeng _ .
Siv ugh aghyan _ quyilleg _ esnagh mii m _ atghileg mineng _ putu nge i kete te _ amaa iqe aq _ kagu luku _ sayug aghte yagh kete ni _ siqlugaghtuumagh an _ pii k sig agh lluku _ tenge te aq _ amaa iqe aq _ nusug aghte ma kanga _ .
quyilleg m _ esnagh mii _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ kak u _ n allegh it aq uten _ ! _ â
taagken _ quyilleg _ tengug meng _ usiligh i luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
ayumiqun _ uksaagh yagu _ awen _ quyillegte llegh meng _ kingute aghagh lutek _ ata ke te lghiik _ Y ag rak en ut amun _ quyillegsi ma lghiik _ .
kaate yalghiimeng _ quyillegtaghyag ghllag _ qem gugh usimalghii _ .

sangafsi _ mul ugh taa s tek _ ?
Utaq aq iim si _ . _ â
legan _ tawaten _ aghneghmi _ quyilleg _ tuqutagh igh ma lghii _ .
Sivul igh pig aluku _ esnagh mii ni _ qigi mii _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek u u vag lghii meng _ aghnagh meng _ ataasigh meng _ si gut angin naqamken _ saama _ tallim aneng _ tuqute i lleqe amken _ ugmestaaghhagh meng _ pilugugkagh meng _ am iiligh luki _ . _ â
taagken _ yuug _ ata ke te lghiik _ kete lutek _ aglagh ma lghiik _ qigi mun _ .
uksughte luteng _ upenghagh mi _ quyngigh m _ ighni llegh an _ kingu aneng _ suna _ taana _ kaa ta _ quyilleg at _ qigi mun _ .
kaate luni _ ungipagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ quyngigh ghhagh i _ pama _ maalghug ii ma uq _ .
whangkuta _ quyilleg ni _ quyngigh put _ malghug egneng _ ighni nghata _ aag llegh i _ tuqute aqe aput _ . _ â
yug m _ qigi mii m _ ata an _ nanevg aghh aam pimakanga _ , _ â _ quyngigh t _ malghi ghngaita _ whangkunni _ esnagh mii ni _ avangite ut _ aglegh ite ut _ qayugh ghllag mi _ whangkuta _ qikmigh t _ saghligagh put _ ighni aqe lghiit _ uglagh pigte luku _ tuqu qagh igate ke put _ .
maaten _ quyngigh ghhagh ut _ malghi ghngaan _ ne pigh ulluku _ tuqute gpenaan _ aag llegh a _ ighni ghngaan _ .
elpek _ quyngigh ke nghite te an _ esnagh mii t _ pi ke aat _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ quyilleg _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qigi mii t _ quyillegte nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ qigi mii _ aghvenge yagute uq _ ukileghyag meng _ .

taagken _ qafsina t _ uksugh t _ atugh luki _ tagi laatagh ma lghii _ quyilleg at _ .
enkaam _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ Ag mang am 3 _ esn am e tegpenasi _ .
quungvagh ghhagh si _ .
masingka _ pama _ quyngigh i _ uglaghi ma uq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qigi mii t _ qamilgugh ma lghiit _ Y ag rak en ut am _ kelut anganun _ .
nekegte ma lghiit _ awen _ quyilleg eng _ sivu liqe luku _ ellngit _ esnagh mii kuvinghagh at _ tunuqligh u luteng _ .
quyngigh eng _ mengteghagh mun _ tagite yatgu _ esghagh yaq es eng _ imani nguq _ ingl amin aghtuq _ uk il eghy aper u waaq _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ Qig im ii kuv ingh aam _ nanevgagh a _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ nuliigh ni _ D im akanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ighnegh ut _ pamavek _ quungvagh nun _ tukughqagh ghhagh anun _ v agh is aghtu ul teggu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nutaghagh t _ pilugug teng _ meteghllug meng _ q as pi qut ighluki _ y atagh qell utek _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
tespagani _ quungvagh ni _ iglegh llu tek mengtegh at maalghug neghet _ esghagh ma kangit _ .
sivuligh tgun _ mengteghagh tgun _ kaate lutek _ itegh gpenatek _ uughqu ii te ni _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
qesiqun _ kaate vike aqe aat _ quyilleg _ ighnegh leg _ panig leg _ .
taake uk _ avaqutagh kek _ tespam an taq ef tuk _ aag llegh ani _ mengteghagh m _ .
unaami _ mekelghiigh _ quyngigh meng _ atghagh luni _ a ta mi _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uq eghh mi _ esghagh ma kek _ aqelqagh k _ maalghug _ .
qavagh aqe uk _ .
pilugug ke lghiik _ meteghllug m _ amighqwaagh aneng _ .
qaprag qagh negh megteni _ meteghllug m _ mel q wa _ anuq atagh aam _ teng q at aqegkanga _ .
itegh luni _ mekelghiigh _ a ta mi _ mengteghagh anun _ ungip a simakanga _ ata ni _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii neng _ aqelqagh neng _ .
ata an _ mekelghiigh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh sqe ki _ !
S aq ung waat _ ? _ â
aane luni _ mekelghiigh m _ itegagh mineng _ taghsagh ma kek _ aqelqagh k _ .
itegh uk nguq _ .
itegh yata _ yug m _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ â _ K iii _ natmun _ iglegh taa s tek _ ? _ â
â _ arekull _ taawa _ taaw ang iin aghhaq _ wh amigh put _ tukughqagh ghhagh anun _ ivagh it ngwaagh put _ . _ â
â _ uuk _ legan _ tawa _ pan il eg pig unga _ .

yug m _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aglagh te ki _ elpesi nun _ .
negh yagh uute ki _ . _ â
aane luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
sivu itni _ mekelghiigh _ kaate luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ ata mta _ aan ghut aaten _ seghlegh pestaagh nun _ .
saki ghhaghqagh ten _ kaate kata _ esghagh lleqe aten _ .
Ak l um asi pig ut _ .
talwa _ meteghllug m _ amighqwaagh aneng _ pilugug ke uk _ . _ â
aqelqagh k _ kaate lutek _ itegh yag Ê¼ ta _ aghnaghagh m _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ imani _ ukuk _ pilugugllug ghllag uk _ .
utuqa _ alla igh aq _ saagllug qu _ taaggun _ aqume sqe ma kegket _ .
neghyaghqagh meng _ ketf aa saq meg tekek _ quyngigh m _ nefkuuragh a _ taagkaghtagh _ tuk ruugh qwaagh llakaq _ iqlugte lutek _ aghtugh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe te ma lghiik _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ yat aghq es ata _ aqelqagh t _ mekelghiigh m _ ata an _ ighnegh minun _ atghagh te sqe ma kangit _ quyng il egt imeng _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ panig ni _ igh sagh waagh ngaan _ qiya ghngaan _ angegh te naqe ni luni _ wanlegi _ maligte te sqe ma kanga _ .
aghtugh yamigu _ ellmi neng _ qagh lu ghi luni _ panig ni _ qaake luku _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
iiwen _ esnagh mun _ tungang anil ngughnun _ quyilleg nun _ aliigh aqe ut _ uka _ quyngilegti _ payegh i _ aliigh aqe uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ im anig uq _ quyngigh kek _ pinigh uk _ ukileghyag kegte ta ghhagh inagh k _ .
yug a _ imani nguq _ atkug kegte uq _ nugh aghmeng _ uk il eghy ak eg taa meng _ saama _ mekelghiigh _ nukalpig aqs a _ seghleghu qagh a _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ pilugug llug alghii _ qaake luku _ aga _ uteghte ma lghii _ .
quyilleg m _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ wasaq _ ighsa aqe uten _ .
langetaq _ aagna _ ugi kaghqagh ke an _ . _ â
panig an _ akite ma kanga _ iqlighte magh mi _ , _ â _ imatuq _ ! _ â
quyngigh mun _ kaate luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
quungvagh m _ quyilleg ita _ quyngigh _ esghapag yaq es eng _ imani _ uglagh uq _ naqam _ uk il eghy aper u waagh llak _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh _ una _ elpegun _ kaa tes qen naqaqa _ .
itegh kan _ allighaghllug kun _ aqume ste naagh an _ .
enkaam _ ketfagh te naagh an _ upenghaghtagh m _ ayvegh m _ tuk igh ug g neq _ qasiqagh m _ nefkuuragh aneng _ .
enkaam _ negh nghmeng _ aghtugh kagu _ pi naken _ , _ â _ wasaq _ elpek _ nanevgagh t _ neqlightugh aqe aten _ ggutangigh tke aat _ tukrug ghllag meng _ .
whangkuta llu _ esnagh m _ negh ka aneng _ tukrugsigh kayugu kut _ .
ikiwan _ elpek _ ggute kegte aq _ wha _ aghtugh uten _ . _ â _ wetku _ ki nguv aqun _ pinitun _ neghe ste naken _ .
una _ ata a _ panike te lghiik _ whangam nin naagh tuk _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh a _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ a ta mi _ apeghtuusagh tun _ .

yuug _ enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh
yuug nguq _ iimna _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ tanpeghh meng _ akmagutagh ngllagh a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ tusaqe i nagh gpenani _ nulighh a _ akmagutagh ngllagh ma lghii _ tanpeghh meng _ .
taaqe yakek _ akmagutagh k _ tanpeghh ek _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ akuqagh luku _ kanaghte luku _ tesqamavek _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ keveg aqe naqe amken _ anguyag mnun _ sughug is qell uten _ . _ â
taagken _ tanpeghh ek _ akmagutagh k _ miluu ll uk ek meghmun _ kete ma kek _ .
anuqe m _ akmagutagh k _ teng simakek _ iw emg am _ natmun _ .
megh m _ itegh gpenakek _ uv lug em _ qapragsagh ke gni _ up- llghite aghte yagh ke gni _ akmagutagh k _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ akmagutagh m _ nukeggnagh anun _ .
tagtalmi _ tepe ma kanga _ esnagh kun _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ akmagutagh m _ allungag a _ vuveghte qugh yagh kete ni _ regh igh simakanga _ .
taagken _ aane yalghiimi _ tepe ma kanga _ tapghaghte lakun _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ taglagh luni _ tapghagh m _ qaye anun _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te ma luku _ sunanguq _ taana _ yuug _ .

â _ sughug u unga _ elpenun _ . _ â
yug m _ nengl aqluku _ unite ma kanga _ .
mengteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ â _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te aqe uq _ .
legan _ nukeggnagh ghllagu uq _ .
aapte yaqegka _ whangam nun nguq _ sughug u uq _ . _ â
Neng l aq laat aam akangat _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ taglagh lum _ ungavig itnun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ nanugh ita _ mesiigh anun _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ .
melqugh ni _ mesiighqe ghllag yamigu _ ungavig neng _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ sug er ng eng itgun _ kavirrakegtagh tgun _ aviigh uute ma lghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ sug emg it _ mesiighqe ughtagh u luki _ ug at anganun _ aglagh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ qefliqe ma lghii _ , _ â _ K iii _ , _ qam ay _ ungavig mta _ sug er ng angi _ seghleghu ut _ whaa _ legan _ mesag igh ghllagu ut _ .
ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ enankinam _ saam _ yeghrat _ nukeggn aaghq eghllag um aa _ . _ â
Ug anguq _ uw at anganeng _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ pi yagh amken ta _ sughug u unga _ ! _ â
â _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ una _ ! _ â _ yuug _ pi ma lghii _ .
enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ maligh qagh atagh luku _ tugu yamigu _ piigugh luku _ eslate mun _ egte ma kanga _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ aglagh a _ sughug ggaaten _ ! _ â
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ iighw iigh luni _ unguvagh yalghiimi _ j a igh qut ameng _ ghh itagh luki _ uygu qugh utagh ma lghii _ .
masingka _ taku yaq miniki _ yug m _ mengteghagh anun _ mayugh luni _ qaak g it _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mineng _ yughqutagh meng _ kenle nge i kete te _ qam qagh simakangi _ .
iqug a _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mi _ qam ut ighluku _ aate ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ unug llegh ke sigh _ mengteghagh _ qule mun _ yaqii te ma kanga _ .
iiwen _ unug em _ qukaa neng _ aghvigh aqe uq _ kenle akun _ mengteghagh _ mengqughtagh luku _ llaag igh aqe a _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ .
qenwat llu _ kenle akun _ mengteghagh _ ghhatagh aghte ma kanga _ .
ghhatagh aghte yamigu _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh _ atghagh te ma kanga _ megh m _ qula anun _ .
taagken _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh _ megh kun _ lli kestagh ma kanga _ .
qama nguq _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ U uug g _ naken _ enraq _ megh m _ itegh inkut _ ?
enta _ qiigh negh ke a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ at qaghlluni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ uzimun _ megh ghllag _ esghagh aa _ .
ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ megh mun _ ll igh um a kut _ .
uzimun _ meghllag u uq _ . _ â

yug m _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ naten _ pi ligu _ aanvig ite ngughk _ .

aghtugh ma lghii _ .

aghnaghaghhagh _ angayuqagh ite ngughk
Aghnagh aghhagh nguq _ iimna _ kiyaghte ma uq _ angayuqagh ite ngughk _ .
Taaw ang iinaq _ apa leg _ enkaam _ nengyugh llgagh _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuna lgu ta ita _ aghnaghagh t _ keleg ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aghulaghqugh naqe ni luteng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapute ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh minun _ .
angegh ma kanga _ ellnga llu _ maligte te sqellug qu _ aghul aghq un un _ .
taagken _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ aghnaghaghyaget _ .
tespagani _ unatagh ma luki _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ piitekagh meng _ tagitug ughte te ma kangi _ .
Atgh amun _ aghnaghaghhagh _ piyaq es eng _ aviite uq _ .
taagken _ aghnaghagh t _ alinge luteng _ angayuqagh meggneng _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tuqlugh agh aatagh yaq es eng _ akite nghite te i _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ .
ima _ aviite uq _ .
aghtugh luku _ tuqlughagh aatagh nghmeng _ miiwen _ sivu meggni _ atghagh ma na yu kan _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh anun _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ ila i _ av iil ng aghy am iki _ qiyaaghwagh ma lghii _ ivagh ma yagh kangi _ aviite ma lghiit _ .
yaghlegi nguq _ suna _ taake uk _ paye k _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ paye m _ saaghw ani _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavaa ma luku _ iw em ga _ taghsagh ma kanga _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ aghnagh agh nguq _ suna _ taana _ nunalgute ke nghite kau nga _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghulaghqugh u yagh lunga _ tagi tugh ugh sagu _ ila nka _ ifl aam aanka _ .
entaqun _ unite lunga _ atghagh ma ut _ .
ifla u iqe lunga _ ila nka _ aghtugh luki _ ivagh nghmeng _ whani _ qavaa ma lghiinga _ . _ â
Aghn am pilaataghaa _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ .
qamavek _ itegh ltung _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yalghiimek _ imani nguq _ aghnagh m _ nenge lunga _ qetngigh uq _ naqam _ nenglu an _ ugate anga _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqetu uq _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ negh e simakanga _ mangtag meng _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ â _ wiin _ whani _ kiyaghten _ .
unaaqute aqe gkagu _ aane aqe gkuma _ whani _ utaqa aqe nga _ .

qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ aghnagh _ aane aqe lghii _ .
Aghn elqusiq _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yaghtugh magh an _ tagi nghmini _ itghute aqe lghii _ tungtu meng _ ilangani _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ .

Qal pegh u simakangat _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ qav aghl aaghi g allg j i em _ iqeghtiigh luteng _ .
eltughagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ aapqugh aghyagh aat _ apa gkenka llu _ enkaam _ aghnaghagh t llu _ tagi luteng _ aghul agh qul gut angita _ , _ naken _ pit ang a . Aghnaghaghhaq _ aksaq ngwaagh umalghii _ .

aghnagh aq _ uyughagh leg

mekelghiigh _ aane igate ngughk _ quunpeng _ itgh um aghllak _ .

aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ .

aghulaqe ma lghii _ aqelqagh _ .

llaaghanwha _ sikig m _ negh kangit _ ellmeggneng _ ketfagh luteng _ ugkelli aqe lghiit _ .
ugkelli luteng _ ellmeggneng _ qulmesiite mun _ itegh luteng _ agaghte ma lghiit _ egllu m _ qula anun _ .
meteghllug _ aqume luni _ qiivaqu aqe lghii _ uzimun _ .
mengteghagh m _ ilu ani _ aghtugh aqe lghii _ esghaate nghmeng _ kitum _ yuug _ apeghiighsagh te aqe agu _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ itegh ma lghiit _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ negh luteng _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ .
yug m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga _ piyaa naqe unga _ kilgaa nun _ .
elpek _ navek _ pi naqe ziin _ ? _ â
â _ whanga _ aki yan _ tunganganun _ ivagh i aqe unga _ ne meng _ . _ â
taagken _ pellghute ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ ayg um im _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ aki yan _ tunganganun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ pengughqagh meng _ talughte luni _ yuug _ iigh te luku _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
talughte neghsi ma kanga _ .
talughte yan _ qemi meng _ meteghllug _ taayughqe ma lghii _ yug m _ mengteghagh nun _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
yug tun _ ellnga llu _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ En ta pis temni _ gaagh te nga _ !
Negh nav reg aam _ avelgh aqin aamakanga _ iw em ga _ wata qun _ .
qenwat _ aghtugh luni _ meteghllug _ qe il iqu malghii _ .
uzimun _ mengteghagh _ ivagh i vike ma kanga _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ esghagh aa _ kangighagh ni _ petug luni _ amigh _ umeg u aqe aq _ .
meteghllug m _ ketfagh luku _ item simakanga _ .
S aagh saqminigu _ esghagh ma kanga _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva aqe uq _ .
meteghllug _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Unang waaq seng alghii _ yug m _ kayute a _ . _ â
meteghllug m _ qesugragh luku _ al mes iistun _ amigh _ imeg ma kanga _ .
neghnavregagh _ qesugraghkagh ni _ imeg te ma kanga _ .
ne akun _ petug luku _ aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
yuug _ unange luni _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ unangkagh ni _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ lli luku _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ pis temni _ ?
gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
Av elgh aqin aamakanga _ .
alla _ pi laatagh aa _ .
aghtugh ma kanga _ .
mataawi tete yamigu _ amigh _ ketfagh luku _ saag saqminigu _ imeg uqagh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ qesugragh luni _ .
taagken _ alme si ll aat aamakanga _ .
ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh luni _ lliigh laatagh ma lghii _ .
tefaay _ !
